1b1(rnying rgyud): #/ gsang pa rnye pa/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo//
1b2(rnying rgyud): 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ longs spyod chen po/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i
1b3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang / so so ma yin tha
1b4(rnying rgyud): ming dang byer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na/ gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la/ ye shes rin po che 'bar
1b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i gzhal yas khang / rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir grwa bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis
2a1(rnying rgyud): mngasnya pa/ mchags brgya'i dris pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil lakhor mkhas pa rnams cad/ so sam yin pa nyid gcig pa y-i shes kun tu 'grol ba/ ya na
2a2(rnying rgyud): bsam kyis me khyab pa'i ye shes rin po che'i dbyibs dang / kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa zla da pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pas sngags pa/ tshad de ga tu med pa/ ye shes rin po ca rdzogs kyi tha~Mng bang/
2a3(rnying rgyud): chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs sna tshogs dang / sgra sna tshogs dang // dri sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la/ maM sgri ba ragasal ba'i
2a4(rnying rgyud): rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab pas bklubs pa/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rtab pas dang ldan pa/ phye dang nang med par kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na/ mi 'jigs pa me ge
2a5(rnying rgyud): da // stobs grang pa 'im da / rdzu 'bral ta'o ba dang / dbangs pa'i ba dang / thogs pa med pa rnam mkha' lding gi da / rang bzhin gyis 'odags pa'i nyin dkyipa 'khor da
2b1(rnying rgyud): gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la/ sgra mdun dang grub med pa/ thams cad du yang zhwal thal le bar gras la zhing mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa/ bsamagyis ma khyab pa thams cad du/ sgra gsung thugs rta thogs pa kun du snang ba/ thabs dang shes
2b2(rnying rgyud): rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rinu po che'i phyag rgya 'bar ba can/ gru gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
2b3(rnying rgyud): pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang / de dag kun
2b4(rnying rgyud): kyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / le ba rgan dang / ljang gu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings dang / sra ba'i dbyings dang / mnyen pa'i dbyings dang / dro ba'i dbyings dang / bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun mor
2b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang gnyis su med par chos kyi dbyings kun du mtha' yas par khyab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang /
2b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub chen po rdo rje sdom pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang / btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dab/ mnyan par bya ba dang / bsnam par bya ba dang / myang bar bya ba'i tshogs dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos
2b7(rnying rgyud): byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje sdom byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje phyong byed dang / btsun mo 'das pa dang / da ltar dang / 'byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i tshogs dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg pa dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje rig byed dang / 'bams
3a1(rnying rgyud): ma pa sman / tu / rgyu da nga ba sno spyang/ du/ da// n+ta ma rnam sa gas pa/ nga
3a2(rnying rgyud): mi ljang ba da gnyis sa med par bzugs so// de nas ni nag shegs pa brjod po tshogs da nyis skye rigs pa kyil 'khor de dag nyid rje gas dpa 'di nyid spyod gsung dang zugs yon du bzhin las rdo rje la swA pU hU~M// oM mr-im e mAH/
3a3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin byings nyid dang gyu mi shes dkyil 'khor thu // rang bzhid ti 'dzin ga n+ya brtan thamarna ma dag gi da de// sgyug phreng thogs dang sngon tan sbyin pas sa'i med pa son tan me bzhin ldan pan// ma mas
3a4(rnying rgyud): ga ga sa nas sbyi na du khyong ba zid 'a shi na po/ thams ca
3a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin gyi rtsal dzisabatsun rgyagyi mchos zin d+ha brjeng mos 'jug par gyu // / tshogs pas phyogs brgya ngas pazhi de sbyin shegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig sa da bzhin byed med pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid/ de btsun/
3a6(rnying rgyud): bA shegs pa nying lce byed brjod pa 'di brjod do// ma mata~M/ rdo rje zang po'i nga shin// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dz+ra bags// mched largya sa rnams mang po bran// byang chub sem srid pa'i dkyil khror rnyed // sar+b+ba s+than dang sa hA/
3a7(rnying rgyud): mi rlung gos dkar zlos ma / nam mkha dkyings kyi pa sugs// srid gsu ma ye nas sangs rgyas rjong // thams cad ma thas kyis so co// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs pas nyid las gzhan pa'i rdza /
3b1(rnying rgyud): sangs kyang chu kyis banas so// zhes 'ad pas/ dubanon gshags pathams cad nashes pa shAg// dunas rnyan ma ma sa gan tub na/ bcom ldan 'das yod kun nga da gas sa mod pa / dang/
3b2(rnying rgyud): brjod pa 'di bad na// tham phyogs bcu spyod khams se nas dben/ med pa ga dag pa'i nga // nyigs ma ni ba ldan pa das/ tid rtogasas pa sas// rjems na chos spyod las/
3b3(rnying rgyud): chos mi badzam/ da las gzhan nas bya ba'i chas// rgyal sang N+Dal bas me sa so// zhes brjod pas rnams cad ponas sangs rgyas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis pabyon to// de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid sbyin pas
3b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas pa'i sems ye shes sa bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi thos// rdzogasu pa'i sangs rgyas kun cigasang // lci ba med las rnams cad skyes/ skyes pa nyid na steb med// seM po mdzang rmad kyi
3b5(rnying rgyud): chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas san gyi gsang // 'greg pa myed pas thams cad 'gru// 'gag bzhid na 'gag pa med// e ma tong mtshar man gyi chos// rdzogs pa'i stangs tras phrin gyi gsad // gnasapa/ zed
3b6(rnying rgyud): cang banus// bzlas paskyed na gnas pa med// e ma hU~M mtshur rmad kyi rjes// rdzogs pa'i sangs cas twAn+ta rje gsang // dmyigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmyigs pa'aM na dmags pa med// a ma
3b7(rnying rgyud): rmad kyichos// rdzogs pa'i sangs byas kun gyi gsang // 'gro'ong med pas 'grod padzod// 'gro ro nyid na 'gro'ong med// ces brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang btsun mo tshogs thams cad kyang shes pas byang pa
4a1(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e mu ho ye nas gsang bang chos// sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang // ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gas pa//
4a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan du min las shin tu gsang // zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na'ang / 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa
4a3(rnying rgyud): las/ 'gro ba lnga'i ris bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la/ thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs
4a4(rnying rgyud): lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan gyis mkha'
4a5(rnying rgyud): la mdud pa 'dor// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas tshes// bstan phyir slo ba sna tshogs mdzad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo // gsang ba'i snying po de
4a6(rnying rgyud): kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las/ thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis brngubs zhes bya ba'o// rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug
4a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snre la gzhi dang yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re rer/ thub pa chen po bcom ldan
4b1(rnying rgyud): 'das re res 'dul ba rnam pa bzhes 'gro ba sdang don mang dang / bltams pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / dka' thab mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas pa dang / bad+mad brdul ba dang / chos kyi'akho la bskor ba dang / cho 'phrul blun pa bstan pa dang /
4b2(rnying rgyud): ngan las 'das pa la sogs par ston pa'i thub pas/ dus bzhi kun du mkhyen pa dang / thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu mkhyen pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis thams cad kun tu gzigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gsan
4b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs kun du don spyod pa dang / zag pa med pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po drug dang / kun du sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du zhal
4b4(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa zangs med pa phyogs brgyar snang bar gyur to// thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang / nyan thos
4b5(rnying rgyud): gyi theg pa dang / rang byang chub sa theg pa dang / byang chubasams dpa'i theg pa dang / blan myed pa'i zlag pas/ nA rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stod zag bsad ldan bzhi'i gnyen po / chos stong phrag bcad du rtsa
4b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i gyi nang gI rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'dzin pa 'khrul pa lngas bya dogs pa dang / las+tha dang las kyi 'azlas cu zung mi za ba dang / las dang
4b7(rnying rgyud): las kyi 'bras bus me gos/ gos par mi 'gyur/ gos su med par ston pa'i mthar thug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul ba'i chos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung
5a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyis// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor// myi mthun pade sdug myong bar 'gyur// rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// rnam dag dbyings
5a2(rnying rgyud): nyid tshul gcig go// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log pa d+h+r-ig po tsa mni dwe las// ze zhing zab pa'ang yad ma yin// log N+Dig nyid la nyid spyod pas// gzhan drugayo ban+de yang med// log tug+sa rmA zas spyan nyid/
5a3(rnying rgyud): kyang // gzhi zla med dbyings skad cig ma// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul// nyid la dbang lngar nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i dz+nyAn// rnam dag zla ma theg pa'i mchog/ theg pa bzhi yongs 'byung sa/
5a4(rnying rgyud): theg pa gcig gi 'bras bu ru gnas// yang dgra rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub// sangs kyis mya ngan yongs mi da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// mu rig smin mdzad 'dul ba'i phyir/
5a5(rnying rgyud): thang nas mya dran 'ang 'a bar sto// 'dul ba mdorje rjes mngon dang // dam chog zla ba dang grub pa dang // ya dag nga thugs tha~Md// rdzogs bzla pan tu ba zugs pa// gsu zan stong po las 'phos te// rang bye
5a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i phreng pa 'dra// gro gan nga byu pan gyi// debyu ga nas gtanas dam par 'pheban+d+ha// chos rnams mang btogs pa can// ston pas den dang mthun thogasas// mingang rdzog tu btags nas pas
5a7(rnying rgyud): pa dngos po med// ces rdzun/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag ted kyis gsang pa 'di nyid/ slong gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje lang byung ngo //
5b1(rnying rgyud): dmigs bdag turtags las 'phros// rgyud drug sgo 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang phyug brdzug 'khrul 'khor la sogs bya// log cig nyid las gzhan du ci yang med// song nyid bdagu med yo mthun
5b2(rnying rgyud): ra rig zugs// dmigs bya dmigs byed med par rngan dbang bsgyur// ngo mtshor lhagasang yin tan zhing khams las// gzhanan med de de nyid de ltar yin// zhes rdo rje ga song bcwa chog tu'o// zhes brjod pas/ thub pa
5b3(rnying rgyud): drug gi sgrub pa grangs med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi snga mkhyen te// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la
5b4(rnying rgyud): phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/ mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi
5b5(rnying rgyud): g.yo bar/ chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge 'phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di/ sgra dang gsung dang thugs dzA nI las phyung ngo // ar+g+ha rab tu brtan gyur a dkar lus// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs
5b6(rnying rgyud): bcug bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par brtan// de las meng tshogs gsal 'bar kun// spro zheng bsdub 'dra de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// badz+rA nA 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no//
5b7(rnying rgyud): aH/ ka khag kyang / tse ma d+ho&/ TaM Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta thad d+ha na/ pa pa~M Sha b+ha ma/ ya thar la/ sha Sha sa ha/ !me swaM/ u U/ e i/ oM oM/ 'di dag phyung bas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa/
6a1(rnying rgyud): rnam pA drug N+Da g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos nas/ chos thams nadu meng gi mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to// he de nus de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca gyis ni dang badzad pa 'di brjod // ang+ge song
6a2(rnying rgyud): mi stong gi// dgra ma 'ang dmigs su yong ma yin// thams cad myo tsam sangs rgyas kum// yi ge 'phreng ba nyid la gnas// a nyid la tshogs par snang pa'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// l+li pi myong gis hA
6a3(rnying rgyud): cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming // tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas// sna tshogs don chen lnga zhing ston// dngos med yi ge
6a4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin sems// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang // dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis// rol pa cir yang sbal cing ston// phyogs btu ngus bzhir gshegs pa yi// ye shes sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs//
6a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// yi ge 'go nas k+Sha la rdzogs// sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge ste// yi ge dngos po yod ma yin// dmyigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'o// sku gsang thugs kyi 'khor lo che// su gsung thugs
6a6(rnying rgyud): ni ngo mtshar gyi// ya mtshan 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa'o// dbyings lnga dbyings kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod// mgo ni ma nor la ma yin te// tig ni shes rab ming dra sba// shwad ni thabs chen tshigs
6a7(rnying rgyud): gcod// a ni s+ye med de bzhin dbyings// tha ni rdzu 'phrul rdo rje nyid// Ta ni snang ba'i sku 'phrul nyid// Da ni sgra 'phrul yod bzhin nyid// D+ha ni sgyu 'phrul rnapa dag nyid// Na ni kun du lta 'phrul nyid// sa ni dra bas mdor rdzogs nyid//
6b1(rnying rgyud): brtan pa da// da ni byas snyam mo ny-i // dz+nyA ni drabs 'breb pa nyid// na na bas na du 'gyur// kaR+Shu stan gyi thugs sde mchog/ khA nras+thAnA mra thugs kyi mchog/ grwan shangs su thugs kyi bachog/ rgani lcags kyi zugs
6b2(rnying rgyud): mchog/ nga ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o// san+ni sbyin gyi sra ye brjod// dz+nyAn rten sde myi mchog/ doni shangs sa sa mchog/ dzA dasngags kyi sgra/ yi mchog/ nyani sgra yang 'dug byed pa'o// pA di sbyir phyogs
6b3(rnying rgyud): phyini snyan gyi gsang gi mchog/ ba ni shangs kyi gsung gi mchog/ dz+nyAni ljags kyi gsang gi mchod// ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed// ya ni spyi ba rnam par dag/ wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin// da ni 'jig pa drag pad+mo// lan
6b4(rnying rgyud): stong pa dag pa'o// sha ne dag med dag pa ste// d+hA r+the da pa dang yod ma yin// sa nI man+t+ra 'thal bdag med pa// ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid// man pa shes thugs kyi thugs// oMn dz+wal snyed lha rnams ste// mI nI rbA snyid sbrul yi//
6b5(rnying rgyud): srin d+hal snyed ma rnams su// sman rdul skyed kyil sod rnams// ma rdug ny-id yo dwags su// i nI mra skyed lal naman// oM khrims da 'dzug par rjod// sa ni bis sa c-i zhig pa yid// la
6b6(rnying rgyud): sa/ sreg sa rnags kyi nga ba / zhes pa dang / sam+b+ha/ de nas na gshegs pa'i sri seM tshogs gnyis ma pa'i par khyong nga de phyogs na sngags gag
6b7(rnying rgyud): sa rdzun pa dasus babs rigs su tus kyi byung chu mas chis padris du ni/ sa bamami brjin mi ming kris na bdu du lathu 'ang nga kyi
7a1(rnying rgyud): ma da gas mapa phyin so// A/ ga // / sa dus gzugs bams dang saklo 'a na// gsu yang na
7a2(rnying rgyud): ma sa
7a3(rnying rgyud): sems nyid mig nga na/ / pa ste// gas sa dun sa 'a
7a4(rnying rgyud): du sa du smra
7a5(rnying rgyud): du/ pa bye du sa
7a6(rnying rgyud): 'dre 'du d+d+he par gyur/ nas sa shes nga gagazigs pa ma sprin ma nga banyid // 'ang bgasmra bu sru kyi khyong ba kyi rnags
7b1(rnying rgyud): yid bzhin mdzod// 'phel 'grib med par dbyung ba ste// dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur// dngos rnams nyid ni dngos med parwa// rtogs pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin// gang gis
7b2(rnying rgyud): dmigs med mi shes pa// de yis chos kyi dbyings mi shes// de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa// 'jig pas dmigs med shes par gyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ni de min// mtshan med ma yin/
7b3(rnying rgyud): rigs brgyad min// kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin// gnas su ma yin gang yang min// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu// thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas// tha dad min las tha/
7b4(rnying rgyud): dang ba'i// nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol// 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya'i mchog/ gang gis glang tshon myos daM dA'i sems// mnyam par gzhag pas btul nas su// sngags dang
7b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya rab brten na// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// gsang pa'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul drab sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u
7b6(rnying rgyud): skye lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid thams cad kyis/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la/ nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyung bur bzhed nas/
7b7(rnying rgyud): tshod du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te// dkyil 'khor bas ma yas spyan grub ni// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen po dpyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi
8a1(rnying rgyud): mA byu ba nas// b+h+ya d+hA byas pargyan pa rnams da / gan+d+ha zla bzhan/ nga rdzun// rlom ma sna tshugs ston nga gam/ khyu ga ba rtaganas sos brgyas/ srong ga klung can d+ha dang /
8a2(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// d+hI rmAbad+ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas nas mthong thos sdom pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs sgru baHsa// kr-I rbAd la~M nA~M
8a3(rnying rgyud): mthong byed dang // zos byed sdom byed myong byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thub drug dang // mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba dgu ni gnas par bstan// sgo khrud bzhi
8a4(rnying rgyud): 'dusmras pa ni/ brnyan drugs dang sbyin pa gnas/ brgya/ ba ma sa ming mamyigs ngas rnal brgyas pa 'dunang dag nas
8a5(rnying rgyud): brgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// mnyen lhag 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher ldan sdug gzi byin ldan// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste// mtha' dbus
8a6(rnying rgyud): med par khya'u pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// su yi phyag rgya che mchog ni// de bzhin dbyings lngas ma g.yos kyang // yang dag thar pa'i gzugs su dang // 'gro ba ma lus gdul ba'i phyir// mthun
8a7(rnying rgyud): byas sun tshogs kyi/ kun nyid rgyam mig su da pa sa ga sa 'ang / ga tho ba'i dang phyog na// seman rgyachog mas 'drab srung / dan tu kya /
8b1(rnying rgyud): bac+doMs kyang // las 'gro'i dbang gis so sor snang // dper na ma long chu zla bzhin// de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la// sdig slod gzugs su snang brda bstan// ny+dzar+g+ha thos rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgal rnams la/
8b2(rnying rgyud): bse ru'i tshul// gzhan yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin// 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu// sra ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste// swA yi
8b3(rnying rgyud): cho ste rnams mjal bar ston// me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du// dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel// 'khor kyis de bzhin su bltas na// byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med// me long bzhin du skul snang // de nas
8b4(rnying rgyud): sa bcu rim gyis 'byang // bla med byang chub yang dag thob// chos sku dpag med brjod du med// longs sgyu zad med yid bzhin gter// sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs// spyod yul kun
8b5(rnying rgyud): du maN+Da la// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog/ de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog/ skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sru// nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas// zad mi shes pa'i gter
8b6(rnying rgyud): du 'gyur// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sgra// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su// ngo tshe su lnga kun cing rdzogs// zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams ca
8b7(rnying rgyud): du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba/ zhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las
9a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje las byung ngo // yaH/ dmyigs bu dmigs ca med migs dbug me bsam me thug/ gas nga dag \u0f7fla 'khor du chags da mo dra// many+dzus dang mi mnyam su ma thag rtsub sang ra
9a2(rnying rgyud): ye nas kunags pa dkyil 'dzar rnam d+has zlos pa sa/ rnas gas ga tun/ sa ba'i lan nyi nas pa sas dkyil 'khor skyes pa'i lalas drug pa'i// de nas nga bstan
9a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa brgyan mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sgra dang gsang dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag kyang ngo // d+h+r-i bi ha bi Ta te/ dzI ba N+Dika/ mngon rtog/ sad+ya d+ha d+h+r-i// maM mA ra l-i ka/ hA pAHdz+dza// dr-i da d+hi b+hu rI/ la dra /
9a4(rnying rgyud): ga /
9a5(rnying rgyud): sa dA dzu pa swAH/ dz+riM shi ai d+ha kA ya swA d+ha/ dzAHhUM be+e prA baM sh+tsa/ phI a bo shAM/ bai d+hi ba su lji/ \u0f7fga tsiH/ mi mAnagr-ita dz+ra/ hUM d+hIt+taHt+yaM / bI ga phaH/ rje bratan kr-id phuH/ oM maHbadz+rad domad+ha
9a6(rnying rgyud): d+h+r-i lA n+ti hU~M phaT/ oM mai hUM daHd+hi ro ma d+hi r+g+ho d+he drA d+hi e nI trAM phAH/ oM ma hA pad+ma ti ngo mahA kro t+ti shwa d+hi hUM laSh+Ti hU~M phaT/ oM mi hA ka d+ha dra ma n+ta po d+hI br-i hrI nr-i hrI hrImra/ d+d+ho tsat+ta maM/ a a a ba dz+ra rba sa maN+Da yaHa mu na kr-in+ti
9a7(rnying rgyud): oM srin hU~M dz+haiM swAH/ oM mun hU~M s+t+rai hA/ oM mr-in hrIhA/ mi munak+ShaswAhA/ oM mun me swAhA/ oM e h+ye tib+ha ke bAn/ mahA&dra trikAR+Wa ts+tshaha~M/ sa ma 'i po/ / oM at+mak+ShaH/ babababab//
9b1(rnying rgyud): rnas rgya gyun gas du/ mu na spyod sa da du / du/ / na
9b2(rnying rgyud): sam yathA/ oM brnam ma pan zhes brjod pas/ gsang TI dkyil la bar di dag sa// dag sa seMg zugs panas cang labri par thugs so// bya/ thugs / nga blags so//
9b3(rnying rgyud): 'das byud pa badz+rarda dang / zla ba mtha gnyis sa myed pa'i dkyil 'khor la tsam par mang // den rtogs brdungs papa'adi bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen pos bdag nyi chen pa'i ye shes dri shin bsdu ba zhes bya
9b4(rnying rgyud): dadru gas dang thigs na nal drab las blang ngo // Am+b+haHbcu rdzun badz+ras zlapa / oM ma hA A rten brgyas rna/ med rje thargya rdzun tan pa ga sa
9b5(rnying rgyud): tan 'a / sa ga tim Ta brdzun thub / sa tu da
9b6(rnying rgyud): sa
9b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung // sla ming tshig garnams 'das// rgyags kyi rnams gas la pang 'byung // gsang gcig dkyil lakhar lan lag ni// bsam gyis ni khyab can du khyab// blang pa ring tshogs sa babrig
10a1(rnying rgyud): ga rgyagam/ dum ga smra gas nag ga ga da da// 'du // / spyod pan/
10a2(rnying rgyud): mchog ste// theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang // log 'gro ma lus thams cad sbyad// byang chub rdo rje gsung du bsdus// bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags// sgra nyid ma chags dang du gsungs// gsungs
10a3(rnying rgyud): pa nyid na brjod du med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor 'angal// dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs bzhin// gsung gcig sgra yis so sor go// de ni gsung mchog rgal po yin// theg
10a4(rnying rgyud): pa mthong man bsam yas kyang // de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// gdul bya'i thabs su so sor byos// ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang // de bzhin nyid kyis gsung pa med// yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung /
10a5(rnying rgyud): ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang // thugs rje gsung gi byin rlabs kyis// 'gro don sna tshogs mo sor gsal// gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje'i mchog/ de bzhin gsung gi 'ad+mo don rnams// de bzhin dang las ma g.yos
10a6(rnying rgyud): kyang // dper na thag ca'i sku bzhin no// gsung ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor bsdus pa dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ yan lag thams
10a7(rnying rgyud): cad dkyil 'khor du ldan gyis grub par byin gyis rlobs pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa// thams cad byang chub mchog she rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po'i phyag tu 'ad
10b1(rnying rgyud): dka'o// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin cen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lha gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar bas phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgya// oM dang muM gnyis k+She sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtse sprad pa// rgyal bu
10b2(rnying rgyud): kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bAkan// hUM bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'ang re// zla brtul 'bru was dri le gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi
10b3(rnying rgyud): sbas nas thugs kar bkran// muM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// A bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo dbar//
10b4(rnying rgyud): brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// lAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i
10b5(rnying rgyud): myadangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// ste bsgreng rtse mor rin rjen 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thug sr-i kar bkan/
10b6(rnying rgyud): mi sgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bad// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// e bskang rtse mor pad+ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing /
10b7(rnying rgyud): 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brten// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// bye bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// bcud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar
11a1(rnying rgyud): bkan// ha bsrung rtsa mor dral gri 'bad// thab rtul 'bu sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i rdul gyis chos lnga brten// 'bru bzhi smras nas thugs kar bkan+da// rtabag+hang ste mar ni la gsal 'bad/
11a2(rnying rgyud): nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// AHluk+Sha shing la sogs mtshan// rin rkyen mu ga ral gri 'bar// pad+ma dkar pa rdo rje 'ber// zas kyi 'khor la na can te// gzugs
11a3(rnying rgyud): rlon chen 'brang ba dang // pi wang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog 'greng dang spros mchod ma// mAr me thug pa la sogs pa'i// las la 'khril zhing chos la bstan// dbu rnams 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// gong
11a4(rnying rgyud): gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// sgo bzhi'i khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// nr-i mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon// bong sbrul chen po gnon pa dang // rdo rje rgya grA ma las kyi gnon// lcags kyu
11a5(rnying rgyud): zhags pa s+pho Ta ho// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang // 'dud tshul 'khril ba gong ma bzhin// thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug tu bstan// yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings// kun bzang
11a6(rnying rgyud): mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i skye la// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te// yang ni de bzhin gshegs nyid dA maM// yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid// phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog ni// thabs
11a7(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab ldan 'byor na// ma bskyod ma bskul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spos bdag ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'phror 'gyur// de ltar
11b1(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i gtso mchog gis// rgyal brgyal mchog de bzhin du// bcu gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro 'bar// de la sogs te bsam mi khyab// phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su// 'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston// theg pa
11b2(rnying rgyud): mtho dman thams cad dang // phyin rje log rnams bsam yas dang // zhi khro'i tshigs chen thams cad la// so sor mthun byas kun du snang // dper na gar mkhan nyid 'dra ba// lus la ma bkod sna tshogs ston// mdor na phyag
11b3(rnying rgyud): rgya thams cad ni// 'di zhes gcig ces brjod du med// gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro// bskyod dang spro ba'ang de bzhin te// mdor na sbrul spyod thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// gnas nyid mi gnas
11b4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'ang min// de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du byin gyis bsgrubs nas phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas de
11b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos/ rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'dri brjod do// shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du// thugs kyi dkyil
11b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor dam pa de// song ni bzhi yi tshad du bya// 'bru lnga spos lnga rin cen lnga// snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga nyid rab bsnams la// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// lte brtsibs dang ldan pa yi// rtsibs
11b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi pa// bar khyams sgo khud ldan par bya// sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la// tsa na'i 'bru tsam pad+ma'i gdan// yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge las// phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bi//
12a1(rnying rgyud): ga du// nan ga ma zla /
12a2(rnying rgyud): bani dra tshod // dbyibs dang kha dag metshan ldan pa // zhal dgyur pa'i ma stsal/ bza' brjing za ba'i tshugs rnams kyis/ sas bzhi'i mchod pa rnyegs sbyin// kho bo'i dkyil 'khod de bzhin du// shin tu phral sbyang
12a3(rnying rgyud): pa phyi// bsam yas dag la 'ang de bzhin bya// rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sbyin rtogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing // mnyen 'dza
12a4(rnying rgyud): na bde ba yi// sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi// mdzes par bris shing skyes pa dang // kun 'byung rin cen phung por 'bar// dbyibs legs sdong bu bro mchog bsil// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // rgan dang dpag
12a5(rnying rgyud): bsum ljon pa'i tsha la// klu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra// bArbi rkyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung rgyan se mo // bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang // rang la midzes pa brgyan pa yi// lha
12a6(rnying rgyud): lha mo rdul skyed kyis// bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis// rim gyis yang na cig car du/
12a7(rnying rgyud): rdzas kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing // mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// gsal ldan ma'am byin brlabs la// stong gsum yungs 'brur gzhug tshul ngu// dbyangs nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mdzod//
12b1(rnying rgyud): nus rbab 'a ma ga / da nan rnam dzad pa mos// sangs rgyan dmas 'a khang ma nas na nA// sna gsum rgyam pathams cadun// duga' brgyan pas grub pang 'tha// chub tu /
12b2(rnying rgyud): sa// phyogs bcu ngas pazhir gshegs pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'a khor ma skyes dang // khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du 'gyur// sras dag sems dang chos rnams cad// gdan 'a mo gnas
12b3(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa// mig yong rdul du sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom// kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas skyeb ma gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog ngas// rnal srid dang ni
12b4(rnying rgyud): gi lus// bu dang chung mnor kyi shog/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug yongs spyod las mchod na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshad ba yin// nye ba'i dkyil 'khor spos kyi dgos// nus pa rnam
12b5(rnying rgyud): cad dag par 'gyur// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs na// phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang // rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya// stong rjes chad ma zos par gzung // yang na rgyal mo rab bsnol nas/
12b6(rnying rgyud): ts+tshin po'i gang du nga// dkyil 'khor mdzu 'i gang tshad du yang // myakhas pas chog rje zhin // yang nus gzhi rab ma / mkhang khru gang chad draH// yung na lus gang tshad ngadu sre// yang na was nag
12b7(rnying rgyud): me// tha bu srid kyi byung // gis rgyan mangs pa'i yid 'a grags// theg ga dang cig phran sa mchogs// ma saldan can po mu mas / yang mthun ba cu drug dang / du'am nyi sa yar /
13a1(rnying rgyud): b+h+ya/ rigs kya kyil 'khor ldanam sas// swA// sang thugs ldan gzugs su dgrad// yang nanang blags bgan d+ha dam// nan ma khyod byungs nubs ma yas pad// sangs kyis
13a2(rnying rgyud): lha tshogs bsgom// ma mthong rmongs la bstan gyi mtshon// 'di/ shu rtsa lnga'am// lnga yi tshon gyis thi bar bya// 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye// ting 'dzin rol ma mtha' yas mcho// yi ge'am ga rnam
13a3(rnying rgyud): po'am// phyag rgya'am su gsung thugs ldan par// byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// 'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam// sa la sogs las phyag rgyar byas// rnam grol rim pa thob 'gyur na//
13a4(rnying rgyud): shes kyis spangs pas// smos ci dgos te 'di nyid min// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan dang ngo // rang mer ma
13a5(rnying rgyud): la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam stong bas// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ dpag pas pa shing dang yod ba rda
13a6(rnying rgyud): po che dang 'byung ba kun// de dag rdzas yad ma ldan te// rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshad rngo 'phrul rmad kyi chas// gzhan nu yod 'ongs ma yin te// thabs la brtan pa'i sha //
13a7(rnying rgyud): yingang du 'thung // shes nga byings kyi de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phrag rgya dbyung ba'i phyir// ma shes pa ni ma zhes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/ rdul bsngon byung skyob pa dang // byin chub sa ston par
13b1(rnying rgyud): nga du dradadu na na// rgyum na can sa rdzogs pas da/ phyogs / snru smran 'dzugs pas mas g+sa gyu na// da
13b2(rnying rgyud): TIg gam// bcu gnyis ban+d+ha bzhi ba ga sa/ dbang ldan rdzogs kyi ma pa 'gyug/ dacoM bcu drug rkyen mang kyis// na gyis rdzogs pa ni// mi b+h+yas ga de nyid // tshig
13b3(rnying rgyud): kyi mi khyib ma'a' mas maH// phyogs bcu ngas bzhi mngon rdzogs 'dzi// zhing khams nam dag bsnga mA las dang // myu bral bu'i gzhal yas/ khang // 'khor po'i rgyan de rim mo'i tsho gros// dkyil khor mdzum
13b4(rnying rgyud): da ma mas can// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang // sbyin gsung la don byung 'ang // man pa'i ye shes dang byung shA'o// gcig da ma rgyal ba ye// mtha' dang byes med de 'bring ny-id/
13b5(rnying rgyud): na sa sa // rdo gas rgyu// rgyas pas // ga la sa// 'a ng+ge semam
13b6(rnying rgyud): sa dzus da / sa sa // sa pa'i rnas pa/
13b7(rnying rgyud): me na pas tha pa gyus na ra mad do// gas 'i shing tsho 'on nyi nges pa pasadzo bkod pa'i gas pa 'di dang tshig gi le 'a steng pa la'o// de man
14a1(rnying rgyud): rlu na su ga ga na nga// / / nas / nas na
14a2(rnying rgyud): 'khar bsgyur// tan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas sa// gsal ba'i thig ming banyid// d+h+r-ig phyag tshogs mchog las// don chen dkyil 'kho gas lu rdzim// d+hi gas dbugasang chen gsang mjug gang // gas
14a3(rnying rgyud): kunal 'di mnyan par bya// gsang bya'i don nyid brtag pa las// gzhan du sgru bar bya ba min// gsal ba'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas sa// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// yig 'phreng ba'i tshogs mdzag lang // rigs
14a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsal 'phro thim// oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po// sku gla srang thugs kyi rdo rje gzung // rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// lag pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas
14a5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i theg le'i ngo bo nyid// hUM gi phyag rgya'i chags mchog las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal 'tsho ziste// oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin gyis// lus rnams mya lus kun gyis shig/ phanya mang po'i 'du 'phro kran/
14a6(rnying rgyud): kyi dgos pa byed pa yin// sna byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hrIHyi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// chos kyi 'khor logs la sngo na ma// oM chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis/ ded ldan smras
14a7(rnying rgyud): byams par byis/ rab 'thong bama'i po can la// mthun pa gsang bsgrags gzhan du min// spyod chen 'bang po'i gzhal las su// gas papa'i phyag da.oM swA yA nya rnams las// dkyil 'khor lde ga
14b1(rnying rgyud): bsgom// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje na// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa pa// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas
14b2(rnying rgyud): par// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang // go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bsku na//
14b3(rnying rgyud): dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song thams cad med pa dang // tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// zhes brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i
14b4(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'dri brjod do// rgya gcig pa dang yi ga 'bru'i
14b5(rnying rgyud): tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin i du shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
14b6(rnying rgyud): nyid du bsgom// yang na khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gzugs sgra dri re reg la sogs// rnam smin me du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gos rgyan bza' btung
14b7(rnying rgyud): dang tshig/ bro gar tshogs kyi smin phung la// hUM du shes pas rab spad na// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan po// dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // sgrub pa dang
15a1(rnying rgyud): srab chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'kho // 'di bzugs k+She dkyil 'khor b+h+yo// sang+yas rgyas nA rmugs ma lus la// dpes mnyam mdzug gi sbyin pas sa// / nga/ @
15a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor rdo rje'i lce yis blang // mkha' 'gro gsal 'bir tsho la sogs// yeng bzhin sbyin gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phan rngams// nye ba'i dkying du mkhas pas gzhag la phrag 'du byed bam
15a3(rnying rgyud): hUM du gyur pas rnam par dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgya 'bar// slar gyur 'od zer 'gro bas brjid// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar ba'i thabs// ye nas skye med bzhin nyid// su ma
15a4(rnying rgyud): khe mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med/ snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing // mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis// dkyil 'khor kun du bzang po yin pa// byed snyed
15a5(rnying rgyud): cha gas chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga dang lnga yi sbyor 'a// tshe ma
15a6(rnying rgyud): lnga yi lha bkor la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo badz+ra// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs te sku gsung thugs// khro bo tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshem bu gsus kyi rtsa rnams
15a7(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro ba tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// khro ga khro mo'i tshogs chen po// She nye phyag brtan bka' nyan tshogs// ci
15b1(rnying rgyud): sogs tshogs rnams kyis// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni// mnyam rdzog sa lhun grub dang gnas shing // spyod pas ci la'ang thogs med pa'i// thams cad yenas dbyer med
15b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje'i rig su thams cad dkyil// 'od 'phro 'bar bar rab tu bsgom// chags med tshul gyis bsnyim par bya// gnyis mid gyur nas phyag rgya che// yod na sku gsung thugs nyid de// thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs//
15b3(rnying rgyud): tIng 'dzin gsal 'bar 'od zer 'gro// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rigs 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar ba 'grub// nyonA mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// rdo rje ri rigs su/
15b4(rnying rgyud): skye ba'i gnas// sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro 'phreng bsgom// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis naM// 'od zer rnam pa mang po 'phro// gnyis su
15b5(rnying rgyud): med par bstim par bya// dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom// sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom// so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang // ting
15b6(rnying rgyud): yang dag so sor gsal// gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang // ma nyams blo ni rang ldan pas// dang por dam nos bzhin du bya// le lo phyid snyoms med pa yi// the tshom med par bsgrubs byas na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par
15b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje gsang mchog dam pa 'thob// sgrub pa'i zhag dang chos grangs ni// rgyud las rmos pa bzhin du bshad// rdo rje gsang ba'i cho ga tu'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ched du phreng ngo // gas
16a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khrur kyai liSh+Ta swA bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa da gyes pa rgyun pa ral ma'i sbyin rnam par spras te/ rgyan bkad pa'i ting nge 'ja nal
16a2(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas rgyud du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sku 'phrul drabs mngon rdzogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// tho gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis// 'dzal lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur//
16a3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyas ni// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni// yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grung // A li kA lo'i phyag tu
16a4(rnying rgyud): yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor ba'i gzungs// 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nas mthu can du gang gyur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// mi dang lha dang
16a5(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa yi// lte ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyang // khyad pad+mas la gnas 'gyur yin// pha rol phyin pa kun du thugs// thabs dang shes rab thabs kyi mchog/ shes rab mchog go mchog gyung pa'i// sa yi khyad par brgyad
16a6(rnying rgyud): gsung // d+ha bas byed par ldan gyi rdzogs// mkha'i dkyil dang sa pa'i dbying sa nIH// ye shes rgyal po stongs dpral brnam// tshul ba'i dkyil 'khar thams cad kun// ma lus par de bsgom par 'gyur// dris pani phyog
16a7(rnying rgyud): btsug nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rlud ma 'gyur// sems tang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas to// sangs rgyas gzhan nas ma tshol cig/ dkyil lakhang kun du ba sbyang bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grib papa dru/
16b1(rnying rgyud): cho ga lhag gam mtshad na'ang// skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med// chos rkyod du brjod pa sa rol mo'i spyan zhes mnyes par gyur to// gas ba slong pamanan nyid ngas pa rgyas chags bsgrub pa'i lho'u sku 'jug sa pa// / dan na/
16b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bac+doM dus bzhi'i spyi dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dgyes pa chen pos/ chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por ldan gyis grib pa'i dam tshig shin tu gas pa
16b3(rnying rgyud): po sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ma togs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba
16b4(rnying rgyud): don rnams ni// yi ge sgra btags med tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gi sta rab mtshon te// khong nas grub sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni
16b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig lde dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi grum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te//
16b6(rnying rgyud): chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams// kun tu bzudang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa 'i// thugs kyi la shes lngas lta zhing // snying po thog la mnyam spong bam// bde ba'i ye shes pas
16b7(rnying rgyud): yis// ye shes dgyes la mchod par 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes su ma rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/
17a1(rnying rgyud): b+h+yaH/ phyogs bcu dus bzhir mngon rtags pa'o// sku gsung yon tan 'dzin las thugs// mA lus bdag nyid zhul maN+Da ga/ dbang sgyu sa cag tung dam pa yin// dAk+Sha 'khyud la gan su dkyil la khor byung // rdzad
17a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor lhan gyis grub// rgyun du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil
17a3(rnying rgyud): sgrol ba yi// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung kun dum lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'dang bar
17a4(rnying rgyud): mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur/
17a5(rnying rgyud): bskul pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing // dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ni// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi// rgal ba'i dkyil
17a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor ma lus pa// bsten nas sru lnga lhun gyis rdzogs// 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor/
17a7(rnying rgyud): ma lus la// 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// kun gyi phyag rgya chen po mchog/ thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis zung // snod ldan ngang tshul
17b1(rnying rgyud): sdug da // 'dudu ra/ / su ma na/ sa dudu dug
17b2(rnying rgyud): sa na rgyu
17b3(rnying rgyud): na tu smra ma shA sa/ /
17b4(rnying rgyud): na ga na
17b5(rnying rgyud): sa
17b6(rnying rgyud): sun
18a1(rnying rgyud): n+ya kyi bdag pa sang+yas rgyas thams cad ngapa nyid kyisazla ba'i dkyil la khor mngon par 'du mdza da / nargya'abyi zhen/ bdug turtangs pa'i rtag pa dang / btags bra la ma ngan pa ldan pas/ yang dag pa
18a2(rnying rgyud): dang bral ba dag/ gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gseng ba la mngon par 'tshal nas/ rgya drung 'bras bu la rmongs pas/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsib myos 'phangs nas/ mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i da myal bar skyes so//
18a3(rnying rgyud): du rab tun pa'i sdug bsngal drag pos gadzangs pa dang / 'di bas shin tu grang yung cem rungs snyam pa'i mad la/ rab tu slebs pa dang / pad+ma wA gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab cu gdungs pa de lta bu'i lhag bsngal rab
18a4(rnying rgyud): bil sogs pa brgyad dang / shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brdung ba dag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo // de nas rnam par ldan pa de zad pa dang / yi dgas lhogs pa dang /
18a5(rnying rgyud): skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis rab tu nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams snyid du mi 'ang ba dang / gdug cedu sgrub pa'i dngom po sna tshogs su gyur pa dang / yod mad par yang 'gyur zhing / shin tu dad cing bskams pa dang / lus
18a6(rnying rgyud): yan lag dang dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur par bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so// de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa'i khyad kyis bsrabs pa dang / sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas/ yi dgas srin po chen por
18a7(rnying rgyud): tu gdug pa gtum po lngas gcig la meg po brgya pa dang / mgri sde chags pa dang / lus brgyal mag pa gcig pa dang / lus snga tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang / yan lags tshogs pa dang / gdug pa'i lag cha
18b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa zags pa/ 'khar rab tu mang po dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs snga chags dang / 'jigs pa'i m+b+ha s+thA rtags rmugs pa/ gzugs dang dang / dri dang khargyangs rjes thams cad skye blang zhes byu g+ha/ rab tu 'ang dang /
18b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rlung nag dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs bcu kun \u0f7f khams 'khrugs par byed pa/ nang bzhib rgya rtsi bzhi 'dabs par byed pa/ myas shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus/ klu'i ris dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang /
18b3(rnying rgyud): lha ris dang / tshangs pa'i ris dang / 'ad gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus so// rnga ston bsnyen pa'i stobs kyis thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur
18b4(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rdo rje bkod pa'i sgra 'phrul tra bAswa/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu sred pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i ngamal chen po'i gzi brjid ston pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skrag
18b5(rnying rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i bdag pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkyus pa chen pas khro bo'i bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phra ba'i/ sgra 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal ba'i ting dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyang /
18b6(rnying rgyud): nga sheg can ma mngon du zung ste/ gas dkris pa'i gcis dngas kyis/ rkyen can pad+hanas pa mdzang nas/ bas su mad pa bsgra babyed pas pasarnas nas/ zung du sa skye du'i shib
18b7(rnying rgyud): la sa hreM la nga zhes badri pas ga tu dugagacugs bcu tho mam pa khyab pa ma pa'i kyil ma rgyag rgyang gsumatha' sa rgya tsam rtsegs ba tshul sa da'i
19a1(rnying rgyud): nAs/ bdag rten drug gaphyogs bcwa rnams cad g.yos/ rab tu gams/ kun drugasasaso// dza dad+ha / ra d+d+had+d+haSh+TA / krAn+nad+haSh+Ta wA ro// rnas rgyas/ rab tu mtsham/ kun du chem rdzam ma// shas
19a2(rnying rgyud): shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun du shig shig go// gtor gtor/ rab tu gtor gtor/ kun du gtong ga tor ro// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs badz+ro'i sdong khams thams cad na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang / gzi rjid che bdang /
19a3(rnying rgyud): mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal/ rab tu bkyil/ kun du brtsal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid/ 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa spyi bung zhes byung ba'i 'bar batshan
19a4(rnying rgyud): po'i khrug 'thung skye smug nu ga zer yang 'gyu ba byA dang phyagu du zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshan che sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbugasum gyig drug zhabs bzhir sbyar te/ dur khrod chen por dkris nas khrig gi rgyu ma'i dkyil nA/
19a5(rnying rgyud): dus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng 'bar ba chen po'i klong gi 'khor lo'i dkyilan dbang phyug chen po dang / dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa chen po khyo shug gi gdun la brkyangs bskams su bzhugs so// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin
19a6(rnying rgyud): krung de dag kyang / lha la ni dpal khrug 'thung chen por gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po cher gyur te lha phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+mar gyur te rngung
19a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun du las su gyur te byang phyogs su bzhugs so// de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang / rngam pa'i nga ro dang / 'bar ba'i klong ni/ dbu gsum
19b1(rnying rgyud): rdzagadru ga zhabs bzhes/ dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / sran po dang / gshin rnga las shes pa lho shug gis gdan byas pa la brgyangs bskums smra bzugs so// btsun mo khrag bzung can ma tshogs rnams kyang ma sa sral
19b2(rnying rgyud): 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// / rigs lngaman ma mnyanas ni/ sa sa na/ ram ma/ sa/ gzug na 'a sengs shi gas shing / thad pa mgu yon/ sa ci pa dug ni
19b3(rnying rgyud): na/ don na na 'i ma gas pa me na pa na/ he ru ka gcig tu bstim te bzlas nas gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar te/ de nas dregs pa chen po la sogs
19b4(rnying rgyud): phrag sa pa'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'thub zed pa sna rdzogs bstan nas/ mamin gtsug tu gdug pa'i nga res/ banang po'i gtam tshig tu smras pa/ bang tha~Mng snying rje'i bdag btso gang byung dam zhes 'ad zhing / shin tu gdug pa
19b5(rnying rgyud): sems kyis khros nas rngam mo// de na sa bcom ldan 'dis dgras pa chen po dbu dgra phyag bco brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas/ rngam pa'i skad kyis thugs nas 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin+da \u0f7f/ khros nas/ ts+tshidz+haiM dz+dza/ ha ha ha// ThA he/ Ni ts+tsha /
19b6(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod nas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa/ gdug pa chan pa'i tshegs dngadag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung / nang khrol kun drangs/ yan lag kun bcud gathubs nas sha kun thos/ lpag sun thungs/ rus pa kun 'argyas/
19b7(rnying rgyud): sus sa su ma su zhes su ru/ phyogs pa'i 'dog ta gyi khams drim pa 'du gyis pa srungs 'acu cog rgyam du chud par bas so// denam nga ba malus pa'i rgyamo pa'i yang rgyal pordzogs pa da/
20a1(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung po thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo/ srin mo chen mo mi srin mo dang / tshangs mA dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug skyed mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi
20a2(rnying rgyud): mo dang / zhib mo dang / be con mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos ma dang / gcig pur spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / me mo dang /
20a3(rnying rgyud): phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chen mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum rna sngo nag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin sdeng nag chen mo la sogs pa/ bran dang yang bran dang / g.yog dang
20a4(rnying rgyud): yang g.yog 'khor zhing gi rdul skyed kyang bsdus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis/ yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed chen po snang bar byas nas/ de dag
20a5(rnying rgyud): kun kyang dgyes pas rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di byung ngo // oM AHhUM badz+ra pra be sha a la la hoHzhes brjod pas/ 'byung mo'i rgyal
20a6(rnying rgyud): mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor spyad cing rgyas par gyur nas/ dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i sku la/ srid
20a7(rnying rgyud): mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang / dmar mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / dmar ser chen mo dang / sngo nag chen mo dang / ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung
20b1(rnying rgyud): rkyod pa 'i gshegs par sprul/ ngas ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang ma dang / 'dug snyed mo dang / gzhon nu monams Sh+kuphywag+sa// bcom ldan 'das dbyal lags ban pa 'i sbal// bdud bya ma dung /
20b2(rnying rgyud): blo dang / btson mo dang / zab mdang/ sbyin marnams khyim mo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrog blang chen po pad+ma'i tshul// khrag gis myos ma dang / gcig par spyod mya dang / yad 'i phyog ma dang / grwa ma dang/ rlung mi
20b3(rnying rgyud): 'khyil lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrig nga chen po kun du las kyi sku le/ mi ma dang / phag mo dang / gan byed mo dang / chen mi da / chu l+h+wa ma rnams bkyil mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dkris pa chen po'i zha ba'i
20b4(rnying rgyud): 'khyo de dag gis/ hUM zhes brjod pas/ bye 'i dkyil mkhyoHb+h+rUM tshogs bsgos nas shin tu btsum par sbyar to// de nas dgyes te ha zhem brjod pas/ byang chub sems kyi sbyin lngas/ dkar mo'i tshogs dang / rkun mo'i tshogs da /
20b5(rnying rgyud): rmongs mi'i tshogs dang / thas byed myin tshogs dang / skom+b+ha m+bu'i chags dang / gtum mi'i tshogs dadi/ skye sha nam gyi tshogs dang / mtshogs ma'i rdzogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang / ngo mtshar dang baHsi nas 'byon to//
20b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin nas kyang 'byur brgyad pa khang momamathun shing blugs nas labar ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs ring gi lag chad dang bcas nas 'khyod pa// de na sa shin tu dgyes nas hU~M shes bdod pas/ seng gdong byi ge'i tshogs
20b7(rnying rgyud): da/ stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / wa gdod chen mo'i phyogs dang // khyi gdod chen mo'i tshogs dang / bzhud gdong chen ma'i tshogs dang / kA ki gardo rje chen mo'i tshogs dang / khwa gdong chen mo chags
21a1(rnying rgyud): dang / thug pa'i gdong dz+nyAn mam tshugs dang bzlas pa rnams/ rang rang gi lag cha dam ma tshad bcas nas 'gron pa gyur // 'thon nas kyang 'ab rgyan par khang man rol shar rdzogs nas 'kho
21a2(rnying rgyud): rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par khyab nas phaT ces brjod pas/ rdo rje sring ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdang ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'jig rten mo'i tshogs dang /
21a3(rnying rgyud): langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang / ngo mtshar du ma bcas nas 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snod shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes pa chen pa'i sprin pa
21a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu na swa phaT ces bsgrags pas/ thams cad khros nas ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin par bkye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun
21a5(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen po bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // oM badz+ra ma hA a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+ha aM aM aM zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la
21a6(rnying rgyud): sogs pa thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gis bsnams nas bton te/ mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtshor chud pa las bsnams nas u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha phyung nas 'dam kun 'thungs te dran pa slar rnyed nas/ khro bo'i
21a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu bcu phyag stong brgyad brgya/ zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor na bzhugs par mthong ngo // de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa kun
21b1(rnying rgyud): du thogs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par sa sor snang bas nas gcig tu brtul lo// de nas da dag shrIn tu 'dar zhing drang pa rab tu rnam pa' rangs/ 'byangs su ts+tsha/ @
21b2(rnying rgyud): su mtsha/ 'bangs sunan tan ma bgyis nA// mgo dang lus ni bcur 'gas shing // snying yang 'gas shing gtubs gyur cig/ rul phyogs tshe ga nas brlag pa dang / dmyal bar sbyang nas 'bod par sho
21b3(rnying rgyud): 'byangs su mardzi bar+ya man 'bang nas// kyil 'khod kyi gden du zhag sa// thams cad kyis maldan ga tsug tu yang smras pa/ bdag d+ha g+h+ra rnams kyi mchis zing da // ma dang rlom sring mornams// dkyil ma
21b4(rnying rgyud): bor bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo je bzhes su gu stso// bdag chags so 'khor bzlas kyi// rdzogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'adi'i// meng tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang // gtsug gnor bu bar bltar// ga
21b5(rnying rgyud): med cing gus ldan pa'i// sems kyis blangs nas spyi bo yi// gtsug tu bzhag ste bkung bar bani// de yi dgos pa n+ti pad+ma rung // mA lus rdzogs par bdag cag bad+ma ba// gal te dpa' bo'i stan snga 'dir // spros pa bzhin du
21b6(rnying rgyud): ma bsgrubasten// bdag cag rnams ni mgo lus skyong // bkas garbabs ng+ge buMr rdul dar mchi'o// zhes smras so// de nas de dag gi chung ma'i tshogs dang / mdang snying mo dang bu ma'i tshogs thams rbad dkyil khong du rma
21b7(rnying rgyud): tsamagyis 'angs nas/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cig 'khor tshogs thams cad kyan// dpa' bo che mapo'i 'bangs su mtsho// dpa' bo chen pos bdag cag la// las kyi darjes grub sngam du gas so//
22a1(rnying rgyud): zhes smrasas// dra nas bcom ldan 'das dkris pa rnon pa sa lag nga ston nas stong ga dbang ba sa mnan+tu rgyu na/ nga// gang ba ba ldan na dngos pa sa kho ban spyod
22a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi sbyin rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis sgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo khrag 'thung
22a3(rnying rgyud): chen po brtson mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo // oM sarba tA thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka/ ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hUM phaT/
22a4(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA n+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa huM hUM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na ma stu shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+yA ka ha na da ha paM tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka hI na da hA pa tsa hU~M hUM hUM phuT/ oM karma
22a5(rnying rgyud): ma hA shrI he nA ka me hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta kA ha ni da ha ba tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta m+me hA pro dz+haiM shwa rI sarba duSh+TA n+ya hUM phaT/ oM mu hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI dz+wa lan+ti hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA s+phur+ye rat+na mu hA krod+d+hi shwa rI bi da ma hUM phaT/ oM ny+tsi shud+d+ha sa mar+tha/
22a6(rnying rgyud): pad+ma ma hU~M kro n+te shwa rI ShA haM hUM phaT/ oM sArba a mo g+hu mAM hU~M kr-id+h+we shwa rI bi shwa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kai rA hI/ badz+dzi ts+yairI ha/ badz+ra pra mo he ha/ 'ongs skr-i ta dang bi sman ni rting zad tshe tshomarba ldang yang kyad la sa~M sa skr-i tI kho na ring med pas rod thos gyi gsung bzhin bcos nam nad ma
22a7(rnying rgyud): babyu ba'o// badz+ra bad+d+hA mA~M ti/ badz+ra tsaN+DI lIha/ ba~M dz+ri wika sI ha/ badz+re g+haswa dIta/ badz+ra swa n-is+t+wa~M/ ba~Mdz+ra sa~Mng+ga mu ShI ha/ badz+ra b+hA g+h+raM mu khI ga/ badz+ra mr-it+pa la mu khI he/ badz+ra shA nA mu khI he/ badz+ra gr-i d+ha mra ShI he/ badz+ra kang+ka mraShI he/ @
22b1(rnying rgyud): blan sa / sasan/ na sag tu rgyu na na nan na
22b2(rnying rgyud): ru lu dz+dza/ a h+ye hi An ya/ dzaHts+tsha ba~M hoH/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya b+hUM/ oM khro la khos byas ni mdzad pa// thub khrod pa la rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs meng po che// de nyid du ni bdag pa stsol// oM bar+d+ha dz+ra d+ha sa ma ya~M s+t+wa~M/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha sa ma ya
22b3(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hauH/ a li u li tA li ta bA laM/ daMSh+Ta go nA rau dr-i/ kha ri yo gai r+b+hi khA ti hoHg+hi ha he phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad tshig/ rab tu tshig/ kun du tshig go// 'bar/ rab tu
22b4(rnying rgyud): 'bar/ kun tu 'bur ro// thams cad du 'bar pa'i dkyil klu 'di rje chag gi skad yin la dong zom chos bzang bzhed rjes lo chen bsod nams rgya mtsho ga sung / 'khor gyi tshogs kyis glang rab tu gang / kun du gang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
22b5(rnying rgyud): nges pa las khro bo'i tshogs chen po'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ de dgu gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'byung ba'i 'khor
22b6(rnying rgyud): lo rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chung bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyad bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i byar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod spel sna tshogs nyi mas brjing // 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he
22b7(rnying rgyud): gzig dang stag/ gtum pa dom gyi spar bas ni// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung // smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang // dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i spu// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang // ko rlon gos ni
23a1(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs ston// rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// sbrulnga dang zod zong ko na'i chus// stong gi 'dzag rten ra lug bcas/ dzA r+d+ha drung tshun gra ba dang // ral gre dgra sta gshal la sogs// rang /
23a2(rnying rgyud): gri lag cha sna tshogs te// btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tsho gas dang 'khril// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyas rab mdzes shing // slas dang bye mo thun mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang
23a3(rnying rgyud): gi stan dang lag chu dang // ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs btu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du gsal bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
23a4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen po 'di ched du brjod do// de la mchod sbyin dam ni// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral// de nas gnyis
23a5(rnying rgyud): med blo yis ni// blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje// gnyis su med par bskal bar bya'o// 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dang // bdag dang mnyam
23a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs la dbul// bza' drang bca' dang btud dang bgo// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// bde gshegs yon tan rmad po che// gzhan
23a7(rnying rgyud): nas yod 'ongs ma yin na// lha srin la sogs spros ci dgos// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs 'gyur zhing // gsal la yod gnyis med pa na// dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur// zhes brjod
23b1(rnying rgyud): pas/ mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to// gsung ba'o snying po de kho na ny-i nges pA lus mchod sprin dam pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwo brgyan pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
23b2(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen pos sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po 'di ched du brjod do// bla med theg par rab des na// nyon mongs las rnams kun spyod kyang // byas la mi sogs tshogs 'gyur te// tshul khrims slom
23b3(rnying rgyud): pa phun sum tshogs// bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu// 'dul ba'i dbang gis tshul khrims dang // ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ yod med dbu ma mi dmigs shing // sum mig yor lta bu'i
23b4(rnying rgyud): tshul// srog med srog kyang gcad du med// srog dang skyes bu log rtog tsam// bden pa gnyis ka dbyer med pas// 'phrul dga'i tshul te tha dad min// gzhan dang ma rten med pa'i phyir// blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings// chos
23b5(rnying rgyud): rnams sgyu ma lta bu la// ming dang tshig tu btags pa rdzun// rdzun nyid la ni brdzun spyod pa// rdzun zhes btags tsam yod ma yin// ma chags pa la chags pa dang // chags pa nyidadra na chags pa med// de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po
23b6(rnying rgyud): ste// shin tu chags pa chen po yin// bla med mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir sgra mi bya// 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te// bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig
23b7(rnying rgyud): chog/ gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang // ngargyal phrag dog mi sring ngo // dkar rtsed dmar rje rje sha chen// dag pa'i sdod rgya mo dor ro// yan lag bcu yangs tshig ste// ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spang // bsrung zhing ba
24a1(rnying rgyud): dmardzog la// tsA ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// dz+ha srung ma dar ldag na stan// yan la gang ma chog 'du ma/ mnyam bam par sgyu ba // sargyam pa dang nag / nas na// mnyam \u0f7fnas rgyan/
24a2(rnying rgyud): po thob 'gyur bas// 'das na sangs rgyas mya yin no// zla ba nyams pa'i 'chal ba dag/ gos la nye bar la brtson dang // skad cig yud tsam sgra ma byed// nyams g+har zhes pa brjod pa 'dra// rtsa ba 'di mchog nyams gyur na// bsgrub
24a3(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad log par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'dra// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung // dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid
24a4(rnying rgyud): yin// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni// gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la// gcig la'ang bcu phrab gnyis su dbye// dam tshig 'di ni rmang po che// 'jig rten dug gi phrogs bcu na// sring
24a5(rnying rgyud): gsum 'gro ba'i sbed pa// rtog 'dul mtshig de srid smos// gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yis// skyab med mchog dam ma lus 'grub// de la sogs pa mthe'i yas mchog/ rgyal ba'i/
24a6(rnying rgyud): rigs mchog 'dzin pa de// 'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur/ dam pa'i mchog dang dam pa yis// sras dang sprin dgongs byin gyis rgyob// bdu gshegs nyid kyi yul la zhugs// 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor//
24a7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs// ji skyed sdom pa bsam pas 'dus// malus rnam+ba dang lhun gyis thub// nyams na bsgrengs pas rdzogs pa dang // de la sogs pa mtha' yas mcho// ces brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
24b1(rnying rgyud): nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dus par gyur to// gsung ba'i snying po de kho na nyid ngas pu las dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po lhan gyis grub
24b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gtumu chen rngam pa la// khros pa'i yi kyis mchod sbyin
24b3(rnying rgyud): bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sgra yang 'dzag/ pad+mad rtse lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje phur bu su gangadab// rdul du byas la tshogs la dbul// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
24b4(rnying rgyud): mchog/ lu gu rgyud du spel bsdams nas// bcings gyur bskyod nas phyogs btur g.yos// myos na sa gas te 'chog par 'gyur// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gru zi brjid lhun chen la// chags
24b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma med du bcas par bya// rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab// chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul// waM rgya
24b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams// 'gugs 'gyur rdo rje'ang rtse bzhin 'brangs// rje 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'brar ba 'du 'phrog zi chen la// draga'
24b7(rnying rgyud): 'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon nyin nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga'i ma zas yul// mtshan ma ming dang bcas pa bya// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtags// nga rgyal dga' 'dre'i phur pa gdab// rdo rje'i gzi cher
25a1(rnying rgyud): 'phel bar dbul// ma ma tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyung du sbrel bsnams bapyod// gzi brjing 'bar ba'i 'gul chen spro// yid bzhin nam mkha' ga bar 'gyur// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil
25a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi badz+rod 'tsher ba la// drang bya'i yid kyis mchod ston gyi// gtum chen rngam pa'ang lhan ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lngal// gtum dze ma 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ne re gsal ba'i
25a3(rnying rgyud): phur bu sa gdab// 'bar ba lhanA ne'i tshogs la dbul// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// 'bar ba lhan ne'i byin gyis khyab// thams cad g.yo ba med par byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/
25a4(rnying rgyud): lhag ma'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa sbyin// rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags nas// gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo// sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka/ shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can// thams cad ma lus 'jal mdzad pa'i// dbang dang
25a5(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs rmad po che// lha chen la sogs dbang du bsdus// 'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas// so so'i las rnams bskos pa de// ji ltar dam bcas khas blangs pa'i// ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung // dam bcas
25a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin du ma byas na// ji ltar dam bcas mna' bor ba'i// sdom bcas de las 'da' bar 'gyur// dam tshig de las 'das gyur na// mgo lus snying yang tshal pa bdun// yak+Sha khro bos gtubs par 'gyur// de bas rnal 'byor
25a7(rnying rgyud): sngags 'chang gis// ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos// las de mngon du ma byas na// rang gis mna' bor khas blangs bzhin// rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro// rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i// las rnams yongs su bya
25b1(rnying rgyud): ba dang // 'khor rnams grag cig bzhin du stong // la mAn ma yang dngos grub 'thob// bcol pa'i lhas rnams myangon du thos// zhes pasl-i'o// khro bo slab pa la s+yA sh+ma g+hats+tsha ba ni 'di yin no// khrag 'brang chen po la sogs pa'i/ p+la
25b2(rnying rgyud): gar grwa chog chen pos ni// thams cad thams cad ci 'dod pa// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'i// sro ga ri ga tshig chen mos ni// 'dra bde 'dod na 'dra bar byer// 'phel bar 'dod na
25b3(rnying rgyud): bar byed// sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glo tshig chen mos ni// lhan ner 'dod na lhun nir byed// rmugs pur 'dod na thugs par byed// seng gdod chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gang sra tshig chen mos ni// thams cad
25b4(rnying rgyud): kun la za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gang glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad ma lus 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// skyes dang gyi mo bran mo'i tshogs
25b5(rnying rgyud): bro gar grwa tshig chen mos ni// rbad rdzing gtang bar bya ba ste// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// ljon pa dang ni stug phran tshal// sdod garti ga dang ni me reg rung // dang byis dga' ba chags pa dang // byis pas kA li rab tu bya// zhes
25b6(rnying rgyud): brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid stong par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las lhun gyis grub pa'i 'byin las byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nya shu pa'o// / de nas bcom
25b7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs kyi dkyil khor gyis shin tu rngam pa'i mdangs kyis klu 'di blangs so// hUMg tum chen dus mtha'i mi chen 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// mche bzangs
26a1(rnying rgyud): yag zazung rje hoH/ lha ma pa'i 'brug stong spyor// gtum tshan ro bu 'bram pa rgyal skang // u la nyala'ogang d+hA N+Da// skyugs pa'i 'phror rlung gas bar+d+ha haH/ ba shes rab 'od baH// ye shes
26a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor kun du gsal// 'bar pa'i ye shes kun du 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes shig le h+ye hoH/ hUM khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po// 'thos pa'i dkyil 'a khor char chen 'de bros// dkyil lo por yang bzhin 'byung ba'i gter//
26a3(rnying rgyud): thos pa'i thig le che hoH/ hUM bdud kun gyi ni bdag chen po// bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po thig le che hoH// hU~M rdo rje brag chen sra pa po// rdo rje chu'i sdung che
26a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje me skye kun 'dar che// rdo rje chung ste 'thong rlung che hoH// zhes tshe dang rdzu blangs so// gsang ba'i snyid po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo lnga bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa
26a5(rnying rgyud): chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid li ge seng sngags kyi rtsal po brtan par ga thong ba 'di ched du brjod dri// the me tshogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin dadi// de zhi na gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// gzung 'dzin spros la 'tshal ba yis/
26a6(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog zhags pas so sor 'dzin// sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro bre' lam// ye shes de mtshar rab 'byams kyis// don du mi 'gyur yongs mya gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
26a7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'// sgo dang skur pa zhi ba yi// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na
26b1(rnying rgyud): nyid da nges pa'i dbyangs nas skang // de ni nges par lung bstan to// skas ni thugs lus skyes pa yin// sa rab rigs pa 'dzin la gnas// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dasas nas dus bzhis nyam
26b2(rnying rgyud): nyidakyi dbyings// sku gsung thugs ldani stug po bkod pa can nyid du bzhugs so// 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po sgra 'phrul drub le'u stong phrag ban+d+ha pa las mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad gi lhung gi sti de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
26b3(rnying rgyud): gas ba gsang po'i snying po kho na nyid nges pa las thams cad ma lus por 'bros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog/ gsang ba'i snying po de khon nyid nges pa 'is mnyes pa dang yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu ga nyis
26b4(rnying rgyud): par/ na r+b+ha s+t+wa~M ga be hU t+na d+hU pa/ bsel ldan 'din sde snong 'dzin nams te// nadu nad+hA ska rgyal po gang bltad// ga da pa na sa so// kun nas thal la rab tu ga //
26b5(rnying rgyud): chen bcom ldan la gr-i hU~Ml gyur TI ga// spyan sngar zhub/ dpal gseng po snying po'i rgyud kyi cung pa ze sA li bA sbyar gusangs pa la/ dpe ra ta wa'i lom la pa~M ge wan+ta la shin tu legs pa kris pa/ ste ng+yas su byon pas/ yi ge la la dzubs/ 2dz+ra/
26b6(rnying rgyud): dgra pa'i stong depa ta le'i byang bu gcig kyang cid/ mjug kyang ma rdzogs pa zhig gdo'i/ 'on kyang le'u nyi shus rdzogs nas ma 'gyur ba 'du gnyis rdzogs sdeni pa zhe gro gda'/ des kyang ji tsa mardzogs mi 'tshal/ gnyis po 'di la
26b7(rnying rgyud): bgyis na nidago'as snyam par gda' sem bgyis/ 'ga' zhig la zung nga bgyis pa 'di dag la yang nor ba mchis pas de rnams legs par 'chos pa dang / 'di gnyis legs par bsgyur ba yang thA/ gdan mtshams spong ma byas pa dang /
27a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ tshogs bcad la shang mthos pa rnams rgyang ba la sar 'dug pa bzhin thos pa lags s+ho// dab nas kyang banas su// rlung dun sbyang pong bul san 'dus pa dang // dbyung mod d+ha tshan 'ang bu dang gzhan// zab ma'i kyang dang /
27a2(rnying rgyud): thag chen chos rnams dang // mjal nas tshul bzhin grub bzod par shog// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas gtsang stang gi 'os min nyams dga' bar// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i bka'// rgyang rgyal gas pa/
27a3(rnying rgyud): ma rnyed pas// bod kyis byas zhes gangs rI'i khrod 'dir grags// bcom ldan ral gris chu dpe legs btsal nas// gzhung 'di 'dzin pa'i sngags 'chang rnams la bstan// paN chen bI shra mi tA la sogs pa'i// gzhung gi sgrub byed gsang snyig
27a4(rnying rgyud): sgrub par ltos// sngon gyi lo pa Na mang gzigs blo gros can// rgya bong gnyis su mkhas la legs sbyangs pas// dpe 'di ma rnyed yid bzhin rin chen 'dra// rlud 'dir 'jug pa'i mun sel nyi ma yin// sangs rgyas gsang ba'i 'od seng ge yas/
27a5(rnying rgyud): ma'i rgyud dang mthun pa'i 'brel pa mdzad// 'di gnyis spangs nas rang gar 'chang ba rnams// shes rab 'chal pa nor ba'i 'phreng ba yin// rnga ring 'tshong druge spang gzhung ma mthong bas// 'gyod drug gzhung mtshams shes pa med ces grags/
27a6(rnying rgyud): 'tshong drug shes par 'dod pa'i blo gsal rnams// gzung gnas blo yis kho bo'i drung du gyon// bcom ldan ral gris bkod/ chos kyi rgyal po bcom ldan ral gri'i phyag dpe la gtugs shing bris so// // mad+hA laM/ gsang snying kyang po'i 'gyur byang bsngags
27a7(rnying rgyud): na mo gur we/ phun sum tshogs dpal thugs kyi gsang ba'i mdzod// theg pa'i bcung 'dus man ngag snying po'i dbyings// mnor gsal byed gzhan min de kho na// rang nyid ngo bos nges pa'i don la 'dud// rdo rje sems dpa' sgra 'phrul dra brtsa
27b1(rnying rgyud): spyad dpal gsang ba'i snying po kho na nyid nges pa 'di la/ oM gyen gyi mkhan po pad+ma sa~M b+ha wA dang / tso ga ro krA'i rgyal mtshan po 'gyur dang / baN+Di ta be shu mi d+ha dang / d+hU ba pa gor bar cana'i 'gyur dang / prar+d+ha ta be na la me tra dang / lo skab rma ngan rkyen mcho
27b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur yod ces grags na'ang / deng sang gi dpe rnams kyi mjug na lo paN 'di dang 'dis bsgyur ces pa'i mtshan bkod pa ni mi 'dug med/ des na'ang rgyud kyi tshig don legs par khong du chud tsong mkhas grub brnyes pa'i lo par+Na chas che bzhig
