27b3(rnying rgyud): gis bsgyur bar kho bos rtogs so// 'dir rgya gar gyi dpe rnyed pa'i tshul na/ mkhas pa'i dbang phyug dam pa bcom ldan ral gris/ nyi 'od seng ge'i rgya cher 'grel dang / bi shwa mi tra'i 'grel chen dang / sangs rgyas gsang ba'i rnam dbye 'grel dang /
27b4(rnying rgyud): rad+hA'i rnam bshang 'grel dang / sgeg pa rdo rje'i 'grel pa par khabs dang / bi ma la'i 'grel chung pi na ta ra ta dang / tiSh+Tha ma ti'i be ra ka 'grel dang / gzhan yang rong po ma chos kyi bzang po'i dkon cog 'grel rnams gzigs pa dang / khyad par dpal
27b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba 'dus pa'i 'grel pa paN+Di ta pre shA mi trAs mdzad par/ rgyud 'di'i khungs mang du drangs pa gzigs pas/ s+yA dgartsod pas rgyan byas nas kun la yang yang du glengs pas/ nam TIg bod yul dbris kyi sa nA dbang dang nye ba na/ maM mag
27b6(rnying rgyud): ba seng ge 'od kyi slob brgyad sngags pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rta ston pa zhes grags pa zhig na re/ gsang ba snying po'i rgya dpe bsam yas na bdag gi zhang po sngags pa zhig la 'dug ces glengs pa la/ de'i rgyu mtshan dris pas/ rtse lngar 'gro zer
27b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i a tsar bod skad kyang cha tsam shes pa 'ga' zhig lhas nas phyung gda' ste/ bsam yas su re zhig bsdad nas dbu rtse'i chung pa rnams la blta zhing 'dug pas/ bdag gi zhang pos ci 'dug ces dris pas/ rgya gar skad du/ gu h+ya gaH/ bod kyi skad
28a1(rnying rgyud): dra gsang bsnying po zhes bya bar 'gro'am thar bas/ gsang bskyed po'i chung po yin dus snyam nAs yi dam du bzung bdag tse swA nus pas/ nga mthag par long zhig par bsgos shing / des kyang rengs pa'i tshul gyis blangs te phral
28a2(rnying rgyud): bsu gzigs te mnyes shing / rgya dbaN+Dala'i lo ma la yig maN+Dal shin tu legs par thos pa sngon rgyal po sri ra kyi dus su zin pos/ rnyings pas phig 'phrul lathabs shing / lces dgu pa'i skyed nas ta pa'i byang thu gcig chung ba/ mjug le ldan
28a3(rnying rgyud): brdzogs pa pan sa gang mtshang ba zhig 'dug pas/ zas cher mnyes pa chen po thob ste/ skang yang d+hang pe yang thog pa r+b+ha gang sa tshub shes rab bzang bzhes grags pa/ snang gyi sbyangs pa sa ban sa pa/ tshong dang po rgyang tshul 'bang ba chung rgyas nas
28a4(rnying rgyud): bzhig byung ba de la sngon gyi chang pa bdi 'dug pas dbu ldan kyisal bcwa nas rnanas shing / des kyang de ster gsungs pa bzhin gyis 'gyur man+dan gas kyang sa/ skye mo'i gnas la mi gsal ba rnams tha dpar yang du ltang btag/ brda srid cing grangs/
28a5(rnying rgyud): dang / nr-i maHr+g+ha gur \u0f89\u0fa4 N+Datra mA ya/ bsil ldan 'din sde snod 'ang ni rnams kyi// nang na rgya sang rgyal pa gang bltad// kun nas thal lo rab tu gas ba'i// mkhas mchog bcom ldan la gI rgyal g+har cig/ spyan sngar chub/ dpal gsang bsting ba/
28a6(rnying rgyud): dpe 'dra len du kyis la bris la bskur gsungs pa la/ 'bru theg bgyis nas bris shing / mtshoms kyar ma byas pa dang / tshogs bcad la shang ma bris pa rnams kyang ben je ltang 'dug pa bzhin bris pa legs shing / sde 'gyur dang 'bru thug bgyis na thabs pa
28a7(rnying rgyud): rnams go'am snyam pa gda' stem bgyis/ dang khrus pang dag par bgyis lags shing / sgo sgar bsal phyir kun la spel bzhu// rgyud kun snying po dpal ldan 'dus pa dang // dbyer med chud chen 'de lta bu dang gzhan// zab mor ches dang theb chen cha
28b1(rnying rgyud): rnams la// mjal nas bka' bzhin sgrub pa byed par shog/ ces pa'i zhwa lIg dang rgya dpe bcom ldan pa'i phyag tu phral zhing / bcom ldan pas gang gi tshe sngags pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po shab ngo mo d+ha khrung du khyer 'dus pa de'i tshe// chung 'di'i rgya
28b2(rnying rgyud): dpe bskur nas// 'di rigs 'dzin chen po pad+ma sa~M b+ha wa'i phyag dper 'dug cing / chud rnam dag yin pa'i chu mtshan dang bcas te bstad pas/ khong rnams na re bong na rgyud 'di la da lta rgyud pa yod dam med kyang rung gi kho bo cag rnams la ni steng nas kyang
28b3(rnying rgyud): som nyi med zer ro// de nas ring zhig lon pa'i tshe/ byang ripa shes rab rgya mtshos rgya dpe de bcom ldan pa'i phyag nas zhus/ thar pa lo ts+tsha ba'i drung du phyin te/ sngon gyi dam pa rnams kyis bsgyur ba dang / rgya dpe'i nang na mang nyung la sogs pa'i dregs yod
28b4(rnying rgyud): pa
28b5(rnying rgyud): nas nga da gsu mas zh-i sa su sa slong hU~M ba sgru ba sa
28b6(rnying rgyud): lhar bkod do// yang le'u gsum pa nas/ bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// drug pa nas/ kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// ces dang / bdun pa nas/ dper na de bzhin spong sangs bzhin// zhes dang / dgu pa nis/ so so thig le de nyid la/
28b7(rnying rgyud): zhes dang / bcu bdun pa nas/ 'bar ba'i khro bo mang po 'khrug/ ces dang / tha ma nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas zhes dang / yang 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po zhes pa nas/ 'bras bu'i mchog gi bar cha dpe 'di na mi snang la/ le'u dgu pa'i 'go nas/
29a1(rnying rgyud): de nas srob ma gzhag par bya// zhes pa'i nga pa zang bu gtsug chang ba 'ang ltas bsabs pa sanan// nga rgya la ba ni b+ha/ nA gang kyi sag ts+tsha ba na dang / dang gag don pa shang kyang tshong bar byung ba dang / bcoMlnga par mjugs
29a2(rnying rgyud): tshigs su bcad pa 'byung ba dag / brgyad d+ha/ kyang rgya pa 'di dus meng ba rnyer zhing / rmi gre ti gi sogs par mabyung ba // rgyad dpe la phreng gyis ba sa gnyis pa sa pa gas pa dang / ded du dpem zung rjes zhes pasi bden cing / gzhung rgyas bsdus bston pa
29a3(rnying rgyud): no// de bas na gzu grams dang / ral chod dang / mAn sbal la sogs pa 'khor ba'i rgyu rnams spangs nas bsam pa rnam par dag pas bsgyur ba yin te/ de bas mtho ba la phrag dog dang / mnyam pa la 'gan sems dang / da men pa la brtu pa la sogs pa'i dz+haiM spangs te/
29a4(rnying rgyud): pos 'gyur 'di la bltas na tshig don gyi na 'ga' zhig la phan par 'gyur srid pas blo gsal zhing dgazu bor gnas pa rnams kyis 'dri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / bklag pa dang / ston pa dang / kun chub par mdzad pa zhu/ dpal gsang ba snying po'i de kho na nyid nges pa'i chud kyi rgyal po
29a5(rnying rgyud): chen po 'di/ byang ri pa dge ba'i bshas gnyen shes rab nu mdzes bskul ba'i ngor/ mang du thos pa'i mi rtsub gnas brtan nyi ma zhal mtshan dpral bzang po sa thar bu'i snying du bstar te legs par gtan la zab pa'o// // gsang pa'i ni rje po de khon nyid rnam par nges pa'i rgyad
29a6(rnying rgyud): po chen po'i chen po kun du bzang po'i gsung mchog zab mo 'di// 'di nyid ston pa dgyes pas ched du brjod cing brjod pas gsungs// gsung bzhin gsung rab kun gyi mchog gyur 'di ni 'og min du// dang po bstan nas slar yang g.yang 'dzin gsang pa'i bdag po'i mabus// a
29a7(rnying rgyud): tig kyang byor ba'i dbang po mgasas// brangs pa mo rkye gdami sri chos 'di'i dbung cos shing // thogs par krol nas ni// sla yang ga jis ma dzer lhasas bcang du// yadz+ra med shes gnyis la bas
29b1(rnying rgyud): bar mdzad// de nas rang zhig lon pa'i dus na rgya dpa 'dra// mang thos bcom ldan la gris brtson pa chen pos d+hA // da yi phyag dbu shes rab rnam rgyas gus pas nus nas ni// bsgyur ces bskul nas kho bos tshul 'di legs par bskur// de las
29b2(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i dge bas sangs rgyas dge ba'i chos// sa mchog rigs 'dzin dbang po ster ba'i lam gcig pu// de khror ba 'byams 'phrin las rnam bzhi 'byung ba'i gnas// ya mtshan tsha 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gsang sngags dpal// dpal 'dzi
29b3(rnying rgyud): ni don rtogs dpal mchog kun du bzang po yi// sa la 'jigs nas sde mchog dbang po'i gnas thob nas// sa 'ogs stengs bya'i 'grong thams cad la// sa bzhin skyo ba med pas yang yang smin byed gog/ yang 'dir smras pa/ gsang sngags
29b4(rnying rgyud): snga 'gyur sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi// rgyud rgyal dpal ldan gsang ba snying po 'di// 'dzin pa'i sngags 'chang rnams la bka' nyid du// rtsod pa med mod 'on kyang snga dus su// skad gnyis smra ba lhas btsas la sogs pas// skyon bzhi yid ces rgya dpe ma mthong
29b5(rnying rgyud): phyir// bod kyis byas zhes gangs can 'dir bsgrags pas// mkhas rlom 'ga' yang the tshom gnas su gyur// dus gyis gang su ri'i khrod 'dir mkhas pa'i mchog/ zab dang rgya che'i gsung rab rnam 'byed cing // bstan thung zing pa chos slob tu gyon pas g.yog bcol ba'i
29b6(rnying rgyud): snying nang yin par grags/ pa'i khur 'dzin mkhas pa'i 'dun sa na// rgyal mtshan ltar mtho dpal ldan ral gri yis// rgya dpe legs rnyed rtsod bral nyi zla ltar// kun la gsal mdzad gtsug gi rgyan du mchod// ma ngas bsgyur nas skyon bzhi'i gegs sel ba// dpal ldan
29b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po grub pa'ang mdzad// de phyir 'di na rtog ge smra ba rnams// don la spyod pa'i blo gros ring byas nas// gsang snying po kyis byas zhes bsgrags pa rnams// chu rlabs bzhin du ngal ba don med gyur// de rjes skad gnyis su ba mkhyen pa'i dpal// zla gros
30a1(rnying rgyud): nyi ma gnas lnga'i 'od zar nan// baN+Dal zhugs rgyal na can 'dzin pa nor dus spad// dod thu dpa' 'thung bzang po'i san+ta dz+nyAn la// gA \u0f88\u0f90nga 'di 'dzin pa pashes garten ma thogs pa// shAH'i dge snyen pra d+hA swA ga ras// lhag bsam dag pa
30a2(rnying rgyud): rab bskul gsol btab nas// rgyud kun snying po 'di nyid bsgyur ba yin// 'di yi ched du bya ba 'gyur rnying la// sngon gyi 'gyur mdzad mkhas grub brnyes pa po// gzhan pa na byams brtse'i thugs ldan de dag gis// don 'gyur gtsor mdzad rtseng po'i
30a3(rnying rgyud): dang // mthun dang mi mthun bod skad dag mi dag/ la la skad rnying gis ba sgribs go ba dka'// dpe 'dir sngar med tshig dga' yod skyong zhing // 'tshed drug la sogs ji ltar nges dka' phyir// sgra bsgyur gtsor byas gzhung nga 'di bsar mod kyi// 'on kyang
30a4(rnying rgyud): snga 'gyur gzhung na mi bzhugs pa'i// chag 'ga' 'gyur 'di'i rgyad pe 'di la mthong // de phyer rgya dpe rgyas bsdus shes par gyis// 'di 'dra'i tshul la mtshar du 'dzin par nges// rtogs dpyod mi ldan kha tsog 'di skad du// 'di la sngon chad sgo skud byung bas na//
30a5(rnying rgyud): de lta rgya dpe yod dam med kyang rung // snyigs dus skye bo som nyi sel dka' bas// gsar 'gyur 'bad pa' dngal ba don med de// 'di la 'chad nyan skyeng ba'ang mi 'byung la// gzhan yang snga 'gyur gzhung gi tshig 'di la// 'di ltar bsgyur ces gshi byed pa'ang srid//
30a6(rnying rgyud): de dag phal cher gang zag rjes 'brang zhing // thos pa'i nor bral chags sbrang cher ma yis// blo mig lkugs pas nges don shes byang gsung // je bzhin lta bar mi nus kha nang zad// de'i phyir blo gsal rnams kyis rgyu de 'di'i 'gyur// gisar rnying sdebs la gzung
30a7(rnying rgyud): gnas blo yis spyod// bstan pa'i nyi ma phan pa de'i 'od zer can// shar ri'i rtse nas nub ri'i sa 'dzin phyir// nye ba'i dus 'dir 'di 'dra'i rgyud zab mo// 'chad nyan bsgom par brtson pa de dag gi/ bsod nams tshad kyis gzung bar mi nus pas// tshig don mkhas pas
30b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan la dang bsnyad par bya'o// de ltar rnam dag gsal bas rab skyam dge ba'i shes bya kun// kun+da nas gzigs pa'i spyan sangs rgyal ba'i grwa gzugs rigs rnams kun gyi bdag/ bdag gzhan 'gro bas myur thob bde gshegs kun gyi thugs rnga'i bcu portags/
30b2(rnying rgyud): bcung ma nor nges pa'i bka' 'dir ba ston zhe ba'ang bskul bar shog/ kun kyang lam 'dis grol gyur cig/ thar pa lo tsa ba'i 'gyur byang // / rang sems dag pa'i 'og min zhing khams su// rang rig dpal ldan khyab bdag rdo rje sems// ye shes lnga med ngas
30b3(rnying rgyud): shel la gzha' tshon bzhin// ma 'dres gsal bar 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor ched/ 1/ ston pa'i dgongs pas yongs bstan rgyad kyi rgyal// rigs 'dzin brda las 'ongs te rgyal po dza'i// khang steng glegs bam char babs sbyin khung las/ rim gyon 'phags
30b4(rnying rgyud): dusasu 'a da la la sa nga smras sa byung nga// sa gang spyad dun pa ni / ga
30b5(rnying rgyud): brang ma dang ldan dkar du// gsang sngags nang gi rgyud rnams ches gnyen pas// 'god par ma lus zhes pa snga 'gyur gyi// chung las ngos 'dzin gzhan pa bya rgyus dbul/ 2thams cad mkhyen pa bu ston rin po chus// la lar zhus ngag mdzad bzhed de
30b6(rnying rgyud): theg par// btang snyoms bzhag las gnyis med rnam rgyal zhes// brdzas ma'i chung bzhin nges par dpung ba men/ pa/ sa lo nyin mor byed pas gangs ljongs kyi// chos log mun pa mthar spyod sdom gsum d+ha// gsang chen rnying ma'i chos rnams btang snyoms las//
30b7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyab bzhin 'bad pas bkag pa med// mkhas pa'i rtser son rig le war lo/ kud khye 'i lu gas nyi meng na yar cing ba da nga rje dzin nyid mang dang rtsal bad+has ma rgya min zhes pa dgas pa cing tshul gsapa yin mo// sags// blos kyi spyan lngar gzur
31a1(rnying rgyud): sa// smra sa na sa sa/ / na sa ldan /
31a2(rnying rgyud): ngas ma thags das gsung das zer rtso// rlo das dpa' tsu smra cis// ya gas // c-i ga // / mi bog pa tshig she su // 'a thabs pad pas ni gdun // pan yo du chags
31a3(rnying rgyud): sa sbyi na na su gag dustsa/ sa du byas
31a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i mas tha bungs cung dag grang ming ba ma pa mig yam la / tsha sa yang gyi sa snyi pa grags shing ba ga chu dang 'tshangs pa ma nyid kyi sbyin sa
31a5(rnying rgyud): bas ma tha~Mng gi sgribabs sems par mgyur pa'i kyang chu ti ma du shes dus pay-i nga ga 'i zhes kya das pang mangs par gyipa yi na/ da kyi rgyam bu da'i ba sa so bsnyed par mig nang migs
31a6(rnying rgyud): dag pa'apa ga byung ba gas rnam rnyed pel ba sa byas pa 'o bang ma mas rgyal po'i sa thas ga bdag dang / bad ga sa na brel ba da / zud 'bral gsung theg gnyis lnga legs par bsgrugs
31a7(rnying rgyud): nas/ ro nga pag sprul pa'i skyer chog/ 'drang pome ga bang na tshogs spya thub/ dram gling ga do mchos thags gsus kyis bris da kris dpas dogs gnas rnams 'di ga mig sa pa srod bye ga zang pa'i lugs
31b1(rnying rgyud): dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa gsang bdag dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba/ dus gsum pang // rgyas thams cad rgyang po bla ma dam pa'i zha'as la zhus pas phyag 'tshal lo// gdong mal
31b2(rnying rgyud): dbyings su rang rig ye shes nyid/ rnam par grol las rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor kun// sgo dang bkru pa'i byed po bcom ldan 'das// kun bzang lha yi lha la dang por 'dud// mtha' yi rtog pas mi bskyod rdo rje'i thugs/
31b3(rnying rgyud): ma ba'i thal chos dbyings dang du rtogs gyur pas// mtha' dang dbus med rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor che ro// mtha' yas rgyud don 'chad pa'i skyes bu rgyal// rab 'byams bde bar gshegs pa ma lus pa'i// rmad byung thugs kyi gas
31b4(rnying rgyud): ba rdo rje'i mdzod// 'dzin mdzad rgyal sras thu bo gang lags pa// de la dngos po kun gyis phyag bgyi'o// chos dbyings mkha' la thabs shes mkha' lding gis// drangs pa'i lam rgyud shing rtal bskyon nas// rnam grol
31b5(rnying rgyud): gling du bde bar 'khrid mdzad pa'i// lam mkhan rig 'dzin bla ma'i tshogs la 'dud// khyad par gsang bdag dran las gsad chen gyi// bka' bab dra ma lnga dang rgyal po dzaH/ rgyud don rnam par 'grol la zla bral ba// sgeg rdor sangs
31b6(rnying rgyud): rgyasnga gsang ba rnam gnyis mchod// bsil ldan mkha' la thugs rje'i rta bdun gyis// gsang chen nyi ma 'dren mdzad pad 'byung dang // yim mi tra lo chen rma gtags zung // bka' srol gcig 'dus gnubs chen rnams la 'dud// gangs
31b7(rnying rgyud): can ri yi sul du theg mchog gi// 'jigs med chos smras lja ngan ri dwags kun// skrag mdzad phyogs las rnam rgyal mi'i seng ge/ zur gyi rigs 'khrungs mes dpon rnam gsum rgyal// gang gi bka' mol khro nas 'dzin ma'i gyon// khyab mdzad
33a1(rnying rgyud): bshes gnyen tshogs dang da las gzhan// legs bshad gtam gyi 'byung gnas rong zo ma dang // dri med 'od zer rnams la'ang gus phyag 'tshal// glo bur las skyes ma ngag chu 'dzin gyis// mtha' bral chos
33a2(rnying rgyud): dbyings nam mkha' bsgribs gyur pa// de sel mdzad po gter chen bla ma las// gzhan du ma dmigs dang brgya'i gtsug gis mchod// gang zhig phung khams skye mched ltar snang 'gro ba'i rtog tshogs ji snyed kun// yen pa rnam grol rang
33a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin rnam dag 'khor 'das ro mnyam dkyil 'khor cher// mkha' ltar mi phyed thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs bde ba chen po'i sku// rang byung ye shes don dam snying po byang chub sems la gus pas 'dud// gang yang dpal ldan skang
33a4(rnying rgyud): po'i rgyu de rgyal 'dir// sngon rabs mkhas pa'i rnam bshad dpag med cing // bdag ltas don gzhan brjod pa'ang nas min kyang // don la mos pa 'ga' yis bskal ba dang // khyad par bdag nyid 'di na tshig gcig tsam// sba ba gang
33a5(rnying rgyud): de'ang gsung rab 'di yi mthu// de phyir rgyud don ji bzhin mthong min kyang // gus pa kho nas tshul 'di brjod la sgo// gang gi tshe gdod ma'i dbyings su rig pa'i ye shes rnam par grol bas spangs rtogs mthar phyin pa'i byang chub chen po
33a6(rnying rgyud): brnyes nas/ gtsang ma'i gnas spangs pa'i 'og min chen po'i gnas su rigs bdag drug pa'i phyag rgyar bstan te// 'chung ba'i skyes bu de bzhin gshegs pa lnga yang mngon par snang bar mdzad nas/ rdo rje gsang ba la
33a7(rnying rgyud): sogs pa rig pa khyad par can gyi 'khor rnams la rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid dgongs pa brda'i tshig gis dus rtag pa rkun gyi 'khor lor bgro bar mdzad pa las rnam par g.yo ba'i rtsol rtog mi mnga' bzhin du gdul bu gdag pa can
33b1(rnying rgyud): nga 'jigs byed chen po dpal he ru ka'i rol pa tshang med pa dang / thun mong gi gdul bya rnams la 'dul byed kyi ston pa thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das drug thugs rig pa ye shes kyi byin rlabs las slob sogs ji ltar 'tshams pas 'dul ba'i
33b2(rnying rgyud): sgron ma rnam par bkod de chos kyi 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa bskor ro// de dag gi don dang 'bras bu thams cad gang du 'du ba'i snod dang / gang las 'phro ba'i gzhi lta bu ni dpal gsad pa'i snying po yin te/ ji skad du/ 'dral ba mdo sde chos
33b3(rnying rgyud): mngon dang / dam tshig srub dang grub pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// phyogs bcu rnams su rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las 'gos te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// 'byung gnas
33b4(rnying rgyud): gtan la nges par 'bebs// zhes dang / sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// zhes gsungs shing / bshad rgyud rgyas pa las kyang / mnyam nyid don rtogs ring rig rgyal po ni// rgya mtsho chen por chu
33b5(rnying rgyud): klung kun 'bab ltar// bla med do na rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu// rnam thar theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// des na 'dir gang bshad par bya ba'i chos ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dre ba rtsi ba'i rgyud dpal gsang
33b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'di nyid yin la/ de gang gis 'chang na/ bshad pa'i rgyang rnams dang / gla ma dam pa rnams kyis don la rton pa'i dgongs 'grel mdzad pa de dag la brten nas so// ji ltar 'chad pa'i tshul la slob
33b7(rnying rgyud): dpon chen po bi ma las khog gzhung gsal sgron du/ rab la mtshan bstan 'bring la dbye// tha mar 'bru gnyer dgrol ba'o// zhes pas don gsum ste/ 'gro smos pas go ba'i dbang po yang rab rnams la mtshan bshad pa dang / dbang
34a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'bring po rnams la su 'don rnam par dbyeb pa bshad pa dang / dbang po tham rnams la 'brur gnyar ra'i sgo nas skos te bshad pa'o// dang po la'ang / khog gzhung las/ rab mtshan tha skad gsum du grags// sgyu 'phrul sta /
34a2(rnying rgyud): po lung gi phyi// lag gi rtsa bzhin dbu zhabs rtogs// skal ba can gyi ched phyir ro// zhes mtshan gyi rnam grangs gsum du bstan pa las// dang po rgyud dang dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo dang 'chad pa'i skyes bu gsum gyi mtshan thun mong du bstan pa ni/
34a3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/ bshad rgyud me long las/ chos rnams ma lus gnyis med pa'i// rang rig byang chub sems nyid do// tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin// zhes pas rdo rje ni rang bzhin dbyer mi phyed pa ste shes rab stongapa
34a4(rnying rgyud): nyed/ sems dpa' ni sa twa'i sgra brtan pa dang / bsdus pa dang / rtogs pa gsum la skabs 'dir 'jug pas na/ thabs dang rig pa byang chub kyi sems shes rab stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i zung 'jug rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa de rdo rje ltar brtan pas sam/
34a5(rnying rgyud): de nyid kyi phyag rgyas 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad la btab pas mnyam pa nyid du bsdus pa ni gzhi 'bras gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang / gnas lugs kyi don de nyid sgrib gnyis zad cing tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i skyes bus mngon du rtogs pa ni 'bras bu'i
34a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ gang rtogs pa'i ye shes de yang rdo rje ltar gnyis su med par gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nyid mtshan ma'i phyag nar snang ba dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo dang 'chad pa'i sgras bu rdo rje mi bskyod pa la yang rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags so// sgyu 'phrul
34a7(rnying rgyud): ba ni/ rdo rje las/ thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i don// zhes pas 'byung ba lnga lha ma ltar snang ba ris su ma chad pa'i rgyus cir yan 'phrul ba ni phung po lnga ste rgyu 'bras 'brel pa can gyi phyir dra ba'o// rgyu mtshan des shes rab dbyings stong pa nyid dang / thabs
34b1(rnying rgyud): drag pa dang gsags gtas 'ang thal pa dang dun c-i/ dul du ba dang / de'i rtags skas pa sa cung 'bral ba nga ngan pa / 'byu'adrabab/ yang na lan sa/ sa pan/ draban ra rgyun ga sapa smang pa grus sa/
34b2(rnying rgyud): le lag las/ lnga phung sgyu ma'i ye shes pa// rang rig thabs kyis rigs lhur 'phrul// zhes dang / bla ma las/ kun byung dkyil 'khor lha 'phrul che// ming la 'brel bdag 'dron// zhes gsungs/ 'di nyid kyi 'dra bzhi pa las ni ya
34b3(rnying rgyud): la dang / yul la rdi ba ba shad cing / gshi bya bras bral m+b+hamAn 'i skang du pA 'dis pa smrag sa ba byed byu ba la ma gyi / mtshan bye las chen mes byed la'ang rngardzas mas dpa 'thu thal thal//
34b4(rnying rgyud): tshab las ma tshan dung gas pa ni/ l+r-ing gi \u0f7f/ rdo rdu las/ sos bstan pa rlomatsho Sh+TAH// dader ston 'das nyon 'od phyir rgyun// don kun 'di la yongs rdzogs pas// lung kri n+d+he zhes btang pa yin// zhes dang / 'di ny-i las/ mtshan
34b5(rnying rgyud): dang rgyud thams cid kyi lung gi d+he/ zhes so// gsum pa na rang gang ba las brtags pa'i/ 'grel rdung pas/ sprin ma pa'i bdag pas// ming rnyed thog mar spros pa gtses// zhes pa ltang grags pa rgya kyi bang drug pa'i ma na
34b6(rnying rgyud): 'chad par 'gyur ro// gnyis pa la gnyis te/ don gyi rnamatha smi rnam par dbya ba dang / chog gi rnam sangs rnam par dbya ba'i/ dang po la ldaH/ rgyud 'byung ba'i \u0f88\u0f90k+Sha ga de/ rgyun grang bslang ba/ 'bras pa yongs su shes par bya ba klung den rgang
34b7(rnying rgyud): byed kas thal/ 'khar la gdams zhing brdzun pa gtad papa// dang na/ lung gyi mar gyis 'gyur bas// zhwa pa la lags dbang byung // phrin du kyi phyogs pa sang ba ga/ sa pas gang du ga 'khong phyogs pa na nga
35a1(rnying rgyud): par nges pa'i phyir dran sum tshogs pa la ldanan glang gzhing// ci'i phyir gling gzhi zhes byazhen/ dA na'i skalas bka' yin min du rtog pa'i the tshom can shA la phun sum tshogs pa lnga'og rgyas brjod pas yid ches byings basbyin par
35a2(rnying rgyud): byeng ba'i phyir dang / gang gleng bar bya ba rgyad kyi ni 'byung ba'i sgra mgwa nir gyur pa'i phyir ro// dathun/ thun mong ma yin pa dang / thun mong gi gleng gzhi gnyis pas/ dang po na/ thabs la ma dung gyur te nang gas ltar 'chad pad+mag yin no// gnyis bAn
35a3(rnying rgyud): longs su'i gleng gzhi 'gra/ glud 'byung ba khyad par can gyi gling gzhi dang / zhar byung gdul byung gos tshad du bstan pakhro bo'i gling ga'i/ srul sku 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gleng gzhi'am/ bstan pa spring gling gzhing glags pa rnams so// gnyis bag+h+nAn
35a4(rnying rgyud): bskur ba ni/ thugs thig las/ stan pas gnang dang 'khor gyis zhus// skabs las gleng bslang ston dang 'khor// gnang 'dra'i rkyen du gang gyur pa// dngas gsung la mu reg pa// zhes pas ston 'khor dri lan gyi sbyar bas rgyud don gdul byeng
35a5(rnying rgyud): 'tshams par 'byung ma rag pa'o// ci'i phyir gleng bskung zhes bu zhe na/ gang gleng bar bya ba ni rgyud ngan yin la/ de nyid snang bar bsrug pa ni bslang ba ste/ bstan pa 'byung ba'i rkyen byed pa'i phyir ro// dbye na/ thun mong ma yin pa'i dang / bun mang gi
35a6(rnying rgyud): gleng bskang gnyis pas/ dang po ni/ ston pa yab yum g+hi su lhan cig pa'i 'khor lo zab dbang bskur ba'i sbyor bas mdun bsus te/ thabs shes gnyis med kyi chu bzung nas gleng bslang ba gsum me// gnyis pa ni/ 'khor gyis gzhan don du gyung bshad par
35a7(rnying rgyud): zhus pa sa ston pa'i thugs rje skyes te/ dngos dang bsgyur pa'i sgonas 'thang par dgyes pa'o// gsum pa 'bras bu longs shes kyang don bshad pa la gnyis te/ rgyud gsum gyi rnam bzhag spyir bshad/ lam gyi cha kun gyud kying dngos po bya brag bdang /
35b1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// dang po ni/ rgyud phyi ma las/ rgyud ni rgyun chags la bshad de/ thabs dang chu las 'bras bu'o// zhes pas spyir rgyun chags pa'i don gyis na rgyud ces bya la/ de bye na/ gang rtogs par bya ba gzhi'am rgyu'i rlung dang / gang gis rtogs shing bgrod pa thabs
35b2(rnying rgyud): sam lam gyi rgyud dang / gang du mthar phyin pa 'bras bu'i rgyud do// dang po ni/ bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// yo nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// zhes dang / rgyas pa las/ thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// de ni lung gi tshad ma ga
35b3(rnying rgyud): ces pas gzhi 'ching grol med pa'i gnas lugs rang rig pa byang chub kyi sems bden pa dbyer med spyod yul dang bral bar ye nas gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ khams bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po dang / rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i rigs dang / kun gzhi'i
35b4(rnying rgyud): shes dang / dri bcas de bzhin nyid la sogs pa'i tha snyad gang la 'jug pa'i gzhi'o// de nyid gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi ldog cha gang rung dang ma bsnun par spyir bzhag pa na rang bzhin nam gnas lugs dang / glo bur gyi dri ma sbyang ba dang bsal stobs kyis
35b5(rnying rgyud): mngon du gyur pa la ltos nas lam dang 'bras bur bzhag go// ci'i phyir gzhi 'am rgyu'i rgyud du 'gyur zhe na/ thabs kyi rkyen gyis zin pa dang ma zin pa las 'khor ba dang myang 'das su 'grub par byed pas na/ 'khor 'das gnyis ka'i 'byung gzhi'am rgyur gyur pa'i phyir
35b6(rnying rgyud): dang / de nyid sems can nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du rang bzhin 'gyur ba med par rgyun chags su 'jug pas na rgyud de/ rim gsum las/ tha snyad gnyis kyi chos rnams kun// ma lus 'byung phyir gzhi zhes bya// zhes dang / mgon po byams pas/ ji ltar sngar
35b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyis de bzhin// 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid do// zhes so// dbye na/ slob dpon bi ma las/ rim pa gsum par/ dang po rnam pa gnyis yin te// ngo bo'i gzhi dang btags pa'i gzhi// zhes pas sems kyi chos nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam par dkra
36a1(rnying rgyud): pa bde bar gshegs pa'i snying poni dri ma sbyang ba'i gzhono du rin po che lta ba steg nas lugs rab nyid kyi gzhi dang / log pa'i nan ljang yul dang bcas pa ni sbrang bya'i dri ma 'damadza ba lta pras+thA/ med snang glo zung ba yin pas 'khrul ba
36a2(rnying rgyud): btags pa'i gzhi zhes gsungs so// zhen sdang nyid 'khor ba 'grub byed kyi rgyu dang / nAm shes kyi 'dzag pa ma zad par rgyun chags pa tsam yin krung bcos ma glo gur gyi chos yin pas 'bras bu'i nyer len du gyur pa'i rgya rgyud ma yin zhing / reg pas dpyad don gyi
36a3(rnying rgyud): slong nyid med dag gsang rgya rgyud mtshan nyid pa ma yin te/ nye len maM rgyu dang rgyun gyi don gnyis kalI gnas pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni/ rgyu rgyud de blo bur gyi dri ma dang bral bar byed pa'i babs shes 'jug gi byed col dang btsas pa ste/ de yang ngo ba skyed byed shes rab
36a4(rnying rgyud): rnam gsum gyis pa skyed bye bran mong dang mchog gi sems lnga skyes sa ma skye ba 'o// de ltar yang rim gsum las/ ngo bo shes rab rnam gsum gyis// sems lnga skyes par bstan pa yin// zhes so// ci'i phyir thabs sam lam gyi rgyud du 'gyur zhe na/
36a5(rnying rgyud): thob bya 'bras rgyud nyid mngon du byed pa'i lhan cig byed chen yin pas thabs dang // gang gis gang du bgrod pa'i te rwa yin pasal ma ste/ ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu yi ngang du
36a6(rnying rgyud): byung // zhes dang / mdo'i don bsdus las/ bgrang dang de chos ldan pa dang // zhes so// de la'ang nye ring gnyis las/ rnal 'byor bla na med pa khyad par gyi lam 'di ni nye ba'i lam mam thabs rgyad yin la/ de las gzhan pa thun mong gi lam nges 'byung
36a7(rnying rgyud): gatheg pa bzhi dang / rtse rgyud sde gsum gyi lam rnams ni skabs 'dir ring ba'i lam zhes bya'o// de yang gzhi 'thas gnyis dang shes thob kyi bya byed 'brel ba can drag nas pa'i phyir thabs par ma chad par rgyan chags su 'byung bas na rgyud do// khyad par gri lam po
36b1(rnying rgyud): dbye / thabs kyis nges pa'i lam dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba'i lam gnyis te/ bshad rgyud rgya mtsho las/ grol lam thabs su rnam par bstan// zhes so// de la thabs lam ni/ ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// zhes pas gtso bor thabs
36b2(rnying rgyud): kyi khyad par brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa rmad du phyud pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu myur du 'grub par byed pa ste/ mak+Shi ka'i sbyor bas lcags khams yud tsam gyis gser du bskung ba bzhin no// dbyen/ rim gsum las/ gdams ngag steng dang 'og gi sgo// zhes pa ltang
36b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis las/ steng sgo ni/ 'khor lo drug la bsten nas 'bar 'jig gi sbyor bas dakhor lo bzhir bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pa la bslab pa rim gyis pa ste/ rgya mtsho las/ 'khor lo gsum gnyis srog shing gsum// me rlung 'grobs nam mkha'i ba/
36b4(rnying rgyud): bzho bas steng du rnam par grags// zhes so// 'og sgo mkha' gsang gnyis la brten nas dbab bzung ldog khyab kyi spor bas skad cig la bde stong gnyis med kyi ye shes bskyed pa thabs lam cig car pa ste/ rgyas pa las/ phun sum tshogs pa ldan
36b5(rnying rgyud): grub rnapas// gsang dbang mchog gis sbyin par byed// ces so// gnyis pa grol lam ni/ ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung kun dam lhun gyis grub// ces pas gtso bor shes
36b6(rnying rgyud): rab rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas rang rgyud kyi 'chi chos nyid du grol bar byed pa ste/ rin po che kau stu b+ha dang lhan cig bzhag pa'i rdo'i khams rim gyis gser du 'gyur ba bzhin no// dbye na/ lam rim las/ ring ba'ang rim dang cig car ba'o// zhes
36b7(rnying rgyud): pas dbang po yang rab kha cig dbyer med tshig chod du rtogs goms mthar phyin par byed pa yod de cig car ba zhes bya zhing / yang rim gyis rtogs goms mthar phyin par byed pa ni rim gyis pa ste/ de cung zad bshad na/ 'di nyid las/ shes
37a1(rnying rgyud): 'dug mtshan nyid 'byor ba'i gzungs// 'bras bu sbyin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nu se mthu can du gang gyur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// zhes byas mtshan nyid gsum ste/ rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba/ rten
37a2(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin/ lam gyur gyi 'bras bu rig 'angon bzhi'o// dang po ni/ lam rim las/ gzhi dang gtan tshigs grub pa'i don// zhes pas gzhal bya zhen snang nyid 'jal byed gtan tshigs rnams kyis gtan la phab pas rtogs bya'i
37a3(rnying rgyud): lta ba rang bzhin rgya rgyad gnas lugs kyi don de bzhin nyid de rang rig mngon sum gyis yul med rang gsal du rjen par rtogs pa ni grub mtha' ste/ lam rim las/ rgya mtsho dang ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar// sgra brten yid la byed min par// rang rig
37a4(rnying rgyud): mngon sum dmigs bral ba// rang gsal gsum bral mi bskul bar// nges par gdengs su gang byas pa// thos pasam brtan pa'i lta mthar phyin// zhes gsungs/ gang dag sngags kyi grub mtha' ni lta ba dbu ma la thabs khyad par du 'phags
37a5(rnying rgyud): pas phye ba tsam du 'dod pa ni/ bden pa dbyer med snong bcud dag mnyam chen por gtan la 'bebs pa'i sngags kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i lta ba la ce re long du song ba yin no// gal te rig pa 'gyur med la de bzhin nyid du byas pa ni nges don gyi mdo sde zab mo
37a6(rnying rgyud): rnams las kyang 'byung bas rtogs bya'i yul la khyad par med dam snyam na/ bden mod kyi/ de lta na'ang / de bzhin nyid de bla na med pa'i rgyud 'dir rgyu rgyud du 'jog pa'i tshe na lhan cig skyes pa mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du byas pa ni sngags kyi
37a7(rnying rgyud): khyed chos su bzhed pa yin te/ rdo rje me long las/ lus can snying la gang gnas pa// rang byung zag med ye shes gzugs// mi shigs thig la bde chen po// nam mkha' lta bur kun khyab pa// mi gnas chos sku'i rang bzhin yin// zhes dang //
37b1(rnying rgyud): dus 'khor las/ des na gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba sngags kyi theg par bstan// ces dang / brtag gnyis las/ rtag tu rang bzhin bde ba can// 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang // sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi
37b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan pa med// ces so// gzhan yang gnyis snang 'khor ba'i chos 'di rnams thag khra'i sprul ltar med sdang glo bur bu dang / de dag gi ldang gzhi ga nas lpags de bzhin
37b3(rnying rgyud): nyid yin pa'i gnad kyis/ rtog tshogs su dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du dag par gsungs pa yang / phung sogs kyi snang gzhi de bzhin nyid kyi rtsal gnyug ma ye shes kyi rtsa dang rlung sems la sogs pa gdod nas sgra gsum gyi ngo bor ldan gyis rdzab
37b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang / ye de bzhin pa'i rigs lnga sogs lha'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pa gang yin pa ste/ slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas gsang bas lam rim du/ phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// gzhi rdzogs phyag rgya ma 'dres gsal// cir
37b5(rnying rgyud): yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub// ces so// gnyis pa la/ ting nge 'dzin la brtan pa ma thob kyang / spyi'i rnam pa tsam bsgom pa mos bsgom dang / lam so so'i ting nge 'don mthar yin par bslab pa nges rdzogs gnyis su 'dus shing
37b6(rnying rgyud): de yang de snga rdzogs ni/ lam rim las/ srid pa rim par smin tshul gyis// 'dug pa'i yan lag lnga ru bzhag/ gang dag dngos kun dang rig phyir// shrI ba don dam bden pa ste// skye ba bar ma kun rdzob yin// skyes pa'i rim
37b7(rnying rgyud): gsum gnyis med don// zhes pas skye 'chi bar do gsum thugs gcig sbyong ba'i lam rdzogs par ston pa ste/ 'chi ba 'od gsal dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam stong pa chen po/ de bzhin du bar do dang snying rje sgyu ma/ skyes pa'i rim pa
38a1(rnying rgyud): gsar po dang / phyag rta gcig pa/ phyag rgya spros baHsa/ tshom bu tshogs sgrub ste/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i la mthor pa 'byo lnga yan pa/ de las kyang dang po bzhin zag ldog gnyis ka yod pa tshogs lam thu
38a2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'gror te/ lam rim pas/ de phyir lam bzhir zag ldog yod// ces so// tshogs grub ni byor lam gyi rnal 'byor yin pas zag pa yod kyang ldog pa med pa'i lam ste/ spyod pa'i dus grangs nges pas zag med la dngos su sbyor
38a3(rnying rgyud): bar chad med lam yin pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa lam gyur gyi 'bras bu ni// zag ldog gnyis ka med pa'i lam mthong sgom mthar lam gsum gyis bsdus pa rig 'dzin bzhi ste/ de yang mthong lam pa la/ chos nyid kyi bden pa mthong yan khro'i
38a4(rnying rgyud): rus stobs che chung gis 'byung ba snyigs ma'i lus ye shes kyi mes spong bar ma nus pa rnam smin rig 'dzin dang / skyong bar nus pas skye 'jig med pa dngas ma'i lus su gyur pa lam mchog yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshe dbang gnyis te/ lam chung las/
38a5(rnying rgyud): nus pa thob dang ma thob pa'i// mthong lam gnyis su 'gyur ba yin// zhes so// bsgom lam pa nI/ ye shes sgyu ma'i sku can phyag chen rig 'dzin yin la/ mthar lam pa ni/ sku lnga lhun grub rdo rje 'chang gi cha lugs 'dzin pa lhun grub
38a6(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin no// de dag kyang rnam smin rig 'dzin dang rtswa'i theg pa'i mthong lam rab dga' la gnas pa'i sems dpa' gnyis dgongs pa mnyam zhing / de las gzhan pa tshe dbang sogs gsum ni rgyu'i theg pa'i sa dang po dang / brgyad pa dang /
38a7(rnying rgyud): bcu pa tsam du skal ba mnyam par 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang dgongs spyod kyis khyad par du gyur pa yin te/ chu'i theg pa'i bsgom lam sa brgyad pa dang tsha dbang / bkru pa dang phyag chen/ mi thob pa'i sa kun tu 'od dang lpan grub cig 'dzin
38b1(rnying rgyud): mnyam par bzhed pa'i phyir/ de ltar yang lam chung las/ de yang dang po dang po dang // skal mnyam gnyis pa'i rigs mchog de// brgyad pa'i sems dpar skul pa mnyam// gsum pa bcu dang skal mnyam mod// dgongs spyod rgya
38b2(rnying rgyud): mchos khyad par 'phags// zhes dang / bsam gtan mig sgron gyi rang 'grel las/ kun tu 'ong bsti gnas kyi sa'o// de ni 'dir ldan gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin dngos so// zhes gsungs so// rnam smin rig 'dzin gyi dngos 'grus
38b3(rnying rgyud): chen du nges pa'i phyir/ mthong lam gnyis po la ma mthar chags kyi skabs su'ang rim par bgrod pa mi srid cing / rnam smin nas zod brgal du bgrod pa yang mi 'byung ngo // gzhan du cig car ba'i rigs ma yin pa'i lam pa blo che ba 'ba' zhig
38b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya gcig spos gnyis nas sbyor mthong dang / tshe dbang nas spyan grub rig 'dzin/ tshe dbang dang rgya chen gnyis nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ser lam gzhan par nas bor la thod brgal du sbyor ba srid pa yin te/ de dag la rang gis blo che ba dang
38b5(rnying rgyud): zung 'jug gi lam bsgom pa dang / lam gzhan par nas bor du yod pa ste thod brgal 'byung ba'i chos gsum po tshang ba'i phyir ro// de ltar na tshogs bsgrub nas kyang thod pa rgal 'byung ba srid dam snyam na/ ma yin te/ lam rim las/ lam mchog
38b6(rnying rgyud): dbyes gcig yin no// zhes zag med kyi lam gyi 'dus dang dbyes mthong la ma yin par gsungs bsal ma gzhan par nas bor du med pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni/ sgra 'phral bye brag bstan pa las/ grub pa'i rnal 'gror rnal 'byor che// lhan grung
38b7(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin mngon byas pa'ang // btags pa tsam ste gnyis pa med// daphyir de la de brjod do// zhes pas myang gzhun rgyud la bstan pa'i spyang bya glo bur gyi dri ma rnams spyong byed kyis legs par spangs pas gzhi ji lta ba bzhin mngon du gyur pa mthar thug/
39a1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// ci'i phyir 'bras bu'i rgyud du 'gyur zhe na/ khog gzhung las/ grub pa mthar phyin 'bras bur brjod// ces pas bla na med pa mchog gi 'bras bu mthar thug pa don du gnyer ba rnams bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pas na
39a2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu dang / nam yang rgyun mi chad pas na rgyad do// dbye na/ khog gzhung las/ 'bras bu'i ngo bo sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rnam pa lnga// de yang skabs kyis lnga lnga ste// zhes pas sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga re re la'ang lnga
39a3(rnying rgyud): lnga ste 'bras chos nyi shu rtsa lngar 'gyur la/ de yang rten sku dang / brten pa ye shes dang / mdzad pa phrin las gsum du 'du ba yin pas/ dang po rten ni/ gsum mam lnga ste/ dbyings thog tu rig pa'i ye shes grol ba zung 'dug chos kyi sku dang / de las ma
39a4(rnying rgyud): g.yos bzhin du sa bcu'i sems dpa' la mtshan dpe'i rnam par snang ba'i gzugs brnyan longs sgra dang / so skye rnams la mos pa dang mthun par sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan ci rigs su snang ba sprul pa'i sku ste sku gsum mo// yang na sku gsum snang cha ma
39a5(rnying rgyud): 'dres pa'i cha nas mngon byed dang / dgyer mi phyed pa'i cha nas rdo rje'i sku ste gnyis po bsnan pas sku lnga'o// gnyis pa brten pa ye shes ni/ de'i tshe tshogs brgyad gnas su dag pas ye shes lnga ste/ cir yang ma dmigs pa chos dbyings ye shes dang / gsal
39a6(rnying rgyud): la rtog pa med pa me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / 'khor 'das kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa mnyam nyid ye shes dang / chos can ma lus pa mngon sum du sal ler gzigs pa sor rtog ye shes dang / 'gro don mdzad pa la thogs pa med pa'i phrin las 'jug pa bya
39a7(rnying rgyud): grub ye shes so// de dag kyang chos dbyings ye shes ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / phyi ma bzhi po ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes su 'du bas na ye shes gnyis so// gsum pa mdzad pa phrin las ni/ de ltar na sgri ba gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa
39b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' dag grangs shing / shes bya thams cad mngon sum du gzigs pa'i sbyangs rtogs mthar phyin pa'i mthalas gdul bya'i skal ba dang 'tshams pa'i phrin las dus las yol ba med par ldan gyis grub pa nam mkha' ji srid par 'byung ba yin no// gnyis pa
39b2(rnying rgyud): lam rtse cha rkyen rgyud kyi dngos po bye brag tu bshad pa ni/ lha spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam tshig/ mchod sngags ting 'dzin phrin sgrub kyis// gsang sngags rgyud kyi dbye ba bya// zhes pa ltar bcu ste/ de kho na nyid lta ba/ la dor ba spyod pa/
39b3(rnying rgyud): bkod pa dkyil 'khor/ rim pa bgrod pa dbang / mi 'da' ba dam tshig/ rol pa phrin las/ don du gnyer bslab pa/ mi g.yo ba ting 'dzin/ gnas su skyob pa mchod pa/ 'chi bzlos sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dang po lta ba lags ma
39b4(rnying rgyud): ste/ ngo bo ni/ lam rim las/ thabs kyi lta spyod chen po ni/ bla med theg pa las 'phags pa// don dam du ni dkor bdun la// kun rdzob tu ni mnyam rdzogs so// yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yis// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med par//
39b5(rnying rgyud): yang dag nyid du rab tu rtogs// zhes pas mtha' gang du yang ma reg pa'i sems nyid ye nas dkor bdun ngo bo nyid du ldan gyis grub pa ni lhag pa don dam bden pa dang / de nyid kyi rtsal sdang spong bcud spu dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du rang sdang bas
39b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs pa ni lhag pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste/ de gnyis kyang phyogs su lhung ba ma yin par ngo bo dbyer mi phyed par mnyam pa nyid du gnas shing / der 'dzin gyi bsam brjod las kyang yang dag par 'das pas ni tha snyad tsam
39b7(rnying rgyud): dulhag pa bden pa dbyer med spyod yul dang bral ba zhes btags te/ de las/ rgyal 'gros ma mdzad ma bcos par// rang bzhin rang gis dbyer med pa'ang // de min zhen pa dgrol phyir las// tha snyad gnyis par bsam brjod 'das// zhes
40a1(rnying rgyud): ga/ pa yang dung sa rnam pan pa na pas tshig pa pas 'alags pa smye ste/ la/ rjod dudu gan
40a2(rnying rgyud): doni dmang ning byer ba na// su mo brtson thams cang la// dag dang mdag gi nyis kar 'dzin// thabs kyi thug pa chen par ni// rnam par dbyang dang drug pasngal dag/ gan ba ya dbyer med de// rgyabs thod mad kyi me//
40a3(rnying rgyud): m-i// nges tshig ni/ dzA ta'i gralas gnas lugs sa don yang dang rjes sa mthun pa'i shes rab kyis blo 'dugs gcod pas na gatshar// dbyen/ dbang po yang rab la gtan phyogs ces rtogs par bye ba/ dbang 'bring la rang bzhin dang 'bras bya
40a4(rnying rgyud): rtags la na nas rtogs par byab/ dbang brtul la brgyud de rtogs par bya ba tsur nga bzhis rnamasas// gnyis pa srid pa la 'ang gsum n+te/ dben/ rim gsum las/ ting 'dzin byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyid// rjes mthur stong pa gzhung bar
40a5(rnying rgyud): hU~Md// ces pas thabs shes khyad par can gyis zin pa'i lam po'i srog sum ni bya bar gyu pa gang yin pa'o// bas rdzog ni/ n+da'i skal su spang bya la tshul bzhin du rtsod par byed po 'don gyis na spyod pa // dbyeran/ snyir lus dag gi
40a6(rnying rgyud): gsum grangs su dag par tha ba yin la/ b+ha brag tu/ babs la ma brgyal zhugs kyu skying pa dang / grol lam pag yod kyi slong pa gnyis sde ba shad cing / phyim la dang / dang brtson gyi spyod pa/ shes rab dang mthun pa/ thabs dang mthu pa/
40a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs gcig pa/ smos pa dang bcas pa/ phyogs kyi spyod pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi spyod pa ste ma gyis pa'i spyod pa bdun dang / thang dor med pa mang du byung ba cig cang ba mi spyod pa dang brgyad do// gsum pa dkyil 'bar la'ang gsum ste/
40b1(rnying rgyud): thugs TIg las/ gnas sa pas bdun du mang po len// bkod pa gang rdzogs dang bo// zhes pas bkod pa lha'i 'khor lar rdzogs par snang ba'o// rjes rgyog no/ maN+Dala'o skams/ maN+Dan snying po'am brgyad dang / lani 'dzin pa 'am la napa
40b2(rnying rgyud): ste/ snying po'i yon tan gyi gzhi 'dzin pas na snying po len pa zhes dang / yang skra ga zug po zlum po'am bskor ba'i don la 'jug pas na gang gi tso bo la 'khod kyis bskor ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor ro// dbyen/ myos don las gsum dang / 'grob
40b3(rnying rgyud): chung las bcu gnyis sa phye yang / 'dir rgyas pa las/ 'dis ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang // gzugs brtan lhag pa'i gzugs partan gsum// rting 'dzin lag pa'aM// nga 'dzin dang // byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog bstan// rdzas
40b4(rnying rgyud): bdun dru gsangs so// bzhi pa dbang la 'dag sa ma ste/ dza bo ni/ thugs thig las/ rgyu gnyis rkyen bzhes yan lag bskrad// dug la gnas pa'i thob byad// ji nyid ces rnam par bshad// ces pas chu gnyis dang rkyen pani tshogs pa la brten
40b5(rnying rgyud): nas go 'phang gi chos rgyud la 'jog pa'i las kyis thar pa'i rgya gu mngon du bskyed pa'am sbre nges kyi nus rbang du smin par byed pa'o// nges tshig ni/ a b+hi Shi D+ha'i skalas mngon par gtor ba'am thugs pa ste/ sgo gsum gyi dri ma 'khrung cing 'bras bu ye shes
40b6(rnying rgyud): nus pa khyad par can 'dzag pas na dbang ngo // dben/ rgyud phyi ma las/ slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // de ma thag pa bzhi pa ste// zhes pas bzhir gsungs shing / de las kyang bla ma dbang la phan nus gnyis su phye bas lngar 'gyur te/ dza rje las/
40b7(rnying rgyud): dang po sa bon 'jog pa ste// gnyis pa nus pa bskyed pa yin// gsum pa nyams myong bskyed pa'o// bzhi pas de nyid brtan par byed// lnga pas brtan pa nyams lon pas// mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dis 'grub// ces so// de yang zhib la
41a1(rnying rgyud): dbang brgya/ nus dpa sa/ zab dbang gsum ga bco brgyad/ zhub la/ gdan nga b+ha byu gas can dang / rnas pa sgrub sa pacoM ste/ zhes pa lhur phyin dbang la nyer ba cad du bye bas sus d+haH drug go// sapa
41a2(rnying rgyud): thog la 'ang gsum ste/ dA pon/ chung gi ma las/ gang zhiganan tan ga nod// rmil mdu'ang mchog brjod// dmab ci pa ni stsom par 'dod// ces pas bsu rtse 'don kyang bar can pas mi 'ad 'bang rdzob pa'i sems pa la ban
41a3(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa'o// rjes chog ni/ sa ma ya ye spya ngosasal lags bcas pa'i thatshig la 'jug pas ni wAr bcas pa las 'da' bar rgyab ba yin pa'i phyi dam rtog go// dbyen/ rtsa ba'i da mchog lnga dang / yan lag gi mchog sna tshanag tis rte
41a4(rnying rgyud): wA/ de dag las kyang thos nu sum pa madrug rgyal lags pa'i// drug pa smin las la'ad gsum ste/ nga bo ni/ thugs theg las/ ma la tshang med nyid las bzhi// zhes pas tshad med pa bzhi dulas byed pa'i byang chub kyisems dang / shes rab chan pas can
41a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgonas gca bar gzhan dan bslab pa la dmigs pa'i bas mkhas kyi mngang spyod do// des chog ni/ kAm zhes pa'i skalas thogs ma kyi thub ma na can ni las te byed pa pa'i 'dod pa'o// dbyin/ bya ma 'gas 'gyur las/ zhib la sogs
41a6(rnying rgyud): dbebs// las ni rnam pa bzhir bltas so// zhes pas na pa dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag pa stelas bzhir/ de dag kyang ga tugs kya 'i thabs kying ma pa ni/ me dang / rdzas dang / lcag chung dang / mchod rten dang / phyag rgya
41a7(rnying rgyud): nas bya ba rnams te/ khog gzung mes/ bdag gzhan don sgru badzin pas ni// mchod rten phyag tsha gro dang ni// has zo d+ha dang rdzas kyis \u0f7f// zhes so// bdun pa srub pa la la gas ma te/ dza tso na/ rgyang phyem la rtse 'gyur las/ los na/
41b1(rnying rgyud): pa yi dngas grub ni// bskyed pa 'angom pa'i sbyor bas thob// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dngos grub ni// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sto bas so// zhes pa sbyar thabs khyad par can gang gis bslab bya mchog dang than mong gi dngos grub rnam pa gnyis las gang da don/
41b2(rnying rgyud): dug nyer ba zhig go// nges tshig ni/ sed+hi'i sgra las dngos grub ste bsrub bya dang / sAd+ha na'i sgra las kun tu len pa ste/ 'dod pa'i don len cing thob par byed pa'am sgrub par byed pas na sgrub pa zhes bya'o// dbyen/ thun mong dang / mchog gi sgrub
41b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// dang po ni/ khog gzhung las/ ro langs tshe dang bru sgrub dang // lha chen po dang rgyal po bzhi// gdug pa mu 'dul rgyal blon gyi// chung ma dbang du byab gnyis// yul khams ce lung gang mgyogs bskrad// mi snang gzugs
41b4(rnying rgyud): 'o// shA ma/ sa / /
41b5(rnying rgyud): sems// byin dbab sgrub pa rnam gnyis so// zhes so// ji ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul ni/ bye brag so so'i grub thabs gud du ltung ba rnams dang / gtso bor ston pa ni tshom bu tshogs kyi sgrub pa ste/ gzhi phun sum tshogs pa lnga tshang ba'i sgo nas
41b6(rnying rgyud): bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i thabs kyis thub ba'o// brgyad dashing nge 'dzin la 'du ga sam ste/ rab nA/ he saka 'dus pa las/ gang dang gang drugasal ba'i yid// ma yengs pa nyid ting 'dzin te// zhes pa sna bsgom bya'idon khyad par can las
41b7(rnying rgyud): thi ga mi bar gnas pa'i sems ci gcig pa'o// nges tshig ni/ sa mad+hi'i sgralas mnyam pa ran+do ste/ sems ce gcig tu ben pa ngan gyis ma ting nge 'dzin no// dbyen/ phyam kha che 'byor las/ lha yi rnam pa'i byor pa yi// zla ba
42a1(rnying rgyud): la sogs rim// bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes su bshad// rang bzhin grub pa'i rnal 'byor ni// rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes byar brjod// ces pas bskyed rim dang / rdzogs rim gnyis las// dang po la'ang / de las/ bskyed dem la
42a2(rnying rgyud): brten skye gnas te// mngal skyes la sogs dbye ba yis// de yang rnam pa bzhi ru 'dod// ces pas skye gnas bzhi'i bag chags sbyor ba dang bstan te sgom tshul bzhi'am/ yang na lam ri ma ltar srid pa mngal skyes rdzas skyes gnyis dang bstun te rim
42a3(rnying rgyud): gyis pa dang cig car pa'o// rdzogs rim la/ thabs la ma steng 'og gi sgo la brten pa dang / grol la ma zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor rim cig car gnyis kyis bsdus pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// dgu pa mchod pa la 'ang gsum ste/ ngo bo ni/
42a4(rnying rgyud): thugs thig las/ bya byed bya ba byed 'dus pas// dgyes tshim gyur pa'i dngos po nyid// ces pas mchod pa'i yul du gyur pa rnams bkur zhing mchod pa'i bsam pas sgo gsum dang / yo byad stob pa'i sgo nas kyang mnyes par byed pa'o// nges tshig ni
42a5(rnying rgyud): pU dza'i sgra las sngon du bskyed pa dang / yang dang yang du dgyes pa bskyed pa dang / bkur ba'i don gyis gnas su stob pa'i phyir mchod pa'o// dbye na/ spyir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod pa dang / bye brag tu/ phyi nyer spyod//
42a6(rnying rgyud): nang dam rdzas bdud rtsi/ gsang ba sbyor sgol zab mo'am/ zhi khro'i mchod pa bcu bzhi la sogs pa rnams so// bcu pa sngags dang phyag rgya la'ang gsum ste/ dro bo ni/ thugs thig las/ yi ge 'dus pa grub pa bzhi// mthu can red pa gang
42a7(rnying rgyud): yin pa// bzhi rdzogs nyid las mi 'da' ba// gang la snang ba de ngo bo// zhes pas/ babs shes kyi yi ge 'dus shing byin gyis brlabs pas nus mthu can du gyur pa ni sngags kyi ngo bo dang / rig pa phyag rgya bzhi rdzogs kyi lha'i skur gsal ba las mi 'da'
42b1(rnying rgyud): ba ni phyag tu 'ang ba'o// nges tshig ni/ maN+Da'i sbalas yid shes bde myur du slob pas na sngags dang / mung+ga'i tha las 'debs shing mtshon par byed pa'am/ rgyas btab pa las 'da' bar dka' ba 'phyar mtshan mdzangon gyis naphyag kya // dacing/
42b2(rnying rgyud): sngags la snyir gsang sngags/ rig sngags/ gzungs sngags gsum dang / bye brag tu de dag gi sbyor gyur pa'i sngags la/ gsal bkralas/ rtsa ba bskyed dang las sngags dang / zhes pas sgra mnor bca pA/ bskyed pa chen/ bzlas pa la
42b3(rnying rgyud): sngags rnams so// phyag rgya la 'ang sbyir rtog tshogs ye nas spyi'i dkyil lakhor du gnas pa dang / rtogs pa dang / mngon du thos pa'i gnas skabs gsum las/ rang bzhin dang / lta ba dang / 'bras chu'i phyag rgya ga sum dang / bye blag
42b4(rnying rgyud): pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du byas na/ gsal bkra lngas/ dem tshig las dang chos dang ni// sra ning phyag tu chen po ba'i// zhes so// bzhi pa skad kyi dgos 'brel ni/ thugs rdeg las/ brjod 'brel dgos pa yang dgos dang // D+ha d+he nA
42b5(rnying rgyud): lag bzhi ru 'gyur// zhes pas mtshon bya rang bzhin gyi rgyud ni brjod par bya ba'o// de khong du chud par bya ba phyir mtshon byed yi ge'i rgyud 'di ni rjod par byed pa'o// rjod byed la brten nas brjod pa'i don shes pa ni dgos pa'o// de ltar shes pa'i don
42b6(rnying rgyud): nyams sublangs pas thun mong gi dngos grub thob pa ni nyid dag sa phra mo dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'i zung 'jug phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub mngon du gyung pa ni nyid dgos mchog go// de yang brjod bya dang rjod byed gnyis shes bya shes byed dang / rjod
42b7(rnying rgyud): byed dang dgos pa gnyis thabs las thabs byung dang / dgos pa dang nying dgos gnyis de las de byung dang / nying dgos dang brjod pa gnyis po bdag gcig gis 'brel ba yin no// ci'i phyeng chud kyi dgos 'brel zhes bya zhe na/ thob bya mthar thug gi
43a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu na rgyun tu na na
43a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa /
43a3(rnying rgyud): gnyen pa sdum shes shing btsud pa pa' bya thas/ na nang bas mi byu ba grangam sa / ci 'dong / ga ste sogs / zhes pas rgyas snang baban
43a4(rnying rgyud): ga / ngas ba ta / dang byung na / sa
43a5(rnying rgyud): pa nga pa nga sgyu ma phyugs gu sa sa drug
43a6(rnying rgyud): ma byed kyi sa ma bcug par mang byang thub mi ma gyu sa napa 'dzin ma'ang ba nang dashig sa min go 'o// min 'dus pa gyi mangs
43b1(rnying rgyud): ga/ nga 'dus pa las chags su bcad pa dang / lkug pa dang / le'u la lags pa'i sa pas rtogs pa ma che bar nga kun chags pa las gzung tshogs mga' rlud dam/ brjod byu na ci cung mngon par nus pa'i rjod byed pa'i rgyu grub pa yinaH/ dI
43b2(rnying rgyud): ge sku btags me tshogs la// brten pa'i chog gis rab mtshon te// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// de yang dpyad na/ ston pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa las dngos kyi 'khor rnams kyi yid la rgyung don rang snang ba'am/ ma tshongs pa'i gdul bu rnams
43b3(rnying rgyud): yid la 'ang sgra spyi'i rnam par shar ba'i ming tshig yi ga gsum tshogs pa'i rgyud gzung ste sgrar snang ba'i spyad dang / de dang mthun pa'i sgra brjod 'dod kyi dbang gis gnas dang byed pa sogs 'phrang pa las ngag tu brjod pa ni skar grags pa'i skad dang // de 'dzad
43b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i na kyi la tu yig gzugs brgyan glegs 'amal bkad pa ni brdar ldar pa'i rgyud gzung ste/ rdzong byed kyi sgo nas rkye ne de tsam mo// ci'i phyir sgra'i rgyud ces bya zhe na/ brjod pa'i don nyid rjod byed kyi spang sdang zhing skar grugs pa'i don gyis na skadas
43b5(rnying rgyud): gags gas rgyun ga sasas/ sa sa na pas pa'i ba zhes pa // gzhan na dud byas pa skyed nga na pa 'o// daza
43b6(rnying rgyud): dang / bshad pa'i rgyud gnyis sam/ rtsa ba'i rgyud nyid la'ang tshig gi tshogs pa le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis su bcad de gnas la/ de yang le'u dang pa dang / gsum pa'i stod dang / bco lnga pa rnams kyis rgya m+b+hir gzhi dang / le'u gnyis pas chen por
43b7(rnying rgyud): bsdang ba/ le'u gsum pa'i spyad nas nyer gcig pa yan chad kyis/ 'bras bu yongs shes rgyud don dang / de dag la khrab byed du khyud kyi dgos 'brel dang / le'u thams gdams gtad rnamami ston cing / yongs su shes par bya ba rgyud
44a1(rnying rgyud): rlon pa'ang/ thun tu das pa brjo dang/ na tan dgag rgyas rnams pa'agang da gangags tan rnamasags kyang san zheb tu bskrad pas rtag sa// gsum pa dbang banam rnams la na ga tu na
44a2(rnying rgyud): spos te bshang ba la/ rgyud kyi mtshan bstan pa dang / mtshan de dang ldan pa'i rgyung don dngas so// dang po mtshan bstan pa na/ 'odi skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po kho na nyid nges pa'o// zhes pa ste/ 'di la gsum/ klad du smos pa'i dgos pa dang /
44a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan gyi don bshad pa dang / cod pa spang ba'o// dang pon/ bum pa zhes pa'i mang las bum pa'i dngos pog bgyur/ dbang po rab kyis mtshan la brtan nas rgyung dun rtags pa dang / 'bring gis don rnam grangs tsam pa'i 'phrod pa dang / thams
44a4(rnying rgyud): kyang ldan snod kyi kha byung ltar glegs bam btsal sla ba'i dgos pa yod do// gnyis pa ni/ paM ma las 'grel chung ngu/ rang bzhin gsang bzhes bya ste// che bzhes pa snying po'i don// nga kho na nyi mtshan nyid nga // nges pas dzes dan mdor bstan pa/
44a5(rnying rgyud): zhes pas mtshan bzhes rgyud kyi rang bzhin dang / tsha ba drang / mtshan nyi dang / nges pa'i don rnams bstan no// de lags dpa'i don ni/ gnas lugs de bzhin nyid gdong ma nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas 'khor 'das mnyam nyid du gnas
44a6(rnying rgyud): ni rgyal pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste// de nyid zab cing gting dpag dka' bas shAn tu rtogs dka' ba'i phyir gsang ba'o// ji ltang gsang tshul la/ sgeg pardo rjes rang bzhin sogs gsum dang / bi ma las mye ba
44a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gsang ba bsnan te bzhir phye na'ang / rang bzhin gyi gsang ba nigab pa'i khongs su 'dra zhing / mi bstan pa'i gsang ba'ang sbas pa'i nang du 'du bas 'dir rtogs dka' ba dang / rtogs su ma rung ba'i khyad par gyis ka' sngas gnyis te/
44b1(rnying rgyud): khang nas gab sgras ngan 'byin pa// zhes dang / gab pa'i gsang ba martogs par/ sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'tshal nas/ zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// du yang gang lagab pa'i yul ni/ gang zag 'khrul ba'i b+h+yo can rnams pa'o// gab tshul na/
44b2(rnying rgyud): marjon bya ra bzhin gyi rgyud gnas lugs de bzhin nyid de rang la rang chas su gnas kyang / dbul po'i khyi ma na yod pa'i sa 'og gi gter ltar g+ho bu 'khrul tog gis bsgribs nas ma mthong ba ni gab pa ste/ rnam snang mngon byang las/ byis pa mi shes pas
44b3(rnying rgyud): bsgribs pas// tshul 'di shes par ma gyur rnams// sangs rgyas gzhan du 'tshal bar byed// 'di na gnas pa yongs ma mthong // zhes so// des mtshon to/ bla na med pa'i dgongs spyod zab mo rnams rang stobs kyis sam/ gzhan gyis
44b4(rnying rgyud): bstan kyang martogs pas gab ste/ mig ser can la drang gi dkar snang gab pa bzhin no// smras pa'i gsang ba la'ang / gang stan/ gsang sngags bla na med pa'i zhwa brdul du zung ba dang / skom spyod rmad du byung ba rnams so// gang las na/
44b5(rnying rgyud): pa'og ma pa rnams dang / seM sa skye bo phog sred can sogs snod ma smin pa'i gang zag rnams la ste/ de dag gi spyod yul du me rung ba'i phyir ro// gal te ma sbas na/ 'di la brten nas sgo 'dogs dang skur pa mi bzad pas de dag gnas ngan du lhung zhing / gsang
44b6(rnying rgyud): sgo 'tshal bas pa nyid kyang nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// ji ltar ldan/ brda la sogs pa'i tshul gyis te// dam tshig gsal bAkra las/ gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te// sems can don phyir rab tu gsang // gsang thub dngas
44b7(rnying rgyud): grib mi lal bas// gas phyir brda dag sa chags gsungs// zhes so// gnyis pa snying ba 'dzi ni/ snying ba'i// swAr/ chid ya/ gtsugasum las/ sngang ni gcig las dum 'phrong ga thal 'dug pas/ mtshan byang ba
45a1(rnying rgyud): rgyud rtags pa dang ma pa las 'bar 'das kyi chos thams cad 'byung zhing / dag tun pa 'babs pa'i klung 'di yang bstan pa thams cad kyang ga ng+gAng byung bang ba ste/ rdzogs pa rnamasas 'grags pa// gas ba'i ra
45a2(rnying rgyud): po las 'bros te/ zhes sa// hr-i da ya ni srog gam snying ltar gces sbas su b+ha ba'i don la 'jug ste/ theg pa'i sgo gang nas thugs kyang mthar thug bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam 'di las mi 'di' ba'i phyir/ ther 'di kun gyis bsnyen bur gyur pas na/
45a3(rnying rgyud): snying po ste/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing // dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// zhes so// gar+b+ha ni thun pa'i nang gi snying po lta bu la 'jug ste/ rtog tshogs thams cad yin
45a4(rnying rgyud): lha'i ngo bor dag pas 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid du gtan la phab pa'i don 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas dbus na gnas pa lta bu'am/ bcud 'dus pa'i don gyis na snying po zhes bya'o// de yang rgyas pa las/ bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di
45a5(rnying rgyud): dag tu// rnam thar theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus// zhes dang / rdo rje phreng ba las/ chos rnams dbus na gnas pa'i khams// khyab cing spyod yul ma yin te// zhes so// gsum pa de kho na nyid kyi don la gsum ste/ snang stong dbyer med
45a6(rnying rgyud): rang byung gi ye shes lo sgom byed kyi blos ma bcos par 'jog pa ni 'bras bu 'byung ba la mi bslu ba'i phyir rgyu'i de kho na nyid do// de nyid 'bras bu skra dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du dang byung ba la phyin ci log gi chos bsal du med las 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do//
45a7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin bden pa dbyer med kyi ye shes las shes bya dang bsrub bya'i chos gzhan zhig gud na med do/ de la chu 'bras kyi dbye ba tsam yang ma grub pas sgra skur dang bral ba'i phyod rgya 'bras ngo gcig pa'i de kho na nyid do// de dag kyang rdo rje las/ rgya'
45b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa la// de nyi dang bskabs kyis gsum// zhes so// bzhi pa ngas pa'i don na/ skal dman gyi gdul b+ha rnams chud mtha ba'i thabs drang ba'i don tsam du bstan pas bu ma yin ta// 'dir skal ldan dbang rten rnams la cal bshad kyang ltung du/
45b2(rnying rgyud): su chud pa'i don bstan pas na nges pa'o// de skad du'ang / rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di las gsong ba'i nges don med// ces so// yang na/ chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ga zhi'i rgyud ni rtogs par dka' bas gsang ba'o//
45b3(rnying rgyud): dngal bsal bzhag med par 'jog pa'i sgo nas gang shar dag sdang du sbyong ba'i thabs khyad par can ni lam gyi rgyud de bstan pa thams cad kyi bcung du gyur pas na snying po'o// gzhi mi 'gyur ba dang / lam gyis de rtogs pa la mi bslu bas don la gnyis po rkyen
45b4(rnying rgyud): ci ma log pa'i phyir de kho na nyid do// de 'dir sgo srung dang bral bar gtan la phab pas na rnam par nges pa ste/ chung phyi ma las/ gsang ba chos 'byung la bshad de// snying po'ang de yi thabs can no// gnyis po phyin ci ma log phyir// de nyid do 'dir rna
45b5(rnying rgyud): ngesas// zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// gzhan yang mtshan thabs lam steng sgo dang sbyar te nang ltang 'chad pa dang / 'og blo dang sbyar te gsang ba ltar 'chad pa'i bka' stsol yod kyang 'dir ma spros pas sngon 'chad pa pos bsnyad do// gsum brjod pa spang ba ni/
45b6(rnying rgyud): kha cig/ khyod kyi rgyud 'di la klang du rgya skad ma spros pas bod mar 'gyur ro zhe na/ dor mangs te/ bod du brtsams pa'i bstan bac+doMs du mar yang klad du rgyu skad bkod pa yod de des rgya gar mar mi 'gyur ba bzhin no// de yang chu gzhung zhi'i mtshan gradang
45b7(rnying rgyud): lo tsA bas bkod pa shas che mod kyang / 'di ni sdud pa pos bkod par bzhed pa'i phyir/ rgyad po'i klad du/ gu h+ya gar+b+ha ta tra bi ni sh+tsa la/ zhes 'byung yang lo tsA ba spos pa la mi dga' bas mtshan bod skad du bgyur te bkod pa las/ mi gcig la na
46a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis su zlos pa la dgos pa chung bar dgongs nas rgya skad ma smos pa yin no// gnyis pa la gsum ste/ klad kyi don ston pa la phyag btsal ba/ gzhung gi don rgyud don dngos bshad pa/ mjug gi don rgyud rdzogs pa'i bya ba
46a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'o// dang po ni/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes pa ste/ bdud bzhi la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma lus pa bcom pa ni spangs pa phun tshogs/ che ba'i yon tan thams cad rang reg pa'i ye
46a3(rnying rgyud): shes la rang bzhin gyis ldan pa ni rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o// 'das pa'i sgra ni rgyu skad la med de/ bkas bcad las/ 'jig rten pa'i b+ha ga wAn las khyad par 'das zhes bla thabs su bsnan te/ zhes 'byung bas so gsung yang / bla thabs su
46a4(rnying rgyud): ston pa de skad dod dang ma 'brel pa zhig glo bur du dbang che'i rig pas bsnan pa lta bu ma yin te/ dper na brtag gnyis las/ sangs rgyas 'di la b+ha ga mnga'// bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya// b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod// dbang phyug la
46a5(rnying rgyud): sogs yon tan kun// yang na nyon mongs la sogs bdud// 'joms phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya// zhes b+ha ga lhun gyi sgra las/ b+ha ga zhi bcom pa dang / legs pa rnam pa drug po gnyis ka la 'jug pa bzhin du/ 'dir yang yi ge bsnan
46a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra las/ b+ha ni a b+h+ya wi tur+t+ti ste 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ga ni ga ti ste song ba zhes pa'i don yin pas/ yang dag pa'i gnas su song zhing log pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ba ste/ don la shes rab dang snying rje chen pos 'khor 'das gnyis
46a7(rnying rgyud): kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa'i phyir/ 'das zhes 'jig rten pa'i rtag ldan las khyad 'byed du byas pa'o// de yang phal po che las/ srid dang zhi las rnam grol zhing / yon tan rgya mtsho gnyis su med// spos pa kun las rab 'das pa'i// bcom ldan
46b1(rnying rgyud): 'das ni mkha' ba'o// zhes so// dpal na gzhi chos dbyangs shin tu med la rang shAzhin rdzun grub kyi dngul gas gragasaH/ dAng lta ba bzhin mngon du sbyar ba'i 'bras thun chos mya rtogs pa bdag gi dpal dang / de nad kyi dang las gang lagang 'dug
46b2(rnying rgyud): gyi gzugs sku ldan grub tu 'char ba ni thugs rnga gzhan gyi dpal lo// de yang chos kun gyi gnas lugs 'ching grol med pa'i rang bzhin thugs su chud pas spyod yul yongs su dge pa'i phyir kun tu bzang po ste/ ye shes gsang ba las/ rang bzhin mig
46b3(rnying rgyud): lhun rdzogs shing // spyod yul kun tu bzang po ste// zhes so// de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsang bdag gis yul dang 'tshal mkhan gcig tu rtogs pa'i sgo nas lta ba mngal ba'i phyag mdzad do// kha cig 'gyur phrag dang / gzhan dag yig pa
46b4(rnying rgyud): phyag tu 'dod pa ni ma yin te/ spar khab las/ sdud pa pos tshig gnyer ba de'i tshe rang gi ston pa la mchod par brjod pa'o// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ de ltar na lo tsA ba'i 'gyur phyag chad par 'gyur ro zhe na/ skyon med de/ dus 'khor bsdus chud
46b5(rnying rgyud): kyi klad du'ang yi ge pa'i phyag gis go bcad nas 'gyur phyag zur du ma bkod pa ltar/ 'dir yang de bzhin no// / gnyis pa rgyud don dngos bshad pa la/ le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis su gnas pa las/ le'u dang po la gnyis te/ gzhung dang /
46b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan no// dang po gzhung la gsum ste/ thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas gleng gzhi mdor bstan/ rgyud khyad par gyi gleng gzhi'i sgo nas de rgyas par bshad/ gleng gzhi'i don bsdu bya'o// dang po ni/ rgyud kyi thog mar phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i bdag
46b7(rnying rgyud): nyid/ oM them ya/ zhes pa'i yig bzhi smras pas stan te/ thugs thig las/ yig bzhi pas shes par 'gyur// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ 'di la gsum te/ kyi grol lam ltar rgyud khyad par gyi gleng gzhi dang spang te bshad pa/ na na
47a1(rnying rgyud): lam b+ha mdang srung ba shad dus ma rgyas bshad pa/ gas na ska lta ts+tsha ba shad d+hA sa nadu la// ngas na ga nas 'ad / yum la mtha' byangs rgya bzhin gnas ldan sum
47a2(rnying rgyud): min rgyas kyi dbyings kyi ba // lnga log thas kyi ba ston pa phran sum tshogs pa rigs dag pa'o// la log gcig ma sbyor ba ba ste/ thabs shes nga ga pa med na ga shelam 'thas gsum ma tu par thal
47a3(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i rgyud rang bzhin gsang pa'i snying po ni bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa'o// de ltar yang pa'i sangs rgyas las/ a yi dbus su la yi gnyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba'i gnas// mkha' da pying ma rdo rje sems dpa' //
47a4(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs su myong ba las// thig li thul zla bAH// rnam par bcang byurdul kyid gsung // ma yig mun can thugs dpa brjod// mkha' khams me la rnam par gnas// zhes dang / brtagag ces las/ oM li Na byad bzang po gang // da
47a5(rnying rgyud): su wi gis rnam par brgyan// bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ ces dang / lha'i dbang pos zhus pa'i mdo las/ chos kyi phung po 'argyad khri dang // bzhi stong gi ni grangs skyed kyi// kun gyi gzhi dang pa ma ni// yi ge gnyi
47a6(rnying rgyud): sa ma bstan// ye ga y-ini ma gyu la// la nI bzhes thab glags// zig med ni myong bas ti// te shing tu chad byung ba'o// zhes phyogs gsasung+yas byung / e baM ni gaganag shegs pa thams cad kyi zabs shes ston pa nyid kyi brdar gyur
47a7(rnying rgyud): pas gsung ba kun gyi dang por 'jog dgos par/ de nyid las/ a waM yig gnyis sgyu ma la// thams cad mkhyen pa 'dir bzhugs pas// dam chos ston pa'i thog mar ni// a waM de phyer rab tu bshad// ces so// ma ni ma na shes pahA/
47b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa'am/ yang na sku mdor ma ni dran pa mtshon pa'i yi ger bshad pas smr-i ta ste/ dran zhes kyi las kyis tu dadon mi brjed par 'dzin pas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o// yan ya na las
47b2(rnying rgyud): dus phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rgyud 'di bshad pa gang gi tshe zhes dus ston pa'i tshig phrad yin pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni/ ji skad du/ d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas// 'od bzhi e sogs dbyibs su gnas// mi shigs nig le waM dpyi bas can/
47b3(rnying rgyud): la bde ba gsal byed dag/ ma nu yid sogs rnam shes bzhi// ye shes myong bas bsdus par bshad// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs skyes pa// par mAr+tha don zab mo// bde ba'i dus nyid snga phyi bral// dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas//
47b4(rnying rgyud): zhes bshad rgyud rgya mtsho las gsungs pa ltar/ es mtshon pa'i gnas ni/ d+harma tsakra zhes pas snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na rtsa 'dab brgyad yod pa rtsa ba'i 'dib ma bzhir 'du ste/ mdun na chos nyid kyi rtsal 'od dkar po zlum po// g.ya
47b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi rdul zla bzhi ser po// g.yon yon tan gyi rtsal zla ga ma dmyur po/ rgya ba rang chud kyi rtsal gru gsum dmar na kra rnams te/ e sogs lngas bzhi'i dbye bas mdog can ni don dam 'od gsal gyi bzhugs gan sa len pa'i phyi ga
47b6(rnying rgyud): so// waM gis mtshan pa'i ston pa ni// de lta bu'i gnas la brten pa'i dngas ma lnga'i dbul nami zhugs pa sems kyi dang sa ma mi shigs pa'i thig le we yig gi rnam par gnas pa ste/ de nyid mar me gsal byed gzhan la ltos mi dges pa lta
47b7(rnying rgyud): gis rang la bde ba gsal bar ston pas na ston pa'o// mas mtshan pa'i 'khor ni/ ma nu'i sgra las drangs na/ ma na shes pa la'o zhes pas yid la sogs pa'i rnam shes tshogs brgyad de/ chos nyid kyi rtsal kun gzhi/ ye shes kyi rtsal yid/
48a1(rnying rgyud): dran tan ma mnyan med/ rang rgyud ma rnam shes rnams gnas pas/ de dag ban thal rnam par rgyan na ma nas gas pa ba byams su byung ba na 'thang ba// malogags mngon pa'i 'astan pa na//
48a2(rnying rgyud): yA na'i skra las bla na med pa'i theg pa ste/ de'i man ngag ster sgo 'du 'dul gyi thabs kyis bde gas la mi rtog pa'i ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs can skyes pa ni/ bang sAna'i sgra las dam pa'i don nam/ do ni zab mo ste bstan pa'o// rnam pa gcig tu na yani sam pa'i ming mtha
48a3(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa'am/ yadwa'i sgra las dus kyang mtshon te/ bad pa'i ye shes skyes pa de'i chos phyir 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dang bral bas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid de bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i dus so// gsum pa ni/ ji skad du/ 'di zhes nye bar mtshon pa ni// oM sogs rnam pazhi'i dbyibs can
48a4(rnying rgyud): gnas// smad ces gsal byed las ming can// lce dbyibs thig ler bcas ston pa'o// sang ma n+ya thom tha~M med// las can rnam shes de dag la// gsol ba ga bas pa nad pa'i 'dang // bskra ni dam nges pa'i rgyud// yin theg chen 'di mi
48a5(rnying rgyud): dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab dus// nA ma de mi zhes bya'o// zhes bshad chud thal ba las gsungs pa wA re/ 'di zhes pa es mtshon pa'i gnas te/ yum gyi b+hag no gu gsum/ khyams glu bzhi/ skye gnas blag ma/ dbyings phyug gis 9
48a6(rnying rgyud): oM sogs las bzhi'i dbyibs can de gsang ba'i ston 'khor bzhugs pa'i gnas so// skad ces pa waM yig gis mtshon pa'i ston pa ste/ yab kyi rdo rje nor bu'i dpung rgyas ya phrag bcu gsum gyi bzung 'dus pa'i kun dzI pa ye shes kyi thig le wi ga 'thabs
48a7(rnying rgyud): ni lab yum gnyis ka'i rgyud la bde ba gsal bar ston pa'i bdag nyid yin pas na ston pa'o// bshad ces pa ma yig gis mtshan pa'i 'khor te/ mdas rjem d+hid/ mnan yid de/ byed pa rlom pa thabs dang bcas pa'igs papa'i rnam sher ni ye shes nyams
48b1(rnying rgyud): su myong bas na 'khor ro// pa'i zhes pa ya yig gis mtshan nas/ yA na'i ska las theg pa chen po zhes bsnyad pa'i bstan pa 'di'o// de gang zhe na/ pa ra mAr+tha zhes pas don dam pa ste/ nyams su stong byasems la rdzogs pa'i dka' ba bdu drug gi tha ma rnam thar pa na na/
48b2(rnying rgyud): gyi bde ba chen po rang bzhim lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes so// dus na shes pa ya yig gis mtshon pa'i dus te/ de nyid nyams su myong ba'i tshe dus 'di zhes mtshon du med pas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus so// nA la ne zhes bya ba zhes pa ste/ phun sum tshogs pa
48b3(rnying rgyud): ka'i ming de dang de mtshon pa'i mjug sdud do// gnyis bcud khyad par gyi gleng gAzhi'i sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa la lnga ste/ chos dang / dus dang / ston pa dang / gnas dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o// dang po ni/ 'di skad bshad pa ni gsang ba'i ste
48b4(rnying rgyud): po ste/ de yang 'di skad ces pa ni/ rgyad don ma lus pa mtshon pa'i tshig skyed do// 'o na bdag gis zos pa mi zer bar bshad pa zer ba gang zhen/ rgyud gzhan rnams su bdag gis thos zhes smos pa'i dgos pa ni/ sdud pa 'o nyid ston pa ma yin pa
48b5(rnying rgyud): khas blangs nas de skad du brjod pa dang / bdag nyid kyis ston pa las mngon sum du thos kyi gzhan las brgyad de thos pa ma yin pa dang / tshig thos pa tsam du zad kyi don rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhes mtshon par byed pa las/ 'dir ni thun mong ma yin pa'i phyogs
48b6(rnying rgyud): bzung ste/ sdud pa po rang nyid ston pa dang tha mi dad par khas DUdra nas sngar ngas 'og min du bshad pa nyid yang 'dir bshad par bya zhes smos pa'o// don 'di nyid kyis na bstan pa 'di yang rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'i saM phug nges don mthar thug pa nyid bstan pa yin par
48b7(rnying rgyud): cing / 'phags pa phyag ni rdo rje pa nyid kyang thun mang gi spyad pa po gzhan las byed par de 'phags pa'i che ba bstan pa'o// de skad du'ang nyi 'ad ga'i ma cher 'grel pas/ bshad ces pas ni 'khor dang ston pa gnyis su med par btsun pa yi pa/
49a1(rnying rgyud): zhes dang / sngar khab las kyang / thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng gzhi ste/ rgyud gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir/ zhes so// de yang spyad pa pa nyid ston pa dang rgyud tha mi dad par/ bde 'dus zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyur
49a2(rnying rgyud): las/ da ni chana'i rgyal pa ste// 'chad dang nyan pa'ang nyid yin// zhes dang / brtag gnyis las/ 'chad pa thong chos kyang / rang gi tshogs ldan tan pa'ang zhes dang // gsang ba slab pa las/ rgyad 'chang pa de thugs dz+r-iH/ 'tsha
49a3(rnying rgyud): pa po de sdud pa'ang de// zhes so// gnyis pa dus phun sum tshogs pa ni/ dus na zhes pa ste/ 'di skad bshad pa'i tshe na ston pa 'di nyid gnas 'dir 'khor 'di dag dang lhan cig tu bzhugs zhes 'brel sbyar ba yin no// 'o na dus gcig na mi zer ba gang
49a4(rnying rgyud): nga du gas pa sa rgyan na/ na pa tsu kyi ba yi ma ga sa las sa sun mau ma tshan sa
49a5(rnying rgyud): chu mtsho las/ de tshe dus nyid mtha' bral phyir// ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid// ces so// gzhan du thu na mod pa ltar na/ dus gcig gi nges pa 'brang ba'i dgos pa yang / dus gcig gi tshe 'di zos kyi gzhan du mthos zhes bka'i don rnyed dka'
49a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / 'dir 'di thos la gzhan du gzhan dag kyang thos zhes sdud pa po dang nyid thos pa che ba dang / dus lan gcig gis khong du chud pas shes rab phul tu byung bar bstan pa yin no// 'dir kha cig na de/ rgyud 'di nyid bka' yang dag pa ma yin
49a7(rnying rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ zhes ma smos pas gleng gzhi log pa'i phyir ro zer/ de ltar na/ dus kyi 'khor lo dang / 'jam dpal mtshan brjod dang / bde mchog rtsa chud sogs rgyud rnam dag mang po zhig kyang bka' yang dag pa ma
49b1(rnying rgyud): yin par 'gyur bas rnam par ma brtags pa'i zla brdal la// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu la mnga' brnyas pa'i phyir/ tshu rol mthang ba'i blos phyogs gcig kho nar ngas bzung bya ba'i yul ma yin pas/ shA
49b2(rnying rgyud): pathun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam bzhag tha dad pa gcig gis gcig dgag par mi bya ste/ mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel pa las/ 'di ni rnam par bzhag pa gzhan kho na yin pas/ theg pa gzhan gyi lugs la brten nas nA ma du'ang sun 'byin
49b3(rnying rgyud): brjod par mi bya'o// zhes gsungs pa lhur ro// gsum bston pa phun sum tshogs pa la gnyis te/ ston pa'i rang bzhin dang / ngo bo na// dang po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nas/ dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan/
49b4(rnying rgyud): yang rgyud phyi ma las/ gang phyir de bzhin nyid du gshegs// de bzhin gshegs par mngon par brjod// ces pas sgrib byed kyi zhen pa gzung 'dzin gnyis dang bral ba mthar thug pas gzhi ji lta ba de bzhin du gshegs pa'o// de nyid kyang dang byung gi ye
49b5(rnying rgyud): shes la spang bya ma grub pas yang dag pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'bras bu ma btsal bar su dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du rdzogs par rang snang ba'i bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas te/ bud+d+ha'i sgra gnyid sad pa lhung sangs pa dang / pad+ma kha bye ba ltar rgyas pa'i don
49b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka la 'jug pas/ ma rig pa'i gnyid sangs shing shes bya la blo rgyas pa ste/ skyabs 'gro bdun tu pa las/ mi rig gnyid las sangs phyir dang // shes bya la yang b+h+yo rgyas phyi re// zhes so// de ni 'dir don ji bzhin pa mngon du byas
49b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i stobs kyis spangs thob med pa'i yon tan mthar thug pa la bzhag ste/ le lag las/ ma rig pa nyid ye shes gsal// nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog/ ces so// de lta bu'i rang bzhin ni bdud bzhi sgrib gnyis bag chags dang
50a1(rnying rgyud): na su su / ya das sus / sa sa nan
50a2(rnying rgyud): las/ bdad bzhi la sogs rig pa'i gdongs kyis bcom// wA la sogs yon tan brjod las 'das// rang gang ba 'di sa bstan du med/ chos so// bdud bzhe rjem lugs ni/ nyon mongs pa sde tid ye shes lnga'i bar rnam par drug
50a3(rnying rgyud): pas nyon mangs de'i 'a 'gyu la/ de dag gas lung ba lnga yang / rigs lnga'i bar mngon du 'asur bar gdon mi zabs na chung po'i bdud btsam ma// de skar gnyig khyer med du rtogs pa la 'dod pa'i bar byed kyis mi chags shing / gang po
50a4(rnying rgyud): brdu bcam pas zang po nyid mam mas gror ba med pa de med pa sa sems nyid 'tshalas la ba'i 'i ba bdud dpa dri bad gagi bdu pa ba cam ste/ mos pa las/ bdud pa'i tshar bad ces bya ba'o mchog na/ mangs brnyed
50a5(rnying rgyud): mi pa ngag pa / ba dkyi la'am/ ci med pa'i ga shA // sreg ga / byud thubalas/ 'khru gapa marnams par dag pa gang / sa
50a6(rnying rgyud): phyir bdang // ba la sogs nga / tan mongs bri bapor ba// sa pas drug lda da ma rdzug panas/ shes tha~Mng na/ shes snang ba cad sa mang du na gsum par byed la bas nga / den langag
50a7(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin po'i rnag pa'i// zag tugs ni byang drung na pa'i sapa ga'ab ba'i ba chags tu dang dbang phyu ga ma rdzog nas pa khyor ba'i tshus sre gar pa 'a byed da / da
50b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'brel chang nas dag par gsungs pa'i phyir/ 'di ni lam bden mthar thag sngags kyi theg pa kho nas skyong dgos pa'i sgrib pa shin tu phra pa'o// spu lnga'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni gzhan las skal ba phun sum tshogs pa drug bshad pa dang dgongs pa mthun
50b2(rnying rgyud): te/ sa mu Ti las/ dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang // brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste// drug po de la ldan zhes brjed// ces pas dbang phyug ni bag chags ma lus pa bcom pa'i bdag nyid shin tu rnam
50b3(rnying rgyud): par drag pa chos kyi sgra dang chos dbyings ye shes yin la/ de bzhin du gzugs bzang ba ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas mngon byang dang me long lta bu/ dpal dang grags pa ni 'gro la yon tan ster ba las mi g.yo ba longs sku dang mnyam nyid/ ye
50b4(rnying rgyud): shes na chos kun dbyer mi phyed par dus gcig tu mkhyen pas rdo rje'i sgra dang sor rtog/ brtson 'grus ni srin las tshad med par snang bas sprul pa'i sku dang bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi chos la rdzogs par longs spyod kyang thams cad ye
50b5(rnying rgyud): kyi rol par lhun gyis grub pas blang dor gyi spyod yul las 'das pa'i phyir gzhan las 'phags pas na chen po'o// de yang steng 'og phyogs mtshams brgyad de phyogs bcu dang / 'das ma 'ongs da lta 'gyung bar ma nges pa ste dus bzhi'i dbyings na bzhugs shing
50b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro do na mdzad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi che ba'i yon tan gyi rten byed pas sgra dang / gdul bya'i bsam pa dang mthun pa'i chos brda sprod pas gsung dang / shes bya ma lus pa mkhyen cing sgrib pa gsum las rnam par grol bas thugs dang /
50b7(rnying rgyud): de dag gi zlas drangs te// dgos 'dod ma lus pa 'byung bas yon tan/ gzhan don mdzad pa la nus mthu thogs pa med pas phrin las te/ re re yang lnga lnga daphye bas 'bras chos nyi shu rtsa lngar 'gyur la/ de dag thams cad kyang rang
51a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin dbyer mi byed pa/ ma nyid 'dzig dang bral ba/ dbo 'dus ma thas pas dana'i bdag nyid du rog cig pa'i gyur/ rgal ba drug pa la rigs thams cad kyi bdag pa'am/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ste gzugs ca na/
51a2(rnying rgyud): bya'o// de ltar na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kho nar nges pas 'khor ba'i chos rnams 'dor ram zhen ma yin te/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad dang dbyer mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs so zhes ston pa la/ sngar 'das pa'i 'khor 'das
51a3(rnying rgyud): lus pa dang / da ltar ba'i 'khor 'das mi lus/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'khor 'das lus la med pa thams cad dang rgyud kyi bdag po rigs drug pa nyid kun rdzob tu rig pa sgyu ma'i snang brnyan yin pas so so ma yin/ don dam par ma skyes pas tha mi dang / bden
51a4(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis ka'i tha skad las kyang 'das pas dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ de dag kyang / skar khab las/ rgyal ba dug pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa yang mdor bdun du 'du ste/ zhes pas gzhung tshan bdun pos rim bzhin/ de bzhin nyid du
51a5(rnying rgyud): nar son pa'i dang / yon tan ma btsal bar lhun gyis grub pa'i dang / ye shes mtha' dbus dang bral ba'i dang / 'bras bu la mnga' mdzad kyang ngo bo bstan du med pa'i dang / mnyam pa nyid mngon du mdzad kyang spyod yul dang bral ba'i dang / de
51a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid gcig dang du ma las grol ba'i dang / gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen por dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i rang bzhin rnams yin la/ kho ga gzhung las/ ston pa'i rang bzhin brgyad dang ldan//
51a7(rnying rgyud): zhes pas yang dag pa'i rang bzhin dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin gnyis so sor gyi ste brgyad dang / 'grel chung ngu bcom ldan 'das zhes pa yan chad gcig tu bsdoms nas bzhir bshad de/ ji skad du/ byang chub mchog gi ngo bo dang // chos rnams
51b1(rnying rgyud): rol par longs spyod dang // phyogs dus bde gshegs bdag po dang / chos so cog dang dbyer med pa'o// zhes gsungs so// gnyis pa ston pa'i ngo bo ni// sku mdun dang rgyab med pa nas/ dbu gsum dang ldan pa/ zhes pa'i bar te/ ston
51b2(rnying rgyud): pa ni ye shes kyi sku can yin pa'i phyir/ de'i sku la mdun dang rgyab kho nar ris su chad pa med pas phyogs thams cad du sgrib pa med par zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thal le bar gsal ba ste kun tu zhal gyi rang bzhin du bzhugs shing / skyes bu chen po'i
