51b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po gsal zhing so sor 'byed pa dang ldan pas skul rnam par sbas pa'o// mtshan dpe la gnyis te/ thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa'o/ dang po la gnyis las/ mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ mngon rtog
51b4(rnying rgyud): rgyan las/ phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs/ phyag dang zhabs sor bra bas 'brel ba dang // phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags// 'di yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang / sor mo ring dang rting yongs sku che drang //
51b5(rnying rgyud): zhabs 'bur mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs// byin pa i Ne ya'i 'dra phyag ring mdzes// 'doms kyi lbab sbubs su nub pa'i mchog/ pags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang // spu ni re re nas kyang g.yas legs 'khungs// zhal mdzod
51b6(rnying rgyud): spras brgyan ro stod seng ge 'dra// 'di yi dpung pa'i mgo bla ma thal gong rgyas// 'di la ro mi zhim pa ro mchog snang // sU ni n+ya gro ta ltar cha zheng gab// gtsug tor dbur ldan ljags ring mdzes pa dang // tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa sa
51b7(rnying rgyud): go 'dra dang tshems// shin tu dkar dang tshad mnyam thags bzang dang // grangs ni bzhi bcu thams pa tshang ba dang // spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rjeb mchog gi// 'dra ba 'di dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// zhes so// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu
52a1(rnying rgyud): na sa/ // na tu na
52a2(rnying rgyud): su de
52a3(rnying rgyud): ga nyid de/ du kyi// cin du /
52a4(rnying rgyud): gas da med pas da/ lan da / ba dngas dang/ rje rje'i // de me da nga'i nga ngo // gsang ni kyang ma / dun nga sa
52a5(rnying rgyud): kyis ni ga nga/ sa nga gi ban sa sa 'di jipa'i / dis ma rjes
52a6(rnying rgyud): mas panam pa tu ngas padang// yu' ba zhis sa // // ga du'i mang mi na ma
52b1(rnying rgyud): na 'phrog par byed pa dang // dpal zhi bcu bkra shes ni// g.yung drung 'khril bas brgyan pa ste// sangs rgyas dab rgyang bzang por bzhed// ces so// gtas pa ni me la lta bu la pags pa ye shes bzhir de rang bzhi bzhir phye ba'i ye shes bcu drug gal ba mang/
52b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' bkra drug/ de'i yul chos dbyangs bcu drug gi rgyal sems ma bcu drug sde sum cu rtsa gnyis ni mtshan bzang po yin la/ sems dpa' brgya drug pa ye shes lnga'i rtags rigs kyi lha lnga lngas dpa brgyan pa'i lta ba chad tu ni dpe byad de/ blo mdo mas/
52b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan gyi me tog la dpe byad kyi 'bras bus sbas pa'i phyir/ sras kyi tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan pa'o// zhes so// yon sems ma bcu drug la dbu rgyan med ngam zhen/ med de/ chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir ro// de yang gyi gzhabs
52b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor los mtshan rdzogs rgyan mong du grags pa las khyang bar du gyur pa ye shes chen po'i rtags kyi mtshan mar snang bas na thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya la/ dag mtshan dper 'dzag pa'i rgyu mtshan yang / 'khor dang 'khor gyi rgyan phun sa ma tshogs pas
52b5(rnying rgyud): gtso bo'i rang bzhin yang bkod pas mdzes par byed pa'i phyir te/ sor gdub dang sor gdub kyi zas skyes bu'i lag pa mdzes par byed pa bzhin no// de lta bu'i sku las mi g.yo bzhin du zhing khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du gang la gang 'dul
52b6(rnying rgyud): gyi sgra'i bkod pa dang / sgra skad mtha' yas pas theg pa ma lus pa ston pa'i gsung dang / srang rtogs kyis bsdus pa'i yon tan thugs mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis khyab cing / gdul bya dag ma dag gi snang ba dang mthun pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs
52b7(rnying rgyud): bar kun tu snang bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad de/ dkan brtsegs las/ nam mkhas ji snyed khyab gyur pa// skra yis kyang ni de sted khyab// skra yis ji nyid khya gyur pa// 'od kyis kyang ni ba sred khyib// 'od kyis ji nyid zab gyur pa// gsu
53a1(rnying rgyud): gis kyang ni de ste khyab// gsung gi su 'i steng lta byung ba// thugs kyis kyang ni de skyed khyab// ces pa sbyang ngo // 'dis sprul pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su bstan pas thub pa drug kyang shugs kyis bstan par 'gyur zhing /
53a2(rnying rgyud): gang ma rnams gzhung tshan gsum par ston pa sgra gsum gyi bdag nyid yin par ma sar sbyar bar mdzad pa'ang mi 'gal lo// 'on ston pa'i rnam 'grar ji lta bu snyam na/ thabs spyir rje chen po dang shes rab stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis sri ni'i mtha'
53a3(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i brdar zhabs gnyis yab mnyam pa'i skyil krung dang / yum brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo gleng du mtshungs par bzhugs nas snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ 'dir yum gyi bzhugs tshul bshad par kun tu bzang mo bstan pa yin do// ye shes
53a4(rnying rgyud): lnga dang byung gi ye shes dang drug gi don mtshan byed phyag drug dang / ye shes de dag gis gdul bya'i re ba yad bzhin du spong ba'i rtags rin po che las grub pa'i rigs lnga ye shes lnga dang chos dbyings kyi phyag rgya rdo rje la sogs pa 'od 'bar ba can 'dzin ste/ sgyu 'phrul rol
53a5(rnying rgyud): bi chen po las// ye shes drug gi bdag nyid kyi// phyag rgya rin chen 'bar ba'i mtshan// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// dril bu pad+ma ral gri 'bar// zhes so// sku stong pa nyid dang / gsung mtshan ma med pa dang / thugs smon pa med pa
53a6(rnying rgyud): gsum ni b+h+yo'i yul las 'das pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin la/ de'i rtags su dbugasum dang ldan pa ste/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing gar snang ba'o// bzhi pa gnas phun sum tshogs pa la banyes te/ gnas kyi rang bzhan
53a7(rnying rgyud): dang / ngo bo'o// dang po ni/ 'og min zhes sogs te/ de la phyir 'og min ni bla na gzhan mod pa 'don yin la/ bye brag tu phyen/ chos dbyings don gyi 'og min dang / rig pa'i 'og min dang / gsang ba'i 'og min dang / gtsang nyes
53b1(rnying rgyud): nang tshan 'jig rten gnas kyi 'og min rnams las/ 'dir 'og min chen po zhes bya ba langs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgra'i sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs gnas gtsang ma'i gnas las sbags pa gang yin pa ste/ rdo rje las/ gtsang ma'i ris dag rnam spangs
53b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i// 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na// zhes dang / rgya mtsho las/ 'jig rten gnas kyi 'og min las// nyis 'gyur shin tu spags pa na// ngo bo mtha' gsum las 'das pa// ma spangs can rdzogs gzhal yas 'ang /
53b3(rnying rgyud): zhes so// de yang rgyu'i byang sems kyis sa dang po'i bden pa mthong ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i 'og min las/ des don du 'tshang rgya ba'i zhing khams 'og min chen po nyis 'gyur gyis 'phags par gsungs pa ni/ tshogs lam gyi sna zin nas mthong
53b4(rnying rgyud): la ma thob pa la yun ji tsam thogs pa'i nyis 'gyur sa dang po nas sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du dgos pa la dgongs pa yin gyi/ gtsang ma'i gnas de'i ya rol na yod pa'i nges pa med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rang gang na bzhugs pa'i rang snang yin pas ma
53b5(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i zhing spangs pa'i pha rol na dag pa'i zhing gzhan zhig zlos btsal du med pa'i phyir ro// de ltar yang rgyas pa las/ yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na// bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong // theg mchog mnyam pa'i don
53b6(rnying rgyud): nyid togs pa na/ ngan song gnas kyang 'og min dga' ldan gnas// zhes dang / rdul phra rab gcig gi steng na'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa ma 'gags par snang bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas te/ sdong po bkod pa las/ spu yi rtse
53b7(rnying rgyud): mo gcig la yang // zhing rnams bye ba bsam me khyab// sna tshogs dbyibs kyang tha dad de// de dag 'dres par gyur pa med// ces dang / bzang spyod las/ rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ zhes so// don la nam mkhas gar
54a1(rnying rgyud): khyab tu sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang phrin las kyis khyab pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing la phyogs dang ras su chad pa med de/ shAkya thub pa'i zhing 'di nyid kyang dag pa dang ma dag pa'i zhing khams so so bar mthong na/ rang gi blo snang tsam las/
54a2(rnying rgyud): dag pa dang ma dag pa'i zhing rang mtshan pa zhig logs ni yod pa ma yin no// de yang 'di ltar dri ma med par grags pa'i mdo las/ btsun pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bdag gis sa chen po 'di mtho dman dang g.yang sa dang ldan ljin gyis gang bar mthong ngo zhes
54a3(rnying rgyud): zer ro// sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i zhing nas 'ongs pa'i tshangs pa ral pa can gyis smras pa/ bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhing 'di nyid gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gnas kyi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa bzhin du yongs
54a4(rnying rgyud): su dag par mthong ngo zhes zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i rang bzhin bstan par mdzad pas/ thams cad kyis shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyan bkod pa'i zhing khams bzhin
54a5(rnying rgyud): yongs su dag par mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni rtag tu 'di 'dra ste/ khyod rnams kyis mi mthong ngo // zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// des na longs sku'i gnas de'i rang bzhin ni
54a6(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa yin pas mtha' dang dbus la sogs pa gang gi yang ris su chad pa med pas nam mkha' ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ 'grel chung las/ mtha' dbus med pa chos kyi dbyings// de ni gnas kyi bla mar
54a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod// ces so// gnyis pa ngo bo ni/ de lta bu'i gnas na yon tan gyi khyad par rang sdang ba'i pho brang gi bkod pa ji lta bu snyam na/ de 'chad pa la 'grel chung las/ gzhal yas gzhi dang rgya dang rgya/ dbyibs dang gle 'phur rtse mo dang /
54b1(rnying rgyud): rkyen dang sgo khyud rta babs dang // mtshan nyid gdan gyi rnam pa ste// zhes ngan bcu gcig tu gsungs pa las/ dang po 'og gzhi ni/ gzhi tshad med ces sogs te 'og gzhi'i rgya khyon thos tshad dmigs su med par brdal pa'i rang bzhin ye shes lnga
54b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan bye gzugs rnam pa 'khor lo sdebs bzhi skye ba dang bcas pa ma 'dres par gsal ba'i steng la ste/ rol pa chen po las/ 'khor lo chen po'i sa gzhal// khang pa gra bzhi'i rnam par brjid// ces so// gnyis pa r+d+ha na~M/ ye she pa ring
54b3(rnying rgyud): po che 'bar ba'i zhes sogs te/ ye shes nyid dbyebs dang kha dog tu rang snang bas gdul bya'i re bskor ba'i rtags su rin po che 'ong 'bar ba las thub pa'i gzhal yas khang chen po'o// gsum pa cha tshad ni/ chu gyogs bzur zhes sogs te byings
54b4(rnying rgyud): la cha tshad med pa'i rtags su gzhal yas khang de'i tshad phyogs bcu thams cad du chu yongs su ma chad pa'o// bzhi pa dbye bas ni/ yon tan zhes sogs te/ de ltar rgya ma chad pas rgyal bar 'gyur ram snyam na/ ma yin te/ rang bung gi ye shes pa 'bras pa
54b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa rgyas pa'i phyir/ de'i rtag kyi phyag rgya dbyibs gru bzhi par thar pa'o// lnga pa glo 'bur ni/ lhag pa'i zhes sogs te/ ye shes re re yang lhag pa'i ye shes bzhi bzhi dang ldan pas re bskong ba'i rtags su gu chad las
54b6(rnying rgyud): phyir 'phyar ba'i rin po che'i glo 'bur rigs bzhi kha dog can gyis mdzes pa'o// drug pa rtse mo'i don ni/ rtse mo zhes sogs te/ gzhal yas khang de'i rtse mo bum pa zlum po'i rnam par 'khyil ba ni/ thugs dang rig pa'i ye shes nying phyogs bcu
54b7(rnying rgyud): dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad par rang snang ba'i phyir/ rang bzhin so so ma yin zhing / ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes spros pa kun dang bral ba'i klong du 'khyil ba mtshon pa'i rtags so// bdun pa rgyan ni/ ye
55a1(rnying rgyud): shes bsam gyes nas bklubs pa zhes pa'i bar te/ thugs rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi rtsal ma 'gags pa las ye shes lnga'am nyi shu rtsa lnga la sogs pa'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba'i rtags su ye shes rang snang
55a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyan rin po che las grub pa'i dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag tshad med pa dang ldan pas gzhal yas khang gzhan las khyad par du byung ba'i bkod pa phun sum tshogs pas brgyan pa/ theg pa dang sa lam gzhan las 'di nyid
55a3(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa'i rtags su sgo dang khyams sogs nas lte ba'i bar rdo rje 'greng bu res rim par spags pa/ chos kyi dbyings la mtha' thug pa med pa'i rtags su pho brang gi rtse mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor ltar mtho ma'i tshad 'di zhes dpag tu med pa/
55a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi rtsal snang rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i rgyan gyi khyad par yang / thugs rje dang sprul pa'i phrin las rgyun mi chad pa'i rtags su phreng ba dang / bden gnyis dbyer mi phyed pa'i rtags su chun 'phyang dang / thabs sna tshogs pa ma 'dres
55a5(rnying rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa'i rtags su shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzhan yang 'dod yon thams cad ma spangs rnam dag rol pa'i rgyan du shar pa'i rtags su yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs sna tshogs dang / bla sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang /
55a6(rnying rgyud): reg bya sna tshogs pa dang / de dag thogs pa'i rdo rje'i lha mo rnams kyis phyogs bcur sprin phung ltar 'khrigs pa ni 'bad rtsol med par rang byung la/ de dag thams cad kyang phan tshun gcig gis gcig mi bsgrib par phyi nang zang thal du gsal ba'i rgyan gyi
55a7(rnying rgyud): bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bkod pas mdzes par brgyan cing bslabs pa'o// brgyad pa sgo ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i zhes sogs te/ dngos po dang mtshan 'dzin gyi sgrib pa las rnam par thar pa'i sgo thun mong ba gsum dang / thun mong ma yin
55b1(rnying rgyud): pa rang bzhin gyis 'dra gsal ba ste bzhi'i sgo nas byang chub chen por ldan pas 'jug pa'i rtags sa sgo bzhin khyad kyi zlas drangs pa'i 'bra ma lags dang ya thubs can gyis phyogs bzhir btsun pa te/ le lag lus/ stang stan mtshan med ngang
55b2(rnying rgyud): gsal du// dper me shes skye bzhi shang // zhes sa// dgu ba rta babs ne/ rnam par thar pa ba kyi zhes sogs te/ don mthong las/ lam ba rgyad rim par bzod pa yis// 'bras bu'i yan tan kun rdzogs pas// rta ba'as
55b3(rnying rgyud): 'bras bcu drug bstan// zhes pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rta babs brgyad brgyad de bcu drug las/ rgya'i rtababs ni/ mtshon sgo rnam thar bzhi'i ske nas mtshon bya byang chub chen por 'jug pa yang / 'khor ba las rnam par thar pa'i theg pa brgyad
55b4(rnying rgyud): bgrong nas 'jug pa'i rtags su sgo phugs kyi phyi nang gnyis na them skas bzhi bzhi stebabs zhon gyi rta babs pa chang dang ldan pa'o// de yang la lag las/ der 'gro lam stegs bcung dang ldan// rta babs brgyad du 'gyur ba yin// zhes dang / srung
55b5(rnying rgyud): las de gang zhon nas sems can thams cad mya ngan zlo// zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// 'bras bu'i rta babs na/ thag brgyad kyi grub mtha'i yon tan brgyad rdzogs pa'i rtags su sgo khang gi steng na rgyan gyi rtababs brgyad dang ldan pa ste/ sgra 'phral gyi
55b6(rnying rgyud): brag bstan pa las// de yi grub pa'i mtha' rdzogs pa'i// yon tan brgyad phyir rta rkang dang // chu skyes sgo ma dang zar chags// snga 'phyang rgyan 'phyang shishang bu dang // khrung mag mdzes pas rim par 'khrigs// zhes so// badz+ra pa gnas
55b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid ni/ phyi dang nang med pa zhes sogs te/ gzhal yas khang de'i phyi dang nang med pa thams cad rang rig pa'i ye shes rtsal rA 'ba' zhig tu ldang ba gyi kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na zhes bya'o// bcu gcig pa gdan khre ni/ mi 'jigs
56a1(rnying rgyud): pa nas/ rin po che'i gdan pa zhes pa'i bar te/ gsang ba'i theg pa 'di ni theg pa 'og ma rnams la nyam ming pa'i phyed ram/ rgal ba'i thugs la mi 'jigs pa bani rdzun gyis grub pa mtshan gyad dbus su seng ga'i khri dang / theg
56a2(rnying rgyud): pa 'og mar me chud pa'i don 'dir shong zheng theg pas sam sgra stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i rtags tu shar du glang po che'akhri dang / 'dis gdu// bla rnams myur du spel zhing yon tan nu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags su lhor ta'i khri dang / 'dis las nyan sa
56a3(rnying rgyud): spangs par dbang du byed cing gsung dbang bcu dang ldan pa'i rtags su nub tu rma bya'i khri dang / phrin las 'gro ba sgrol ba la chags pa dang thogs pa med pa'i rtags su byang du nam mkha' lding ste shang shang gi khri dang / theg pa brgyang bgrong nas 'bras bu'i yon tan
56a4(rnying rgyud): thugs su chud pa'i rtags su seng ge la sogs pa de dag re re yang brgyad brgyad de mjug ma nang du bsnol nas rin po che'i khri rkang 'degs pa'o// de yang dbang bskur rgyal po'i chung las/ thugs ni mi 'jigs pa zhe yis bdud bzhi 'joms// de grub
56a5(rnying rgyud): rtags su seng ge'i khri la bzhugs// sku ni stobs bcus mi dge bcu rnams 'dul// de grub rtags su blang chen khri la bzhugs// yon tan rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhis chags med sgrol// de thub rtags su rta mchog khri la bzhugs// gsung na
56a6(rnying rgyud): dbang bcu mthar phyin rgyal po'i gsung // de grub rtags su rma bya'i khri la bzhugs// las ni phrin las bzhi yis 'gro ba sgrol// de grub rtags su shang shad khri la bzhugs// zhes so// thugs rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas 'od
56a7(rnying rgyud): gsal zhing thabs shes zung du 'jug pa'i rtags su nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / nyes pa'i skyon gyis gos pa med pa'i rtags su pad+ma dang / gdul bya'i re ba yid bzhin du skong ba'i rtags su rin po che'i gdan te/ de yang dkor bdu ni ngo bo nyid du lhun gyis
56b1(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i rtags su ka bas bteg pa'i khri dang mdzod mig bdun pa'o// de ltar gdan lnga brtsegs de dag gtso bo dang rigs lnga'i gdan te/ 'khor gzhan rnams la ni so so'i gnas su ji ltar 'os pa'i gdan/ sems dpa' la ni sum brtsegs
56b2(rnying rgyud): so// nye rgyang khrol pad cang thub/ zhes pa ltar yin la/ kun bzang yab yum ni dkyil 'khor la 'god pa'i tshe bzhi brtsegs su bshad kyang / gleng gzhi'i skabs 'dir lo thong gi lte bar bzhugs shing / spun 'grel las bdan yang la
56b3(rnying rgyud): brtsegs su gsungs so// 'o na 'dir mi bskyod pa gang du bzhugs snyam na/ 'chad pa'i skyes bu rigs lnga las thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul gyi skabs 'dir rdo rje mi bskyod pa ni ston pa rigs drug pa'i mdun na bzhugs te/ rgya mtsha las/ 'khor
56b4(rnying rgyud): lo 'bar ba'i lte ba la// bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo bskor// bka' rjod skyes bu mdun na gnas// brjod pa med bzhin go bar mdzad// ces dang / thal rgyud las/ 'khor lo'i lte bar mi 'jigs steng // bdag po kun bzang 'khor
56b5(rnying rgyud): rnams la// kun 'byung lha 'phrul ston pa'itshe// mi bskyeng rgyal po mdun na gnas// zhes so// rdzab 'khor phun sum nogs pa la gnyis te/ rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i 'khor dang / rig pa khyad par can gyi 'khor ro// dang pa la gnyis
56b6(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi yab lnga dang / yum lnga'o// dang po ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nas/ 'tsher ba zhes pa'i bar te/ de yang spangs rtogs kyi yon tan mthar phyin cing mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pas bcom ldan 'das dang /
56b7(rnying rgyud): yaM ji bzhin pa'i dbyings su gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'o// mtshan gnyis po de ston pa rigs drug pa dang thun mong ba ste/ sbar khab las/ mtshan thun mong ba gnyis ni sngar thal te/ zhes gsungs shing / des mtshon nas ston pa'i rang bzhin bdun por
57a1(rnying rgyud): lnga'i rang bzhin du'ang 'gyur bas rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i 'khor zhes grags so// rnam par shes pa ni yul rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi tshogs brgyad do// gzugs ni gzugs su rung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi chu'i gzugs bzhi/ 'bras gzugs bcu
57a2(rnying rgyud): gcig ste bco lnga'o// tshor ba ni nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos bde ba/ sdug bsngal ba/ btang snyoms gsum gyis bsdus pa'o// 'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan ma
57a3(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa/ rgya che ba/ chung ba/ tshad med pa ste lnga'o// 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems pa ste/ kun tu 'gro ba lnga/ yul so sor nges pa lnga/ dge ba bcu gcig/ rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa drug/
57a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu/ gzhan 'gyur bzhi ste sems byung lnga bcu rtsa gcig las tshor ba dang 'du shes gnyis logs su bgrangs pa'i lhag ma bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'o// gzhung lugs phal mo cher phung po lnga'i 'go gzugs phung nas brtsams te ston na/
57a5(rnying rgyud): ci'i phyir/ 'dir rnam shes dang por smos zhe na/ gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyang sems kyi rol rtsal tsam las gzhan ma yin pas/ sems nyid gtso bo'i dbang du mdzad nas rnam shes dang por spros shing / lha'i dus na'ang dkyil
57a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi gtso bo me bskyod pa dang sbyar ro// lha dang rtog pa'i chos mthun brtsi ba ni/ rnam shes thugs kyi bdag nyid yin pas thugs kyi rigs mi bskyod pa dang / gzugs ni sku dang dngos su mthun pas na su'i rigs rnam snang dang / tshong nga ni
57a7(rnying rgyud): yul la longs spyod du blta ba'i gzhi yin pas yon tan gyi rigs rin chen 'byung gnas dang / 'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyi nang gi chos rnams la tha snyad du 'dogs pa'i las kyis brda sprod pas gsung gi rigs snang mtha' dang / 'du
57b1(rnying rgyud): non babyad pa las kyo dang cad yin pas son las kyi rigs ngan yang chubasas/ du/ gzugs na rnam par snang ma nga da// char bdon can 'byungasanapa// 'dra gsas sasang ma // 'drathud panas dkrung da
57b2(rnying rgyud): rnam pad+ma shes pa mi bskyod pa// zhes me zhes srung ba'i rgyung du gsungs pa ltar ro// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po rnam snang du bzhed pa ni ma yin te/ rdo rje lus rim las/ rnam zhes nam mkho'i ngo bo nyid// sems kyi
57b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid ma skyes pa// maM bskyod yab yum rang duzhin las// zhes pas gnod pa'i phyir ro// yan lag brgyad cu dang ldan pa'i phung po lnga ma dag pa 'khor ba'i chos ltar snang ba de kho na rigs lnga'i sang sAnas yin nam s+thA mAn/ mA pa~Md+ha ti/
57b4(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i phung sogs rtag tshogs 'di dag sur bya'i chos med snang glo bur ba yin pas rigs rtswa'i sangs rgyas su mi rung te/ dpe na mi gnad can gyis drang sar bar mthong ba'i tshe/ ser po de drung gyi kha dog gi gnas lugs ma yin pa bzhid no// dI'i
57b5(rnying rgyud): na rtog pa dang lha gnyis chos mthun brtsi pa 'di dngos po la mngon par zhen pa rnams ste rtog dbyer med kyi shes rab skye ba la kha drang ba'i tshabs tsam du gsungs pa yin no// 'on phung sogs ma dag pa'i rtog tshogs las rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas gzhan du rdzab bzhig
57b6(rnying rgyud): ma sA mAn/ de yang ma yin te/ de dag gi snang gzhi rang bzhin na ma gnyug ma'i phung po lU ye nas rigs sde'i sangs rgyas su rnam par dge pa/ de nyid lam na gyis mngon du gyur pa la 'bras zer rnam par bzhag pas na tog chags las gan
57b7(rnying rgyud): du'ang brjod du med pa ste/ mig gi nad sbyin gyis sbyangs pas dag pa'i tsheni sngar ser por mthong ba'i drung deg dkar por snang ba las/ dkar po'i kha dog gagan zhig logs nas bcol du med pa bzhin no// gas lngana'i mtshan la rgyal logs smos pa ni/
58a1(rnying rgyud): rtsal po rnams rang ga rgyal phred la dbang ltung gang longs spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi dpung pham pa dang // rang gi dpung rgyal bar byed pa bzhin du/ thugs rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis rtog tshogs la dbang bskung ba dang / zag bya ma
58a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos la mnga' brnyes pas bde ba chen po'i longs spyod la rol pa mdzad cing / chos kyi thal med bsnyungs pas gdul bya chud kyi sgrib gnyis pa gzugs dang bcas pa'i dpung ma lus pa pham pa dang / tshogs gnyis la sogs pa'i yon
58a3(rnying rgyud): tan gyi dpung rgyal bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ngo so'i mtshan gyi rgyu mtshan yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ye shes ni phyi nang gi gyen gang gis kyang bskyod par mi nus pas mi 'gyur ba rdo rje'i rigs mi bstod pa
58a4(rnying rgyud): dang / spya ni de bzhin tidang las mya g.yos bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs par snang bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam sdang dang / yon tan ni don gnyis 'grub pa la gnas su gyur pas rin po che'i rigs rin chen 'byung gnas dang / gsung cenas
58a5(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten du chos kyi snang ba chen po rgyas par mdzad pas pad+ma'i rigs snang ba mdza' yas dang / phrin las ni 'gro ba'i don mthar phyin par mdzad pas las kyi rigs don yod grub pa ste/ rdo rje bkong ba las/ lu ni ma bcos de bzhin
58a6(rnying rgyud): nyid// thugs ni mi 'gyur rdo rje'i rigs// yon tan kun dbyung rin chen rigs// gsung ni chags med pad+ma rigs// don thabastod pa las kyi rigs// zhes so// de yang 'bras chos lnga la mtshan ji skad du thob pa'i nges pas/ de nyid 'gro ba 'dul ba'i zabs
58a7(rnying rgyud): kyi phyag rgyar 'phrul ba 'ching pa'i skyes bu lnga ladang de ltar du grags so// rigs lnga po de dag kun gyi rigs kyi mtshan mar gyur pa'i kha dog kyang / chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i brdar chos dbyings ye shes dang / rdo rje'i rigs mtha
58b1(rnying rgyud): dang / nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i brdar me long lta bung ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dkar po dang / che ba'i yon tan rgyas pa'i brdar mnyam nyid ye shes dang rin chen rigs ser po dang / gdul byang don la rjes su chags pa'i
58b2(rnying rgyud): brdar song tog ye shes dang pad+ma'i rigs le brgan tu dmar po dang / sems can gyi don tu tshogs mdzad pa'i phrin las ldan gyis grub pa'i brdar bya thub ye shes dbu las kyi rigs rnams ljang gA ste/ thams cad kyang so so'i mdog thags la zheng 'thag ma dngas
58b3(rnying rgyud): 'tsher ba'o// gnyis pa yum lnga ni/ btsun mo dam pa nas/ khyab par bzhugs so// zhes pa'i bar te/ rtog pa'i dus na 'byung ba lngas phung po lnga bskyed cing / lha'i dus na rigs kyi yab lngas longs spyod par bya ba'i yul lam/ sras bskyed pa'i
58b4(rnying rgyud): yum du gyur pas na btsun mo/ yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan las 'phags pas na dam pa'o// gang gis glo phye bas dngos po thams cad snang bar byed pa nam mkhang ni chos kyi khams rnam shes kyi yul yin pas/ de gnas su dag pa'i tshe thugs rdo rje'i
58b5(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi yu ma rdo rje dbyings phyug ma dang / sra bsa'i khams ni brtan cing rten du gyur pas na skra'i rigs kyi sum sangs rgyas spyan ma dang / mnyen pa chunga'i khams ni rgA brlan cing yon tan sdung par byed pa rin chen rigs kyi yum mAm ke dang / dro ba mo'i
58b6(rnying rgyud): khams ni mtshan 'don gyi spangs gsal bar byed cing shes rab kyi mes dag par byed pa'i bdag tid pad+ma'i rigs kyi yum gos dkar mo dang / bskyod pa byung gi khams ni gdul bya sgrol ba la thogs pa med pa las kyi rigs kyi yum dmachog sgrol ba ste/ de
58b7(rnying rgyud): yang 'byung lnga'i khams pa nas bram tha'i dbyings su dag pas sam/ sras dang bde ba'i ye shes kye'i drung khungs su gyu pas dathams cad pa dbyangs kyisas zlos so// de dag la sogs pa rigs kyi btsun mo'i chog pa dang don rang bzhin gnyis su med cing /
59a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ smra hA/ sa sa na /
59a2(rnying rgyud): smra sna /
59a3(rnying rgyud): mi smi /
59a4(rnying rgyud): sa sams 'dus padu rdzos
59a5(rnying rgyud): sa
59a6(rnying rgyud): su chu bu sa ku su su na
59b1(rnying rgyud): nam shes bzhi bskyed par byed cing rnam shes kyis skang byar gyur pas na 'atsun mo/ mig shes kyis mthong d+ha'i yu la yin+ya pas mthong bar bya ba gzugs ta do rje sreg mo dang / de bzhin du mnyan par byang zla ste klu dbyangs pa dang / bsdam par bya ba
59b2(rnying rgyud): phreng ba ma dang / myong bar bya ba ro ste gar lhur ma'i tshogs so// yab yum 'di rnams 'dir go rim bzhin yul shes byor ba dang / man ngag pas rgyan ras gzigs kyi yum gru ma dang / phyag rdor gyi yum gar mar mdzad pa gnyis mi 'gal
59b3(rnying rgyud): lam nyam na/ 'dir ni rtog pa'i yul yul can gtso bor byas la/ man ngag las ni rigs gtso ba'i dbang du byas te/ glu ma gsung gi rigs dang / gar ma las rigs su bsdu sa pa yin pas 'gal ba med do// gnyis pa ni/ byang chub chen
59b4(rnying rgyud): po rdo rje mthong byed nas/ ma byon pa'i tshogs dang zhes pa'i bar te/ 'dir yang byang chub chen po rdo rje ni lci'i mtshan yin la/ bye brag tu mig shes kyis gzugs mthong bar byed pa'i bdag rkyen mig gi dbang pos byed pas mthong byed ni mig dbang ste
59b5(rnying rgyud): byams pa dang / de bzhin du zos byed rna ba'i dbang po ste sgrib sel dang / sdom byed lnga'i dbang po ste kun tu bzang po dang / myong byer lce'i dbang po ste 'jam dpal dbyangs dang / de dag gi yum yang / dus bzhis go phye nas dbang po bzhi bskyed pas na
59b6(rnying rgyud): btsun mo/ chu 'bras gnyis ka spyad zin pa 'das pa'i dus te 'dug spos ma dang / rgyu spyad cing 'bras bu ma spyad pa da ltar ba ste me tog ma dang / rgyu 'bras tshogs la ma spyad pa 'byung ba ni ma 'ongs pa ste mar me ma dang / chu 'dus yong la ma tshogs
59b7(rnying rgyud): pas 'das ma 'ongs pa du'ang ma ngas pa ni mgyon pa'i dus te dri chab ma de tshogs so// de yang dus bzhis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad rgyal ba rnams kyi dag pa'i dbang po me long lta bu'i nang du chags thogs med pa sal yar gsol bas kyang yab yum
60a1(rnying rgyud): 'brel ta/ phal po tsha las/ 'das dang ma'ongs dkar byung // nga kyang nga bzhin mngan nga mar// zhes so// gnyis pa 'joms cad khro bo 'khor na/ 'doms pa chen po nas/ gnyis su med par bzhugs so// nasa?/
60a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i bar te/ gdug pa can 'joms pa'i brtul zhugs chen pos thams cad 'joms shing / phas tso rgol bas tshur mi tshugs pas nardo rje ste/ klas pa las/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin sleb pa kun// 'joms shing ces kyang ni tshugs la// rang byung ye shes lhar
60a3(rnying rgyud): lha// thams cad kun la 'bigs par byed/ ces so// rje drug tu lus kyi yul dbang rnam shes gsum 'dras pa'i rig pa ste bdud rje 'khyil pa dang / dreg byed lus kyi dbang po ste rta mgrin dang / reg pa phral te stobs po che dang / reg shes lus kyi
60a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par shes pa \u0f7f/ gshin rje gzhed dang / gdug pa can 'angom pa thod ci gtan po yang tig kyang bdag ma tshani bzhim yin pa'i chos nyid yum gying po das bskyed pa'i phyir ram/ nyi dang yang yeshes kyis sogs shing spang byar skur pa dang / chang med
60a5(rnying rgyud): pa bzhi yang spyad bya'i yul yin pas na btsun mo/ chos thams cad rtag par 'dzin pa'i rtog pa nyid rang gi mar snang ba ltar ma yin te/ de gnas su dag pa'i lha byams pas srung cing 'dren par byed pa'i bdag nyid lcags su ma dang / de bzhin du chad par 'dzin pa
60a6(rnying rgyud): ma yin pa ste snying rjes gzhan srung cing 'ching bar byed pa'i las rgyan gags pa ma dang / bdag tu 'dzin pa ma yin pa ste dga' bas spang cing sdom pa'i las can lugs sgrog ma dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa ma yin pa ste btang snyoms kyis sdud cing mnyes par byed pa'i la
60a7(rnying rgyud): can dril bu ma la sogs pa de lta bu thugs ye shes rang sdang gi 'khor dang / gzhan yang rgyud mas sbyangs kyi tshogs da bcas pa brjod kyis mi lang ba rnams dang rang bzhin gnyis su med par bzhugs te/ ji skad smos pa'i ston 'khor gyi rnam par snang ba de thams cad
60b1(rnying rgyud): sbya pa rigs drug pa cad rgya ye shes kya la pagazug sa dang du 'du dang / 'gro ba'i phyung khams kyi mdzad ji snang ba thams cad kyang ldanasas grub pa'adakyil 'khor nga lanas sangs rgyas pas sbyaraH/ 'grel bu yas/ zad gsum 'dra ba rnams cad pa//
60b2(rnying rgyud): po khams dang skye mched dang // brjod med brjod kyis mi lang ba/ de snyed 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid des// gnyis med ldan grub dkyil 'khor na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag par bkrugs// zhes dag brtag
60b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis las/ nga yis 'di kun khyab pa ste// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong / zhes so// gsum pa bsdu ba la gsum ste/ gsungs pa yo rjes su brjod pa dang / bldab dngos/ bka' gsang lugs mtshon byed kyi chog go// dang po ni/ de nas
60b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa zhes sogs te/ gleng gzhi rgyas par bstan pa de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yab rnams yum btsun mo'i tshogs dang dgongs pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo rtogs dka' ba gsang ba'i ye shes rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi
60b5(rnying rgyud): don gzhan gyi spyod yul las 'das pa'i gsang ba chen po 'di nyid ston pa rigs drug pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las lnga'i ngo bo 'chad pa'i skyes bu rigs lnga dbyer mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i dang de las mngon par snang bas na byung ngo zhes bsnyad do// gnyis pa ni
60b6(rnying rgyud): a e ma e ma'o// de bzhin nyid ces sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ e e ma e ma'o zhes zlos te brjod pa ni/ bgrel chung las/ e zhes bya ba dam pa'i chod// e ma zhes pa rab tu dam/ e ma'o zhes pa shin tu ngam// zhes pas shin tu ngo mtshar
60b7(rnying rgyud): bar ston pa'i tshig ste/ ngan song spong ba las/ kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs/ zhes pa lta bu'o// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ces par gnas kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid bsdu ste/ de yang sems nyid rang byung
61a1(rnying rgyud): ga ye shes de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pa'o// rang snang ba nyid gces par/ gzhal yas gzhi dang chu dang hA/ dbyibs dang glo 'brar rtse mo dang / rgyan dang zhes pa yan chung bsdu ste/ rtogs pa'i rig pa nyid la 'bras bu
61a2(rnying rgyud): yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i rtsal pho brang gi gzhi la sogs pa rnam 'phrul lnga tshogs par rang snang ba nyid do// ting 'dzin zhes par sgo'i don pa lnga ste/ rnam thar bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas 'jug pa'i brdad sgo bzhir ldang ba'o// gzugs brtan zhes par
61a3(rnying rgyud): rtababs kyi don bsdu ste/ theg pa brgyad nas bskyod pa'i rgyu 'bras mtshor byed rta babs kyi gzugs brtan du rang sdang ba'o// sgyu ma rnam dag gsal ba zhes dang / yid bzhin rin po zhes par gdan gyi don bsdu ste/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi sogs mtshon
61a4(rnying rgyud): byed rtogs pa'i rig pa nyid sgyu ma ltar sems can lnga'i gdan dang / nyes skyon gyis ma gos pas rnam par dag pa pad+ma dang / 'od gsal ba nyi zla dang / re ba yid bzhin du skong ba rin po che'i gdan rnams su snang ba yin no// dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor
61a5(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i ngang zhes par ston pa'i don bsdu ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la mnga' mdzad cing dbang gyur ba'i ye shes nyid ston pa'i ngo bor snang la/ rtogs pa'i rig pa nyid ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor du gsal zhing de nyid chos can 'khor 'das kyi chos
61a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang chos nyid tha mi dad par gnas pa thugs rje'i ngang ste ston pa'i rang bzhin no// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las zhes par rang bzhin/ ga/ nyis su med pa'i 'khor dgas lnga yab yum bsdu ste/ ston pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las
61a7(rnying rgyud): las bud khams rnam par dag pa 'chad pa'i skyes bu rigs lnga yab yum du ldang ba'o// sems med ces par khyab pa'i tshad chos kyi dgengs kun tu zhes dang / mang ba'i tshad de lta bu'i tshogs zhes sogs bsdu ste/ chos thams cad la sku dang ye shes kyis
61b1(rnying rgyud): khyab pas nyas skyon cung zad tsam gyi yangs pa med pa'o// yan tan zhes par sna mdag gdon bsdu sta rigs kyi su mdog dang 'od zer la sogs par snang bas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i thabs ma 'dres par gsal bar yon tan mtshan pa'o// mi zad par lda
61b2(rnying rgyud): gyi 'khor lo zhes par rig pa khyad par can gyi 'khor bsdu ste/ ston pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i khyad par las dang snang ba'o// rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do zhes par dus dang chos phun sum tshogs pa blta de/ rdo rje jig
61b3(rnying rgyud): rgyud mchog tu gyur pa ni bstan pa yin la/ de 'byung ba'i gnas ni ston 'khor gnas gsum tshogs pa'i dus nyid do zhes pa'i tha tshig go// gsum pa ni/ zhes rdo rje gsang pa'i tshig tu'o// zhes pa ste/ rdo rje gsang ba ni rdo rje'i theg pa yin la/
61b4(rnying rgyud): de mtshon par byed pa'i tshig tu bsdus pa'o zhes sam/ yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang ba'i bdag pos tshig tu bsdus pa'o// de ltar na rigs lnga dbyer mi byed pa drug pa nyid kyi thugs las phyung bar bshad pa dang 'gal lo zhe na/ 'dir spang ba po nyid ston
61b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang / dgongs pa tha mi dad par sngar bshad pa bzhin yin pas skyon med do// gnyis pa le'u'i mtshan ni/ gsang ba'i zhes sogs te/ de ltar bshad pa de dag gis gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa rtsa ba'i rgyud 'di la le'u nyid shu rtsa gnyis su yod pa las
61b6(rnying rgyud): sa rgyad 'byung ba'i rgya phun sum tshogs pa lnga bstan pas na gleng gzhi zhes bya la/ le'u ni paT la'i sgra las ris su bcad pa'am/ yang na pa Ta naM gos kyi don te skyob par mtshan nyid can/ wa ni 'dzin pa'i don la 'jug pas mtshan gyis gzhung khebs shing
61b7(rnying rgyud): gzhung du ma bur bcad pas don tshan 'dres pa las nye bar thob pa'i phyir le'u zhes bya ste/ yas nas bgrangs pa'i thog ma yin pas na dang po'o// / le'u gnyis pa la gnyis te/ gzhung dang / mtshan no// dang po gzhung la gnyis
62a1(rnying rgyud): te/ thun mong ma yin par gleng bslang ba dang / thun mong du gleng bslang ba'o// dang po la gnyis te/ yab yum gnyis kyis gleng ba spang ba'i sgo nas gsang dbang bskur ba dang / dbang gnyis kyi las bud mong du bstan
62a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// dang po la gsum ste/ gsang dbang bskur ba'i ched du ya ba yum snyoms par zhugs tshul/ nyams su bsgyur ba'i don las rdzas kyis dbang bskur zhing / rtogs pa brjod pa/ dbang thob pa'i yon tan nges tshig dang bcas pa'o// dang po ni/ de
62a3(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid ces sogs dang / de nas btsun mo byab mo chos kun tu bzang mos zhes sogs 'og nas blangs te gzhung tshan gnyis po des bstan/ de yang gle gzhi tshogs pa de nas zhes 'brel sbyar te/ spyir yid ni rtogs pa'i
62a4(rnying rgyud): dus na rang rig pa rang byung gi ye shes zhes grags pa gnyug ma'i yid de 'das pa'i byed pa po yin mod kyang / de nyid ma rtogs pa'i dus na rtog bcas 'khrul pa'i yid ces glo bur ba med snang 'khor ba'i byed pa por 'gyur ba'i phyir 'khor 'das gnyis ka'i byed pa
62a5(rnying rgyud): po'o// chos bya ba zhes pa ni dbang po gzugs can lhas sbyang byar ma gyur pa'i yul 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi khams te/ yid kyis gtan la dbab par bya ba'i yul yang yin la/ des yid skyed par byed pas na skyed byed du'ang 'gyur ro//
62a6(rnying rgyud): de bas na 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das rgyud dang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi byed pa po 'khor 'das rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed par thugs su chud pa'i yid rang rig pa rang byung gi ye shes te/ spyod yul yongs su dag pas kun tu bzang po'i khor 'das kyi chos sems
62a7(rnying rgyud): cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid kyi tshul du ro gcig cing dbyer mi phyed pa'i rdo rjes/ btsun mo ste yul gtan la dbab par bya ba mo 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i dbyings kyi phyag rgya yum kun tu bzang mo la snyoms pa
62b1(rnying rgyud): 'jug par gyur cing / da' cha btsud mo zab ma chos kyi dbyangs kun tu bzang mo yang bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang thabs shes gnyis su med par rnams par 'jug par gyur to// de ltar thabs shes gnyis pha snyoms par zhugs pas
62b2(rnying rgyud): gas btsungs bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dbyings dang sa shes rlung 'jug gcig gi rang bzhinang N+DI byed pa mkhyen pas nyi las gzhan pa'i gardul gyi la zigasum ldan pa de bdedag dgas pa yang
62b3(rnying rgyud): lhan cig pa'i 'khor rang bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la thabs dang shes rab kyi gsang dbang bskur ba'i phyir rang gis nyams su bskur ba'i dgongs pa 'og nas 'byung ba nyid bstan par bzhed nas ched du brjod pa'i tshul thabs shes kyi theng srong gnyis pa
62b4(rnying rgyud): 'dri brjod par mdzad do// gnyis pa la gnyis las/ dang po yab kyis nyams su bstar ba'i don thubs kyi cha bzung nas brjod pa naM/ e ma la rje phung po nas/ sa par gyur to zhes pa'i bar te/ dzI ga tshogs thams cad lag
62b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du rtogs pa la e ma'o zhes ngo mtshar ba'o// ji ltar na/ sred dang rnam par grol ba'i chos thams cad rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du dbyer mi byed pas rdo rje ste/ phung po ni dam spangs su dzin yin la/ de'i yan lag gi
62b6(rnying rgyud): ba ni rnam shes sogs lnga'i bye brag rtog pa brgyad cu'o// de dag rnam shes kyi phung po mi 'gyod par grub pa sogs phung po lnga rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru thugs sheng/ de bzhin du dbang yum las rnam shes dug phye zhing skad cig rtsi mar rgyan mched pa
62b7(rnying rgyud): pas dang / rnam shes yul dbang gi khams drug drug ste bco brgyad po rnams kyi rtog pa'i bye brag mang po kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' yab yus sogs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas te/ shes yul dbang gsum re re yang drug drug gi rdza ma bzhi
63a1(rnying rgyud): na ga nga spyod yoms pa sa sa ba su gyung sa su / mam dan
63a2(rnying rgyud): shes kun tu bzang po dang / yul chos ni bzang mo yin pa/ skol bzhi'i rtog pa'ang de'i sde brag ste/ rtag chang bdag mtshan bzhi ma yin pa'i chos nyid kyang der 'dra ba'i phyir ro// 'byung ba lnga ni rigs kyi yum lha te/ sa dang chu ni sangs rgyas spyan ma dang
63a3(rnying rgyud): mA ma kI'o// me dang rlung ni gos dkar mo dang dam tshig sgrol ma ste/ nam mkha' ni yum dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o// de ltar na srid gsum yenas sangs rgyas kyi sku dang zhing khams su rnam par dag pas 'khor ba'i chos thams cad dang / 'das pa'i
63a4(rnying rgyud): chos ma lus pa ste/ snga zhing sred pa'i chos so cog thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dug cing 'ong gsil byas su dang ye shes su sangs rgyas pa nyid las gzhan ma yin te/ sangs rgyas nyid pas gzhan du gyur pa'i chos 'ang zhes rang mtshan da grub pa
63a5(rnying rgyud): zhig sangs rgyas nyid kyis btsal kyang don la med pas me brnyes so ste rnyed pa ma yin no// de ltar yang phyir mi ldog pa 'khor lo'i mdo las/ chos kun ye nas sangs rgyas pas// byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ngo // zhes so// de ltar rtog tshog
63a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad ye nAs sangs rgyas pa'o zhes ston pa yab kyi brjod pas yum dang 'khor gyi dedabye zhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// gnyis pa krim gyis rnams su bskur ba'i don zhes rab kyi cha bzung nas dbyings kyi don gleng ba'i/ kye ma
63a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs padu sogs tshogs papang gzhes te/ rags rtogs pa 'a dgazhan sa ston par bzhed nas rtse ma lonas por cing / 'di 'drangangs tshar ba bstan du yong bas dmas pa'o// dajig pa zhen/ zhi ngas mtshor grogs btung song khams
63b1(rnying rgyud): kyi 'jig rten du snang ba thams cad log rtog gis brtags pa las ye nas rang bzhin gyis dben la/ de'i rgyu mtshan gyis srid pa gsum nyid rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas sku gsum gyi zhing khams dang / 'brel chung ngu/ nyon mongs susatsho lhab sems
63b2(rnying rgyud): can nyid// ces gsungs pa'i snyigs ma lnga nyid ma spangs par bde ldan gyi gnas su rtogs te/ nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i snyigs ma lnga po rim bzhin dang sa ma ye shes lnga dang / dus bzhi mnyam nyid dang / sde 'chi med pa rdo rje'i tshe dang / yan
63b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas pa dang / srid zhe mnyam nyid du ste/ slar khab tu/ lte ba'i snyigs me'i dod du las kyi snyigs ma bshad pa ltar na/ ci byed yang dag pa'i mdzad sprod du rtogs shing / 'gro ba'i phung po lnga nyid rang bzhin gyis mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas
63b4(rnying rgyud): pas na/ chos thams cad gnas lugs la mchog gi 'bras bu bslab bya'i gzhi bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po ste/ gnyug ma rang bzhin rnam dag gi sangs rgyas yin pas/ de las gzhan du rgyal ba'i chos shig yod dam snyam nas btsal
63b5(rnying rgyud): bar mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan du gyur pa ma dag pa 'di zhes bya ba'i chos zhig gud nas btsal kyang / gzigs pa rnam par dag pa rgyal ba nyid kyis kyang mi brnyes so ste/ don la med des yin pa'i phyir mi rnyed do// de yang rnam nges
63b6(rnying rgyud): las/ thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs pa log pa ni thams cad du med par go bar byed pa kho na yin no// zhes so// gsum pa ni/ zhes brjod pas thams cad ces sogs te/ de yang ston pa'i thugs rang rig pa nyid gdul bya'i ngo la ye shes
63b7(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtsa rlung thig le'i rnam par snang bas yab yum snyoms par zhugs te/ de las byung ba'i nyi zlas rgyu dang / nyams su bstang ba'i don rtog tshogs thams cad ye nas lha'i phyag rgya dang / chos nyid skye ba med pa'i ngo bor sangs rgyas pa'o zhes
64a1(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa brjod pas rkyen byas te/ lhag pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa mthong ste rtog tshogasathams cad yi ga rod ma nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa smyon pa yab yum ting dang dgongs pa za mi dad pa'i 'khor
64a2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis mkhyen to// zhes 'dir gzhan rnam par bcad pa'i tshig gis gsang dbang gi nges tshig kyang grub ste/ 'khor thun mod pa rnams kyis dbang thob pas don dam rtog med kyi ye shes chud la skyes kyang / ston pa'i dgongs pa dbyer med kyi ye shes
64a3(rnying rgyud): chen po da dung ma myong ba'i phyir spyod yul ma yin pas na gsang ba'i dbang zhes bya'o// gnyis pa dbang gnyis kyi las la gsum ste/ gsungs pa'i lo rgyas dang / sems bskyed cing ji ltar bsrung ba'i rim pa dngos dang / de'i yon tan no// dang po ni
64a4(rnying rgyud): de nas gnyis su med pa'i zhes sogs te/ gsang dbang bskur ba de nas don dgongs pa dang rtags yab yum gyi nyi zla byang chub kyi sems// nyis su med pa'i bdag nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyis 'khor rnams la chos thams cad yenas sangs rgyas pa'i don
64a5(rnying rgyud): sems nyid ye shes lngar dngos su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// gnyis pa ni/ e ma'o ngo mtshar sogs tshigs bcad lnga ste/ di la gsum gzhi rang bzhin gyi/ bgrod pa lam gyi/ mthar phyin 'bras bu'i sems bskyed do// dang po ni/ e
64a6(rnying rgyud): ma'o zhes pa ngo mtshar ba'i tshig ste/ gang lan/ rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyi rang bzhin ye shes lngang dag pa'i gnas lugs ngo mtshar zhing gzhan las rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid 'di ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi gsang ba zab mo ste/ phal
64a7(rnying rgyud): gyi spyod yul ma yin pa'o// gang zhe na/ sems nyid gdod nas skye ba med pa las 'khrul ngor rtog bcas kyi sems thams cad kyu rkyen las skyes pa ltar sdong la/ de ltar skyes par ldang tsam nyid nangon la ji lta bur skyeb grub pa med pa
64b1(rnying rgyud): bya mags brjod pa/ dazhon du dang ba thams kyad ga da na na sa pa da pa'i na dug / nga gnas pa da gnas du gas pa pong / ga nga// namang la gnas pa nga da/
64b2(rnying rgyud): don la gnas pa med pa'i zung 'jug dngos po'i gshis tha dang dang phyogs ris bral ba 'dzin rton mongs pa can gyi yid mnas panyid kyi ye shes so'o// yul tha dad du dmigs pa nyid na don la dmigs pa med pa'i zung 'drag yul yul can gezhi pa med
64b3(rnying rgyud): gasngal lam 'dres pa ni yongs sor rtog pa'i ye shes smrahA/ gang du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba skad ltar ca kaudan don pa gro'ang med pa'i theng 'dag sems da ma na pa stan gyis grub pa ni sgo m+b+ha b+ha ba grub pa'i ye shes gru ba skyed pa'o// gnyis pas/
64b4(rnying rgyud): grol lam dang / thabs lam gnyis las/ dang po ni/ e ma'ong mtshar rmad du byung bzung 'jug spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i chos nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi gsang ba ni 'di lta ste/ don dam par skye 'gug gnas dmigs
64b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro bong med pa'i ngang las/ kun rdzob tu chos thams cad skye 'gag la stsogs par snang yaM/ de ltar skyes pa la sogs par snang ngas nyid na don dam par skye ba la sogs pa med pa'i ngo bo lhag pa bden pa de byer mi dngu la bras balnga po 'di ni ye shes lnga dang
64b6(rnying rgyud): sbyar na stong pa nyid la sogs pa ste/ de ltar rtogs pa'i blo na ye shes so// de dag sems lha dang sbyar te bshad na/ chos thams cad thog mar spro ba med na mthar 'gag pa dang bar du gnas pa med la/ de med pas rang spyi'i mtshan nyid du
64b7(rnying rgyud): demigs pa med cing / gnas dmigs med pas 'gro 'od kyang med mod kyi/ de lta na'ang / de'i ngang las rig pa sgyu ma tsam du thams cad skye 'gag la sogs pa ltar snang bas bden gnyis mtshon tshul gyi ldog chanas tha dad kyang ngo bo dbyer med pa
65a1(rnying rgyud): smyos pad slo bsod pan pa na par byor 'a myod na la sems dasor sa nga sa nga / chub kyisapas sa// da un lakhrugs thabs pas migs pa mags dadang 'ong cad bdudunang/
65a2(rnying rgyud): thang chub tho pas dang / ga pasogs kyi mid kyang de pa 'dug byang chu gyis mas dang / gnas pasegs dkyi byedun pa gnas bzung bkyis pos dang / 'thathong phyogs dbyer ming bye na ma par byed pa byed chub kyi sa
65a3(rnying rgyud): so// du yang lam pa'o d+mo thad kyi sa byed sbed dbye bden pa la sems dus gcig la rdzogs pa cig cang ba dang / rim dar bskyed pa ma skyes pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ e mA 'o zhes pa dmas pa rtse/ gang 'an/ 'dod chags chen par
65a4(rnying rgyud): spyong pa 'dzin kyang kyang rje 'dzing bsi sa m+b+hi zhing / des blan med pa'i bras bu mngon du byed pa'i slar bam gzhan las ches ma du byung ba'i chas rdzogs pa'i sangs smras gan sa thugs kyi pa dag bu len par mi zad// zini ni dang bcas pa'i
65a5(rnying rgyud): denis kyis mi mi bu'i bye gas ga// gang zhes/ ngabazhen ciganyis pa nyid med kyis sheng ba migs su 'ang med pa las yab bya gnas nga byer rol pa'i byu bas dngos po spya cig skyes pa'i srog sa kyis
65a6(rnying rgyud): blangs pa'i gnas thams kyad nas thig sa/ mas pas pa ba gro nga ba chub du skyes pad rdzu zung chu'ikyis+ho// bde ba skyes 'dag pa smrasa'i dag bar tha byung bag dun lig 'angs kyang chub kyi //
65a7(rnying rgyud): kyi 'a bar sa dganas pamang pa tshul tu ngas sa gas pa'i skyes pa sa da ba thams pang ma rtsigs dang 'du mar myod du bya na du ma bran/ dedag ba nyi
65b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro thun mong byung// dngos gzhan/ sbyin byang chub kyi sems rdo dang padu tsho dga' bab ba drug zugs 'byung du 'gro bas zad tsam skabs kyi 'dzag pa bkag bzung bas shes rab yo shes kya dbang thob cang / thun mo ngags brgya dang las su
65b2(rnying rgyud): nas na pa 'dagasal gyi ma gyis kya sa skyes pa'o// dashing slang ldog pa'i thabs kyis dang gnas 'ong bams banan bye dag ba gdug gis gang dgadang mar kyi keng 'og pa'i ga cig gnyis par drung yang 'gegs pa pa dgas sakyi 'thu
65b3(rnying rgyud): myongasa'i napa sten shA mngab ba pa bang byo nga/ pa rdza la rtagasunas chug pa 'di pa kya mi spyod du rje ma 'chi ni I tha pa'ang brgyad po par da du byas pa das par blon pa zung rdun sa sate/ dadug
65b4(rnying rgyud): 'a gruganas dmigs 'argya 'dulta thAng dus drin don la sleb la sogs pa me pas rang bzhi ma ga sa pa mo zhes la badzin po khyor med dul ldan pa'o// de sbyar dbang rdzogs pas zhen rtag pa'i bar rnam pa kyis rang bzhin gsang ba'i
65b5(rnying rgyud): don long nga chud dekun 'khor dgongs pa dbyer lda dri khyer nas gzhan donang chung khrab rjes po rmis pa'i phyid/ spo byung gi zeng ba gsum pa 'dog bya ba'i 'khor la gyis te rgyung 'byung ba'i rkyen kyang slong du 'gyur nang / sbyin rtog par la bar
65b6(rnying rgyud): snyos na rlung rjer gcig rdzas der rdzogs pa yin te/ sngon byung du grang ba sang ba/ dbang thob pa/ rkad den rtogs pa gsum dumig tsug pa ldog pas sor snang btsam yin pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni/ e ma tshang mtshar mad du gang ba chus zad/
65b7(rnying rgyud): dbangag srim thab pas spyan cig pa rnams rang don du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su lnga po da kyi bdag zhing busangs kyis te/ sprin ladar dgangs pa de byer bameng du gyur pa 'dzin 'khor thun sa pa 'byod yul ma yin pas gas baH/ srab mngal sa
66a1(rnying rgyud): sogs kyis dbyings yi zung 'jug chos kyi sku dang / 'gag pa sogs kyis skugasum dbyer med gsal stong zung 'jug mngon byang gi sgra dang / gnas ba sogs kyis dag pa'i gdul bya la gzugs su'i rnam par snar yang mtha'
66a2(rnying rgyud): lam gnas pa'i zung 'dug longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / dmigs pa sogs kyis sku gsum so sor snang yang mi dmigs pa'i dbyangs su dbyer mi gyed pa rdo rje'i gru dang / 'gro 'od sogs kyis skal pa dang mtshams par 'char nub tu ston kyang don la 'gro 'ong
66a3(rnying rgyud): med pa sprul pa'i sku'o// gsum pa yon tan ni/ zhes brjod pas sogs te/ sems bskyed cing dbang bskur ba'i rim pa de skad ces brjod pas lhan cig pa'i 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa yab thams cad dang yum btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang don du ma 'od gsal
66a4(rnying rgyud): dang dbyer med kyi dgongs pa nyams su myong ste ston 'khor dgongs pa khyad med du gyur pa la mnyes pas khyab par gyur to// gnyis pa thun mong gi gleng bslang ba la gnyis te/ 'khor gyis zhus pa dang / ston pas lan stsal pa'o// dang po ni/ de nas
66a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa nas/ shin tu gsang zhes pa'i bar te/ thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng bslang ba de nas 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du ston pa'i thugs rje 'phul ba'i brjod
66a6(rnying rgyud): pa 'di brjod do// ji ltar zhus na/ ma rtogs pa'i 'thob pa skyo ba'i tshul gyis e ma'o zhes dmas te/ gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid la 'bras bu che ba'i yon tan thams cad lhun gyis thub kyang / de'i don thog ma nyid nas ma rtogs pas yenas gas
66a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos so// de nyid sna tshogs su sdang ba'i chos thams cad kyang 'bras bu mi zad ba rgyan gyi 'khor lor gnas pa la gyen ci log/ shes pas bslang nas rang gi rang bzhin ma rtogs pa ni rang bzhin gyis gsang ba'o// gnas lugs de yang tshul sems
66b1(rnying rgyud): dang rtsa 'bras la sogs pa gnyis chos thams cad las ba nyid kyis grol te yul du gyur mod kyang ma rtogs pas de ltar blta ba na rab tu gsang ba'o// de yang sems nyid las gzhan zhig grad du yod pa min kyang sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pas bsgribs te/
66b2(rnying rgyud): rang la gnas pa gzhan las 'tshol ba ni shin tu gsang ba ste/ de ltar gsang bya ba zhes chod nas ma rtogs pa'i gdul pa rnams thugs rjes bzung bar rigs zhes zhus pa'o// gnyis pa lan stsal ba ni/ zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
66b3(rnying rgyud): dang nas/ ched du gleng do zhes pa'i bar te/ 'khor gyis gsang ba bzhi'i don de skad ces brjod de zhus pas ston pa'i thugs rje skyes te/ ji ltar na/ dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dang ye shes kyi snang ba thams cad dang / ma dag pa 'khor ba'i
66b4(rnying rgyud): chos phyi nang snang ba cud du snang ba thams cad rtogs rung ma rtogs rung gnyis su med de/ byed pa po med par ye nas rang bzhin lhun grub kyi sangs rgyas bden pa dbyer med pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir thugs rje skyes nas don
66b5(rnying rgyud): byar med na 'ang / 'gro ba rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa skyed pa'i rtsa ba ma reg pa gnyis las/ 'bras bu lha ma yin stong ris lha dang smad res dud 'gror bsdus pas 'gro ba rgyad lnga'i sdug bsngal nad rigs mi mthun pa bsam gyi a mi khyab par smin pa la//
66b6(rnying rgyud): thabs dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po dang / shes rab sangs rgyas kyi thugs ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po ste/ de nyid kyi ngad nas ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi 'gag pas gdul bu'i ngo la thugs rje skyes nas don mdzad par dgongs te ched
66b7(rnying rgyud): du brjod pa 'di brjod do zhes sprul pa spro bar zhal gyis bzhes pa'o// gang gi phyed smon/ ma rtogs pa la brtse ba'i rang bzhin gyis e ma'o zhes dmas te/ sems nyid ye nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ni bde gshegs snying po'o// de ltar yin pa las rgya lhan cig
67a1(rnying rgyud): skyes pa'i ma rig pas rang ngo ma shes shing / rkyenu sems can rang rang gi gyin ci log ga rnam par rtog pa kun brtags kyis nyon mongs pa skyes nas las sngardzogs pa sdung pa'i dbang gas 'khor ba'i chos 'di rnams thag zad
67a2(rnying rgyud): sbrul mthong ltar med snang glo bur du srul te/ de las bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro sogs sna tshogs pa'i lus dang / rang rang gi 'dod pa'i yul gzugs sgra dri ro sogs longs myod dang / mtho dman sna tshogs pa'i gnas dang / tsha grang gi sdug bsngal la
67a3(rnying rgyud): sogs pa sna tshogs par snang ba la/ lus can rnams kyis nga'o zhes pa dag dang / dA'i 'di dang 'di zhes bdag gir byed pas so sor bzung ba dang 'dzin pas gcings te nyam thag go// de yang 'khrul por snang ba tsam du zad kyi/ don rim par 'gro ba
67a4(rnying rgyud): 'di kun 'ching byed kyi mkhan po sus kyang ma bcings shing / dngos po gang gis kyang bcings pa med de/ gang bcing bar bya ba dang yang yod pa ma yin kyang / kun rdzob tu bcings pa ltar snang ba ni/ rang gi rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis bcing
67a5(rnying rgyud): pa las/ 'ching byed gzhan med kyang blo 'khrul ngor snang ba tsam du zad de/ dper na rab reb can gyis nun gyis brtags/ mkha' las sA shung 'dzeg pa med bzhin du 'dzag par mthong nas/ de la mdud pa 'dor ba'i 'khrul snang byung ba ltar chos nyid ris med la dgag
67a6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub gzung 'dzin gyis phyogs nges su bcad pas 'khrul ba las don la 'khor ba tshad mas grub pam yin no// de yang bcings pa yod na de ltos kyi grol ba'ang srid pa las/ ltos gzhi bcangs pa med pas del nyis pa'i chos rnam pa 'grol ba
67a7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba mtha' dag le nas bcings grol med pa'i gnas lugs sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du spyan gyis grub cing yongs su rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas pas 'khor 'das mnyam paci dngul bzla ba'i chos te/ de
67b1(rnying rgyud): par byed pa'i rgyud 'di gdul bya khyad par can gyi ched du dngos su bstan cing / gdul bya thun mong ba rnams la brgyad nas bstan par bya ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i skal pa thub pa drug slob sogs 'gag med thugs rje chen po'i rol pa rnam pa sna tshogs
67b2(rnying rgyud): pa ston par mdzad do// zhes ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lhan cig pa'i 'khor dbang rdzogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gyur pa la go skye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du gleng ngo // gnyis pa le'u'i mtshan ni/ gsang ba'i sogs te/ rgyud 'di la
67b3(rnying rgyud): shu \u0f7f// nyis su yod pa las/ 'dis don dam par spros pa nye bar zhi ba dang / kun rdzob bya de nyid ma togs pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba la don mdzad tshul gnyis so sor bstan kyang / don la gnyis ka byang chub kyi sems 'ching grol med pa'i ngo bor
67b4(rnying rgyud): dbyer me phyed pas na 'khyor 'das ye nas dbyer zeng du gnas pa la gnas par shes pa'i bdag nyid du sems bskyed par bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / le'u gsum pa la gnyis te/ gzhung dang / mtshan no// gzhung la gnyis te/
67b5(rnying rgyud): par bshad pa dang / don bsdu ba'o// dang po la gnyis te/ bstan pa 'byung ba spyi'i gleng gzhi dang / yongs su shes par bya ba lta ba'o// dang po la'ang / rgyu dang / ngo bo gnyis las/ dang po ni/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nas/
67b6(rnying rgyud): 'bon to zhes pa'i bar te/ gang gi ched du spro bar zhal gyis bzhes pa de nas/ ji ltar spro na/ 'thon to zhes spel te/ gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las dmigs med kun khyab rang byung gi thugs rje chen por rang shar ba'i byin gyis ba
67b7(rnying rgyud): pa dus su 'byung ba zhes bya ba thugs rig pa'i ye shes las rnam par 'phrul pas na rig pa'i skyes bu dang / las nyon gyi dpung bcom pas na thub pa ste/ gdul bya'i dbang gis rnam pa drug go// gang las na/ ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa rigs
68a1(rnying rgyud): drug pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dbyer mi byed pa'i rdo rje las so// ji ltar na/ tshangs pa rang gi gnas las ma g.yos bzhin du lha ga nas gzhan thams cad du rang gzugs kyi snang ba ston pa ltang gdul bya'i ngol dang snang ba'i
68a2(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis te/ rgyud bla las/ ji ltar tshangs pa tshangs pa yi// gnas nas 'pho ba med bzhin du// lha yi gnas ni thams cad du// snang ba 'bad med ston pa ltar// de bzhin thub pa chos sku las/ bskyod pa med par khams kun tu//
68a3(rnying rgyud): skal ldan rnams la 'bad med par// skal po dag ni ston par mdzad// ces so// gnyis pa ngo bo la gnyis te/ mdor bstan pa dang / rgyas par bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ 'thon nas kyang nas/ don mdzad pa / zhes pa'i bar te/ de ltar
68a4(rnying rgyud): thub pa drug 'thon nas kyang don mdzad pa'i yul ngan song gsum dang lha mi ste 'gro ba rgyud lnga'am/ theg pa lnga'i rigs can gyi 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de/ gang du na/ don bya ba'i zhing gdul bya'i las kyi bye brag tha dad pa'i dbang gi mgo 'phreng la bstan
68a5(rnying rgyud): nas 'gro ba spel gzhi dang / gyen mthur du bstan nas 'gro ba yan man gyi 'jig rten snod kyi bye brag zlum po sogs bzhi dang bzhi rtsal ba dang steng g.yogs med pa ste rnam pa mi 'dra ba drug gi rang bzhin gyis phyogs bcur khyab cing tshad gzung du med pas
68a6(rnying rgyud): mthu' yas mu med pa'i zheng khams nam mkha'i dbyings ltar snang ba las/ de'i khongs su tshud pa dum bu'i 'jig rten chung zil nas bsam gtan dang po man chad kyis bslus pa snying bzhi pa ste/ de stong la spyong kyi phrang/ de stong la stong gnyis pa par ma/
68a7(rnying rgyud): de stong la stong gsum gyi stong chen po ste/ de re rer gang gis don mdzad pa po thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re rer snang nas ji ltar don mdzad pa'i tshul 'og nas 'byung ba'i sku bsod nams chen pos 'dul ba sogs 'dul ba rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas so//
68b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa la bzhi te/ grubasod nams chen pos/ thugs mngon sum pas/ mu 'phrul bsam byas mi thub pas/ gsung dag pas 'dul ba'o// dang po na/ bltams pa dang rnas/ ston pa'i thug pas/ zhus pa'i byar te/ 'dzam gring dbyed
68b2(rnying rgyud): grag brgya re rer 'dul byed mchog gi sprul sgra yang de snyed 'byung ba thams cad mdzad pa'i tshul mthun par ston pas na gcig gi mdzod tshul smos pas thams cad kyi mdzad pa rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ 'o skol gyi ston pa 'di nyid kyi sgo nas brjod de/ dga'
68b3(rnying rgyud): ldan gyi gnas su dam pa tog dkar por skye ba bzhes te/ gzigs pa lngas gzigs nas/ sa mo lug gi lo chu snod zla ba'i nya la glang po che'i rnam pas yum lha 'phrul ma gso sbyong la gnas pa'i lhums su zhugs te/ zla ba bcu phal cher rdzogs pa
68b4(rnying rgyud): lcags sgres ga'i chos bdun rgyu skar rgyal la babs pa'i tshe lum+b+hi nI'i tshal du yum gyi rtsi ba log g.yas pa nas mngal gyi dri ma med par sku bltams te/ yi ge sogs slob pa ltar mdzad nas bzo'i gnas la byang bar gyur cing / shAkya rnams kyu rtsal gyis
68b5(rnying rgyud): sa na sa
68b6(rnying rgyud): rAny+dza na'i 'gram du lo drug gi bar dka' thub mdzad pas sru shin tu ring pa la grod pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas pa stong gi 'o ma nyid khur byas pa sgrang rje dang sbyar ba drangs pa gsol ba'i mod la sku gser gyi gtan pa phyis pa ltar gyur pa dang / de nas rdo rje gdan du
68b7(rnying rgyud): skyes bu chen po'i stabs kyis gshegs shing rtswa 'tshod bkra shis las rtswa bslangs pa la stan mdzad nas/ byang chub kyi shing drung du skyil mo krung gis bzhugs te/ dgung lo so lnga pa shing rta sa ga'i nya'i tho rengs bsam gtan bzhi pa la brten nas sleb gnyis
69a1(rnying rgyud): bag zags dang bcas pa ma smras pa spangs shing / shes bya thams cad thugs su chung du mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa dang / de'i sku logs dad srod kyi nus su srin ma thams nas 'od zung ba thub pa sogs pa'an
69a2(rnying rgyud): nas padang bang+gAl ba dang / sang dus nas nas bdu phrag bdun tho bar sasus gsangs pasmra/ myas pa dang spyo gyi 'thag khyeng bar 'arjems brtsams dun bka dang bdanapa pa zhi / na nga ba'arab sa rigs pa
69a3(rnying rgyud): b.rab mtshan nyid med pa dang / yangs pa can la sogs par bka' tha mdon dam rnam par nges pa kye chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa gsum bskor ba da/ mnyan yod du mu stegs rnams 'dul ba dang sangs rgyas mthag shing tA la bdun srid du 'phags pa sogs
69a4(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa dang / mthar dgung lo brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa lpags 'dzugs ga'i nyal cad yul sa can gyi gnas shing sbrul zung gi rtsa bar rdo rje lta bu'i rgyab shig nas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul dang srag dung ring bsrel la sogs pa rnam 'phrul
69a5(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas par ston pa'i thub pa gang gi sku'i mdzad pa de dag dri bsod nams thun mong ma yin pa gzhan las 'phags par bstan pas na sra bsod nams chen pos 'dul ba'o// gnyis pani/ du sa bzhinas drug dang zhes pa'i bar te/ sngon gnas dran pa dang phyi
69a6(rnying rgyud): gnas mkhyen pa'i mngon shes kyis 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus bzhi kun tu sgrib pa med pa rgyas la phyir mkhyen pa dang / pha rol gyi sems mkhyen pa'i mngon shes kyis gzhan thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi 'grub sna tshogs pa kun tum pasgribs par mtshan
69a7(rnying rgyud): ba dang / sgrib pa med ba rdzu 'phrul gyi lha'i spun gyis nye ring med pa'i gzugs dang 'chi 'do bye ba sogs thams cad kun tu gzigs pa dang / lha'i stan gyis sgra rje thung thams cad nye ring med par kun tu gas na pa dang / cog bye bya ba grul pa'i mngon zhes
69b1(rnying rgyud): sa gang 'dul khri mos pa dang mthun par sprul sbyar sogs sna tshogs ston pas kun tu sems can gyi don spyod pa dang / sgrib pa dag pa'i ye shes zag pa med pa'i mngon shes kyis ji ltar spyad kyang mi gos pa rnam pa kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
69b2(rnying rgyud): de lta bu'i mngon par shes pa chen po drug gzugs kyi rjes su 'gro zhing mkhyen nas shes bya thams cad la mngon sum du dbang sgyur ba dang ldan pas don mdzad pa'i phyir thugs mngon sum pas 'dul ba'o// gsum pa ni/ kun tu sgra nas snang bar gyur to/
69b3(rnying rgyud): zhes pa'i bar te/ gdul bya'i zhing kun tu dang rang gi snang ba dang mthun pa lha mi'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i sku dang / rgyud kun tu mos pa dang mthun par 'jug pa'i thugs mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / su re re la'ang 'gro ba'i mos pa tha dad pa'i spyod yul
69b4(rnying rgyud): tu de dang mthun pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ni khro dang phra men la sogs pa dang / gdul bya'i skul ba ji ltar yod pa kun tu so so'i skad dang mthun par chos ston pa'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldanapa ste/ de ltar nam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyo bcing
69b5(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas par 'phro bas grangs med pa dang / phyogs bcu'i zhing kun tu snang nas 'dul bar gyur to// bzhi pa la gnyis te/ mdor bstan pa dang / rgyas par bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ thams cad kyang nas theg pas zhes pa'i bar te/ de la spyir
69b6(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i sgra don dang / dbye ba dang / phye ba so so'i don bshad pa dang gsum las/ spa don ni/ yA na'i sgra las 'degs pa'i don gyis na theg pa zhes bya'o// de'ang 'dis 'degs pas na theg pa ste bzhon pa bzang po lta bu'o// 'di 'degs pas
69b7(rnying rgyud): na theg pa ste de la brten nas 'gro ba'i gang zag go// 'dir 'degs pas na theg pa ste rang rang gi 'dod bya'i 'bras bu'o// de yang spyad pa las/ theg pa 'di ni mkha' 'dra gzhal med khang chen te// dga' skyid bde ba mngon par thod byed theg pa'i
70a1(rnying rgyud): mjug/ deg zhin nas sems can thams cad myangan 'da'// zhes so// dbyeb la/ bka' stegazhung du thugs bskur na/ zag pa'i thangs 'di khon zhes phyogs gcig tu gzung du med/ gdul bya'i klo dang 'jams
70a2(rnying rgyud): bar sangs rgyas kyi thugs des gang la gang 'du 'a dru ba stan pa'i phyi / rgyas pa las/ tha med theg pa bas ma las gsungs pa yang // me so dang ga sngol snang bar zad// ces dang / lan gshegs pa las// sems can na mis ni yongs drang phyir/
70a3(rnying rgyud): theg pa mtha' dgangs bshad de// 'di zhes dmigs su mod ma yin// zhes so// de yang re zhig brdzun/ dam chos pa dkar las/ theg pag ceg ste theg pa gsum du med// ces pa lta bu 'bras bu la dgongs te ma bar thug theg pa gcig tu bsdun
70a4(rnying rgyud): pa dang / ya shug pa rgyang ldan po'am/ lha 'bras kyid rtsibs gnyis dang / bya semasags mams/ kyang dren pa/ dka' thub gA kyad / dbang ba sgyur thabs kyi thig pa stegs ma dang / rtswa'i ga pags pa 'bras thug
70a5(rnying rgyud): bcas pas bzhi dang / mtshan nyid skye gsum/ byud sde gsum/ nang tud sde gsum kyi theg pa dgu dang / lang gshegs las// ji srid sems ni 'jug pa'i bar// theg pa'i mtha' la thag pa med// sems ninas zhig byung ba na// theg pa med cing
70a6(rnying rgyud): 'gro 'ang med// ces pas rje sring blo'i dug pa mthang tho bar dushig pa'i mtha' lathug pa med pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gang la ba nas 'gro ba'i lam dang gang gis 'gro ba la sogs pa zla ba nyid kyis drug pa 'don ga pa zhes pa la dmigs su nga
70a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bar du bshad do// bye brag drung gzhung 'di nyid du grags pa ltar na/ sbrul grwa'i gsung bsam byes mi khyab pa de dag thams cad kyang bsrun 'di lta ste/ rigs can lnga'i gdul bya 'dul ba'i dbang gis theg pa'i bye brag lngar phya nas bstan to// phye bas de'i
70b1(rnying rgyud): na 'a dpapa / spya sa mas// / na sa na
70b2(rnying rgyud): sa / pa ga nga
70b3(rnying rgyud): 'ag sa shA sa sa da sa ga da 'i da smra gi ngas pa na/
70b4(rnying rgyud): dge mi kyin / 'ad sa sa spyo sa / nas pa gas ba myed// bral nga ldatan pa dang nas tshugs pa la ma
70b5(rnying rgyud): ldan cing/ ririgs thob pa 'bras byag 'an ma rdzog ci sos bsngon sa te/ / rgyu bras shes pa dang 'dzin pasams kyi sbyi ga rjes bcom lus nga bzhin nad pas gang thag gsug gas
70b6(rnying rgyud): gyi dag bzung dul na gyim ga nyis kyis basbyor ba bar bcas par med de/ gtu gas rang sams da da nga yang ga tardul ba sa/ bras pa b+hi nga dang ba spyod cing / sems pas bya ba'i rlog na dag / 'a
70b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i rnamapa pa drug bsgom pa'i cha tho gis mthong bas grang bsogs pa zhes pa shes sa pa te/ mdza mi thob pa'i sa la sgom pa gyis 'dod nyonang bu'i ba'i ma na rtso nga / drug nas brgyad bye dang / nga sa
71a1(rnying rgyud): du chung smra na su na sa /
71a2(rnying rgyud): su pa yo
71a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i nyid bye pa// gang 'ag bya ba dang zung ba dang 'dzi dpang rtog / shes pamed cig du dang grang bsta nang/ 'khod 'anas kyi sa lha byas su de 'og sa so//
71a4(rnying rgyud): sagyur 'ang na pa na
71a5(rnying rgyud): dun pa ba bya /
71a6(rnying rgyud): hU~M 'ong ga kyir ma shes pang ga su 'dang / dab pa skyed dpa' chogs sa mthos pa shul ba rkyen pa rdobabla tsung dran pa dang 'jug pa'i sems kyis pa di su nga
71a7(rnying rgyud): slobab bras ba sa byang rgya cu mi brisangasalangabyas gro ba ba'i sas kyi kyisatim cu sun/ mabyas/ bras ba tu gags kyi
71b1(rnying rgyud): sa bcu mgyis bgrad par rnal 'byor pas// sangs rgyas sa bgrod ka 'phang thob pa'i lam// bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu thab par 'gyur// zhes so// gsang ba sngags kyi thag pa ni/ rgyas pa las/ mnyam nyid du chags dang ngag rgyal ba/
71b2(rnying rgyud): na por chu gung kun 'bab ltar// bla med do na rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu// rnam thar theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus// zhes pas kun rdzob tu yang chos thams cad la mi gnyis pa'i bsam spyod dang ldan pas bden gnyis la gza' dran dang dor du blta
71b3(rnying rgyud): bcu'i theg pa las 'phags shing / de dag thams cad 'dir rdzogs pas na bla na med pa ste/ de'i theg pa la/ phyi thub pargyad dang / nang pa thabs rgyad gnyis las/ phyini dri yog rje gsum ste/ de yang tron dam par mtha' bzhi dang bral ba'i dag par rtogs
71b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i kun rdzob tu lha dang bdag je khol gyi tshul du bltas nas dngos grub zhu zhing / gtsang sbra dang dka' spyad sogs phyi'i bya ba la gtso bor brten te bsrug pas mi cha bdun na rigs gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'dod pa kri ya ste bya ba dang / lha sgom rnal 'byor chun dang
71b5(rnying rgyud): spyod pa bya ba ltar spyad pas mi tshe lnga rnga rigs pa ni rdo rje 'chang gis thob par 'dod pa'i phyir u pa ya ste gnyis ka'am spyod pa zhes bya ba dang / don dam par mtshan ma med pa'i chos nyid kyi byin rlabs kun no ba rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du gtan la phab ste/ bdag dmi chog
71b6(rnying rgyud): dang lha ye shes pa gnyis bzang ngan med par bltas nas rnal 'byor la gtso bor brten cing bsgrubs pas mi tshe gsum na rigs lnga stug po bkod pa'i sa thob par 'dod pa yo ga ste rnal 'byor gyi theg pa'o// nang pa thabs kyi rgyud du chos thams cad sems nyid snang sto khyer
71b7(rnying rgyud): med lhag pa'i chos su chen por gtan la phab pa'i don yul med rang gsal du bsgoms shing / de'i dad la glang dor med par spyad pas tshe 'di nyid la grol bar 'gyur ro// gnyis pa la gnyis te/ gnyen po la dgongs te dbye ba dang / de'ang dbang po'i bya
72a1(rnying rgyud): gis bsrub 'o// dang poni/ ma rig pa nas gsung bar 'gyur ro// zhus pa bar \u0f7f/ 'gro rnams ldan cig zlas pa khyi ma dgu pa 'i dbang gis byin gyi srog gi rnam par rtog pas bstang ba'i rten mangs pa dus gas pa dang
72a2(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa nyi khri tshig stong de ste bsgoms pas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir spyod pa'i gnyen por chos kyi sgo yang sde stod gsum dang / chamanyam rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde sdod de bkris bzlas pa stong phrag brgyad curtsa bzhi skur gsungs so// da ltar gsung ngo // mang
72a3(rnying rgyud): pana'ang gsung bar 'gyur ro// de skad du 'ang kun byed pas/ 'dod chags 'dul ba'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni// 'dul ba sde snod d+hi/ khri tshig spyong gsungs// zhe nga 'dul ba'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni// mdo ma 'i sde snod nyi khri cheg stong gsungs// gti mag
72a4(rnying rgyud): 'dul baji gnyen por gsungs pa ni// mngon pa'i sde snod nyi 'i cing stong gsungs// thams cad 'dul ba'i gnyen por gsungs pa ni// sde snod bzhi pa nyi khri cheg song gsungs// zhes dang / mdzod pas/ spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen mo na// chos kyi sung pa mthan
72a5(rnying rgyud): por gsungs// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ de dag nas mthar thug zhes pa'i bar na chos kyi sro de dag thams cad kyang dbang po'i bye breg gis lde 'draste/ de yang la pa dge rjeg dang migayo ba'i las kyi 'bru'i bu thams cad chung mi zadra mam pa
72a6(rnying rgyud): pas blang da ma nor par spyod kyang 'khor ba lasangs par 'byung mthus pa ste pa'i theg pa dang / glang zag gi bdag med rtogs pas 'khor ba lasadzes par drung srid chos kyi bdag bzung bcu la ldan dang 'dzin pa skad cig mdon mdu 'dod pa nyan thos kyi theg pa la rgan mongs pa
72a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs dang / shes pa skad cig mdon dam du dod pas kyi'i rnyen 'brems po nas 'bras bu'i ba dang nga gi nyin cing brel bar 'byung ba ma rig pa nas na shi'i bar du khor bar 'do pas nga thal gyi theg pa zhin mongs pa'i gags pa'i thangs te/ ngam
72b1(rnying rgyud): bden pa gnyis ka rdzas yod du bltas nas blang dor byed pas spong ba'i lam du gcig go// chos thams cad bdag gnyis kyis stong par rtogs pas gzung ba'i yul yang 'dzin pa'i shes pa rkyen gyis 'khrul pa'i las kyis yul du sgro 'dogs par zad kyi/ don
72b2(rnying rgyud): la bden med sgyu ma lta bur shes kyang / thabs kyis zin pa dang ma zin pa las phan gnod kyi bya ba yang byed par shes nas kun rdzob rdzas yod du bltas te blang dor byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la nyon mongs pa chos nyid du sbyong ba'i thabs dang / yang kun rdzos
72b3(rnying rgyud): rdzas yod du mi 'dod kyang btags pa'i yod pa mi 'gog pas 'di ltar las dang las kyi 'bras bu rnams med ces skur pa gdab tu mi rung la/ 'on kyang nyon mongs pa lha dang ye shes su sbyar ba'i thabs la brten na de dag gis mi gos so zhes ston pa kri yog sde gsum gyi
72b4(rnying rgyud): theg pa dang / kun rdzob tu btags pa'i yod par 'dzin pa'ang cher zad de las dang las kyi 'bras dri bdag nyid chen po'i rol par rtogs pas nyon mongs pa lnga nyid ye shes lnga'i rang mdangs su shes te spang gnyen gnyis med pas na gos par mi 'gyur te/ ji ltar spyad kyang
72b5(rnying rgyud): yon tan du 'char bsngags nang pa gnyis la nyon mongs pa dbang du byed pa'i thabs dang / chos dbyings rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa rang byung gi ye shes rang shar pas srang sbyang bsgyur ba dbang du byed pa thams cad dngos zhen gyi blta ba las byung bar rtogs nas/ gang yang
72b6(rnying rgyud): mi 'gog cing gang du'ang mi rtsol bas spang gnyen gyi tha snyad thams cad las grol nas las dang las kyi 'bras bus gos su med par ston pa ste/ theg pa thams cad kyi grub mtha'i mtha' gsang ba snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i rgyud gzhung 'dir thug pa yin no// gnyis
72b7(rnying rgyud): pa yongs su shes par bya ba blta ba la gnyis te/ gsungs pa lo rgyus su brjod pa dang / gtan la dbab pa dngos so// dang po ni/ de nas de bzhin sogs te/ bstan pa spyi'i gleng gzhi bshad pa de nas ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po nyid
73a1(rnying rgyud): kyis go phye ba'i 'khor gyi ched du dgongs pa brda'i gsung gis brjod pa dang 'dra bar brda sprod pa 'di brjod pas go bar mdzad do zhes sdud pa pos lo rgyas brjod de 'brel sbyar ba'o// gnyis pa la gnyis te/ brtag gzhi 'khor ba'i chos rang
73a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin med par dang / 'das pa'i chos brjod med du gtan la dpa' ba // dang po la/ gzhal b+ha/ gta tshigs/ grub mthang rdo rje theg par bstan pa'o// dang ba ni/ ji snyed sogs na pa 'aM ste/ phyi nang sdod badz+ra kyi dngos po snyed pas bsdus pa'i 'ji rte
73a3(rnying rgyud): drug dam yin pa la de nga na kyis blo btugs pas me la ma ltar 'phru la chos te/ zlab stan cig skyes pa'i mdag pa dang / bdag gnyis su rtog pa'i kun brtags gzung 'dzin gnyis snang gi shes pas kyi rten thems pon gyi chu dang 'brel pa sa nas 'das bu bang
73a4(rnying rgyud): kyis bsdus pa/ rkyen dang 'brel ba chos 'thung ngas kyi 'gyu ba dang brngas pas byed pa lta bu dang / nang gi rted 'brel ba rig pa nas ni sh-ing par skyes bzlas pa lta bur byin nga gnyis su med pa nying ti'i 'khong po ltar la ba \u0f7f/ las mi mdzad pa'i da
73a5(rnying rgyud): bde sdug ste tshogs myong bas nyam theg par 'gyur zhing / de lter snang dus nyid na de'i rang bzhin chos nyid las nyams pa med pas 'khor 'das gnyis de nyid dang gzhan du derjid du med mod kyis/ so sor zhen po spro ba tags kyi slong nyid skabs 'ding brtag gzhings
73a6(rnying rgyud): gzhal bya'o// debang rnam kod las/ btags pa'i spyod yul gnyis la gzhal// zhes dang / l+r-i pa rim las/ 'khor dang sa dngos rteg// zhes so// gnyis pa pa/ thun mong dang / thun mong ba yin pa gnyis pas/ dpa
73a7(rnying rgyud): thun mong pa bden pa'i gtan tshogs ni/ yang dag sgyu ma'i sogs dang pa gsum ste/ 'khor bar skang tsam nyid nas yang dag par ma grur pa don dam 'den pa dang / lha ma lta bung ma 'gags par snang ba kun mo ste/ de ltar mtshan nyid theg pa pas chos tham/
73b1(rnying rgyud): dang dpag sa ston pa'i 'o ngadapa tha pang 'dis yang gnyis sa / 'ad kar ba gathangs pa byas pa dang / bdagag par dag pazung bcwa dang / thebyung baphral ga 'a na btags tapa 'ang yang dag du nyid das
73b2(rnying rgyud): rnam pa dag pa'i kyis bzhi nyi dadu tshul gcig par mnyam pa 'a gyur ro// de yang bdag gsum pa dngad rjongs 'din dor thud pa med pas ming du mnyam pa/ rjo byed dadang po bsgrub sa bla mdzang sa nyes dun mong ba dang / tshig pa 'dang
73b3(rnying rgyud): nyi kyim gtan lababan/ bdag gsum po dngom pa ji lta'ang ye shes pa dang / rigs rwa dang / yum ldad dag pas don dam bden pa'i bang du le shes/ 'bras bu/ rang banan don dmi gsum ste dkor bdun da nga nyid du sa thub par satam la/ smo no
73b4(rnying rgyud): da pa'i dang dril shes/ phyag rgya/ dngos po rnamag su ste dang yinas byed kyil ba khor du la nas rdzogs par mnyam pa ni nanam ma yin pa'i mnyam pa'o// gnyis pa pa/ rtog pa bzhi dang / dag pa grasas ci garten tshogs so// dang rdo/ 'di ni
73b5(rnying rgyud): bdag ni gzhan rnams ni sogs nang pa gcig dang btsos pa'i rdzogs bcang gnyis te/ bdag dang bdag gi gzan zhes tha dang du snang ba 'di rnams ni ma rig pa'i dbang gis log par rtog pa'i 'khrul snang tsam nyid las gzhan du ma mthong bas tha zhing rje 'phye rdul ldan
73b6(rnying rgyud): dang // ma rtogs pas zab pa ste zhes pa skad rtseg ma yang logs na yod pa ma yin kyang / 'di ltar snad pa ni log rtog gi rgyun sde ma nyid pa khyim nyid spyod pa ni pam gyi snang ba ltar 'khrul bar zad pas ne byung bzhing 'pho 'a byur des ma 'dzings dang mag so
73b7(rnying rgyud): don pa cho nyid las gzhan du g.yob ce yang med pa ni chu gcig pa'i rtags kyi bslab bya ste/ srub cu pa ni tha skad pa'i shes rong sdeng yang rnam par dpyad na log tog ma yang yod pa ma yin te/ de tsu ma rig pa'i bdag dang / dbras bu phreng po dang /

74a2(rnying rgyud): lta sa/ ma
