74b1(rnying rgyud): pa bzhis nges par 'byung ba'i 'bras bu bla na med pa'i theg par bstan pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i tshe 'phrul du bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang chos la 'pho 'gyur med kyang gdul bu'i don du de ltar bstan pa/ gyud kyi che ba bstan pa/ de thams cad btags pa
74b2(rnying rgyud): tsam ste rang bzhin brjod med du bstan pa'o// dang po ni/ theg pa bzhi sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ lha mi/ nyan dang / byang sems kyi theg pa bzhi yis rang rang gi mi mthun phyogs ngan 'gro dang / 'khor ba dang / mtha' gnyis las nges par 'byung la/ de ltar
74b3(rnying rgyud): nges par 'byung ba'i mthar bla na med pa'i theg pa gcig pu 'di kho na ni/ de dag gi bsgrub bya dang 'di las bgrod cing sdung du med pas 'bras bur nges shing gnas pa'i sa yang yin no// gnyis pa ni// yang dag rtogs pas sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ yang dag pa'i gnas
74b4(rnying rgyud): lugs rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu brtags shing dpyad na chos thams cad rang bzhin cir lang grub pa med pa'i ngang las/ rten 'brel tsam du rol pa cir yang ma 'gags par 'char bas thabs rnams kyang gdul bya'i blo dang mthun par chud mi za bar 'grub bo//
74b5(rnying rgyud): gsum pa ni/ sangs rgyas sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ yang dag par na sku gsum dbyer med pas sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku'ang mya ngan las yongs su mi 'da' zhing / des gsungs pa'i chos kyang 'khor ba ma stongs par nub par mi 'gyur te/ sems can
74b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad sgrol bar bzhed pa'i snying rje chen po mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang 'pho 'gyur yod pa ltar snang ba ni/ gnas lugs ma rig pa'i sems can rnams smin par mdzad pa dang 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du dang po byung ba nas
74b7(rnying rgyud): mu nga ni las 'da' ba'i bar gyi mdzad pa dang / bstan pa dang dru patha ma rba bcom sras rang chud pa ma yin te/ spyi mdo las/ khyod ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin to// 'da' dang mi 'da' yongs mi mnga'// 'jig rten pa dang mthun
75a1(rnying rgyud): pas// da 'du byar yongs dgongs// nas dang / gagang da largyas dngas rgya bam pa shA sag nan gagags ga ra// rnams cargya rnams la pan pa'i phyir// bag dang /
75a2(rnying rgyud): rnam pa rna tshogs ston// zhes so// bzhi pa ni 'dul ba logs tshogs bcang gnyis te/ gang du lhag pa tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab rtsi bam pa pa gsumagatso bar ston pas bzhag pa 'dul ba/ ma tre/ tshes mngon pa ste sto gas dang
75a3(rnying rgyud): khrus dang gtsang sgra sogs 'da' bar dka' ba'i da tshog gis bcings pa byu d+ha dang / gro yog gnyis ga lab rtse nus sgrub pa spyod tu dang / lum dag gi sbyong pa thogs tsam la ma tsu rnal 'byor la brtan pas don grub par byed pa mog dang / tsheg gsum
75a4(rnying rgyud): bskyed stsogs bsrid rim dang / rdzogs rim ges la stong ga rgya bor ston-i sku'i rgyud pa tha med dang / bgyid de mardzogs ky-i la dang rdzogs rim 'ad gang gtso bor sbyin pa gsung gi rgyang mtha med dang / bsgred rdzogs zung du 'ju ci 'dags la ye shes can pa
75a5(rnying rgyud): risag ca zung stonang thugs kyi cung gnyis su med pa ste/ phyogs btsu 'i ni la mam rnams su da ldan la rab tu grags pa'i ma d+ha thams cad gsang ba'i snying po 'di las 'dzin te/ de bas nam ma dang mtha' 'a thams cad kyis rgyas 'debs padi di
75a6(rnying rgyud): gsung ba'i snying pa 'di ni 'khor ba srid pa de zeng du ma kun dang rgya dgun kyi 'byung gnas te mo nye bur 'khyer zhing / de thams ra da gi rten ma dang 'dis ngas par 'babs pas nam tsu kun gyi 'gre zhwa bu 'ang yin no// thAt+paH/ rgyas rnams rnas ra das
75a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i bag/ de ra ba ni chos rnams thams ci mad du gas pa ma'i mdon la thub pa ring / na sa bcang 'a ben sa pang dag pa 'don par 'byis kyi nga du zhigs rgya dngas su phyogs su sa ga su sa
75b1(rnying rgyud): bas ba rnam las/ de ltar ston pa'i ngas nyid nas ming cig la dan gyi dngas po rung byad kyang thub pa med de/ ting 'dzin rgyal po las/ de ltang la la zhig la bu bcas nas// de yi meng de sa dang dang btags kyang // nang dang byo ro la kun tu btsal na med// chos rnams na dang /
75b2(rnying rgyud): da de bzhin shes par gyis// zhes so// de nyid pos thams cad brjod med pa 'o zhes brjod par mdzadado// gnyis pa bsgrug la bzhi nye/ gsungs pa'o rgyas su brjod pa// ba sa/ bka gas sngags tshon pa'i tshog+sa/ bas pa'i yin // nga
75b3(rnying rgyud): po ni/ de nas sogs te/ rgyas par bstan pa de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yab yum dgongs pa gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi don spyod yul las 'das pa'i gsang ba 'di nyid ston pa'i sku la sogs pa ldi ngo ba rigs lnga dbyer mi byed pa'i rdo rje la
75b4(rnying rgyud): phung ngo // gnyis pa ni/ a hoHsrid tsa'i sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te/ a hoHzhes pa ni 'khor 'das gnyis med du gtan la phebs pa la ngo mtshar pa'o// de yang tshigs su bcad pa dang po'i nang du ji snyed 'jig rten zhes sogs gzhal bya ston pa rkang pa lnga brdza n+te/
75b5(rnying rgyud): 'did byed pa 'a ba'i nyes dmigs thams cad babyed pa'i thab ni dang bdag tu rtog pa'i marig pa ste/ de las bathos pa ltas dang ston mongs pa'i 'du byung bri bag chags sbyin pa'i dbang gis mngon par bye pa d+hAng drug gi sem na sa'i spo ba ma bye da/
75b6(rnying rgyud): srog 'gag pas 'chi ba dang / lus bzang ngan dang / mongs spyod che chung dang / gnas mtho dmang dang / bachi 'bo ltung ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'khrul 'khor bar med du 'khor ba la sogs pa ste/ de dag kyang log rtog nyid de lta snang bcom pas don
75b7(rnying rgyud): gzhan du grub pa ci yang med de/ dran pa nyer gzhag yas/ blatshogs lus dang longs spod dang // bde stug nyid du phreng ba ni// sems kyis sprub zhing sems kyis byas// sems las gzhan du drung bad med// dper na ni la ma'i zhin no// zhes so// dang /
76a1(rnying rgyud): pasang byeng bamang gta phyogs gsus tham thu da sab pad tog dag pa gan tshogs gsu thoso nas kun paca mthams dang bza sbyis rnas par dran pa 'ang byung bdag par pa 'don ga tan pa thabs pas
76a2(rnying rgyud): mang yang da ga rtogs pas sogs nang badrug pa te/ stong nying bdag dpa na nas sa byin pos sa dgis rig pa'i mi dus thugs su byed pan chos thams cad nga bzhid med pa maung thul du zigs pa spyon pa dang bstan pa'i 'dzir gyur yang nga gro
76a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs tsam du ston par snang ba'o// rkang bajug par theg pa'i khyad par dang / rgyud kyi che ba/ rang bzhin brjod med du bstan pa'i don gsum bsdu ste/ dmigs bya bzung ba'i yul dang dmigs byed 'dzin sems kyi rtog pa gnyis rang gis med pa draH sna ye shes
76a4(rnying rgyud): dbang bsgyur ba ste/ ye shes nyid la nyid 'dod dgur spyod pas bzhis nges par byung ba'i 'bras bu theg pa 'dir bstan pa dang / 'di las bstan pa thams cad 'phros shing thams cad 'dis 'grel pa dang / dbang bya'i yul dang 'beb byed kyi theg pa thams
76a5(rnying rgyud): cad brjod med du bstan pa'o// de rnams ni bsdu ba'i snong du le dra'i skad ba sla ba zhes bya'o// de nas rkang pa bdun pa dang brgyang pa te bcwa pa'i slad du le ba'i stong bstan pa 'byung ba spyi'i gleng gzhi badz+ra ste/ gnas lcags rtogs pas chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba
76a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu mngon du byas pas yon tan lhan gyis grub pa la ngo ma tshang ba'i mdzad pa gleng gzhi spo ba'i rgyu dang / sra bsod nams chen po dang / gsung rig pa dang / yon tan nyid mngon shes dang rdzu 'phrul du shar nas don mdzad pa thugs mngon sum pa dang / rdzu 'phrul bsim
76a7(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pas 'dul ba ste/ ji ltar spro ba'i mdzad pa 'dul ba bzhis gang du 'dul ba'i zhing khams mtha' yas par snang ba de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas nyid kyi ye shes rang snang ba las gzhan logs na rang mtshan du grub pa med de/ ye shes de nyid gdul
76b1(rnying rgyud): byung ba 'ang rung ba na// rmang blang rgyal ba pas/ sangasargyam rgyadang gas ci byams dang // mashes pan yin pas stsung bu// mags nyid du m+WA byung ba sten/ ga sa su na gang ldan ces drug// // sangan nang
76b2(rnying rgyud): sogs te/ de bA ci sa bams cang dang ba gnyis las ma'adas so nas rjo dzin pa gsang pa'i bdag pas tshig tu bsdus pa'o// bzhi pani/ sa rjod pas thub pa migs te/ dag ces brjod pas ston pa'i thugs pas zu bdug gi srung pa thang sa pa 'a slo
76b3(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i dbang gis chos kyi stong ma bstan pa dang / gdod nas grub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis da gongs pa dang brdal sogs pa'i nonas gsungs pa yang chos thams cad sems dang ye shes rang snang bar bstan pa de dag tsam du 'dus par ston pang bzhid de zhen
76b4(rnying rgyud): pa rigs drug pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gnyis pa le'u'i mtshan ni/ gsang ba'i sogs te/ rgyud 'di sa yang nyi shu rtsa gnyis su yod pa las 'dis 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad sems dang ye shes nyid da ltar snang btsam dang / de thams cad kyang mthar rang bzhin gyis
76b5(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa chos nyid du gtan labab nas bstan pa de skye gsum pa'o// paT bzhi pa la gsum ste/ gsungs pa po sas brjod pa dang / gzung dang / mdza to// dang bani/ derjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du sadod pas d+hA rna
76b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i ba te/ chos byams cad gtan pa phab pa d+mong nga mdzad byed pa ga la brten nas 'bebs dgos pa'i phyir/ du nas phyogs bdu dus bzhi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgrongs pa tha dang meng drugacig tu byung nas sringad gi ma nyam pa chen po'i tshul dung d+hi 'i byud pa/
76b7(rnying rgyud): dbyes su 'khor 'dang kyis pa sdus pa'i chos thams cad panas rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas par byungar ba ting nga dzin lamadagongs pa gzhan mig yo bar bzhugs pas chos thams ca dang ba med pa mi ce ma gnas pa da rtsod pa byed pa pagi 'dre
77a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i 'di ston pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i rdo rje las phyung ngo // le'u'i gzhung pa gnyis te/ rgyas par bshad pa dang / bsdus te bstan pa'o// dang po la bzhi ste/ yi ge ji ltar byung ba'i tshul/ de ltar dru
77a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i mthu/ lam pa'i dbang du sems sbyang ba/ yi ge'i don bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ a/ ka kha nas so so zhes pa'i 'a te/ kun 'dus las/ dbyings las a d+hu a las ni// yi ge'i tshogs rnams ma lus 'phro// zhes pas yi ge 'khor po'i 'phro gzhir ma
77a3(rnying rgyud): a yig ni khong nas rang byung ba ste/ 'grel chung las/ sku gsung thugs kyi grong nas a byung ste// ye 'i khong dus 'byung ba skye ba med// ces so// yi ge gzhan rnams sngon byung ston pa'i thugs rje rang snang ba'i tshe 'phro ba'i gnas nI a'i 'od zer sku'i gnas so sor dkyil pa
77a4(rnying rgyud): de dang de las byung ba ste/ de'ang 'gral chung las/ a las 'od zer mgur gyi bum par 'khyil// 'od 'ac+doMs ka la sogs pa 'bru lnga shar// zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar/ masar gyi gnas las ka kha ga g+ha nga / de bzhin du ljags las co sde/ ljags kyi rtse
77a5(rnying rgyud): las Ta sde dang ta sde gnyis/ mchu las pa sde/ sku'i cha nyi shu las la sogs bcu bdun dang khyab byed kyi yi ge gsum rnams 'thon to// de la sku'i cha nyi shu ni 'grel chung gi bzhed pa ltar sdoms su byas na/ byin pa sta zur dku skabs dang // dpung las yar la
77a6(rnying rgyud): la byung // phyag mthil thugs ka mdzod spu dang // zhabs mjig gsang gnas las rim bzhin// shaMnas ha k+Sha rnams 'phros// spyan skan tshems shangs rnam pa'i las// gnyis gnyis 'phros pas me I dang // u u e i oM oM phros//
77a7(rnying rgyud): gtsug lte ba mchog ma yi// gnas las mgo shad tig gsum 'thon// zhes bya'o// rjes 'jug lam pa'i sems nyid rang snang ba'i yi ge 'byung ba'i gnas ni/ spra sgo las/ bogs mgrin pa rkan dang lce// sna dang spyi bo so dang mchu// zhes pas amra
77b1(rnying rgyud): mgrin pa/ i dz+nyA ya sha e rnams dan/ ri Tu ra Sha s+the bo// u pu wa o mchu/ phaiM tu las so// rjes su nga ro swA ste/ mgrin pa rkan spyi bo so bzhi'i byed pa ni rim bzhin lce'i rtsa ba dang / dbus dang / rtse mor ny+tsa ba dang / rtse mo rnams rgan dang 'phrad pa las so// 'dir
77b2(rnying rgyud): A ring dang / r-i l-i bzhi dang / aM aHrnams ma byung ba ni lha dang sbyor ba'i dbang gis bsdus pa ste/ A ring po shad/ aHrnam bcad can tig/ ri li bzhir dang la/ aM ni o yig o yig la sbyar nas oM zhes bsdus par rdo rang zom bzhed/ thar lo'i phyi 'akur
77b3(rnying rgyud): las ni paM ge lnga bcu tshang bar byung zhing / 'og tu so so'i don 'chad pa'i dus su'ang / A ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid// aM ni nyer skyes dag pa nyid// a/ ni zas sogs dag pa nyid// raM ni dngos dang dngos med stong // spri ni srid dang srid med stong // l-i ni shes dang
77b4(rnying rgyud): shes bya stong // l-I ni stong dang snying rje'i bdag/ ces 'byung zhing / sngar gyi dpe phal che bar/ oM ni thams cad zhig pa yin// zhes rong TI ka gi bsdus bshad ltar oM la oM du 'don na'ang rgya dper/ oM sarba bin+da shi t+yA/ zhes snang bas oM nyid du bton pa legs
77b5(rnying rgyud): so// gnyis pa ni/ 'di dag myong bas zhes 'ogs te/ yi ge 'di dag phyung ba tsam gyi mthus 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad shar nub dang mtha' dbus sogs yin tshun mthong ma'i rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ tshe de rab tu g.yos/ chos ni kun
77b6(rnying rgyud): g.yos pas dngos po'i 'khrul pa zhig nas 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ming du btags pa las don gyi ngo bo ma grub pa'i mtshan nyid tsam du gyur pa la mnyes pas hoHzhes bya'o// de ltar yang spyi mdo las/ gang skye ba med par mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni a
77b7(rnying rgyud): zhes bla dgas su btags so// bya ba mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni ka zhes bla dgas su btags so// zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin no// gsum pa lam pa'i dbang du sems spyad pa la gsum ste/ a yig la sbyang ba/ yi ge gzhan la sbyang ba/ de ye
78a1(rnying rgyud): shes kyi chung bstan pa'o// dang po ni ma/ rab tu brtan gyur sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ rang rig snang stong gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin a yig dkar po brtan gas pa kyi tshad brgyad dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o// ji ltar na/
78a2(rnying rgyud): g.yo/ yi 'gyur/ mngon par mi 'gyur/ cing yang bskur du rung ba ste rab tu brtan par sbyar ba'i tshang bzhi dang ldan pa'i a dkar po// sal le/ sang de/ lhag de/ lhang nge bstegasal ba'i tshad bzhi da du ldan pa la rtse gcig tu blo gnas pa dang / spyod yul si s+thA
78a3(rnying rgyud): zhen skyong phyir de las shin tu phra ba'i a grangs med pa rnams zlo bar bya'o// de ltar spros pas phyogs bcu thams cad as grang bar sbyang bting nge 'dzin gyi yul du gsal bar gyur pa dang / de nas 'gro gzhi'i e de la bawas b+hang gzhi dang mkha' khyab kyi a'i rang bzhin
78a4(rnying rgyud): la 'phel ba'am 'grib pa med de/ ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par gsal zhing brtan pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni/ de las sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ a yig de las ming gi gzhi dang ro rnams gsal bar byed pa'i yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi tshogs kha dog
78a5(rnying rgyud): gsal zhing 'od 'bar ba phyogs kun khyab par spro zhing bslu ba'i tshul gyis spyod pa'ang snga a la ji ltar sbyangs pa de bzhin no// gsum pa ni/ 'di ni sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ de ltar yi ge la sems skyong ba'i thabs 'di la 'bad pas ni rdo rje gsum gyi dngos grub thams
78a6(rnying rgyud): cad kyi rgyu ting nge 'dzin brtan pa nyid 'byung ste/ des 'bras bu ye shes bskyed pa'i rgyu byed pa yin no// bzhi pa yi ge'i don bshad pa la gsum ste/ gsungs pa lo rgyus/ don bshad dngos/ mjug bsdu ba'o// dang po ni/ de nas sogs te/ yi ge la sems skyong ba
78a7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i rjes de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ston pas yi ge'i don bshad kyi ched du brjod pa 'di dag brjod do// gnyis pa la gnyis te/ yi ge spyi'i don bshed dang / bye brag bzhi bcwa rtsa lnga'i don bshad pa'o// dang po la bzhi ste/ yo na'i
78b1(rnying rgyud): che ba/ rang bzhin/ byed las/ nges tshig go// dang po la gnyis te/ yi ge sku gsum gyi bdag nyid du bstan pa dang / de dag gi rdo rje gsum mtshon byed du bstan pa'o// dang po la gsum las/ dmigs med chos skur bstan pa ni/ a ni stong dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig
78b2(rnying rgyud): ste// yi ge a ni stong pa dang mi stong pa gnyis kyi mtha' dang bral bar ma zad/ zung 'jug dbu ma tsam du'ang dmigs su yod pa ma yin pas spros pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ spyi mdo las// snang dang mi snang la sogs pa// gnyis su rtog pa thams cad mtha'// kun
78b3(rnying rgyud): mkhyen rnams ni dbus la'ang min// zhes so// de ltar gtan la phebs pas chos thams cad ming du btags pa tsam las don bsam brjod kyi yul las 'das pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin chos slar nges pa'i phyir/ de'i rang gdangs yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo nyid kyang
78b4(rnying rgyud): chos sku'i dang la gnas pa las gzhan du ma g.yos so// gnyis pa dbang phyur longs skur bstan pa ni/ a nyid sna tshogs sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ yi ge thams cad kyi 'byung khungs a nyid kyis go phye bas sna tshogs par snang ba'i tshul ni ngag gi 'du byed kyi dbang
78b5(rnying rgyud): las ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis su snang ba'ang sgra'i nga ro dbyangs dang ming gzhi gsal byed kyi yi ge ji snyed pa thams cad 'dir de snyed du bsdus pa ste/ de'ang sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su mngon par rdzogs par mda' mdzad pa'i rgyal po de kho na nyid longs sku'i ngo bor nges pa'o//
78b6(rnying rgyud): gsum pa rol pa sna tshogs par snang ba sbrul skur bstan pa la gsum las/ dang po sprul sku'i gsung du bstan pa ni/ e ma ho ngo mtshar sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ e ma ho/ zhes yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo ni shin tu ngo mtshar zhing ches ya mtshan gyi gnas te/ ci'i
78b7(rnying rgyud): phyir na/ cho 'phrul chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' ba'i yi ge zhe gnyis kyi steng du khyab byed kyi yi ge gsum bsnan pas bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i tshogs 'di dag 'dus pa las/ don gyi ngo bo tsam ston pa ming dang / don gyi khyad par ston pa'i tshig rnams byung zhing / de 'dus pa
79a1(rnying rgyud): las ngag gi rnam pa ma lus pa 'dzin pa'i gnas su gyur te/ gang dngul skal sku'i gsung rgya che ba theg pa sna tshogs pa dang / zab pa brjod bya'i don chen po gdul bya'i snang dor snga zhing gzhan la ston pa yin no// gnyis pa skul sku'i thugs su bsta
79a2(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ dngos med sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ yi ger snang dus nyid nas bden pa'i dngos po med de/ ci'i phyir na yi ge'i rang bzhin sems nyid yin pas/ sems kyi rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du yi ge'i rang bzhin yang bdag gnyis med cing spros pa'i mtha' thams
79a3(rnying rgyud): cad dang bral bas blo'i yul du cir yang mi dmigs pa ni thugs kyi gsang ba'o// gsum pa sprul sru'i skur bstan pa ni/ dbyibs dang sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ yi ge'i rang bzhin dmigs pa med kyang rol pa ma 'gags pa tsam du spyi mdo las/ a seng ge glal ba
79a4(rnying rgyud): su na ma na sa
79a5(rnying rgyud): cir yang snang bas sprul sku'i mdzad pa sgrub cing ston pa'i phrin las can no// gnyis pa de dag gi rdo rje gsum mtshon byed du bstan pa ni/ phyogs bcu dus bzhir sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ phyogs bcu dus bzhir 'gro don la gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs
79a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyang ye shes sems dpa' rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor zhe gnyis su 'dus pa khyab byan byas pa'i de re re la khyab byed sku gsung thugs gsum gsum dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor zhe gnyis khyab byed gsum dang bcas te bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid du 'dus shing /
79a7(rnying rgyud): de dag kyang yi ge mgo shad tig ste khyab byed gsum dang / ka nas kya'i bar gsal byed so bzhi/ i dang oM'i bar dbyangs brgyad dril bas khyab bya'i yi ge zhe gnyis te/ mdor na a'i cho 'phrul yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la 'dus shing rdzogs pas chos sku'i rol pa gzugs
79b1(rnying rgyud): sku'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba mtshon par byed pa ni yi ge'o// gnyis pa yi ge'i rang bzhin ni/ sems kyi sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid yi ger rang snang ba ste/ de las gzhan du yi ge zhes dngos por grub pa cung zad kyang
79b2(rnying rgyud): yod pa ma yin no// de ltar yang mdo las/ rab 'byor yi ge ni don dam par ma skyes pa ste a'i ngo bo nyid do// a'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni sems kyi rang bzhin te/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'o// zhes so// gsum
79b3(rnying rgyud): pa byed las ni/ dmigs med de nyid sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ cir yang dmigs med kyi yi ge de nyid kyang rol pa sna tshogs par rang snang ba'i yi ge sku gsung thugs dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo chen por ma 'gags pa ste/ des ye nas sku gsung thugs su ldan
79b4(rnying rgyud): gyis grub pa ni ngo mtshar gyi gnas ya mtshan zhing cho 'dzul chen por snang ba'i dngos grub nyid rang rig pa'i mngon sum du rab tu 'gugs shing 'dren par byed pa yin no// bzhi pa nges tshig ni/ dbyings la sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ yul chos kyi dbyings la yul can mtshan med shes
79b5(rnying rgyud): rab kyi dbyings kyis bya rtsol med par bris pa ste/ de'i phyir ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i yi ge'i sprin 'gyur ba med cing rnam pa brjod bya thams cad gsal ba pi nus pa dang ldan pas yi ge zhes pa'i ming ni tha snyad tsam du brjod pa ste/ yi ge'i skad dod a k+Sha ra'i sku las drangs na mi
79b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / bya stan gsal byed/ war+Na nus pa dang ldan par 'jug pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa bye brag gi don bshad la gnyis te/ khyab byed gsum dang // bya ba bya zhe gnyis kyi don bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ mgo ni sogs rkang pa gsum ste/ mtshon byed yi ge mgo ni
79b7(rnying rgyud): be ra ka ris te/ mtshon bya'i don zung 'jug ma nor ba gnyis med ye shes kyi rang bzhin thugs rdo rje mtshon/ byed las ni yi ge thams cad kyi 'go 'dren cing 'jug pa'i sgor gyur pas lam dang 'dra ba yin te/ dpal byin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las/ mgo ni thog mar mtshon pa ste// dang
80a1(rnying rgyud): lagazugs sdug gsal ba// don mag ga yan// 2 gu sam gnasaH// rnams// nag tan \u0f7fnan/ na nasu rang chub kyi nga ba nagasu dang / thod lngas ya ga rnams 'das par byangs kyis bcing sa
80a2(rnying rgyud): du ma ma shA sa pa byesapa na sa
80a3(rnying rgyud): nams ma rnams par// zhes pa ma mthong bar zad do// yi ge shad ni don thabs snying rje chen pos 'dul ba'i rang bzhin su rdo rje/ byed las nang pa sdebs nas tshigs su gcod par byed pa ste/ skye mdor/ gcod pa mtshon par byed pa'i yi ge la ni med dbyug pa zhes bla dgas su
80a4(rnying rgyud): btags so// zhes so// gnyis pa la bdun lal/ drang po ba bang mi dang m+b+ha sbru la ba phram gyi yi ga / seMn gyi ming sogs da pas pa pa rtsonas ma / cesathams cad bye me de dzin nyid kyi byed ma thub mo na tu bang dz+dza/
80a5(rnying rgyud): bar ma las/ a zhes bya ba ni gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// zhes dang / b+hU 'phral phyi ma pas// A ni stong pa ye nas stong // stong pa nyid na stong pa med// yi ge kun gyi gzhi'am hA// yin pa'i phyir na 'ag bar bzhag/ ces yi ge sun gyi 'byung
80a6(rnying rgyud): grangs len pas thog mar smos so// Tha yin ni spyamA lta bu'i rnam shes chos dbyings ye shes su dgra pa'i phyag gyur 'phrul pa rdo rje mi ba smod pa nyid de/ 'dir yab lngal du 'phrul gyi sras ston pa'ang / phung po lnga sgra ma'i snang ba ltar med pagasal snang tsam du 'char ba ma
80a7(rnying rgyud): dgags kyang / 'char gzhig zug ma rang rig pa'i ye shes su rnam par dag pa ni ye shes ma yin la/ de nyid thabs kyi phyag tur 'phrul ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi balngaste/ l-i lag las/ wa rung s+thi ma'i ye shes la// rang rig zings kyis rigs par
80b1(rnying rgyud): 'phrul// zhes so// de wAr lho'i mtshan sgyu 'phrul 'gro ba las sa so'i khyad thos la/ zani mo long ye shes kyi phyag rgyar snang ba'i lha rnam snang / Da ni mnyam nyid ye shes kyis rab yid bzhin du nor ba'i phyag rgya rin 'byung / lhan mos kun so sor ma 'dres pa'i gzigs
80b2(rnying rgyud): pa rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya snang mtha'/ Na ni gdul bu'i don kun tu mthar phyin par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi phyag kyi don grub nyid do// bla ni drabs te yum rnams dbyings kyi phyag rgya yin pas chos can thams cad dang 'brel zhing / rnam pa'ang yab dang phran tshun thabs shes
80b3(rnying rgyud): zung 'brel du bzhugs pas san/ yum gyi mkha' dra ba dang chos mthun pas kyang dra ba zhes pa'i slas bstan no// so so'i khyad par ni/ the ni chos nyid kyi mkha' la chos can thams cad mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya dbyings phyug ma nyid do// ha ni sra bar+d+ha nA sa'i khams yon tan gyi
80b4(rnying rgyud): na na
80b5(rnying rgyud): ljags kyi rnam shes dag pa spyan ras gzigs/ dA ni lus shes kyi mthar thug gsang ba'i rnam shes kyis bde ba myong dus mig shes la sogs pa'i rtog pa 'gag pas thugs kyang 'jig par byed pa gshin rje gshed do// gsum pa nang gi sems ma bzhi sgo / khro bo dang bcas pa
80b6(rnying rgyud): yi ge ni/ tsa ni spyan gyi sogs rkang pa lnga ste/ sgo lnga'i rnam shes skye ba'i rten byed pas na yul lnga la spu'i sbas bstan te/ tsan ldan gyi yul gzugs rnam par dag pas sku'i mchog sreg mo// tsha ni stan gyi yul sla dag pa kyu ma/ nga ni shadas kyi yul dri dag pa phreng ma/ dz+nyA ni lpags
81a1(rnying rgyud): ce yu la dag pa grang nA/ gni sa l+ya / Tha mamang thag gas pa'i ba dang bzang pa'i das yul gnan ga pa gag pas yang 'dug par byed pa stobs mna'o// bzhi pa rgya sems pa b+barna rgan slong dang bcas pa 'i ga ni/ bdun
81a2(rnying rgyud): kyi sogs rkang pa lnga ste/ yul dang shes pa gnyis phyi nang du brda sgor byed pas na dbang po lnga pa gsung gi sgras bstan te/ pa ni stan gyi dbang po dag pas gsung gi mchog byams pa/ pha ni stan gyi dbang po dag pa sgrib se la/ ba ni shangs kyi dbang po dag pa kun bzang /
81a3(rnying rgyud): gni ljags kyi dbang po dgra pa 'jam dpal/ ma ni reg byed lus dbang gi mthar thug gsang ba'i dbang pos yul bzhir 'dzin pa'ang mi gnas pas gsung yang 'jig par byed pa rta mgrin no// lnga pa phyi'i sems ma bzhi no ma bzhi dang bcas pa'i yid ni/ ya ni gyi ba sogs tshigs
81a4(rnying rgyud): bcad gnyis te/ ya ni da ltar bskye ba'i go 'byed byed 'das pa'i dus rnam par dag pa spos ma/ wa ni gnas pa zin pa da ltar ba'i dus dag pa me tog ma yin no// ra ni da ltar 'a 'di 'jig pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus dag pa ste mar me ma/ la ni dus gsum gang du'ang tha snyad
81a5(rnying rgyud): gdags rung gis stong pa ma nges pa'i dus dag ba dri chub ma'o// sha nI chos la rtag pa med par 'dzin pa dag pa ste lcags su ma// sa ni chad par 'dzin pa'ang yod pa ma yin pa ste zhags pa ma/ sa ni bdag gnyis su 'dzin pa'i mtha' dang bral bas bdag med pa ste lcags
81a6(rnying rgyud): grog ma/ ha ni mtshan ma med pa'i chos nyid du 'don pa'ang dag pa dril bu ma'o// drag pa kun bzang thub drug dang bcas pa'i yi ge nI/ k+Sha ni ye shes sogs rkang pa bdun te/ k+Sha ni rnam shes ye shes su dag pazugs kyi bdag nyid rang byung ye shes kyi thugs rigs drug
81a7(rnying rgyud): pakun tu bzang po ste/ 'dir thugs kyi sgra zlos te bstan pa ni/ yid kyi rnam shes kyis rang yul chos dang sgo lnga'i yul gnyis ka gcod par byed pa'i phyir ro// i ni rgya mtsho chen po'i rdul phra rab ji snyed pa de snyed kyi lha rnams te gnas su 'dul byed rigs mthun gyi gzugs su
81b1(rnying rgyud): ska nga thub pa brgya b+hin dang / I ni rdul snyed lha min gyi thub pa thag bzang ris/ u nI rdul snyed mi rnams kyi gnas su shAka thub/ u ni rdul skyed byol song rnams kyi thub pa seng ge rab brtan/ e ni rdul snyed yi dwags kyi gnas su kha 'bar de ba/ i ni rdal snyed
81b2(rnying rgyud): dmyal pa'i thub pa chos kyi rgyal po rnams su bstan nas 'dral ba ste/ yi ge drug po rtsa yig gi rjes su 'brang ba 'ang byed pa po ngan bzang gi thugs rig pa ye shes kyi byin rlabs las 'grong bral gyi sbal ltad bstan pa mtshan no// bdun pa byang rdo'i khro bo leg ne/ na sogs
81b3(rnying rgyud): rkang pa gnyis te/ oM nI lus dbang shes gsum 'dus pa reg pa'i mthar thug gsang ba gi khams gsum gyi rtog pa thams cad bde ba'i ngang du 'jig par byed cing / oM ni bde ba'ang stong par grol bas rtog pa thams cad mi gnas par zhig pa yin te rgyu 'bras ro gcig pas
81b4(rnying rgyud): yi ge gnyis po de bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bsdus so// gsum pa mjug bsdu ba ni/ yi ge nas a hoH'i bar te/ de ltar na gsung yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs chen 'di rnams kyis sangs kyis thams cad kyi lha gsung thugs mi zad pa chen mi 'khor lo'i phreng ba rnams ma lus par
81b5(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa'o zhes ched du brjod do// de ltar gsung yi ge'i 'khor lo gtan la phab pa la dgyes pas a hoHzhes ngo mtshor bar bstan pa'o// gnyis pa bsdus te bstan pa la bzhi ste/ gsungs pa lorgyas su brjod pa/ bsdu bu dngos/ bka' gsang sngags
81b6(rnying rgyud): yon tan no// dang po ni/ de nas sogs te/ byas par bstan pa de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yab rnams yum btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi don rtogs dka' ba'i gsang ba 'di nyid ston pa'i rdza sogs rigs lnga dper
81b7(rnying rgyud): me phyed pa'i rdo rje las byung ngo // gnyis pa ni// a hoH/ thabs dang nas a hoH'i bar te/ a skye ba med pa shes rab dang / hoHdgyes pa thabs te zung 'jug yi ge'i 'khor lo la ngo mtshar ba'o// de yang thabs snang ba dang shes rab stong pa nyid dbyer med spong tha ma gyi ye/
82a1(rnying rgyud): shes te/ der yi ge dmigs med chos srung bstan pa'i tshogs bcad gcig brda'o// sems nyid snang stong gnyis med du sbyar ba'i dgyes rol las spyod yul thams cad A'i sprin chen por sgo zhing bsrub ste/ a yig la sems lhung ba
82a2(rnying rgyud): bsdu'o// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ya las yi ge zhe gnyis kyi tshogs cung ste zhing bathub te/ yi ge gzhan la sems byung ba bsngo'o// ston pa'i thugs rje dang 'am pas phy-i ga lnga sems sbyong ba'i thabs ni yi ge 'khor lo dang 'bras rnga ye shes kyi d+har rjes te/
82a3(rnying rgyud): le'u spyi dang / yi ge'i don bshad gnyis kyis gsungs pa lo rgyus dang / 'di ni sogs ye shes kyi rgyud bstan pa rnams balnga'o// gsung mi zad pa gyen gyi 'khor lo yi ge'i sprin ni ston pa'i thugs rdo las rang snang ba ste/ a ka kha sogs yi ge ji ltar gyung pa'i tshul bsngo
82a4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje gsum gyi phyag rgya rmad du byung ba'i 'bras bu rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su sbyin pas don gnyis grub pa ste/ de dag gi rdo rje gsu ma mtshon byed du bstan pa dang / 'ogo ni ma nor sogs bye brag yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don bshad pa bsdu'o// yi ge'i
82a5(rnying rgyud): sgo nas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i don ston pa la ngo mtshar ba ste/ yi ge sprul sku'i gsung du bstan pa bsdu'o// chos thams cad ming gi tshogs pa tsam las ngo bo ka da du'ang ma grub pa ste/ yi ge byang ba'i mthu bshad pa bsdu'o// yi ge bzhi cu rtsa gnyis ni rgyal ba zhe gnyis kyi
82a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin du mngon par grub pa ste/ yi ge dbang sgyur longs skur bstan pa bsdu'o// yi ge de dag kyang rgya rkyen gyis gsar du 'du ma byas pa sems kyi chos nyid dmigs pa dang bral ba ste/ yi ge sbrul sku'i thugs su bstan pa/ yi ge'i rang bzhin/ yi ge'i
82a7(rnying rgyud): nges tshig rnams bsdu'o// de lta na'ang lam pa'i ngor yi ge de dag 'dus byas pa ltar dbyibs kha dog sogs kyi rol pa ma 'gags par snang ba ste/ yi ge sbal spu'i slar bstan pa bsdu'o// sangs kyis thams cad kyi rdo rje gsum dbyer mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor ma
82b1(rnying rgyud): lus pa gsang ya ga'i 'khor las mngan du 'byin pa las mi 'da' ba'i dmachog te/ yig 'khor la sogs mjug bsgra'i ga dang gnyis brjo'o// de ltar rdorje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor snad par mdzad pa dam thog pas dadung bar ma mdzang pas 'bras bu su dang ma nas nga
82b2(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa'i dngos thab mi 'grub pa'i dbang med de/ 'thub byed bye phywa dang rkyen bsgom pa'i ste de 'dzin chags pa'i ma man po las 'bras tha mngon thob chos nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ dmigs nyi sogs yi ge'i byed pas brda'o// de lta ngas
82b3(rnying rgyud): tshwa bas basmras pa'o// gan+d+ha ya bas pas nying nig nas kyis du kyang A cad pa grol badzo/ na d+ham na la dbangos brgyad pa spyo'o// g.ya na/ te/ ba dzin pa
82b4(rnying rgyud): cang yi ga zung pa'i 'khor lo dang bzhin gnyis su med par sbyar hU~M// gsum pa le'u'i mtshan+tiH/ gsang ba'i sogs te/ gud 'dril leb nyi cag nyis su yod pa las 'des chos thams cad med tsam pas don pa mgrub pa mtshon byed yi gaphreng ba'i 'khor na
82b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyags rje dang gdul bya'i sems nyid las rang snang bar bkod cing bstun pa'i le'u nye bzhi pa'o// // le'u lA pa la gsum he/ gsungs pa 'o mus su brjod pa dang / gzhung dngos/ mtshan no// dang po ni/ de nas yi ge sogs te/ gsung yi ge'i dkyi
82b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor bstan 'de nas bshad ma thag gi yi ge 'khor lo'i ljin bkod pa'i mthu las thabs shes zung 'jug sgyu 'phrul lha'i dkyil 'khor dang / las dang dngos grub sgrub pa'i rim pa rnam par 'phro ba 'di ched du brjod do// gnyis pa gzhung dngos la gsum he/ gang
83a1(rnying rgyud): gas sgrub pa rten gyi gang zag/ rtags gams kyi thabs kyis ji ltar 'grub tshul/ gzhung gsungs pa'i yon tanan// dang ban/ ston pa mchod brtson sogs tshogs bcud gcig ste/ thar lam ston pa po tham dang slob dpon mchod par
83a2(rnying rgyud): brtson zhing phan nus zab mo'i dbang gsum thob pas rgyud sbyin pa/ rta ba lhag pa bden pa dbyer med kyi gnas lugs rtogs pa dang / rtogs don sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsal ba/ rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig rnams mnyams pas rnam par dag pa/ rgya rkyen las kyi
83a3(rnying rgyud): sngags gsum dang / dam tshig las chos mtshan bzhi'i phyag rgya rnams legs par shes shing / lam ma las/ dmachog blta ba ting 'dzin dang // byang chub sems dang snying rje ste// lhag pa'i yo byad rdzogs bya// zhes pa ltar la mdus kyi yo byad wal
83a4(rnying rgyud): yang na bza' dang btung ba/ rgyan dang bgo ba/ gru tshig sgra/ bro gar 'du 'phro/ A li kA li ste sgrub pa rdzas kyi yo byad lnga dang ldan pas bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur la/ chos de dag dang mi ldan pas ni bsgrub kyang don med par ma zad/ sgrub pa po rang nyid brlag par
83a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes khe nyen dang bcas te bstan no// gnyis pa la gsum ste/ chu shes pa'i mtshan nyid blta ba/ rkyen drug pa'i mtshan nyid ting 'dzin/ mngon du gyur pa 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid de// dang po la gnyis te/ rtogs pa'i thabs la gdams pa dang / rtogs
83a6(rnying rgyud): bya blta ba'i ngo bo bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ gang gis dmigs med sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ gang zag gang gis sems nyid gang du'ang dmigs su med pa'i don mi shes pa de yis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa mtha' bral gyi gnas lugs zab mo mi shes la/
83a7(rnying rgyud): na mtshan de'i phyir phyi nang gi grub mtha' dngos por blta ba rnams dang / dngos po med par 'dzin pa de thams cad cing yang ma grub cing gang du'ang ma 'gags pa'i sems nyid mtha' bral gyi dang der 'jig pa'i tshul rtogs pas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs med bsam
83b1(rnying rgyud): rjod dang bral ba 'dan nyid shes par gyis shig ces gdamams// gnyis pa ni/ gzhim med pa'i sogs nang pa bdunaH/ brtan pa'i gzha dang bskyed pa'i zla ba med pa'i sems nyid gsun ma'i rang bzhi de/ 'dags cing yang gdagras supa dang / ba dang mo dang na
83b2(rnying rgyud): gsum yang min la/ de las gzhan du mtshan med dang / 'gro ba rigs drug/ rgyal rigs sogs rigs bzhi/ rigs so so'i rgyud sogs gang yang ma yin zhing / dkar dmar sogs kha dog dang / gru bzhi zlum po sogs dbyibs su grub pa dang / brtan
83b3(rnying rgyud): gnas dang rten byed kyi rdzas sogs dngos po dang dngas med kyi chos su grub pa ma yin te/ mdor na grang yang yin par mi 'gyu bas mtha' cing yang grub pa min pa ni chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings rnam par dag parang byung gi ye shes te/ de nyid gasgo mngon du byed pa las mi 'das
83b4(rnying rgyud): bathabs kyi phyag rgya la ma dang / rtogs martogs kyi byed pas 'khor 'dus su snang ba kun gyi gzhib ma mu ste/ ci'i phyir ni/ sems kyi chos nyid las gzhan du gyur pa'i chos 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir ro// de yang le'u lnga pa 'di nyid brdud pa'i bka'i stsol la mtshan nyid
83b5(rnying rgyud): gsum du d+hi la nas 'chad pas na/ rtogs pa'i thabs dang rtogs bya'i ngo bo bshad pa'i gzhung can gnyis po 'di chu shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin mod/ de yang man ngag la ma'i mdang sbyar na/ de nyid las/ rang bzhin gyi shes rang gnas dang // de mthong der 'jug rnal
83b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor bzhi// bar chad med smrab rnam par smin// dbang sgyur phyag rgya ldan grub lam// mngon byas rim pa brjod par bya// zhes pa ltar mtshan nyid gsum yang le'u dgung phye ste/ dang por rtogs bya ye shes rang gnas gzhi'i ldeT/ gnyis par dang gnas mthong ba
83b7(rnying rgyud): blta ba'i leT/ gsum be nas drug pa'i bar le'u bzhis/ stong chen/ snying rje sbrum/ phyag rgya gcig spros te tshogs lam gyi rnal 'byor bzhi/ bdun ze skyong lam tshags sgrub/ brgyad pas la mgyur gyi 'bras bu rig 'dzin bzhi/ dgu pas gzhing ltang
84a1(rnying rgyud): mngon byas mthar thug gi 'bras bu rnams bstan pa las/ rtogs bya lta ba'i ngo bo 'di lam ril gyi gzhi ye shes rang gnas kyi le'u dang sbyar nas/ rtogs pa'i thabs la gdams pa rang gnas mthong ba dang sbyar du drang ngang rgyal bgayung bzhed
84a2(rnying rgyud): cing / sngar rten gyi gang zag bshad pa'i gzhung de le'u bdun pa bar chad med pa'i lam tshogs skya ba dang sbyor ba yin no// gnyis brkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin la drug ste/ ci'i phyir bsgom pa'i dgos ched/ ji ltar bsgom pa'i thabs/ de nyid thams cad
84a3(rnying rgyud): du rang snang ba/ de las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa/ de nyid kar dag pas blang dor dang bral bar dpes bstan pa/ de la 'dris par bslabs pas 'bras bu la mtshams sbyor ba'o// dang po ni/ dngos rnams sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ 'di ltar dngos po
84a4(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs su snang ba'i chos rnams sdang dus nyid na dngos por grub pa rdul tsam yang med par rtogs pa'i don la rang dbang sgyur ba'i thabs ni ting nge 'dzin yin no// gnyis pa ni/ gang gis glang chen sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ sgom pa po gang gis mdul ba'i glang chen chang
84a5(rnying rgyud): gis myos pa dang 'dra ba'i sems 'khrul rtog sna tshogs kyis myos pas las su mi rung ba 'di nyid/ ji ltar glang ji mkhas pas lcags rtswa la sogs pa'i thabs kyis glang po btulan thul ba ltad/ gdams ngag gam shes rab kyi stobs kyis mnyam par 'jog thabs
84a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis po gang rung la 'arten nas rtogs don gnas lugs kyi ngang la yul med rang gsal du bzhag pas btul ba na dngos po dang mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i 'khrul rtog thams cad zhi nas gzhi ji lta ba bzhin klungs su phebs pa ni thul ba'o// de ltar dgos ched dang sgom thabs
84a7(rnying rgyud): sa po 'di ni de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor te/ lam rim le'u gsum pa dang sbyar ro// gsum pa ni/ rtsa ba med pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ gzhi dang rtsa ba gang du'ang grub pa med pa'i sems kyi chos nyid ni cing med pa 'gags pas
84b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das kyi chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin par nges pa rnyed nas/ rang gnas kyi ye shes ma rtogs pas sgyu ma lta bu'i 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i sems can la dmigs med kyi snying rje chen po bsgom pa ni kun snang gting 'dzin spyir rnga sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor te// lam rim
84b2(rnying rgyud): le'u bzhi pa dang sbyar ro// de ltar kye 'gag gnyis su med pa'i sems nyid thams cad du rang snang ba las 'dir yi ge a'i rang bzhin du bsgom ste/ yi ge de las a phra mo dang ka la sogs pa'i 'phro 'dul sems sbyong ba ni ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i chang 'dod rkur
84b3(rnying rgyud): 'bebs pa la rin chen gyi khams las grub pa'i sprin dgos pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad spo ba'i chur yi ge la sems sbyang dgos te/ chu'i ting 'dzin nam phra ba yig 'bru la bslab pa zhes bya'o// bzhi pa ni/ thabs las sogs rkang pa lnga ste/ rtsa ba'i
84b4(rnying rgyud): thabs rang rig yi ger snang pa las/ rten gyi dkyil 'khor du snang ba gzhi'i thabs byung zhing / der brten pa lha'i dkyil 'khor bkod de bsgom pa ni thabs bsam yas pa zhes bya'o// de dag ni dwags pa lha sku la bslab pa ste/ 'di dang / sngar gyi phra ba yig 'bru
84b5(rnying rgyud): la bslab pa/ 'chad 'gyur gyi de la 'dris par bslab pa gsum ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byor yin pas lam rim le'u lnga pa dang sbyar ro// de ltar thabs gsum dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi cho 'phrul du snang bas bzang
84b6(rnying rgyud): ngan tha dad pa 'grub pa min kyang / rnam pa gtso bo las tha dad pa'i 'khor sogs nang brten pa lha'i dkyil 'khor dang rlung gi phyi rol rten gyi dkyil 'khor te/ snang ba rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor zhi ba la chom bu stong dang / nyi khri bzhi stong dang / khro
84b7(rnying rgyud): pa la stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu dang / bdun khri drug stong brgyad brgya lnga bcu/ gnyis ka la bas ma yas spun grub kyi dkyil 'khor sogs phyag rgya spros pa mkha' khyab bsam yas kyi dkyil 'khor du bsgom pa de thams cad kyang rang rig ye shes kyi rol par shar bas
85a1(rnying rgyud): 'ang ba mags lam jug yang sang 'dags pa mad/ spyod yul yang sa dag panub zang nAg nas caganas ma btab pa tsal ma pa byu ba/ rangaH/ shA pa shas sus tshogs pa dgacugs/ bsha dra dang/
85a2(rnying rgyud): thabs gsum po de nyid rang rig pa'i ye shes las dang snang ba'i phyir na yi ge dang ming tshig gis bsdus pa'i lha'i sa bon dang bskyed sngags las gzugs kyi cha shas yongs su rdzogs pa'i skur bsgom pa sogs yid la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin ting nge 'dzin la 'dod dgur dbyar yod
85a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i yon tan gyi dpe ni/ mun nag la sgron me bteg pas snang ba byung ba ji lta ba de bzhin du rtog tshogs gang yang ma spangs par brten pa lha'i snang bar grol zhing / lcags yud tsam gyis gser du 'gyur ba gser 'gyur gyi rtsis thebs pa ltar 'byung lnga ma spangs par
85a4(rnying rgyud): yum lnga'i rang bzhin rten gzhal yas khang gi snang bar grol ba dang / bcud len gyi rtsis dug sman gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ba'i tshul dang 'dra bar rnam shes tshogs brgyad dam dug lnga ye shes ldang grol ba ste/ de'ang rnam par grol ba tsam las ma dag pa'i chos
85a5(rnying rgyud): rnams med snang yin pas dag pa'i ngo bor gsar du bsgyur dgos par ni mi bsam mo// drug pa ni/ sngags dang sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ phyag rgya gcig spos kyi skabs su sngags kyi yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha sku phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'bris par bslab
85a6(rnying rgyud): pas rkyen gyis mi 'phrog pa'i gsal snang la rab tu brtan zhing goms pa na 'og nas 'byung ba'i dngos grub ya mtshan chen po rnams thob par 'gyur ba yin no// gsum pa mngon gyur 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la gnyis te/ thun mong dang / mchog gi dngos grub po//
85a7(rnying rgyud): dang po thun mong ni/ lam thabs grol gnyis kyi dbang du kyi nang gi bshad tshul gnyis mdzad pa'i bka' srol snang na'ang / 'dir re zhig phyi bshad grol lam ltar 'chad do// de la gsum ste/ yon tan 'byung ba'i dngos grub drag/ 'thung lnga'i dngos grub
85b1(rnying rgyud): lA/ lus than rdzogs brgyad // dang yon/ bdud sags tshogs bcad gcig ste/ rgyud 'khrul pa dang sgrub thabs skyes 'chad pa'adabyung du byas na/ ya ga'i 'gro 'dul bzla nas bsgrub ste/ bstad gzhi zas drug can pa mig la thad da bu
85b2(rnying rgyud): skyi las kyis spya mchog bad rjeng 'gyur ba zom pa tsam gyis 'dod bya 'grub pa dang / ni gi ba sdigs yon tan lhag ma lnga po thams cad 'grub cing / de sngams bsgrub na/ ya 'i 'gro 'dus 'did byug ni rdzogs pa snang 'byung ba dang / nad pa'i dus
85b3(rnying rgyud): ge bkod pa'i 'phyo 'dus rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'i nad bzhi'am/ yang na kun brtags gdon gyi/ 'phrul byung rten gyi/ 'byung 'dus gzhi'i rang bzhin sngon las kyi nad bzhi po de la'ang bcu rtsa gcig pa snang ba bzhi ban rje bzhi'i nad thams cad pa 'a zhe
85b4(rnying rgyud): bde bar 'gyur ro// hri las rin po che'i gtor du bsam pa'am yi ge'i 'phro 'dus mchod pas longs spyod ci 'dod 'byung zhing / 'byung ba'i yi ge gsum gyi 'gro 'dus ngan song du skye ba'i sgrib pa stong pa dang / gang dang cing snang ba'i chos kyi rnam pa yang de dang mi
85b5(rnying rgyud): mthun pa'i snang ba gzhan skams las rba dang / sol ba las smyon zhing / bye ma las gser du 'gyur ba sogs 'grub pa yin no// de dag bshad d+had nus pa dang sbyar te bshad na/ rkang pa dang po gnyis ni le'u bzhi brgya ba mchog gi bdud rtsi sgrub pa dang / bdun
85b6(rnying rgyud): rtsub thun mong gi bdud rtsir langs sgrub pas bstan/ longs spyod 'byung ba ni zhwa gcig pa'i blon po nor mang sgrub pa sogs kyis bstan/ ngan song skyong ba ni zhe gcig pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub pa las a la sems spangs nas hU~M du bsgoms te bdag lus sbyang ba
85b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis bstan/ ci yang gzhan du 'gyur ba ni/ so brgyad pa nas rkang mgyogs dang mi snang ba/ re bzhing nas tshe/ re lnga pa nas bsgrub sogs kyis bstan/ gnyis pa ni/ nam mkha' sogs nang pa rnga te/ 'di yang 'grol sngab sbyar na/ nas
86a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' la spyi zhes rdo rje'i skas bsams nas pa'i sgras 'byung zhing / lag mthil du ri bkod pas 'bar ba'i ye shes kyi mer gyur nas tha mal gyi ma yang tshig par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du kha bkod pa ye shes kyi zur 'gyur bas
86a2(rnying rgyud): mal gyi chur 'bab pa'ang dag par byed pa dang / yaM bkod pa rlung du gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams ni gzhan du 'degs shing 'thor bar byed pa dang / yi ge e bkod de 'phro 'dus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad stongs par byed cing steng 'og tu 'phen pa dang ltung bar 'gyur
86a3(rnying rgyud): pa sogs 'grub bo// bshad rgyud dang sbyar na 'byung ba la thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston par nus pa ste/ rgyas pa'i so brgyad pa las// mi gnas nam mkha'i mtha' klas par// goms par 'dod pas 'gro ba dang // chu las bzhin 'gro ba dang // bsreg bya
86a4(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i dbus gnas dang // tshangs pa'i rlung gis bteg nas kyang // phyogs bcu kun tu phyin par 'gyur// zhes so// gsum pa ni/ dgug dang sogs rkang pa gsum ste/ 'grel sgrub ltar na ting nge 'dzin gyis gzungs ma dang dgra bgegs sogs bsgrub
86a5(rnying rgyud): bya gang yin dgug pa dang / yul gzhan du btang ba ste bskrad pa dang / dgra rkun sogs g.yo med du bcing ba dang / byad gdon gyis bcings pa sogs dgrol ba dang / nad pa dang sri'u la sogs pa gso ba dang / dgra bgegs gsad pa dang / gzhan
86a6(rnying rgyud): sde pham par bya ba dang / rang sde rgyal bar bya ba'i las rnams ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub bo// de dag bshad rgyud dang sbyar na// dgug pa dang bcing pa ni/ rgyas pa'i so brgyad par yul khams dbang du bya ba/ zhe gnyis dang zhe gsum gnyis nas 'das
86a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzungs ma rigs lnga'i yum dang sems ma/ zhe lnga par 'jig rten pa'i gzungs ma rgyal po dang lha chen gzhan gyi chung ma dgug pa/ da drug pa nas dgra bgegs dgug pa/ re lnga par pra se na/ re drug par lha chen dang rgyal po dgu gcing bcing ba sogs
86b1(rnying rgyud): brtan na// btang ba nas brgyad par drug pagags tha khams gzhan du bsrung pa dang / zhe drug par dang gnas kyisgra bskrad pa sngags kyi pa bstan/ dkrol ba da gas pa ni lazhwa las gzungs ma thang byung du bcug pa dgrol thabs dang smra bar ba dang san dang /
86b2(rnying rgyud): 'du par mang byung ba 'i zhes ngas sa dang / bdu na pa pas rabazhi chag pa 'i migs kyis gsu bsten/ bas pa'i dag par dra bzhigs pa susas kyis sa/ 'bas rgya 'phrulas gnyin
86b3(rnying rgyud): cig pa dang sgra dmyings tha can dang / 'dug par nya chen dang rgyal ba zla bzhi sgrub pa migs dang gyur bar byaste/ las dang than ma ga dngasatha pa rnams thams cad byug tun cig na kyiting 'a na 'dil brtad pa khyab sos byed ngas pa 'a
86b4(rnying rgyud): ngas grab bstan pa yid / bshad kyi'i labar kyi 'khrir la ba rnam pa dag sa dgapas pa nga ding bral ba dpas btsun pa gsus kyis byab ni sa sa byin la 'thar bshan te/ sa'is ba da gyu /
86b5(rnying rgyud): zhi du sa tha' bya sbyin gang gnyis lam/ das med bstan te/ rgyu 'phru kyil 'a / sa sbru la la nga rgyal ba ga ni nas bas shes 'du
86b6(rnying rgyud): na sum shrI yul du gas par gsal ba la/ bsgyu byubyugs rdzu sa pazhi'i rgya labram sa pa'i yon tu rdzogs pas gcig dang ma'i mtha' las grol ba'i phyir dang basbyin pas thal par byin byed kyil 'bar thams cad mangs su 'grub par 'gyur ro//
86b7(rnying rgyud): 'dini mtha theg ni 'bras dri ste/ lam rim le thu thu pa dang skyer // gnyis pa rgyas bgad ni/ dus gsum sags dang bcun te/ snong spyad thams cad su dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor drugs laban/ dras gsus kyi rgyal ba rnams kyid gangs pa
87a1(rnying rgyud): dang / de dag gis thugs su chud pa'i don yang yin la/ rnal 'byor pa'i blta ba'ang yin pa'i phyir/ thun mang gi grub pa las khyad par du gyur pa dngos grub mchog ces brjod pa gang gri bslab bya'i snying po 'di mngon du gyur ba'i yon tan na ngam/
87a2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis rtag pa'i phyir/ thob nas zad pa'i dus med pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mdzod lngar 'phel 'grib kyi 'gyur ba med par 'byung ba yin te/ don dam par dngos po'ang mtshan mar grub pa med pa'i ngang las gdul bya'i ngo dpol po ltar snang ba'i sprin gyi rol pa lha dang dkyil
87a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'a sogs pa dngos grub sna tshogs pa'i rnam par 'byung zhing / don mdza da pa'i phrin las cing yang 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni gnas skabs la ma gyur gyi 'bras bu ste/ lam rim le'u brgyad pa dang sbyor zhing / de'ang gzhung can gnyis po 'di med rgyas su 'jog pa'i
87a4(rnying rgyud): 'thad pa ni/ mchog dngos spyi la sbyor ba'i tshe gzhung snga mar 'ang don phun tshogs dang / phyi mar don gnyis phun tshogs gtso bor bstan pas phyi ma brjod bya rgyas par bzhed la yang gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi mchog dngos so sor sbyor ba na gzhung tshig mang nyung gis mdo rgyas
87a5(rnying rgyud): phu song ba yin gsungs so// gsum pa gzhung gsungs pa'i yon tan ni/ zhes brjod pas sogs te/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul drab sgrub pa'i rim pa'ang shes 'jug mthar phyin pa'i mtshan nyid gsum po der 'dus so zhes ched du brjod pas 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs
87a6(rnying rgyud): pa nyid ting nge 'dzin las dngos grub lnga tshogs yul med rang gsal du shar ba'i gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// gsum pa le'u'i mtshon ni/ gsang ba'i sogs te rgyud 'di la le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis su yod pa las 'dis zung 'jug lta 'phrul dra ba'i dngos su' thams
87a7(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / le'u drug pa la gsum ste/ lo rgyas dang / gzhung dang / mtshan no// dang po ni/ de nas de bzhin sogs te/ snga mar thabs gsum mdor bstan pa de nas gzhi dang bas
87b1(rnying rgyud): mi khyab kyi thabs gnyis las zhi ba lhag ting dang 'bras bu rang bzhin sgra'i dkyil 'khor gnyis rgyas par ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pas ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas thams
87b2(rnying rgyud): cad kyi spyi gzugs ston pas gdul bar bya ba'i yul 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ 'dul byed ston pa nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'byung bar bzhed nas 'khor gyi ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//
87b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa gzhung la gnyis te/ rgyas par bshad pa dang / bsdus te bstan pa'o// dang po la gsum ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dang / lhag pa ting nge 'dzin sku'i dkyil 'khor dang / rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin sku'i dkyil 'khor ro// dang po ni
87b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes phyogs sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin la phyogs ris ma grub kyang / yon tan gyi ldog cha nas mtshon bya ye shes lngar snang ba la/ mtshon byed phyogs bzhi dang dbus lnga'i tha snyad brtags te/ de ltar ye shes lnga'i dkyil
87b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor de nyid dmigs med bsam brjod kyi yul las 'das shing / mtha' yas pa'i chos thams cad kyi bya ba phyed du ma btsal bar lhun gyis grub pa ni rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying por ye nas rdzogs pa'i gnas lugs chos nyid rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po
87b6(rnying rgyud): de rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas chos kun 'byung ba'i gzhi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid ting nge 'dzin gyi yul du byas te goms shing 'dris par bslab pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i bya bas spyod cig pa'o// gnyis pa la gsum ste/ rten gzhal yas khang
87b7(rnying rgyud): brten pa lha/ dkyil 'khor gyi che ba bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ 'khor lo sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ 'og gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba la rdzogs pa'i ye shes rin po che'i gzhal yas khang bsgom pa ste/ de'ang ye shes lngas ma
88a1(rnying rgyud): reg pa gcod pa'i rtags su nang gi gzhi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi dbus kyi lte ba dang wa/ dri nyid kyang smos pa dang bral ba 'chos nyid du zlum pas rdo rnga ra pa'i ma/ khrud dang bcas pa/ de'i phyir bden pa bzhi mtshon pa'i bu chad bzhis brgyan pa
88a2(rnying rgyud): bden gnyis dbyer med mtshon pa'i bar khyams khor yug tu 'khor ba dang / che ba'i yon tan kun tu rgyas pa'i rtags su babyibs gru bzhi pa/ rnam thar bzhi mtshan pa'i sgo bzhi sgo khyud can chu 'bras kyi rta babs la sogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ gnyis su med pa'i
88a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi rtsal snang ma 'gags pa'i rol mo rtsig pa lnga skrag gi steng na mu tig gi dra ba dbyangs pa'i seng mgos bteg pa'i rin po che'i pha gu dang / phre phul gyi snam bur rin po che'i dra ba dang dA phyed/ bya 'dab las dbyangs pa'i shar bu/ steng ngos su pu shus mdzes pa/ gdus
88a4(rnying rgyud): 'phan tshul mtshan sogs rgyan sna tshogs pas kun tu 'khregs shing / 'dod yon ma spangs rgyan du shar bas gzugs rdo rje la sogs mchod rdzas thogs pa'i lha mo sprin phung bzhin du gtibs pa/ chos dbyings ye shes mtha' thug pa med pa'i ban rang lus phyur bu bum pa thus
88a5(rnying rgyud): sa rgya sa kyi rkyen zhesas sas/ yAnas rtags pa na pa'i pa'i dmas kya ngas napa dzin pa rab na nye rnam par s+ho/ gnyis pa la brgyan pa shad ga nyis las/ mdag tu / dkyil
88a6(rnying rgyud): sogs te/ gzhal yas khang de nyid mdzes byed bdag po'i rgyan lha'i dkyil 'khor rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis mdzes par brgyan pa ste// khang pa mdzes byed khyim bdag bzhin no// rgyas bshad la bzhi ste/ gdan gang la ji ltar bzhugs tshul/ bzhugs gnas
88a7(rnying rgyud): kyi khyad par/ 'dzin pa phyag mtshan/ u mdog gi tshul 'od dang bcas pa'o// dang po ni/ seng ge sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ gdan gyi khyad par mi 'jigs pa bzhi sogs mtshan byed dbus kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba dang rtsibs bzhir seng ge dang / glang chen dang / ha dang
88b1(rnying rgyud): dang / rnamam pa bri ga gang rnams rang yang sa cad bkya kyis pateg pa'i thaca pa la/ thabs shes nam dag tun ba'i bdu mas/ dang ga kyang da dgra thul 'anam kya'i khye dang nga mug 'dulas brtag par// na dmatha' la 'dis gyud dang /
88b2(rnying rgyud): gzhir na bya 'byung ba ni dbang gi khrir don rtags mtshungs pas 'dam kha ste/ rna byas dug dbang du byed pa ltar khyung gis kyang bu'i dug dbang du byed pa'i phyir ro// de ltar rigs lnga la srog chags dang rin po che'i khri nyi h+la pad+ma ste lnga brtsegs bshad cing / des gzhan rnams kyang
88b3(rnying rgyud): mtshon dgos te/ 'di ltar 'od rim las/ nyi na du skyes sum brtsegs sems// hrI n+yang khro la pad rgyang thub// bya byed kun bzang yab yum la// nyi zla pad+ma rin chen rgyas// zhes so// so so'i gdan de dag la bzhugs tshul ji ltar zhe na/ rigs lnga yab lngani don gnyis
88b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yum lnga ni rang don brtul nas gzhan don la zhugs pa'i phyir yab yum bcu po rgyal po'i tshul ltar de dang de'i skyil krung du bzhugs shing / sems dpa' rnams ni gzhan don gyi mdzad pa ma rdzogs pas yang rnams g.yas dang yum rnams
88b5(rnying rgyud): g.yon cung zad brkyang ba'i phyed skyil te blon po'i tshul dang / kun bzang yab yum ni mdzad pa rdogs shing dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bya phyed thabs shes mtshon pas rdo rje dang pad+ma'i skyi la krung / mthar byed yab yum ni dmag dpon gyi tshul ltar gdug pa can tshar gcod pas zha'
88b6(rnying rgyud): phyir gzigs nas kyad kyi dor stabs/ thub drug ni skad cig kyang mi gnas par 'gro don la gshegs pas bzhengs stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o// gnyis pa ni// 'khor lo rgyal po sogs rkang pas dman pa'i tshigs bcad gsum ste/ dbus kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba dang rtsibs
88b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi la rgyal po rigs lnga po rgyal mo yum lnga dang bcas pa'o// gtso bo zhal shar gzigs kyi g.yas nas brtsams te mdun kyab kyi g.yas g.yon du rim par 'ged pa'i nges pas/ shar lho dang / byang shar/ lho nub dang / nub byang bzhi'i rtsibs mtshan la rim pa ji lta
89a1(rnying rgyud): bar/ mthong bas nyid dang / thos pa ga rdong dang / sdom pa nam rnying dang / myong bstad ras gzigs dang bzhi btsun pa'ang ngas par gagam// gar ma/ zangam/ glum chags su bcas pa// de bzhin du byacha pa de dran rtogs g.yas
89a2(rnying rgyud): bskor gyis rim par/ mthong byed byams pa dang / thos byed sgrib sel dang / snol byed kun bzang dang / myong byed 'jam dpal rnams btsun mo gros ma/ me tog ma/ mar me ma/ dri chab ma'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas so// bar khyams la ni/ 'od rim las/ shar lho wa
89a3(rnying rgyud): nyo phyogs mi// lho nu ba nub byang ye dwags byol// byang dang byang shar lha min dmyal// zhes pa'i rim pa ltar phub bajug dang / gzhan yang bar khyams de'i shar dang nub ste gtso bo zhal shar gzigs kyi mdun dang rgyab kyi phyogs dag tu byed pa kun tu bzang po dang / bya ba bzang mo dag ni
89a4(rnying rgyud): gnas par bstan te/ de gnyis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bya byed du mtshon pa'o// yongs grags khams lugs pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs par bzhed pa ni mi rigs te/ bshad rgyud me long las/ khyams kyi mdun dang rgyab tu ni// kun bzang yab yum
89a5(rnying rgyud): nam ma pa'i mdog// ces gsungs pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro// sgo khyud bzhi la gdug pa can 'joms par byed pa'i khro bo shar sgo gshin rje gshed/ lhor stobs chen/ chub tu rta mgrin/ byang du bdud rtsi 'khril ba rnams ni rang rang gi btsun mo lcags kyi/ zhags pa/
89a6(rnying rgyud): lcags spob// dril bum bzhi'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas so// 'dir kha cig/ skyon pa kun bzang khyams la bkod pas gtso 'khor log pa'i skyon yod ces smrab ni/ rang gi rang bzhin gsal bar ston pa'i smre sngags shor ba ste/ rgyud 'chang ba po kho nas dkyil 'khor
89a7(rnying rgyud): gtso bo byed par ma nges pa'i phyir/ dper na 'jam dpal sgyu dra'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor ston pa shAka thub mi 'byung ba bzhin no// gsum pa ni/ rdo rje sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ ye shes sde mtshon pa rigs lnga'i rang nags kyi phyag mtshan ni/ mtha'i
89b1(rnying rgyud): rtag mi byed pa'i bdang ma brjod pa nga na/ kun lada'ang sbyar bas nam snang gi 'khor la/ rje ba'i yon dan sun gyis thub pas rin 'byung gadzin pa za/ gsal la ba chags par gzigs pas spang mtha'i baH/ 'byin las bzhis 'gro ba 'anyon mongs pa ga can
89b2(rnying rgyud): don lu kyi ral gri/ ye shes kyi yul dbyings kyi phyag tu dril bu ste thams cad kyang 'od 'bar ba can no// de yang ya ba lnga g.yas rang rtags thugs ka dang / gapon dril bu dpur brten pas yul la 'gyu cing / yum rdza po de las rdzog steg pas dril bus lab kyi dbu gsas
89b3(rnying rgyud): nas skad cing g.yon dang rtags thugs kar 'dzin pa'o// sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag mtshan ni/ 'jam dpal ni nyon mongs dag pas blo rgyas pa'i phyir um+b+hal/ byams pa ni gdung ba skyob pas blo shing 'dzin pa la sogs pas mtshan nas gzhan rnams kyang rang rtags
89b4(rnying rgyud): mad pa te/ ji skad na/ sa steng ni ye shes bskyed pa'i rin chen myu gu/ rnam snying ni nyon mongs pa gcod pa'i ral sri/ spyan ras gzigs ni skyon gyis mgos pas pad dkar/ phyag rdor na nyon mongs pa 'joms pas rdo rje/ sgribase la koni mongs pa chos nyid du
89b5(rnying rgyud): mkhyed pas 'khor lo/ kun bzang ni bskong bas rin chen zhe sa'o// 'dir gyi sems kyi mtha' thog nas brtsams te phyag mtshan sogs khongs thos pa gang zhe na/ gzhan drug po'i phyogs tshan rigs wa'i phyugasatshan du 'dres pa'i dbang du mdzad pa ste/ g.yon pa
89b6(rnying rgyud): dril bu bzhin no// sems ma brgyad ni mdzes pa'i mtshor sgeg gi tshul dang bcas te mnyes par byed pa'i mchod rdzas gzugs gsal ba'i me long dang / dri tshun mi chad pa'i phreng ba sogs rang rang gi ming dang mthun pa'i yo byad 'dzin pa ste/ sems dpa' brgyad po g.yon dril
89b7(rnying rgyud): dzu dbur brten cing yab yum phan tshun 'khyud tshul kyang sngang rigs lngar bshad pa bzhin no// skob bzhi ni/ byams pas zhe sdang tshar gcod pa dang / snying rjes sdug bsngal 'joms pa dang / dga' bas 'gro ba'i don mi gtong ba dang / btang snyoms kyis 'gro don mthar phyin
90a1(rnying rgyud): par mang dpas rgyags kyi shrIs ga gdengs pa la sogs pa dang / smras rnams cad med pa zhes 'grib rnam zugs rjes 'dzin pa dang / 'chid ba dang / me 'ar byur sdom pa dang / nyan mangs pa thal bar rdzog pas dka' bar ma rung /
90a2(rnying rgyud): phyir lcags kyu la sogs pa'o// kun bzang yab yum ni byed pas 'khor 'das mnyam nyid du mkhyen cing bya ba chos kun la khyab par gnas pas phyag mnyam bzhag go// thub drug ni/ sdom bzhi'i chos sgras nga rgyal 'joms par mdzad pas lha'i thub pa pi waM/ bzod pas
90a3(rnying rgyud): phrag dog sbyang mdzad lha min gyi thub pa go cha/ chags bral gyi lam gyis 'dod chags dag par mdzad pas pi'i thub pa gseg par/ gti mug sel phyir chos ston pas byol song gi thub pa pu ste/ bkres skoms sel bas ser sna dag byed yi dwags kyi thub pa rin chen sbom bu/
90a4(rnying rgyud): tsha grang ginyis dmigs bstan nas zhe sdang dag par mdzad pa dmyal ba'i thub pa me chu bskams pa'o// zhal phyag spos pa'i skabs 'dir rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum las/ rgyas pa ni yum rnams dang thub drug ma gtogs thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug par bshad rgyud rdo
90a5(rnying rgyud): rjer bshad cing / de las gzhan ru rigA lnga'i ma gtso bo tsam zhal gsum phyag drug par mdzad pa 'bring po thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis par mdzad pa bsdus pa ste/ 'dir bla ma rnams 'bring po rigs lnga zhal gsum phyag drug pa la phyag len mdzad pas/ de'i dbang du rdo rje
90a6(rnying rgyud): las/ rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// dril bu pad+ma rin po che// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rim pa'o// gzhan gang gnas su rdo rje shes// dang po thugs dang g.yon 'khyud pa'o// zhes pas mi bskyod pa'i phyag mtshan rdzogs par bstan nas rigs gzhan bzhi la g.yas dang por rang
90a7(rnying rgyud): rtags kyi phyag mtshan song ba'i shul du rdo rje spro ba khyad par ro// bzhi pa ni/ mthing ga sogs rkang pa drug ste/ de yang srem dog la rigs dang rigs 'dres pa'i kha dog gi nyis las/ dang po rigs kyi sku mdog ni nyer gsum ste/ le'u dang por bshad pa ltar rigs lnga ye shes
90b1(rnying rgyud): na du langs par byas te/ ma badzud/ zad pa/ phyag dra rnams sas yum gcas/ gamin gyi thub pa dang badran ni mab+h+ring ba// rnam sang dang / sa rnyeng yum pa cas/ zhwa thub pa dang na kar ba// byung dang/ 'a ting sums pa/ ba pang /
90b2(rnying rgyud): wa ni ser po/ snang mtha' dang snyan ras gzigs yum bcas bzhi nI le brgan te dmar po/ don grub yab yum gnyis ni ljang bu'o// gnyis pa de la sogs pa'i khengs nas rig sa gnyis 'bres sna tshogs pa'i sku mdog ni bzung pa ste/ byams pa dkar ber len pa
90b3(rnying rgyud): sogs su chad kyi gyi sems bzhi yab yum bye bas brgyad ni phyogs gnyis 'dres kyi kha dog dang / shar sgo la sogs pa'i 'joms pa yab yum brgyad ni srug ser dmar ljang bzhi'i kha dog nag po dang 'dres pa dang / thub drug las byol sor dmar nag/ yi dwags ser nag
90b4(rnying rgyud): dmyal bdung la'o// zhi ba'i tshul dbuni/ zhwa de dag kyang nga rgyal gnas su dag pas sle shas nyen pa/ zhe sdang dag pas yan lag lhag pa'am dbu sa pas rjed cing 'tshams pa/ 'dod chags dag pas thabs shes phan tshun 'grel ba'am zil brag chags pas sra
90b5(rnying rgyud): nyod por ma gyur pa/ phrug dog dag pas su drang zhing ldem pa/ gti mug dag pas sgra gzhon sha chags pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma rig pa spangs pas su gtsang zhing gsal ba/ ye shes rgyas pas bzag cing 'tsher ba/ mtshan dpe rdzogs pas brjid cing yid du 'ong bas
90b6(rnying rgyud): sman sdug pa/ che ba'i yon tan gyis thams cad zil gyis gnon pas garje byin chen po dang ldan pa ste/ sngam lda byi bo'i yon tan dang / gyi ma bzhinam pa'i yon tan no// su de dag las 'od ji ltar 'gro ba ni/ zhi ba rnams kyi baspu'i bug re re nas kyang gsal zhing dag par
90b7(rnying rgyud): 'di zer dkar ser dmar sngo btsod la dngul mdog dang drug po re re las kyang bye ba phrag drug drug phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po'i sdang bas khyab par byed cing / khro ba rnams la me ltar 'bar zhing rdo ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun tu 'khrigs pa'i grong na bzhugs pa ste/ gar
91a1(rnying rgyud): dgu'i nyams kyis sgeg pa'o// 'phros don rgyan gyi khyad par la/ rigs lnga dang / sems dpa' yab yum/ bya byed rnams ni/ gdul bya'i nyon mongs pa'i gdung bsrel ba'i brdar lha rdzas las grub pa'i dar gyi chas gos lnga dang / 'dod
91a2(rnying rgyud): yon ma spangs rgyan du rdzogs pas 'gro ba'i re bskong ba'i brdar rin po che'i rgyan brgyad de/ gyan chas bcu gsum mo// thub drug ni gang 'dul gyi gzugs su rnam par ston kyang 'khor ba'i chags pas mgos pa'i brdang tshangs par spyod pa'i cha lugs can dang / khro bo yab yu ma ni
91a3(rnying rgyud): dpang rtags kyi rgyan dur khrod kyi chas brgyad do// gsum pa dkyil 'khor gyi che ba ni/ mtha' dbus sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ mtha' dang dbus 'di zhes dmigs su med par chos thams cad la khyab pa'i chos nyid gzhi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bsam brjod las 'das pas
91a4(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas pa'i gnas rmugs de nyid rtogs don sgom pa'i thabs lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor la goms par bslabs pa'i mthus 'bras bu rang bzhin ldan gyis sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsum pa rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dkyil
91a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bzhi ste/ spu'i mtshan nyid/ sku'i 'phrin las/ 'bras bu thob tshul/ de gsungs pa'i yon tan no// dang po ni/ sku yi phyag rgya sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te/ 'bras bu che ba'i yon tan b+hi rten byed pas na skya ste/ de yang mthar thug gi 'bras bu sku lnga
91a6(rnying rgyud): ldan gyis grub pa las mi 'dadra' zhing gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyag rgya ches che ba'i mchog ni rigs drug pa rgyal ba spyi'i gzugs can nyid yin la/ sku gcig po de las su lngar snang ba ni/ gzhi chos dbyings de bzhin nyid zung 'jug spos bral gyi ye shes las ma
91a7(rnying rgyud): g.yos pa'i blag sa kyi spyo/ datu mig pas kyang gnyis pagacags pa cas pa las pa dag par byeng pa gzugs sru ga pa'i dul byal chu nga shung byengs mi pa pa dbus pa shi ngas sa pa sas par
91b1(rnying rgyud): spyong pa'i ldag na sangs su dang / gdul byang 'grob ma lus pa dngos brgyad ci rigs par 'dral ba'i phyir/ dengag gi bsam pa dang mthun par byas pa zhwa'i bkod pa nig zug kra ma ngas par nga tshogs suston pa'i thog bani sprul ba'i smra'o// dbang don pa nyid kyang dang
91b2(rnying rgyud): ma'i ma meg yor gyi tshul dang 'dra bar gzugs su gnyis su sdang ba'i tshul de nyid kyang dbyings nas kyi sgra las g.yos pa med pas sgra gsum dbyer mi skyed pa'i sdig pa ni rje'i sgyu'o// de ltar chos skulas ma g.yos bzhin du gdul bya'i las dang mthun par su rna rdzogs rje
91b3(rnying rgyud): bas sra gsum snang cha ma 'dres par go 'byed pa'i ldog pa ni mngon byang gi sla'o// gnyis bsku'i 'phrin las la gnyis te// spu de ltar snang ba'i tshul dang / wa'i mdza par// dang po na/ da tshe mi mthun sa gas nang pa Sha b+he/ swa lwa wAn gyis grub pa do ci gdul
91b4(rnying rgyud): bya'i bral ba mi mthun pa cwa tshogs la 'dul byed kyi skyes pa gas dang 'dra bar snang btsud bzhin byed kyi dang las rtsol bsam bcos krung gdul bya rang rang gi sal pa dang sngon gyi las 'phrong dbang gis spros sor sdang bste/ dper ni gzugs gcig nyid mi gong du ma'i na sa
91b5(rnying rgyud): so sor 'char ba'am/ chu ldod du par zla gzugs gcig nyid so sor 'char ba bzhin no// de ltar yang phal po che las/ zla ba dbyings las ma 'phos kyang // chu yi snod du ldang ba ltar// de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos par// sprul pa bya ba bsam mi/ khyab// ces sa//
91b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa phra'i mdzad pa ni/ de tshe'i gro drug sogs nang pa ban+d+ha s+t+waM/ spung ltar snang nas don mdzad pa de'i tshe lha dang mi sogs 'gro drug gi sems can thamal pa thams cad la 'dul byed sdig spong gi gzugs brgya sbyin dang 'khor los sgyur gyi la sogs su rnam par bstan nas do/
91b7(rnying rgyud): mdzad cang / de bzhin du dge tshul gris mtshon pa'i nyan thos kyi rigs can rnams la nyan thos dgra bcom pa'i gzugs dang / rang rgyal gyi rigs can rnams la bse bu lta bu rigs mthun pa'i tshul du bstan nas don mdzad do// de las gzhan yang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
92a1(rnying rgyud): theg pa mchag pa gas par dam la sathab pa sogs 'du thud smyan pa'ang gdul ba dbang pa'i rim pa bas du bkun nas 'dul ba ni sngal gA ma da pag/ gangs sa pa na/ gnasas pa 'gas ma nga'i bam
92a2(rnying rgyud): gzugs khams las 'phags pa'i mchog tu ston pa nges pa longs sgra rnam par snang mdzad man po'i tshul gyis/ 'khor nges pa sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' ste 'phags pa'i 'khor rnams la dus nges pa rtag pa rgyan gyi 'khor lor chos ston te/ de'i tshul ni
92a3(rnying rgyud): sbrul sku bzhin du chos rnams gsung mchog tshig tu mi swa ste/ 'on ji ltar ston ni chu'i badz+ra yis chos nges pa theg pa chen po nyid 'khor rnams kyi sgrol 'jal bar ston no// gsum pa 'bras bu thob tshul la gnyis te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dang / gsang sngags
92a4(rnying rgyud): kyi thob tshul lo// dang po la gnyis las/ sgrib pa sbyangs pas grol tshul ni/ me long bstan pa'i sogs rkang pa bdun te/ ji ltar me long bstan pa'i nang du byad kyi dri ma snang ba'i tshul gyis byang dngos kyi mdog bzang po ngan par bsgyur ba'i dri ma thams cad ngos zin nas/
92a5(rnying rgyud): gdod sel bar byed pa de bzhin du 'khor sa bcu'i byang sems rnams kyis ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi skur bltas pa na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub la sgrib par byed pa'i dri ma gting dpag med pa rnams me long la snang ba bzhin du ston pa'i skul snang bas rang chung
92a6(rnying rgyud): kyi sbyang bya'i dri ma dos zin pa'o// de yang thog mar tshogs lam gsum du tshogs pasags pas gtso bor zos bas ma la brten pa'i shes rab kyis bdag med gnyis don skye'i tshul du rtogs shing / tshogs lam chen po thob nas sangs rdzas sprul pa'i sgra las
92a7(rnying rgyud): gdams ngagatan/ sbyor lam bzhir 'jig tan pa'i bsgom thung gi ye shes la dngos su zhugs pas gzung 'dzin gyi rnam tog rags pa rnams rim par bcom nas/ 'dog rten pas 'das pa'i ye nas sngar sa mthong ba gsar mthong bas d+mo ba tam
92b1(rnying rgyud): sa sa// mas na ga sa sa na sa la/ rnan pa
92b2(rnying rgyud): badra thA rabasas bcu'i mi mthun phyogs rnams par byon bcu dang sa'i yongs su skyong bas rim gyis 'byung ba ste dag pas/ sa dang por yon tan bcu phrag bcu gnyis dang / de nyid sa gnyis par stor 'gyur/ gsum par btu stong / bzhi par 'ag /
92b3(rnying rgyud): khrag zig phrag stong / drug par khrag khrig phrag brgya skyong / bdun par bye ba zag khrig brgya stong / brgyad par stong gsum brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul sted/ dgu par sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul steng / bcu par sangs rgyas kyi zhang /
92b4(rnying rgyud): du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul snyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal blta ba dang / chos nyan pa sogs skad cig re re la ston par nus pa yin no// de lta ra sa bcu rgyan gyi tha ma la mdo sde rkyen las/ sgom pa tha ma thob nas ni// 'od zer men po
92b5(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur ro// zhes pa ltar 'od zer chen po'i dbang bsgyur bas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste shes sgrib phra ba bag la nyal gyi dri ma bcom nas blan med pa'i byang chub kun tu 'od kyis yang dag par thob bo// gnyis pa de ltar thob pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo sku gsum ni/ chos
92b6(rnying rgyud): sa sogs gang shA gsus te/ dag pa gnyis ldan chos kyi sgrani spros dpag tu med cing ngag gis brjod du med de nam mkha' lta bu'o// de'i ngang las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i suni rtag tu zad pa med pa nor bu ni chen gyi gter dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa dang / sbal pa'i su ni gang
92b7(rnying rgyud): gang 'dul gyi sku'i bkod pa bya ba phrag bcu sogs bsam gyis mi khyab pasna tshogs par bstan nas don mdzad do// gnyis pa sngags kyi thob tshul la'ang gnyis las/ mthar thug gi sa'i khyad par ni/ mtshan dang dge bud sogs dang pa lnga te/ sngags thabs
93a1(rnying rgyud): sa su ma sa sa sa sug zugs nga na rgyu sa/

93b1(rnying rgyud): gteras gyur ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sra'o// sku gsum dbyer mi byed pa'i rdo rje rang rig pa'i dang du 'dra 'bral med par 'dzin pa'i spyan rdo rje'i mu'o// chos thams cad rig pa'i ye shes su dbyer med pas mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i phyir sgra gsum snang cham 'dres par
93b2(rnying rgyud): sbyang ba'i sgra ni mngon byung ngo // chos can de snyed pa thams cad ma 'dres par mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis gdul bya'i mos ngong brtan g.yo sna tshogs pa'i rnam par ston pa'i rtsa ni sprul pa'i sku ste// mthar thug thun mong ma yin pa'i sa thob pa de'i tshe sgal po de dag kun kyang rdzogs pu
93b3(rnying rgyud): babs lnga phyi med de/ sri ba bral mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes nyid yon tan gyi rten byed pa'i ldog pa nas sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyis dang / mi slob pa'i lam zhes sas/ rang byung gyi rig par gnas pa'i chanas ye shes dang / nges don mdzad pa'i chanas phrin las zhem mom
93b4(rnying rgyud): btags na'ang ngos bu mi dad par gcig pa'i phyir ro// bzhi pa gsungs pa'i yon tan ni/ zhes brjod pas sogs te/ rang bzhin lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi don de skad ces brjod pas gdul bya'i yul 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i zhing mtha' yas su med pa thams ca
93b5(rnying rgyud): du 'dral byed spu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par rol pa brjod kyis mi lang bgyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul snyed rang rig pa'i yul du gsal zhing snang bar gyur to// gnyis pa bsdus te bstan pa la gsum ste/ ma gyis brjod pa/ bsrab dngos/ gas
93b6(rnying rgyud): mtshon pa phyogago// dang pon/ de nam sogs te/ rgyas par bstan pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa ya ba rnams yul brjon po'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs dka' ba gsang badza nyid ston pa'i d+ha sogs ba byung sa byung ba
93b7(rnying rgyud): las byung ngo // gnyis pa ni/ a hoHdmigs bya sogs te/ rang bzhin ma byas pa las rol pa'i gag med la ma deng 'bras bu sgra'i dkyil 'khor du gsal ba la a ho zhes ngo mtshar ba ro// de'ang dmigs byang dbyings dang dmigs byad rang rig gnyis dbyar ma
