94a3(rnying rgyud): nga lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rten dang badzin par bcas pa rnam pa tshogs brjod kyis mi lang bar dang
94a4(rnying rgyud): dang // mi mnyam par tha dad du 'dzin pa ma dag pa'i gdul bya ste/ de dag kun la rgyal ba drug pa'i phrin las kyis khyab par don mdzad pa'i dus na/ gdul bya'i yul de dag chos nyid las gzhan du ma gyun pa'i phyir khya byed medapas gnyis
94a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings rnam par dag pa ste/ sku'i mtshan nyid dang phrin las/ rgyu'i 'bras bu 'thob tshul/ sngags kyi mthar thugs 'i khyad par bstan pa rnams bsdu'o// ye nas su po kun kyang bde ba chen po'i sgra las ma 'gags par ra gsal pa'i dkyil kho rnam pa sbas
94a6(rnying rgyud): tsam nyid nas spros pa'i mtshan ma med pa ste/ sngags kyi 'bras bu su lnga bstan pa dang // de gsungs pa'i yon tan gnyis bsdu'o// de ltar bsdus pa'i don la hoHzhes mnyes pa'o// gsum pa ni/ zhes rdo rje sogs te/ dkyil 'khor gsum gyi don de skad ces rdo rje 'dzin pas
94a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag pos tshig tu bsdus pa'o// gsum pa le'u'i mtshan ni/ gsang ba'i sogs te/ rgyud 'di la le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis su yod pa las/ 'dis ting 'dzirda lhag pa'i ting 'dzin gnyis dang / 'bras bu rang bzhin su'i dkyil 'khor spros nas bstan pa'i le'u ste drug
94a8(rnying rgyud): 'o// / parje bdun pa la gsum te/ lo gas dang / gzung dang / mtshan no// dang po'i/ de na ma de bzhin sogs te/ sgra'i dkyil 'khor brtan paden ti dang 'bras bu rang bden pa sung gi dkyil 'khor gnyis rton du'i phyi 'a du gshegs pa yang
94b1(rnying rgyud): yum btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dbyed kyi byed pa'i nog las gsung gsang ljags kyi gsang ba 'di dag phyung ngo // gnyis pa gzhung la gnyis te/ lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang / rang bzhin gsung gi dkyil 'khor te/
94b2(rnying rgyud): dang po lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'chad pa'i skabs 'dir zhi ba'i 'phrin las sgom rim gyi thebs cung zad brjod par bya ste/ de la sngon 'gro// dngos gzhi/ rjes kyi rim pa dang gsum las/ sngon 'gro la'ang bdun te/ dang po gral phyag dang tshul sdug bya ga/ ga
94b3(rnying rgyud): pa yan lag brgyad pas rgyun sbyang ba/ gsum pa mtshon chad 'tshig/ las rgyal po lnga'i phyag kyis mtshams bcad pa/ bzhi pa 'dzod med kyi bshags pa bya ba/ lnga pa pun+d+ha ri ka'i rgyud las gsungs pa ltar dam bcad nyi shu pa bya ba/ drug pa bab drug 'das bzhi'i dgongs
94b4(rnying rgyud): pas bdag gnas yo byad rnams la byin dbab pa/ bdun pa rtsi nang gi mchod pa rnams byin gyis rlob pa ste sgrub thabs kyi las byang ltar bya'o// gnyis pa dngos gzhi la gnyis las/ dang po khyad par gyi sbyor ba sems bskyed pa ni/ bdag dang mtha' yas sogs kyis kun
94b5(rnying rgyud): rdo ba dang / le'u gnyis pa'i e ma mtshar lngas don dam pa'i sems bskyed pa'o// gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dngos la gsum ste/ ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis khog dbub pa/ rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa/ las kyi rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin no// da
94b6(rnying rgyud): po snang stong so so tha dad kyi zhen rtog sbyong phyir le'u lnga par gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum tshig rin chen dra bltar dang / brtan pa'i yan lag tu rgyu'i a las yi ge phra mo'i spro bsdu la sems sbyong ba le'u bzhi pa ltar ro// gnyis pa la/ dbyung lnga'i zhen rtog skyong phyir
94b7(rnying rgyud): sgrub thibs ltar yum lnga'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin gzhi dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa/ ma dag pa'i snod bcud kyi snang zhe na skyong phyir sa bon b+h+rUM las rten gzhal yas khang dang / le'u bzhi pa ltar yi ge zhe gnyis spros pa las cho ga gsum gyis
95a1(rnying rgyud): pa ba skas kyis 'kha/ 'dir bragang pung brgyad gas kyis bskyed cing / la'u jug pa ltang phyog gas gsal gA ba/ rags mthun rtsa las la dbang 'gyur ba dang gagasung du stobs 'phel ba'i zheg tog spyor phyir dbang bsrur byed/
95a2(rnying rgyud): rlabs 'di nas bshad pa ltar bya ba rnams so// gsum pa las kyi rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jug las/ dang po 'khor 'das tha dad gyi zhon pa spyang phyir ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la stan gsan dbab cing / bug blangs pa la rig pa'i me tog dor nas dbyer med du bstim pa rnams
95a3(rnying rgyud): nas bshad pa ltar ro// gnyis pa phyag dang mchod pa bcu gsum dbul ba/ gsum pa bshags pa bya ba/ bzhi pa dngos grub gsol ba/ lnga pA dam bca' ba/ thug pa 'dzag khang phye nas dam ye gro 'du gsum gsal bas ngag gi zhen po rkyong ba dang lha'i thugs dam
95a4(rnying rgyud): bskal ba'i phyir 'dzab bzla zhing skabs kyi mjug bsdu ba rnams sgrub thabs ltar ro// gsum pa rjes kyi rim pa la lnga ste/ dang po bsod nams sel phyir rdzogs kyi mchod sbyin/ gnyis pa las 'chol phyir brtan mthong ba/ gsum pa rtag cad cim tha bsamartsi da
95a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsdu zhing thun mtshams kyi lhar ldang ba/ bzhi ba par chad kyi rgyun gcod phyir go pago lus bsrung / lnga pa spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir khyod lamathun gyi rnal 'byor bsrung ba rnams kyang grub thabasna ltar ro// da ni dbyes nyid la 'jug ste/ lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gsung gi
95a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor la gsum/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i sngags/ ye na dkyil 'khor dgug bstim gyi sngags/ de'i yon tan no// dang po la gsum ste/ rten gzhal yas khang babyed pa'i/ brten pa lha bskyed pa'i/ dbang bskur byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags so// dang /
95a7(rnying rgyud): po ni/ b+h+rUM bi shra bi shud+d+he/ zhes pa'i sbyi ni rigs lnga 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang gis bon/ bi pra n+da tshegs/ bi kud+ha rnam par dag pa na zhes pa ste/ 'byung lnga'i rtog pa sna tshogs yum lnga'i mkha' dbyings su rnam par dag bgazhal yas khang bskyed pa'i sngags te/ thal
95b1(rnying rgyud): skams // ya ga sa / ga na/ / sa ma thag sa
95b2(rnying rgyud): drug ga zugs so// dang dzin/ hU~M badz+ra d+hi/ sogs te/ rigs kyi yang lha'i sngags kyi go 'dren rje oM hrI A~M trA~M rnam pa ni thugs me pyod pa sogs kyi rigs kyis po te/ rdzas ni rabs pa'i sngags so// bang do / thig 'dzin pa ste/ rnam shes dag pa byang chung kyi gyur
95b3(rnying rgyud): 'jug dbyer mi phyed pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa mi bskyod pa ste/ de'i bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags so// sa bon dang bskyed sngags bsgril ba ni bzlas pa las kyi sngags te thams cad la 'gre shes par bya'o// dzin ngog rgyal baN+Dal te/ dbyings smos bral ni me dge ba'i chos las rgyal zhing /
95b4(rnying rgyud): las shar ba'i 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur gyi gzugs kyang rgyal ba'i skur dag pasbyin ma sdang / rat+na d+h+r-i ka rin chen 'dzin pa ste/ bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed pas sems yon tan rin po che'i dbyung gnas de nyid nyams su song bas 'dzin par byed pa tshor phur dag pa rin 'byung /
95b5(rnying rgyud): A ro lika chags chen mtshon te/ sems 'dod cing rtsen pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon byed mtshan mar 'dzin pa 'du shes dag pa snang mtha'/ pradz+nyA tI ka shes rab 'dzin pa ste/ rnam shes don la phyin ci ma phog par 'jug pa'i blo ni shes rab/ de 'dzin par byed pa 'du byed dag pa
95b6(rnying rgyud): don grub kyi bskyed sngags so// de ltar yang gsang 'bras las// rdo rje 'dzin dang rgyal ba'i rgyal// rin chen 'dzin dang chags chen mtshon// shes rab 'dzin pa zhes bya ste// zhes dang / nang ltar na snyibag chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa las rigs lnga'i thig le'i bdud 'dzin pa
95b7(rnying rgyud): bal tsun mas// // khams spa shing la// dong rgyal badzin can chos// shes rab rigs ldan brgyad kyi gzugs// dzes par 'dzin pa gsang ba'i sngags// zhe mo// rigs rje'i gros kyi sngags kyi 'go rjen/ ts+tsha ts+tshi gyis po namam
96a1(rnying rgyud): cad dang / 'ag kyims dag ga
96a2(rnying rgyud): du // dang sa nga sa pa seM nga/
96a3(rnying rgyud): gdang
96a4(rnying rgyud): 'i sa
96b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka dgyes pa'i mchog tu bshad// ha dang si yi bde sgra dang // bdag gi chags pa thob pa'o// shin tu bskyod pa'i bde ba nyid// kun nas bskyod pa drung zhes bya// zhes so// gnyis pa gyi sems yab yum gyi sngags ni/ me d+hA ra Ne sogs te/ me ni me dri byams pa'i
96b2(rnying rgyud): ming gi dang po sa bon/ d+hA ra Ne gzungs la/ zhes pa ste byams pas rjes su 'dzin pa/ b+hI sle bsel gyi bsdus pa'i sa 'on/ ni wa raM b+ha ya dang spel bas sgrib pa bsal ba'i ched du/ hUM byang chub sems kyis bon/ sa rA dza ya'i sa ni sa~Mm na ste kun dus rgyal po'i ched du zhes
96b3(rnying rgyud): kun bzang / mu~M ni mr-i ste rnam par grol ba mtshon pa'i sa bon/ shrI dpal I gsung gi/ rA gA ya chags pa'i ched du skye 'jam dpal/ bzhi ka'i nA/ tha bA hA ni yon tan khyad par can las dang sbyar ba'i ming so so de dang de'i ched du gzhi 'dzugs pa'i legs par phyin zhes pa'o//
96b4(rnying rgyud): yum bzhi'i sa bon dzaHhUM baM hoHbzhi ni bzung 'khyud sdom mnyes te phyag rgya bzhi'i sa bon/ d+hU pe bdug spos ma/ puSh+pe me tog ma/ dI pa blon me/ gan+d+he br-i ma zhes so so'i ming dang / mthar snyoms 'jug gi sbyor tshad bzhi rim par sbyor te/ pra be sha rang du zhugs pa/ a
96b5(rnying rgyud): be sha babs pa/ su gi dI bde ba ma/ tsit+ta thugs te sems tshim pa'o// de'ang thal chud las/ gnyis 'dres dngon pa zhes bya ste/ de nyid phye ba las byung ba'o// me tog bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid// bdag po'i zhal du thim par bshad// shin du bsdam pa'i rim las byung /
96b6(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i ye shes bde che// kun gsal brjod dang 'dra ba'i sgra// gnyis med thugs su shes par bya// zhes so// gsum pa ni/ hU~M ya mAn+ta gr-ita sogs te/ khro bo bzhi'i 'go 'dren hUM bzhi ni spyi'i rigs kyis khyab bya'i rigs bzhi la zhugs pa'i snga bon/ ya ma gshin rje
96b7(rnying rgyud): dang / pradz+nyA shes rab dang / pad+ma skad song bzhag dang / bih+la bgegs te/ so so'i mthar an+ta kr-ita te mthar byed ces sbyar ba ming dang / phaT bkas pa'i don de bkas par gyis shes las la sbyar ba'i sbal tshig po// yum bzhi'i 'ogo 'dren oM bzhi ni rang bsngags
97a1(rnying rgyud): ta spyi'i sa bon/ ma ldan po// badz+rad rnapa d+ma/ ma bzhin rdorje rin rkyen pad+ma las/ d+hur 'chang ba/ mthu ldan pa kr-id+hA hU~M khro mo'i dbang phyug sa/ ljin 'bar pa sa ta/ rdo rim rgyan so gas mang rgyan po zhes pa thabs dang /
97a2(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i dbang phyug ma zhes pa shes rab kyi ming so so'i mthar/ hUM bzhi khyab byed zhugs pa'i rigs kyi snying po dang / phaT bsngal tshig sbyar ba'o// bzhi pa ni/ hUM hUM hU~M sogs te/ hU~M gsum ni kun gzhi rdo lnga yid kyi rnam shes gsum 'das pa ye shes kyi sa bon/ badz+ra
97a3(rnying rgyud): tsit+ta rdo rje thugs/ oM thabs kyi snying po ste byed pa po kun bzang / a gsum ni shes pa gsum gyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyi sa bon/ badz+rI b+ha dra sa maN+Da d+ho rje kun tu bzang mo/ u ni shes rab kyi snying po ste bya ba mo'i sngags so// de'ang bal rgyud las/ rnam shes gsum 'das
97a4(rnying rgyud): ni// zhes 'jogs grags nyid do// dbye sagasus rnam dag 'dris ma rgyas// na dru ba'in gnas byeng ba'o// zhes so// ljib/ oM thun gyi sogs te/ oMrnams der ba 'a ba te phyag 'tshal ba'is pan/ chu nirigasu rtsub pa/ sngon byed pa
97a5(rnying rgyud): dod yon gyi byed pas wAg pa lha'i sa bon/ hU~M rjen go/ cha bkod pa d+ha min gyis bon/ sku nisar 'khyil ba ste dkyil cheb mi sa bon/ ni hoste 'dud pa'i don gyis dud 'gro'i sa bon/ k+ShaM ni k+Shar ste dngos snar 'gyur bas gdung ba yi dwags kyi sa bon/ ye ni gang yang
97a6(rnying rgyud): rung bar khrid pas dmed pa'i gnas su gyur pa skye dmyal ba'i sa bon/ sA hA ni 'gro ba'i rigs de dang de'i bag chags zhi ba'i ched du gzhi 'dzugs pa'i don no// nang ltar ni snying gar rigs drug gis bon zung gsum gnas pa bde ba chen pos rang rig pa'i ye shes sugs pa/
97a7(rnying rgyud): banam rig pa gnyis las byung ba'i 'khor ba'i bag chags 'phrul ba ste/ thal chud las/ si bin zung gsum de bdeb// nges kyis rang rig gyur ba las// gnyis byung 'dul bas thub par gsungs// zhes so// gsum pa dbang bskur byin gyis rmothong /
97b1(rnying rgyud): sngags la gsum ste/ lo chus/ sngags dngos/ de'i yon tan no// dang po ni/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nas phyung ngo zhes pa'i bar te/ dkyil 'khor bskyed pa de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba byed phyogs dus bdag zugs thams cad dang mi rtsa pa'i rdo rje
97b2(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi yab lnga dang / spyad bya'i yul bya ba mo rdo rje yum lnga'i rnam par rang gi thugs ka'i dngas ma'i srog hUM yig gi 'od kyis spyan drangs pa rnams gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i rjes chags kyi mes thub ye shos lnga'i chu rgyun dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi dbu' gnas lnga la
97b3(rnying rgyud): thim par mdzad do// de ltar dbang bskur bas nyon mongs pa lnga sbyangs nas chu lung pa dbang gnas su 'khyil pa las phyogs bcu dus bzhi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid chen po rang rigs bdag por gyur pa'i rigs lnga stsal gru'i cha byad can gyis
97b4(rnying rgyud): dbu brgyan cing / phung lnga bdag nyid chen po'i rang bzhin du dag pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su du rgyal 'dzin pa ste/ 'dir rigs kyi dbyed ni/ thal ba las/ mi bskyod byed do yum dang bcas// dzin pa'i phyag rgyar bstan// byam
97b5(rnying rgyud): pas snying de bzhin nyid// gzhan dag rang gi phyag rgyas te// gshin rje gshed la rtag par bshad// thung chen rdo rje 'dzin 'chad pa// zhes pas mi bskyod pa yab yum rdo rje'i rigs yin pa'i shugs kyis/ snang mdzad de bzhin rigs/ rin 'byung rin chen/
97b6(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas bad+ma/ don grub las rigs yin par mtshon cing / nga bzhin du bya byed dang thub drug kyang rdo rje'i rigs te/ rkang pa dang po gnyis dang drug pa'i don no// sa snying dang byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin pa'i shugs kyis/ nam snying dang sgrib
97b7(rnying rgyud): sel rin chen/ snga na sa gzigs dang kun pa'ang bad+ma/ phyag dor dang 'jam dpal las rags yin par mtshon te/ rkang pa gsum pa'i don no// gshi rje gshed rtag pa rnam sdang gi rigs yin pa'i thugs / spo bar byed na zer/ madz+ra na pad+ma/
98a1(rnying rgyud): pa las rigs te/ rkang pa lnga pa'i don dang / rkang pa bzhi pas ni mgyon byed dngos su smos pa'i thugs las mtshon bu gzhan rnams mngon pa'i tshig go// mdor na kyis grang yin ze lha la rang rigs ma 'dag pa dbus su song ba
98a2(rnying rgyud): drordo rje'i rigs 'gro ba'ang shes par bya ste/ de dag ni dbang bsrung ba'i dgongs pa dang / yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'bras chos lnga'i byin bsdupa 'ad gongs pa ni/ lci'o dung khang du za ba la mo dkar po/ mgrin par pad+ma la Ad mar po/ ngags kar
98a3(rnying rgyud): 'i mdun du nyi sa lu hU~M sngon po/ lte ba'i g.yas g.yonang zab la sa sngon po dang hA lja bu rnams las 'thos pa'i dod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cung kyi thugs chung bsngal/ rdo rje sa'i lha'i rnam par spya drangs pa yi ga so sa pa this pas sangs rgyas thams
98a4(rnying rgyud): kyis ga sung dugs yon ta drin las dang gnyis su med par byed kyis bairdebs pa'i dwagaso yi ge lnga yongs su gyur pa las rnam ldang dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin pa sogs de bzhin gshegs pa lus rgyas btab pa dang las pa ste/ rgal pA la pheM/ gnas ga
98a5(rnying rgyud): 'dragayog las// 'od zer 'gro ba'i tshogs chen pos// khams gsum byin rlabs karbaM byin palnga// rang bzhin rdo rje gsum gnas pa// chu gnyis tshul gyis dang sdang ba'o// skye ba rnam gnyis thab la// sgo lngang yi ge swA hA gnyis// rjes mthun
98a6(rnying rgyud): yon tan las// yan lag rdzogs pa'i gzidzin ldan// zheba'o// da ltar dbang dang rnangasu pa zhesartsa pa'i gsang rdzogs 'di dag ston pa'i skye dang gi sang dang phyug/ mi bye dang 'ordo rje thabs shes zung 'brel spu 'phrul rngub las snang ngo // gnyis pa la gnyis te/ dbang
98a7(rnying rgyud): bzung ba dang / phyin gyi thob pa'i chags so// dang pon/ oM ma hA ngogs te/ yor ba bsngags/ mduchen po// su byung stong pa nyid/ ad nam yong snang/ me mnyam pa nyid/ pabye brjes song rtog pa/ 'ang kun bya bgrub pa/ dz+nyAn brjes
98b1(rnying rgyud): shes rdoH/ pA b+ha ba rang bzhin na mngo bo nyid/ At+ma kaHbdag nyid/ a hi ste/ mtshams sbyar bas At+ma ko hA hi zhes 'byung bas/ rab bsngags stong pa nyid sogs kyi ye shes chen po rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid pa'o zhes so// 'dir dbang ldani/ leT brgyad/
98b2(rnying rgyud): par gsungs pa lhar gung mo rdo rje'i rigs yin pa sogs nges par byas te/ rdo rje bsnams pa las rang rigs kyi ser mo gnyis sbyar nas brkyang ba spyi bo sogs mgo bo'i gnas lngar 'dog cing / de'ang rang rigs kyi phyag rgya dbus su gang song gi shul du rdo rje'i rigs kyi
98b3(rnying rgyud): dbang du 'gro ba'ang shes par bya'o// gnyis pa ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sogs te/ oM rab bsngags/ sarba thams cad/ ta thA ga ta desazhin gshegs pa/ mahA chen po/ kA ya swa/ lA ka gsung / tsita thugs/ a du rA ga Na rjes su chags pa
98b4(rnying rgyud): ngo mchod pa/ ba'i rdorje/ swa b+hA ba Ad+ha ko&haM sngar bzhin te/ rab bsngag sang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su sogs rdo rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid nga'o zhes so// 'dir byin gyis rdob pa'i rtsa ni/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnas de dang der gtug pa'o//
98b5(rnying rgyud): de ltar dbang dang byin rlabs kyi lha lnga lnga ste bcu'i steng du snying dbus srog gi gor rang 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' rgyan dang phyag mtshon spangs pa re re bsgom pa brtsis pas yan lag gi lhab cu gcig tu 'gyur na'ang / don la byin rlabs kyi yon tan dang phrin las gnyis dza
98b6(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi zhar byung tsam yin pas lam bsgoms pa'i dbang du/ sa chu gnyis dang me rlung gnyis kyi dang sa ma ro gcig tu 'jug pas drin 'byung rnam snang la bsdus pa pu de de/ don grub mtha' yas la bsdus pa gsung rdo rje/ de'i rig pas sems kyi dngas mngon dam pa'i
98b7(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' dang ro gcig pa nyid kyis khyab byed drug pa dang khyab byom paskyod pa gnyis 'dres thugs rdo rjer byas pas byin rlabs kyi lha gsum ste/ yan lag gi lha dgur gsungs pa'i gnad kyang shes par bya'o/ 1/ gsum pa yon tan ni/ zhes brjod pas sogs te/ dbang
99a1(rnying rgyud): dang blon grub phags don daces brjod byas pa shes du byas nas rnam par byung bas ba'i gnas lur dbang kya gas pa gas dang / gnas gsas gas rnams 'byur bar bya// gnyis pa
99a2(rnying rgyud): shes bya kyil 'khor dbug bstim gyi snga gsul bzhi las/ dang po stan gsan dbeb pa'i sngags ni/ oM a h+ye ti mags te/ oM ye shes kyi snyeng po snying go 'dran/ oM h+ye hi tshu ldan tshur sbron/ b+hag ldan bcom ldan 'das/ maH
99a3(rnying rgyud): gas chen pa dang ldan pa/ rdo \u0f7f gzigs dang/ snum pa seM stsal pa ba begs pa ste/ dus cig pa rnags drug d+han da gyis bsral pa de bzhin gagags pa thams cad sa kyi sa las zugs sa sprul shes 'khor po dam pa
99a4(rnying rgyud): sam pa na/ gnyis pa smin drang ba'i sngags ni/ ma sa te/ thag snyaganas skyes pa'i rgyagatu'i ma sa dgrag pa zhing / brnams la dmas pas byed pas pa shes kyi khor lo lngang nga brted par bcas pa srung ngas te/ dmachog
99a5(rnying rgyud): sa thong gzugs / gsus pa dag pa'i btan do pa'i sngag na/ gas/ a mas kyi zhem pa man ra zugs na byangs bangar dubab sa su la nas pa ba sa thags pa pas/ bdag
99a6(rnying rgyud): ga pa'i sgrug sang rnags yini rdzun las pa sa byung d+hi pa da tshigags pa nagagags pa thams 'a da kyas sa ga sa na dpang go pa na
99a7(rnying rgyud): gas na pa pa dzul gas kyang rigs so// bde dngas thab bskal sa pa'i sag nani/ e/ legs la lags / man ngas papa gso ba'i 'i ga dus/ ra pa'i migs paca 'am pa
99b1(rnying rgyud): po zhes bos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su gsung thugs yon tan zan las gzhan las ches ma pe che de nyid dus phyi ma lus pa da lta nyid du 'dir ni dbyer med mnyam par sbyor bas ye shes lha'i rdo rje gsum gyi phyag rgya chen por bdag gi sgo gsum sbyor bar mdzod cig
99b2(rnying rgyud): ces bskul bas lha rnams dngos grub stsol ba la phyogs par gyur pa dang / oM ba dz+ra sa ma ya hUM zhes pa'i hUM thugs bayul pa'i sa bon du byas te/ rab bsngags rdo rje mnyam par mdzod/ ces pas ye shes pa dam tshig ba lang stims te gnyis med du gyur/ oM badz+ras pa/
99b3(rnying rgyud): ya s+thi zhes pas nam mkha' lha'i 'khor lor grub par ma gyur gyi bar du brtan par bzhugs pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig khyod ces so// oM bzos ma ya hoHmchog ster rdo rje'i dam tshig gis mnyes par mdzod ces bskul bas shin tu dbang du gyur te dgyes pa chen shes rjes su chags par
99b4(rnying rgyud): bya'o// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes phyag rgya bzhis shin tu brtan cing gsal ban byas pa'o// gsum pa yon tan ni/ zhes brjod pas sogs te/ de skad ces brjod pas lhagating ga sung gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis yul 'jig rten dug gi phyogs btu thams cad kyi
99b5(rnying rgyud): gdul bya'i ngag la ye nas khyab par/ de la markyen gyis sngags skar rab tu/ des 'gag med gsung rdo rjer grol bas kun tu grags so// gnyis pa rang bzhin gsung gi dkyil 'khor la gsum ste/ gsung lnga'i mtshan nyid/ byed las/ rnam grangs so// mtshan
99b6(rnying rgyud): nyid la lnga las/ dang po skye med don gyi gsung ni/ e ma ho ngo mtshor sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ e ma hoHzhes brjod med las don gobs ro mtshar zhing ches rmad ci chos te/ ji ltar na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi khyab byed chos kyi sku'i gsung ni zag pa'i
99b7(rnying rgyud): pra dang btags pa'i ming dang / brjod pa'i chog sogs kun las 'das pa'i brjod med kyi gsung des go bye bas sna tshogs pa'i sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung ba'i gzhir gyur pa'o// gnyis pa brjod pa tshig gi gsung ni/ gsung gcig sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/
100a1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang gi gsang ba gcig la yang gsung gi dkyil 'khor yan lag drug sul sogs par snang ba ni/ mdo chen por gsungs pa'i don sdoms su byas na/ tshangs dbangs sal stan gru gar dang // ka
100a2(rnying rgyud): yin 'brug gi sgra// sgra brnyan lta bu'o rnam grangs drug/ re re la yang yan lag ni// bcu bcu 'jug ste 'du shes bskyed// rnam rig mnyan 'os mi mthun med// shin tu zag dang rjes su 'byung // mi tshugs rnar snyun ma 'khrugs dang // shin dugs
100a3(rnying rgyud): te drug cu'o// de dag kyang gdul bya rigs drug gi gnas kyis phye bas sum brgya drug cu sogs bsam gyis ni khyab pas zhing khams kun tu khyab cing rang rang gi skad du brda sprod pa'i slad da ming tshig so sor khrag cing / grags pa de thams cad kyang rngab pa dang mche ba'i nasu
100a4(rnying rgyud): ge phyag rgya las mi 'da' ba'i phyir mchog tu gyur pa'o// gsum pa rig pa byin rnabs kyi gsung ni/ phud mchog sogs rkang pa lnga ste/ rgyud thams cad kyi mchog thabs shes zung 'brel sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las 'bras bud de ba chen po dang ldan pa 'ang rig pa ye shes
100a5(rnying rgyud): cig sung gi don 'byung ba'ang ji ltar zhe na/ 'khor 'das kyi sgra thams cad gzung 'dzin gyis gos pa med pa pad+ma lta bu de dang du gyur pa'i phyir na/ rnam par grol ba 'das pa dang / thar par bgrod byed la ma dang / bcings pa 'khor ba'i sgra skad kyi rnam pa 'i dang
100a6(rnying rgyud): brjod pa thams cad kyang mtshan mas mgos pas gsung gi mchog ste/ cir yang mi 'gag par rang rig la sdang ba'i phyir rig pa'i gsung ngam bde ba chen po'i gsung zhes kyang bya'o// bzhi pa dbyer med rdo rje'i gsung ni/ theg pa mtho ba na sogs rkang pa drug ste/
100a7(rnying rgyud): rnam par grol ba'i theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang / phyin ci log mu stegs pa dang / 'gro ba rigs drug gis bsdus pa'i sems can ma lus thams cad kyi sgra skad kun kyang don la zag stong gnyis mu med pa'i ngo bor ya nas byang chub pa rdo rje'i gsung du bsdus shing /
100b1(rnying rgyud): bsus tsam nyid nadang de las ma g.yos bzhin du phyogs bathar rnam par grags shing go bar mdzad pa'i sgra nyid ji ltar pad+ma la chus migs pa ltar mchags 'dzin med kyi dang du gsungs pas mtha' gnyis las grol ba'i phyir/ mu 'gags par gsungs pa'i dus nyidan
100b2(rnying rgyud): ma dmigs pas brjod du med pa// / lnga pa tshangs pa dbyangs ni gsung ni/ brjod med de nyid sogs rkang pa lnga ste/ brjod med don gyi gsung de nyid brjod pa sna tshogs pa'i sgra'i 'byung gnas su snang bas gdul b+ha kun la tshig gcig mthun par grags shing /
100b3(rnying rgyud): de las don so sor 'angal zhing go bar byed de/ dper na tshul de bzhin du thub pa'i dbang pos sbrid pa bsangs pa la nad pa sman pa khyim bdag mo gsum gyis don so sor go ba bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gcig gi sgra yis so so'i bsam pa dang mthun pa'i chos 'am
100b4(rnying rgyud): cad go bde ni gsung gcig gis bran la khyab pas gsung mchog rgyal po ste tshangs pa dbyangs kyi gsung yin no// de ltar yang dkon brtsegs las/ rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs gcig snang ba// myos pa'i dbang gis ngo so bcos// zhes gsungs pa ltar //
100b5(rnying rgyud): 'dir longs phra ba rda'i gsung 'byung bas chad la/ sprul bu'i gsung gnyis thung bas lhag go zhan/ longs su'i gsung na sngar le'u dug par/ de bzhin gsung mchog mo sgra ste// sku yis chos rnams 'angal bar ston// zhes bstan dran pas 'dar
100b6(rnying rgyud): spos la/ skal su'i gsung gnyis las/ tshig gi gsung ni tshig res don re mtshan pa yin la/ tshangs pa dbyangs kyi gsung ni tshig res don du ma mtshon pa yin pas lhag pa'i skyon med ces gsungs so// gnyis pa gsung gi zed las ni/ theg pa mtha
100b7(rnying rgyud): dman sogs rkang pa gsum ste/ gdul bya'i snang bar theg pa mthong mnabs ma las gsungs pa ltar snang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin nyid la 'bab pa kho na las gzhan ma gsungs te/ gdul ba 'dul ba'i thabs su chos kyi rnam grangs so sor thos pa
101a1(rnying rgyud): tsam du dang// // rang mas rgyal po las// ngas na gzugs ca da bzhin nyid 'ba' zhag gsangs na/ pa gan nas byab / lu nan ga na
101a2(rnying rgyud): nigazugs 'ang des bya bar thos/ la la pa ni gzugs sdug bsngal zhes thabar thos/ skyems// byams pa gsung ga dam ban/ dI ltar gas dang sogs tshogs pa bye nga shedu / ji nya gas
101a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid kyis gzhalan brjod du med pa'i phyir/ chung zed ba gsungs pa med du/ rjes su su med don skye gsung ngo // don gyigasang ga la so 'i gar bub basbed pa dang snar brjod meng bas lpags ma rnab sa thang yang 'i
101a4(rnying rgyud): la don 'angal bar stod paseMn longs spya gangs pa panga'i gsung // reg pa ye shes kyig su ti byang sgrub rti thugs bye nga thams nyid kyi nga kun pa sa bya ba'i bya byin dupa ra yang ma 'gag na bas nga
101a5(rnying rgyud): nga rig pa byin rlabs kyi gsung ngo // 'gro ba ga la gang 'dul gyi myos pa dang mthun pa'i bla don sna tshogs sdig gcig gis so sor gsal zhing thos pas par spyong pa ni spel sa 'arjod patshig gi gsung ngo // ltar gas nyid nang ngami mig
101a6(rnying rgyud): dung gi rang bzhin dbyer me phyed pas rdo rje'i mchog ste dbyer med rdo rje'i gsung ngo // tshul de bzhin dus des rgyas kyi gsung gi sgo nas 'gro ba'i don ma dzad pa rnams ni brjod med de bzhin nyid kyi ngang las gzhan du ma g.yos kyang rgal ba'i thugs rje dang gdul bya
101a7(rnying rgyud): pa las rang lgang ba ste/ dper na thag ca'i sgra nyid kyang brjod 'dod dang / rtog pa dang / col ba gang yang med bzhin du rkyen gyis sgra'i rnam pa 'byung ba bzhin no// de skad du'ang chung gar/ ji ltar sla brten poni lnga// gzhan gyi rnam rig las byung ba// da/
101b1(rnying rgyud): rade bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung // kye dang nangan 'ang gnas ma yin// zhes pa lhur ro// gsum pa la'ang mtshan na/ gsang ba'i sogs te/ chud 'di la le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis su yod pa las/ 'dis rang bzhin gsang gi dkyil 'khor rje snyed pa
101b2(rnying rgyud): gsung ldang bsdus pa dang skrag pa ting nge 'dzin gsung gi dkyil 'khor gsang sngags kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / le'u brgyad pa la gsum ste/ lo d+h+yas dang / gzhung dang / mtshan no// dang po ni/ de nas de bzhin sogs te/ gsung
101b3(rnying rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa de nas rang bzhin dang blta ba dang wAg ting ste thugs phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsum ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid kyis lus dang rtog pa'i yan lag thams cad sra dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du ye
101b4(rnying rgyud): nas lun gyis lug pa nyid rtogs goms kyi sbyor bas mthar phyin par byin gyis rlog pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rim pa 'di ched du brjod do// gnyis pa gzhung la lnga ste/ rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya dang / lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / lta ba'i phyag rgya dang /
101b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya spos bcas kyi ting nge 'dzin bsan pa dang / phyag cu'i rnam grangs kyi sgo nas mjug bsdu ba'o// dang po ni/ sgyu 'phrul dra bas sogs tshig bcad gcig ste/ chos thams cad zung 'jug sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor du yi nas rang bzhin gyis mngon par chog
101b6(rnying rgyud): bsangs rgyas pa'i phyir rdzog tshogs thams cad la chos nyid byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po mchog gi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ de nyid gnas rtogs mngon du byas pa'i gnas skabs gsum la/ rang bzhin dang / lta ba dang / 'bras bu'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o//
101b7(rnying rgyud): de ltar rtogs dkar ba'i gsang ba de kho na nyid du nges pa'i don chos nyid snying po'i phyag rgyas btab pa ni rgyal po'i bka' rtags ltar 'da' bar dka' ba ste/ nam par de las mi 'da'o// gnyis pa la gsum ste/ phyag rgya'i chu dang / de las bung ba rigs
102a1(rnying rgyud): spyi'i dman+ta/ de las 'phros bltas so'i phyag \u0f7f'o// dang pon/ sa bskyed sogs chags bcad gcig tu/ 'phel zung las/ dang d+hi ba / migs // lagag bskye // lag ga na
102a2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i rigs/ rkang g.yon chos kyi sems dpa' ste// klung g.yas lus ni sems dpa' 'o// zhes lus kyi yan lag lnga dang / nying lag gi phung mo rdoH/ mdzub mo bdag sheg/ is lag rkyen/ mtha'o dz+ra/ mthe'u ra las rigs
102a3(rnying rgyud): yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor du ldan gyis thub pa'i phyir/ mi bstod pa'i rigs lag pa g.yas kyi sod mo'i gre kha lnga la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lnga'i phreng du thabs rigs lngal ya I hA dang / rin chen rigs lag pa g.yon
102a4(rnying rgyud): kyi sor mo lnga la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga'i steng du shes rab yum lnga'i yi ge sru~M l-I Sh+kaM hU~M kyai rnams sor mo'i rigs gang yin lur ma 'khrul par bkod rjes/ sor mo waphag gnyis po zung du smad pa'i las kyis thal mo mnyam pa'i skar bas lha so so'i phyag tu 'byung gA'i chu
102a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// gnyis pa ni/ oM dang muM gnyis sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ g.yas kyi mdzus mo'i oM dang g.yon gyi gung mo'i rgyu gnyis rtse sbyar te lhag ma rigs bzhi'i yi ge 'brub rgyad kyang / g.yas kyi gung mo'i hU~M dang g.yon gyi mdzub mo'i ljang bden
102a6(rnying rgyud): du mthe bong dang mthe'u chung g.yas g.yon gyi hA dang pAM/ AM dang tAM rnams phan tshun so sor bsgrol nas rba smad pa las srin lag gi sna mAM gnyis mthe'u chung nang du bkug pa'i rgyab tu sbyad nas bsgreng pa na rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med mnyam par sbyor ba'i dngos grub bde ba chen
102a7(rnying rgyud): po'i ye shes sbyin par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// de ltar yang thabs zhags las/ sor mo nang du bsnol nas bkan// gung mdzub mthe bong mthe'u chung rnams// so sor rtsa spang phyir bkyed de// srin lag gshibs bsgreng dam tshig tu// zhes dang / rngam
102b1(rnying rgyud): thog las ca/ da sgra gnyis padapa// de bzhin du dang gyur// rgyud pa yang de bzhin te// s+yA d+hA sbyar ba pas// rnga b+hu ra bla ba// shA bas
102b2(rnying rgyud): sA dang pAM sbyar// AM dang skr-i s+phA ra tI sbeng // yum gyi spyi rgya yin par bshad// ces so// gsum pa so so'i phyag rgya la wu las/ dang po rigs lnga'i phyag rgya las gtso bo yab yu men/ 'grub zhi sbas nas sogs tshogs bgrang ga/ te/ bad
102b3(rnying rgyud): gtso bo mi bskyod pa'i lur bsgol pa phyag rgya chen po// de'i ngang las lag g.yas pa'i hUM ma gtogs pa'i yig 'bru gzhan bzhi po khu tshur gyi rnam par sbas nas phung mo gyen du bsgreng ba'i chub thugs kar gtad de bkan da ni bca' ba dam cu/ spyi yig mthing ga
102b4(rnying rgyud): bsgreng ba de'i rtse mor 'i sgom pa ni bsam pa chos kyi/ hUM zhu ba las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od 'bar bar gyur pa ni bsam pa dam rgya/ lag g.yon pa'i zla ba lnga nang du gtul bas yum gyi yig 'bru lngasmras pa'i khu tshur gyis dril bu bzung bag
102b5(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis brla g.yon po chos kyi sems dpa' ngam pad+ma'i rigs kyi skyed du bzhag pas dgra la brten thabs su bca' ba ni bca' ba las rgya dang / de ltar bsgom pa ni bsam pa las Ta/ de nas phyag rgya g.yas su bcas pa mdun du bskur nas g.yon du yum
102b6(rnying rgyud): thugs kar so gol gyi sra dang bcas te/ ngag tu hU~M badz+re d+h+r-ika ces brjod cing dkrol ba ni brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ shes rab la thabs kyis rgyas 'debs pa'o// yum gyi phyag rgya ni/ mi bskyod pa'i g.yon phyogs kyi 'phang du yu med kyings sug sa bsgos pa
102b7(rnying rgyud): ni phyag chen/ lag g.yon gyi 'bru bzhi nang du sbas nas phung mo thugs kar ba kan thabs su sbreng ba ni bca' ba ma rgya/ muM mthing gsung mo slong ba 'irtse mor bsgom pani bsam pa chos t+ya/ hUM zhub las dril bregasil ba'i spang na dong dang der gyur bani bsam pa
103a1(rnying rgyud): dman+ta/ lag g.yas nyi ma la gnas par 'bru tham bcings pas yab ca drag yas pa las kyi sems dpa' steng du bdag par rgyal rgya sa mthol shi yo la rgya ra brgya dag la 'dum pa'i mdapas kyis yang
103a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshul du bca' ba ni bca' ba las rgya/ de ltar bsgom pa ni bsam pa las rba/ de nas byag rgya g.yon du bcas pa mdun du 'gyur nas g.yas su yang ci thugs par sa rong+ga kyi spang kyis kyis jo la ning rjod bcos ma ngas la shes
103a3(rnying rgyud): kyis rgyas 'debs pa'o// mdor na phyag rgya bdun po de'ang bzhi 'du ste/ dam rgya dang las rgya gnyis la btu' ba dang bsam pa/ chos rgyal bsam pa dang brjod pa gnyis gnyis su bye ba tsam du zad pa'i drug pod byer ni gsum du 'bras pa'i steng phyag rgya chen po bstan pas
103a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi'am/ yang na g+ha swa su ma lta bur gsal baphyag zhen/ sa don chos bya/ bca' bdam bya/ dkrol ba las rgya steng zhi'o// pan+dar yang gsalang thalas/ dmatshog las dang chos dang ni// dan pa'i'i// no mo// da na
103a5(rnying rgyud): snang yab yum sogs rigs gzhan bzhi po'i phyag rgya yang / 'bru bzhi sbas nas sogs tshigs bcad brgyad de/ bdag nyid rnam snang sogs rigs gang yin der gsal ba las/ lag g.yas pa'i 'bru bzhi blas nas rang rigs kyi sor mo bsgreng bzugs kar bkan
103a6(rnying rgyud): thabs su bcas shing / oM hU~M AM hUM bzhi rigs mthun gyi kha dog can sor mo bsgreng ba de'i rtse mor bsam pa las rang rang gi thugs phyog mtshan 'khor lo dang rin chen dang pad+ma dang ngal gri rnams 'od 'bar bar gyur bar bas ma zhing / g.yon zla btul gyis yum gyi
103a7(rnying rgyud): lnga sbas pa'i khwa krung kyis dril zugasil zhing sum la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis brla g.yon pa zos la brten pa'o// yang g.yon du das kyi gram gang yin gas la ba las/ g.yon pa'i 'bru bzhi rdzas nas pa rigs kyi mar mo bslang bzugs par bkan thabs su bca 'dis
103b1(rnying rgyud): Sh+Ta/ rigs kyi kha dog can sor mo bsgreng ba dang rtso mor bsam pa las dril bu gsal ba'i phra can 'odong bar bar gyur cang / g.yas nyi ma bus dang bcas pa ma bcings pas las ta yang kya bar+Na g.yas pa'i steng du bzhag pas 'bral zhing yab la da
103b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis zhal la blta ba ste/ yab yum so so'i mthar sngags brjod cing thabs shes phan tshun chus 'debs kyis dgrol bar bya'o// gnyis pa sems dpa' yab yum gyi phya ga rgyani/ ut+pal chu shing sogs chags bcad bsumalag
103b3(rnying rgyud): grangs pa'i mtha bong ma gtogs pa'i sor mo gzhan bzhi pa nyid dkyil re ri'i steng du mdzun mo nas brtsams te thugs kyi sems dpa' ba'i ri sa bon/ rdo rdo dang / gsung gi sems dpa rgya ma bzhi dgang / bye na pa da kyi
103b4(rnying rgyud): sems kyi yum bzhi'i sa bon d+hI d+hI hrI aM dang / phyi'i sems ma dzaHhUM baM hoHbzhi bkod nas/ sems dpa' sems ma ga yin gyi sgrar gsal ba li si bru gsum sras nas rang rigs kyi sor mo bsgreng ba'irtsings son gso yongs su gyur pa las 'a ma pa
103b5(rnying rgyud): ut+par/ byams pa'i bu zhing la sogs brdugs phyag mtshan 'od 'bar ba bsam pa ste/ de bzhin dus snying gi rin che sta thA/ rnam snying gi la gri 'od 'bar ba/ spyan ras gzigs kyi 'dud kar ngo // bya ga rje 'od 'bar ba/ sleb
103b6(rnying rgyud): sol kye chos kyi 'khor lo/ kun bzang gi rin chen snyem ste yab brgyad dang / de dag gi yum sgeg mo gzugs mdzes gsal ba'i ma long / mA lo'i rin chen phreng ba dang / bI ti'i bi waM/ nai ti'i gar mkha rna mchog gi mtshan medza la ba nyid dang /
103b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin dbu sgo me tog gi phreng ba dang / bdug spos kyi mchod snod 'chang ba'i d+hA tra~M a~M/ A lo ki mar me/ gar+b+he ma'i dri'i byug pa rnams 'od 'ang ba bsam pa'o// la sogs zhes pa'i khongs nas sems dpa' brgyad kyi gdon zla brtul 'bru sras kyis
104a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa / sa na/ ba
104a2(rnying rgyud): yang bye rdag yas las la ban pas 'brel zhing du nungs papa la thang ba 'dra pa'i tshul ci bang sum pa'i bshang pa 'i jigs mas shes da dus 'dab pa
104a3(rnying rgyud): lani rigs ra sapas bzhin du nabs shes gnyis 'a sa byed da byings kyi pa latha' bar// gsu pa sgrub pa ba sus ba rdzun/ zhi gas dang / bzhir gangs pa 'a po la gcan ba rnan
104a4(rnying rgyud): dadag pa ni mi par mar chub te ma gad nas nyi sa pa'i gas pabs blan las rang rags kyi sa ge bzang pa 'byer po pa rnas sum pa rdzun na rnam nga sa pang / bas pa nano pas dang / mayin pa
104a5(rnying rgyud): ska'i chen pas dkris pa gnon thabs su 'dzin pa dang / bdud kyi khyil po rjertsa gram las kyi mtshan mag na thabs dang / yum pa ni thang khrag tu gyu bang bas mning // de ster blo bzhing gnas pa de dag kyang yang rtsig sa pa rdzogs mdza dang /
104a6(rnying rgyud): ga yas rnams rim par thugs kya dang zhags pa dang thon ste lcags zlog dang hoHzhes dgus pa byed byed dril bu 'dzin pas pa can dbu brjod pa dang 'phyo ba tshal gyis yab mapa 'khril ba'ang gang du ba shang ma thag pa bzhinan// bezhi pazub drug
104a7(rnying rgyud): tha'adrug sogs dang pa gsum gyi/ thub padrug gi cig ci ga lagyim sa pa ma bya tshig das gas meng brdzun byeg nga / 'a/ brgyan chags ga pa sa/ nyas cung gas
104b1(rnying rgyud): dz+ra sogs kyi sa bon las phyag mtshan dang gzugs kar 'dzin par bsam pa yin na// 'dar thub drug la thabs shes zung 'brel gyis mnyes par byed pa'i phyag rgya med dam snyam na/ dmigs bcas rtags kyi yum med kyang 'dir na dmigs med chos kyi dbyangs kyi yum
104b2(rnying rgyud): dnge 'du 'bral med pas mnyes par byed do// lnga pa kun bzang yab yum gyi phyag rgya ni/ kun bzang sogs dang pa lnga ste/ byed pa po kun bzang phyag g.yas pa steng du bkod pa'i mnyam gzhag las ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phro ba/ yum bye ba mo de las 'gyur te phyag g.yon
104b3(rnying rgyud): steng du bkod pa'i mnyam gzhag mdzad cing / bzhugs thabs yangab rdzogs pa rdor skyel dang / yum pad+ma'i skyil thung du bzhugs pa'o// de las gzhan yang yum gyi phyag rgya'i bye brag ni chos nyid cir yang mi 'gag pas gcig tu ma nges par sna tshogs su snang ste/ de
104b4(rnying rgyud): yang ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa yab kun bzang ltar las ma 'gyur ba'i mnyam bzhag nyid dam/ yang na rdo rje thal mo thugs kar sbyar ba nyid do// yang bka' sol la lang / rkang pa phyi ma gsum po phyag rgya spyi'i rnam grangs bsdub don du mdzad de/ gdul
104b5(rnying rgyud): bya'i dbang gis rigs so sor ba sgrub pa na de dag gi phyag rgya rigs de dang de'i phyag mtshan gyi rnam par bstan pa sogs ma nges pa dang / yang na lha so so'i phyag rgya mi nus pas bsdus pa la dga' na de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga so so'i phyag rgya'am spyi'i de mchi lngar bshad pa tsam/
104b6(rnying rgyud): dang // de'ang mi nus na rdo rje thal mo 'ba' zhig bcas pas kyang rung zhes bzhed do// gsum pa lta ba'i phyag rgya ni/ phyag rgya chen po'i sogs tshogs bcang gcig ste/ rtog tshogs thams cad phyag rgya chen po snang stong dbyer med lha b+ha d+ha ma wA 'u'i rdo rje gsum gyi rol
104b7(rnying rgyud): par snang ba'i tshogs mchog ni srid zhi'i mtha' 'gog byed thabs dang shes rab dbyer mi phyed pa ste/ yul med rang gas la zung 'jug gi don zab mo de rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan cing rgyud la 'byor na/ lus ma bskyod cing yan lag ma bsngal yang ci byas cir sdang thams cad
105a1(rnying rgyud): ldan ngas mas su sa na smras// /
105a2(rnying rgyud): rnas
105a3(rnying rgyud): na
105a4(rnying rgyud): na sa
105b1(rnying rgyud): du da ga rnamam pags mas na cag rnam pa ba nga ma ma sa/ tha ba dang / rung gas pa gsas su na/ dadapa pa
105b2(rnying rgyud): da pa sa ta pa na pa nga ga tu thag cang sabasas nam ma na tha // ya kyi kyi rnams pa pa di ba ga
105b3(rnying rgyud): yadang nathabs kyi bzhi ba/ shes rab kyi bzhubargya/ sngags thugs kyi sgrub \u0f7f/ dban kyi brgyad pa / ba la bas sa ba sam gnyis la yan lag dang zhag pa'i gsang bsgom pa nis ngas na de steng gi khe 'i
105b4(rnying rgyud): dang // gnyis ni/ de ltar ldan pa'i sags nang pa gsum te/ sang sa chas ting gdape pa lab de dag gang la ji ltar ldan pa'i mag tsa mchag mi bskyod pa yab skam gyis mdzan te/ zhabazhan rnams pa 'ang dregs dge gas par dang / khyad par
105b5(rnying rgyud): dang rtse snang mang pa'i lab sras kyi rtag pa'i gnas sucan pa rang yab yum 'god pa ni thams cad la 'du// de ltar nges par bya te/ rgyal ba rigs bzhedapa/ nal maN+Dag na bzang po lab sum te zung lngar 'ang thar babyed pa de ba zhid du brdzob pas stong
105b6(rnying rgyud): sas dang 'di kyang nga thong ba ni// labus ma nga 'du gnyis Sh+Ta tshamadrug nyis/ thab drug pa yum me pas thalas kyim la yab tu gsum dang/ gzhan tha tshal sam brgya bdun rnaMms nang lag ge lhag su de kyi bdu dang /
105b7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' lab sres dmas da'ang kyi phro nga nang du 'gad pa'i nges pas thab pa drag ririla'ang tid thang ba nyung rkyo ga de dag gi nying dug pas brgyar pa'i phying chog rkye te/ mngang ting 'i thartsa ba zhi thams cad pa'i 'a zing tho gang ga brje 'bang bar 'gro ma
106a1(rnying rgyud): te khri bzhi stong gi dkyil 'khor la bsgrub pa'o// gsum pa ni/ de la sogs te bsam mi byab ces te/ steng dang nyi khri bzhi stong pod la sogs te snang 'byed kyi ting nge 'dzin las su drang bas snang ba thams cad ga/ dang ye shes bye dkyil 'khor rab
106a2(rnying rgyud): 'byams bsam gyis mi khyab par gsal ba ni bsam yas lhan grub kyi dkyil 'khor la bslab pa'o// gnyis pang sadon med dz+wa la ni/ phyogs bcu sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te/ den bya ba'i yul gyigs bcu dang dus bzhis bsdus pa'i zhing khams bsam yas pa
106a3(rnying rgyud): su 'dul byed dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo de ltar smos pas gangal bya 'gro ba'i don rnams mos pa bzhin du 'dul thabs so sor ston cing / der ma zad theg pa mtho ba gsang sngags dang byang sems/ dman pa nyan rang ste yang dag pa'i grub mtha' la zhugs pa thams cad dang /
106a4(rnying rgyud): phyin ci log gi zab mtha' la zhugs pa mu stegs byed rnams dang / gang la'ang ma zhugs pa'i skye bo bsam yab dang / de dag kyang lha/ sogs zhi ba'i rigs dang / bdud srin sogs khro bo'i rigs kyi gdul bya'i tshogs chen pa thams cad la ma sor mas par nga mthun
106a5(rnying rgyud): par byas pa'i 'dul byed kyi sgra'i bkod pa kun tu snang bar mdzad na 'ang / phyag cha'i dkyil 'khor las g.yos pa mi mnga' zhing rtsol rtog dang bral bas ngon mdzad pan dper na thos gar ma khan nyid dang 'dra ba ste/ gar mkhan de yang lus gcig pod las ma g.yos bzhin
106a6(rnying rgyud): rnam 'gyur gyi bkod pa sna tshogs ston de'i phyir ro// lnga pa phyag rgya'i rnam grangs bsdu pa ni/ mdar daphyag rgya sogs tshogs bcang gnyis te/ mdor na lus dang rtog pa'i yan lag gi phyag cha thams cad ni/ rnam pa 'di khon 'o zhes sam/ grangs gcig tungs zhes
106a7(rnying rgyud): brjed du med de/ ji ster na/ lus kyi yan lagagang bang drug nyis de gsum gcig tu 'joms te yan lags pa de'ang rigs sde lab gram bcwabargyar rnam par 'jo bas phyag ca bkyangs/ tog pa'i yan lagagi dang du zangs shes gnyis pa sngams pa la na
106b1(rnying rgyud): dang / rdo rje gsum du byin gyis rlob pa'i lha brgya nyi shu/ de dag las kyang rnam par 'gro ba dbu rgyan gyi lha brgyad brgya ste sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'o// de bas na lus kyi yan lag brtsod pa dang / rtog pa'i yan lag spro ba'ang lha'i sku gsung thugs kyi hud
106b2(rnying rgyud): rgya'i de bzhin nyid las mi 'da' bar bslab par bya ba ste/ de dag kyang mdor bldan yan lag baphrul zhing lus bskyod pa ci snang ci byas thams cad kun rang bzhin ji lta bar rtogs goms kyis lha sgra phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas pa las mi g.yo zhing / de ltar gnas pa'i
106b3(rnying rgyud): dus nyid na'ang der 'dzin med pa'i phyir/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin la/ gnas pa'ang min te mtha' dang bral ba'i chos nyid do zhes de skad du spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i rgyal mchog ston pa nyid kyis bshad ces sdud pa po'i tshig go// gsum pa le'u'i mtshan na/ gas/
106b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i sogs te/ rgyad 'di la le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis su yod pa las/ 'dis lus dang rtog pa'i yan lag thams cad phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brdabs nas rang bzhin lta ba ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi phyag rgya spos nas bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
106b5(rnying rgyud): le'u dgu pa la gsum ste/ lo rgyus dang / gzhung dang / mtshan no// dang po ni/ de nas sogs te/ lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa de nas lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad dbyer med drang
106b6(rnying rgyud): dor dang bral ba zag med bde ba'i ye shes la dgyes pa chen por longs spyod pa'i bdag nyid kun tu bzang pos sku gsung thugs ye shes rdo rje'i gsang ba gsum thob par byed pa'i thabs las mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig dkyil 'khor dbang sgrub ste las kyi rim pa gsum du bkod
106b7(rnying rgyud): cing / de nyid ston pa'i dgongs pa ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gnyis pa gzhung la gsum ste/ dkyil 'khor dang / dbang dang / sgrub pa'o// dang po la gnyis te/ sngon du slob dpon gyis bsnyen pa bya ba dang /
107a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi las rim dngas so// dang po ni/ shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog/ ces te/ yid dang mthun pa'i gnas sra ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis khog phyab nas yig dang phyag mtshan dang lha mu stong rje gsum gyi phyag tu shin tu zla ba'i ting
107a2(rnying rgyud): de 'dzin sgoms pa'i sgo nas mtshan dus grangs gsam gang rung gi bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya ba ste/ 'di ni gzhan don gnyer ba'i slob dpon gyis nges par 'da' mi rung ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ste gtso bo yin pas 'bad par bya'o// gnyis pa la gnyis te/ zhi ba
107a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang / des khro bo dang mchog gi dkyil 'khor mtshon par bstan pa'o// dang po la'ang / rdo rje las rim las/ sa gzhi mnyam dang tshad thig dang // tshon dang bri ba rnam pa dang // rab gnas sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor du// 'jug dang
107a4(rnying rgyud): zhugs pa'i yon tan no// zhes don bcu las/ dang po la'ang / sa gzhi mnyam pa spyir bshad pa dang / go ma ya btang ba bye brag tu bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ yang nas gzhi rab mnyam la/ zhes te/ skal ldan gzhug bya'i dkyil 'khor rgyud tshod dang sbar ba
107a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi las/ rang bzhin ye shes dang / lhag pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa nyams kyi dkyil 'khor gsum du 'jug mi nus pa'i gang zag rnams/ de las gzhan yang lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs te/ der 'jug pa'i dbang du byas na/ thog
107a6(rnying rgyud): mar sa dang sar 'dzin gyi rtog pa rig pa'i dbyings su mnyam par bya ba'i phyir sa gzhi sa'i cho gas rab tu mnyam par bya ste/ de la'ang snga ma las/ gzhi dang rang mtshan bslang dbang dang // sbyang phyin pa srung dang bzung ba ni// dang po'i nying lag nyid du bshad// ces
107a7(rnying rgyud): pas/ sa der dkyil 'khor rung mi rung brtag pa'i phyir spyir gnams par gsum gyi dpyad de sa'i gzhi la brtag pa/ bye brag tu sa rang gi mtshan nyid la brtag cing / brtags pas rung bar mthong na snang ba sa'i bdag po la rin 'jal ba dang / mi snang ba dkyil
107b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi ska la 'dod don gsal zhings bdag 'khor dang bcas par bden pa brjod de bslangs la/ gzhi der dbang mchog gi phur bu gdab pas dbang du zab dang / ste babyesten gas ma mgo shar du bstab sogs g.yas bskor gyi gnas lugs shes pas song
107b2(rnying rgyud): zad nas bdas la/ chu sa'i go nas prA ba rtag cing gter badrug ste/ stegs bu dbus pags kyis mtho zhing shar dang brang yid tsam gzhol brtsigs pa pa babyung dang rdzas sum chus sbrang rdul b+ha ba rnams ni las dang brabs spang ba'o// gzhan yang zhi ba'i me dang /
107b3(rnying rgyud): sngags rgya dang / mtshan med stong nyid kyi ngang las mtshan bcas gzhi der gzhal yas khang bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis sa'i nyes spyan spang ba dang / de nas slob dpon rdo rje'i 'gros kyis shar sgonas zhugs te dbus su gnas pas bdag nyid gtsab yab
107b4(rnying rgyud): yum dra ba skyed pa'i sems smin las 'khor rnams sgo zhing / mkha' khyab kyi rgyal ba rnams mchod nas/ yum bzhi'i nga rgyal 'dzin pa'i phyogs kyi slob ma bzhes slab dpan la mchod cing gsol ba btab rjes/ slob dpon gyis rgal ba rnams bskul zhing
107b5(rnying rgyud): byin bsdus nas/ rang nyid zhe zung rdo rje'i snyems pas 'bang ba'i stan dang rdo rje'i 'gros kyis sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing / bcu 'phur tha gdab pa dang mtshan mtha'i rabasas bsrung par bya ba rnams te/ bzung ba ni 'og tu mdzad do//
107b6(rnying rgyud): dag ni nr-i ba dang po'i zla ba'o// gnyis pa ni/ 'bru lnga sogs dang pa gsum ste/ phung po lnga sku lngar dag byed 'bru lnga/ dbang po lnga phrin pas war dag byed sras wa/ yul tha yon tan wang dag byed rin chen la/ rnam shes lnga ye shes lngar dag byed snying po
107b7(rnying rgyud): dang / 'dzingasan snga gsung thar dag byed ldan lnga dang / khams lnga rigs lngang dag byeng bdud rtsi lnga ste/ rjes sum na po nyid rab tu mnyam par gyur ba'i rdzigs dkyil 'khor gyi gzhil gam ye btang bar byu / 'di nyid rje / rnams su gzhung gi 'gros kyar
108a1(rnying rgyud): thig gis khangs su bsdus na'ang / rdon las rim snar 'dir las dang thabs snang ba'i khongasas sdeb su shing / dkyil 'khor khang pa nying pa lta bur ni TIg dang spel kyang sogs par 'gyumar// gnyis pa tshad la gnyis
108a2(rnying rgyud): las/ lkug pa gzugs brtan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni/ dkyil 'khor khru gang sogs rkang pa gsum dang / yang na khru ni sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ gnas khang dang 'byor ba'i khyad par las chur 'bring che gsum du 'gyur bas dkyil 'khor lags
108a3(rnying rgyud): rer khwa gang gi tshad du bya ba'am/ yang na de bzhi 'gyur lus gang gi tshad du bya ste chung tshad gnyis so// yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad de khru bcu gnyis pa'am/ yang na khru ni bcu drug gi tshad gnyis ni 'bring tshang dang // bru nyi shu'am yang na nyi shu rtsa lnga
108a4(rnying rgyud): bya ba gnyis ni che tshad do// de nas mchog gi dkyil 'khor lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi tshad ni/ yang na rgyang grags sogs rkang pa gsum ste/ rnal 'byor pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal zhen pa dang / 'bring dang / rab gsum gyi dgongs pa'i khyad par las chung
108a5(rnying rgyud): 'bring cheg sam ste/ bris dkyil las gzhan yang na chang grags gcig gi tshad du sgom pa chung tshad de/ de'i don ni mdzod las/ sor mo nyi shu bzhi la khwa// khru bzhi la ni gzhugang ngo // de dag lnga brgya dag la ni// rgyang grags de la dgon par 'ang
108a6(rnying rgyud): de brgyad dpag tshad ces bya'o// zhes so// 'bring dpag tshad gcig gi tshad dam/ yang na rab kyi tshad nam mkha'i dbyings ni bas ma yas par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang nye khri bzhi stong dang bas ma yas lhan grub kyi dkyil 'khor sogs sna tshogs brjod kyis mi
108a7(rnying rgyud): lang ba bsgom pa'am/ lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi gzugs brtan zhes grags pa dkyil 'khor dngos su sprul nas ston pa ste/ lam rim las/ sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor sog/ rdo rje'i thig tshad dor tsam gyis// rgyang grags la sogs mtshan ma yi/
108b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor phyag rgyags la ldan pa// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i gzugs brtan yin// zhes gsungs te/ sngon sangs rgyas gsang bas mtsho ma pham la theg btab nas many+dzu shrI sogs la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dngos su bstan pa dang / slob dpon pad+mas stag tshang /
108b2(rnying rgyud): mkhar chen bza' la rdo rje gzhon nu'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' dang mnyam par bstun nas dbang bsgyur ba lta bu ste/ gzhan du sbal pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes grags pa de'o// gang dag lhag ting gi tshad 'dir spros pa ni skabs 'tshal lo nyam na/ skyon mod de/ lhag pa
108b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs brnyan gyis mtshon nas lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i phyir 'grel pas 'gros don du sbas pa'o// gsum pa thig ni/ rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// zhes dang / phur bu sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ de la'ang don bdun las/ dang
108b4(rnying rgyud): po rgyu ni/ spyir me 'gyur ba'i don gyis thig ste/ de'i rgyur 'gying bskor gyi phur bu gnyis 'du bya zhing / srad bu la gnyis las/ ye thig gi d+ha pad+ma'i rgyas pa dang / dam thig gi rgya ngas bal 'jam po'o// grogs ni/ gas rgyan bzang pos mdzes par brtsan
108b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan ldan yid du 'ong ba'i grogs phyag rgya lo bcu drug len pas 'phel lo// tshad ni/ ring thung dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur la/ sbom phra sgo'i nyi shu cha'o// grangs ni/ tshon gyis kha dog sa sar phyeb ste/ ye shes kyi thig srung kha dog nyi shwa
108b6(rnying rgyud): lnga'am lnga bsgril dang / dam tshig gi zig sud kha dog dgu'am sum bsgril lo// rab gnas ni/ ye thig gdab pa'i srad bu ye shes lnga dang / dam tshig gi theg srung sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor byin gyis rlob pa'i cho ga rigs mthun gyi yig 'bur bskyed pa la
108b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' khyab kyi rgyal ba rnams sbyor ba'i byin badz+ra zhing brkam pa la sogs phun sum tshogs par byaba'o// gdab pa'i thabs ni/ thig g.yog rig ma dngos sa mde mas pa la cig snga gtad de yab yum lngar gsal bar byas pas dam chog gi thig sug sung thags
109a1(rnying rgyud): b+h+ya/ / Ti rang bzhin can du btab pa'i ston du ye shes kyi thig na mkha' la btabapas srag sung thugs dede'ang ye shes lnga lnga'i rang bzhin du byas gangad ba par bya ba'o// nyes pa spang ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi las la mkhas pas lag yon dang rdzun
109a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzidzug pa dpon chen pos rig sa ma yengs par bsgrims te/ thig phud ma rgyad cing thig sa ma nor ba dang / bskor 'dug gi phyogs ma 'khrul ba/ thig rten mdzud pa/ thig la'i 'gom pa ska nas gdab cing / gal te 'gam dgos na steH'i sgra dang 'degs pa
109a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas thig mkha' la bteg pa'i 'og tu 'dzul nas las bya'o// bzhi brtson ni/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la rnams bsgom/ zhes dang / ma mthong sogs tshigs bcung gcig ste/ de la'ang ngan drug las/ dgos tshad ni/ ye shes sras 'gro ba kun la
109a4(rnying rgyud): chub kyang de 'danam mthong ba'i rmongs pa rnams la rang gnas kyi don bstan par bya ba'i phyir tshon/ pa dgras sor bya ba'o// mr-i ni/ 'byor pa rab kyis rin chen sna lnga dang / 'bring gis 'gyu'am sman padog bsgyur ba dang / thams sa tshan/ bdag wal b+ha'o// grangs
109a5(rnying rgyud): ne/ kha dog rgyas par na rigs re re'ang lnga lngar phyebs nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am/ yang na kha dog lnga yi grangs su bslus kyang rung ngo // rab gnas ni/ sa bon phrag mtshan las rigs kyi dasal 'khor thabs shes drang 'brel wa'am/ chus par ni sa so'i rigs chung dang /
109a6(rnying rgyud): bcas pas rgya rdza bcu rnams bskams pa zhub las rin po che'i rdul phra rab tu gyur par bsam pa'o// tshe nad kyi lugs ni/ lag sar la dpa' bo 'bru la bkod nas dang por slabang dpon gyis 'gying pur btab pa'i shul du chen snga lngas bkang rjes shar du blta bas g.yan
109a7(rnying rgyud): bal gyu kyi sa bang ljin nas pa rtsams ti rje 'i ma gcigagi da bar bya zhing / tha rtag pa 'don du man snga la bka' sta gaganas/ phreb ba rnams dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gang gis 'a rje'i rtsegargya lpags parjin
109b1(rnying rgyud): ldan pas dgye bar bya'o// de ltar yang rnam snang spyad las/ tshon ni nang nas dgye bar bya// phyi rol nas ni tshon me kye// dang po byang shar nas brtsams te// thog mar slob dpon nyid kyis dgye// de nas slob mas bya bar bshad// ces so// nyes pa snang ba ni//
109b2(rnying rgyud): tshen ha cang mthug par ma srab pa// tshon thal she rib sogs spyi dang / khyad par tshon pra la/ re khA dmas pa yo ba// chad lhag/ nyams pa/ mi gsal bsogs 'dug na ngan pas bsal ba'i cho ga bya'o// lnga pa bri ba ni/ lte ba rtsibs dang sogs
109b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs bcad gcig ste/ dbus kyi skye bzlum po'i mthar 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brten ma khrud dang ldan pa'i phyi rol du ga chang bzhi dang / dbyibs gru bzhi'i rnam pa sgo bzhi na chung can tababs snam bu brgyad pa phyi rol du pa nor me'i khor yug dang ldan
109b4(rnying rgyud): par bya ba ni dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring ba sdus gsum ga'i thun mong ba ste/ khyad par rgyas pa ltar na dbus kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi lte ba dang bcas pa'i gnas lngar rtsibs bzhi pa'i 'khor lo chung ba mu khyad dang bcas pa re ras mtshan pa dang / rgas 'bring gnyis
109b5(rnying rgyud): la grwa chad kyi phyir bar khyams dang ldan pa bri zhing / bsdus pa la ni khyams med pa'i phyir gru chad la sgo dod pa'i rnam pa can no// drug pa rnam pa dgod pa ni/ sku gsung thugs sogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha gnas so sor rten tsa ka li lta bu bris 'bur ram/ med
109b6(rnying rgyud): na tshon gyis bri ba'i rjes 'brel du sku phyag rgya'i gzugs brnyan dang / gsung thaTa'am hrI mAM sogs sa bon dang / thugs phyag mtshan nam rang mdog dang mtshungs pa'i thig le 'dri ba sogs mtshan ma gsum gang rung dang ldan pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa'ang ci nus dgod par
109b7(rnying rgyud): bya'o// bdun pa rab gnas la gnyis te/ nub gnyis pa'i las rim gzhung bshad kyi dbang du 'brel bsdebs nas 'dir bshad pa dang / skabs thob kyi las rim dkyil 'khor rab gnas so// dang po la'ang gnyis te/ yan lag dang / yan 'ang
110a1(rnying rgyud): can mi lhag gnas so// dang pon/ khro ba ma 'chi tha babyor ba byed byams pa sgruba'i sgo nas ngogs las zlum bskrun / gnas bya thams cad lab sangs sutor bya ba'i ngadang // de dang nges 'bral dun rdal/ thod cu
110a2(rnying rgyud): sngar bshad pa'i thig tshon rab gnas rnams so// gnyis pa la/ bum pa/ slob ma/ lha stu gon no// dang po ni/ rnam rgyal bum par dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yongs rdzogs babyed bzas 'od khrus bum chu chus ldan du bslab pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ khrus
110a3(rnying rgyud): dang sems bskyed nas gnang ba byin cing slob bskyed/ bgegs dang sgrib pa phral ba sngon du 'gro bas slob ma lhur bskyed cing bskur rlob go ba go lus bsrung rnams byas la so shing dong / bye ngas khyod chu/ sung spad/ kra sha gsum byin zhing gags pargyad
110a4(rnying rgyud): bshad de/ tshe lam brtag tu gzhug/ gal te nganan sngags rgya dang mes sbyang ba rnams so// gsum pa na/ dzirje las rim du/ sa bzung ba zhes gsungs pa de yin te/ las thig tshogs pa'am sgra thig tsem ga ba ba gang rkyang gis lhaganasangs par byas/
110a5(rnying rgyud): nas gzhal yus khang bsgoms rjes/ lha gnas rnams su byang sems kyi thig le tshom bu dang bcas pa so so'i sngags kyis bkod de/ rang gtso bo yag yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad spos la dbang nas bstod pa'i bar byas rjes snyan
110a6(rnying rgyud): gsan phab ste rol pa'i gtso byin gyis de nyid du thim par mos pa'o// gnyis pa dkyil 'khor rab gnas la gnyis te/ las khrigs kyi sdeb bshad pa dang / gzhung don bshad pa'o// dang po la don dgu las/ dang po sngon du bya ba'i rim pa ni/ slob
110a7(rnying rgyud): dpon kyis bum bsnyen bya zhing bram chu bsgrub/ rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg/ gnas bya'i gzugs brtan pa babyung ba dz+ra zhing shing thun gyis 'phyi ba sogs byas te/ zhi ba'i las gzhung bsrang ba rnams so// gnyis bting nge 'dzin gnyis kyis srung zhing bskyed pa
110b1(rnying rgyud): dang// gsum ba spur drang zhing bstim pa gnyis le'u 'di nas bshad pa skar ro// bzhi bzur mas sun dbye ba sogs dbang po 'dzin pas laba' chos bdun dbul lo// rdza ma thun mong du ye shes lnga'i dang brjin kyi bum jus dbang bskur zhing snga gsung thugs cing d+h+ya /
110b2(rnying rgyud): brlabs nas/ khyad par dbu rgyan sogs rgyan chas ti shurtsa lngas mnga' gsol ba'o// drug pa chu bdun gyis khrus gsol zhing ras kyis 'phyi ba'o// bdun pa mchod pa sbyi nga la gting gsang mchod rnams 'di nas bshad pa ltar dbul lo// brgyad pa
110b3(rnying rgyud): don rdzogs byang brtan bcugs gsol ba'o// dgra ba bskor bu dang smon lam gdub pa rnams te rang gnas kyichog pas shes par bya'o// gnyis pag sung don pazhud pa 'jug te/ yo byad dang ma ba/ sto pa nyid kyi rkang nge 'dzin sdes sbyangs/
110b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'i 'du dgas bskyed pa/ de ltar sbyangs shing bskyed pa'i yon tan/ ye shes badrung shi gzhug pa/ mchod pa 'bral ba'o// dang pon/ brjes bu'i sogs dang paganyis te/ bcos pa padog bskur ba'i sa pa dadrims kyi
110b5(rnying rgyud): ba nagadugs lnga hU~M sogs sna tshogs pa dang / rin po ma'i rgyan phreng dang / bzung ba dang bza' ba sgo mchog ldan pas kyang yongs su bskor zhing / gzhan yang thun mong ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bkod dung / su~M rgyas sogs rab gnas hU~M
110b6(rnying rgyud): yo byad/ thun mong du byi nang ge mchod gtor sogs bkod legs par bsham pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ lus dag sogs tshigs brgya dag cig ste/ rang gi lus ngag sems gsum dang gnas bya'i byin gyis mtshon pa'i phyi nang ge chos thams cad sems
110b7(rnying rgyud): sa gzhan gang na'ang mi gnas shing cir yang mi dmigs pa'i ngang las med bzhin du dang ldang ba mig yor lta bu'i tshul du mnyam par sbyor bas yul chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu la yul can rig pa no ro gcig tu 'dres pas yul med rang gsal nam mkha'
111a1(rnying rgyud): du du tun tu na na/
111a2(rnying rgyud): bla sa 'i nga sa
111a3(rnying rgyud): mi / par bye yulas gsus pa da pa pab pa nur na pa na gyu byur sa da ga rnas nga
111a4(rnying rgyud): ni bye du ladab rgya chu kyi kyis pa da ngos pa pa mtha ca ca ma da nga bani mchag 'thub ba 'byang badrim mthas du byed pa ba ste/ na 'animamam da bya rgyu pa gyung // bzhu bde/ sa
111a5(rnying rgyud): su shA thaM pa nga na pa nang slo
111a6(rnying rgyud): 'i sang pa spod ba'i byas su sa kyi khyod mirnaMsas med pa las ga'ad ba'i rnazlab bang pa nga ga/ / thogasangs skyegs gas sate/ phyogs
111a7(rnying rgyud): ni skyes bu'i phyil la mgyis pa'i ring nyid kyi 'i phyi 'ong bdarig 'jas rtse kyil babs labacing la rdzogs pa pasag lus shes sa pa'i 'ang 'i 'ang ba rnas pagra nas su byas su /
111b1(rnying rgyud): glang dran dag pa dang sdang dbyer med da mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sun dus pa de nyid 'jug kyang ba stim pa 'a mtshan nyid kyis pa ye myanyam par byor ba rdzogs brgya dras pa'i ku nas don gnyis mthur rtsi par gshegs pa'i rdul pa thams cad ston pasnyen pa'i sngon lam nga /
111b2(rnying rgyud): gis 'igadon mdzad pa'i phrin las ye zhes kyi dkyil 'khor du rnags rjes bzhengasangs rkyen padas tshig ga kyil 'khor ya bci rdzogs par 'dug pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad 'di las 'da'abar nga mdzad pas te bar 'brel bar gyur pa'i phyi ma tshig gi mtshig ces rgya/
111b3(rnying rgyud): drug pa la gsum las/ dang po byinang gi marjod pa ni/ sgo chog sogs tshogs pacad gcig ste phyi mdzad pa rnam pa lnga dang na bza' lhab sgrub/ nang snga nag tor rdzogs kyi yo byad dang / ngag gi tshe ga lus kyi zlog/ rol po la shes sogs mchod pa'i
111b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin byung mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyis rab tu mdzo byung / rgyas 'debs ma sogs gsang yum bzhi pa yod 'je ba'i tshul can nom bzhi dang / byin gi sems su brgyad de ma badz+ra drug gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i skabs kyi las gang byed pa de bzhin du

113a4(rnying rgyud): can ma/ pan klang ma/ bad+ma can/ ri mo chen bzhi'o// lnga pa gtso sems ni/ don gyi sems sbeng bden pa dbyer med kyi blta ba rtogs nying byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa/ bye brag las so so'i kun srong stongs kyi sems ni/ zhi zhing dngas pa/ dga' zhing

116b5(rnying rgyud): mtshon byed rtags la bkod pa ltar mtshon bya yab yum mnyam par sbyor ba ri mkha'i gsang gnyis la thabs shes bsnol ba'i sgo nas dgod par bya'o// gsum pa sgrub pa la gsum ste/ sgrub pa po dang / 'grub pa'i dus dang / bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu'o//

116b7(rnying rgyud): nga 'dzin dang // byang chub sems dang snying rje ste// lhag pa'i yo byad lnga rdzogs bya// zhes pa ltar lam gyi yo byad lnga 'am/ bro gar gru tshig/ bza' btung / gos rgyan// sbyor sgrol te sgrub pa rdzas kyi yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan pa dang / yid
117a1(rnying rgyud): slob pa dang byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir sngags te yan lag gi lha dgu'i das rgyan rigs bdag gcig gis bsdus pa'i gnad kyis gcig tu brtsis pas yan lag gi lha lnga'am/ yang na 'grel chung las/ snying gar ye shes
117a2(rnying rgyud): sems bsgom steng gar nyi zla'i dkyil// dam tshig phyag rgya bzhag ste de steng yig 'bru ba zhag/ zlos tshe spro bsdus bzlas bsngags kyi yan lag yin// zhes gsungs te/ de dag rdzogs par gsal ba'i rnal 'byor pas rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam
117a3(rnying rgyud): tshig ma nyams par sgrub pa la 'jug cing / zhugs nas nyams len la rab tu brtson par byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnyis pa la gnyis te/ mthong lam 'grub pa'i dus dang / mthar zug spu lnga 'grub pa'i dus so// dang po ni/ zhag ni sogs
117a4(rnying rgyud): rkang pa gsum ste/ dbang po dang brtson pa yang rab kyis zhag ni sum cu phrag drug ste zla ba drug gam/ rab kyis zla ba bcu gnyis te lo gcig/ 'bring gis zla ba bcu bzhi ste lo gcig dang zla ba gnyis/ tha mas kyang zla ba bcu drug ste lo gcig dang zla ba bzhi
117a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis dbang po brtul na rnam smin nam/ rnon tshe la dbang sgyur ba'i rigs kyi dam pa ste lam mchog yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshe dbang rig 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnyis pa ni/ de tshe sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ mthor lam la gnyis las nus thob tshe
117a6(rnying rgyud): dbang rig 'dzin thob pa de'i tshe lo brgya brgyan phyir bsnur ba lan bcu drug ste stong drug brgya tshun chad kyis rim gyis pa phyag chen dang lhan grub rig 'dzin brgyad nas mthar thag gi 'bras bu la sbyor zhing thod rgal ba tshe dbang nas lhun grub rig 'dzin nam/ shin tu blo chen las
117a7(rnying rgyud): gzhan ma brgyad par mthar thug gi 'bras bu sme lnga rgyan gyis grub pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par byed de/ rgyas pa las/ tshe ni bcu dang drug pa yis// brgya brgya dag tu bskur zhing gnas// lus me bor bar sangs rgyas sa// zhes gsungs
117b1(rnying rgyud): shing // ji ltar 'grub pa'i tshub ni 'chang bar 'gyur ro// gsum pa bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu la gnyis te/ 'grub tshul dang / 'bras bu rang gi ngo ba'o// dang po la gnyis te/ 'grub tshul rang snang du bstad pa dang / de dpe' sgo nas bstan pa'o// dang po ni/ 9
117b2(rnying rgyud): shes theg le sogs rkang pas dman pa'i tshigs bcad gsum ste/ lam mthar chags kyi dbang du lhan grub rig 'dzin dang / thod nal gyi dbang du tshe dbang gi dgongs pa rang rig pa'i ye shes sgros bral thig le de nyid kyi rang la mnyam par bzhag pa'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi ye
117b3(rnying rgyud): shes spros pa dang bral ba'i thig le de nyid rang snang ba'i phyir/ dgongs pa'i ngo bo ni blo'i yul las 'das pas bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtha' yas pa'i yon tan ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir mchog ste/ de tshe phyogs bcu dang dus bzhir mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa'i
117b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtha' yas pa dang / zhing der rgya gang du'ang mchad pas 'di tsam zhes bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang gzhi tshad med kyi ye shes kyi 'khor lo la bden pa'i bkod
117b5(rnying rgyud): pa mdzes pa'i rgyan dang / 'dod yon gyi rol mo'i smin tshogs rnam par 'khrigs shing / de ltar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor che ba'i yon tan ma lus zad pa med pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor lo bsam yas par snang ba kun kyang / skad cig dang po mnyam bzhag gi gzigs
117b6(rnying rgyud): dor rang rig mngon sum gyis mthong nas skad cig gnyis pa rjes thob la nye bar brnyes pa ste/ de thob pa dang gsung lnga yang ldan gyis grub pas ris su ma chad pa rgya chen po'i gsung gi snang ba las gdul bya'i don lhun grub tu 'byung ba'ang gzhi lam 'bras bu'i ye shes gsum
117b7(rnying rgyud): cig tu gyur pas mthun pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// de'i phyir gzhan du grub pa med de/ rig pa'i ye shes la rang snang ba'o// gnyis pa ni/ dpag bsam sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te/ dper na lha'i gnas sogs su dpag bsam shing gis
118a1(rnying rgyud): grib mar gnas pa rnams kyi bskor nus pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nong bu rin po ches mchod pa byed pa rnams kyi re ba skong bus pa dang / der ma zang gzhan yang 'dod pa 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur pa kun snang yang // don de dag rdzas grub tu
118a2(rnying rgyud): yod nas de la spyod pa ma yin te/ gzhon nu me skyes kyi rin po che'i khang bzang ma skyes dgra'i khang pa dang pa rjes kyang lo rang gi phyi bzhin 'brang ba lta r+ya rang rang gi sems kyi snang ba bsod nams kyi mthu brtas shing brtan par gyur pa nyid de lta bur sdud pa yin no// de bzhin
118a3(rnying rgyud): du 'bras bu 'grub tshul kyang de dang 'dra ste/ gzhi ji lta ba mngon du gyur pas spang thob med par sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ngo mtshar ba'i cho 'phrul chen po ya mtshan rmad du khyang ba brnyes pa'i yon tan gyi chos de yang / lam pa nyid kyis phar bgrod nas
118a4(rnying rgyud): der slebs pa'am gzhan zhig na yod pa tshur bkug nas 'ongs pa ma yin te/ thabs rang gsal 'gag med bde ba chen po la goms pa rab tu brtan par gyur pa'i rang rig pa'i ye shes nyid shes rab stong pa nyid kyi dbyings su grol ba'i zung 'jug de lta bu'i dang
118a5(rnying rgyud): du ma btsal bar rad 'byung du sdang ba'o// gnyis pa 'bras bu rang gi ngo bo la gsum ste/ rgyu rkyen las ma skyes shing don byed nus par bstan pa gcig tu bral gyi don dang byung gi ye shes su bstan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis gdul bya la gzigs
118a6(rnying rgyud): tshul lo// dang po ni/ shes rab dbyings sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te/ shes rab chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid thabs lam gyi phyag rgya chen po goms par gyur pas snang zhen gyi 'khrul pa sangs pa'i
118a7(rnying rgyud): don 'bras bu'i yon tan rnams rang gsal ba'i phyir/ bral 'bras tsam las lam gyis gsar du bsgrubs pa ma yin te/ gzhi'i ye shes de nyid la ni 'bras bu dang sdang ba'i ye shes rol ba tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro// de ltar ni 'bras bu'i snang ba de dag yod
118b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan mar mi 'gyur ram zhe na/ ye shes la ye shes rol pa nyid kyang dngos por ma grub ste/ sgra ma ltar gsog gsob yam brgya'o// ye shes ci 'dra bar sgra yang de 'dra ste/ rgyal ba sprul pa'i sgra 'jig rten du mngon sum du 'byung zhing 'gro ba sdug bsngal las skyob
118b2(rnying rgyud): ba dang / chos sku'i ngang las longs sku dang sdang ba'i byin rlabs kyis brda'i chos ston pa'ang ye shes la brjod pa de bzhin te/ rang rig su'i dkyil 'khor du ye nas bzhugs pa la 'bras bu'i phu rol cing de nyid kyang rang bzhin med pa smra ma nya bu'o// 'o gru dang yonas
118b3(rnying rgyud): des don byed mi nus pa zhig ma snyam na/ ma yin te/ don bya ba'i yul la don byed nus pa'i thugs rje'i gzi byin mnga' ba'i phrin las kyis sgra dang ye shes kyi rol pa gang 'gang 'tshams su bstan nas sgyu ma lta bu'i phrin las kyis don mdzad cing / de lta na 'ang ngo bo gzhan du 'gyur
118b4(rnying rgyud): ba ma yin te/ sku lnga dbyer mi phyed pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gang gis kyang mi shigs pa'i nus ma thu mnga' bas btsan po ste rje ba'i mchog dam pa'o// de yang rdo rje las/ ye shes rgyu mo dang sdung ba// rdo rje btsan po dmatshig mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyang
118b5(rnying rgyud): grub che// 'gro ba kun la rab sdang ba'o// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ gcig dang du ma sogs rogs bcad gcig ste/ sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhan sdang gzugs sgra'i rol pa tha dad du ston pas gcig gi mtha' dang / ji ltar bstan kyang rang bzhin chos
118b6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi su lus ma g.yos pas du ma'i mtha' dang bral zhing / de ltos kyi gnyis ka dang gnyis ka ma yin pa'i mu yang med de/ gcig dang du ma ma grub pas de'i mtha' khegs pa'i phyir dang / yod med rtag chad la sogs pa'i mtha' dang de ltos kyi dbus kyang grub pa med
118b7(rnying rgyud): brjod med de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su gshegs pas mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs bya gzigs byed las 'das pas mi gzigs te/ sdong po bkod pa las/ ji ltar mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa// de dag byis pa'i spyod tshul
119a1(rnying rgyud): te// gang zhig mtshan nying kun med pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams ni mi mthong ngo // zhes so// de ltan 'ang rang byung ye shes kyi dgongs pa ni gnas byang yul dang gnas byud kyi u gcan gnyis myed par rung gsal ma 'gags par
119a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad du sdang ba'o// gsum pa ni/ log par sogs tshigs bcad gcig dang / zhes ched sogs te/ 'gro ba'i log par rtog pa gzung 'dzin gyis rnam par brtag pa'i sgrib pa de dag ye nas rnam par dag pas chos dang chos nyid rang bzhin gyis 'brel zhing
119a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes kyang chos thams cad kyi chos dbyings las mi gzhan pa'i phyir yul dang yul can rang bzhin tha mi dad par 'brel pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams sngon byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe thugs rje chen pos sems can yongs su sgrol bar dam bcas

119a5(rnying rgyud): rigs drug gi 'jig rten dus su phyi dang gnas mtho man sogs snang ba thams cad ma lus pas la ler gzigs pa ni ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad snang la rang bzhin med par gzigs pa ni dbyer med mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o//
119a6(rnying rgyud): de skad ces ston pas ched du brjod par mdzad do// gsum pa mtshan ni/ gsang ba ni sogs te/ rgyud 'di la le'u nyer gnyis yod pa las/ 'dis rdo rje gsum thob byed las kyi rim pa gsum du bkod pa'i don mchog tu gsang ba 'da' dka'i dam tshig
119a7(rnying rgyud): ki le'u sta dgu pa'o// / le'u bcu pa la gsum ste/ lo rgyus dang / gzhung dang / mtshon no// dang po ni/ de nas sogs te/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing snod dang 'tshams par dbang bskur tshul mdor bstan pa de nas ji ltar bskul
119b1(rnying rgyud): rir ba ston pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po chos kyi rgyal po 'ogo 'phang skal ba dang 'tshams par sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbang bsrung ba'i ched du brjod pa 'ad brjod do// gnyis pa gzhung la gsum ste/ dbang
119b2(rnying rgyud): bskur ba'i rim pa/ ma bskur ba'i skyon/ bskur ba'i yon tan no// dang po dbang bskur ba'i rim pa 'chad pa'i skabs 'dir/ ster gsang bdag sgo thug pa chen po'i gsung rgyun lnga phyi gnyis las/ snga ma'i bka' sgrol 'dzin pa rnams dbang bams
119b3(rnying rgyud): cad la/ mtshungs ldan dang / dbang rdzas dang / skur thabs gsum du bsdus nas gsung na'ang / phyis don brgyad brgyad du bsdus nas gsungs pa'i lugs dbang btsun du byas na/ rdo rje las rim las/ chu chen ngo bo 'bras bu dang // rim

119b5(rnying rgyud): gsum dbang rnams ldan// zhes pas phran nus gnyis la rang rang gi bstim gnas dang / zab dbang gsum gyi lhag pa'i bden pa gsum mo// lhan cig byed pa ni/ phan nus gnyis la dbang rdzas rab gnas can dang / zab dbang la byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag
119b6(rnying rgyud): rgya ma'o// gnyis pa rkyen la bzhi las/ dad partson brtul zhugs gsum ldan pa'i rim pas phan nas zab mo'i dbang gsum bskyed rung ba'i slob bla rgyu'i rkyen/ dbang gsum bskur nus pa'i mtshan ldan gyi slob dpon bdag po'i rkyen/ rdzas sngags ting
119b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin sogs 'dzom pa'i nus pa khyad par can dmigs pa'i rkyen/ dbang snga ma snga mas go phye nas phye ma phye ma 'byung ba de ma theg pa'i rkyen no// gsum pa ngo bo ni/ rdo rje las re ma las/ ngo bo snod kyi mtshan nyid kyis// dbye ba rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur// zhes pas
120a1(rnying rgyud): phyi nang bar/ nang nus dbang // gsang ba dang ma'i dab dgas maso// bzhi pa 'bras bu ni/ dbyed na maston pa dung btags pa ltar dbang bslar bas tho bya dang gnas byed dmangan byung ba'i sa pa dngos sa thos pa'ams po

120a4(rnying rgyud): gnas// bstim gnas/ rang skal gyi sgrib pa gang dag nas nus pa gang skye ba'i tshul rjes mthun sngon lam dang bcas pa ste/ dbang ri re la'ang lnga lnga'o// bdun pa mthog pa'i ston dang / brgyad pa thob pa'i yon tan gnyis ni 'og tu ston no// da ni gzhung gi rgyas

120a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung gi rab gnas can gyi dbye rgyan paskyon la sti por rigs lnga'i dbang rgya 'cheng lding dbang rjes tshogs brgyad kyi shes pal bstim pas don ye shes lnga 'ang bor dag pa'i rtags rigs lngas dbu brgyan par bsam pa'o// de bzhin du mthar yas dang rdzing sems kyis brdabs
120a7(rnying rgyud): dra ra dras mthing gtson pa ni na pa'i gsas g.yon du bru shi dbyangs bcu nga gnyis la bsnyem pas yon tan thams cad rdzogs shing ba dag pa can 'dul bar dang / ngan 'byeng gis brlabs pa'i phreng ba mgor bcings shing shig les gnyis la bsgos pas gang
120b1(rnying rgyud): mkha' la wA 'gro ba dang / lus kyi ba dag gas la zhing ga byin 'byur ba'am sems kyi mngon shos gsal lbo ting 'dzin dang lo shos kyi 'dra 'bar bas la mgong mar bgrad pa dang / mnyashA dang mnyam pa la sogs pardzun mang ga dngos sgrub rnams dang / yang /
120b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin na po che'i sprin ltang 'dod pa'i chang 'bebs pa zag med slob pa'i lam rig 'dzin gyis dang mthar thug gi 'bras bu rigs bdag kun tu bzang po'i sa mchog thob par 'gyur te mchog gi dngos grub bo// gnyis pa k+Sha li sgrol ba'i thabs ni/ zhing gyur sogs tshigs
120b3(rnying rgyud): bcad gnyis te/ bskal ba'i khring du gyur pa ni mchog bkra shis dag pa'i zhing dang / mchog phran thugs rjes brgyang bya'i zhing gnyis las/ snga ma ni dngos grub kyi rdzas khyad par can mA chu sgri ba bdun pa'i mi yin la/ phyi ma ni TI bad+ha ste/ gsal bkra las/
120b4(rnying rgyud): dkon mchog slob dpon su dgu gnyis// da ma nyams log dang 'khus pa dang // 'du bar 'ongs dang yongs la gnod// dam dgra ngan pa'i ngang tshul can// ngan song ga sum dang bcu po ni// rnal 'byor kun gyis dang dublang // zhes so// yang na mchog zhing btu las sku
120b5(rnying rgyud): dgu gnyis gcig tu brdzis pa'i me bdun dang / mchog phran ni ngan song gsum rnams so// ji ltar sgrol ba'i thabs ni/ e gragasum 'bar ba'i nang ti zla'i steng du sgrol ba'i las la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor bas bskal b+ha bkrug pa bzhag/ de nas bskal b+ha dung ste 'as
120b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gsum sgrol ba'i phyir/ sgrol byed slob dpon dpal chen po dang / sgro la ki Tak+Shi rA dza'i nga rgyal la gnas pas gri 'jam dpal rnon por bskyed de lag gi 'du byed kyis khog pa phye bas ma rig pa'i rgya dral bar bsgom/ de nas la gsor la dpa' bo 'bru lnga bkod pa das snying
120b7(rnying rgyud): bzung bas yig 'bru'i 'od kyis rigs drug gis bon gnyid dang bcas pa sbyangs pa'i dang sa ma hU~M yig drug dang / de'ang gcig tu gyur pa slob dpon gyi shangs bug g.yon nas sru la bcug pas sgrib pa rnam par dag pa de nyid rdo rje'i lam nas yum gyi mapa' dbyings su thim nas gnas

121a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo sdebs bzhi pasgo dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas su spagasal ba'i theg le shin tu dngas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gnas pa hUM le gzung ljags chos mi phyag d+ha'i tshogs mchog las rin chen 'byung gnas rigs chung gi sems dpa' sgo slong dang bcas pa'i lha yab yu ma cwa
121a3(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskyed cing / bsgyur rlob dbab drang bstim pas na mchong nas/ slob po n+d+ha mi s+yo mtshams nas smyos pa'i 'od kyis bskul bas lha thams cad rjes chags kyis u ba slob pur thim pa'i rkyen gyis smyo baTa'ang 'od du zhu ba las dzin
121a4(rnying rgyud): chen 'byung gnas kyi sbyar bskyed pa la/ glegs pa mngon 'byung gI rab gnas can lag cag tad de/ skrag tshig ni/ d+haM/ gAsang ba sogs te/ trAM yig 'gro 'dren/ gsang ba mahA/ gsang chen ana?/ gsang mchog a ta yo ga'i rgyu dgang
121a5(rnying rgyud): yin pa dang / der ma zang gi seng bsngags kyi rlud sde gzhan gyi yog sogs sa tra la'ang nyan par dbang bas ma ldan par bya zhes gnang ba skrin zheng / nyan nas gsang ba'i don nyid bsam pas bad+ma gcing dpyod pa las gzhan 'chang dbang ma thob kyi bar de srid du su la 'das
121a6(rnying rgyud): bar bya ba men pas ma ston cig ces dam tshig bsgrags nas/ dbang rdzas rna ba'i thig ler bstim pas bka' phyi nang thams cad mnyan po la dbang 'thob par gyur pa'o// de nas sgom dbang gi bsam chud ni/ gsal ba'i sogs te/ dran pa gsal bar byed
121a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rten snying rtsa'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su dran pa gsal ba'i thig le dngas pa'i ngo bo nyid me tog 'phog pa'i lha gang len gyi yi ge zung lnga'i phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las rigs gang yin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal sgo thim pa sogs sar ltar las slob bu yid dam gang yin du bsgred
