121b3(rnying rgyud): pyA gnyi kyi/ phrin las kyi dbang gibs pand ni/ lag pa'i sogs te/ lag pa gnyis kyi 'dos ci'i 'khor lo'i gzhal la sus pa byed gsul ba'i rtenami thig le dngas par ba da blang ba'i bug cu tshogs patsog las 'phrin pas kyid dkyil khor
121b4(rnying rgyud): smozlas pa sags pas skyeb do grub tu bsted bul/ las rigs kyis brlabs pa'i rnams la gtagatad de/ sran can // / khyod na sogs te/ bu rjod de ldan dang las ma'adamanas sa sa sogs la ga rnamasas byas ngan khyong sa
121b5(rnying rgyud): kyis shig dang / de'i grogs mo nyam ze 'arol ba nang du 'du zhing phyir 'grob can gyis khyad cig nas sa pas dang ma thar thug kyi dgos pa don thams cing smra 'a bar byed pa yin zhes bsgrags nas/ rdzas lag pa'i thog ler bstim pas gzhan do phrin mas ldanapa
121b6(rnying rgyud): bang thob par gyur ba'o// de nas 'chad dbang gri bas ma byud ni/ wA byed sogs te sa byed kyi'i 'dom pa'i 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su sgragasal ba'i thig le dngus pa'i ngo bo nyid N+DI khrung wa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las gsung chos cirigs skur ma tha'i bye
121b7(rnying rgyud): dzar thog sa ma tha rnam pa thogs mim slo bu da da pa ga mid du bsrid pa la/ rdzing mabs pardabs pa'i dung dang 'khor lo phyag shing rnams lagadug tad de/ sdig cigani/ oM/ chos ma sogasate/ rkyen gsang na'i cis kyi'adu tshu
122a1(rnying rgyud): maud ces gangal kyi byas mas na rgya na// da ba na pa ga gas bamag par byab la na nga na/ da 'gyur ba gyur brnas pa
122a2(rnying rgyud): sa 'i TIg bsgrim pa pa bzhan pal ba dag 'dza pa dbang pobabar gyu ra// gsapa la po dpa shibapa mad de/ da ci ta/ da med me gas mo mas gyi dzi ba ma myo byed
122a3(rnying rgyud): rig shes kyi bag 'ang ba nyid lag g.yas par hU~M/ sra gzor mo/ lagag yon par sa/ rkang sreg yon pa pama?/ g.yas dang rnams drang rtswa sbrul pa rigs lngas sa rigs chung dang gsas pa'i skyil 'khor ba dang / lus kyi stong ga phyogs
122a4(rnying rgyud): mtshams pacang thob rtsal pa yum gyi zhing ba ba sgos pa sogs sur bar las thob thaban du bzeng ba sasgyu pal/ gas drug pas 'a sa pa'ing rdul phragadugad nga/ ga rgyanan/ ai/ phyogs pabu sogs te/ phyogs brgyangs pa ni
122a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba rnams cad kyi skrag sung thugs mi darjo bdag nyid rgya pa'i mchog ste/ rgyu nga dkyil 'khor ba byed na mtshad med pa da kyil kho la rnams pa sbyin pa'i thub khyo gces gdang basbyin dpa/ dbang rdzas ldan
122a6(rnying rgyud): lag tha'i thig le la ba sem pas gnan gyi dron kun rgya ma tshogs pa la dpung thob pa gyur ban// des na pa dbang rje srung yang gzhan kyi ngam nyi ma zung pa'i nus pa ni ma bzhag pa'i phying dus dpa rje b+h+yo/ dang po gnyis ces
122a7(rnying rgyud): grang byed byaman gsogs na kyi la ngas spyod pa dang dran mo pa'i rdzogs brjes su pa rnams can pa dros sa pa'i sel ba cad da kho ba du ma gso / bye sa sa de byang las su 'byung //
122b1(rnying rgyud): pa ba dbang bskung ba dam pa ni/ shes rab sogs tshogs pacad gcig gi sring nga tha ba dbang gsum sbags nas ston te/ yum shes rab ma tshan dang ldan pa la nyi zam/ bcu drug ma/ bcu gnyis ma gsus ngem par dbang gas pa kyin du zung ba dang / thabs la /
122b2(rnying rgyud): gsang dbang la rdo rje slob dpon dang / gong ma gnyis la slob ma ste/ yab yum ltar gsal bas thabs shes gnyis kyi mkha' gas dbyin gyis rlob cing / sbyor ba'i brdas bskul nas phyag rgya bzhis snyoms par zhugs pa las/ yab kyi byang chub kyi
122b3(rnying rgyud): sems bde ba'i rang bzhin hUM yig gi 'bru tshogs sra gsal ba'i chu tshun yab kyi rdo rje'i lam nas yum gyi pad+mod 'khyil ba'o// de nas bshad pa'i zu gsum las/ dang po gsang dang gi dus su pad+mor bskyil ba'i byang sems de nyid thabs shes gang yang rung ba'i
122b4(rnying rgyud): mkha' gsang gi rtse nas dngos su len cing / mi nas na yab kyi lces blangs pa las sam/ me long gis blangs te bdud rtsi dang sbyar ba slob bu'i kyai thog tu bzhag pas byung sems de nyid yungs 'bru tsam gyi rdo rje sems dpa' sha stag tu gsal ba snying gar babs te bstim
122b5(rnying rgyud): zhing / des chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa chen bzhi la gnas pa'i rigs drug gi sa bon gnyid dang bcas pa sbyangs pas sems nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin don dam smos med kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bsgyur ba'o// yang zur gnyis pa sher dbang gi dus su yas babs
122b6(rnying rgyud): dga' bzhi'i 'gros kyis phyen pa'i thig le pa d+mar nges pa'i gnas su bskyil bags ca'i rdza rtse gnyis nas kyi ska ngan tshun du bstim zhing ngogacig tu 'dres pas sems nyid don dam 'od gas la du dngas pa'i rtags snang zhag pa kun rdzob skye ye shes su ga ba na de'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bad kyi/
122b7(rnying rgyud): skyedakyil 'khor dbang bsgyur ba'o// yang bur gsum pa dbyer med pa de chenas dbang gi dus su byang sems yum gyi bablor bsgril bas yas babs kyi dga' bzhi' 'gros re re la'ang dga' ba bzhi bzhi ste brdudrug/ de sa'i zlaso sor brtsis pas mtshan so gnyis dang /
123a1(rnying rgyud): zla ba'i dga' ba brna ga po la'ang mi shes papa dang ldan pas na da gas dang/ 'ang par gas pa sa sa gang bram sa na can dkyis 'gro dang rdzog pa bangs kyi
123a2(rnying rgyud): bsgrim dang / mas brtan gyi dgarda ba bcudrug ga dang po bzhi rdzogs lam/ de nas dngas spyong mthong / de nas dgas bsgom la byas dgra rdzogs te/ dga' ba bzung ga gi san rang bzhin ga cig sas dga'i spyan zhes kyi 'brang ba'i bde bachen po ni rdza
123a3(rnying rgyud): stong gi mthas ma bsgribs par gsal bas kun tu 'od dang / mi shigs pa'i dang sams lus thams cad la khyab cing brtan pas 'khor ba'i gyon gyis mgos pas badra can dang / rtog tshigs thams cad spa nga yo shes kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'byams su rang spang bas
123a4(rnying rgyud): yi ge 'khor lo'i sa rdzogs te/ 'khor 'das mnyam nyid bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bsgyur ba'o// de ltar gsang ba zab mo'i dbang gsum bskur bas thun mong ma yin pa'i rdzogs ripa la spyod pa'i skal ba can du byal pa'o// gnyis pa dbang
123a5(rnying rgyud): ma bsgyung ba 'i smon ni/ slob gron rdzogs tshogs paca gcig ste/ dbang bskur ba po dza bu smon rdzogasugakyis panyis par babyas shing / ba dus rgyab mo 'ad gang rabs rgya de ma thob par mthas pa gsang sngags kyi da dang ldan pag tan 'chang brtsub
123a6(rnying rgyud): lasogs pa'i byab pa rnam pa rnams tshe 'dir bsgrubs pa'i 'bras thu dngos thub mad cing / phyi mang ni gror ltung bas bdag par 'gyur ro// gsum pa'i spar ba'i yon tan/ dus 'diso gas tshogs paca ga cig ste/ dbang thob pa'i du
123a7(rnying rgyud): ngas gsum thergyal ba'i sras kyi sang ba 'a zhing/ phreb nga maung daltung ba'i las 'thabs shing bdang byas sa sa jug pajal mas meng pa dang / 'a ngad pa bur ga / rgyam sa sa shes
123b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal po dang / zas dbang gis thar pa'i lam ston pa'i bshes gnyen dang / zab dbang gis rtsal bkun mya dgas kyi bdag pa chen por 'gyur ba nas brjod par mdzad do// gsum pa le Ta'i margyad ni/ gsang ba sogs te/ smad 'dal le Ta nye gnyis yod pa las/ 'dis sngo/
123b2(rnying rgyud): dang 'tshams par dbang gsum sbyin pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / le'u bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa bsdebs nas tshogs sgrub bstan pa la gsum ste/ lo rgyas gnyis dang / gzhung gnyis dang / mtshan gnyis sdebs pa'o// dang po ni/ le'u bcu gcig pa'i de nas
123b3(rnying rgyud): sogs dang / bcu gnyis pa'i de nas sogs te/ sngar le'u dgra par tshogs sgrub mdor bskrun pa de nas le'u gnyis bsdebs nas tshogs sgrubargyas par ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ces pa chen pos bsgrub bya zung 'jug sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po'i go 'phang mchog gi dngos grub
123b4(rnying rgyud): la dbang sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sdang spyod ci yul thams cad ye shes bya rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te longs spyod mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gnyis pa gzhung gnyis sdebs
123b5(rnying rgyud): pa la gnyis te/ dngos dang / de gsungs pa'i tshul lo// dang po la gnyis te/ mtshan nyid gsum mdo dang / rgyas par bshad pa'o// dang pa ni/ shes 'dug sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ chu shes pa'i mtshan nyid blta ba rtogs shing / rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting rje
123b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin goms pas lha spyod zung 'brel du 'byor pa ni sgrub byed thabs kyi nges pa mi gtong ba'i gzungs kyang yin la/ sa bon dang rgya lung ltar 'bras bur smin byed kyi rgyu dang rkyen yang yin no// de ltar rtogs goms gnyis 'bras bu 'byin rgyas kyi mthu can du gang gi tshe gyur pa na zag med skyob pa'i
123b7(rnying rgyud): lam rig 'dzin bzhi dang / mi slob pa'i lam rgyal ba spu lnga'i go 'phang 'thob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du grags par 'gyur ro// yang cig car bltar na shes 'dug gnyis dbyer med tshig chod du rtogs goms zung du 'byor pas zag med lam gyi ye shes gcig chod du mngon du
124a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba'o// de ltar nges cig cang gnyis ka'i lam mtshan nyid gsum gyis 'jang // theng las/ lam gnyis ka yang mtshan nyid gsum gyi don mthar phyin par 'gyur te/ zhes so// gnyis pa lags mas/ rgyu shes pa'i dang / rkyen
124a2(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa'i dang / 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i mtshan nyid do// dang po la gnyis te/ gtan rdzogs dang / grub 'bras gzhan tshal ci zhen pa dgag pa'o// dang po la gsum ste/ rtogs pa bzhi dang / dag pa gsum gyi dang / mnyam pa bzhi gtan tshigs so// dang na/ chugacig sogs/
124a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs bcang gcig ste/ ma rig log rtog gi sems las 'khor ba dang / spu dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor las byung 'das su sdang ba ste/ de ltar 'khor 'das gnyis su snang zheng zhen pa'i chos ni chu gcig pa'i rtags kyi gzhal bya yin la/ 'jal tshul snyam snga mas gtan la phab
124a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i grub mtha'i zhen cha gtan tshigs phyim phyi ma'i gzhal byar byas te/ 'jal byed rgya gcig pa'i dang / yig 'bru'i tshul gyi dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i dang / mngon sum pa'i gtan tshigs bzhis bcal pas// rim pa ji lta bar rang bzhin phye med/ rol pa 'gag med/ ngos
124a5(rnying rgyud): dbyer med/ de'ang yul yul can med par mngon sum du rtogs pa ni mtshan nyid blo bral te grub mtha'o// ji ltar zhe na/ 'khor 'das kyis bsgos pa'i chos thams cad sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes skye ba med pa'i dbyings su chu gcig pa yin te/ de ltar rtogs pa dang ma rtogs pa
124a6(rnying rgyud): las 'khor 'das gnyis su snang ba'i phyir/ dper na rgyal bu da'u dmangs su 'dzin pa'i sgo 'dogs dang rgyal bur nges pa'i tshad ma gnyis ngo bo rgyal bur gcig pa bzhin no// de'ang rgya mtsho las/ chos nyid dbyings su tshul gcig pas// ma lus dang sdang chos thams cad// ma lus
124a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems su rtogs// zhes so// sems nyid phye med kyi gdangs rol pa 'gag med lha'i sra gsung thugs su dang snang ba yin te/ mtshon du med pa'i yi ge a nyid mtshon byed yi ga du mar ma 'gags par snang ba sumatshon nas rtogs pa'i phyir/ dper na mdzub mo sa bong can

125a1(rnying rgyud): dag snga ma'i grub mtha' phyi ma'i gzhal byar byas pa ni rIm gyis pa'i rtogs tshul te/ cig car pa'i dbang du byas na/ dngos po gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad bden pa dbyer med du chu gcig pa dang / de mtshon byed yig 'bru a
125a2(rnying rgyud): A ma gsum 'dus pa'i tshul gyis mtshon nas/ gnyis su med pa'i dbyings de'i byin gyis rlabs kyi mthus rdo rje gsum du ye nas sangs rgyas par rang rig mngon sum gyis thag tshad cing bro'i spyod yul las rnam par grol ba ni grub mtha' te/ rngams klog las/ rgyan bden
125a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis cig car du// gcig pas gcig pa'i mtshan nyid dang // spa gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// chos sun rang bzhin rtogs pa dang // lce med dbyings kyi byin rlabs las// chos kun snang bar shes pa dang // de lta bu yi rang bzhin te// gzhan lam brten mi 'ag
125a4(rnying rgyud): bar// mngon sum rig pas thag chod na// rnal 'byor sa la slebs pa yin// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ snod bcud rgyan rnams dag rtogs shing // zhes te/ phyi snod kyi 'jig rten 'byung ba lnga dang / nang bcud kyi sems can phung po lnga dang de dag rang rang gi rgyud rnam shes
125a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs brgyad kyis bsdus pa rnam la ye nas sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas pa yin te/ snod bcud rgyud gsum po de rim pa ji lta bar de bzhin gshegs pa yum lnga dang / yab lnga dang / ye shes ltar dag pa'i phyir/ gang ye nas dag pa'i rang bzhin la
125a6(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa mtha' dag gis gos ma myong bas khyab cing de nyid sku dang ye shes kyi ngo bor sangs rgyas pas khyab ste/ chos kyi sra bzhin no// de skad du'ang / thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi btsal// zhes so// gal te de nyid rtogs shing goms
125a7(rnying rgyud): nasangs rgyas yin mod/ gnas pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas su ji ltar 'gyur snyam na/ rtogs cang ma rtogs rung rang bzhin rnam dag ni sangs rgyas yin te/ 'dus byas rnams rtogs drang ma rtogs drang mi rtag pa yin pa bzhin no// gsumani/ mnyam gnyis
125b1(rnying rgyud): sogs rkang pa gsum ste/ chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa yin te/ mnyam pa bzhis 'khor 'das gnyis med du rtogs pa'i phyir/ da la mnyam pa bzhin/ spos pa phyogs re tsam dang mtha' dag zod pa'i dbye bas rnam grangs dang rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don/
125b2(rnying rgyud): dam zhes phye ba gnyis ka'ang spros pa bkag pa'i stong nyid tsam du mnyam zhing / snang du// dra'ang don byed nus mi nus kyis yang dag dang log pa'i kun rdzob ces btags pa gnyis ka'ang bden pas stongs pa tsam du mnyam pa gnyis ni theg chen thun mong pa'i tshul yin la/ 5
125b3(rnying rgyud): par sngags bla na med pa'i tshul las ni lhag pa'i mnyam pa gnyis gsungs te/ med dkug dang ma yin dgag gi dbye bas rnam grangs dang rnam grangs ma yin pa'i stong nyid gnyis ka'ang lhag pa'i don dam dkor bdun ngo bo nyid du lhun gyis grub par mnyam zhing / ma dag pa
125b4(rnying rgyud): las snang log pa'i dang dag pa lhar snang yang dag pa'i kun rdzob gnyis ka'ang lhag pa kun rdzob ste dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du mnyam pa'o// de ltar 'jal byed gtan tshigs rnams kyis bcal bas gzhal bya 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ro mnyam pa rang bzhin gyi
125b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du rtogs pa ni grub mtha' ste/ de'i tshe dag ma dag gis phye ba'i zhing thams cad kyang / na tu bzang po'i zhing khams kyi rang bzhin du dbyer mi phyed cing / sgo gsum gyi byed spyod ci dang ci byas kyang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po gnyis lhun rdzogs su gyur
125b6(rnying rgyud): nas ther snang ye shes su 'char ro// ga da ga rtogs pa bzhi dang dgas nyas kyi gtad tshigs 'di rnams sngang le 'u gsum par yang byung bas rnaMs so snyaman/ gnas tshul dang rtogs tshul gyi sdig pas thos skyon med de/ snga ma ni btags gzhi 'khor ba'i chos gzhan la 'bebs par
125b7(rnying rgyud): ched du thos la/ 'dir ni lha sprod spel ba'i phyir tshigs sgrub kyi sngon 'gror smos pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ dus bzhi sogs tshogs bcad gcig ste/ de ltar gtan la phebs pa'i grub mtha'i 'bras bu de dag dus bzhi dang phyogs bcu ste yul dus gnas skabs gang nas btsal kyang
126a1(rnying rgyud): rang gi sems nyid las logs du gyur pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rang mtshan pa zhig rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems nyid rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa de gtogs na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ 'di ltar nang du sangs rgyas ma rtogs na
126a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan phyi rol du btsal kyang mi rnyed pas ma 'tshol zhig ces gdams so// gnyis pa rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la/ rim gyis pa dang / cig car ba gnyis las/ dang po la'ang gnyis te/ gang bsrubs pa'i gzhi dang / ji ltar sgrub pa'i thabs phun sum tshogs pa'o//
126a3(rnying rgyud): dang po la gsum ste/ sgrub pa po dang / gnas yo thun mong du bstan pa dang / dus so// dang po ni/ yan lag sogs tshegs bcad gcig ste/ sngags kyi yan lag lnga tshang zhing dam tshig ma nyams pas rgyud dag pa/ srub pa rdzas kyi yo byad lnga dang ldan cing / de ting sogs cho
126a4(rnying rgyud): galnga po rdzogs par shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa tshom bu gcig gsum lnga pa gang yin gyi sgra grangs dang mthun pa tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis tshogs bsgrubs na nges par legs pa'i dgos pa rig 'dzin bzhi dang / mthar thug gi dbras bu rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thub par 'gyur ro//
126a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa ni/ gnas dang sogs rkang pa bdun te/ rang dbang zhing bar chad mi 'byung ba'i gnas 'khor khang rim pa gsum ldan dang / 'tsho ba zas kyi/ rkyen bzlog sman gyi/ sgrub pa rdzas kyi/ mchod pa rdzas kyi yo byad de nyer mkho'i longs spyod thams cad bsags pas ci bde bar
126a6(rnying rgyud): spyad du yod pa dang / des mtshon te mthun rkyen rnams ma nyams par tshang zhing 'gal rkyen med la/ sgrub pa'i sgo ni gzhan rkyen gyis mi 'phrog pas mthar spel ba'i zhe bcad dang / blta bsgom spyod gsum 'brel ba'i blor ba dang ldan pas/ dang por sgrub pa la 'jug dus 'dod pa'i don ma
126a7(rnying rgyud): grub kyi bar du bsgrub bo snyam pa'i dam nus pa bzhin du mthar skyel bar bya zhing / de'i tshe brtson pa 'dor ba'i le lo dang sgyid lug gi snyoms las su lus pa rnams med pa'i sgo nas blol the tshom med par bsgrubs byas na chom bu'i dkyil 'khor gang bsrubs kyang thun mchog gi dngos grub thams/
126b1(rnying rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang zhe na/ 'bras chos ldang dbyer mi byed pa'i darje gsang mchog rgyal ba'i dgongs pa dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// gsum pa ni/ bsgrub pa'i sogs nang pa gnyis te/ ngisam bsgrub pa'i zhag grangs ni sum du zag drug sogs 'dzu dbu pang bsha nga/
126b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin dang / sgrub pa la 'jug pa'i chos grangs sogs ni bshad rgyud rgyas pa sogs rgyud gzhan las smos pa bzhin du bshad par bya zhes kha 'phangs te/ rgyas pa las/ chos grangs yar gyi brgyad la bya// shin tu skar ma rgyal rnams la// zhes so// 'dir kha cig/
126b3(rnying rgyud): po'i rgyud 'di chud ma yin par 'gyur te/ rgyud la kha 'phangs pa'i phyir zer/ de ltar na 'jam dpal sbrang dang mkha' 'gro ma kun spyod kyi sdungad sogs kyang rgyud ma yin par 'gyur te/ zud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ shes dang / rgyung du sbas pa 'dir bshad bya// zhes rgyud
126b4(rnying rgyud): gzhan la kha 'phangs pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa sgrub pa'i thabs la gnyis te/ zhi ba'i dang / khro bo'i sgo nas sgrub pa'o// dang po la gnyis te/ baisnyen sgrub bzhi mdor bstan pa dang / de rgyas par bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ bsnyen pa dang ni sogs rkang pa gnyis te/
126b5(rnying rgyud): 'di'i skabs su spyir lam rim las/ 'di yang lam sgrub sbyor ba yi// zhes pas lam dus kyi/ sgrub pa'i dus kyi/ sbyor ba'i dus kyi bsnyen sbrul yan lag bzhi las/ dang po ni/ lam bgrod tshul rim gyis pa'i dbang du byas te/ lta ba rtogs nas stong chen dang kun ting
126b6(rnying rgyud): la gnas pa bsnyen pa dang / phyag rgya gcig spros ni nye bsnyen dang / tshogs sgrub ni sgrub pa dang / de 'bras mthong lam thob ma rag pa ni sgrub pa chen po ste/ lam rim las/ byang chub sems rtogs 'grus pa ni// bsnyen pa'i dam pa yin pa'i phyir// sems chas snying rje maH
126b7(rnying rgyud): chad do// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// de phyir gcig dang spros pa'o// sgrub pa nyid ni bar chad med// dus kyi tshogs mthas sgrub chen len// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ bar chad med pa'i lam pa tshogs sgrub pa'i dbang du byas te/ sngon 'gro shoms byed cing nub dang po
127a1(rnying rgyud): rgya zhapa la ga pa da sa na dang/ pa ga ts+tsha sa gyu / gas pa ba
127a2(rnying rgyud): pal rtsa 'du lacha dang bsgral zhi pa thabs dad pa byad ni sgrub padang/ gas 'thongs thanapa pa na na pa ba thu / byed gamanya bdapa
127a3(rnying rgyud): gsal ladzu sa da // bcom mang byed thu pas/ 'dra ba la rgyas bsgrub par \u0f7f/ zhag kyang sa dzung margyags byung // da mi thub sa byung chubargyad po// zhes so// gsum pani/ sgrub pa chen pa 'dus dang nga dzub sa mtha' las
127a4(rnying rgyud): dbang byas / phyog brtsal nas cas pa lag pan bzhin pa dang / yum byu ba'i ngas pas gsags ni ti byed dang/ gas da pa ba nga she ba sa nas nga ga dgas ci shings pa sgru badzin pal// gnyis pa
127a5(rnying rgyud): bshad la gsum ste/ bsnyen pa dang / kye sgra bathun mang nga bstan pa dang / sgrub pachen po'o// dang po la gnyis te/ na byab dang / rbab dang po rgyab las kyi bsnyen pa'o// da coH/ mtha' kyis sogs tshogs brgyad gcig ste/ bskyed rim ltar ting 'dzin gsum
127a6(rnying rgyud): na du 'grobasam pa'ad kyil snang dang sa pa'i dbyings kyi snang brtan gzhal yas pang du zhin pa'i gdan la/ rang byung yi gas kyis kun la dbang bsgyur ba'i rnas po na rna sems dpa' gangs dpul te yab yum dang / rdzogs rim ltar na byings dang la shes te/ de nyar zung 'brel
127a7(rnying rgyud): bsgom par byas pa ma rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad na kyang lhag mam lus par ni pe rnam par 'gyu te/ rdul pa thams cadag cig dang du ma'i mtha' las grol dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pal dbyangs me chung 'jug tu 'a 'byur // de la snang tshogs
127b1(rnying rgyud): grub kyi sngon du zhi khro gang byed kyi bsnyen pa byed pa ni/ mos bsgom tsam ma yin/ nges rdzogs su bslab pa'i lugs yin pas/ dang por lta ba gtan la thebs par byas nas tshogs lam gyi rnal 'byor bzhi la brtan pa thob par bya dgos mod/ 'dir don rtogs kyi rgya gcig tsam smos
127b2(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis ka'i bsdus don lta bu las sngon du bya ba'i basbyin pa kho na 'chad byed du ma des kyang / snying rje sgyu ma nas zod brgal du bgrod pa 'byung mi srid pas tshogs sgrub kyi sngon du rgya gcig 'gro bas khyab pa'i phyir sa khongs 'dzin byed tsam du smos pa'o// gnyis pa
127b3(rnying rgyud): la gsum ste/ tshom bu lnga pa dang / gsum pa dang / gcig pa'o// dang po ni/ lnga dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ rnal 'byor pa pho mo dang lha yab yum brang spyad de so sor bsgom pa'am/ rnal 'byor pa skyim tshom bu spyir bsgom pa gang mos kyis gtso ba rigs
127b4(rnying rgyud): kyi yab lnga dang yum lnga'i lha zhal sbyor du bzhugs pa la so so'i rigs chung gi sems dpa' yab yum zung bzhis bskor bas tshom gu lnga'i lha wab tu bkod pa la khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcus bskor bas lha bdun tu'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshul du shoms kyi tsha bri zhing bsnyen pa'i
127b5(rnying rgyud): dus su rnam par bsgom par bya'o// gnyis pa ni/ de bzhin sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / dbus su rdo rje'i rigs dang / nub tu pad+ma'i rigs rnams la so so'i rigs chung gi sems dpa 'azung bzhis bskor ba ste/
127b6(rnying rgyud): de ltar su gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor cha gsum gyi mthar khro bo yab yum brgyad kyis bskor bas lha zhe drug gi tshogs dang ldan pa'i tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bri zhing bsgom mo// gsum pa ni/ rigs kyi sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ rigs thams cad kyi rigs kyi bdag
127b7(rnying rgyud): po ste rigs kyi gtso bo ni thugs rdo rjer 'du zhing / de'i rgyu mtshan rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs ye shes lnga gcig tu 'dus pa ni rang byung gi ye shes te/ de nyid mtshon byed thugs kyi mchog rdo rje mi bskyod pa yab yum la rang gi rigs chung gi sems dpa' zung bzhi dang / khro bo ya /
128a1(rnying rgyud): yum bzhes bskor bas lnga bco brgyad kyi tshogs dang ldan pa'i chom thug cig pa'i lha rnams dri zhing bsgom mo// gnyis pa la gnyis te/ rnal 'byung ba thams lhas sar ba sgom pa dang / tshe mthu' lha sgrub pa'i thabs so// da pan/ rnam
128a2(rnying rgyud): myong thabs dang sogs rkang pa lnga ste/ rnal 'byor pa thabs yab dang shes rab sem rnams kyis rim pa ltar de bzhin gshegs partags ze la ba sa dang rigs kyi yum lnga rngams rang rlom zhing / de bzhin du 'khor byin la 'byor pa po rnam gyis sems dpa' dang / sornas
128a3(rnying rgyud): gyis sems ma nyid du bskams nas rgya so so'i sngags dang rang rang gi ga rgya dang ting nge 'dzin dang de yang dag par so som 'dres pa da gsal ba la gaslab pa'o// gnyis pas gsum te/ chom thu gcig pa dang / gsum pa dang / wa pa sgrib pa'i thabs so// dang po ni/
128a4(rnying rgyud): rje'i rigs sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ rdo rje'i rigs su rigs gzhan thams cad 'du bas chom bu gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'khro ga ni byin 'bar dbyung rab tu bsgom zhing / yo byang la chags med tshul gyis spyod pas 'khor gsum mi dmigs pa'i dbyings su bstim pa
128a5(rnying rgyud): byub ste/ de'i 'bras bu ni lha spyod gnyis ming bu 'byong bar gyur nas thob pa'i mthong lam de la mgong ma phyag tu chen po'i rig 'dzin la spong bar byud nga// gnyis ga ni/ yang nasngags tshigs brgyad gnyis te/ chom tha gcig pa las gzhan yang na su gsung dwags kyi thom
128a6(rnying rgyud): gsumang bsgrub par bya ba nyid de/ sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus bsdu gsung thugs rdo rje gsum du 'dus pa'i phyir/ rgyom bu gsum gyi lhang te 'dzin gsal zhing gzi byin 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'gro bar bsgoms nas/ so byang rnams gnyis med kyi thos mnyam pa'i dang/
128a7(rnying rgyud): kying du thim par spyad pas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu mthong lam gnyis las/ tshe dbang de rig 'dzin pazhi'i nang nas dngos grub mchog banyes pa ldan grub rig 'dzin thob pa la sbyor bar 'gyur bas yon tan pa dag don du rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar bste gsal bar mngon du nga
128b1(rnying rgyud): cing / gzhan don du 'gro ba'i nyan mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa'i phrin las kyis thams cad kyang rdo rje gsum mo phyed pa'i rigs su rtse ba'i gnas la 'god par mdzad do// gsum pa ni/ sngags 'chang sogs rkang pa bdun te/ sngags 'chang gang zhig dngas grub yang dag thob pas
128b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod pas ni rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab grangs tshang 'tshogs pa thams cad kyis tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor cha wa dang khro 'phreng rnams te lha bdun cu so sor bsgoms nas/ yo byad la chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'dod yon ma 'gags pa'i 'od zer rnam pa mang po 'pho zhing gnyis su
128b3(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dbyings su bstim par byed pa'i bya bas brnyes pa'i 'bras bu mthong lam gnyis las cho bang des dngos grub mchog gi snying po spyi lngar sbyor ba 'grub bo// 'on rtsomabu dang dkyil 'khor gyi khyad par gang snyam na/ rnam sdar sogs rigs bzhi'i gtso bo rda nga'i rigs ga
128b4(rnying rgyud): gis bsdus pas rigs tha dad kyi gtso bo gcig tu gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor dang / rang gi rigs rlung gis bye brag tu bskor bas rigs tha mi dad kyi katso bo rigs so sos byed pa ni chom bu'o// gsum pa sgrub pa chen po la gnyis te/ sgrib byed yo byad lnga la spyad pa'i thabs dang / de'i
128b5(rnying rgyud): bsgrub bya dngos grub bo// dang po la gnyis tAM/ yo byad bzhi la spyad pa'i thabs dang / A li kA li la sbyang ba'i thabs so// dang po ni/ gos rgyan sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ dar dang zhing lpags sogs lus la bgo ba'i gos dang / rin chen dang thod phreng sos
128b6(rnying rgyud): 'dregs pa'i rgyan gyi yo byad dang / dri ro zhim pa'i bza' btung gi dang / snyan pa'i glu dang sbyar ba'i sgra tshig gi dang / rigs so so'i dang bro dang lag gar gyi 'du 'gro ste/ yo byad bzhi'i tshogs gang dang gang spyod pa thams cad kyi sprin phung la rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin
128b7(rnying rgyud): hUM gis mtshon nas rang snang gi longs spyod du shes pas chags zhen med par rab spyad na 'bras bu ngo mtshang 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes pas phan yon rlabs po che thob po// gnyis pa la gsum ste/ A li skyong ba/ kA li sgrol ba/ de gnyis spang
129a1(rnying rgyud): sa pa brtan pa'o// dang po la gsum ste/ gang la spyad bya'i yul/ ji ltar spyad pa'i thabs/ yum gyi mkha' las dngos grub chen po blang ba'o// dang po ni/ lha mo sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ lo grangs rgan gzhon dang /
129a2(rnying rgyud): rtsabazang ngan dang / nyi zla 'dzag mi 'dzag dang / sbyor thabs kyi sgyu rtsal shes mi shes sogs kyi sgo nas phye ba'i mi mo ste/ rab lha mo/ 'bring klu mo/ tha ma rigs ngan mo dang / yang na rnal 'byor pa nus pa thob pas dang po gnyis dngos su dgug pa 'am/ de ltar mi
129a3(rnying rgyud): nus pas phyim ste mi'i bu mo'o// gang ltang kyang rnal 'byor pa'i blo khyod kyis bzang ngan so sor dbye ste bzang po bsten pa'am/ yang na mi dbye bar gang rung bsnyen pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ yum gyi sogs tshogs bcud gcig ste/ 'dod pa'i bstan bcos kyis bde ba rgyas
129a4(rnying rgyud): par byas te/ yab yum lhar bskyed cing mkha' gsang rdo rje dang pad+mar rlobs pa'i yum gyi pad+mar tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas/ de nyid du bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byang chub kyi sems spro zhing / bde ba'i sgra dang 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas
129a5(rnying rgyud): kyai sbyin 'khrigs pa'i tshogs ma lus la mchod cing spyan drang sa/ de rnams dgyes par rol pas 'dod chags chen po'i mes byung sems dkar dmar shin tu dngas pa'i ngo bor phub bdag gi skyo bo nas zhugs pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor kyi lha rnams mchod pas thams cad nga rig gi/
129a6(rnying rgyud): ngo bor dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bdag dang 'khor 'dis dbyer med bde ba chen po'i ngang du bstim pa'o// gsum pa ni/ bsgrubs pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ de ltar bsgrubs par byas pa'i mkha' gsang gi nyi zla gnyis 'dres ye shes lngar rang gsal
129a7(rnying rgyud): babar byed pa'i snying po de pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor nas tshogs sgrub kyi nub tha ma'i tho rengs kyi dus su yab kyi gsang ba rdo rje'i lce yis blangs te ldog dgram gyi sbyor bas rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes su la bzla'o// de ltar bsgrubs pa'i yon tan ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyis
129b1(rnying rgyud): mkha' la b+ha ltar 'gro ba dang / lus kyi kha dog gsal zhing gzi byin 'bar ba'am sems kyi mngon shes gsal zhing ting 'dzin dang ye shes kyi 'od 'bar bas la mgong mar bgrod pa dang / tshe nyi zla dang mnyam pa la sogs pa thun mong gi dngos grub rnams dang / yid
129b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin rin po che'i sprin ltar 'dod pa'i char 'bebs pa zag med slob pa'i lam rig 'dzin gyis dang mthar thug gi 'bras bu rigs bdag kun tu bzang po'i sa mchog thob par 'gyur te mchog gi dngos grub bo// gnyis pa kA li sgrol ba'i thabs ni/ zhing gyur sogs tshigs
129b3(rnying rgyud): bcad gnyis te/ bskal ba'i zhing du gyur pa ni mchog bkra shis dag pa'i zhing dang / mchog phran thugs rjes bzung bya'i zhing gnyis las/ snga ma ni dngos grub kyi rdzas khyad par can gyi chu skye ba bdun pa'i mi yin la/ phyi ma ni zhing badz+ra ste/ gsal bkra las/
129b4(rnying rgyud): dkon mchog slob dpon sru dgra gnyis// dam nyams log dang 'khus pa dang // 'du bar 'ongs dang yongs la gnod// dam dgra ngan pa'i ngang tshul can// ngan song gsu ma dang bcu po ni// rnal 'byor kun gyis dang du blang // zhes so// yang na mchog zhing btu las sru
129b5(rnying rgyud): dgu gnyis gcig tu brdzis pa'i mi bdun dang / mchog phran ni ngan song gsum rnams so// ji ltar sgrol ba'i thabs ni/ e gru gsum 'bar ba'i nang nyi zla'i steng du sgrol ba'i las la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bskal bya bkug pa bzhag/ de nas bskal b+ha ru dra ste 'das
129b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gsum sgrol ba'i phyir/ sgrol byed slob dpon dpal chen po dang / sgro la king Ta k+ki rA dza'i nga rgyal la gnas pas gri 'jam dpal rnon por bskyed de lag gi 'du byed kyis khog pa phye bas ma rig pa'i rgya dral bar bsgom/ de nas lag sor la dpa' bo 'bru lnga bkod pa des snying
129b7(rnying rgyud): bzung bas yig 'bru'i 'od kyis rigs drug gi sa bon gnyid dang bcas pa sbyangs pa'i dngas ma hUM yig drug dang / de'ang gcig tu gyur pa slob dpon gyi shangs bug g.yon nas su la bcug pas sgrib pa rnam par dag pa de nyid rdo rje'i lam nas yum gyi mkha' dbyings su thim nas gnas
130a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i d+hi yig da thugs b+h+ya rje 'od 'ab ba gyur ba sas sems dpa smyad/ ts+tsha/ banas ma zang 'tshabs pa da pa gag 'byor ba las rnam pa N+Dal ba'i rtags rigs padag thamam ning / nyid dkyil lagan
130a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas sa kyis 'og min du 'phang ba'i las kyis sgrol ba'i thabs 'di ni ngo mtshang rtsi ste/ bsngal byasdigacan na 'grolas thang nas rnam par grol pa thob pa'i thabs khyad par can yin pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa nyes pas mi gos par bstan
130a3(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ ye na sa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ chos thams cad ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid kyi gnas lugs rdzogs pas ji ltar sgra mang sdang ba'i skyes zas mig yod du spang ba'i gang zag la sbyor sgrol byas pa'i tshul bzhin du skyong ba dang sgrol ba'i bya ba kun byas kyang 'dzin zhen me
130a4(rnying rgyud): pas rdul thar ba kyi cha tsam yang byas pa med/ ye shes rgyas pa las/ ji ltar spyi ma'i mkhan po dag/ rang gis sprul pa'i sbru ma la// dge dang mi dge 'du byed pa// nyes pa gang gis migs ltar// thabs la mkhas pas rnam par spyod// tsas dang / sdu pa
130a5(rnying rgyud): las// skye bo phal cher mgo ma bye ba gcod byed kyang // 'gro kun sprul 'drar rab shis de la 'jigs pa med// ces so// gnyis pa bsgrub bya dngos grub la gnyis te/ de 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / blang ba'i thabs so// dang po ni/ rnal 'byor sngags 'chang sogs
130a6(rnying rgyud): tshigs bcad gcig ste/ lam bskyed rdzogs kyi rnal 'byor yid skye ba sngags kyi rang bzhin dang rig la 'chang bas bsgrub bya'i dngos grub ni/ lha ba chos thams cad sgra dang ye shes su mnyam rdzogs lhun gyis grub par rtogs pa de'i ngang la bsgom pa ting nge 'dzin gnas
130a7(rnying rgyud): shing // spyod pa ci la'ang chags thogs dang zhen pa med par spyod pa'i thabs des chos thams cad ye nas dbye medang rtogs pa ni dngos grub 'byung ba'i gzhi'am byug// gnyis pa ni/ yan lags gas tshogs bcad gnyis te/ rang sdang gi yan lag rdza dang / dang
130b1(rnying rgyud): popa lha dang / de dag gi num shes dang bcas pa can gyi rnam pa la shes lnga'ang por ldan pa mtshan byed mi ga yong gas par byagang / ngas mtshan nurdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs la yub rtsod kyil 'khor nyid du bsgom pa'am/ yang nagadul bya'i dab gas zla ba dgas lnga'ad
130b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor du bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du gzugs sde dri ro dag bya la sogs pa yul gyi rnam pa kun dbyings lnga'i ngo bor smin pa mtshon byed yi ge muM du shes par bya zhing / des mtshon bya rigs lnga yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom pa'am/ yang na khro mo lnga'i dkyil 'khor
130b3(rnying rgyud): bsgom par bya'o// gnyis pa khro bo'i sgo nas sgrub pa ni/ khro bo khro mo'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ khyo bo yab lnga dang khro mo yum lnga'i tshogs chen po la 'khor po nya gnas ma brgyad dang / phyag brtan yul ma brgyad/ bka' nyan sgom ba zhing tshogs dang /
130b4(rnying rgyud): cibagyi'i mngag gzhug dbang mo nyar brgyad la sogs pa'i khongs nas khro bcu yab yum ste bdun tu don brgyad kyi tshogs rnams kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas bsgrubs na mchog thun gyi dngos grub dang las bzhi sogs 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnams rdzogs par byed do// 'dir
130b5(rnying rgyud): lam ri ma las/ de nas 'khor lo gcig pa'am// gsum dang lnga ru bsgom par bya// zhes byas sngar kyi rigs bzhi he duka rdo rje'i rigA rlung gi khro bo yab yum bzhis brjes pa'i lha don brgyad ni tshom bu gcig pa/ yang rdo rje he ruka rigs chung dang bcas pa lte bar
130b6(rnying rgyud): bkod nas shwar chub kyi rtsibs la bud+ha dang pad+ma te nug so so'i rigs chung dang bcas pa bstan pa'i go brgyad ni chom thu gsum pa/ de'i steng du lho byang gi rtsibs la rat+na dang karba he ruka rtags chung dang bcas bstan pa'i brgya bco brgyad ni tshom bu lnga pa'o// gnyis pa rkyen 'dug
130b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid cig car ba ni/ cho ga lhag gam sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ cho ga ste lam gyi rim pa rnams cigacar ba'i gang zag gis rim gyis pa ltar bsgoms pas lhag gam ma bsgoms pas mtshang na'ang chad lhag gi skyon nyid dag ste/ de'i nyes pa med pas dngos
131a1(rnying rgyud): 'thob pa la me sleb ste/ nam mkha' la rdul gyis mgos pa bzhin no// gsum pa 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la'ang rim cig cang gnyis las/ drang ba ram gyis pa lagasum ste/ yo byad lnga la spyad pa'i 'bras pa/
131a2(rnying rgyud): myo bang dag 'don kyi chu lugs/ mthar drug ga 'bras tha bstan pa'o// dang po pa 'ang sa ste/ thog pa du byo'o/ (\u0f7fk+sha mA la/ rgyan dang bgo pa'i/ brda'adang btu bya'o/ A la pA 'i 'ayo byad la ltung pa'i 'bras bu'i// dang po nr-i/ u ba drabs so
131a3(rnying rgyud): tshigs bcad gcig ste/ tshom bu'i lha zung 'jug sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phyag rgya rang rig la thebs pas thams cad mngon rdo sa D+ha dang nya mo'i dkyil 'khor du gsal zhing brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pasna chags zhen med par spyod ces 'og ma rnams la'ang ltar ro// de'i ngang las yan
131a4(rnying rgyud): lag lnga la lha bkod de rkang lag gi bskul bskyod gro ka raM las mi 'da' ba'i phyag rgya 'od zer sbal pa'i 'du 'phro sna tshogs dang bcas te spyad pa yis sa 'og dang di brag la 'dzul lam/ steng gi nam mkhar thogs med du 'gro bas klu dang lha'i bu mo rnams dbang du byed par 'gyur ro//
131a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa ni/ glu tshig sogs te/ snyan pa'i glu dang brjod pa'i tshig thams cad rang rig ye shes kyi sgra las mi 'da' ba'i phyag rgyar spyad pa yis gsung gcig gis mtha' yas pa'i gdul byar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsum pa ni/ rgyan dang
131a6(rnying rgyud): sogs te/ rin chen dus pa sogs kyi rgyan dang dar dang ko rlon sogs bgo ba'i chos gos rnams ye shes las mi 'da' ba'i phyag rgyar spyad pa yis gzi byin 'bar ba'i rgyal po rgol ba gang gis kyang thub pa med pa'i stobs dang ldan pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzhi pa ni/ bza'
131a7(rnying rgyud): dang sogs te/ sha chang sogs bza' dang btung ba rnams ye shes las mi 'da' ba'i phyag rgyar spyad pa yis 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i yid bzhin gyi sku bzang po dang ro brgya ldan pa'i bdud rtsi zad pa med pas 'gro ba tshim par byed pa 'grub po// lnga ba ni/ A li sogs te/
131b1(rnying rgyud): A li sbyor ba dang kA li sgrol ba'i brda chog ste/ rang rin pa'i ye shes las mi 'da' ba'i phyag rgyar spyad pa yis las thams cad dang mchog rgyun gyi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnyis patshod dbang gi cha lugs ni/ myi dang sogs rkang pa gsum ste/ mi'i dbang /
131b2(rnying rgyud): po dang / 'dod pa'i lha dang / gzugs kyi lha tshangs pa la sogs pa'i skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyang gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa ste/ skye ba la rang dbang 'byor pas gang la gang 'dul du skye bar snang ba'i phyir ro// des na nas thob mthong lam gyi sa la gnas pas klu'i
131b3(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i rab dga' dang mthong lam tsam du skul ba mnyam kyang dgongs pa kyu'i mi g.yo ba'i sa la bzhugs pa'i byang sems dang mnyam par 'gyur ba yin no// gsum pa ni/ pha rol sogs rkang pa lnga ste/ shes 'jug 'brel bas tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i
131b4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu ni rgyu 'bras kyi sa lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ de yang slob lam sa bcu'i ngo bo pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po gnyis su med pa'i don mthar phyin pa la rdzogs pa ni/ gang la yang yongs su mi 'dzin pas sbyin pa/ ci la'ang ma chags pas tshul
131b5(rnying rgyud): khrims/ gnyis med kyi don la mi skrag pa'i bzod pa/ de'i ngang las mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan/ de las dus thams cad du mi g.yel ba'i brtson 'grus/ don phyin ci ma log par rang rig la gsal ba'i shes rab/ de mngon du gyur pas smon lam/ 'bras
131b6(rnying rgyud): bu gzhan nas mi 'tshol bas thabs/ mi mthun phyogs kyis mi brdzi bas stobs/ ye ji bzhin pa'i don mngon du rtogs pas ye shes te/ de ltar phar phyin bcu po kun tu rdzogs pa na sa yi khyad par bcu'i bgrod pa'ang rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar mnyam
131b7(rnying rgyud): pa nyid kyi dbyings rang mtshan mthong bas sa dang po rab tu dga' ba/ mthar lha'i dri ma dag pas gnyis pa dri ma med pa/ sems nyid rang gsal bas 'gro ba'i don mi 'gog par byed pas gsum pa 'od byed pa/ rang rig nyid thams cad du 'od gsal bas bzhi pa 'od
132a1(rnying rgyud): 'phro ba/ don gnyis dus gcig tu byed pas lngab sbyang dka' ba/ sems nyid yul med du rang gsal bas drug pa mngon du gyur pa/ mtha'i lta ba las ring du song bas bdun pa ring du sa ga g.yeng ba'i yul med pas brgyad pa mi g.yo ba/
132a2(rnying rgyud): yon tan lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes mnga' bas dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros/ yon tan de dag kun gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pas brla ba chos kyi sprin rnams dang / mthar thug sangs rgyas kyis gsum yang grub ste/ rang rig cir yang mi dmigs pa'i ye shes nyid kun tu khyab cing sdang
132a3(rnying rgyud): da grib sa gags pa kyis dang / dems pa gagos pazhe du sa chags ming mes pa'i shes brtsimigs pa 'ing pa'i sags rababs pas pas byadang bye byung mchog srepa ca kyis 'o// shes rab stos zlas su shes mchog sa dzus
132a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du rtsol ba med pa lhun gyis grub par ston nus pa mchog tu gyur pa'i ye shes ni 'khor lo tshogs chen gyi sa ste/ 'grel chung las/ thabs ni kun tu 'od yin shes rab pad+ma can// thabs dang shes rab mchog nyid 'khor lo tshogs chen te// zhes so//
132a5(rnying rgyud): de ltar mthong bsgom mthar gsum gyis bkrus pas bcu ni rgyu'i sa skye/ spang bya spong ba dang gnyen po skye ba'i sa yin pa'i phyir/ sa mtshan nyid pa yin la/ kun tu 'od sogs gsum ni mthar thug 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyis gcig gi ngo bo la su gsum gyi chas phye nas btab
132a6(rnying rgyud): pa ste/ sa lam gyi khyad par de thams cad dus yun ring por spyang mi dgos par myur du ldan gyis rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'on chu'i theg pa'i kun tu 'od dang mthar thugs gsum gyi nang tshan kun tu 'ong gnyis gcig gam snyam na/ mi gcig ste/ lam re ma las/ lam
132a7(rnying rgyud): rtsol bas ngal ba rnams// grod pa bskyed phyir kun tu 'od// rdo rje 'dzin sdug bkod par bstan// mthar thugs gsum cha las brjod// ces sogs kyi 'phros las/ rangs thob las bo nyid// gcig par smrab sun sprul lo// zhes dang / dbyi gi blo
132b1(rnying rgyud): sa kyang / khyod kya tha bye kun du dod// thabs can theg pa'i bsreganas so// zhes dang / A d+yad pa'i gsung zag smon dang 'brel drudungs pa kyang / mu yis bzod pa'i banatu'od// thabs rjen lam byachos bya ste// zhes so// de lta na 'di nyid las/ theg pa pan
132b2(rnying rgyud): yi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// zhes pa dang 'gal lo zhe na/ rang rang gi gnas skabs kyi dmigs yul la ltos nas tha dad pa'i 'bras bu de thob na 'di mthar zug yang dag pa'i 'bras bu la ltos nas gcig tu gyur pas skyon med de/ 'di nyid las/
132b3(rnying rgyud): sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byams kyis// don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs// zhes so// gnyis pa cig car ba'i 'bras bu ni/ dkyil 'khor kun tu sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ bsrub
132b4(rnying rgyud): bya'i dkyil 'khor kun dang / lam du gyur pa'i 'bras bu rig 'dzin bzhi'i char gtogs pa'i ye shes tshig chod du rang rig la gsal ba'i spos rab tu sbyor bas na mthar thug gi 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyang rtsol med du 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di nyid las
132b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob par 'gyur// zhes so// gnyis pa gsung tshul la gnyis te/ bka' gsang sngags mtshon pa dang / gzhung gsungs pa'i yon tan no// dang po ni/ rdo rje sogs te tshogs sgrub kyi don 'di rnams rdo rje
132b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa gsang ba'i bdag pos tshig tu brjod pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ zhes de bzhin sogs dang / ces ched du sogs te/ de skad ces ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng zhing ched du brjod pas snang spyod thams cad ye
132b7(rnying rgyud): shes kyi rol mor 'char ba'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to// gsum pa mtshan gnyis sdebs pa ni/ gsang ba'i sogs te/ rgyud 'di la le 'u nyer gnyis yod pa las/ 'dis skal ldan mi'i/ 'byor ldan yo byad kyi/ dgyes ldan lha'i tshogs dang / de dag
133a1(rnying rgyud): le'u bcu gsum pa la gsum ste/
133a2(rnying rgyud): snang la mi dmigs par spyad pas tshogs chen po ste/ de lta bu 'tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor tshom thu gcig gsum lnga ba'i sgo nas tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa'o//
133a3(rnying rgyud): rgyas dang / gzhung dang / mtshan no// dang po ni/ de nas sogs te/ tshogs sgrub bstan pa de nas thabs grol gyi man ngag snying po ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu ngas bzhis bsdus pa thams cad kyi su gsung thugs mi byed pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rig
133a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes rang snang ba las pa yi pas gcig tu 'dus nas gnas pa'i ston pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pached pos 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad yi nu phyogs pa chen po rang byung gi le shes sus btsal bar ldan gyis srab pa las mi 'da' ba'i nga mchog sdong ma yin pa pani
133a5(rnying rgyud): tu gsang ba rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po de khon nyid mtshon byed thabs kyi smi rnam par bkod pa'i gling nge 'don la snyoms par grags rnam ched du brjod pa 'di ba no// gnyis pa gzhung la gnyis te/ dngos dang / gsung tshul lo// dang po lagasum ste/ man ngag gi
133a6(rnying rgyud): ngo bo bshad pa/ de gzhan las 'phags pa'i che ba bshad pa/ yul gang la gdams pa'i sdod bshad pa'o// dang po la gnyis te/ rgyas par bshad pa dang / don bsdu pa'o// dang po la gsum ste/ mtshon par byed pa'i sgo/ myong bar byed pa'i thabs/
133a7(rnying rgyud): mngon du gyur pa 'bras bu'o// dang po la'ang gsum ste/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i blta ba mtshon pa'i sgo/ de gnyis ka'i tha snyad mtshon byed kyi sgo/ mtshon bya don gyi khyad par 'byin tshul lo// dang po ni/ ma rtogs pa dang sogs tshogs bcad gcig
133a8(rnying rgyud): ste/ 'di la gnyis las/ dang po 'jig rten pa'i lta ba la/ ma togs pa dang / log par rtogs pa gnyis kyi/ martogs pa ni/ 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i thabs la rmongs pa sor bzhag lha dang mi'i theg pa gnyis so zhes bzhed pa'ang yod mod kyi/ de lhan dang /
133b1(rnying rgyud): ngas rgya chu sa pa nga / pa gas pa ma pa byu pa 'ongs pa ldan ngas mas ngas martag na
133b2(rnying rgyud): 'di'i btsan phyug mthu stobs sogs 'jig rten pa'i rig pa bzong mo rjes sogs la brten nas bsgrub pas na hud 'ben pa zhes bya'o// de 'phyal ba ni martogs pa dngos dang / rgyang 'dzin pa ni zhar las byung ba'i martogs pa ste/ de gnyis ka zab mthas tho bsla ba'i
133b3(rnying rgyud): ma yin kyang sems kyi gnas tshul bsdu ba'i phyir de'i zlal bshad pa yin no// log par rtogs pa ni/ rmad ste mur phyug pa dang / rtag ste mu stegs pa'o// dang po ni/ chos nyid ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub pas 'khrul gzhi byas nas rgyas gyi dang las rgyu 'bras med par blta ba ste/
133b4(rnying rgyud): tshe gcig gi chos thams cad kyi med glo bring du skye zhing mtha' chad par smra bas sa phyi'i mur dathug pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ chos nyid 'gyur ba med pas 'khrul gzhi byas nas bdag dang gtso bo'am dbang phyub sogs rtag pa gcig pu rang dbang can du 'dod pa ste/ dbyen/ grangs can pa/
133b5(rnying rgyud): bye brag pa/ spyod pa pa/ gcer bu pa dang bzhi'i steng du chang lha mur stug pa bstan pas ta na sde lnga zhes grags shing / de thams cad bdag tu lta bar mthun te/ mu stegs pa ni bdag rtug par 'dod la/ mur lhag pa ni bdug yod pa chud par 'dod pa'o// su mtshan des thams
133b6(rnying rgyud): cad 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i thabs ma yin te/ 'phor ba'i la bdag 'dzin gyis bcings pa'i phyir/ de slar yang rnam 'brel las/ dze sbed bdag la mngon chags pa// de srid de rje 'khor bar 'gyur// zhes so// gnyis pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa/
133b7(rnying rgyud): chu 'bras kyi theg pa gnyis las/ dang po chu'i theg pa la'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo phyogs re tsam rtogs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas gnyis te/ snga mas gang zag gi bdag med dang / phyi mas de'i steng du chos bdag gzung ba rang bzhin med par rtogs pas phyed dang gnyis rtogs
134a1(rnying rgyud): sa/ kyang badzin pa rang bzhin dbar martogs pa'i phyir // bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnamathar gyi sgrol stod kyang dri 'i theg pa'i don ma rtogs pas/ yang dag byed martogs pa ni bu sems gnyis te/ sems tsam pas don dam par gzung
134a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gnyis med dang / dbu ma pas don dam spros pa dang bral bar 'dod pas bdag med gnyis rtogs kyang / chos thams cad ye nas dog mnyam chen por gnas pa'i don ma mthong ba'i phyir/ gnyis pa 'bras bu'i theg pa la phyi nang gnyis las/ dang po phyi nub
134a3(rnying rgyud): pa rgyud kyi theg pa la/ sgo gsum gyi bya bas rgyud 'dul ba gtso bor byed pa kri yA dang u ba ya/ sems kyi dgongs pa ting de'i dzin gtso bor byed pas 'bras bu srub pa ni yo ga'o// gnyis pa nang pa thabs kyi rgyud la/ phyi rgyud man chad bran mong gi yul dum gyur pas gsang
134a4(rnying rgyud): ba ni gtud bskyed pa ma hA yo ga dang / ma rgyad rdzogs pa a n+ya yo ga'o// chos thams cad ye nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa rang byung gi ye shes su gnas pa'i don a nu man chad kyi yul du ma gur bas gsang ba ni gnyis med kyi rgyad a ti yog ste/ ma hA yo ga las
134a5(rnying rgyud): du phye ba'i bskyed rdzogs gsum mo// de ltar a ti man chad kyi don de rnams ni mtshon bya sgo'i khyad par bstan pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ yi ge sla btags sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ mtshon bya de rnams tha snyad gang gis mtshon zhe na/ yi ge a las skra'i ngo ro dang ming gzugs
134a6(rnying rgyud): bar byed pa'o tha skrad kyis btags pa dbyangs gsal gyi yi ge sil bu 'dus pa las don gyi ngo bo tsam ston pa ming 'byung zhing / de du ma tshogs pa la brten nas don gyi khyad par gsal bar ston pa'i tshig dang / tshig gi tshogs 'dus pa las gzhung so so'i lus grub cing / des
134a7(rnying rgyud): rang gi brjod bya'i don rab tu mtshon te gnas so// gsum pa ni/ khong nas sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ snying gzhung tshig so so'i khong nas rang rang gi brjod bya'i'o don gnas shing / khyad par mtshon bya rang bzhin gyi rgyud sems can kun gyi khor na gnas kyang rtogs dka' bsag
134b1(rnying rgyud): cing / mtshon byed la markyen yi ge brgyud du gsang ba zab mo rnams skal med kyis mig pa'i phyir sbas pa ste/ de ltar ga bsras kyi don gnyis po de 'byin par byed pa po ni chung ngor phyin ci ma log par ston pa rdo rje slob dpon gyi thugs la gnas pa'i phyir des 'byin cing / ji ltar 'byin
134b2(rnying rgyud): na/ rang gnas rang bzhin gyi rgyu dang sprod pa dang / yi ge'i rgyud 'chad pa'i man ngag gis 'khrugs pa bsdeb cing kab pa mngon du phung ba'i tshul gyis so// gnyis pa myong bar byed pa'i thabs la/ gzhung gcig gi steng du bshad tshul gnyis te/ shes rab krol lam gyi dbang
134b3(rnying rgyud): du bshad pa dang / thabs lam gdams ngag gi dbang du bshad pa'o// dang po la'ang gnyis te/ grol lam rim gyis pa ltar du bshad pa dang / grol lam cig car ba ltar du bshad pa'o// dang po la'ang mtshan nyid gsum las/ rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba ni/
134b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// shes te/ rang rig pa ye nas rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor lhag pa bden pa dbyer med spyod yul dang bral ba des 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad la ris med du ldan par khyab pa ni lta ba'i ngo bo ste/ gnas
134b5(rnying rgyud): lugs kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid gtan tshigs rnams kyis gtan la phab pas yul med dang gsal du rtogs pa ni grub mtha'o// de nas rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin ni/ dkyil 'khor la ni sogs tshogs bcad phyed dang bzhi ste/ ye nas rnam par dag pa chos nyid
134b6(rnying rgyud): don gyi dkyil 'khor de la ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor bsgom zhing / don dam chos nyid kyi dkyil 'khor de'i rang gdangs ma 'gags pa ye shes sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor snying rje chen po ma pa 'khyab tu bsgom pa ni snying rje ma'i
134b7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor ro// de gnyis zung du 'jug pa mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po cing yang ma 'gags pa las rang byung ba'i yi ge ar snang ste/ de las a tha mo dang ka sogs kyi 'phro 'dul sems sbyang zhing / de thams cad kyang thugs rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi ngos yi ge
135a1(rnying rgyud): gdakyil 'khor du bsdus la bsgom pa na tha ba yig 'dral bslab pa'o// de nyi rtsa lnga par gsal ba yongs su gyur pa las snang b+ha dbyed med kyis phra 'a kyil la bang yan lag lhag pa'i sgra dang bcas pa basmon pa ni phyag rgya gcig nga
135a2(rnying rgyud): tetenge nge 'dzin yin la/ des dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgoms par 'gyur bas na mchog ste/ rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// mA lus par ni bsgom par 'gyur// zhes gsungs shing / zung 'jug gi lha sru na dang du zhen pa'i blos rtogs dka' bas
135a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don dang mtha'i spros pa dang bral bas thig le ste/ de ltar spros bcas kyi dkyil 'khor 'char gzhir gyur pas na dbyings so// de'ang 'byung ba lnga ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin rigs kyi yum lnga dang / chen po'i sbas brjod pa phung po lnga ni rigs kyi de bzhi
135a4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa lnga ste/ de ltar rtog tshogs thams cad byang chub kyi sems su rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas lha rtog dbyer mi phyed pa ni ni rje'i tshogs te/ 'di ltar mig sogs dbang po dang / gzugs sogs yul dang / 'das pa sogs dus dang / mi
135a5(rnying rgyud): rnam shes sogs rig pa ste/ de ltar rtog tshogs kyis bsdus pa'i spyod yul rnams sems dpa' sems ma dang / khro mo khro mo sogs lhar yongs su dag pas na kurba ta bzang po'i dkyil 'khor te/ rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la yan lag gi lha ba zhib tu pa bsku
135a6(rnying rgyud): pa ni thabs kyi lha bzhi bcu'o// de rnams kyang rang gi sems nyid rnam par 'phrul pa'i bdag nyid chen po yan lag lhag pa'i lha thugs ye shes sems dpa' re re bsgoms pas shes rab kyi sgra bzhi bcu dang / thabs lha bzhi bcu po la su gsung blugs kyi lha re ste/ bzhi
135a7(rnying rgyud): bcub tshan pa bzhi la ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya dbu rgyan gyi lha lnga lnga res brgyan par blta zhing bsgom mo// de ltar nyi khri bzhi stong po thams cad gsal zhing brtan pa ni sdang ba rnam par dbyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ spos bcas so// drangs ma dkar de mar gyi snying po'i thag pa dab
135b1(rnying rgyud): gi sbyor bas spyan skyes kyi ye shes la sbyor ba ni A li ste/ des mtshon nas yo byad lnga yul dang yul can gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyong bas spyod bzhin pa chags pa bde ba'i ye shes kyi rol mo yis rtog tshogs ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du rang gsal bas dgyes pa dang ldan pa'i
135b2(rnying rgyud): lha nyid la nyid rol pa'i tshul du mchod pa mnyam rdzogs chen por dbul ba ni tshom bu tshogs sgrub bo// de nas 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni/ zag pa sogs nang pa dgu ste/ de ltar zag pa med pa'i ye shes dang bsod nams khyad par can gyi mthas gnas skabs kyi nas
135b3(rnying rgyud): gsal gyi lha skur mngon du gyur pa mthong lam gnyis gang dung rdzob pa las/ zung 'jug ye shes sgyu ma'i spang dang sdang ba rgya chen dang mthung lam gyis brnyes pa la sbyor bar 'gyur te/ de'i dgongs pa ni spyod yul thams cad rang byang gi ye shes rang snang ba'i rol mo dag pa dag 'jam
135b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par 'char zhing / snang stong mi phyed pa'i ye shes mchog grags su rjod pa/ de nyid rtogs dka' zhing spros pa'i yul pas 'das pas gsang ba'i thig le ste mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings so// zung 'jig de ni sangs rgyas kun gying ngo po'am dngos gzhi ste/
135b5(rnying rgyud): tshed phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i dbyings su mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pa'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs te 'bras bu'i chos rnams ma lus pa rang gi rig pa las tha dad med par rtogs pa ni/ bdag nyid la yod pa de'i zhal bdag gis mthong bas 'khor 'du
135b6(rnying rgyud): kyi chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid du dbang sgyur ba'i mchog nyid de/ slob lam gyi rtse mor phyin pas lam gyi nang nas dam pa yin no// de ltar man ngag lam dem gyis rgyab byas nas grol lam rim gyes pa ltar du bshad pa ste/ 'di la snga rabs pa rnams kyis bskyed
135b7(rnying rgyud): rim zhes bshad na'ang / grol lam cig car pa la ltos nas de ltar gsungs pa las/ rim pa gnyis kyi zlas phye ba'i bskyed rim ni ma yin te/ gal te yin na/ de kho na la bslab pa'i spyod pa'i nye rgya tshogs srub kyis zag med mthong lam la sbyor ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro// des
136a1(rnying rgyud): na lam rim du/ phyag ca gcig pa'i skabs su chog gsum bskyed dang bzlas brgya tshul sogs 'byung yang / de tsam gyis bskyed rim kho nar gyi 'gyur te/ rdzogs rim gyis drangs par lha'i gas la snang la bslang tshul dang / thun margyarmA/
136a2(rnying rgyud): kyi bya ba bzlas pa sogs sbyar te bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug tu bslab pa'i ched yin pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang bskyed rim ltar bslab pa'ang mtha' gcig tu ni mi mgog ste/ gang zag 'ga' zhig bskyed pa'i rim pas spos bcas kyi lha'i gsal sngar ci rigs thob nas/ tshogs
136a3(rnying rgyud): kyi stod pas thun mong gi dngos sgrub ma nga spyod bsgrubs te ts+tshom dang sprul pa'i sgonas pan 'dogs pa dang tshar gcod pa sogs kyis sems can kyi don byed ci / rkyen des sangs rgyas byang sems rnams mnyes par byas pa'i mthus rdzog pa sa la thugs te thar 'jug gi
136a4(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa ni yod par 'dod dgos so// des ni lam gyi gnad ni 'di yin te/ lam rim las/ yan lag dbang po thams cad kun// rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa dang // ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa lngar// ye nas ma bcos mongs kyis gnas// shes
136a5(rnying rgyud): dang // rang lus gdod nas phyag rgya che// bsgoms pas mngon du gyur pa'i lha// zhes sogs gsungs pa ltar man ngag gi gnad gzigs pa'i dam pa gong ma rnams bskyed ris zhes gsung yang / de'i don 'chad pa'i tshe lhag pa kun rdzos 'di ltar snang ba kun rang
136a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyis lha'i dkyil 'khor du yongs su grub pas/ de ltar gsalo btab cing goms pa na zung 'jug gi lha skye dang shar du 'byung bar bzhed pa'i phyir rdzogs rim gyi lha spu las 'os med do// ji ltar bsgom pa'i gnad kyang / ltam gtan la phengs pa'i gang zag gis sgo gsum
136a7(rnying rgyud): gyi bya ba btang nas/ stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis nyin mtshan sbrel te don dam 'od gsal rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas/ zhi lhag zur du 'jug pa'i 'od gsal gyi ngang du sems thim ste 'gags pa na phyi nang gsang ba'i drod dang zad par gyi snang pas
136b1(rnying rgyud): stong gzugs kyi snang ba mtha' yas pa 'chang la/ de'i ngang las nyin snang dang mtshan no mi lam gyi snang ba thams cad lham lta bur shar nas 'gro ba rnams la dmigs med kyi snying rje rang gsal ma 'gags pa'i ngang du mnyam par 'jog pa snying rje sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor la bslabs pas/
136b2(rnying rgyud): snang ba ris med las snying rje chen po'i 'phen pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rkyen gyis zung 'dug gi lha su phyag gya gcig pa dang / de las ches cher 'phel te snang ba thams cad zung 'jug gi lhar mngon sum du sgo bar nus pa ni phyag rgya sgos bcas so// de la/ nye rgu'i spyod pa spos bcas
136b3(rnying rgyud): sgrub bam/ spros med rnal 'byor pho mo gtso bo yab yum tsam tshogs pa la brten pa'am/ shin tu spros med ni yab mi 'gyur ba'i bde chen nyid yum rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong pa nyid dang kha sbyor gyi spyod pas zag med kyi lam la sbyor bar byed do// dese na chog mar stong chen 'od/
136b4(rnying rgyud): gsal rnam par mi rtog pa'i lam las brtsams pas lha sku'i snang ba rnams kyang zung 'jug gi lha sku phyag rgya chen por 'char ba'i phyir/ mngon sum pa'i lam rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste/ rdo rje snying 'grel las/ ko dra ba yi sa bon las// sA lu'i 'bru ni 'byung ba med// rnam rtogs
136b5(rnying rgyud): bon las byung ba'i// 'bras bu rnam par rtog par 'gyur// rnam par mi rtog las skyes pa'i// 'bras bu rnam par mi rtog 'gyur// zhes so// gnyis pa cig car ba ltar bshad pa la/ bstan bshad gnyis las/ dang po ni/ dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i sogs rka pa lnga
136b6(rnying rgyud): ste/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad ye nas sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas te rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin gyi/ phyis lam gyes 'bras bu gsar du bsrubs pa ni ma yin no// chos rnams kyi rang bzhin de ltar yin kyang / yin pa tsam gyis phan mi thogs
136b7(rnying rgyud): pas/ gzhi de ltar yin pa lam gyis mngon du rtogs par bya dgos te/ de yang ye nas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad la dang chas su ldan pa 'do na rtogs nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyis yenas yin pa'i dkyil 'khor de la ni/ de ltar yin pa
137a1(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor du gsal 'debs shing bsgom par byas nas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor las byung ba ni thugs rang rig pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste/ dkyil 'khor
137a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor ro// de ltar gzhi lam 'bras gsum du snang kyang don la gsang ba byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin thog le chen po'i dkyil 'khor spros bral gyi dbyings las gzhan du ma g.yos pas de tsam du zad do// gnyis pa la gsum las/ dang po
137a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ji ltar ldan par bstan pa ni/ 'byung ba sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ sngar ltar 'byung ba lnga yum lnga yin bsogs rtog tshogs thams cad rang bzhin gyis lhar rnam par dag pas 'gro ba kun la de ltar ye nas rang chas su ldan pa yin no// gnyis pa rang
137a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar bsgom tshul ni/ kun tu bzang po'i sogs rkang pa gsum ste/ de ltar chos thams cad kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor du ye nas sangs rgyas pa de la/ de'i don legs par rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid chen
137a5(rnying rgyud): pos ye nas grub pa'i don de dang gnyis su med par rig pas lhag pa'i dgongs pa zab mo ste/ thugs dang byung gi ye shes gcig dang du ma'i mtha' dang bral ba las rol pa ma 'gags pa ye shes lngar 'chang ba'i tshul gyis blta zhing bsgom par bya'o// gsum pa de ltar bsgom pa
137a6(rnying rgyud): las cir 'gyur ba ni/ snying po'i sogs tshigs bcang gsum ste/ chos thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'i chos kyi dbyings thig le nyag gcig dang / gnyis su med par mnyam par sbyor ba las/ don phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'i rig pa rang byung ba ni byang chub kyi
137a7(rnying rgyud): sems bde ba chen po'i ye shes te/ de nyid kyi rol mo sna tshogs par 'char ba'i sprin gyis ye shes la ye shes dgyes par rol pa'i tshul du mchod par dbul zhes bya'o// de ltar gzhi lam 'bras gsum du bstan kyang rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems las mgayos te/ zag
137b1(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsgrubs pa'i ye shes sgra ma lta bur ma 'gags par dang snang ba'i rol mo'i dkyil 'khor rnam 'gyur mtha' yas par 'phrul yang mchog gsang ba'i thig le byang chub kyi sems de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las gzhan du g.yos pa med do// de
137b2(rnying rgyud): lta bu'i man ngag dang man ngag can gyi yon tan gang zhe na/ dbyings de nyid ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos gzhi ste man ngag gi don yin la/ man ngag de dang ldan pa ni/ phyogs bcu dus bzhir tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa bdag nyid las mi gzhan pa'i tshul du
137b3(rnying rgyud): sku'i zhal mthong ba dang / gsung chos la dbang sgyur ba dang / yon tan phrin las mthar phyin pa'i mchog nyid du dang / thugs dbyer mi phyed pas bsdu med skabs kyi dam par gyur pa yin no// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor la gnas sogs rkang pa gsum gyis de tho tshul
137b4(rnying rgyud): dang / rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas sogs rkang pa lngas thugs rje chen po'i mdzad pa ji ltar 'byung tshul bstan pa'i yon tan rnams kyang 'dir sbrel ba'i bka' srol yod kyang yi ges 'jigs so// de ltar man ngag 'di la slob dpon chen po bad+mas lta ba'i phreng bar/
137b5(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa bzhi'i lam gyis yid ces par bya ba dang / mtshan nyid gsum gyis don mthar dbyung ba dang / bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhis don ldan gyis grub par bya ba dang / spun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i thabs bstan pa ste/ don rnam pa bzhir phye nas
137b6(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa las/ phyi ma ni 'og tu 'chad par 'gyur zhing / dang po gsum ni sngar bshad pa la 'dus pas 'dir rgyas par ma smos so// gnyis pa thabs lam gdams ngag gi dbang du bshad pa la gnyis te/ steng sgo 'du 'dul gyi man ngag ltar bshad pa dang / 'og sgo
137b7(rnying rgyud): khams gsum rol pa'i man ngag ltar bshad pa'o// dang po la'ang bzhi ste/ kun tu bzang po'i dang / kun tu bzang mo'i dang / sbyor ba dag pa'i dang // byab brdal chen po'i man ngag go// dang po ni/ dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/
138a1(rnying rgyud): snab gang bsta dus na nga nga rgyas pargya ba thabab cad ma pa cwab na / mnan cig su mchis nyid na sub med pa'i snang ba'i las thu / g.yas gnag la nas t+ta ya shAsu
138a2(rnying rgyud): 'char ba'i la byed pa/ g.yon cig cig yon tan gyi stem byo shes dang bcus cu rlom rnam 'ang ba / hUM TIgs pa nga ste shes pa ma sa rmongs shing 'doms pa lus byengad do// di shAs thub chen po bzhi / dra khro na
138a3(rnying rgyud): drung sto kyis pon mu shes dang bcas rnams gsate/ kyi kyi la na stong/ po// rgyu byas byas/ so/ ba ge slong ma nas/ ye zhen byin 'a'od tha bzhis po// smang ba ma dun/ phyo byung ste/ yid rnam shes/ yan
138a4(rnying rgyud): kyi rtsa li 'od blag ma dmar po/ spang bya de du/ thong byed AH/ skyon mongs can yid/ rang du dpaN+Da la 'od grags 'damar rnag la/ g+ho tsA'i shes pa gnyi dang bcas pa gnas so// 'di ngos nyid dang ye shes 'od dkar po dang ser por byas pa rna
138a5(rnying rgyud): chung dang gnas kyi lugs te/ gsung rdzogs las ni chos nyid ser po da / ye shes mthing kar bshad do// de ltar snying gi dkyil 'khor rtsa chen bzhi dang ldan pa de'i nang na/ dngasam lnga'i dkyil 'khor dang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i dbus su ye shes snying po'i jig
138a6(rnying rgyud): la sbyong gsal 'gag med bde ba chen po'i ngo bor bzhugs te/ nyi zla kha stor gyi rgyud las/ tsit+ta rin chen gzhal yas na// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// sku ni sbrang la rang bzhin med// cha tha 'od gas lnga snying por bzhugs// zhes dang / bta
138a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis las/ lus pa ye shes chen po gnas// tog pa thams cad yang dag spangs// dngos po kun la khyab pa po// lus gnas lus las maskyes pa'o// zhes dang / rim lngalas/ rtag tu snying la gnas pa ma// thig la gcig la 'gyur ba med/
138b1(rnying rgyud): sgom byu ba bo la// nges par la shes skye bar 'gyur// zhes so// de la dang sa mahA ni/ dAngs mdu dka spyad pa badra bsgom phran ba ca gshegs rnam gyi nang na/ khrag gdangs mamatshal khra khwa dang / ma drangs ma malong nyi ma la bzhag pa'i dang rtsi ma dang /
138b2(rnying rgyud): rlung gi dngas ma ga seras 'og na yod pa'i rlangs tsam dang / nam mkha'i dngas ma ber sngang sang ser go 'byed pa'i tshul du yod de/ lha po dang ye nas yum rdza/ ye shes wa/ spu lngar gnas te/ rtsa'i dwangs mni 'byung bas ste/ yA ma stanA ma/ me long wA bu'i ye shes
138b3(rnying rgyud): mngon byed gi sku'o// khrag gi dwangs mji chu ste/ mA mA kI/ mnyam nyid/ longs su'o// me'i dngas ma ni/ gos dkar/ sor rtog/ rdo rje'i lha'o// rlung gi dngas ma ni/ sgrol ma/ bya grub/ sbrul bu'o// nam ma pa'i dwangs ma ni/ dbyings phug ma/ stong pa nyid/
138b4(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sku'o// ye shes snying po'i thig le ni/ rig pa'i dngos ma sems nyid 'od gsal ba ste/ yum lnga 'dus pa bya ba mo dang / ye shes lnga 'dus rang byung gi ye shes dang / sku lnga 'dus pa bde chen gyi sgrar don gyis 'gyur zhing / der ma zad dngas ma drug po'ang gnyis
138b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis ro gcig tu 'jug pas shin tu phra ba'i sgo gsum mam/ rdo rje mi shigs pa gsum du'ang 'gyur te/ sa chu gnyis su rdo rje/ me rlung gnyis gsung rdo rje/ mkha' sems gnyis thugs rdo rje ste/ dpe chung las/ mi shigs ye shes thig le ni// sra gsung thugs kyi rdzo
138b6(rnying rgyud): rje'i bdag/ gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa// sna tshogs snang la mtshon du med// ces so// de ltar drangs ma lnga 'dus kyi dbus na ye shes snying po'i dkyil 'khor dngas shing 'od 'bar bar bzhugs la/ de nyid ni ye nas bzhugs pa lhur lam pas thig le'i dkyil 'khor
138b7(rnying rgyud): yungs 'bru tsam 'od lnga'i gong bu can gsal ba yul gyis mo 'phrog par bsgom par byas pas/ dang saM ma lnga ye shes snying po dang drug ye shes drug gi dkyil 'khor du rang snang ba ni phyin cim log pa'i yongs grub po// de la spyi bod tshadra pa'i bu gnas mar sems gtad de bsgoms
139a1(rnying rgyud): pas ye shes snying po dkyil 'khor te thig le 'od 'bar ba las byung ba'i 'od kyis sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge bskul ba 'od du 'bar pas spang bya yi gtugag nyid dang bcas pasrungs te/ lam dang bag chags thams cad mi dmigs pas
139a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba chos nyid du krol zhing / dngas ma lnga'ang ye shes snying po la bsdus pas bde ba'i ye shes 'thung ste/ de 'ang rtsas bde ba'i rten byed/ khrus bde bsdud cing chud rlan par byed/ rjod kyis bde ba smin par byed/ dbugs kyis g.yo bar byed/ nam mkha' khams
139a3(rnying rgyud): gsum bde ba chen por yongs su grol bar byed pas bde ba'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ni dmigs med mtha' bral thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ gsang thigs 'grel pa las/ de ltar nam mkha'i gzugs su skyes pa de nyid thig le byang chub kyi sems yin te chos kyi sku'o// zhes
139a4(rnying rgyud): rlung sems kyi dngas ma thams cad thugs kyi dkyil 'khor der rdzogs pa'i tshe snar cha 'od lnga dang stong cha chos kyi skur ro gcig tu 'dres pas tshogs gnyis rdzogs te/ sku gnyis mngon du gyur nas 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/ 'di ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa'o//
139a5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor pa'i chi ba'i dus su'ang dngas ma dang rlung thams cad dbu mar 'du/ dbu ma'i rlung dang dngas ma'i shin tu dwangs ma rim bzhin 'dus pa las 'chi srid stong pa'i 'od gsal sdang ba bzhi dang / de nub nas snang ba'i 'od gsal rigs lnga tshom bu'i snang ba nam mkha' khyab par
139a6(rnying rgyud): 'char ba'ang 'di'i gnad kyis byung bar bzhed do// gnyis pa ni/ gsang ba'i thig le sogs tshogs bcad gnyis te/ lte ba'i rtsa 'dab drug curtsa bzhi'i dbus na dbyings phyeg lnga'i theg le zhes bya ba a thung gi rnam par gnas pa ni chos kyi dbyings zab mo gsang ba shes rab kun
139a7(rnying rgyud): bzang mo'i rang bzhin nyi ma'i theg le ste/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bzung gnas du gyung bas dbyings so// de'i rang bzhin ni shes rab dang thabs te/ gang zhe na/ thig le de las gyur ba 'byung ba lnga'i dngas mcha phra ba rang bzhin med pa ni dbyings ni shes rab sti rigs kyi yum lnga dang /
139b1(rnying rgyud): chen po rags pa mtshan nyid 'dzin pa ni thabs rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ste yab lha'o// de ltar thig le byang chub kyi sems thabs shes dbyer mi byed pa ni rdo rje ste/ de las byung ba'i rtog tshogs dbang po dang yul dang dus dang / yul so sa reg par byed pa'i rnam shes rnams
139b2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' dang 'joms byed yab yum sogs thams cad bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyi spyod yul du rnam par dag pas kun tha bzang po'i dkyil 'khor yin la/ de dag thams cad kyang dbyings rang byung gi ye shes su rdzogs pa la bdag nyid chen po ste/ de dang basbyor ste dga' 'khor
139b3(rnying rgyud): lo la rgal ba kun gyi lhag pa'i dgongs pa zab mo thugs stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgra cha me long lta bu la sogs pa lnga ye nas mun grub du gnas pa ste/ des blta ba ni snying gnas mar lte ba'i thig le la sems gtad de sgo snga pas snying ga'i thig le'i do dang dngos ma'i drod ma sod pa dbyings rgyag
139b4(rnying rgyud): thig le pa log skye 'od dra bar byas tog tshogs su dang ye shes sugasal bar gyur/ de'i rjod srar yang yar song ste snying ga'i drungs ma la bris pas dngas ma'i bdo drod thos rjer dbang ba na dgas pa'i rlung gi chub 'gags pas thig le gro 'or med par stong ga'i gnas las mi g.yo bar gnas
139b5(rnying rgyud): bas bde bachen po dang rig pa'i ye shes rang shar ba la blta bya lta byed med pa'i tshul gyis brgya ning nyams su len pa ni lte ba'i 'khor lo sgom pa'i man ngag go// gsum pa ni/ snying po'i thig le sogs rkang pa gsum ste/ mgrin pa'i rtsa ngadab bcu drug gi dbus na mkha' bsgomarnams
139b6(rnying rgyud): mazhes bya ye ge aM gi rnam par gnas pa la bza' ba tung gi 'dud 'dus pas na snying po'i thig le ste/ de snying ga'i dngas mtshan po'i dzad dang rjod yar song ste khu ba'i drangs ma steng gar mdzod/ dazugs thig ler brimapas rlung da rtog pa dgags te 'khor lo gnyis bde ba dus gcigatu
139b7(rnying rgyud): mnyam par sbyor zhing / de ltar sbya bas bde ba chen po la gnas pa'i rang gdangs ye shes lngar ma 'gags pa rol mo yis drod drung rtsa gsum gcig tu 'dres te bde gsal rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mi g.yo bar rang gsal ba'i dgyes pa chen po la yul yul can gnyis med
140a1(rnying rgyud): du mchod par 'bul zhes bya ste/ mgrin pa'i 'khor lo sgom pa'i man ngag go// bzhi pa ni/ zag pa sogs dngas dgu ste/ spyi bo bde chen gyi 'khor lo rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus na kun tu bzang po zla ba'i thig le hi gi rnam par gnas te/ de
140a2(rnying rgyud): sngar mgrin pa'i thig le'i bde ba ni yul yul can gyi rtog pa zad pas zag pa med pa'i bde ba yin la/ de nyid ma 'gags pa'i bsod nams kyi mthus thig le nyid rang bzhin med de/ bde ba chen po'i ye shes sgyu ma lta bur rang sdud pa/ de las bde ba'i rol mo 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
140a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas par spro ba'i mchog ces bya ste/ mgrin pa'i thig le'i 'od kyis shin tu rdzogs dka' bas gsang ba ste bde chen 'khor lo'i thig le la 'phrog pas 'od du zhu nas spyi blugs su gyur pas bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du gyur te/ de nyid chos kyi dbyings dang rog ci gang sa khams
140a4(rnying rgyud): gsum thams cad so so ma yin pa bde gsal rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su skyes nas kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur pa zhes bya ba chos kyi skur gyur pa de ni dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i dngos te/ de ltar rnal 'byor pa bde ba chen po chos kyi
140a5(rnying rgyud): gur pa na phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad bdag nyid las gzhan du ma gyur pas skra'i zhal dus gcig la mthong ba ste/ de gsung la dbang sbyar ba dang / yon tan phrin las mchog nyid mthar phyin zhing /
140a6(rnying rgyud): shugs don dam pa'i ye shes su ro gcig tu gyur pa yin te spyi bo'i 'khor lo sgom pa'i man ngag go// de ltar 'khor lo bzhi'i rim pa mdor bstan/ snying ga'i 'khor lo bsgoms pa las snang ba'i ye shes smos pa thams cad dang bral ba ni chos kyi sa dang / lte ba'i 'khor
140a7(rnying rgyud): mo bsgoms pa'i ye shes tog tsigs de gnyis skar dag pa ni smras pa'i sgra dang / mgrin pa'i bdegs pa rtog pa'i gzhes ni 'ongs su 'jig rtog pa'i ye nes ni di zen / de' drangs pa'i dngas ma rdzas 'ang po ni
140b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i dngas ma g.yo byed dang bral ba'i 'od gsal la tshur thim pas pa' gsal rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes chen po gcig dang du ma med pa'i chos nyid mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i 'od gsal 'char ba yin no// gnyis pa 'og sgo khams gsum rol pa'i man ngag lhung bsha
140b2(rnying rgyud): pa la gsum ste/ thabs nyid shes rab du dang / shes rab nyid thabs su dang / thabs shes dbyer med du sbyor ba'o// dang po ni/ dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i sogs tshigs pacad gcig ste/ gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor bde ba'i ye shes
140b3(rnying rgyud): 'o dang bcas pa yab yum gnyis la rang chas su ldan pa de nyid rtogs par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i lung rigs man ngag gsum gyis gtan la phab nas/ yab yum lha'i dkyil 'khor du bskyed pa la skye mched rlob pa ni yan lag gi lA yab la yab dang
140b4(rnying rgyud): yum la yum gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing / mkha' gsang rdo rje dang pad+mar rlobs te snyoms 'dug gi brda' bzhis bskul nas yab thabs kyi dkyil 'khor dang yum shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis phyag rgya bzhis gnyis med du rol pa'i rjes chags kyi rkyen gyis rlung bskyod pas
140b5(rnying rgyud): dmar cha 'bar ba des dkar cha zhu ba yas 'bab kyi dga' bzhi'i 'gros kyis phyin pa'i rim gyis zla ba rdo rje'i bum par 'jog med du bzung ste gang ba las bde ba'i ye shes byung ba'o// de nyid gnyis med kyi ye shes su gsal la mi rtog pas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ de ltar myong ba'i
140b6(rnying rgyud): tshe khams lnga'i bcud kun rdzob ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du dang snang bas na mchog go// gnyis pa ni/ gsang ba'i thig le sogs tshigs bcad gnyis te/ de'i tshe yum gyi gsang ba pad+ma'i ze'u 'brur thig le nyi ma byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba ste gnas pa'i tshe/
140b7(rnying rgyud): de nyid thabs kyis zin na rtog tshogs sku dang ye shes su 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dbyings so// ji ltar na/ yum gyi 'byung ba'i drangs ma cha phra ba ni shes rab rigs kyi yum lnga dang / chen po ste rags pa rigs kyi yab de bzhin gshegs pa lngar gsal ba ste ldan
141a1(rnying rgyud): gyis grub cing / byang chub sems kyi bde bas rtog tshogs thams cad ni sku dang ye shes kyi rdo rje dbyer mi phyed pa'i tshogs so// de 'ang dbang po yul dus rag pa rnams lhar yongs su dag pas spyod yul kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khod pa sems
141a2(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin pa'i lhan skyes bde ba'i ye shes zag pa med pa'i bdag nyid chen po skyes pa de nyams su myong bas lhag pa'i thugs kyi dgongs pa'i ngo bo bde ba chen po'i ro ye shes lngar 'char ba las blta byalta/ byed med pa'i tshul gyis blta zhing rang gsal ba'o// gsum pa ni/
141a3(rnying rgyud): po'i thig le sogs tshogs bcad gsum ste/ yab yum g+hi n+ya thams cad kyi brgyad 'jus pa'i snying po nyi zla'i dwangs ma thig le dus gcig tu mnyam par sbyor bas dngos po lhar cig skyes pa bde ba'i ye shrIs nyams su myong nas/ slar yang dga' bzhi lugs
141a4(rnying rgyud): gi gros kyis myong ba'i bde ba mchog tu gsang ba'i ros mo yis rtog tshogs rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes srarname par grol bas rab tud gyes par gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor la bde stong gnyis su med pa'i mchod par dbral zhes bya'o// de ltar tshogs drug girten gyi
141a5(rnying rgyud): mthams cad dpa' bzang rdzog pa'i thabs kyis tshogs brgya rtog pa'i dngos po thams cad ldadu skyes kyi ye shes su dang gsal bas zag brjed pa'i ye shes kyi rom 'grags par byung ba bsod nams kyi rdzogs kyis bde ba'i ye shes sgyu ma lta bur stang la 'dzin med du spyod pas chogs
141a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis rdzogs pa dang / 'dod chags 'di stong gi ye shes su rang snang ba'i rol mos tog tshogs sde dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bsam me khyab pas mtha' yas pa'i mchog tu rang gsal zhing / nyi zla gnyis med kyi ye shes nyams su snang dka' bas gsang ba'i drag le ste/
141a7(rnying rgyud): nyid pas chos thams cad kyi bya gnas su su ngas kyis so// de ltar bsgoms pa'i yon ta kya/ bad chen po pa la shes sangs rgyas sun kyi dgongs pa'i dngos banan/ de rdzo pa'i tshotshogs pa pani rdzogs pa sa sa cas rnams
141b1(rnying rgyud): ta bran las thugs te 'bras chob nyi chung malus pa mngon byas shing bad kyi sbrul mthong ba med pa'i tshul zhes mthong ba dang / bdag med kyi ba ngas dbang pang drug bsngal brgyas lta dod zhugs par rjen tan cig sus par yashes su dbang bsgyur bas/ bum cin das co
141b2(rnying rgyud): nyi dang / thabs kyi na nas dar ba te/ bden+d+ha gyi las rba da byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// de lta 'og rdo thig le'i rnal 'byor nyams su blangs pa'i tsheganas skabs la ltos pa'i dga' bzhin/ snyoms par zhugs pas dang por thig le ga nas nas g.yos pa ni dga' ba/
141b3(rnying rgyud): bde ba nyams su myong ba ni mchog dgra'/ bde ba'i dbong sems 'gogs pas stong par grol ba ni dkang bral/ rang bzhin gas bu'i snying po bdi stod dbyer med nyams su myong ba ni zhan skyes kyi dga' ba ste/ lugs 'thung lugs ldog gi 'khod kyis dga' ba bzhi ba
141b4(rnying rgyud): gnas bzhi dang rang spang ga bshad do// de re la'ang dga' ba'i dga' ba sogs bcu drug ste/ rdo rda las rimA las/ gnas ni ye shes brgya drug go// tshogs sbyor la sogs dang ponas// mthar byin sangs rgyas pa nyid de// gnas bzhid bzhin bye ba las/
141b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnyis pa rab dag 'a sogs// pha rol sbyin dngas mtshan nyid// mtshungs phyir rdzogs par bshad pa yin// zhes pas dgu' ba'i dga' ba bzhi tshogs pa ma sogs srung darabang gi dus sbyar ba star las yas 'bra cu'i sa lam dang / mas brtan pa zus sangs pa
141b6(rnying rgyud): pad byis gas mad sacas paro tshung tu zhig de'i tshe rab tu gyen pa bcu lang rdzogs te/ byung sems rgya gnas thams cad su khyab par gtong basbyin pa/ 'dzag med du sdom pa tshul khrims/ thubs la mi skrag pa bzod pa/ de la 'bar pa brtson 'grus/ de'i dngu las mi

142a1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// gsum pa ma gyur pa'i 'bras bu/ dkyil pakhor pa gnas sogs tshogs bcad gas te/ thabs pol ma da kyil 'khor lagams pa sanar byen pa'i mthus gzhi gnas lugs cad kyis ma da nyid pa na du
142a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis rdzogs pa rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar byin gyi dkyil 'khor rang rig la lhan gyis grub par snang ba'i tshe ye shes kyi rang bzhin rig pa'i rgyan du phyogs bcu ngas bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad ma 'dres yongs rdzogs su thogs te/ 'bras bu'i yon tan thams
