152b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil la khor can por 'bral bas bzhes su gsol/ gang gas na dregs pa can 'jams pa'i dbu' bo rgya tshan po rnams kyi yang rdza bar gyur bya dpa la ta zugs pa zhes su gsol// zhes 'khor phul nas/ mchod par dam bca'aban/ bdag can pa dadzang /
152b2(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ 'di ltar zhal mthong ba'i khro bor rdzogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i snying tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa yang rang gi gtsug gi nor bu 'od 'bar ba bskur ba ltar sems la ga yo sgra med cing mchog tu gus pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyi
152b3(rnying rgyud): blangs nas rnam pa thams cad du spyi blo'i gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur sti dang rim gro phun sum tshogs par bsgri bas/ dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan 'chang ba de'i dgos pa'i las ci yin yang rung ste/ 'dod pa'i rlab ma lus pa rdzogs par bdag cag rnams kyis bslab bo//
152b4(rnying rgyud): gal te dpa' bo he ru ka'i spyan sde 'dir bdag cag rnams kyis ya lag ma bcas pa'i tha tshig sbas pa 'di bzhin du ma bsgrubs na/ bdag cag rnams kyi mgo tshal bar bkas shing / lus dmod pa'i mtshon gyis gtubs ti snying yang du mthur 'thor nas dul bar ma
152b5(rnying rgyud): zhes smras so// bzhi pa ni/ de nas sogs te/ bro bor bde nus dregs pa can de dag gi chung ma'i tshogs dang / sring mo dang / ma dang / bu mo'i tshogs thams cad sngar bkye ba las slar yang dkyil 'khor gyi drung du yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas/ de dag thams
152b6(rnying rgyud): cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag dbang mo 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kun g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi bar bgyin dpa' bo chen pos bdag cag rnams la/ 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi las 'di dang
152b7(rnying rgyud): 'di kyis shig ces las gang byed kyi bka'i bsgo bskal ba dang mthun pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol zhes smras so// ci bgyi khrus pa de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa chen pos de rnams kyi lag tu rdo rje byin nas/ rdo rje mi'i srin mo sogs rang rang dang mthun pa'i ming gi
153a1(rnying rgyud): da na sam sa / na
153a2(rnying rgyud): dub mamam mdzin palapa sapa sa 'angag pa gsu// ba smra
153a3(rnying rgyud): da gas sa byung lam pa byud phyi bcos na das dkyis bad kyil spyod tshugs can patu ba pa nga gnas sa ga gas pa bzhig 'thung bye gas
153a4(rnying rgyud): brnyan ma dang cas myogs dngagagi byug nga thugs byu ma nyid nga thu ga nas na 'i ldarnams sbyi ga kyi sa nga / sa pa rgya la // gsu
153a5(rnying rgyud): dngas / gas ni stsol la gapas nga go// yin nib ba
153a6(rnying rgyud): ba sa da/ /
153a7(rnying rgyud): sa su
153b1(rnying rgyud): rlung gadrums cag gsum rgyas natsug zhug nag car yang 'gyur bar babyed/ gnyis pal/ d+h+rU'i gadrag zugs gnams pan myangs gzhing bang can gyi dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa na rnams pa/ mthab rta ban du ston
153b2(rnying rgyud): gis gsal gdang / de nas bdag nyid ye nas sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir bdag gi sras su de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba bdag sras kyis cho ga ni/ le'u bco lnga pa ltar ngo mtshar tshogs kyi lha sum cu bskyed/ rigs mi nubacing ldan gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin
153b3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bya ba gzhan sras kyi chog ni/ bdag gtso bo'i thugs gnas 'bon te bskul bas/ sna tshogs rnams las thabs shes gnyis su mung ba'i 'od zer smos pas bdag gi lus tog sbyangs te 'od kyi gong bur gyur pa la/ slar ya
153b4(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi 'od zer bstim pas yi ge 'bru gsum du gyur pa rim bzhin hUM la bsdus pa de nyid zla ba la gnas pa chung dkyil gyis bteg ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams lag yas sku bskor nas gtso bo'i thugs kar thim/ byang chub kyi sems su
153b5(rnying rgyud): baspu'i dbyibs brgyad yum gyi mkhar son pa'i rkyen gyis gtso bo yab yum kyang bde ba chen po'i ngo bor zhu zhing / hU~M ha he phaT zhes pas 'khor rnams kyang dbus kyi thig ler bsdus nas 'od kyi gong bur bsam pa na bdag don chos spu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis snang ba'i zhen pa
153b6(rnying rgyud): stong ba'o// de nas hUM hUM zhes pa'i sgra gdangs yid la dran pa tsam gyis 'od phung de hUM yi gzung du gyur pa las cho ga gsum gyis gtso bo badra he ru ka yab yum bskyed nas dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab/ de nas mkha' gsang brlab pa sogs byas te yum
153b7(rnying rgyud): mkhar byang chub kyi sems lha'i sa bon yig 'bru'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa/ le'u 'dir bshad pa'i sngags kyis bskyed nas ngo mtshar tshogs kyi lha sum cu yum gyi mkha' las phaTadzaHzhes pas phyir bton la/ spo ba spus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsku
154a1(rnying rgyud): te gtso bo dang la bskum nang 'khor rnams su gnas su dang/ dbang mo nyer brgyang pa gtso pa'i thugs gnas na nyi btus so'i gnas su smras pa las/ man+ta thAs sogs bskyed sngags kyis khrag khyams su bskyed cing/
154a2(rnying rgyud): bcu bdun pa pazhi tshig gis gsal gdab rnams ni gzhan nagazugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis stong ba'i 'dzin pa sbyor ba'o// gsum pa las kyi ma / 'dred de/ su drangs nas parnams te pa brna pa'i b.ras bcad drug dang / gsum rdzas kyi rim pa la 'ang chos
154a3(rnying rgyud): mchod sogs sa bcad lnga ste srung zhabs ltar shes par bya'o// da ni dkyus la 'jug ste/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor la gnyis te/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i sngags dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang bsogs pas kyi rim pa'i sngags so// dang po la
154a4(rnying rgyud): gsum ste rigs lnga yab yum bcu'i dang / khro mo nyi shu'i rtsa bskyed las sngags dang bcas pa/ dbang mo rnams rtse rtsa ba'i sngags so// dang po ni/ oM badz+ra ma hA sogs te/ sngar gyi dpe rgyan rnams su bud+ha he ru kA'i sngags thog mar 'byung yang / gya dper badz+ra he ru gnyis
154a5(rnying rgyud): dang por yod ces gsung zhing thar lo 'gyur du'ang de ltar 'byung // de la sngags kyi 'gro 'dren oM rnams ni ye shes lha'am rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid rab bsngags kyi sa bon no// 'arjo rje/ sarba ta thA ga tad bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ raN+Da rin po che/ pad+ma
154a6(rnying rgyud): sor bzhug/ karma las te yab lha'i rigs so so'i mtshan/ ma hA shI he ru ka zhes pa ni spyi'i mtshan sngags bod pa ste/ ma hA chen po/ shrI dpal/ he ni he wa ste spyod cing rten pa/ ru ni ru d+hir ste khrag/ ka ni bdag po'i sgra ste khrag la rol pa'i don gyis khrag 'thung ngo //
154a7(rnying rgyud): de dag ni snying po bskyed pa'i sngags so// ma hA tsaN+Da sarba dush+tan+ta ka ha nad ha na ts+yai hU~M hUM hU~M phaT zhes pa ni las la bskul ba'i sngags te/ ma hA tsati zhig tum po chen po/ sarbe duSh+ka ni gdug pa can thams cad/ ad+haka ni mthar byed pa/ ha na bsnun pa/ da ha bsreg pa/
154b1(rnying rgyud): bca' chad pa/ gsum gyi dang poca pa'is po// gnyis pa thugs bkrang 'das don/ gsum pan bsdig par mdzad/ ban dgas pa kyis 'as las 'dul ba'i chags tu/ rab bsngags dang sogs rigs gang yin gyi dpal khrag dung ba nga /
154b2(rnying rgyud): nas// gtum po chen po gadrug bcan thams cad sa thar byed pas ldan cig/ grags shig// chos shig/ sdigs shig/ dgas par mdzod cig pa'o// sum la'i sngags ni/ badz+ras rba te thAg te/ raH/ pad+ma rnams sa pa dang / sa ma rka pa
154b3(rnying rgyud): rbad don yod pa nye rigs kyi mtshan no// ma lo d+hI b+hU d+hI rnams kyi khri mo dbang phyug ma tshan mo// thog mtha'i oM dang ze sdang bzhin/ hUMrtsa ba'i sangon/ khyad par du d+hAr 'chang ba/ dz+wa li nI 'bar ba mA/ spyan du Sh+Ta n+te gadrug ba can thams cad la/ mahA s+thas te ma chen /
154b4(rnying rgyud): bide ma rig ma/ hrI pra ta sa ma ta kun tu rgod pa/ khyA tati zo shAg/ bi shwa sna tshogs so// gnyis pa la gsum ste/ gnas ma brgyad kyi/ yul ma brgyad kyi/ sgo skyong bzhi'i sngags so// dang po ni/ oM badz+ra gau rI sogs te/ oM rab balngabla/ badz+ra rnams ni
154b5(rnying rgyud): rje lte dbang rtags mtshon pa'o// mjug gi ta brgyad ni rtsa ba'i sa bon/ bye brag gau rI dkar mo'i mu mdzod ldan ma/ tsa nI tshum rkun ma'am rkun mo/ pra mo he rab krongs ma'am rmongs mo/ be ta lI ro langs ma'amathal byed ma/ tsaN+Da lI gtum mo/ sug spyi thos so//
154b6(rnying rgyud): g+hAsmA d+hi s+ye sha can nam drod mo/ sma shan+ti dur khrod ma'am mtshogs ma'o// gnyis pa ni/ oM badz+ra saM hi sogs te/ oM dang badz+ra 'dra/ mjug gi he brgyad rtsa ba'i sa bon/ sid+ha mu khI seng gdong ma/ b+ha g+hA yu khI stag gdong ma/ shI gA lA mu khI wa gdong ma/ shA n+tama?
154b7(rnying rgyud): rje khyog dong ma'am spyang gdong ma/ gr-i d+hi mu 'i byi rgod gdong ma'am gzhadag dong ma/ kan mra lI ga 'i gdong ma' mdur bu'i gdong ma/ kAg rtsu la gdong me'am bya rog gdong ma/ u lpaka mU lI 'ug gdang ma'o// gsum ba ne/ i dz+wa yA byasogs te/
155a1(rnying rgyud): da spangangs 'phags snapang ga sang myu nga 'phyor/ Am+b+ha sa nga ma'am ngan yadam/ bka ga nas/ la yas khral bur byud sa/ mdun ga ra stong gnas nan// gsum pa dang /
155a2(rnying rgyud): mo'i rtsa sngags ni/ b+h+yo drug chen da'i/ bzhi tshon gcig ste nyer brkyang ni/ ma mo'i tshogs kyi don dang / snying po'ang len la/ 'bod pa dang bskul ba'ang yin no// rnam pa gcig tu na/ b+ha gi ni sring mo dang / b+han chung ma la 'jug pa'i sgra bsdus pa'am/ man
155a3(rnying rgyud): ngag skye mar/ 'jigs par byed ba'i don la bsha dang ltar na 'jigs byed ma zhes bod pa'o// bskyed sngags nI ma nu raN+Da sI b+h+yo sogs bshad kyad me long las gsungs pa ltar ro// gnyis pa las kye rim pa'i sngags la gsum ste/ dbab cing drang ba'i sngags/ me
155a4(rnying rgyud): tog do zhing dngos grub skal pa'i rdzog sngags/ dzin len du 'chod cing brgyan pa sngags so// da dzin/ oM du lu ru l+r-i n+ti zhes bstan ga nu dbab pa'i sngags te/ spyir drani chu nga'i sbalas 'jig par gyis/ su ni wa nyi sras gcod pa/ dz+nyAn bsdig paste/
155a5(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi lha bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig cing cod la bsdig par mdzod ces pas gdul thu gadrug pa can gyi ngong chos kyi sku las 'jigs byed chen por bzhengs par mdzod ces baphrul ba'o// khyad par basbyin 'i bye brag parda las sbyin drang bar shes pa'i skabang te
155a6(rnying rgyud): las kyi srin po'i dam chog gi gdug pa'i sgra dpal chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa// oM ts+yaiti / An ya d+hadz+haiM d+d+hoHzhes pa ni spyan drang ba'i chags te/ e h+ye d+hi ts+tsha skyon nur spyod/ An+ta ya dkrug pa'o// tshad mod bzhes 'gro don baphrul ba//
155a7(rnying rgyud): di de la gnyis mi 'dab byang ma du zhugs pa'o// gnyis n-i oM brgyas su nyon ra / yor ba brlabs/ ga/ sam yod/ gas sheg pa'o// masags dngam du ba badra la bas
155b1(rnying rgyud): klu'i 'go 'dzin/ gdul bya khrol 'dul byed khros par snang bas rgyang zhi bar mdzad pa thugs rnga dang gis khro bar bstan bus 'gro ba'i dpal mgon 'jigs byed chen po rngams pa'i tshogs khrag 'thung 'bur ba'i dkyil 'khor lha gsung thugs yon tan phrin las 'a byin
155b2(rnying rgyud): rlabs gzhan las ches che ba'i thang po che ste/ de nyid dus de lta nyid du 'dir ni bdag la stsol bar mdzod cig pa'o// oM badz+ra kro d+ha gsum ni sngar ltar dang / sa ma yaHdam tshig gam dus la/ tAM khyod ces bong pa'am 'ba'o// phaT smos shig/ hoHmnyes par
155b3(rnying rgyud): mdzod ces pa ste/ mchog ster rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig khyod/ dam tshig sgos shig/ dam tshig gis dgyes par mdzod ces so// gsum pa ni/ a li sogs te a bar+NaM sha'i skad yin ces gsung / de la a li ni chang ste btung ba/ u li shwa ste bza'
155b4(rnying rgyud): ba/ tA li ta pA li 'bru 'bras sogs dam tshig gi rdzas sna tshogs/ daMSh+Ta zhal mche ba bgra pa/ gon rdo rje/ ro dri khro ba'am drag po/ kha raM stob pa ste/ rdo rje khro bo mche ba bgrang ba'i zhal du stob po// zhes pa'o// yo gi n+ti rnal 'byor ma/ khA hi gsol
155b5(rnying rgyud): cig/ hon mchod pa stob pa ste/ 'khor gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams la stob pa'o// hUM ha he phaT ni dam ye gnyis med du gyur nas gsal zhing brtan par byas pa'o// gnyis pa yon tan ni/ ces brjod pas sogs te/ de skad ces gsung gsang sngags brjod
155b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mthu byin gyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus snang ba'i rtog tshogs thams cad tshig/ ngag grug pa'i rtog tshogs rab tu tshig/ sems sgrib pa'i rtog tshogs kun tu tshig go// de ltar tshig pas snang ba lha'i dkyil 'khor du 'bar/
155b7(rnying rgyud): grag pa sngags kyi dkyil 'khor du rab tu 'bar// dran rig thugs ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du kun tu 'bar ro// de'i tshe nam mkhas gang khyab thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyi skus gang / gsung gis khyab par rab tu gang / thugs gnyis
156a1(rnying rgyud): su med pa'i lags kyis kun tu khya cing gang bar gyur // gsum pa mthan ni/ gsung ba sogs te/ rgyud 'di la lamra nye gnyis yod pa las/ 'dis khya bar tshogs ldan pa'i lha gteng gsung gi dkyil 'khar spros pa'i ma
156a2(rnying rgyud): badrug pa'o// / yeng brgya badran pa lnga gsum te/ mthus dang / gzhung dang / mtshanano// dang po ni/ de nas mags te/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa de nas lhag pa wa dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ston pa'i phyi bcom ldan 'das dkyus
156a3(rnying rgyud): chen pos khro bo'i sprin gsang sngags dang bcas pa de dag gis bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gnyis pa gzhung la gnyis te/ lha'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i yon tan no// dang po la gnyis te/ rten gzhal
156a4(rnying rgyud): yas khang dang / brten pa lha'o// dang po la'ang gnyis te/ ngo bo rgyan dang bcas pa dang / gdan bstan pa'o// dang po ni/ 'bar ba'i 'khor lo sogs rkang pa drug ste/ 'og gzhi tshad med pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la rdzogs pa'i ye shes rin po che'i rang bzhin d+ha ny+dza 'bar
156a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su ye shes lnga'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi lte ba dang bcas pa/ de'i phyir bden bzhi mtshon pa'i gru chad bzhis ni rnam par brgyan cing / che ba'i yon tan rgyas pas dbyibs gru bzhi pa/ rnam thar bzhi'i sgo bzhi sgo khyud can bzhi dang ldan pa/ bden
156a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis mtshon pa'i 'bar ba'i bar khyams nang ma gser khyams dang / phyi ma khrag khyams gnyis kyis mdzes shing / thod bskam rlon rnyid gsum gyi rtsig pa phyi ma rim pa lnga dang / nang ma gsum pa/ thams cad kyang rak+Shas sbyin thabs su sbyar zhing gnam lcags kyi
156a7(rnying rgyud): gzer bus btab pa/ bcig steng thod pa sna tshogs kyi bgu 'phyang ba las b+hu ma dang snying gi mgul 'khor dang / ze phral gyi sna ma bur sbrul sbra ma dang thod phreng ge dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa/ gang lag gi shar bu/ skal rtsib kyi mda' yab/ rim pa gnyis ka'i rtsig
156b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'gram du 'dod pa'i snam bu dang / sgo phye ma la rgya 'bras kyi rta babs sogs 'jigs pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis bkra ba/ steng zhing lpags kyi thog phubs nyi ma dang zla ba'i mthongs dkar dang bcas pa'i dbus phyur bu lha chen gyi thod pas phug pa'i rtse mo tsit+ta'i tog
156b2(rnying rgyud): gis brjed pa/ phyi rol tu du du longs spyod dang bcas pa dbyings su bskal bu'i dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor zhing / 'bar ba'i ma dpung me'i tshwa tshwa gro ba'i grong nas tshe rgyang mang po 'gro zhing 'khrug pas mangs pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ khyu mchog sogs
156b3(rnying rgyud): rkang pa gsum ste/ dbus kyi lte ba dang rtsibs bzhir pad+ma dang zla nyi brtsegs pa'i steng du/ gti mug gnas su dag pa'i rtags su shar rtsibs la khyu mchog dang / nga rgyal dag pa lhor ma he dang / 'dod chags dag pa nub tu gzig dang / phrag dog dag pa byang du stag
156b4(rnying rgyud): dang / zhe sdang dag pa dbus su gtum pado ma rnams zung gi sbar bas ni dregs pa zil gnon gyi gdan dbus su dbang phyug dang lha chen po drag po/ la sogs pas shar du dri za/ lhor gshin rje/ nub du srin po/ byang du gnod sbyin rnams pho mo kha bu ba gan rgyal du
156b5(rnying rgyud): bsnol ba'i sogs skrag dang nu spag nas las la nan tur du bstan pa'i phyir bzung ba'o// 'khor gyi gnas yul sgo skyong rnams la nyi ma dang zhing gi gdan/ dbang mo rnams la zhing skam po'i gdan ro ra'o// gnyis pa brten pa lha la gnyis te/ gtso bo rigs
156b6(rnying rgyud): lnga'i bzhugs tshul dang / 'khor gyi bkod pa'o// dang po la lnga ste/ sku mdog/ zhal phyag/ rgyan dngang ngo // phyag mtshan/ 'khril tshul lo// dang po ni/ smug nag sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ dug lnga gnas su dag cing phrin las lnga'i mdzad pa mtshon
156b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdang rigs so so'i kha dog la/ de dag kyang rigs mi 'gyur zhing las bzhi'i phrin las kyi gzhi dang mthar phyin pa drag pos mdzad pa'i phyir thams cad la nag po'i sgras spros te/ bud+d+ha he ru ka'i sku mdog spug nag/ badz+ra he ru ka'i sngonag/ rat+na he ru ka'i ser
157a1(rnying rgyud): drug dang / padz+ra ga rbaka'i dmang nag/ gang she ga'i ltang dag ste sra mdog cazha la dang bcas pa'o// g.yas zhal ni nye na'i sngon po dang / gzhan thams cad dkar ba/ g.yon zhal ni badz+ra dang pad+ma gnyis ser po dang / gzhan gsum dmas
157a2(rnying rgyud): po ste/ gdug pa can gyi ngor shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra che zhing yan lag rags pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ dbu gsum sogs te/ thams cad kyang rnam thar gsum mchod pa'i dbu gsum/ ye shes drug gis 'gro don mdzad pa'i phyir phyag drug/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dngapa
157a3(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i phyir zhabs bzhi g.yas brkyang ba'i dor stabs su bgrang pa'o// gsum pa ne/ ko rlon sogs rkang pa gsum ste/ bko so rngon rje gos ni na tshogs pa gyon pa ste/ stobs bzlas gti mug bcom pa'i brdar glang rjen gyi go rlon dang / byang chub sems kyis
157a4(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags bcom pa'i brdar zhing lpags kyis stod g.yogs shing / dpa' brtul drag po'i las kyis zhe sdang bcom pa'i brdar stag legs kyi sham thabs grol ba nye bgo ma'i gos gsum mo// klu rgyal rigs dkar pos skra 'chings/ je rigs ser pos snyan cha/
157a5(rnying rgyud): bram ze'i rigs dmar pos se mo dro dang mgur chu/ dmangs rigs ljang gus ska rags dang do shal/ gdol pa nag pos gdus ste thams cad kyang gdug pa srul gyi rnam pa can dang / thod phreng ni skam po lnga'i dbu rgyan/ 'dzag pa'i mgo rlon lnga bcu'i do shal/
157a6(rnying rgyud): tshal bu'i dpung rgyan te gdags pa'i rgyan gnyis so// dpral bar bral chen gyi tshom bu/ sprin mtshams su raka'i theg le/ mgrin par zhag gi zo ris rnams ni byug pa'i rtsigasum ste/ de dag ni dur khrod 'i chas brgyad do// sman gong g.yas g.yon nas nyi zla'i 'od
157a7(rnying rgyud): zer spong ni gsal ba'i chos gnyis so// gsung ni 'brug ltar chems pa'i rngams pa'i sgra chen drag po shin tu 'jigs par spogs pa'o// bzhi pa ni/ stong gi sogs te/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten khor yug dang bcas pa ni badz+ra he ru ka'i phyag g.yon gyi thams
157b1(rnying rgyud): bsdams pa yin la/ rdo rje rtse dgu pa ni badz+ra hi rbag g.yas dang po'i phyag mtshan dang / rtse lba ba dang dung chen gang pa ni thams cad kyi phyag par pa gnyis dang / ral kr-i na kAr+m+ma te rba ka'i g.yas dang po ste/ grub thabs su bshad rgyad brgyad pa ltar rgya gas bshad do//
157b2(rnying rgyud): dgra s+thA ni gA'i g.yon nam/ blo ga shol ni ka ma'i g.yon pa ma'o// de la sogs pa rang rang gi lag chen tshogs pa 'dzin pa ste/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po brad+ha'i 'khor lo// rA'i rin chen/ pad+ma'i pad sdong / thams cad kyigayon dang badral bu dang / g.yas
157b3(rnying rgyud): tham zhing byu// prang+ka'i g.yon pa mchi shul dang padz+nyA chang rnams \u0f7f/ 'di dag ni ba shang chu brgyad pa ltar thub thabs kyi phyag drug mchod dung mthun par byas pa'o// lA pa ni/ btsun mo sogs te/ rang rang gi rigs skye btsun po 'jigs pa tshogs sngags
157b4(rnying rgyud): mdagal ba dang ma than pa gzigag paca na sa ni rdzas ma la yon chu dpa nam pa nyid she zang jug pa'i ba ya ba dang gnyis su med par 'brel ba'o// gnyis pa ma bsod pas
157b5(rnying rgyud): gnas dang sogs rkang badrug ste/ rnam shes tshogs brgyad ni 'khor bab skyed pa'i gnas dang / de'i yul brgya dganas su dag pas na gau rI ma sogs la gnas ma dang / sid+ha ma sogs la yul ma brgyad ces btags la/ de dag gi phyag rgya ni/ shan
157b6(rnying rgyud): dmang zhing dbyug so// zhes sogs dang / sing+ga khar bsnol ser seng // zhes sogs dang / sgom bzhi'i phyag rgya ni/ rtagadong sngon mo lcags kyu 'dzin// zhes sogs te/ so so'i sku mdog phyag mtshan dang mgo brnyan rnams kyang gar ma tshad kyis gsal
157b7(rnying rgyud): par bstan to// de ltar khrom nyi shu'i 'khor ci bkod pas rab tu mangs shing / gzhan yang sras te chungs dang / byi mo mdza' mo dang / bran mo ste las byed pa'i cha nas btags pa dbang phyug ma'i tshogs grangs bza tshan gnyis dang yab rgyad do// burtsa bcun
158a1(rnying rgyud): kyis mdzes par bskor ba/ de dag kyang rang rang gi snyan zhing skam po re dang / skra mdog dang lag cha ni/ srin mo skrag nag thod rlon 'chang // zhes sogs dang / bdag gi las skal ci bgyi zhes zhu zhing / rdzu 'phrul ni thogs pa med par
158a2(rnying rgyud): yud tsam gyis chas te so so'i las dang mthun pa'i phyogs su gnas so// de ltar khrag 'byung nga brgyad ni dkyil 'khor spos pa las bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ 'bring po la de'i steng du khro bcu yab yum bstan pas don bcad/ rgyas pa la de'i yang steng du khrag 'azung
158a3(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga la rigs chung gi khro bo yab yum zung bzhis bskor ba'i bzhi bcu bstan pas brgya bco brgyad do// yang 'phros don rnam grangs spos pa ni/ lam rim las/ yan lag bkod pa lnga bcu brgyad// cha lnga'i grangs ni nyis brgya dang // dgu bcu'i lha rnams
158a4(rnying rgyud): yan lag ldan// zhes pas badz+ra he ru ka'i yan lag lnga la khrag 'thung yab lnga dang yum laM yum lnga/ yab kyi dbang rten gyi nang rtsa ra gau rI ma brgyad/ phyi rtsa ra sau ha ma brgyad/ mthil bzhi la sgo ya/ sgal tshigs la dbang mo nyer brgyad de thabs lhang brgyad/
158a5(rnying rgyud): de rnams la ye shes sems dpa' dang / sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams re re bsgoms pas ngabargyad pa cha lnga la nyis brgya dang dgu bcu/ de las shes rab kyi lhang brgyad phri ba'i lha gnyis brgya so gnyis po re re la dbu rgyan gyi lha lnga lnga ste stong tshig brgya drug tu 'byung ba
158a6(rnying rgyud): brgya dgu bcu la bsnan pas stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu lte gtso bo yab yum la tshang bar bsgom mo// des mtshon nas khrag 'thung rigs bzhi'i zung re re dang / gnas yul sgo dbang gi lha zhe brgyad la yum med pas/ mgo'i g.yas dang / rkang lag g.yas
158a7(rnying rgyud): kyi mdun rgyab la yab lnga dang / mgo'i g.yon dang / rkang lag g.yon gyi mdun byab la yum lnga bkod de/ mdor na stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu nga gsum la bdun khri drag stong brgyad brgya lnga bcu'i dkyil 'khor 'byung zhing / bsam yas lhan grub kyi dkyil 'khor
158b1(rnying rgyud): ni zhi ba ltar ro// gnyis pa yon tan ni/ zhes brjod pas sogs te/ de skad ces brjod pa'i mthus 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba chen po khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyis kun du khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// gsum pa mtshan ni/ gsang ba'i sog
158b2(rnying rgyud): te// rgyud 'di la le'u zheng gnyis yod pa las/ 'dis khro bo'i lhag ting spu dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / le'u bco brgyad pa la gsum ste/ lo rgyas dang / gzhung dang / mtshan no// dang po ni/ de nas sogs te/
158b3(rnying rgyud): khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa de nas khyad par gyi mchod pa ston pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams mnyes par byed pa rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa chen po 'di ched du brjod do// gnyis pa gzhung la gsum ste/ mchod pa dngos dang /
158b4(rnying rgyud): mchod pa'i 'bras bu dang / de gsungs pa'i yon tan no// dang po la bzhi ste/ zhe sdang sgrol ba'i/ 'dod chags sbyor ba'i/ gti mug dam rdzas kyi/ 'dod yon tan gyi mchod pa'o// dang po ni/ de la sogs rkang pa lnga ste/ lhag pa ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil
158b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor la brten nas bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag pa de la bde gshegs rnams mchod pa dang / mkha' 'gro rnams la sbyin pa gnyis las/ de dag gi nang nas kyang khyad par du gyur pa'i mchog dam pa ni 'di yin te/ thog mar rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid chu shes pa'i
158b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid blta ba rtogs shing / rkyen 'dug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin goms pa'i thabs kyis gzung 'dzin gyi zhen rtog chos nyid skye med kyi dbyings su bsgral te rtogs pas bdag bskal ba'o// de nas thugs rjes gzhan bsgral ba ni/ bskal bya sgrol
158b7(rnying rgyud): byed gnyis med du rtogs pa'i blo yi gdeng gis zin pa ni shes rab ste/ de'i ngang las rgyu 'bras kyi don la rmongs pa'i blo ngan zhing bcur gyur pa'i sems can srid pa'i 'jig rten 'og mar brgyud pa 'di dag snying de rje zhes thabs snying rje chen po'i sgo nas bskal bya'i rnam shes
159a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis sa med pa'i byang chub kyi seb sa thos kyi dkyings der bathal bar byu// gnyis pa na/ 'grel ba 'gas nang paganyis te/ yab sum pa gis tha ma dpa 'thal bas bdapa mthong sabyung chub tho
159a2(rnying rgyud): mnyam par sbyor bas rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid bde ba'i rol mos mnyes shing tshems par byas nas/ byang chub sems kyi rdul phra rab mkha' khyab tu spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyang tshims te bde chen ldan
159a3(rnying rgyud): cig skyes pa'i ye shes su ro mnyam par byas pa'o// gsum pa ni/ mnyam pa'i sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i dngos gra bsgrub pa'i rdzas chen po bdud rtsil po 'di dag bdag dam tshig gi 'khor mo
159a4(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes lha'i dkyil 'khor gnyis med du mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'khor gsum yongs dag gi mchod par dbul lo// bzhi pa ni/ bza' dang sogs gang pa gsum ste/ sha zan sogs bza' ba dang / shing thog sogs bca' ba dang / rnga chang sasra/
159a5(rnying rgyud): btung ba dang / sra ba 'jam yang ba'i bgo ba dang / gzhan yang lha dang pi'i longs spyod 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa'i snang ba thams cad lha dang lha mod rnam par dag pas 'phrul tshul ni/ mchod yul ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor// tshogs la ni mazod rdzas 'dod
159a6(rnying rgyud): yon lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gnyis med bde ba chen por ro gcig tu thim pa'i tshul gyis dbul lo// gnyis pa mchod pa'i 'bras bu la gnyis te/ thun grong dang / mchog ga'o// dang po ni/ phyogs bcu sogs tshogs bcad gcig ste/ phyogs bcung dus
159a7(rnying rgyud): bzhing 'gro ba'i don la gshegs pa yi bde ba dgashegs pa rnams kyi che ba'i yon tan zad che rnams kyang / rang degartogs pa las gzhan zhig 'og nas patsal du yod pa'ang tshwar 'ongs pa pa yin dgazhan 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub lha srin la sogs pa'i mthu las byung ba
159b1(rnying rgyud): tan 'grub shi lta spos kyang rtse dgas so// gnyis pa ni/ rnal 'byor sogs tshigs bcad gcig skye/ rnal 'byor ba gang zhig lha brtogs shing ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba rnams kyis lha bu phyag rgya chen po rang rig la mngon ma par 'gyur shing / de nyid yul gyis me
159b2(rnying rgyud): 'phrog par gsal ba la brtan pa thob nas 'bras bu 'grub pa ma mi 'grubaskam pa'i yid gnyis dang the tshom med par gyur pa na rang bzhin 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gsum pa de gsungs pa'i yon tan ni/ zhes brjod pas
159b3(rnying rgyud): sogs te/ de skad ces brjod pa'i mthas mnyes pa zan pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du mchod pa'i sbyin gyi bol mos khyab par gyur to// gsum pa mtshan ni/ gsang ba'i sogs te/ rgyad 'di la le'u nye gnyis yod pa las/ 'dis rgyal
159b4(rnying rgyud): ba rnams mchod cing ma mo dang mkha' 'gror smin pa'i thabs thun mong du ma grags pas mchog dam pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brkyang pa'o// / le'u bcu dgu pa la gsum ste/ lo rgyas dang / gzhung dang / mtshan no// dang po ni/ de nas sogs
159b5(rnying rgyud): te// khyad par gyi mchod sbyin bstan pa de nas dam tshig gi rim bskon pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos skyugs 'chung rnal 'byor pa rnams log par mi lung zhing 'bras bu myur du 'grub pas lam la 'bad pa don yod par bya ba'i phyir blan med pa'i dam tshig chen po 'di
159b6(rnying rgyud): dag ched du brjod do// gnyis pa gzhung la gnyis te/ dam tshig dngos dang / de'i yon tan no// dang po la bdun te/ dam chog gi che ba dang / rnam grangs mdor bstan pa dang / mnyam pa'i dam tshig skyon yon dang bcas pa dang / dam tshig nyams pa'i
159b7(rnying rgyud): smon dang / dam tshig gi rang bzhin dang / dmachog ge rnam grangs rgyas par bshad pa dang / de mnyams pa'i yon tan no// dang po la gnyis te/ spyod sgo yangs pa'i dang / 'dul sdom thams cad 'dras pa'i che ba'o// dang po ni/ tha med theg par
160a1(rnying rgyud): na na
160b1(rnying rgyud): no// de ltar yang / theg chen dam tshig la gnas na// 'og ma'i 'dul sdom dam tshig kun// bsrung ba med par thub pas na// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' dang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po yin// zhes so// gnyis pa la bzhi ste/ srog gcod pa dang /
160b2(rnying rgyud): mabyin par len pa dang / rdzun du smra ba dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba ji ltar 'dus shing dag pa'o// dang po ni/ yod med sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ don dam par chos thams cad yod pa rtag pa dang med pa chad pa'i mtha' dang / de gnyis ka dang bral
160b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbu ma tsam du'ang mi dmigs shing / kun rdzob tu sgyu ma'i skyes byas mig yor gyi sems can bsad pa lta bu'i tshul du snang yang / sdang dus nyid nas bcad bya'i srog bden par grub pa med pas srog gcod mkhan dang bcad do ba'i 'du shes kyang ma grub pas don la
160b4(rnying rgyud): gcad du med de/ srog dang de ldan gyi skyes bur 'dzin pa ni log tog 'khrul ngo tsam yin pa'i phyir/ de ltar rtogs nas zhing bcu'i srog bcad kyang nyes pas mi gos shing / tshogs rdzogs pas na srog gcod spong ba'i sdom pa'i ngo bo dang yon tan yang ldan du 'dus so//
160b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa ni/ bden pa sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ chos thams cad don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa gnyis ka'i tshal la bdag dang gzhan zhes dbyer med pas don dam par ma dmigs shing / tha snyad kun rdzob tu'ang 'phrul dga'i lha rnams rang gis
160b6(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i longs spyod len pa ltar/ ma byin par len dus nyid nas rang snang gi rdzas la rang snang gis len pa'i tshul gyis blangs te spyad kyang don la tha dad min pas/ glang bu'i yul gzhan dang / das bdag gir bzung ba'i rdzas ma byin par len rgyu zhig
160b7(rnying rgyud): gung na med pa'i phyir/ blangs pa'ang med de/ ci blangs kyang thams cad bdag nyid las mi 'da' bar gnyis med kyi dbyings su ro gcig tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ de ltar bdag gzhan gyi rgyu dadabyer med du shes pas 'jungs pa las blangs nas baben pa la
161a1(rnying rgyud): ster ba sogs byas na nyes pas mi gos shing tshigs rdzogs pas mabyin len blang ba 'asgom pa 'ango bo dang yon tan yang ldan du 'das so// gsum pa ni/ chos rnams sogs tshogs pa ca gcig sa/ chos rnams thams cad bltar snang ba de bzhin du
161a2(rnying rgyud): yong pas yin pas sum ga sa du tsam du ba la/ de ltar bdang bya nam thab bapazhin mau byed mi gang chog tu bdags na pade la dang dzin pa na no// de'i phying yul shes kyang nga dod pathams kyang bded par 'asgrub pas ldan pa zhing lani/ shes cing da kyang sa
161a3(rnying rgyud): spyod pa nye/ nga ny-i mthan/ de la nyos pa na pa 'ang sgruthub pa pa rdza kyi cing gas patsa ga 'ang yod pa payin do// de lta shes pas dun smras pa shes pas rdzogs shing / ji lta bar bde sbya mas pas rgyags rdzags
161a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir bathong pa'i sdom pa bo nga yon dang yang 'ad du 'dus so// ba ne ni/ mchags thogs chog pa bad gcig ste/ chos thams cad la yul mas gnyis med dgas la bani chags pa'i ye shes te/ de la gnyis sa zhen ca chags pa'i dus na/ gnyis
161a5(rnying rgyud): med du shes pa'i blta ba dang / 'du shes gsum ldan gyi bsgom pa dang / thabs kyis zin pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pas 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags la spyod pa ltar snang ba'i dus nyid na yang tha mal gyi chags pa'i dri ma rdul tsam yang med pa de ni 'dzag med kyi tshul khrims tshangs par stod pa thams
161a6(rnying rgyud): nga kyi mchog ga maN+Dal po ste/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa pade stong zung 'dug dang rig gi ngo'i grol ba ni chags pa chen po bde chen gyi ye shes yin no// de ltar shes nas srung na nyes pas migos shing / 'dzag med kyi ye shes 'grub pa sogs tshe ma klupa'i phyir ba tshangs
161a7(rnying rgyud): spyod spong ba'i sdom pa'ang po dang yon tan yang ldan du 'dus so// gnyis pad ma chog ge rnam grangs 'dor bsan pa la gsus ste/ rtsa ba'i da mchog/ yan lagag mchog/ de gnyis kyi nges chog bshad pa'o// da yon/ tha tshang sogs dang badrug te/ 'dil
161b1(rnying rgyud): papa'as/ / / sa gas sa sa 'o// smras bsdu par ma na// sa smra la sgrubs/ sna /
161b2(rnying rgyud): dum / bya bde pa nyis / ma ng+gA rnag da gyis bye me tsugasanas/ gsas sgrags ga rdzug tulas byed pa// na/
161b3(rnying rgyud): brang shing 'di kyang mang thob bi skye du/ rababyu gi ldan pos tha den pa dang/ demachog 'bogs shing dbang bla bzod pacig dab ga dang / bshags su'adu gyur pa nyams cag slong pa'i dag chob zad pa 'aslo ba po sa
161b4(rnying rgyud): kyil 'ad/ ga gas papa ma gang na slob po ste/ glus / gle nga nga / ga dang bu rdzung ste// rgyu ga sa dusan/
161b5(rnying rgyud): rang T+Te/ nga sa ma ga sa ma pa// ga ma ma sa sgru / na / snru sa gas
161b6(rnying rgyud): da ste/ gsal bas las/ rtsa ba bskyed dang las sdigs dang // dam tshig las dang chos dang ni// rtswa nyid phyag rgya chen po bzhi// zhes so// de dag brtson par bkyis chu ba'i sman bzhin nam/ nyin nag gcig gi nang du thad dru gagam pa'i'i rjem
161b7(rnying rgyud): 'tho byar/ 'breng gis zla ba ladus tshogs drug gam/ dus bzang ba bzhi'am/ nya stong gnyis mo dang / thams kyang grangs dang longs mimachod pargyan mi gcad par 'bad par bya'o// mched la byams pani/ yul gyi'i ma
162a1(rnying rgyud): can thams cad/ ring ba'i mched bstan la zhugs so cog/ ge ba'i mched sngags kyi theg par zhugs pa/ 'dres pa'i mched bla ma gcig gis bsdus pa pha gcig pa'i spyan dang / de'i shugs kyis dkyil 'khor gcig
162a2(rnying rgyud): gis bsdus pa ma gcig gi spun rnams so// de rnams las khyad par phyim gsum ni yang dag pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i mched dang / de'i nang nas kyang 'dres pa'i mched ni lhag par yang byams par bya ba'i yul lo// de dag la thams lugs ni rtag tu
162a3(rnying rgyud): 'bral ning pan 'dags pa'i sgrog bas ma gyis ban+de d+hangs spyan mi chang par byeba'o// gsang ga gi sa la ni/ thAHmA lAs/ dmahA pas dam las lag padang // dam med da kyil 'khor ma mdzod dang // 'dres dang ma 'dres thams cad pa// zhesas/
162a4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar gsang ba'i tshul ni/ skye gsang sngags kyi tshig don rnams byedar gyur pa ste snod ma yin pa la gsang bar bya ba yin mod// khyad par du ni/ phra rgyas las/ spyi dang bad gsang bzhi bzhi dang // 'os dang gnyer gtad rnam pa bcu// zhes gsungs pa
162a5(rnying rgyud): rnams ni shin tu gsang bar bya ba'o// de la steng gsang bzhin/ gsal bkri las/ lha zab spyod pa brlabs po dang // lha'i ming gzungs dang grab rtags gsang // zhes pa'i lta za ba ni theg dman sogs glo 'phangs dma' ba rnams dang / spyod pa ni
162a6(rnying rgyud): ma 'dres pa thams cad la gsang ngo // yid mgyi lha sngags dang grub rtags ni ma 'dres pa la bstan na dam tshig nyams shing / 'dres par bstan na'ang dngos grub nyams par gsungs pas thams cad du gsang bar bya'o// par gsang bzhin/ bsgrub
162a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas dus grogs dang rdzas// bar du gsang la bsgrub par bya/ gzhis pas bsgrub pa'i bar de srid dugasang ngo // gsang bar 'os pa ni rdzas dang sprod pa mthong thos su mi za ba rnams so// gnyer gtad pa ni// slob dpon dang mched kyis
162b1(rnying rgyud): gas nga ga sa pa masas 'a par gan// deg ba nga/ na ga pa skad pam na ga yin pas bldunas gsangs pa sa te/ de' byangs pas dang gas rgyag skyes bsgrub pa dang / gdan
162b2(rnying rgyud): bzung 'a cigag bachog ste pa'o// yang bag yang bstan/ dang mched la bstsung bad+ma'i brjog/ thugs rtags ste/ gsung bathugs te/ byang sems kyang thugs kyid macig tu bsdus dab ngag/ dka ma dzin
162b3(rnying rgyud): sa ni drung mas/ byang chub sems gsas bsgom pa ni// de thugs kyi mngon no// zhes so// gnyis pa yan lag ge macig la gsum ste/ me smrang ba lta dang / mdor blta bstan pa dang / gnyis ka'i mngag bsduba'o// dang po
162b4(rnying rgyud): gti tsugasogs na ga / 'di 'gas la bsgrums/ ying gdug la gdugs// zhes pas sding yang 'gag nyisu las/ yang gA ba drug ni/ chos thams cad mnyam tha~M gas pa'i / khwa ba zlogs sa dang srod pa ma
162b5(rnying rgyud): gyis dbyung ba med pa ni gti mug dang / de ma rtogs pa lnga dmigs meng kyi snying rje chen po'i 'dod chags dang / rang reg pa'i ye shes kyis logatog 'joms pa'i zhe wang dang / mnya ba nyid rtogs pa'i lhab shongs su mi 'bebs pa'i dad+ha ma dang /
162b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'dzin kyi zhen rtog mnyam nyid kyi srong du mi shong ba'i phrag dgu ste/ togs goms kyi sbyor bas me spang // log pa'i drug lda naM/ drug lnga dang mtshan pa rnams te/ de dag ci'i phyir me snang zhen/ log pa'i drug la chos can/ spang bya ba yin no/
162b7(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad dang ring gang pos stong bas spang bya'i rjes mgrub pa'i phyir dang / thabs kyis zed na spad kyar mi 'ching bar rnam par grol ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir dang / yenas rigs lnga'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro// ribs na me spang ba la dgos pa yod de/
163a1(rnying rgyud): dngos pa'i zhen pa ldog pa dang 'ching byed kyi las la spyad pas grol ba 'di 'drang mthar che snyam du thabs kyi lam zab mo langs shes skye ba dang / chos nyid thab mo rtogs pa lam rmya ba'i dgos pa rnams yod pa'i phyir ro//
163a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa mi dor be wa ni/ dkar rtse sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ dkar rtsi byang sems dkar po dang / dmar rtsi byang sems dmar po dang / dri chen dang / sha chen dag pa'i snod de dngas ma dang / dri chu rnams ni gtsang sde'i rtog pa skyong ba dang / nad lnga sel
163a3(rnying rgyud): zhing thun mong gi yon tan lnga 'byung ba dang / rigs lnga ye shes lnga srub pa'i dam rdzas khyad par can yin pa'i phyir/ mi dor bar dang du blang bar bya'o// 'dir dpe phal che bar/ dag pa'i snod bcud ces 'byung ba ni ma dag pa ste/ rgya dper chu'i skad drod
163a4(rnying rgyud): dza laM zhes yod cing / thar lo'i 'gyur las kyang / dkar dang dmar dang dri dang ni// sha chen dag pa yi ni snod// chu nyid kyang ni dor mi bya// zhes so// gsum pa mjug bsdu ba ni/ yan lag sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ de ltar mi spang mi dor ba ni
163a5(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba'i grogs sam thabs su gyur pas na yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ces bya ste/ ye nas dag pa gsum dang mnyam pa bzhir gnas pa'i don rtogs pas sprad par bya'o// gsum pa nges tshig ni/ bskyang zhing sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ sbyar bshad
163a6(rnying rgyud): bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig rnam pa lnga ni rtsa ba'i dam tshig yin te/ ljon shing gi rtsa ba ltar bsrungs na dngos grub 'byung zhing nyams na re zhig byang chub kyi rigs kyang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// mi spang mi dor ba'i dam tshig lnga tshan gnyis ni rtsa ba'i dam tshig gi grogs
163a7(rnying rgyud): su dgos pas yan lag gi dam tshig ces bya ste/ de dag kyang nyams na 'bras bu myur du 'byung ba la gegs byed pas rab mtshams kyi 'obs ltar 'da' bar dka' ba'o// gsum pa mnyam pa'i dam tshig skyon yon dang bcas pa ni/ mnyam la sogs
163b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs bcad gcig ste/ chos thams cad bde na gsum ris med du mnyam pa la shes 'jug gi lam zab mos mnyam par sbyor ba yodan de las mi 'ang 'bras mnyam pa'i ngamachog ste/ de'i dang la gan sun 'bras bu mnyam rdzogs chen po ban tub zang byung/
163b2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i sa thob par 'gyur bas bsrung bar bya zhing / gal te de'i 'gal zla mnyam pa las 'das te tha da du rtogs na 'bras bu sangs rgyas thob pa ma yin no// bzhi pa mchog nyams pa'i skyon la gsum ste/ nyams pa dang 'grogs pa'i dang / rba ba nyams
163b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dang / yan lag nyams pa'i skyon no// dang po ni/ rtsa ba nyams pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ rtsa ba'i dam ga nyams pa'i bslab sdom 'tshal bdag dam tshig gso ba'i thabs la dus nye bar mi brtson pa rnams dang skad cig tsam yang mi 'grogs
163b4(rnying rgyud): shing yung tsam du'ang gtam smra bar ma byed cig/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyams pa dang 'grogs par gyur pa'i nyes pa brjod kyis mi lang ste zlas nyams zhes bya'o// de ltar yang kun 'dus las/ ji ltar 'o ma rul pa dag/ rdul pas 'o ma kun rul ltar/
163b5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor nyams gyur gcig gis ni// rnal 'byor can kun ma drangs byed// ces so// gnyis pa ni/ rtsa ba'i dam tshig sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams par gyur na chang pha bangs than pa 'byung ba lta bu tshe 'dir yang las gang bsgrub pa
163b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyang 'bras bu sbyin ci log par 'gyur ba sogs mi 'dod pa sna tshogs 'byung zhing / skye mar yang yid du mi 'ong ba sna tshogs pa'i 'bras spya rje myal ba sogs ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsnga' mi 'dod pazhin du khab len gyi lcags ltar dang dbang med
163b7(rnying rgyud): par 'du bar 'gyur ro// gsum pa ni/ yan lag sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ yan lag gi dmachog nyams par gyur na bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu dngos grub med cing phye ma rangan song gsum gyi gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ro// lnga pa dam tshig gi rang bzhin ni/ dam
164a1(rnying rgyud): chog rnams ni sogs te/ rtsa ba dang yan lag gi du mtshig rnams kyi rang bzhin ni srag phung thugs dbyer mi phyed pa rdo rje chen po'i rang bzhin te/ 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid chos kun gyi srog dang bslab pa thams
164a2(rnying rgyud): cang byedam pa yin no// drug pa dang tshig gi rnam grangs rgyas par bshad pa la gnyis te/ sum bcu drug tu dang / mtha' yas par myos pa'o// dang po ni/ sa ba'idamachog sa gis rdzogs bcad gcig ste/ 'di la phrachas pas/ bres pa yan lag las/
164a3(rnying rgyud): lnga bcu'i brgya dang drug tu dang // nyis brgya'i bsrung bya ma lus pa// bka' lung gnyis kyi rjes su bsnyeg/ ces pas rtsa ba'i dam tshig la brgya drug cu dang / yan lag gi dam tshig la nyis brgyar gye bas sum brgya drug cu ste/ de yang rdza ba'i dam tshig lnga po lA ni/
164a4(rnying rgyud): gcig ste re re la'ang thabs shes gnyis gnyis su phyebs bcu dang / yang rtsa ba lnga po re re la'ang bcu phragasasum ste sum cu rer phye bas tshig brgya lnga bcu ste/ de sngar gyi bcu dang sdom pas bcu drug cu'o// de yang phra rgyus las/ pawa'i nying la ga zhes pa'ang // dang po nyid nas
164a5(rnying rgyud): thabs spyod dang / shes rab nyid kyis nyis 'gyur yin// re re'ang bskyang bya sum cu ste// zhes so// yan lag gi dam tshig lnga tshan gnyis te bcu po re re la dbye tshul gti mug lta bu gcig la'ang nang tshan bcu phrag gnyis su ste nyi shu nyi shu dbye bas nyis brgya'o// de ltar rtsa ba
164a6(rnying rgyud): dang yan lag gi dam tshig sum bcu drug tu po so so'i don shes par 'dod na phra rgyas su blta bar bya'o// gnyis pa ni/ dam tshig 'di ni sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig 'di dag ni gzhan las khyad par du gyur pas rmad po che yin te/ des
164a7(rnying rgyud): don bya ba'i yul 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na sred pa gsum gyis bsdus pa'i 'gro ba ji snyed cig yod pa de rnams so so'i rnam par rtog pa 'dul ba'i gnyen por dam tshig gi rnam grangs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa de snyed cig spros nas don mdzad do// bdun pa ma nyams pa'i
164b1(rnying rgyud): yon tan bstan pa la drug las/ dang po 'bras bu thob cing tshad med pa'i yon tan ni/ gzhan yang sogs tshig bcad gcig ste/ mnyam pa'i dam tshig las gzhan yang rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig rnams bsrungs pa'i 'bras bu rgyal mchog rigs kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po
164b2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur te/ de'i ngo bo ji ltar zhe na/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad lhag ma ma lus pa rgyal ba'i sgra gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya'i ngo bor ldan gyis grub pas ched du bslab pa med par 'bras bu'i mchog dam pa kun bzang gi yon tan ma lus pa 'grub
164b3(rnying rgyud): cing / de la sogs pa'i yon tan bsam brjod las 'das pas na mtha' yas pa'i mchog go// gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi gtso bos bstod cing bkur ba ni/ rgyal ba'i sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ rgyal ba'i rigs mchog gsang sngags 'dzin cing dam tshig la
164b4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa de lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi gtso bo rnams dang / de'i 'khor ma mo dang mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ltar bkur gnas dam par mthong bar 'gyur ro// gsum pa 'phags pas byin gyis rlob pa ni/ dam pa sogs rkang pa
164b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis te/ dam pa mchog rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / dam pasar gnas kyi byang chub sems dpa' yis rim pa ji lta bar rang gi sras kyi thu bo dang / spyan du dgongs pas thugs rje'i byin gyis rlob pa myur ba nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// bzhi pa rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob
164b6(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ bde gshegs sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ dam tshig dang ldan pa de ni bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi spyod yul rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la rim par zhugs nas/ ltung gnas kyi 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad med pa spyod yul yongs dag kun tu bzang po'i
164b7(rnying rgyud): zhing khams chen por sbyor bar 'gyur ro// lnga pa 'og ma'i 'dul sdom rdzogs pa'i yon tan ni/ ji bzhin sogs rkang pa gsum ste/ gnas lugs ji bzhin pa'i chos nyid mngon du byed pa bla med kyi dam tshig dang / de'i nang du gdul bya rnams blo dang 'tshams
165a1(rnying rgyud): par 'dul ba'i thabs nyan rang byang sems gri yo ga sogs theg pa de snyed pa de dag gi sdom pa bas ma yas pa thams cad kyang 'dir yang ldan gyi tshul du 'dus shing / dgag bya ba lus pa rnam par dag pa dang // yon tan bams
165a2(rnying rgyud): ma btsal bar rang bzhin ldan gyis grub pa yin no// drag pa skams kyang bsang pa'i thubs yang pa'i yon tad / nyams na sogs nang pa gnyis te/ gal tegs sngags kyi dmachog nyams par gyur nanyan thos kyi pham pa 'jab bcas blang ba skar gas
165a3(rnying rgyud): rlung ba ma yin te/ slong ba'i thabs khyad par can gyi tshogs bsangs pas sbyar bzhin stor nung cing / dum tsug gi yan tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / de la sogs pa'i yon tan gapa' yas pa'i 'chog rdo rje'i drug pa 'di la menga' ba
165a4(rnying rgyud): no// gnyis pa yon ta na/ shes brjod pas sogs te/ de skad ces brjod pas dam chog ga dang ba ni pazhin gi sheg sa pa nyid yirnamasan/ de'i nga ba yin mas rgyas bde bzhi dgashegs pa'i da kyang 'ad 'ar mim po nagazhan zhes stos te/ de'i phre ba
165a5(rnying rgyud): bla rnams la blan med pa'i dmachog bstan nas 'dul bar gyur to// gsum pa mtshanan/ gsang ba'i sogs te/ rgan 'di la le' zheng gnyis yod pa las/ 'dis rtsa ba dang yan lag gi mchog gi rnam gzhag bstan pa'i le'u ste bsrungs pa'o//
165a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrig tha pa lags sa te/ 'o rgyas dang / gzhung dang / mtshan no// deng po'i/ den sa sogs te/ dra kyog pas pa des du mjog tan gyis phrin las phre bzhon pa'i phyir de ba 'i rtag shegs pa bcom ldan 'das dkris rgya po yo da ldan lus pazhi
165a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du spyan gyis grub pa las mi 'di' ba'i dmatshig de nyid chog pa zhis bskul pas mngon du snang bar byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zin las gro don byed du brjod pa 'di 'arjod do// gnyis gzung la gnyis te/ phrin la sa ngas dang /
165b1(rnying rgyud): tu// da pol / zlamanyim mas tu ston dasul rgya ba dang / ga su'i las dang / zlag rnags pa / dang / lang bzhi sa / m+b+ha mang btu pa dang gi sems pan to// dang pa la'ang las rna pa ba'i ng+yas da/
165b2(rnying rgyud): yar drag po'i phrin las la rma n+te/ ling+ga bca' ba/ dkyil 'khor bgyid pa/ bsrub bya'i las/ mchod sbyin bya ba yon tan dang bcas pa/ wu gra r+tha kyi za'i las yon tan dang bcas pa'o// dang po ni/ brlad ce la sogs dang pa gnyis te/ bskya ba bra'i badz+ra rtsi lnga
165b3(rnying rgyud): thag rdzas sam/ zas sh+ya/ nya sha/ b+ha ra ma/ spang rtsi/ til lnga dang / gzhan yang mi la rkang rjes kyis dang / mi ma yin pa la gnas rten gyis sogs la r+g+ha byas pa'i len mo mog yin gyi mtshan ma can dpral bar nas/ snying gar srog gang yin ming du bcas pa rnams rmi
165b4(rnying rgyud): shog la bris te gnas so sor gan pa'i/ yang na gro shog rang la leni bris pa'i skye bar glang gas/ 'doms su ge byar yang kyi hU~M bri/ mtha' ngas bskor zhing / sngang srings rnams rgyags te/ thod pa mtshan pan gyi nang du mug lho rngub tu bstan dus bcug pa
165b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi byung phyogs su 'thab khrung grags pa du gzhug par rgya no// gnyis dA naM/ e la tshogs mi dkyil 'khor mchog/ ces te/ sngags 'chang rnams drag po'i las dang mthun pa'i cha b+ha dang 'dug stangs kyis/ er sogs brjod pas kyi rgod kyi 'dzig rted du
165b6(rnying rgyud): gsabya ma lkog gin pa pa can pa ny-i nags 'bar ba'i dbus kyi lags na gyi sa nang bcud kyi sems can rnams cad thug 'thang 'bar ba'i skartags labanas brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor drag pa'i las la mchog tu shes pa badz+ra gas gso bya shing / thams
165b7(rnying rgyud): ma dog 'phreng dag lags pa'i gzugs ca du bzhengs par bsam par// gsum pa ni/ bkug nas sa gas nang pa gnyis te/ bcu'i sngags kyis las la gzung / bi gas sprul pa/ bslab byab bug nas gnyis med du bskos la/ lugasas ma ni

166b2(rnying rgyud): gi tha mar byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dbang sogs las lhag ma gzhan gsum s+thi des khog thub pa la// ung pam gyi sgos chos rnams bklad par bya ste/ de la lin bca' ba ni/ chu bdud rtsi wa'am zas wal/ bsgrub bya gang yin gyi yin mtshan ma ming du bcas pabya ste/
166b3(rnying rgyud): de'ang dbang la gang dbang du bya bar 'dod pa dang / rgyas pa la 'jig rtenan rdzo dang bsod nams rgyas pa sogs 'dod pa'i yon tan 'byung ba'i yid bzhin gyi gter du brtag pa dang / zhi ba la mtshungs pa gtu mnam la khrug pa'i ngo bar brtag ste/ de rnams las gang yin gyi 'brub
166b4(rnying rgyud): khung du bcug nas/ dbang la dkyil 'khor gyi nub/ rgyas pa la lo/ zhi bar shar du bzhag go// de nas dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni/ dbang la waM gi rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor dmar po blag ma/ rgyas pa la ma yi rnam pa'i gru bzhi ser po// zhi ba la ya yi rnam pa'i zlum po dkar po
166b5(rnying rgyud): ste/ thams cad kyang yangs shing me 'od 'phro ba can gyi nang du thag 'thung 'bar ba'i lha tshogs lnga bcurtsa brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor las gang la shis pa'i mchog dbang la pad+ma he ru ka/ rgyas par tra he ru ka/ zhi bar bud+ha he rba kas gtso byas pa/ gtso 'khor thams cad kyang las
166b6(rnying rgyud): dang bathun pa'i kha dog can du bskyed do// de nas bsgrub pa'i las te/ sngar bzhin bsgrub bya dgug bstis lci bar byas te/ dbang la zangasas ma sheng dmang po las dpal thag ma nan do chags pa skye badzag la yar bskyed pa'i phung bu la dbang po lnga dang / rgyas par 'aper
166b7(rnying rgyud): ram zhing ser po las dpal gru bzhi par byas par rgyal dga' 'gro ster tre he ru gar ba byed pa'i phur bu bzhi yan 'ag bzhi dang / zhi bar dngul lam shing dkar po las dpal zlum por byas pa lhan no gsal ba ste bud+ha sI la yang bskyed pa'i phur bu drug gis yan lag ldang
167a1(rnying rgyud): spyang la gdab pa du ste/ bams cad ga sgyu ma nga na gyis brlabs te/ lung skal dang / swA gas las pa sham brtan mas gdang rbang/ grwa mkhyen pas gzungasaH/ yang ga ga dag
167a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs dang 'bar ba lhan ni sogs las dang mthun pa'i lha la stob pa bya/ cha gcig lam gang yin gyi bsreg rdzas la bsre/ cha gcig la zo gdan bya'o// de nas mchod sbyin bya ba yon tan dang bcas pa ni/ las so mo'i me lha'i lto bar 'das pa'i lha'i dkyil
167a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba skyed de/ de'ang dbang la sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba gzi brjid che zhing su lhun po chen po lta bu pa darigs gtso bor byas pa la stobs kyi sems chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin byas pas/ gsung rdo rje pad+ma gar dbang yang dbang du 'gyur na gzhan lta ci ltos pa dang / rgyas
167a4(rnying rgyud): par rin chen rigs gtso bor zas pa'i lha tshogs 'od 'bar bskul pa'i 'du gro can gzi brjid chen po la stongs kyi sems dga' zhing sngo pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin byas pas tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba logs yon tan tshad med nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa thob pa dang /
167a5(rnying rgyud): bar bud+d+ha sa gtso byas pa'i lha tshogs dngas shing gsal ba'i gzi brjid mchog tu 'bar ming 'od zer 'tsher pa la stongs kyi semasa'i zhing dang ba'i yid kyis mdzod snying byas na ma rungs pag tum chen rngam pa'ang gi pa'i sems su lhan ner 'gyur ba'o// de nas lug chud yon
167a6(rnying rgyud): bcas pa ni/ sngar bzhin waM b+ha sogs kyis yi ge gsum gyi rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor me 'bar ba'i nang du las dang mthun pa'i khrag 'bud 'bar ba chags kyi cil 'khor bskyed la/ leng ro spangs pa'i mthar mched rnams lag g.yas steng du byas nas bsngol ba'i
167a7(rnying rgyud): dbang la min lag/ rgyas par grang mo// zhi bar mdzub ma phre nga spel zhing bsdams nas thong las l+r-ings dang mthan pa bca pa// 'dod chags de rje sogs lams ma'i thog dngas su lags kyis bsral //
167b1(rnying rgyud): chags dpag mad sgrus pas las gang yan 'grub par bsams nas/ las sas sa tha sngags bad byug ga zhugasu bzlog la/ yang da dbang la ngadagos la'o// byas par yang dang / go bar la mtsha la rnamasas pas mdun bye dra ba dzus
167b2(rnying rgyud): par mtshanan// de dag gi yon tan kyang / dbang gis 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ba lji no smras te/ phyag na rdo rje dang ring gi phyi bzhin du 'brang ba sogs yid la ci 'dod pa de bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyas par gzi brjed 'bar ba'i rnam 'ophrul chen po rags
167b3(rnying rgyud): khro bo spo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yon tan tshe dang bsod nams sogs 'dod dgra 'byung ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bus nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang bar 'gyur ba dang / skyibs pha rol ma rungs pa'i sems me ltar 'bar ba'ang ldan ner zhi ba'i byin rlaban gyis khyab pas
167b4(rnying rgyud): thig pa dang gdug semapa thams cad drung zad kyang yid la med klu bas g.yo ba med par byed par// gnyis pa lhag sa'i las la gnyis te/ mdo dang / rgyas pa'o/ dang poni/ sbas dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ de ltar las bzhi gang yang drang ba zlas pa'i/
167b5(rnying rgyud): rjes la/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gas la gang ba/ lcug ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed/ mgron pakrag la/ lhag ga tor rnams la zlas than nas gtor mar bsuM shings sor mchod da/ dpal chen po'idakyil 'kho wa~M d+hA na du gnas pa smras te lhan dpa'i drung ma dang /
167b6(rnying rgyud): skye langa' ma dang / g.yog phrad pas bran mo tshogs te/ dbang b+hagA ma ti shuH brgyad po lag ma'i mtshad sbyin 'dod pa'i mgron yin pas/ chog bzhin du sbyin te thal ma bdan bu'i sar bstsal zhing / sngon dpal rgyan po'i sman snga rang rang gis khas byungs pa'i ngas
167b7(rnying rgyud): tshig rnams rab tu bsgrags nas 'dren las bzhi gang dang gang 'dod pa'i las de dang dbyed par bka' bsgo par bya'o// gnyis pa la gsam ta/ dam pa sreg cing las la bsrub ba/ las dem bsgrubs pa'i skyon/ las bsgrubs pa gron tanan// dang na
168a1(rnying rgyud): sngon cha sogs rkang pa dgra ste/ sngon du drang dul ba'i tshong pal chen po he rba ka gdul bya dang mthun par shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can du bzhungs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dregs pa can ma lus pa rnams 'dul bar
168a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'i dbang phyug dang byin rlabs khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir mang po che mnga' bas lha chen po la sogs pa thams cad dbang du bsdus nas/ de dag gi 'khor na gnas pa'i ma mo rnams longs spyod pa'i phyir dbang phyug dang sras su dbang bsrung bar byas te/ zhi rgyas dbang
168a3(rnying rgyud): drag so so'i las rnams skal pa bzhin bskos pa de nyid sngon ji ltar dam bcas shing khas blangs pa rnams skad cig kyang ma rdzogs par myur ba nyid du las kyi 'bras bu mngon par phyung bar mdzod cig pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ dam bcas sogs rkang pa bcu gcig ste/ rang
168a4(rnying rgyud): gi dam bcas pa bzhin du las ma byas na sngon ji ltar rang gis dam bcas shing man 'phor ba'i sdom bcas kyi mtshams de las 'da'i bar 'gyur la/ gal te dam tshig de las 'das par gyur na ni khyed cag rnams kyi mgo lus dang snying yang tshal la bdun du yak+Sha khro
168a5(rnying rgyud): pos dum bur gtub par 'gyur ro// de bas na de 'dra'i nyen la ma kha do bar rnal 'byor sngags 'chang bdag gis las ji ltar btsal ba bzhin du sgrub par byos shig/ gal te las de mngon du ma byas na rang rang gis man 'phor zhing khas blangs pa'i dmod pa bzhin du la
168a6(rnying rgyud): myags 'tshig nas mthur du bltas te rdo rje'i dmyal ba de 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gsum pa ni/ rnal 'byor sogs rkang pa lnga ste/ de bas na rnal 'byor pa dam la gnas par gyur pa'i las gang dang gang 'dod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rnal 'byor
168a7(rnying rgyud): pa de'i 'khor rnams kyang rang gi brag cig pu la mas rungs pa bzhin du myongs shig dang / de'i mthum khyed cag pra min ma rnams kyang dngos grub rnam pa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur ba de'i phyir/ rnal 'gyor pas ji ltar bcol ba'i las rnams mngon sum du
168b1(rnying rgyud): ba byes shig cas bka' bzla// gsum ba zag tshig ga yon nal gtsesaH/ spying bstan pa dang / mas rab shang pa'o// dang ban/ wa gas rags// zhwaT 'dasal ga pang dang gas ga/ ba pa'i'adus yang ban las ba bzlabs can /
168b2(rnying rgyud): bon thagAr gla tshig 'di yin te/ smyom dang rdzas sogs kyi lda na sa las bzhi'i phrin las gang dang ga bkyis kyang rung ste/ las zin rjeg 'dis mtha' ba sdus na las byas pa gsor mi bar 'gyur ba yin no// 'dir 'gos 'gyur du/ zhes pa khra bo'i grub
168b3(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi// las rnams kun la brjod par bya// nges par gtso bo 'di yin te// rnam pa gzhan du gdul dkar 'gyur// zhes 'byung ngo // gnyis pa la drug ste khrag 'byung yab yum gyis las bzhi ka 'grub pa/ phyogs kyi khro mos dbang hAs/ mtshams kyi
168b4(rnying rgyud): khro mos zhi zag/ phyogs kyi phra men mas drag po// mtshams kyi phra mernams kyang drag pa/ dbang phyug mas pho nya dang mngag gzhug gi las thams cad 'grub pa'o// dang pon/ khrag 'thung sogs tshogs bcad gcig ste/ khrag 'jung chen po badz+ra he dug la sogs pa
168b5(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga'i he ru ka yab yum gyi rkang pa'i gro lag pa'i gar zhal mi glu tshig ging ro chen pos ni/ wi rgyas sogs las thams cad dang mchog thun gyi dngos grub thams cad ci dang ci thob par 'dod pa ltar las thams cad dang dngos srab thams cad 'grub par byed pa yin no//
168b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa ni/ mdod ldan sogs tshogs bcud gcig ste/ gau rI sgra las mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'i khongs nas/ tsau rI ma/ pra mo he/ be tA paM rnams kyi tho ga dak+Sha tshig chen mos ni 'gro ba dbang du 'du bar 'dod na dbang du 'dra bar byed cing / rje dang bsod nams
168b7(rnying rgyud): sogs 'phel zhing rgyas par 'dod na 'phel zhing rgyas par byed do// gsum pa ni/ spos mo sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ puSh+pa sI'i sgra las srog mo chen mo la sogs pa'i khongs nas/ g+has+sa rI/ swaM shan+ti/ tsaN+Da lI/ rnams kyi thog gla tshig chen mos
169a1(rnying rgyud): ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams lhan ner zhi bar 'dod na zhi zhing ldan na byed la/ drag pas dran pa nyams te sems rmugs shing mi gsal bar 'dod na rmugs par byed do// bzhi pa ni/ seng gdong sogs tshogs bcu dgacig ste/ seng gdong zan mo la sogs
169a2(rnying rgyud): pa mchi ba can bzhi'i bro gar gla tshig chen mos ni gdug pa can thams cad kun gyi srog lus la za bar byed cing / rdul phran gyi cha tsam yang med par ba rlag par byed do// lnga pa ni/ bzhad gdong sogs tshigs bcang gcig ste/ gr-i ta'i sgra las bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa
169a3(rnying rgyud): gzhog pa can pa zhing ga rdzag nams 'i ga ga na thams mnal ma byas pa ma nga ba dang / las rtse pas bzung par byed cing / bdag 'dul pa dang dranas chags pa ma pa rab tu 'ams par byung nga// 'i 'a zhes pa na dpar/ ra
169a4(rnying rgyud): 'gugs pa'i don te dbang gi las su 'gyur ram snyam mo// drug pa ne/ smras dang sogs tshigs bcad gcig ste/ sras dang byi mo bran ma ste dbang phyug ma'i tshogs kyi blo gang gru tshig chen pos ni dgral rbad cing mngag/ gzhug gi las lag ta Tha bya ba ste/ 'gal byed thams
169a5(rnying rgyud): chad brtag par byed pa dang / mthun pa'i phyogs rnams bsgrub pa pho nya'i las thams cad byed pa yin no// bzhi pa las bzhi'i gnas gzungs thun mong du bstan pa ni/ lon pa sogs rkang pa gnyis te/ sheng ldan pa can ni zhi ba'i gnas dang / lcag phran gyi tshal nims pa'i
169a6(rnying rgyud): pa/ sdod gcig ni dbang gi dang / mos reg ste nags tshal 'tshig pa'i gnas su drag po'i las shes pa'o// las so so'i gzungs ma yang / zhi ba'i gzungs ma shing ljon pa dang chos mtshungs pa ni dung can ma'i rigs dkar mo bzhin lus mdzes pa la sogs pa'o//
169a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa'i gzungs ma ni lhag phran gyi tshal lta bu skyeb na glar can gyi rigs sha rgyas shing phun bla mang ba'o// dbang gi gzungs ma dang sdang po gcig pa dang chos mthun pa ni pad+ma can gyi rigs bzhin lus mongs shing ldan d+ha dang bu rtsa med pa'o// drag po'i gzungs mkhyen ting mas
169b1(rnying rgyud): rig pa sa bunar ma can po rigs mdag nag cing dag ga tum pa la sogs pa'o// wa badran stongs kyi sems bstan pa no/ dang bas sogs dang ba gnyis te/ de la don gyi sems ni/ lhag pa paden pa dbyer med ciganas lpags rtogs shing / tshad med pa bzhin/
169b2(rnying rgyud): sbrulas thung ba byung chubs sems dang ldan pa n+de las bzhig la khya byed du dgas pa nu'i sems zhes bya ste/ g+ha~Mn pa sreg ba lapa/ rang rig sungs rgyas kun gyidas// thams cad dang dbang ltung ba dag phyir// sgrub pa'i gtso bar 'di gsangs // zhes
169b3(rnying rgyud): so// stongs kyi sems ni/ mthun po'i thogs byed pas rkyen gyi sems zhes bya ste/ las so so kun nas slong ba'i bsam pa'o// de'ang zhib la zhi zhing dang bas/ rgyas pa la dga' zhing spobs/ dbang la chags shing zhen pas dang / drag po la
169b4(rnying rgyud): sdang khros pa'i sems dang ldan pas kA li thabs te/ 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i thabs mkhas sde ma dang rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// gnyis pa yon tan ni/ zhes brjod pas sogs te/ de skad ces brjod pas gdul bya rang bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs
169b5(rnying rgyud): pa nyid de sems can rnams la/ 'dul byed rtogs pa mngon du gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'dzin las rnam pazhis rgyung dag par spyod pas 'dul bar gyur to// gsum pa mtshan ni/ gsang ba'i sogs te/ chud 'di la le'u nyer gnyis yodapa
169b6(rnying rgyud): las/ 'dis ye nas ldan gyis grub pa'i phrin las bzhi mngon du snang bar byed pas sbyin gyis brlab pa zhes zla ba'i les n+d+hek+ti sa pa'o// / le'uny+tsa nA gcig pa la gsum ste/ lo n+yas dang / gzhung dang / mtshan no// dang po ni/ de nas sogs te/
169b7(rnying rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bstan pa de nas rang snang gi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khrag 'thung nga brgyad 'dus pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor kyis zhal shin tu rngam pa'i mdangs kyis rang snang gi 'khor lor dgyes pa'i glu drug po 'di blangs so//
170a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa rjo du/ sa na na rgyu na tun tu ga du/
170a2(rnying rgyud): rnams ri 'ang sgra wa ye shes par mngon pa'o// de la dpal chen po'i sgra ni/ dregs pa can rnams 'dul pas gtum po chen po ste/ dus kyi mtha' bskal pa 'jig pa'i me tshon ltar babar pa'i sgra las ye shes kyi 'od zer nyi ma tha mdzes gcig la sha

170a7(rnying rgyud): shes rab kyis gdul bya'i mun pa sel bar mdzad pas 'od po che ste/ brags ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyis shes bya'i yul kun dus gcig tu rang gsal ma'agags par mkhyen cing / 'bar ba'i ye shes des gdul bya'i zhog tog kun tu 'joms par
170b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa/ de yang ye shes lnga da ji ltar snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes sogs sna chags pa'i ye shes rnam pa tha dad du gsal ba kun kyang rang byung gi ye shes thig le chen po gcig ging por dbyer med pa'o// bzha pa yon tan la bstod pa ni/ khro bo'i rgyal po sogs
170b2(rnying rgyud): te/ gdug pa can 'dul ba khro ba'i mdzad pas gdul bya la dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po ste/ yon tan 'byung ba'i sprin chen po las 'gros pa'i 'jal byed khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi thugs rje'i chang chen po 'bebs pas gang lagang 'dul gyi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor zad pa
170b3(rnying rgyud): med pa dgos 'dod yid bzhin du 'byung ba rin po che'i gter dang 'dra bas don mdzad pa sna tshogs su snang ba phyag rgya chen po'i sur khros pa thams cad kyang ye shes chen po'i khro bor ro gcig pa'i thig le chen por gnas pa'o// lnga pa phrin las la bstod pa ni/ bdud kun
170b4(rnying rgyud): sogs te/ bdud bzhi po kun gyi rang bzhin ma spangs par dbang du byed pa ni bdag nyid chen po dpal he ru ka'o// de'ang bdud bzhi'i dpung mthar byed kyi bdud de sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams 'joms par mdzad cing / bdud dang gshin rje
170b5(rnying rgyud): sogs 'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams kyang bsdigs shing 'jigs par byed pas 'jigs byed chen po che btsan 'gran zla dang bral ba'i khrag 'thung gi tshogs thams cad kyang ngo bo chos sku spros bral thig le chen por ro gcig pa'o// gnyis pa rten brten pa spyir bstod pa ni//
170b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje brag chen sogs te/ khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad kyi spu ni rdo rje'i brag chen po ltar s+ye shi dang 'pho 'gyur med pas sra po ste che ba'i yon tan kun gyi rten du gyur pa'o// gsung dang yon tan ni rdo rje'i chu bo ltabu ste gdul bya'i tshogs ma lus bsnyad pa

173b2(rnying rgyud): chen zla pa'i thugs mtshor 'khril ba las// nga dab rtson rnga yabartse mos bcud du blangs/ 2/ shin du rjed dka' gsang chen rdo rdo'i chag/ dbye bar dka' mong dang dang rjes mthun par// nam par phyi 'di dpal ldanagasang ba'i bdag/ dgongs pa mangs byed legs
173b3(rnying rgyud): bshad rgyan du rnam/ 7/ sbrang bu'i bgrod pas nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol ltar// gsang chen zab mo byis blo'i spyod yul min// de phyir thun thos 'dir nongs gyur pa'i tshogs// 'phags dang dam pa rnams kyis bzod par mdzod// skye bo pal cher grag
173b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rjes 'gro bas// 'phags dang mkhas gzhung rnams kyang phyogs gcig tu// len pa min na bdag gzhung ldatsa spos// de phyir gzhan don 'gyur snyam spob med/ 5/ 'on kyang dam pa'i gsung gis bskul ba dang // rang gi blo la'ang goms pa skye ba'i slad//
173b5(rnying rgyud): rmongs gur kyang b+h+ra ma'i man dag la// brten nas rnam par bshad la skyon yod min/ 'di las rnam kar dge ba gang thog pa// de yis mkha' mnyam lus can thams cad can// rma dbyung la mgyis dri ma yongs sbyangs te// rang byung ye shes mngon du rtogs par
173b6(rnying rgyud): shog/ 9/ phyogs lhung sgo spur bral ba'i blo gros mkhar// rnam par song ba'i legs bshad 'od brgyal// shar ba yis ni mi shes rmongs pa'i sun// mthar byed bkra shis snang ba 'bar gyur cig/ dpal gsang ba'i snying po'i rgyud kyi 'grel ba grol lam gtso bor
173b7(rnying rgyud): ston pa gsang bdag dgongs rgyan zhes bya ba 'di ni dpal gdong chu bya'i lo le'u gsum pa yan chad tsam grub pa las/ de man chad le lo'i dbang gis lus pa phyis rje bla ma dam pa'i sras kyi thu bo thugs rje dang mkhyen rab rmad du byung ba zhabs dung rin po che phra mched kyis gzig pa'i slad dang

180a5(rnying rgyud): rnams mye kyis pa rnam grangs so/ pa nI/ thege pa'i dum bste/ de la theg pa'i gyudon dang / / dang pon/ smon ni me thalas nyig du ni/ de bzod cu'i dul ti kyi d+hi lapa dang / khyer gyur ba nyid kyi phyi na
180a6(rnying rgyud): tAl sogs pa'i bzhon pa la 'jug pa/ 'dir de dang 'dra ba'i sgo nas dge bcu'i las lam sogs pa 'ang 'jug ste/ lamagong nas gor du bzod par byed pa gyur ro/ de'ang smad pa la sa/ rdeg pa 'don mkha' 'dra ga zhal med khar chen te/ 9
180a7(rnying rgyud): myongang ba mngon par 'job byed theg pa'i mchog/ rig zhin nas sems can thangs cad byung ngan 'dul// / gnyis pal/ gleng dbyeb dang / kye drag tung byab// nga man/ theg pa'i rnam mang
180b1(rnying rgyud): gcig tu 'chad pa med de/ 'gro ba nyon mongs pa'i gtan par sangs rgyas kyi thugs rjes gang la gang 'dul du bstan pa 'gyur/ da kar yang lang gshegs las/ sems can rnams na yongs drang phyir// zag pa mtha' dgangs bshad/
180b2(rnying rgyud): 'di zhes dmigs su yod ma yin// zhes so// de yang re zhig bstan 'bras bu la dgongs te theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa ni/ dam chos pa dang kar las// theg pa gcig gi theg pa gsum du med// de dag drang ba'i thabs su bstan pa yin// zhes
180b3(rnying rgyud): dang / spyi mdo las/ gsang nyid snying por nges pa ni// theg pa'i sgo yang gcig las med// ces so// yang rgyu 'bras kyi theg par mos pa'i gdul ba la dgongs nas gnyis su gsungs te/ kun byed las/ theg pa rnam pa gnyis yin
180b4(rnying rgyud): te// mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa dang // 'bras bu rdo rje theg pa'o// zhes dang / mdo sde gdams ngag 'bogs pa'i rgyal po las/ rgyal mos pa rgyu chos kyi// 'khor lo rab tu bskor byas nas// rdo rje theg pa'i nye la ma zhig/ ma 'odra dus na 'byung
180b5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes s+ho// yang / dman pa dang rgya chen po la mos pa'i gdul bya la dgongs nas kyang gnyis su gsungs te/ ye sngon las/ tshe chung rim pa'i zla yod phyir// theg pa'i grangs kyang de bzhin te// bsun gyi chung rnam gnyis so// zhes so// yang/
180b6(rnying rgyud): rgya dang sngags phyi nang gis gsum du'ang bshad de/ skye mdo las/ lang ka'i bdag po gzhan yang gang // don dmanges pa'i theg pa ni// gsum du nges par bstan pa ste// kun 'byung 'dren dang dka' thub rig/ dbang bsgyur thabs kyi zag pa'o//
180b7(rnying rgyud): zhes so// yang / mtshan nyid kyi theg pa gsum 'bras bu dang bzhir yang bshad de/ 'jam dpal spyarba las/ theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// zhes dang / bam brgyad las/ theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du gsungs// gas
181a1(rnying rgyud): 'bya/
181a2(rnying rgyud): na sa na
181a3(rnying rgyud): gas du
181a4(rnying rgyud): sa
181a5(rnying rgyud): mas su sa su
181b1(rnying rgyud): khyed ral gri'i gon/ thun stor// lga rdi gla na srul nag gi stong thun sbyor// rna je mda' tig dug sdong gi stong thun sbyor ba las/ rje sgo phrag pa phyi ma ltar bzhed de/ de yang spyi mdo las// ldum rar dug gi sdong skyes pa// dug shing yin par shes pa
181b2(rnying rgyud): zag/ rtsad nas bcad de dbyung bar bya// ce phyir l+h+wam zas de dag la// dug 'phel rgyas nas 'chi phyir ro// zhes pas/ dper na rgyal po'i bza' shing gi ra bar dug gi sdong po skyes pa la/ 'bangs blun po kha cig/ dug shing gi ro mngar tshor te/
181b3(rnying rgyud): ga gipa 'i lda na gyis na shA ga pa na na pa / da dzin gas pas dgi ga sa lan na nga sa pa nam dzu sa ma / ya ma /
181b4(rnying rgyud): de bas mnyam nyid ma rtogs par// drug lnga 'jol spyod rgyud lngar 'khor// zhes so// 'bangs de rnams kyi nang nas kha cig gis/ dug shing dang bza' shing gi kho nyan shes nas bza' shing la spyod na'ang / du gsheng gi khrod nas 'phags par ma nus pa
181b5(rnying rgyud): ltar/ dkar po'i las sad pa kha cig/ dge sdig gi las kyis mtho ris dang ngan 'gror skye ba'i las 'bras la yid ches pas mi dge bcu spong zhing dge bcu la spyod kyang 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ma nus pa ni lha mi'i theg pa ste/ las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba
181b6(rnying rgyud): dang / zhes gsungs pa'i phyir yang / 'bangs kha cig na re/ dug sdong 'di rtsa ba nas bton te thag ring por bskyal ba drag zer lo// dpe de bzhin du nyan thos pas gang zag gi bdag med rtogs pas 'khor ba las nges par byung yang / chos kyi bdag gzung
181b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin phra ba don dam du 'dod pas nyon mongs pa spong ba'i thabs bsnyen pa ste/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i/ zhes so// yang / 'bangs kha cig/ dug sdong 'di rtsa ba nas 'don pa'i dka' tshogs me dgos kyi/ sdong po bcad nas bstsal lo/ rtsab la khro chu thugs
182a1(rnying rgyud): pas slar sde bar mi 'gyur ba ro// de bzhin du rang rgyal 'dzin dgasad cig la don dam du ba lkuzhing 'khor 'das rten bral gyu zas pa 'dzin pas sogs byung yangs nas grags sngag gas 'bras pa drags pas stod
182a2(rnying rgyud): mongs pa 'geg pa'i thabs la brten pa ste/ gyi nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ zhes so// de ltar lha ma nyan par gsum ni/ don dam dang kun rdzob gnyis ka rdzas yod du bltas te blang dor byed pas spong ba'i lam du gcig pa'o// yang / 'bangs
182a3(rnying rgyud): de rnams kyi nang nas sman pa zhig na re/ dug shing rtsa ba nas 'don pa dang sdong po gcod pa gnyis ka blun pa ste/ 'di ni spyan mar gyi rgyur rnyed dka' ba zhig go zer nas/ dug shing la sman sbyor bus pas nad sel zhing ro ci'i mchog tu gyur pa zhig byung skar/
182a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin du bdag med gnyis rtags pa dang ci rigs par ldan zhing bden gnyis la bzang ngan blang dor du byer pa ste/ de'ang nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur shes kyang / thabs kyis ma zin na gnod pa'i bub byed la// zin na phan pa'i bya ba yang byed pas//
182a5(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob rdzas yod du bltas te nyon mongs pa dang rnam rtog chos nyid du sbyong ba'i thabs la 'bad par byed pa ni bya'i sems kyi theg pa'o// de dang / 'dzin pa 'khrul pa las 'dogs pa dang / zhes so// yang 'bangs de rnams kyi nang nas sngags pa zhig na re//
182a6(rnying rgyud): dug shing 'dul ba la sman gyis 'dul spong 'di tsam byed ci zhig dgos/ 'di bzhin byed pa yin mod zer nas sngags btab pa tsam gyis slar gyi spyan mar las kyang mchog tu gyur pa zhig byung la/ dpe de bzhin du kri yog sde gsum gyis bden gnyis rdzas
182a7(rnying rgyud): yod du mi 'dod kyang / nyon mongs pa rnams rang gi sems nyid du snang ba'i phyir kun rdzob tu btags pa'i yod pa mi 'gog pas/ sngags rgya ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs kyis nyon mongs pa dang rnam rtog lha dang ye shes su sgyur par byed do// las dang las kyi 'bras
182b1(rnying rgyud): tham migs/ zham sa// yang / na bu zhig byung nas drug ga ga byung ba mthong bas/ ches dga' ste sgros mang du bus pas lung co rgyas shing su skrag ma dngas dang ldan pa thar la/ dbade ba'i nadum dang a nA theg gnyis kyis/ rdzas nanas/
182b2(rnying rgyud): cad dang rig pa'i bdag nyid yin pas nyon mongs pa lnga nyid ye shes lngar shes pa'i phyir/ kun rdzob tu btags pa'i yod par 'dzin pa cher zad de/ bden gnyis kyi lta bar 'dzin pa'ang shas cher phral nas/ dbyer med pa'i bsam pa 'brang du thob pas ji ltar sprad
182b3(rnying rgyud): kyang mi gos pa'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa dbang du byed pa'i thabs te/ gos par mi 'gyur/ zhes so// da lta dadug sdod kyis tsam nyid nas/ smras pa dang / bcad pa dang / spyan gyis spangs pa dang / sngags kyis bsgyur ba dang / rma byas zos
182b4(rnying rgyud): sa gas gang sa 'ang sa shAng dang dga' mi dag tshig pa med/ dgas smras kyang dge ga sub dang / zang du med pabarnyanadu/ a d+hi rang lpags kyi zag pas/ chos kyi dbyings dang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dang byu g-i sogs nga ga sa/
182b5(rnying rgyud): sbyang bsgyur ba dang dbang du byung pa rnams kyang dngos por zhen pa'i lta ba las byung bar rtogs nas/ sgyu ma la rtsol ba da lta bu'i gnas med par yang rtogs te/ gang yang mi 'gog la/ gang du'ang mi rtsol bas sang gnyen gyi tha snyad las grol ba'o// de'ang /
182b6(rnying rgyud): gos su med par ston pa'i mthar thug go// zhes so// tshul 'di la sgyu ma g+ha bu'i blo tshad du phyin pa zhes bya ste/ snang ba'i mtshan nyid med par rig pa'i phyir/ bden gnyis kyi 'dzin pa phra mo dang yang bral bas lha ba thams cad dang bral te/ de la tha skad du mnyam pa'i
182b7(rnying rgyud): lngaba'am dbyer med spyod yul dang bral ba zhes gdags so// gnyis pa ni/ 'dir theg pa lngar gsungs pa 'ang / bsnyun gnyis su 'dus te/ rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud rig pa rang shar las// kye togasang ba'i rdo rje 'dzin// nga yi theg pa bsam yas
183a1(rnying rgyud): ga ga sa sa// / sa // 'dag na
183a2(rnying rgyud): napa 'o// zhes dang / byan pa las/ 'ji gden 'angs du ga snya pal// sa ca 'ang mangs thapa rnas sa' ba'i gan pas 'das pa sa pag/ dan na/ sa ma nga/
