183b1(rnying rgyud): bde 'dus kyi lung snga ma'i 'phros las/ ma sa'i 'don pa yi// 'dug sgo smrab tshul khrims dang // sgom pa ldan las 'bras bu rnams// rim pa bzhin du shes byas// zhes gsungs te 'og ma rnams la'ang shes par bya'o// zhes ma/ dang po 'jug rno na/
183b2(rnying rgyud): ngan sor gsum sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin can du mthong nas/ der kye ba'i rgyu mi dge ba'i las spong ba'i sgo nas 'jug ste/ he ru ka gal po las// lha mi'i theg pas mi dge sdang // zhes so// de la mi dge bcu ni/ lus kyi las srog gcod/ mabyin phan/ 'dod
183b3(rnying rgyud): log gsum/ ngag gi rdzun/ phra ma ngag 'khyal/ tshig cu pa bzhi/ yid kyi brnab sems/ gnod sems/ log lta gsum ste bcu'o// gnyis pa ni/ yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten pha rol dang // las chu 'bras la yid ches
183b4(rnying rgyud): pa ste// ched du brjod pa'i tshoms las// 'jig rten pa yi yang dag lta// chen po gang la yod gyur pa// de ni tshe rabs stong du yang // ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// zhes so// de las ldog ste log par bltabs srog gcod spangs
183b5(rnying rgyud): pa sogs dge ba'i las gzhan la spyad kyang 'bras bu sdug bsngal du smin par 'gyur te/ bshes spring las/ gang zag log par bltabs leg smad kyang // thams cad rnam par sman pa mi bzang ldan// zhes gsung ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i lta bas zin
183b6(rnying rgyud): pa ga la che'o// gsum pa ni/ mi dge bcu spong ba'i rtsol khrims las gzhan med no// de ltar na/ snga ma las/ gso sbyong 'dod spyod lha lus yid 'ong ba// skyes pa bud med dag la stsol bar bgyi// zhes lha'i go 'phang 'grod par byed pa la yang
183b7(rnying rgyud): dag par blangs pa las byung ba'i tshul khrims dgos par ma bshad dam zhe na/ bshad mod kyi/ 'on kyang de ni khyad par can gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs kyi/ tsam po la ni dgos par ma nges te/ yang dag pa'i lta bas zin pa'i dge bcu'i las lam 'khor
184a1(rnying rgyud): bcas kyis 'grub par bzhed pa'i phyir/ bzhi pa ni/ rang gi 'bras bu 'byin nus kyi bar du goms par byed pa'o// lnga pa ni/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i dge bcu'i las lam 'khor bcas la spyod pa ste/ de ni mi dge bcu spangs
184a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i cha nas btags so// gzhan yar lus kyi las phyag sogs dang / ngag gi bstod pa sogs dang / yid kyis gzhan la phan 'dod kyi sems dge ba la sogs pa'o// 'o na/ he ru ka gal por/ lha mi'i theg pa'i skabs su yi ge 'dri mchod sogs chos sgo
184a3(rnying rgyud): bcu la spyod dgos par gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na/ 'dir yang sngar ltar khyad par can dang tsam po'i khyad do/ drug pa ni dge ba'i las stobs che chung gis/ gling bzhi'i mi dang / 'dod lha rigs drug ste 'dod khams kyi mtho ris gnas bcur skye ba'o// de ltar yang /
184a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa las/ dge bcu spyod cing mi dge slong byed pa// 'dod khams lha dang mi du skye ba'i rgyu// zhes dang / mam di ma las/ dge bcu dag lo gtsong len cing // dge dang mi dge mi mnyam pas// lha dang mi yi skye gnas te// mnyam nyid ma rtogs
184a5(rnying rgyud): 'dod khams 'khor// zhes so// de'ang 'di'i 'dod pa'i bde ba mthar thug pa mi'i 'khor los gyur rgyal dang lha'i gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdag po'i bang du bzod pa'i phyir/ yang gshegs su bgrod bya'i gtso bo'i sgras sngos te/ lha'i theg pa zhes gsungs
184a6(rnying rgyud): so// theg pa 'di ni/ lam rim las// gzhi yi theg pa'i dang por gzhog/ ces pa ltar theg pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa 'am sngon du 'gro ba'ang yin te/ gang yang dag pa'i/ lta bas ma zin pa dang dngos gzhi dge bcu'i las lam la mi spyod pa'i theg pa ni
184a7(rnying rgyud): gang na'ang med pa'i phyir/ dgyes rdor las kyang / dge bcu las brtsam nas ni// de yi chos ni rab tu dbye// zhes gsungs pa yin no// yang lang gshegs las/ tshangs pa'i theg pa/ zhes gsung ba'i tshangs pa ni/ tshangs ris la sogs pa
184b1(rnying rgyud): gsum khon ma yin gyi/ brakwa'i sgra las tshangs pa dang / gzung ba dang / dag pa la 'dug pas/ 'dod pa'i nyon mongs pas gtsang ba 'am dag cing tshangs pas na/ sgra yangs pa'i dbang du byas na/ khams gong pa'i rgyu gzugs khams gnas 'o pa
184b2(rnying rgyud): bdun dang / gzugs med khams sa'i gnas bzhi sde nyi shu rtsa gcig po thams cad la tshangs pa'i sgras brjod cing / der bgrod pa'i lam 'khor bcas la tshangs pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o// de'ang zhi gnas dang / rang rang gis 'og ma la rags pa rang lta zhing /
184b3(rnying rgyud): sa da par bta pa'i thugs thod parloms pa bas kyis/ sa 'og ma nan mangs pa sbyangs pa zhigagong ma bye bar gsungs pas/ rang du gis 'ogam la chagasu pa bral byed kyilam bsnam gtan bzhi gzugs med pa'i nig 'dug pa 'i'i dngas gzhigs
184b4(rnying rgyud): mi byab cing ba rgyag gas ma pa'i dag pa da dang / pa med de/ 'gato pa'i man shes cings gag so temabyad par na cil mang bad do// smyi nga/
184b5(rnying rgyud): sgo dang tshul khrims mi dge bcu spong ba dang / spyod pa dge brtul skrod pa sngar skar gyi sted du/ byams snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms te tshad med bzhi la spyod pa'o// bsgom pa la/ gzugs dang / gzug med kyi snyoms 'dug gnyis/ dang po ni/ 'dzin
184b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshor ba las med 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid can thobs ma gtan pazhe ste/ tham par ma las/ rtog pa dang ba cas shing dpyod pa dang brngas pa ni bsam gtan dang po'o// rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsa me dang bcas pa ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'o//
184b7(rnying rgyud): pa pang med dpyod pa yang med pa'i yid mabyed pa ni bsam gtan gsum zin// dga' bsdud pa yid mabyed pa ni bsam gtan bzhid no// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ bsam gtan bzhi'i 'du shes la yid 'byung ba mam seM spyo 'drug
185a1(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' mtha' yas ske mched kyi// rnam shes mtha' yas kye mched kyi// ci yang med pa'i skyes cad kyi/ 'du shes med 'du shes med man gyi sde mched kyi snyoms 'dug ste sring rtse'i lam mthar thag
185a2(rnying rgyud): de dag kyang rgyas pa las// tshad med bzhi sbyong mi g.yo sgom byed pa// tshangs gnas la sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no// zhes so// 'bras bu la'ang // gzugs dang / gzugs med gnyis las/ dang po ni/ bsam gtan dang po'i dngos gzhi
185a3(rnying rgyud): 'bring che gsum du bsgoms pa las tshangs ris sogs gsum du skye ba la sogs pa ste/ so skye'i gnas bcu gnyis po la 'gre zhing / bzhi pa pa 'phags pa'i zag med shes rab spel zhing rim pa lngar bsgoms na mi che ba sogs gtsang gnas lngar skye
185a4(rnying rgyud): yin no// de'ang gzugs la chags bral ma thob cing bsam gtan gyi ro la chags pas 'khor te/ lam rim las// tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi// rim pas so sor bdag 'dzin cing // gzugs rnams kun la bdag tu rtog/ 'di
185a5(rnying rgyud): tshangs gnas rim par skye// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ lhag mthong gi shes rab kyi dben pas med bzhi la ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bdag tu bzung bas gzugs med kyi lhur skye ste/ de las// mnyam dang gzugs med ma rtogs nas// mi
185a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi med par ma shes te// skye mched bzhi la gnas gyur na// srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa ru ste// zhes so// gnyis pa la/ spyi dang / so sor bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ 'di nyid las// ma rtog pa dang log par rtogs// zhes pa'i don la//
185a7(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi slob dpon rnams dgongs pa mi mthun te/ slob dpon nyi 'od seng ge ni/ ma rtogs pa rgyal chung mur stug gsum dang / log par rtogs pa mu stegs par bzhed/ slob dpon sgeg rdor ni/ ma rtogs pa phul pa dang / log par rtogs pa su
185b1(rnying rgyud): rtag chang gnyis la bzhed// bi ma la'i dgongs pa ni/ 'grel chung las// sprin ma rtogs rgyal pa cang 'phen dang // log par rtogs pa mur sug rgya stegs dang // zhes gsungs shing / spob dpon chen po pad+ma'i mnang gag/ phreng las kyang de ltar 'byung ngo // kun
185b2(rnying rgyud): mkhyen chos rje ne/ ma rtogs pa sor bzhag gi theg pa dang / log par rtogs pa mu stegs kyi theg par bzhed mod kyi/ de ltan 'ang / rang lugs dang thur lugs kyi bka' srol phal mo che/ 'brel chung dang nya phreng steng bzhed pas/ 'dir yang
185b3(rnying rgyud): 'chang ngo do// gnyis pa la/ martogs pa dang / log par rtogs pa gnyis las/ dang po la/ go ba dang dbye ba gnyis/ dang po na/ so so bye bo zlang mthas thom bsgyur ba'i glang zag go// gnyis pa la/ dngos dang / wer byung gnyis/ dang
185b4(rnying rgyud): pa dngos ni/ 'jig rten rgyal ba ste/ de la/ ngo bo/ nges tshig/ dbye ba gsum las bo ni/ las rgyu 'bras le ma togs pa'i kun tu rmongs pa 'o// ngos tshig ni/ rten 'byung rgyu 'bras kyi chos yod med gang du'ang me spyod cing spong len mi byed nga
185b5(rnying rgyud): gyi phyal ba zhes bya ste/ sbar khab las/ cir yang ma rtogs pa ni 'jig rten phyas pa ste/ zhes so// dbyen/ dman regs dang / rigs mi nges pa gnyis/ dang po ni/ yon tan la thob blo med pa'i blo 'phang spad pa'o// gnyis pa la/ bzang ngan
185b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis te 'og tu 'chad/ gnyis bzhar las byung ba'i martogs pa ni/ rgyung 'phen pa ste/ de la'ang / gsum las/ ngo bo ni/ myos gyi yod med du ma rtogs shing tshe gcig gi phan pade bag tsam srub pa'i blo can no// nges tshig ni/ phyi ma chung ngu por te/
185b7(rnying rgyud): tshe 'di' btsan phyog dang mthu stobs sogs 'jig rten pa'i gsang chog mo rmi rjes sogs la brten nas bsgrub pa'i phyir chung 'phen pa zhes bya'o// dbyed/ rigs chad dang / 'du shes can gnyis/ dang po la/ rang bzhin dang / rkyen gyis chang pas
186a1(rnying rgyud): k+Sha/ dang pon/ theg rten gyi thab mtha' 'dzin pas 'drad byam yin na rgyas par 'gata 'chad do// 'du shes can labazhi / mad chen po las/ 'du shes can bani chags pa dang // gang lag yeng dang yang rnan
186a2(rnying rgyud): mos pa can zhes grags pa bzhi// sa bon 'dzin pa'i zhing du sbeng // zhes pa rnams ri ma bzhin/ 'dod yul la chags sred 'bral maphod pa dang / tshe 'di'i ma chos kyi byabs g.yeng ba dang / btsan phyag sdig dang bsngos nas sgrub pa dang / ma
186a3(rnying rgyud): bcu spong zhing thar pa la mos pa'i rigs can no// gnyis pa log par rtogs pa la/ go don dang / dbye ba gnyis/ dang po ni/ rten gyi gang zag gang zhig log pa'i grub ma thas blong snang ba'o// gnyis pa la/ chad lta mur sdug pa dang / tag
186a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// dang po ni/ chos nyid ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub pas 'khrul gzhi byas nas/ chog kyi dang las rgyu 'bras med par blta ba ste/ tshe gcig gi chos thams cad rgyu med glo bur du spel madra' chad par blta ba'o// gnyis pa ni/ chos nyid 'gyur ba med pas 'khrul
186a5(rnying rgyud): gzhi byas nas chos thams cad la bdag yod par bkrab ste/ bdag rtag pa gcig pu pa zhes bya ba phung po lnga'i rgyun la zab po dang / byed pa po'i bdag nyid can gcig don dam par yod par 'dod pa'o// de la'ang dbye na/ grangs can pa dang / bye zag pa dang /
186a6(rnying rgyud): spyod pa pa dang / gcer bu pa skye bzhi/ de bzhi'i steng du chad sgra bstan pas tarka sde lnga zhes grags so// 'dir/ mur sdug pa ni mu stegs pa dang sbram 'dom na phyi rol pa spyi'i ming la 'jug pa yod ste/ 'od srungs kyis zhus pa lngas/ 'od spangs pa'i bstan
186a7(rnying rgyud): pa 'di mung lug dgu bcu rtsa drug gis ni 'jig par byed mi nus te/ nga'i dge slong nga dang 'dra bas 'jig par byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bshad do// ma rtogs log togs kyi lta ba bzhi po de ni ma rig pa kho na las byung ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa
186b1(rnying rgyud): phreng las/ 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can phyin ci log gi lta ba grangs med pa'i mdo rnam pa bzhir 'dus te/ phyal pa dang / rgyang 'phen dang / sung sug dang / mu stegs pa'o// zhes pa nas/ 'di dag ni ma rig pa'i lta ba'o// zhes pa
186b2(rnying rgyud): bar gsungs so// de la ma rtogs pa gnyis ni grub mtha'i ltab ma yin mod kye/ 'on kyang sems kyi gnas tshul bslu ba'i phyir/ de'i zla la bshad do// log par rtogs pa'i blta ba gnyis ni/ kub mthos blo bsgyur ba'i lta ba yin kyang /
186b3(rnying rgyud): chos nyid mtha' dang bral bas sgro skur gyi mthar zhen pas log par bsgyur ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i nabs ma yin te/ grub mtha' sgrub rnams kyi nang nas tha chad pa mur sdug par ma zad / mu stegs pa'ang bdag 'dod pas la dor ba'i rtsa ba
186b4(rnying rgyud): bdag 'dzin gyis bcings pa'i phyir/ de ltar yang / rnam 'grel las// ji srid bdag la mngon chags pa// de srid de ni 'khor bar 'gyur// zhes so// de bas na lam rim las// rtag chad gnyis la gang gi blo zhen pa// don gyi snying po nyid
186b5(rnying rgyud): las grol bar gsungs// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir skabs 'dir lam dang 'bras bu sogs kyi 'dod gzhung ma bris so// 'dir kha cig/ rgyal ba'i bka'i dbye ba 'chad pa'i skabs su phyi rol pa'i grub mtha' sogs 'chad pa 'di ni shin tu mi rigs pa nyid do zhe na
186b6(rnying rgyud): skyon med de/ mu stegs rang chud pa'i dbang du byas na lam gyi lhangs dang spang byango shes nas 'das pa'i theg pa rab lam las mi 'gyangs pa'i dgos pa yod pa'i phyir te/ he ru ka gal po las/ mu stegs theg pa rab nges na// pi spyong spang phyir
186b7(rnying rgyud): khyod la bshad// ces so// yang sprul pa pa'i dpeng du byas na/ sngar gyi dgos pa dang ldan par ma zad kyi/ 'di dag kyang gang la gang 'dul gyi rgyal ba'i phrin las yin par gsungs pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chos kyis mdzad pa'i bde 'dus
187a1(rnying rgyud): zugs dbyung bgaganas lung las// drags 'jug rnachags pas// jiska bas pa 'dul ba da// byor la byed 'i donas sul// dang na sags sa// 'a // da ma \u0f7f/
187a2(rnying rgyud): nam drug 'god mkhan gyi rgol ba dang 'byung ba'i tshe/ thog mar ba tsam dang / de rjes ldog phyogs kyi sgru byed rnam dag mthong nas yang dag pa'i tshad mi skye bar 'gyur bstan/ grub mtha' la ye ma lhags pa'i thun po las yang dag pa'i g+ha bskyeb pa
187a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir ro// yang / 'dudag 'i theg pa las 'bros te 'chud pa dang zhen/ ste nga mi zlag pa gnyis kyis bgrod par byed pa'i rten gyi gang zag ni rkyen gnyis ka la yod pa'i byer smos te/ bri ba'i dbang byas ni/ dpya' bas/ khyod
187a4(rnying rgyud): la ma phyogs pa de// skye bo ma rigagis ldongs pa// srid rtse bar du song nas kyang // mug bsngag yang 'byung srid pa brlab// rgyas dang / rlung pa'i dbang du byas nas/ dkon mchog gsum la bya ba byed par mos pa'i sgo nas skabs su
187a5(rnying rgyud): nga bdon gnyer gyi blo med par 'jog rten pa'i lam nyid la gnas pa'i dbang du ma dzad de/ chung zer/ phying gsum lo// mos pa rnams kyi dbang mdzad nas// blangs gsu marnam par bzhag pa yin// zhes so// gnyis pa

187b1(rnying rgyud): las bgrod bya'i nges legs sam rnam par grol ba'i theg pa zhes bya'o// de bshad pa la/ phyi rol ba las 'phags pa'i tshul// sa sa'i dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa/ theg dgu'i lha rim la rtsod pa spang ba'o// dang po ni/ dkon mchog gdu
187b2(rnying rgyud): thuzla ga gnas sru bzang nas/ nye ba bka nags kyi thugs zhe sa lan pa'am/ de'i khyod gragatogs shing / gang dag pa'i bas pa pa gsum la skyob pas 'azlas thu thod rtsalas bran la rnam pas 'phags te/ bye pa par lal na dger
187b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad sdug bsngal ba// chos byams cad bdag med pa/ mya ngan lus 'das bzheba'o// bslab pa gsum la slob pa ni/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / sems dang / shes rab gas ma largyas bsam bsgos gsum kyi sto nas bslabs pas thog
187b4(rnying rgyud): mtha' bar gsum du dgye ba ste/ 'od ldan la ste// bslang pa gas ma ni rab ston cing // phyag rgyags mdang yang dag ldan// tshogam par dang mthur dge ba// sangs rgyas gsung du mkhas pas rtags// zhes so// 'bras ba srid ce las brgyab rna
187b5(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ dpa' bo/ khyod kyi bstan pa'i rjes 'gro ba// bsam gtan dngos gzhi mthob kyang // bdud kyi mig ras rtsa bzhin // srid pa dag ni ldog par bgyid// thos so// gnyis pa la// rgyu mtshan nyid kyi dang / 'bras bu rdo rje theg pa gnyis te/
188a1(rnying rgyud): gzhang las/ 'angag tan las 'das pa sna pa gtas/ na ga pa dang / ga pan nas// dayal/ 'di pas gsartags par dganadang rtanas/ rnam / rnam
188a2(rnying rgyud): thar pa bdan pa'i blo phyogs gags pardeg dam na dang / bsam gyis byung ba la snod kyi me pa 'dzin martos sa pas yang dag nyid martogs pa byang chub sems pada'i dzin pa'o// dang po thas dang / rang
188a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis/ dang pon/ 'dre nad las/ nya thos kyi zhig pa dang / ma pa 'dzi 'cha pa la/ na/ sakyig/ dbye ba/ paste/ 'ab pa las ga sa kyi ma zag gi bdag med rdzogs pa'i bab ma gyu pa/

188a7(rnying rgyud): byang byas te/ bden pazhi la dmigs pa'i lha 'bras srang blang gi sgo nas 'jug pa'o// gnyis pa ga bani/ gzung yul dngos po rags pang 'jiganyen pa dang blos gzhig cing gago du nga ba'i phyir dade/ pa sems kyi gyur ras gsus
188b1(rnying rgyud): gzhig tu rung ba'i phyir dang / gzung 'dzin rags pa 'di kun rdzob tu snang ba tsam las rang bzhin med pas gang zag gi bdag med par rtogs kyang / gzung yul dngos po rags sdung bcom pa'i gzhi rdul phra rapa 'di gnyen po dang blos gzham du med pa dang /
188b2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin sems skad cig ma dus kyi cha dang bral bas gzung 'dzin phra ba de ni dam du 'dod pa'i phyir chos kyi bdag ma rtogs te/ lta phred las/ chos thams cad la mu stegs pa la sogs pas sgo dang spang bas kun tu brtags pa/ ye med pa chad pa'i lta ba
188b3(rnying rgyud): dang / rtag pa la sogs pa'i yod par blta ba ni/ zag pa la sbrul du mthong ba bzhin du med de/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rdul phra ba dang / rnam par shes pa ni don dam par yod par blta ba/ zhes ga
188b4(rnying rgyud): so/ dbyen/ skab dpal brtsegs kyi lha rim snang ba bcu bdun pa las/ chos tsam pa lta ba'i nyan thos pa// mdo sde pa dang bye brag gnyis// phyi rol dz+wal la rtsod byed cing // shes pa skad cig snang byed mthun// zhes pas bye s+tha ni/ rags pa kun rdzob kyi
188b5(rnying rgyud): bden pa 'di na sing ltar tshogs pa gcig tu snang yang / don dam par rdul phra rab bskor ba bar med dang bcas pas cha ldan sil bur 'dod de/ klu sgrub kyi g.yu thang las/ kun rdzob bye brag 'dod gzhung nyid// snod kyi rdzas rnams dngos po 'di// rdul phran sel bu
188b6(rnying rgyud): phan tshun pas// ma 'dres ni sing lta bu ste/ sems nams kyi mthu'am chung gi stobs kyis 'dus par 'dod// don dam shes pa skad cig ma// re re yod par 'dod pa'o// zhes so// mdo sde pa ni// rdul phra rab 'byar yang ma 'byar/ bar yang med pa 'bru'i
188b7(rnying rgyud): phung po lta bur 'dod de/ de las/ mdo sde kun rdzob phra rab rnams// 'dus pa'i rnam pa gcig tu 'dod// don dam shes pa mthun par 'dod// ces so// 'dis rdul phran las gong bu brtsam pa de'ang cha med du rtogs pas bye sA las 'phags te don

189b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung bzhi ni 'gog bden gyi'o// lam/ rig pa/ sgrub pa/ nges 'byin bzhi ni lam bden gyi rnam pa ste bcu drug go// ye shes bcu drug ni/ bden bzhi re re la'ang / chos shes/ chos bzod gnyis/ rjes shes/ rjes bzod gnyis te bcu
189b2(rnying rgyud): drug go/ lnga pa spyod pa ni/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan btu gnyis la gnas nas dang don gtso bor spyod pa ste/ ga yu thang las/ spyod pa'ang rang don 'ba' zhig pa'o// zhes so// drug pa 'bras bu ni/ rgyun zhugs dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir
189b3(rnying rgyud): mi 'ong ba ste gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu dang / mthar thug zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i ye shes gnyis dang ldan pa'i lhag bcas lhag med kyi dgra bcom pa thob cing / 'bras bu bzhi po re re la 'di zhugs gnas gnyis gnyis su phye bas bachad de/ dbye

189b5(rnying rgyud): nas ni// nyon mongs dgra rnams zhi ba'i sa ru 'gro// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ 'di nyid las/ rang byang chub kyi theg pa dang / zhes pa'i don la/ ngo bo/ des tshig/ dbye ba'o// dang po ni/ slob dpon la ma brtan par srid pa tha ma'i

191b7(rnying rgyud): bad+ma zhing blo yi yul gyur pa// su rdzob kyi la mtshan nyid do// zhes so// dbyen/ sdang la don byed nus pa me la mir snang ba lta bu yang dag kun rdzob/ sngang la don byed mi nus pa zo yor la mer ldang ba lta bu log pa'i kun rdzob ste/ de las/ srin rdzob
192a1(rnying rgyud): yang dag dang // log pa rdzob ces kyang// sos mtshan nyid rabab sha// snang la don byed mi nas log/ yang dag 'ang yang na byeng nas// zhes dang / bden gnyis las/ dang 'drab 'dod byed dag/ sa pa'i byeng nga
192a2(rnying rgyud): mi nus phyir// yang dag yang dag ma yin pa'i// kun rdzob kyi ni dbye ba byas// zhes so// don dam bden pa ni/ spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba ste/ gal po las/ don dam pa yi mtshan nyid ni// spros pa thams cad bral ba yin// zhes dang / dze hA ri'i
192a3(rnying rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung rnam par 'byed pa las/ yod min med min yod med min// gnyis kang bdag nyid du yang med// mtha' bzhi dag las nges grol pa// zhes so// dbyen/ smyos pa dang phyogs re dang bral ba rnam grangs pa'i don dam dang / spros pa
192a4(rnying rgyud): mtha' dag dang bral ba rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam ste/ gal po las// dbye ba rnam grangs don dam dang // rnam grangs ma yin mtha' brgyad bral// zhes so// de ltar bden pa gnyis po de gcig gam tha dad cing / tha snyad du chu dang chu zla ltar rang bzhin gcig/
192a5(rnying rgyud): la ldog pa tha dad pa ste/ byang chub sems 'grel pas// bu ram rang bzhin mngar ba dang // me yi rang bzhin tsha ba ltar// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gnas// zhes so// don dam par gcig tha dad gang du'ang brjod du med
192a6(rnying rgyud): de byams pas zhus pa las/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma las brjod du med pa'i dbyings de nyid kyang ma yin la/ gzhan yang ma yin no// zhes so// de'ang dbu ma pa la/ don dam 'jog tshul la ze dad med kyang / kun rdzob tu snang ba sgyu ma tsam du grub par las len pa rang
192a7(rnying rgyud): rgyud pa dang / snang dus nyid nas spros pa dang bral bar 'dod pa las len pa'i kun rdzob tsam yang 'gog pa zal 'gyur ba'o// sems tsam pa ni/ gzung 'dzin gnyis snang gi yul dang yul can kun rdzob dang / gnyis med kyi shes pa dang ngag rang gsal ni don dam
192b1(rnying rgyud): bden par 'dod do// dbye na/ phyi don shes pa'i rnam pa tsam du bden par 'dod pa'i rnam bden pa dang / snang ba shes pas spo btags par 'dod pa'i rnam rdzun pa gnyis so// gnyis pa lta ba ni/ bdag med gnyis phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa'o// de 'ang dun
192b2(rnying rgyud): rdzob tu chos thams cad chu zla ltar snang la/ don dam par spros pa thams cad zhi ba'i tshul du rtogs pas bden gnyis kyi gnas lugs rtogs pa ste/ lha phreng las/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i chos thams cad don dam par na rang bzhin med pa
192b3(rnying rgyud): yin la/ kun rdzob tu ni sgyu ma tsam du so so'i mtshan nyid ma 'dres par yod do// zhes dang / lam rim las/ mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes shing // kun rdzob don dam gnyis 'byed la// chos dang gang zag bdag med na// 'di ni byang chubs pa yin//
192b4(rnying rgyud): zhes so// gsum pa tshul khrims la/ dge ba chos sdud kyi/ sems can don byed kyi/ nyes spyod sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang gsum/ dang po ni/ tshogs gnyis dang phyin drug gis bsdus pa'i legs spyong dge ba'i tshogs slob pa'o// gnyis
192b5(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ bsam sbyor thams cad sems can gyi don du spyod pa'o// gsum pa ni/ dbu ma pa'i lugs la sems bskyed len pa'i rten du so thar gyi sdom ldan dgos par ma nges kyang / byang sa na nyes spyod sbom po'i tshul khrims so bar rigs brnyan la
192b6(rnying rgyud): bshad pa ltar de dag gi bslab byar gnas pa gzhir bzhag gi steng du/ byang chub la dmigs pa'i ston sems dang / de'i ched du tshogs dang bya ba la sbyor ba'i 'jug sems te/ dbu sems gang rung gi tshogs blangs la/ de'i bslab bya la bslab pa'o// de
192b7(rnying rgyud): la sems tsam pa ni rtsa ltung bzhir 'dod de/ sdom pa nyi shu pa las// rnyed dang dkur stir chags pa yis// bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa dang // sdug bsngal mgon med gyur pa la// ser snas chos nor mi steng dang // gzhan gyis bshags kyang mi nyan par//
193a1(rnying rgyud): khrobs gzhan la 'tshogs pa dang // theg pa chen po thong byed cing // dam chos 'drar na sodan pa'o// zhes so// dbum bltar na/ bcu dgra' ma nyi shur 'dod de/ rgyalnga ba la ngas pa lta/ smon pa la nges pa lnga/ phal ba la
193a2(rnying rgyud): nges pa brgyang / thun mong pa smon sems gtang ba dang bcu dgur nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo'i rjes su 'brangs te bslab btus su bshad/ de'i steng du 'dug sems spangs te dge ba la mi sbyor ba dang nyi shur dkon mchog brtsegs las gsungs so// de dag kya
193a3(rnying rgyud): spyod 'jug las// sems bslang 'dod pa rnams la ni// dran pa dang ni shis bzhin dag/ srog la babs kyang srungs shig cis// gdag ni de ltar thal mo sbyor// zhes pas/ dran pa dang / shes bzhin ma nyams pas/ nag po'i chos
193a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi spang zhing / dkar chos bzhi dang du blang ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas chung ma zad par bsrung ba la 'bad par bya'o// bzhi pa bsgom pa ni/ spyir slob pa'i lam bzhir byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom ste/ tshogs lam chung ngur dran pa nyer gzhag
193a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi/ 'bring du yang dag spong bzhi/ chen por rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi/ sbyor la madrod rtser dbang po lnga/ bzod pa chos mchog tu stobs lha/ mthong lam du byang chub yan lag bdun/ bsgom lams dgung 'phags lam brgyad bsgom pa'o// bye ngas
193a6(rnying rgyud): tu/ thog ma nas ji ltar nyams su blang ba'i tshul 'khor lo tha ma nges pa don gyi mdo sde'i dbang du byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshul khong du chud par byas la/ rig can das byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ sdang yul ma 'gags la 'dzin rtog zhi ba'i
193a7(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin skye ba'i zhiganas dang / lhag mthong ni/ snang ba sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad du blta ba dang / gzung 'dzin phra rags thams cad stong par thag bcad pa chos nyid stong pa la brtag pa dang / mtha' bral dbu ma'i don la mnyam par 'jog pa rnams te/ zhi lha ga zung
193b1(rnying rgyud): 'brel gyi skyo nas bsgom pa'o// de ltar yang / spyod 'dug las/ zhi ga nas rab tu ldan pa'i lhag mthong gis// nyon mongs rnam par 'joms par shes bya ste// zhes so// lngab spyod pa ni rjes thob kyi dus su bdag pas gzhan gces kyi sgo nas sems can gyi
193b2(rnying rgyud): don byed pa'o// de'ang spyod pa'i rang bzhin pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam bcu sgyu ma tsam du spyod ste/ drug ni sbyin sogs dang / bcu ni thabs/ stobs/ smon lam/ ye shes bzhi bsnun pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'du'o// byug pa 'bram bu
193b3(rnying rgyud): ni/ sa bcu dang lam lnga rim gyis bgrod nas/ mi slob pa'i lam brgya gcig kun te 'od kyis la/ rang don du chos kyi srung grol te gzhan don du gzugs sku gnyis la brten nas sems can gyi don 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du mdzad pa yin no// de dag
193b4(rnying rgyud): kyang rgyas pa las/ bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa'i// sa bcu rim gyis bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sangs rgyas sa bgrod go 'phang 'thob pa'i lam// bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// zhes so// gnyis pa
193b5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu sngags kyi theg pa la// rgyu'i theg pa las khyad par 'phags tshul/ khyad par can gyi theg pa nyid bshad pa/ de rnams brjod byar ston pa'i rjod byed rgyud kyi khyad par bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ phar phyin theg pa rgya la ma byed las/ 'dir 'bras bu
193b6(rnying rgyud): lam byed kyis 'phags so// de la mtshan nyid kyi theg pa pa rnams na re/ khyed gsang sngags pa 'bras bu lam du byed pa de/ sbyin pa zhig lam du byed dam/ ma smin pa zhig lam du byed/ dang po ltar na thug med du 'gyur te/ smin nas kyang lam du byed pa'i
193b7(rnying rgyud): phyir/ rtags pas/ khyab pa tshad mas grub ste/ na ning gi 'bras bud dgazod kyis bon du 'gyur ba bzhin/ 'dod na gsang sngags nyid ring la ma du thal lo/ gnyis pa ltar na/ 'bras bu lam du byed pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ ma smin pa'i phyir/ 'dod na rang
194a1(rnying rgyud): runams/ gang ma ldan pa las 'a shAg ga'ags sa ub / sgrus mnapa ba dun/ nan/ yin nul mthob pa dan myor ba nga la gnas dang / rnal nas mnags ngas/ dartags par 'dus
194a2(rnying rgyud): tsam li lam du byed ces 'dogs te/ lam rim las/ de ltar ye shes rang gnas pa// lam dang 'bras bu kun ngo // 'brel pa dag phyir thabs chen pos// mngon byed rang las byung bar zad// ces so// de ltar na rang gnas kyi 'bras bu lam gyis
194a3(rnying rgyud): mngon du byas pa'i tshe sngar gyi 'bras bu la skyed byung dam ma byung zer na/ ngo bo la ltos nas skyed du byar med de/ rgyal bu dmangs 'khyams nyid rgyal bur ngo shes pa'i tshe rigs kyi ngo bo bzang du 'gror med pa bzhin/ 'on kyang mngon gsal la ltos nas slad du byas te
194a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal bur nges pas dmangs la dbang bskur nus pa bzhin/ de'i phyir/ 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ he ru ka gal po las/ mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa yis// sems nyid sangs rgyas rgyu ru shes// 'bras bu sngags kyi theg pa yis// sems nyid sangs rgyas
194a5(rnying rgyud): nyid du bsgom// rgyu dang 'bras bu gang yin pa'i// phyogs kyang rab tu shes par bya// zhes pas/ mtshan nyid theg par/ sems nyid sangs rgyas kyi chu com du shes pa de/ rkyen tshogs gnyis kyis gong du 'phel bas sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa'i phyir dang /
194a6(rnying rgyud): lung 'das kyi rgyu rnam byung gi chos lam du byed pa'i phyir/ chu'i theg pa zhes bya ste/ rgyu 'bras snga phyir khas lan pa'i phyir ro// sngags kyi theg pas sems nyid 'bras bu'i ngo bo skra dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid can du ye nas rang la gnas pas thob tu da lta nyid nas rang la yod
194a7(rnying rgyud): pa na gzhi/ de nyid shes 'jug gi byed pas gnas skabs glo bur gyi dri ma bsal te ngo shes par byed pa'i cha nas lam/ gzhi de nyid mngon du gyur pa'i tshe nas 'bras bur bzhag pas/ don la chu 'bras snga phyi dbyer me phyed pa'i phyir/ 'bras bu'i theg pa
194b1(rnying rgyud): dang rdo rje'i theg pa zhes bya ste/ 'di nyid las/ dus bzhi phyogs ba tu gang nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas banas mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma 'tshol zhig/ ces dang / 'di ni gsang chen
194b2(rnying rgyud): nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin// zhes dang // ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu yi ngang du byung // zhes dang / rgyas pa las/ rgya 'bras ye nas snga phyi ma
194b3(rnying rgyud): yin pas// 'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus gcig mnyam par sbyor/ zhes so// de bzhin du/ gyi rgyud kyi dbang du byas te/ lam rim las// bya ba'i lugs kyis shes rab dang // cho ga yan lag grangs rdzogs pas// 'bras bu lam bya
194b4(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs pas// zhes dang / nang pa'i dbang du byas te/ de las gzhan pa'i thob bya med// kun kyang sprin zin bgrod pa med// de nyid lam gyi ngo bo ste/ zhes gsung pa bzhin no// yang / gong ma rnams/ kun rdzob lam du byed nus pa dang mi nus
194b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i khyad par yod par bzhed de/ pha rol tu phyin pas don dam bslab bya dang / kun rdzob spang bur byed la/ sngags las ni kun rdzob tu 'ang chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du spyod pas na/ mi spong bar lam du byed pa'i phyir/ bden gnyis phyogs su ma lhung
194b6(rnying rgyud): pas 'phags te/ lam rim las/ bla med theg pa'i nang nas ni/ don dam du ni dbyer med la// kun rdzob tu ni thams cad la// dag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin// thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni// rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob tu 'angang byer
194b7(rnying rgyud): med de// blta ba mtho dman de tsam mo// zhes so// tshul des kyang 'bras bu lam byed du 'gyur te/ chos thams cad dbyer meda'abras bu'i ngo bo snang stong zung 'jug gi chos spang bal zhing thabs kyis goms par byed pa'i phyir/ de ltar yang rgyas pa las/
195a1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten brtan ga po la sogs pa// snang ba nyid na ngo bo med// de nyid chos sku chen po yin// zhes so// de'ang sngags gyibs lha'i sku gsung thugs su bltas te bsgom pa dang / nang pa ltar na chos thams cad sku gsung
195a2(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du rtogs nas goms par byed pa'i phyir na 'bras bu lam byed dang rdo rje theg pa'i nges tshig grub ste// bang mdzod 'phrul gyi lde mig las// 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa ni// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor lam byas nas// 'bras
195a3(rnying rgyud): bu de nyid lam du khyer// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer sbyor// de rigs rdo rje theg par btags// zhes so// khyad par gzhan yang yod de/ tshul gsum sgron ma las// don gcig na'ang ma rmongs dang // thabs ma
195a4(rnying rgyud): dka' ba med pa dang // dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas// sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags// zhes gsungs te/ rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa chen po gnyis ka sems can gyi don la dmigs nas byang chub 'dod par gcig na'ang / sngags khyad par bzhi
195a5(rnying rgyud): 'phags te/ lha bsgom sngags bzla ba sogs thabs kyi chal ma rmongs pa dang / de'ang thabs kyi chu'i sgo gcig ma yin par dbang po'i rim pa dang mthun par bya spyod la sogs pa'i rgyud sde'i sgo mtha' yas pa'i phyir mang ba dang / de dag kyang rgya'i lam lha
195a6(rnying rgyud): bskal pa grangs med gsum sogs su dka' bas bgrodami dgos par tshegs chung ngus 'grub pa'i phyir dka' ba med pa dang / de nyid sngags kyi theg pa'i dngos kyi gdul bya dbang rnon la dgongs nas gsungs pa'i phyir tshul bzhi po des 'phags pa yin/
195a7(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang // dpal po mkhas pa kun dga' rdo rje ni/ shes bya gzhi/ shes byed lam/ thob bya 'bras bu'i khyad par phye ste 'phags tshul gsung ngo // yang / gzums chen gyis rnal 'byor mig gi bsam gtan gyi rang 'grel du/ pha rol tu phyin pa las
195b1(rnying rgyud): sngags nang pa khyad par bcu gnyis kyis 'phags par gsungs pa dang / rje zur chung pa dang rog bder gshegs chen pos/ lta ba gtan la 'bebs tshul/ phab pa'i grub mtha'/ nyams su len tshul/ 'bras bu thob dus/ 'bras bu rang gi ngabo rnams la khyad
195b2(rnying rgyud): par yod tshul rgyas par gsungs kyang 'dir yi ges 'jigs pas ma spros so// gnyis pa ni/ 'di nyid las/ bla na med pa'i theg pa dang // zhes pa ni/ rgyas pa las/ mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po ni// rgya mtsho chen por chu klung kun 'bab ltar//
195b3(rnying rgyud): medadon rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu// rnam thar theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus// zhes gsungs te/ de la dbye na/ phyi thub pa rgyud kyi theg pa dang / nad pa thabs kyi rgyud kyi theg pa'o// de gnyis kyi khyad par la snga rabs pa rnams kyi bzhed pa mi mthun pa
195b4(rnying rgyud): mang na'ang / 'dir thugs sras ka ba bzhi'i dgongs pa rje sgo phug pas bsdus nas lngar gsungs te/ dang po lta ba'i khyad par ni/ sngags kyi theg pa gang zhig sems nyid bdag nyid chen por rtogs pa nang pa/ ma rtogs pa phyi ba ste/ in+d+ra b+hU ti'i lam
195b5(rnying rgyud): rnam bkod las/ rigs gsum rigs lngar 'dod pa dag/ bdag nyid chen po ma rtogs phyir// thun mong mnyam par nga skya'o// zhes so// gnyis pa dngos grub len tshul gyi khyad par ni/ ye shes kyi lha la re zhing bka' la sdod pas dngos grib zhu ba ni phyir/
195b6(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid chen por rtogs pas sems nyid sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du rang snang ba'i phyir dngos grub dang la yod par mthong ba ni nad pa ste/ rdo rje sems pa'i zhus lan las/ sngags phyi nang gi rnal 'byor pa gnyis dngos grub len pa la khyad par ci mchis//
195b7(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pa'i lan du// dper na rgyal pos blon por bskos pa ltar// grub pa gong nas 'byin pa phyi ba'i tshul// 'bangs kyis rgyal srid phul nas dbang bsgyur ltar// rang phyung rdzogs chen bla na med pa'i tshul// zhes dang / 'di nyid las// ngo mtshang tsho 'phrul
196a1(rnying rgyud): rmad kyi chos// zhus mags gsungs bltad // gsum pa dbang gi khyad par ni/ mchog dbang gang ma gsum bsrung thub mi nus na ts+tsha pa/ dra gsum la gaN bar 'dzin pa na na pa// bzhi pa stod pa'i khyad par ni/
196a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i chos nyi shu la thabs kyis zin nas spyod nus pa nang pa dang / mi nus pa phyi ba'o// lnga pa 'bras bu'i khyad par ni/ mi tshe bdun dang lnga dang gsum sogs nas sbyor nus pa phyi ba/ tshe 'di la spyod nus pa nad pa'o// zhes gsungs/ lha rje kha rag
196a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang rog ni/ rgyud gzhung gi skabs su/ rgyud kyi dngos po bcu phyi nang gis bsgyur ba'i khyad par dang / bye brag dbang gi skabs su zab dbang gsum ston nus mi nus dang / lta ba'i skabs su rang byung gi ye shes sgra nus mi nus dang / bsgom pa'i
196a4(rnying rgyud): skabs su lha zhal sgo du bsgom nus me nus dang / spyod pa'i skabs su dam rdzas lnga la spyod nus mi nus dang / lha dang bdag tha mi dad du bltas nas 'jug nus mi nus dang / dngos grub kyi skabs su dus te ring dang phyi nang nas re bo'o khyad par yod ces gsung/ wA rje dbya
196a5(rnying rgyud): pa na re/ khyad par de rnams kyang phyogs re ba tsam yin pas/ 'dir shes bya gzhi'i khyad par/ shes byed lam gyi khyad par/ thob bya 'bras bu'i khyad par gsum du phyen 'thad gsungs/ rje srol g.yung gnyis kyi zhal nas/ lha spyod dang ting nge 'dzin
196a6(rnying rgyud): gsum dbyer med du 'dod pa sngags nang pa mi 'dod pa phyi ba'o// 'o na rgyu'i theg pa dang lcags phyi bal khyad par med par 'gyur ro zhe na/ mi 'gyur te/ kun rdzob lam du byed nus myi nus kyi khyad par yod pa'i phyir gsungs/ de las/ drang po kyi thub pa chud kyi
196a7(rnying rgyud): theg pa la dbyen/ rang shar las/ phyi ba chud la rnam gsum ste// kr-i ma u pa yog go// zhes pas/ bya ba'i rgyud dang / gnyis ka'i rgyud dang / rnal 'byar rgyud kyi theg pa'o// dang po la/ ngo bo/ nges tshig/ dbye ba'o// dang po ni/ don dam par
196b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' bzhi dang bral ba'i dag par rtogs pas kun rdzob tu dngos grub gzhan la re zhing rtul ba'i thabs su gyur pa ste/ lamang ma las/ gnyis med mnyam par ma shes pas// don dam dag pa chos nyid tsam// ye shes bzhi yon kun rdzob lha// nges bsgom
196b2(rnying rgyud): byA ba las kyis// zhes so// gnyis pa ne/ kri ya'i sgra byab ste/ 'i bya ba gtso bor ston pa'i phyir/ de ltar yang bsam gtan phyi ma'i 'grel pa las/ rgyud 'di ni lus ngag gi rgya ba gtso bor ston pas na bya ba'i rgyud ces bya'o// zhes so// gsum pa dbyer du
196b3(rnying rgyud): gi/ dang po 'jug sgrol// thog ma'i 'jug sgo sbyin byed dang / bya ba'i 'jug sgo gnyis/ dang po ni/ chu dang cod pan gyi dbang 'khor bcas bskur bas slob ma snod rung du byed pa ste/ ye shes thig le las/ chu yi dbang bskur dbu rgyan dag/ bya ba'i rgya/
196b4(rnying rgyud): la rab tu grags// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ khrus dang gtsang sbra dang dag pa gsum gyi sgo nas 'jug ste/ rang shar las/ 'dug pa'i sgo ni dag pa gsum// khrus dang gtsang sbras 'jug pa'o// zhes so// de yang dag pa gsum ni/ de las/ dge
196b5(rnying rgyud): pa rnam gsum gang zhe na// lha dang dkyil 'khor dag pa dang // rdzas dang longs spyod dag pa dang // sngags dang ting 'dzin dag pa'o// zhes so// gnyis pa lta ba ni/ lha rim las/ kr-i ya don dam chos nyid blta// kun rdzob rang rig yon tan lha// rigs
196b6(rnying rgyud): gsum dkyil 'khor snang ba la// skye bo 'khrul pa med par 'dod// ces pas bden pa gnyis te/ don dam bden pa ni/ sems nyid drag pa steng gsal gyi ye shes yod med snang stong gi mtha' bzhi dang bral bar 'dod ste/ la shan las// rang sems
196b7(rnying rgyud): mtha' bzhi yongs bral ba// rig phyir ye shes gzhan las min// zhes so// kun rdzob la/ yang log gnyis las/ log pa'i kun rdzob ni/ dbu ma pa man chad kyis yang dag dang log par brtags pa'i kun rdzob thams cad yin la/ yang dag kun rdzob
197a1(rnying rgyud): de/ sa nyid rtogs pa yon tan dgas gsum pa'i dkyil khor dusang bar 'dod pa sa/ ma' thos las phred bas snang ba'i lags oM// ltung ba dud la mtho 'dam rbAb// drug byed rig tu gyu
197a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// mthong ba rnam par dag ces bya// zhes so// gsum pa tshul khrims ni/ yang 'byed 'phral lce las/ dkon mchog gsum dang byung chub sems// stegs dang phyag rgya mi chang zhing // rdo rje dri la bu spang me hUM// wA dang bla ma de bzhin no//
197a3(rnying rgyud): ni yan+da lag dam tshig yin// rtsa ba'i dmachog sa thon+de// khri la nyal bar me bya zhing // sha li za zhing chang mi gabyung // klog pa la phung khu zla mi b+ha// zhes dam tshig bcu gcig tu gsungs/ gsang nga spyi rgyud las spyi'i dpya tsheg gsum nga
197a4(rnying rgyud): brag gi mchog bcu gsum du bshad pa lnga sogs pa'o// ba'i ba bsgom pa lalA/ mtshan bcas/ mtshan med gnyis pas/ dang po ni/ he ru ka gal po lngas/ chos nyid sgra dang yi gzugs thug so// ye shes yongs rdzogs slar sgrub bsgom/
197a5(rnying rgyud): zhes pas kyi ladon gyi drug gi so nas du mchog pa skyed par byaste/ de' b+h+yo ba rjid kyi swA / yi ge'i lha nga / sna'i rtsa dang/ gzugs kyi na dang / grag d+hA'i sgra dang/ mtsho ma'id+hato// de ltar yang // stong pa log grag cugs dang/ lcag
197a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan madrug yin te// zhes nam 'joms kyi rgyud rgyas pa lus gsungs so// de nas ye shes pa stan drangs te/ mchod pa rtso dang ba rnas pa sogs byas la/ rje tshal gyi tshul drabaskyes nas dngos phra bablang ste/ rang shwar lAs/ lha dang rdul 'byor dgapa
197a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis// rje dang 'phangs kyi tshul du blta// zhes dang / rigs thams cad pa'i dngos grub len pa'i rgyud las/ rje dpon rgyal po'i tshul bltas la// pa nyid zan gyi 'dra shes kyis// sngags bsrung dngos pa bster po ni// dran med pa'i mchog
197b1(rnying rgyud): nangs// gnas pan/ mtshan panas rtswa dang miga'abral sogs par bsgom pa'i snang ba da'ang mo dmigs pa dag pa mtha' ba zhi dang thal ba nga du 'angag pas pa naganyis nges pamam sa/ la gnalas/ snang maras rdzus brtan par byeng // ces/
197b2(rnying rgyud): pa spyod pa ni/ bya ba drug ste/ 'jug pa'i dus dang / zas dang / gos dang / gtsang sgra dang / dmigs rten dang / bzlas badz+rod grags kyi byu ba rnams so// de ltar yang / gal po las// gza' skang dus rdzogs zlas gos gtsang // bai N+Da la zhugs dka'
197b3(rnying rgyud): byen// ces dang / g+ha byed las/ sgyu'i gzugs brnyan dang / thugs mtshan dang / bzlas brjod dang / zhes so// sku gsungs so// drug pa 'azlas bu ni/ mits+tsha bdun nu dgasags ma rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa sgra gsum ye shes rje'i bdag nyid can
197b4(rnying rgyud): na pa'i 'dodub ste/ gal po las/ mi tshwa bdun na sangs rgyas pa// rigs gsum mgon pos 'gro ba 'dul// zhes so// gnyis pa un+d+ra pa'i theg pa la/ jo bo/ nges tshig/ dbye ba'o// dang po ni/ skam po gdang / spyod pa thung
197b5(rnying rgyud): phyung sdod pas dngos gru ba sgrub pa'i thabs su gyur pa ste/ lha seng las/ gnyis ka la brten pa las grub pa'o// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ u b+ha'i was/ phyi lus ngag gi bya ba dang nang gi rdul 'byor gnyis/ cha mnyam du spyod pa'i phyir gnyis ka gyur
197b6(rnying rgyud): chos bya ste/ rang shar las/ u pa la ni 'di wa ste// lta ba lo gar blta ba lA// spyod pa kri yar spyod pa'o// de phyir gnyis ka'i rgyud ces grags// zhes so// gsum pa dbyen drug gi/ dang po 'jug sgo la'ang gnyis las/ dang pong bang ni/
197b7(rnying rgyud): cod pan gnyis kyi steng du rdor dril ming gsum ste/ ye shes thig le las/ rdo rje dril bu de bzhin ming // spyod pa'i rgyud du rab tu gas la// zhes so// bya ba'i 'jug sgo dang / gsum pa tshul khrims dang / lnga pa spyod pa rnams bya chud dang / gnyis pa
198a1(rnying rgyud): zhab dang / bzhi pa rnam pa rgyad sna na mog dang shas kyi mthun pa te/ gsugang las/ gtus ga/ spyad pa 'a' pa ni// spyod pa zla ba'i sa ma thun yang // ba nal slong nas ma gyur// ragasung/
198a2(rnying rgyud): pasgrubs khyang par 'gyur// zhes dang / lha ma las/ gnyis kra s+yAd kyi 'dad pa ni// la spyod gang ga rnaMs su mthun// skyes so// 'on kyang tshal bajigs pazhing pa sti zhing ba rnam pa sogs khyad par cung zad ti // drug pa 'bras dra ni/
198a3(rnying rgyud): nirigs bzhi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par 'dod pa ste/ rigs bzhi ni las kyi rigs ran chen rigs la bsdus pa'o// de 'angag la po las// rigs bzhi rdo rje 'chang bar gnas// gis dang / kun byed las// gnyis su med la mtsha ldan dri 'gol/
198a4(rnying rgyud): zhes so// gsum pa lo ga'i theg pa la/ rab/ des chog/ dbye ba'o// dang po ni/ don dam mtshan ma med pa'i chos nyid kyi byin nabs bran rdo ba dzo dkyings kyi yang brtags te rtog pa bzung ngan blang da su tsa labs 'bras thubazlab par 'dong ste/ @sa?/
198a5(rnying rgyud): rem las/ ldan grub mnyam pa ma mthong bas// chos kun rnam g.ye shes kyi// byin rlabs rdo rje dkyi ngas sprul pa// drang dor 'byed pa rnal 'byor pa'o// zhes so// gnyis pa ni// yo ga'i sgra las nang gi rnal 'byor gtso ba dbyed pa'am ston pas na
198a6(rnying rgyud): rnal byar spyad ces bya g+sa// gaphreng las/ rnal 'byor gtso bor thas pas 'grub pa'o// zhes so// gsum pa rkyen drug go/ dang po dag stsol gnyis 'am/ drang po dab ni/ rig pa'i dbang lnga'i steng rjo thob dpon gyi dbang dang rtang pa
198a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes theg sa las/ phyir mi ldog pa tham pa dbang // rnal 'gror thud drugs sa par byes dag gi the ga ba // dzan rje po pang rjes pa// zhes so// gnyis ma bya ba'i 'jug nan/ bcas mkhyed med kyi ting
198b1(rnying rgyud): skyonas 'dug ste/ sun byed las// lo gtsug po bkod 'dod pa// mtshan ma yod med sbyor zhugs nas// zhes so// gnyis pa khA nI/ bden pa gnyis te/ don dam bden pa ni/ chos thams cad spros pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'i rang bzhin 'od gas
198b2(rnying rgyud): stong pa nyid de/ saM gra ha lAs// chos rnams rang bzhin dod gsal bas// ngo bo nyid kyis gdod nas dag/ ces so// kun rdob la gnyis kyi/ log pa'i kun rdzob lngar dang 'dra/ yang dag kun rdzob ni/ cir snang thams cad chos nyid rtogs

198b4(rnying rgyud): las// byin rlabs de rje dbyings kyi lha// shar lta grogs pa'i tshul du blta// zhes so// gsum pa tshul khrims ni/ tso mor gsungs pa'i rigs lnga sti'i dam chog/ byang chub kyi sems dang por bskyed cing / de'i rjes sa tshal khrims gsum gyi bcwal
198b5(rnying rgyud): la nan tan byang ba dang / rmi brag gi dmatshig/ snang mdzad kyi mtshig gsum/ mi brjod drin byung gnyis la bzhib na/ mtha' yas kyi gcig/ de na grub kyi gnyis te brgya bzhi gArba dz+wa la/ yang 'byid 'phrul zer/ tha kAd kyi dmachog bcus kyi/

199b1(rnying rgyud): steng cha gnyis gnyis su med pa'i dang la mnyam par 'jog pa ste/ rdo rje 'byung ba las/ gnyis su med pa'i chos dbyings dang // bla med dngos grub dam pa blang // zhes so// lnga pa spyod pa ni/ gtsang sbra sogs phyi'i kun spyod kyi grogs dang ldan pa'i
199b2(rnying rgyud): sgo nas gtso bor lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas rang gzhan gyi don spyod pa ste/ rtse mo las/ lha yi ting 'dzin la gnas te// sems can thams cad yongs mi gtod// rtag tu sangs rgyas yid la byed// rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod pa mchog/ ces so// du/
199b3(rnying rgyud): ba dbras bu ne/ me tshe gsum na stug po bkod pa'i sa la sru gas mA ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can du 'tshang rgya bar 'dod ste/ kun byed las/ yo ga stug po bkod 'dod pas// mi tshe gsum na grol bar 'dod// ces dang / thugs kyi sgo lhags pas/
199b4(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin bag chags lnga byang nas// ye shes lnga yi rtsal dag gis// stug po bkod pa'i sa non nas// rig lnga 'dus pa'i 'bras bu thob// phye med chos su dag pa ni// skye med sgo nas 'gro don mdzad// phyag rgya rigs lnga longs spyod rdzogs// byung
199b5(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa'i 'gro don rdzogs// sprul pa bye bras yu yis// rigs drug ngo la cir yang ston// zhes so// gnyis pa nad pa thabs kyi byeg pa la/ bskyed rdzogs gsum so so'i dbye ba bshad pa/ rgyud galhung 'di nyid de gsum gang yin la dpyad pa'o//
199b6(rnying rgyud): dang po ni/ bla ma kha cig/ nang pa madz+nyA yo ga'i skol mdo ni gzhung thil po yi na pas sbyar mi dgos par bzhed la/ a rbu dang a tI yo ga'i skol mdo ni 'dir ma sbyar kyang chog mod kyi/ de lta na'ang / 'og tu gzhung 'di nyid bskyed rdzogs gsum gang yin ngos 'dzin
199b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshe so so'i mtshan nyid phyed pa la mkho bar 'gyur ba'i phyir cung zad bri bar bya'o// de'ang rang shar las/ nang pa la ni gsum du 'dod// ma hA a nu a ti'o// zhes pas/ chud ma hA yog/ lung a nu yog/ man ngag a ti yo ga'o// de gsum
200a1(rnying rgyud): sh+ya/ gyi khyad par la/ glan rtsub par bas rje Tar rdung ba la zlas pa'i lanaH/ rig pa'i tshe 'phrul du snang ba mad+ha/ rang rig pa'i rtsal dru dang ba aH/ reg la rang snang ba a tin+te/ ru dga' ba rjongs/ cho 'phrul rtsal dang rang snang
200a2(rnying rgyud): ba'o// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir gsungs skad de'i don ni/ chos thams cad sems nyid snang stong dbyed med kyi zong phral du rtogs pa ma hA yo ba// chos thams cad sems nyid dbyings ye gnyis su med pa'i rtsal du rtogs pa a nu/ chos thams cad sems nyid
200a3(rnying rgyud): ye nus kyi 'gag med pa'i rang byung gi ye shes rang snang bar rtogs pa a ti ste wA ba'i sgo nas khyad par phye ba'o// de la ma bU k+ka na gnyis kag ces nor du bzhed do// yang / sgo gong bu pa'i rdal nas/ med 'dzin tshe chung yin te/ spyo dpag tso che ba ma hA ting nge 'dzin
200a4(rnying rgyud): gtso chi ba a nu/ lta ba gtso che ba a ti'o gsung / yang / lha rje rog/ ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis lha rim par bskyed pa'i phyir bgyed pa ma hA/ de la mi brten par lha rdzogs tshul du bskyed pa rdzogs pa a nA/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis las grol bas bskyed du med pa
200a5(rnying rgyud): nordzogs pa chen po a ti'am/ yang na/ rgyud kyi dngos po bcul ched 'don cheb ma hA/ de bas srung ba Ana?/ ched 'dzin lus grol ba e tI 'o gsung / mai rtag byung grags gyon pa nas/ yod babye 'ardzogs gus ma g.yod kyang / bskyed rimA hA rtsa
200a6(rnying rgyud): bor ston pa ma hA/ rdzogs rim gtso bor ston pa a nu/ de gnyis kyi rtsol ba dang bral ba rdzogs pa chen po ste/ dmyal lo kun nor yang des tshig gi khyad par la 'odi legs par bzhed de// kun mkhyen chen po na/ gzul bya zhe sdang shas che zhing
200a7(rnying rgyud): rtog pa mang pa'i don du snang ba thabs kyi rang bzhin pargyud ma hA yog/ 'dod chags shes che zhing sems gnas pa la dga' ba'i don du stong pa de kho na nyid kyi rdzogs rim shes rab ma'i rgyud ana?/ gti mug shas che zhing bya rtsol can gyi don du gnyis su med pa'i
200b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin a ti yog bstan te/ bkod pa chen po las/ sems yas pa la bskyed pa ste// sems bzung can la rdzogs pa'o// mchog gsang rab la rdzogs pa che// zhus gsungs pa'i phyir gsung zhing / sems nyid ngal gso las kyang / ma
200b2(rnying rgyud): tas rlung dang bskyed ri mo thabs gcol// a d+has khams dang rdzogs rim shes rabag to// a nyis thams cad gnyis med ye shes gaN+Do// zhes so// de las/ dang po mahA yo ga'i theg pa la/ ngo bo// des tshig/ dbye ba gsum/ dang po ni/
200b3(rnying rgyud): thabs bskyed pa'i rim pa la gtso bor brten pa'i sgo nas lhag pa bden par dbyer med kyi don la rtogs goms kyi sbyor ba 'grol ba thob pa'i rang bzhin no// gnyis pa ni/ many+dzu yo ga'i sgra las rnal 'byor chen po ste/ gnyis med kyi don la blong gyor bas yo

200b5(rnying rgyud): las/ slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // de ma zag pa bzhi pa ste// zhes so// de yang bum dpang la phan nus gnyis su phyebs lngar 'gyur te/ rdo rje las ni ma las// dbye ba rnam pa lta cu 'gyu re// bdag pa na nus pa gnyis ga'i las// zhes so//
200b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa bya ba'i 'jug sgo ni/ shes rab stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor dang / thabs snying rje lha ma dang phyag rgya phra rags te ting 'dzin gsum gyi sgo nas 'jug ste/ bskyed rim gtso bor ston pa'i lam yin pa'i phyir/ de ltar yang rang shar las/ 'jug
200b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i don ting 'dzin rnam pa gsum// zhes dang / yang 'gyed 'phrul lde las/ mahA yo ga'i dadug rnon// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rmi nas 'dug/ chos so// gnyis pa lta ba ni/ rig pa cwom thal la snang ba ba nyid kyi grwar kun thu cu 'dod pa'i don dam
201a1(rnying rgyud): bden pa dang / de nyid kyirtsa pa rjog chags thams cad su dang ye shes kyi dkyi lug par du rang snang ba kun rdzob kyi bden par 'dod la/ de gnyis kyang phyung stong phyogs rab ma ldan te/ ngab dbyar mi byed par mnyam pa nyid du
201a2(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i phyir/ tha snyad du dbyer med ces parjod na'ang / der 'dzin pa'i bas ma brjod kyi yul las 'das pa'i phyir/ dbyer med spyod yul dang bral ba'o// de ltar yang rnam bkod yas/ lhag pa'i mnyam nyid dbyer med don// ming grangs cir yang
201a3(rnying rgyud): bstan mod kyang // don du skabs ma yul las 'das// zhes dang / lam ri ma las/ de ming zhen pa sgrol phyir las// tha snyad gnyis par bsam brjod 'das// zhes so// gsum pa tshul khrims ni/ gsang sngags phyi 'gyur ba rnams/ bsrung bya'i

201a6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub par bye ba'o// zhes gsungs shing / chu dang der ni/ tsa ba lnga dang / yan lag bcur bshad do// bzhi pa bsgom pa Sh+Ta/ drug sde gci la byis pa dang / rgyud sdegatso bor byas pa'i lugs gnyis/ dang po nI/ 'ja me pa' kyi srang 'o po da
201a7(rnying rgyud): brten nas bde gshegs sku'i grub pa dang / rta skad phrengs gsum la brtan nas pad+ma gsung gi grub pa dang / rdugs rig pa rang byung gi ye shes yang dag drub pa gcig bul brten nas drug rdo rje'i sbub pa dang / nga khor 'das kyi chos thams cad yon tan du rdzogs par
201b1(rnying rgyud): ston pa bdud rtsi yon tan gyi sgrub pa dang / mngon spyod sde pas kyis gdug pa can 'dul brje thabs gtsa bar ston pa zur pa phrin las kyi sgrub pa ste la shes lha'i khub snrel dang / ma mdzad gtad / drag sngags dmod pa/ 'jig rten mdzun pa stad kyi rtsu ba
201b2(rnying rgyud): stethun mong gi sgrub sde gsum mo// gnyis pa ni/ s+thir ma hA yo ga la'ang pha ma gnyis med kyi rgyud gsum gyi dbye bas/ gsar 'dres la sogs papa rgyud du bskyed rim thabs kyi cha dang / de'i rdzogs rim kyang rlung gtso bor byed pa sngags la stor rnam par mi rtog
201b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgol gyis nyams su len par 'dod/ bded dgyes yang dag sogs ma rgyud rnams su bskyed rim gyi spros pa shas chung zhing / shes rab rdzogs pa'i rim pa khams byang chub kyi sems thig le gtso bor byed pa'i bde stod rnam par mi rtog pa de tshul gyis nyams

201b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis nyams su len par 'dod do// 'dir rgud gzhung 'di nyid kyi dbang na brus twe bshwad na/ ri ma gsum las/ mtshan ma bsgom pa'i rim pa dang // de bzhin nyid ni bsgom pa yi// bye brag rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// zhes pa/ mtshan

201b7(rnying rgyud): bsgo ma dang / nges rdzogs gnyis las/ dang po ni/ ting nge 'dzin la brtan pa mthob kyang rnam pa tsam bsgom pa nub gcig la bskyed rim gyi cho ga'i yan lag tshang ba nyams su len pa lta bu/ gnyis pa ni/ zag bcas tshogs skyod kye rnal 'byor lnga dang / zag med rig
202a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rnam pa bzhi'o// rdzogs rim las/ steng sgo 'ju 'dul gyi man ngag dang / 'og sgo khams gsum rol pa'i man ngag gnyis te/ rim gsum las/ gdams ngag steng dang 'og gi sgo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ gnyis pa
202a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan med ni/ chos nyid de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'o// lngapa spyod pa ni/ thabs la mkhas pa'i gdeng gis zin pas 'khor ba'i chos ci la'ang ma chags par spyod pa ste/ bang mdzod 'phrul rje las/ bskyed pa ma hA yog ni// ta nA dang ni ga Na dang /
202a3(rnying rgyud): ngam rdzas bdud rtsi rnga po la// thabs chen lta ba'i spyod pas spang // ces so// drug pa 'bras bu ni/ tshe 'di 'am par dor sna lnga ldan gyis grub pa'i bdag nyid mngon du byed pa ste/ gsang 'dus las/ 'di ni bcom ldan padag nyid che// sku gsum mi byed las byung ba/
202a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes rgya mtsho rnam pa rab can// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// zhes dang / ye shes thig le las/ yang na lus ni spangs ma thag/ brtson pa mi ldan pas kyang 'grub// ces so// gnyis pa lung a nu yo ga 'i dag pa la/ ngo bo/ nges tshig/ dbye ba gsum/ da
202a5(rnying rgyud): po ni/ shes rab rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gtso bor brten pa'i sgo nas dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i don la rtogs soms kyi spyod pas grol ba thob pa'i rang bzhin no// gnyis pa ni/ a nu yog ste shes rab rjes chags kyi lam gtso bor ston pa'i phyir rjes su rnal 'byor
202a6(rnying rgyud): ro// gsum pa dbye ba drug gi/ dang po 'dug rgo la gnyis las/ dang po dbang ni/ a nu'i dkyil 'kho du rtsi nang sgrub gsang bzhis bsdus pa'i dbang cho ga sum cu rtsa drug ste/ kun 'dus las/ phyi yi dbang dang nang gi dbang // grub pa'i dbang dang
202a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang // bcu dang bcu gcig bcu gsum dang // rnam pa gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur// zhes so// de la kha cig/ de ltar spros pa'i rtsa bso drug las yan lag gi dbang brgyad brgya po gcig tu bye ba ni theg pa dgu ka'i dbang yin te/ dbang don
202b1(rnying rgyud): ban+d+has pa lus/ yag las gas zug drugalas// rtswa dab btud kyi thabs bya// zhes sogs dang // dbang dun rnam par 'khyud pa las// brgya las byang chub rigs can 'gyur// bcug cig gsad ba nad par 'gyur// bcug sam tha mtshan pa gra/
202b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi theg dgu'i dbang rdzogs pa'o// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ a r+tha'i dgos dbang du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ skyon med de/ theg rim dgu dang tshul mthun pas theg dgu'i dbang du mir btags par bla ma mkhas pa rnams bzhed pa bzhin yin gyi/ mdo dbang
202b3(rnying rgyud): 'chad pa po phal gyi 'dod pa ltar ma yin te/ gal te yin na/ a nu yo ga'i dbang gi nang du gong ma a ti yo ga'i dbang 'du bar khas len dgos pa'i phyir ha cang thal te/ phyi rgyud kyi nang du nang pa'i thun min gyi chos skad mi 'byung ba bzhin no// de ltar yang / bdag
202b4(rnying rgyud): gi rje bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa'i zhal nas/ rtsa ba a nu'i cho ga la/ theg brgyad dgos chos bye brag tu// skur pa nyid la ltos dgos na// an+d+ra'i mtshan gzhir ji ltar nges// zhes gsungs pa'i phyogs snga ma nyid du gnas pa'i phyir 'thad pa ma yin no// gnyis pa
202b5(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i 'dzag sgo ni/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas 'jug ste/ kun byed lasA/ a r+ya dbyer med pa 'dod pa'i// dbyings dang ye shes sgor zhugs nas// zhes so/ ji ltar 'jug ce na// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis te// blugs
202b6(rnying rgyud): kye sgo lcags las/ skye med dbyings nyid ye shes te// ye shes rig pa dbyings nyid tshul// gnyis med rol pa bde ba che// rim par 'jug pa ma yin te// snang srid phyag rgya thams cad la// rgyal nya ldang ji bzhin du// thug phrad snang srid phyag rgya che/
202b7(rnying rgyud): zhes so// gnyis pa lta ba ni/ chos thams cad rang gi sems yin la/ de nyid phye med spros pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin yum kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa ste/ ye ji bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes kyang bya'o// de ltar yang spyi mdo las
203a1(rnying rgyud): sems las byung ba stod nyid pas// de las byung ba thams cad stong // zlas so// lce mod de nyid thams cad du mi dgag par rig pa rang krung rjod kyi dkyil 'khor rdugs la ba ni ye shes kun tu bzang po'am/ rang bzhi/
203a2(rnying rgyud): ldan srab dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste// de las/ brtags na ma mthong cir yang snang ba nyid// ces so// de gnyis ngo bo tha mi dad par gsal ba ni/ dbyings ye shes gnyis su med pa'i sras bde ba chen po ste rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de ltar
203a3(rnying rgyud): yang snga ma las/ gsang sngags zhes bya ba ni/ spad pa dang mi snang ba gnyis su med pa/ gnyis kyi ngo bo las grol ba/ dbu mar mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de kho na nyid do// zhes so// 'i phyir/ chos thams cad dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum dbyer
203a4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i rang bzhin rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor du ye nas sangs rgyas par blta ba ste/ de las/ thams cad de nyid der gcig pas// ye nas sangs rgyas bde rten nyid// phye 'gag med pa'i snying po yin// bya byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum// ye
203a5(rnying rgyud): nas grub zin lhun gyis grub// ces dang / g.yu thang las/ snang srid bzang mo'i mkha shor las// ma bskyed dkyil 'khor kun bzang shar// shar ba nyid na shA ba med// yab yum sras bcas bde chen po// lhan rdzogs/ zhes so// de'ang kun tu
203a6(rnying rgyud): bzang po'i rol pa ma 'gags pa'i rtsal lha sbur 'char bar 'dod de/ kun 'dus las/ kun bzang rdzogs chen ye nas brda' bal// gyi nang gsang ba bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// spang srid rnam dag lga dang lha mo'i dbyings// zhes dang / bang mdzad
203a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul we las/ rdzogs pa a tra yog ni// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// lha dang lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i tshul du 'dod// ces so// gsum pa tshul khrims ni/ don bsdus las/ gzhi 'dzin pa ni dmatshig
203b1(rnying rgyud): !/ nag+sas na shA gnas s+ho// ba ldan pagal rdzos pa// nga dub ta// rtswa mgasung la sa nga du smra dang bab byas smran/ nA na/
203b2(rnying rgyud): mdangs pa'i mchog pa ni/ phrin ma gon bcad/ ga pa'i bAn/ bat+tAl na sa / gduni/ sgrub pa'i hUM/ kyim rgyad kyi ni/ bdud pa spang ba/ dkri zhi gzhom pa/ pa'i da mchog rnam pa sa dbu ma dpa
203b3(rnying rgyud): su sa na
203b4(rnying rgyud): dang // dmatshig 'di ni nang po che// kun gyi thun mong ma yin gyir// mos pa chung ngu thams cad la// bsrung ba'i mtshams dag bzung bar byas// zhes so// bzhib bsgom pa lnga/ don bsdus las/ ngo bo thabs dang shes rab ste// zhes pas/ thabs
203b5(rnying rgyud): lam dang / grol lam gnyis las/ dang po ni// gle gro 'khor lo bzhi'am drug bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor dang / 'og tha ma pa' gsang gnyis kyi snyoms 'dug la brten nas lhan b+h+yas kyi ye skyes bskyed pa'i thabs te/ de las/ rol pa'i ka ra la sogs pa
203b6(rnying rgyud): man ga zubs kyis de 'jug dang / dugasungs pa'i / gnyis bu la/ don spyod pa dang / sa kying pa nas/ dang ba ni/ sdom med da mdza rten khyod nge 'dzin / rnam rjid rnying po badzin pa'i nga las gos myed gyimam
203b7(rnying rgyud): par 'dog pa'o// de ltar yang / rdza mede las/ de bzhin pa cho nyid la// de bzhin pa'i thobazhag nas// sa ma med pa dang shi las// sa sangs spyan dudran pa // zhe no// gnyis pa ni/ smras bcas rgyal ting 'dzinaH/ rdzag
204a1(rnying rgyud): brjod pa tsam gyis chu las nya ldang ba ltar/ snod bcud lha'i dkyil 'khor gsal la ma 'dres par cig car du bsgom pa gtso bor byed pa'i nyams len no// de ltar yang bang mdzod 'phrul lde las// a nu yo ga'i theg par ni/
204a2(rnying rgyud): snying po tsam zhig brjod byas nas// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i lha ru bsgom// zhes dang / kun 'dus las/ sdang srid rnam dag lha dang lha mo'i dbyings// 'byung dang 'byung gyur yab yum lhan rdzogs rnams// zhes so// de'ang spyir nges rdzogs bsgom
204a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam la/ zag bcas dang zag med gnyis las/ dang po ni/ 'dun pa sems kyi rnal 'byor dang // rig chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor ro// gnyis pa ni/ dbugs chen 'byin pa'i/ lung chen thob pa'i// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor
204a4(rnying rgyud): ro// lnga bskyod pa ni/ spyir mnyam pa nyid la gtso bor spyod pa ste/ bang mdzod 'phrul lde las/ rdzogs pa a nu yo ga ni// dbyings dang ye shes longs spyod rdzogs// zhes so/ bye brag tu dbye na/ byin gyis rdzo ba dang / dbang sgyur dang / thabs
204a5(rnying rgyud): kyi spyod pa gsum ste/ spyi mdo las// byin gyis rlob gyi spyod pa dang // dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod pa ste// dper na nam mkha' rgyal po'am// ji ltar me dpung chu bo 'dra// zhes so// drug pa 'bras bu ni/ tshe gcig gis 'bras chos nyer lnga dbyer med lhan
204a6(rnying rgyud): grub kyi ngo bo sku bzhi'i bdag nyid bde ba chen po'i sku mngon du byed de/ thig le mchog gi byung las/ 'od gsal ba yi sems nyid ni// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med par// bde ba ched su bsgom pa// 'bras bu tshe 'dar rdzogs 'tshang rgya// zhes dang /
204a7(rnying rgyud): bang mdzod 'phrul lde las// a nu yo ga'i theg pa ni// bar mchod pa'i tshe gcig gis// sangs rgyas sa la nges par 'gro// zhes so// gsum pa man ngag a ti yo ga'i theg pa la/ ngo bo/ nges tshig/ dbye ba gsum/ drang po ni/ 5
204b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas pa'i don rang thog tu grol bar byed pa'i thabs/ sang blang dogs dang thal ba'i rang bzhin can no// gnyis pa ni/ a ti yo ga ste/ bgyid tshogs gnyis ka'i rdzogs rim mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir dang / zag pa thams cad kyi rtse mor gyur pa'i/
204b2(rnying rgyud): kyir shin tu rnal 'byor ro// gsum pa dbye na drug gi/ dang po 'jug sgo la gnyis las/ dang po dbang ni/ rig pa'i rtsal dbang la sogs pas smin par byas pa'o// gnyis pa bya ba'i 'jug sgo na/ tse yang 'jug tu med pa'i sgo nas 'jug ste/ kun byed
204b3(rnying rgyud): las/ chos la bya ru med pa'i phyir// rtsol ba med pa'i sgo nas 'jug/ ces so// gnyis pa lta ba ni/ snang srid 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad thig le chen po chos kyi sku rang byung gi ye shes chen po'i ngo bor bya rtsol med par yi nas
204b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas par 'dod ste/ nam mkha' che las/ rang byung ye shes rtsol med las// grol nas grol ba'i lam yang ston// zhes dang / khyung chen las/ rang byung ye shes mi rtog kun tu ji bzhin gnas// zhes so// gsum pa tshul
204b5(rnying rgyud): khrims ni/ med pa dang phul ba la sogs pa'i dam tshig las mi 'da' bar bya ba ste/ yang 'byed 'phrul sde las/ a ti lo ga'i dam tshig ni// med pa dang ni phyul pa dang // gcig pu dang ni spyan gyis grub// de yi don las 'da' mi bya/
204b6(rnying rgyud): zhes so// bzhi pa bsgom pa ni// a ti bkod pa chen po las// yid can rnams la sems kyi sde// nam mkha' can la klong gi sde// rim rtsol bral la man ngag sde// zhes pa ltar/ reg stong chos sku'i ngang du 'jog pa sems sde/ chos nyid bya
204b7(rnying rgyud): tshal med pa'i ngang du 'jog pa klong sde/ ye grol spang blang bral ba'i chos nyid kyi ngang du 'jog pa san ngag sde'o// de'ang spyir rdzogs pa chen po'i lugs kyi bsgom pa ni/ khregs gcod dang / thod rgal gnyis su 'dra ste/ mu tig phreng ba las/ nyams
205a1(rnying rgyud): grangs khrigs gcod thod rgal lo// zhes so// de las dang po ni/ ka dag gi lta ba'i dang las ma g.yos par 'jog pa te/ khyung chen las// lhun gyi gnas pas bzhag pa yin// zhes dang / slodu
205a2(rnying rgyud): dpon dga' ra ba rdo rjes/ sems kyi rang bzhin ye nas bud+d+ha ste// sems la skye 'gag med pa nam mkha' 'dra// chos kun mnyam nyid yang dag don rtogs nas// de nyid ma btsal bzhag na bsgom pa yin// zhes a ti zab don snying por gsungs so//
205a3(rnying rgyud): de ltar bsgoms pas lam gyi bskyed rim bzhi ste// gnas dang mi g.yo mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub// ces gsungs pa'i phyir/ gnyis pa thod rgal ni/ gnad drug la brten nas snang bzhi rim par 'char ba ste/ chos nyid mngon sum/ nyams
205a4(rnying rgyud): gong 'phel/ rig pa tshad phebs/ chos nyid zad pa'i snang bas mthar phyin pa'o// lngab spyod pa ni/ cir snar chos nyid kyi rol par shar bas blang dor med par spyod pa ste/ nam mkha' che las/ bya ba med pas las rnams zin// zhes dang / bang mdzod 'phrul
205a5(rnying rgyud): lde las// a ti yo gA'i spyod pa ni// lha sgo ma srog dang ldan pa yis// shugs las byung ba'i spyod pa ni/ ji ltar smyon pa'i spyod pa bzhin// gad+ha la'ang thogs pa med par spyod// ces so// drug pa 'bras bu ni/ lhan rdzogs kun tu bzang po'i sa la da
205a6(rnying rgyud): nyid nas gnas pa mthar phyin pa ste/ gdeng bzhi tshad du phyin pas 'khor ba myang 'das su grol ba'o// de ltar yang / yang dbyed las/ rdzogs chen a ti'i 'bras bu ni// gdod nas snying po byang chub tu// thog med 'bras bu rang la smin/ zhes gsungs
205a7(rnying rgyud): so// gnyis pa la/ gong ma rnams kyi bzhi dang / zhung dgod pa/ de dag gi dgongs pa la brtag pa/ rang gi rtogs pa brjod pa dang gsum/ dang po ni/ dgongs pa mi mthun pa mang ste/ bstan/ man ngag rdzogs pa chen po rababral ba dang / bskyed pa ma hA
205b1(rnying rgyud): yog pathal ba grags bya sa dang bralas/ dang bani/ rmong dpon na 'odas ga dang kun pa sbyin nas pa 'dagongs pa ste/ del l+h+wam 'brelang/ srud 'di 'ganas sa byas sa dang can na rdzogs pa can pa dang san las/ gang yang dbyur med pa kya/
205b2(rnying rgyud): zhub po dang / ston pa po so sor ma h+ye nye/ 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ zhes smos so// zhes gsungs la/ de lta na'ang / 'grel ba 'dir rgyud don phal cher brjod bya'i cho ga re'ang ma hA yo ga dang / a ti yo ga'i dbang du byas nas 'grel tshul gnyis
205b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis snang ngo // kun mkhyen thos de ni/ rdzogs chen la'ang bskyed rdzogs gnyis med sems dang ye shes rang spang ba'i dkyil 'khor du bstan pa dang / bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa la mi ltos par sems nyid ye sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa dang / ye shes
205b4(rnying rgyud): rang snang ba'i ngo bor sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa gsum las/ 'dir dang po nyid do zhes bzhed/ gnyis pa ni/ sgeg rdor/ sangs rgyas gsad pa/ gnubs chen sogs dang / zur pa'i bka' stsol 'dzin pa phal che ba'i dgongs pa ste/ de'ang
205b5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas gsang ba'i lam rim che chung la sogs par ma hA ltar bkral zhing / gnubs kyi rnal 'byor mig gi bsam gtan gyi 'grel bar ma hA'i 'dod gzhung 'chad pa'i tshe'ang rgyud 'di la brten nas bshad pa mdzad la/ slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rje ni/ mahA
205b6(rnying rgyud): la pha ma gnyis med kyi rgyud gsum du phye ba las/ de gsum ka'i spyi rgyud du bzhed de/ war khab las/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa thabs kyi rgyud dang / dpal bde ba'i mchog la sogs pa shes rab rgyud dang / dpal sangs rgyas
205b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba la sogasu ma mi ning gi rgyud do// de las dpal gsang ba'i phung po 'di ni/ thams cad kyi don dang sku 'bras tshang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ rgyud thams cad kyi spyi yin par gsungs so// zhes dang / rje gro phug pa dang grol gsung rnam gnyis kyi khon/
206a1(rnying rgyud): dbub las kyang de ltar 'byung ngo // wA dze sA skyon na/ rdzogs pa tron nu drang yang bgyid pa'i dam pa shas chebs mad+hU lags/ zhes gsungs/ yang gal nag/ TA tA ga pa g+sa nga gnyis med kyi byang du bdang/ dwe
206a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis/ lha rje rog ni/ thabs shes zab pa dang / rgya che ba gnyis su med par ston pa'i phyir gnyis med do gsung / nyang TIka pa/ lha phreng ltar rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul la'ang gsum du phye ba'i 'di ma hA'i a ti'o gsung / de ltar na 'grel pa nyi
206a3(rnying rgyud): a tir bkral ba'ang der 'gyur ram sbrum te/ de dang lha phreng gi a tir 'jog pa'i dgongs pa des cher mthun pa'i phyir/ gnyis pa las/ a ti dang ma hA ra 'dod pa'i phyogs gnyis la log rtog bsal ba/ nang tshan gyi dbye tha mos kyi'i lus kyi dbye ba phyed dbug med
206a4(rnying rgyud): du 'gyur bar bstan pa'o// dang po ni/ gong ma rnams kyi a tir bkral ba phal cher ma hA'i rdang gses kyi gsum du gye ba la dgongs pa 'am/ yang na sher phyen sngags lugs su bkral ba ltar ma hA'i gzhung a ti'i lugs su bkral bar mngon la/ gzhan du rgyang
206a5(rnying rgyud): lung man ngag gsum spyi'i dbye bas phye ba'i a tir bzhed pa'o snyam du rtog na mi rigs te/ rnal 'byor mig gi bas ma gau tan las/ sngags nang pas gsol ba/ rang reg pa gnyis su med pa de bzhin nyid kyi dang du gsal ba la/ sAg rnga snang du zad de su
206a6(rnying rgyud): dang skye mched lha'i dkyil 'khor lags pa'i don de las lhag pa ci btsal/ zhes pa'i lan du/ a ti sa/ de bzhin nyid du gnyis su med pa la// skur byed don byed rtsol ba bcug pas nor// gya med ti pa 'dzin don la nam yang reg mi nus// de phyir
206a7(rnying rgyud): grub rgyal po nga nyid gcig pur byung // zhes dang / kun byed las/ ma hA rdo rje 'chang 'dod pas// thabs dang shes rab sgor zhugs nas// rang chud dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bsnyen grub rnams bzhis grub par byed// a ta yo ga'i bde
206b1(rnying rgyud): rtsol brgyab 'das pa'i byang chub sems// zhan lags rgyas par gsungs pas gnod pa 'a phyir dang / masa'i bkol mdor spos pa sgyur gyi u tu dgas chos rnams kyang gzung 'das gca bar smyon pa'i phyir dang / slokha dpon ba byi thong po'i mnyam
206b2(rnying rgyud): sbyor gyi 'grel brgyud don rnam bshad las kyang / gsang sngags kyi rgyud mtha' dag bstan/ mtshon bya gzhi'i rgyud dang / mtshon byed yi ge'i rgyud do// mtshon byed kyi rgyud la/ bya ba'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang / rnal 'byor gyi rgyudadang
206b3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud do// de la bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum du rtse ste/ dang po rgyud kyi rnam grangs bco brgyad du gsungs pa las/ zhes tan+t+ra bco brgyad po rgyud lung man ngag gsum las/ rgyud du gsungs pa'i phyir dang / bskyed rdzogs gas
206b4(rnying rgyud): mi yul du babs pas gnas tha dad par gsungs pa las/ ma hA ni rgyal po dza'i khang steng du glegs bam dang bcas te babs par grags pa ltar/ 'di'ang der babs par bshad pa sogs kyis gnod pa'i phyir ro// yang ma hA yo ga nyid du bzhed pa'i
206b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs kyi dgongs pa 'grel tshul la'ang brtag par bya ba ni yod de/ slar khab las pha ma gnyis med kyi rgyud gsum ka'i spyir bzhed pa nyid/ gnyis med kyi rgyud kyi go don pha ma gnyis cha mnyam par ston pa la bzhag pa ltar/ de gnyis kyi don tshang/
206b6(rnying rgyud): par bstan pas gnyis med kyi rgyud kyi don kyang bstan par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ che ba'i ngos nas de gsum gyi spyi rgyud ces smos pa las/ ngo bo gnyis med kyi rgyud yin par dgongs so zhes bshad na legs par mngon la/ gzhan du na rgyud thams cad kyi spyi zhes
206b7(rnying rgyud): pa'ang / nang spyad bregasu ma pa ni'i gyi byed du bzhed pa pa yin te/ 'di nyid las/ mtshan nyid dang byud thams cad kyi na rtse/ zhes dang / le lag la sa// srang gi kyi 'di shi tu zab pa'i phyir// zhes dang / 'brel ba 'dzin rtogs las/
207a1(rnying rgyud): ru grags pa yi// rnam par dbye ba lngar 'gyur// zhes sogs dang dgangs pa mthun pa te/ thams cad kyi don dang rgyu 'bras tshang bar 'byung ba'i phyir/ zhes gsungs pasas// de bas na/ che ba'i ngas nas lung tham
207a2(rnying rgyud): cad kyi spyi dang / rang gi ngo bo gnyis med kyi drung du gzhag par bya ste/ dper na gsang 'dus kyi rgyud nyid/ mdo sde dang rgyud sde thams cad kyi snod dang rtsu bar gsungs shing / ngo bo pha chud du bzhed pa bzhin no// yang kha cig na re/ rgyad 'di ma hA ra 'do
207a3(rnying rgyud): pa mi rigs te/ lha phreng las bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi rdzogs pa chen po'i skabs su rgyud 'di dang sbyar nas/ rtog chags lhar dag tshul dang / rtogs pa bzhi yi gtan tshig dang / mtshan nyid gsum sogs ston pas gnod pa'i phyir zhe na/ skyon med
207a4(rnying rgyud): bang rdug sde pa zan pa 'dzin ni/ maN+Dal gsam gyi ba'i yin par/ ga pa ban pa kar 'bad pa dang / de bzhig pa 'jugs kyi kyi cu dang gnas cing 'dus pasags pas kyang ldan pa'i phyi / gzang naman 'phral lam
207a5(rnying rgyud): cig car ston pa'i gzhung du rje sgo phrag pa bzhed par grags shing grub pa'i phyir ro// yang kho na re/ mahA la nang gses kyi bskyed rdzogs gsum du phye ba de 'dra mi rigs te/ de ltar 'byed rigs pa'i tshad ma med pa'i phyir zhe na/ rtags ma grub ste/
207a6(rnying rgyud): kun khyab kyi tshad ma gsum gyis 'grub pa'i phyir/ de la lung ni/ 'di nyid las/ sru dang gsung dang thugs kyi drung // ces dang / dgongs 'dus las/ dbang sgyur thabs kyi theg pa yang // yul gyis rnam pa gsum snang ste// bslad
207a7(rnying rgyud): dang rdzogs dang yongs su rdzogs// zhes so// man ngag ni/ bde 'dus sgrub pa lung gi bka' 'go las// yog rnam pa gsum la dgu dgur bka' stsal pa'i/ ma hA She ma hA ni lha'i dkyil 'khor rim pas bskyed pa'o// ma hA'e a
207b1(rnying rgyud): du ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ldan gyis thub dang // mahA a tin don dmang po mthos par// zhes sags dang / gsang sngags bka rje mig lngas kyang gas sngags thams cad chung wang man dag gsum durje/ der ral 'ang ga
207b2(rnying rgyud): gsum dgur phye ste/ rgyud kyi rgyud/ rgyud kyi lung / rgyud kyi man ngag/ ces sogs gsungs so// rigs pa ni/ rgyud 'dir bkan gyi e nu a ti dang / dgongs 'dus kyi a ti ga~M nyis/ de dang de'i nang gses kyi a rbu dang a tir bzhag
207b3(rnying rgyud): dgos te/ gzhan du 'og mas gong ma 'dini mi mthong bar bzhed pa'i bstan pa sti skad kyi phyag rgya las 'das par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / gsang sngags kyi 'gyur ba la grags pa ltar / pha rgyad 'dus pa/ ma rgyad bde mchog/ gnyis myo
207b4(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyud dus 'khor la sogs pa de dag kyang / snga 'gyur rang skad kyi ma hA la gsum du bye ba'i ma rgyud sogs ma yin no zhes 'dod dgos par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ bde mchog sogs mdo dang / dus 'khor sogs e ti ri thal ba bzlog tu med do//
207b5(rnying rgyud): de'i phyir 'di nyid las/ rnam par tharlab brgyad kyi rtababs dang ldan pa/ zhes pa'i skabs kyi 'grel chung pin+d+ha thar/ nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub dang // bya ba'i chung dang gnyis ka'i rgyud// rnal 'byor bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi// rnam
207b6(rnying rgyud): thar brgyad phyir rta babs bcad // ces rdzogs pa man chad bgrod nas thob bya don gyis rdzogs chen du bshad pa'ing / mahA'i rdzogs chen rgyud 'di nyid la dgongs pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni/ !sgom spyod pa sogs la mi 'dra ba'i
207b7(rnying rgyud): khyad par sngar bros pa ltar bskyed rdzogs gsum ka la yod pa'i phyir/ de rnams gang gtso bor ston pa'i sgo nas dbye bar bya bar yin gyi/ phyogs ri nas bzung ste bskyed rdzogs gsum spyi'i lus kyi dbye ba phyen zug med du 'gyur te/ bskyed rdzogs gsum
208a1(rnying rgyud): 'gal ba ba yin pa'i gnad kyis bka' gyu 'phrul dra ba ga zug cig gi nang dung de gsum ka tshang bar nges pa'i phyir/ de ltar yang bdud rtsi bas bcad las/ rgyang dang wang dang man ngag gsum// dmangs dang rje dang rgyal po'i tshul/
208a2(rnying rgyud): gcig la gcig brten gcig gi dang // zhes so// gsum pa rang gi rtogs pa brjod pa ni/ chud gzhung 'di nyid ma hA yog la gsum du bye ba'i gnyis med kyi rgyud da ngos bzung ngo // de ltar na/ der 'jog byed kyi khungs dang / khyad par
208a3(rnying rgyud): zhig yod ce na/ lan du/ khungs smos pa dang / khyad par bstan pa gnyis las/ dang po ni// dur khrod bde ba'i dpe chung rang gnas las// 'bras dang ni sA rab ma nang chud// bstan pa'i yig lam rkyen du gsungs// zhes pa
208a4(rnying rgyud): 'grel par bi ma las/ dpal bde mchog dang / de bI dA la sogs shes rab kyi rgyud dang / dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor thabs kyi rgyud dang / dpal gsang ba'i snying po sogs ma ning gi sbyar yi ger bkod
208a5(rnying rgyud): dzin na dzama'i rkyen dungs te/ zhes dang / bde 'dus gsang sngags pasa'i sde'ig tu tung phre ma na dgags ma dang thugs su zla ba'i thab / de skad du/ rgyud kyi mi na ga ni/ sems dang mi shes dang snang dbyer med gas pa'i snying po la rgyas
208a6(rnying rgyud): te/ so// ga'adul/ gtsobo dang / phal pa gzhes/ rnyeb mo// kye 'du las/ dem babyed pa'i 'a ngang namagasam pa pa babyed das/ dkyi la mang bkyimatshan cing gom sa pa sa 'tha //
208a7(rnying rgyud): lo/ dodangs sre gag zed pa'i gradang sas dang / rnam par mag pa'i dod thal tu phyi byi sa las kyang mamams pa/ sarbabatu bags pa gcug tsho rnam gsas par gro zhing shas las rje'i bar bamasangs ma//
208b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul ni/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad dbyer med par su gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin ye nas yin par rtogs nas bsgom pa ste/ zhes gsungs pa ltar/ 'dir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
208b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du rtogs nas bsgom pa gtso bor ston pa'i phyir dang / rdzogs rim gyi skabs su/ gsang dbang gi lam thabs lam steng sgogatso bor ston pa la rgyud/ shes rab ye shes kyi lam 'og sgo las rgya'i rnal 'byor gtso bor ston pa ma rgyud/ dab
208b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa'i lam rdzogs pa chen po gtso bor ston pa gnyis med kyi rgyud du bzhed pa las/ 'dir thabs la ma steng 'og gi sgo gnyis kyang cha sgoms par ston cing / khyad par dbang bzhi pa'i lam gtso bor ston pa'i phyir gnyis med kyi rgyad do// gnyis pa ni/ thabs
208b4(rnying rgyud): de kho na nyid rgya che ba gtso bor ston pa pha rgyad/ shes rab kyi de nyid zab pa gtso bor ston pa ma rgyud las/ 'dir dbang dang phrin sgrub sogs rgya che ba dang / rdzogs rim sogs zab lam dag gnyis su med par ston pa'i phyir dang / lha rnams kyi rnam pa'ang cha
208b5(rnying rgyud): lugs kyi khyad par zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor du pha chud ltar ston kyang / khro dkyil du ma rgyud ltar ston pa'i phyir gnyis med kyi rgyud du gzhag par bya'o// gsum pa rjod byed rgyud kyi khyad par la phyi nang gi rgyud sde spyir bshad pa dang / sgyu 'phrul dra ba bye brag tu bshad pa'o// /
208b6(rnying rgyud): dang po ni// kI ya'i rgyud la spyi bye brag gnyis las/ spyi rgyud ni bzhi ste/ gsang ba skye chud/ legs grub/ dpung bzang / bsam gtan gyi ma'o// bye brag ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs gsum dang / 'jig rten pa'i rigs la nor bu'i
208b7(rnying rgyud): glang po'i/ lngas chen gyi/ ba la glang gi/ phal pa'i rigs te/ rigs drug gi so so'i rgyud mang du bzhugs pa rnams so// spyod pa'i rgyud ni/ rnam snang mngon byang / phyag rdor dbang bskur/ rdo rjes 'og gi rgyud la sogs pa'o// yog la/ rtsa chud
209a1(rnying rgyud): nga pa/ ngan rgya ma dad pa / ba rna kyang byud la sags s+ho// byung la/ rna dang / la/ gas ga sa
209a2(rnying rgyud): brgyad las kha cig ma gtogs pa ste/ gsang 'dus sogs pa tud/ mnyam grong sogs ma chud/ su 'phrul drag sogs gnyis med kyi rgyud // a nu la/ kun 'dus/ kha phrag rol pa/ rnam srog sems ldang chen mo/ mdon ga / de
209a3(rnying rgyud): su grags pa spyi mdo dgongs 'dus la sogs pa rnams so// a ti la/ kun byed dang / sems sde ma bu bco brgyad sogs sems sde/ ye shes gsang ba sogs klong sde/ rgyad bcu bdun la sogs pa san ngag gi sde'o// gnyis pa ni/ ba
209a4(rnying rgyud): brgyad kyi sgos kyi rgyad rnams so// gnyis pa la/ rgyud kyi mtshan gzhi'i dbye ba dang / de dag gi yan lag ci tshul lo// dang po ni/ bur lugs pa phal cher/ sgyu 'phrul sde brgyad dang / bshad rgyud rje bzhir dbye bar mdzad de/ de la
209a5(rnying rgyud): brgyad ni/ sems dang ye shes dang sbrang du ston pa rtsa ba'i rgyud gsang ba snyir po/ rol pa mngon par brjod pa lha mo sgyu 'phrul dra ba/ dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ston pa sgyu 'phrul brgyad pa/ phrin las rdzogs par ston pa bzhi bcu pa/ dbang gcom
209a6(rnying rgyud): smon pa bla ma/ yon tan mthar phyin par ston pa brgyad cu pa/ sde snod yongs la khyab par ston pa 'jam dpal spya dra/ dam tshig mchog tu ston pa le lag dang brgyad do// bshad rgyud sde bzhi ni/ grol lam rim cig cad du ston pa ye shes
209a7(rnying rgyud): nga po dang / rdo rje me lang / thabs lam rim cig car du ston pa rgya mtsho dang / thal rgyad do// lha rje so ston// rol pa chen po bshar chud bzhi'i gras su bgrangs nas/ ye shes snying po de bzhiga'i bsus chu dang bzhen/ mag pa dang /
209b1(rnying rgyud): kun ma/ khyen chen po ni/ spu 'phrul sde bzhir bzhed ste/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rang snang dbyer med du ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' sgra 'phrul dra ba/ las tshogs rgyas par ston pa rnam par snar mdzad sku 'phrul drab/ sde sdong yod la khyab par sto
209b2(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal s+ya dra/ rol pa mngon par brjod pa lha mo skya dra'o// nor sems lha dra la'ang nang gses kyis dbye na/ rtsa rgyud snying po dang / bshad rgyud sde brgyad du bzhed do// gzhan yang rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po dang / sru phrul snying po bkod pa/
209b3(rnying rgyud): po stobs kyi rgyud sogs rgyad phran mang du bzhugs shing / spyir rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul drapal rgya gang na le'u 'bum phrag gcig bzhugs par grags so// gnyis pa la/ yan lag bdun ldan du dbye ba de rtsa bshad gnyis su bsdu ba'o// dang po na/
209b4(rnying rgyud): ru ka gal po las/ rtsa ba'i rgyud dang bshad pa'i rgyud// phyi ma phyi mar gyur pa dang // ma tshang kha skong dka' ba gcod// kalpa rtog pa dum bu rnams// zhes pa ltar brtsi na/ khyad par gyi mtshan nyid dang / mtshan gzhi'o// dang po ni/ thos ma
209b5(rnying rgyud): byung zhing bshad gzhir gyur pa ni rtsa chud/ ma tshang kha skor ba/ dka' ba gcod pa/ 'khrugs pa sdebs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can ni bshad pa'i rgyud/ chud snga mar gab pa mngon du phyung pa ni rgyud phyi ma/ der yang mi gsal bar gsal bar byed
