209b6(rnying rgyud): pa phyi ma'i phyi ma/ ma chong pa logs su gsungs pa kha skong gi rgyud/ dka' ba logs su bkral ba dka' ba gcod pa/ rtsa bshad nas logs su phyung ba kalpa dum bu'i rgyud do// gnyis pa la/ rtsa ba'i rgyud ni le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa 'di'o// bshad
209b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud ni/ bshad kyang sde bzhi la sogs pa'o// phyi ma'i chud ni/ glegs pam de nyid kyi phyi ma ni rtsa rgyud kyi phyi ma le'u nyer gsum pa dang nyer bzhi pa lta bu/ glegs pa ma gzhan gyi phyi ma ni rgyas pa'i phyi ma dang / phyi ma'i phyi ma lta bu/ de dag ni phyi
210a1(rnying rgyud): mu 'dra yin pa pa shud tshun kyang yin no// mtshang ba la skong gi srung rje/ brgyad rtsub/ bzhi bcwa pa/ bcad pa/ ShA / le lag rnams te/ ma n+ta ka/ dmadza'i rgyud yang yin no// dka'adug cod pa
210a2(rnying rgyud): ni/ snying po'i phyi ma dang khro bo stobs po che'i spyad lta bu'o// gnyis pa ni/ de dag kyang rga pa'i hud ni le'u nyer gnyis pa ste/ gzhan thams cad bshad rgyud du bsdu'o// de gnyis po'i khyad par gyi mtshan nyid la/ snga rabs pa rnams dgongs pa mi
210a3(rnying rgyud): mthun te/ so dar snying na re/ brjod bya mi gsal ba mun pa ltar gnas pa ni rtsa rgyad/ gsal byed snang ba ltar ston pa ni bshad rgyud do gsungs/ de ltar na/ snang mun dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ ca bshad gnyis phan tshun 'gal bar thal bas mi
210a4(rnying rgyud): 'thad do// yang bur lugs pa phal cher/ ston pa'i bdag nyid kyis gsungs pa rtsa rgyang/ 'chad pa'i skyes bus gsungs pa bshad rgyud do gsungs/ de ltar na brgyad cu la sogs kyang rtsa rgyud du 'gyur te/ rgyud gsungs pa'i gleng gzhi rtsa rgyang
210a5(rnying rgyud): dang tshig don khyad par med pa'i phyir dang / spar khab tu rtsa chud nyid kyang 'chad pa'i skyes bus gsungs par bzhed pas gnod do// yang nyung TIg pa na re/ gzhung gzhan la ma brten par don gzhan bskyed nus pa rtsa chud/ gyad kyis kyad kyi don
210a6(rnying rgyud): 'grel par byed pa bshad rgyad do gsungs pa mi 'thad de/ dang po ltar na rim gyis 'jug pa dag lam stegs kyi theg pa gzhan la brten mi dgos par thal/ 'di nyid kyis bskyed nus pa'i phyir/ 'dod mi nus te/ sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang //
210a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// zhes pas gsal/ gnyis pa ltar na rtsa ba'i rgyang 'di nyid kyang bshad rgyud du 'gyur te/ le'u bcu gcig pa'i/ sgrub pa'i zhag dang / zhes pa le'u dgu pa ru/ zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// zhes
210b1(rnying rgyud): sogs kyis bkral ba'i phyir ro// rog de gshegs chen po ni/ thog mar byung zhing bshad gzhir gyur pa ni ca rgyud/ rjes la byung zhing 'chad byed du gyur pa'i rgyud kyi dngos po gzhan du grub pa na bshad rgyud ces gsungs te/ legs par dgongs pa'o//
210b2(rnying rgyud): de ltar yang dur khrod rmad byung gi rgyud las/ thog mar gsungs pa rtsa ba'i hung // phyis nas gsung pa bshad pa'i rgyud// mdo tsam brjod pa tsA pa la// gsal bar byed pa bshad pa'i rgyud// ces gsungs so// gsum pa la/ rtsod pa dgod pa
210b3(rnying rgyud): dang / de spang ba'o// dang po ni/ dbu ru dpal 'dzin na re/ lta ba khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa chen po mchog go lo// sngags kyi khyad chos blta ba min// dbu ma las lhag ga la yod// ces zer/ gnyis pa ni/ theg chen thams cad blta ba spos bral du 'dod pa'i
210b4(rnying rgyud): phying zer ram/ dbum dang sngags gnyis lha bsgos bral du 'dod par gcig pa'i phyir zer/ dang po ltar na/ dbu sems gnyis kyang lhag byad med du 'gyur te/ gnyis ka theg rjen du bzhed pa'i phyir/ 'dod na/ sems tsam pa spos bral du mi 'dod pas gsal/ gnyis
210b5(rnying rgyud): pa ltar na/ don dam smos bral dang kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du blta bar mthun na'ang de tsam gyis sngags kyi lta ba gtan la phebs pa ma yin te/ sngags kyi lta ba ni/ bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin can du 'dod pas/ de'i mthus kun rdzob
210b6(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid can de dag kyang yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mtshan nyid du blta ba'i phyir/ des na khyed cag sngags la dbu ma las 'phags pa'i lta ba mi 'dod pa mi rigs te/ 'di ltar/ chos nyid sangs rgyas yin na/ chos can sangs rgyas ma yin
210b7(rnying rgyud): po mi rung ste/ chos can gyi ngo bo chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/ zhes 'khor 'das dbyer med kyi lha ga khas len pa'i phyir/ de la kho na re/ sngags kyi kun rdzob ltar snang ba de dag chos can/ don dmal dmigs pa'i lta ba ma yin te/ kun rdzob la
211a1(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa sgom pa yin pa rgyur d+ha na/ gnas la pa'ang sngags sa lan me dod par / padan gnyis la ba mang ngan thang dang drab tub mdang chags pa da/ sngagags ban gtas ma gyu nas ma 'angon par ma
211a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i lta ba khas len pa'i phyir/ sgom pa pon la lta ba min pa sogs/ 2/ sgom 'gal bar 'dzin pa yang mi rigs te/ lta ba gtan la phab nas rtogs don sgom par mkhas grub kun la grags pa'i phyir dang / gal te lung khams sogs gzod/
211a3(rnying rgyud): nas lhar dag par gsungs pa ltar rtogs pa gnas lugs kyi lcag ma yin pa dang / de ma yin na dang / der spyo btags te skos pa yin na legs pa'i skom du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ 'bras bu 'byung mi rigs te/ bod pa gsar du bsgom pa la ji tsam
211a4(rnying rgyud): 'bad kyang de mi 'gyur ba bzhin no// de'i phyir lta ba la khyad par yod par grub la/ de ltar kun pa nyid kyis/ de rtogs byed theg pa'i dem pa la'ang khyad par yod par dmigs pa'i phyir/ theg rim dgu ka la lta ba so sor snang zhing / kun gyi rtse mo mchog tu gyur
211a5(rnying rgyud): ba nI a ti yo ga ste/ de bas na/ mchog go lo zhes ma rangs pa'i tshig gis bsnyad pa ni hA col tsam du 'ang de/ ste oM mod do// de la ji ga na re/ de mai ta tha de/ rdo rje nyid 'grel las/ sangs rgyas pa la bzhi pa dang // ljang thub pa'i
211a6(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa men// zhes pas theg pa bzhi pa dang / brab mtha' ltab med par gsungs pas theg pa ni gsum kho nar nges pa'i phyir rjer/ 'o na mtshan rjod dang / rdo rje nying 'grel nyid las/ theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras
211a7(rnying rgyud): gnas// zhes bzhir phye ba'ang mi 'thad par thal/ gsum kho nar nges pa'i phyir byas pa pa/ khon re/ gsum da lte ba ni nyan rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gsum yin la/ da phyi ma la chung bas gnyis sa rtse nas gang ga ngas pa'i ltar/ dbye bcwa'i khyad
211b1(rnying rgyud): skyon med do zhe na/ de 'drar ma dgu la'ang mtshungs ta/ phyan ga krung rdza drug pa 'bras theg tu'abral/ da 'dra sangs rgyas ma zag pa nang du 'du bas 'dir yang da ba h+lA khyad do// gal tenam zag pa ma 'dus so zhe na/ skyon med te/ ma'i tha bung na
211b2(rnying rgyud): mngon mthong theg pa yin la/ rdo rje snying 'grel las gsum du bsdus pa ni rnga ma thol gyi theg pa la dgongs pa'i phyir ro// de bas na khyed cag theg pa gsum kho nar zhen pa ni/ lang gshegs kyi mdor/ theg pa bsam gyis mi khyab par gsungs pa sogs
211b3(rnying rgyud): kyi don la rmongs par zad do// gzhan yang gyi 'gyur gyi rgud sde rnams su A rbu dang a ti'i chos skad ma byung ba rgyu mtshan du byas te/ 'gog pa ni smad mi mkhas kyi bstod spad 'gyur te/ rgyal bas gdul bya la ltos nas gsung rab la mchog dman mdzad
211b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'og ma 'og ma'i nang du gong ma gong ma'i chos skad dang bshad pa rgyas par mi 'byung ba spyi lugs yin pa'i phyir te/ dper na nyan thos kyi sde sdod du phar theg dang / de'i nang du sngags kyi chung dang / de dag tu gsang ba de sogs kyi chos skad mi 'byung ba
211b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin no// de'i phyir gsang bde sogs su a nu dang a ti'i chos skad dang bshad pa rgyas par mi 'byung ba nyid kyis rdzogs pa chen po ni theg pa kun gyi tso mor thub pa yin te/ spros pas chog go// gnyis pa bstan bcos la/ rnam gzhag spyir bstan pa dang /
211b6(rnying rgyud): bye brag chung 'di'i dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos ngos bzung ba gnyis/ dang po la/ mtshan nyid/ swa don/ dbye ba'o// dang po ni/ gtso bor bstan bcos rtsom pa'i bsam pas kun nas bslang ste rang gizhi 'dod kyi grub mtha' gzhan la bstan pa'i phyir
211b7(rnying rgyud): bsdebs pa'i lung chos gang zhig/ khyad chos gsum dang ldan pa banyan bcos rnam dag gi dang / de gsum gang rung dang bral ba ltar sdang gi mtshan nyid do// khyad chos gsum ni/ rgyal ba'i bkag la brten nas de'i dgongs 'grel du byas pa dang / rtsom
212a1(rnying rgyud): po rnam g.yeng sa dpa' yid can gyis bshad pa dang / b+had las thar pa thob pa'i lam dang rjes sumathun pas/ rgud b+hur/ gang zhig rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'ab zhog // dpa \u0f7fsa rnam g.yed med yad canaHsa bsha
212a2(rnying rgyud): thar pa thob pa'i lam dang rjes mthun pa// de yang drang srong bka' bzhin spyi bos blang // zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ sham+b+ha'i sre las/ shA san 'chos pa dang / tra ya slob pa la 'jug pa'i phyir/ 'chos skyob kyi yon tan gnyis dang ldan pas na bstan
212a3(rnying rgyud): bcos te/ rnam bshad rigs pa las/ nyon mongs dgra rnams ma lus 'chos pa dang // ngan 'gro srid las slob byeng gang yin pa// 'chos skyob yon tan sbed na bstan bcos te// gnyis po 'dre dag gzhan gyi lugs la tshad// ces so// gsum
212a4(rnying rgyud): pa la/ mchog dman gyi sgo nas dang / byed las kyi dang / rtsom byed gang zag gi dang / ji ltar brtsam tshul gyi dang / brjod bya don gyi dang / bshad bya bka'i sgo nas dbye ba dang drug/ dang po ni/ bde 'dus kyis gcod choms kyi tshang pa
212a5(rnying rgyud): las/ bskrun bcos don med don dman dang // don log don ldan bzhir shes bya// zhes pas bzhi ste/ don med pa du rogaso btag gi bstan bcos lta bu/ don dman pa thun mong gi rig gnas bzhi'i bsnyen bcos su bya/ don log pa phyi rol
212a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i bstan bcos lta bu/ don dang ldan pa sangs rgyas pa'i nang rig pa'i bstan bcos lta bu'o// pa spe las dgur bshad de/ ji skad du/ don med don log don dang ldan// ngan g.yo ba rtse bral sdug bsngal spong // thos rtsod bsgrub pa lhur len pa/
212a7(rnying rgyud): bstan bcos rnam pa dgu yin no// zhes gsum tshan gsum las/ snga ma gnyis gnyis ltar ljang dang // rtse ma de re bstan bcos yang dag go// gnyis pa ni/ bka'i don rgya chen po ldad pa'i/ 'khrugs pa bsdeb pa'i/ za mo rnam par 'byung
212b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bstan bcos gsum ste rim par/ lam rim/ rin chen dra ba/ bi ma la'i thugs thig lta bu'o// gsum pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la bstan bcos su byas pa rdo rje chos kyis mdzad pa'i bde 'dus kyi lung lnga dang / byams pa'i chos ldan
212b2(rnying rgyud): bu/ dgra bcom pas gsungs pa la bstan bcos su byas pa mngon pa ste bdun lta bu/ sa non pa'i byad 'phags kyis brtsam pa la bstan bcos sa byas pa slob dpon chen po pad+ma dang 'od 'phro'i sAl bzhugs pa garlabs chen gyi bstan bcos lta bu/ yi dam
212b3(rnying rgyud): lha'i lung bstan thob nas brtsam pa la bstan bcos su byas pa sgeg rdor dang phyogs glang gi bstan bcos lta bu/ rang gi grub mtha' la zlos shing gzhan gyi grub mtha' sun 'byin pa la mkhas pa'i skye bos brtsam pa thugs sras kA ba bzhi'i bstan bcos lte bu //
212b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa na/ bka' nyed la 'grel par btab pa'i dang / bka'i don rang chud du brtsam pa'i bstan bcos gnyis te/ rim bzhin 'grel pa spar khab dang / kun mkhyen chen po'i sems nyid ngal bsol bu/ wa pa ni/ ji lta ba ston pa'i/ ji skad du ston pa'i/ thar pa
212b5(rnying rgyud): dang thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa'i thabs ston pa'i baspyan bcos gsum ste/ rim bzhin dbu ma h+ya na/ mngon pa kun btus/ stod 'jug lta bu'o// drug pa la/ mdo'i dgongs 'grel dang / sngags kyi dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos gnyis
212b6(rnying rgyud): drang po la/ mdzod dang mdo rje lta bu 'khor lo dang po'i// dbu ma rigs tshogs lta bu 'khor lo bar pa'i/ rgyud bla dang klu sgrub kyi bstod tshogs lta bu 'khor lo gsum pa'i dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos rnams so// gnyis pa ni/ phyi nang gi rgyud sde drug
212b7(rnying rgyud): gi dgongs pa 'grel par byed pa'i bstan bcos rnams te/ gzhan du rig par bya'o// gnyis pa la/ rgyud kyi la 'jug pa'i man ngag dang / rgyung gnas skabs la 'jug pa'i man ngag gnyis/ dang po ni/ thos bsam gyi shes rab la brten te rgyud drang zad du gtan
213a1(rnying rgyud): 'a'ababs par byed pa'i man ngag nye/ dal dang / zla 'don pagad dang / 'thab pa gnyas/ drang ba/ skrag pa rtags thag/ bum la gcogagan gas pastan lasogs // gnas pan/ rtswa d+had pa zlog param mams pa
213a2(rnying rgyud): khab/ 1 me ge'i rtsachang 'brel/ sangs kyis gsang ba rnam zhal/ badz+rad rnam pa shad med po/ bai mal 'gres chung bar+N+NaH/ ma'i rgya mdud 'brel rnams so// bshad kyad la bam las mdzad pa'i bla ma'i 'brel pa man sa ma/
213a3(rnying rgyud): phyags ldan 'brel/ bcad 'byang bcus bul la sogs pa rnams so// gnyis pa ni/ bzhis pa shes bulag rdo bro btan rnaMs rnyed pa rjon rlos bsrab jir sems papa dpang man dag ste// mongs zhes sgying ngam byor yang basbyin pa
213a4(rnying rgyud): nga // dri la bculas/ dang po skya ba zhitso por ston pa'i man dgun/ dga' rab kyil nan/ padz+ra ga zeng / bi ma la 'i zhes rab ldan 'i nir sgron pa'i nor/ bya chub cig sunang / dpal brtsegs kyi lha ma la sogs pa'o// gtos pa spyo
213a5(rnying rgyud): pa gtso bor ston pa ni/ snod brjes sgron ma dang / derje 'ang ma mgon pa sogs pa // gsus pa kyi ma'i so d+he/ sadas rgyas gsang ba'i rdo rjegs pa kyi stod dring / dkyi 'am chos don/ khyim pa'i ga sa durnam sogs pas da /
213a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa dbang ni/ deng las dpeganyis kyi srid dang / gal sa sa 'argyang chungardzogs pa gsam pa sogs pas ston// ma tshi ga nig sa gas pa bza dang / gabyas la sogs pas stan no// drug pa pa sa na/
213a7(rnying rgyud): sbyi sreg dang mig/ skugadung las drang / du brjod ba ba'i de bcung nga gnas paso gas // 'dun pa grub na/ mang gsung brgyad pas mang drug su nga/ dedag pa pa gnapa gabyung ba'os ma/
213b1(rnying rgyud): sa pa la/ ngas phyogs sgom pa man ngag ni/ ing+ga du ti'i lam rnam bkod dang rim pa gnyis pa/ sangs rgyas gsang pa'i lam ri mche rung / sreg pa'i rim drug/ ba ma 'ang ma gsum sogs pa snyed rdzogs gnyis gson pa gzung
213b2(rnying rgyud): rnams so// mos sgom gyi man ngag ni/ bi ma'i 'od rim dang chen/ sangs rgyas gsang ba'i dra chung dang / dam pa rgyan la sogs pas ston no// brgyad pa ting nge 'dzin ni/ rim pa'i phyag rgya bsam gtan/ khro bo phyag rgya gcig pa/ rtse gcig bsdus pa
213b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa mtshan bcas gtso bor ston pa'i man ngag dang / spyod yul zhi pa'i bsam gtan/ spyod yul sbyong ba'i bas ma gtan sogs mtshan med gtso bor ston pa'i man ngag rnams so// dgu pa mchod pa ni/ pad+ma'i tha
213b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs/ dug khrod bde ba'i gtor chung / he chen/ he chung / g.yos yig che chung / bim pa'i thab mchog dpag gis mi lang pa dang / dbyig gi blo nA ma la sogs pas ston no// bcu bsngags dang phyag rgya'i man ngag la/ yi ge zur ba med pas
213b5(rnying rgyud): smrabathabs kyi khongs nas ston pa yin gsungs/ de dag kyang mdo tsam brjod pa ste/ rgyas par ma 'gyur la phra mo drug rgya rtsa bzhi yong pa grags shing / lcer 'brel bshad srub thabs tha mo bas ma gyis mi khyab pa ste/ sa ston rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis ga
213b6(rnying rgyud): pa la'ang bcu bzhi sor bar gsungs la/ de rnams la gyung srub thabs dang brel ba zhes bya'o// sub thabs la g.yen dang 'brel ba'i man ngag la phrin las shwar sde bcud ste/ zhi ba dang khro bo gnyis/ tshogs mabu gnyis/ dbang bsre ba gnyis/
213b7(rnying rgyud): dang sbyin sreg gnyis te brgyad do// lnga ba skabs don ngos ba zung ba ni/ de ltar bka' dang bstan bcos gnyis las/ 'dir gang bshad par bya ba'i dam chos ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' spu 'phrul dra ba/ de'i nang nas kyang rtsa ba'i rgud gsang ba snying po ste/ bshad
214a1(rnying rgyud): rgyud rnams la gtso bor brten cing / dgongs 'grel man ngag rnams kyi legs cha blangs nas bshad par bya ba yin no// gang bshad bya'i chos ngos bzung ba bshad zin te/ gnyis pa gang gis 'chad pa'i man ngag la/ rgyal bas gsungs
214a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud bshad zabs dang / de la brten te mdzad pa'i man ngag bshad thabs gnyis/ dang po ni/ spyir ma hA yo ga'i rgyud rnams rgyan bdun dang / a nu rnams lung bdun dang / a ti rnams spyi don drug gi sgo nas blo kha dbye bar he ru ka gal por gsungs
214a3(rnying rgyud): shing / bla med kyi rgyud 'ga' zhig la ni/ phyi nang gzhan gsum dang / ston pa bzhir bshad pa dag yod do/ sgrub sde rnams las ni/ bshad thabs nyi shu ste/ bde 'dus kyi rgyud kyi spyi chings las/ bshad thabs man ngag nyi shu la//
214a4(rnying rgyud): sdoms lnga dang rgyud chings lnga// lung sdebs lnga dang sgrub thabs kyi// sbyor lugs lnga yis gtan la dbab// ces so// de ltar bshad thabs kyi man ngag mtha' yas na'ang / yi ges 'jigs pa'i phyir/ gzhan rnams btang snyoms su byas te/ 'dir
214a5(rnying rgyud): ma hA yo ga spyi'i bshad thabs rgyan bdun dang / khyad par 'di nyid kyi bka' srol spyi don lnga bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ gal po las/ ma hA yo ga'i rgyan bdun yang // gleng bslang ba dang sangs rgyas tshul// rgyas bshad mtha' dang bshad pa'i tshul// da
214a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i rnam pa gang zag stod// bden pa'i dgongs pa shes par bya// zhes gsungs pa ltar bdun las/ rgyan dang po la/ dri ba dang / lan bstan pa gnyis/ dang po ni/ de las/ gling bslad pa yi grangs lnga ni// rgyud 'di'i ming ni ci zhig yin// rgyad
214a7(rnying rgyud): 'damu zhag don du mdzad// byed po ston pa su zhig yin// rgyud 'di'i ldang tshad ji lta bu// dgos pa ci zhig yod par shes// zhes so// gnyis pa lan la'ang lnga las/ dang po ni/ 'di'i ming ni gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa zhes bya'o// gnyis
214b1(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ gdul bya dbang po rnon po 'dod chags can gtso bor gyur pa'i dug lnga'i rtse bo rnams 'dul ba'i don du mdzad do// gsum pa ni/ byed pa po rigs drug pa kun tu bzung po'o// bzhi pa ni/ de las/ cho ga de bzhin be'u dang // rim par
214b2(rnying rgyud): dang dum bu'o// zhes pa las/ cho ga ni/ dbang dang / mchog gi sgrub pa dang / las bzhi'i phrin las sogs rgyas par ston// rab gnas/ sbyin sreg/ thun mong gi sgrub pa rnams mdo tsam/ gtor ma tshogs/ gnas lugs rnams
214b3(rnying rgyud): cha mthun gyi rgyud gzhan las kha bskang ste man ngag tu bshad do// le'u ni nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ phyi ma dang bcas na nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// rim par phye ba'i/ rim pa drug pa dang / gsum pa dang / gnyis par phye ba rnams so// dum bu ni gnyis te/
214b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i dum bu le'u nyer gnyis dang / bshad pa'i drim bu le'u nyer gsum pa dang nyer bzhi pa'o// lA pA ni/ tshe dang napo mgyogs sogs thun mong gi dngos grub dang / mchog gi dngos grub gnas skabs rig 'dzin bzhi dang / mthar blag gi 'dra
214b5(rnying rgyud): burdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i ched du'o// rgyan gnyis pa ni/ gal po las/ sangs rgyas pa yi tshul bzhi ste// rgyud dang gleng gzhi nges tshig rgya// zhes pa'i don la/ chags bral gyi tshul bzhi dang / chags lam gyi tshul bzhi'o// dang zin/
214b6(rnying rgyud): me'i skye bar 'khrungs pa ni chags bral gyi chos kyi rten du gyur pa'i phyir gyud ces bya'o// khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung ba ni chags bral gyi rnam pa la nges pa ster bas gleng gzhi zhes bya'o// rab tu byung nas kyang 'dul sdom bsrung ba ni nges par bstan pa'i gnas su rig
214b7(rnying rgyud): pas des tshig ces bya'o// de ltar gsungs nas kyang 'bras bu byang chub 'dod pas lam la bslab pa ni rnam grol thob pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rma zhes bya'o// 'dir chags bral gyis sangs rgyas tshul smos pas ci bya zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das thub pa'i dbang po ni/
215a1(rnying rgyud): ji skad bshad pa'i tshul bzhi skonas sangs rgyas par 'jig rten du grags shing / rgyad kyi ston pa rigs drug pa'ang / de las spyad pa mi dad du shes pa'i sgo nas byed pa po tshad mar sgrub pa yin no// de la bram dbus grwa smon lam sa
215a2(rnying rgyud): ge na re/ 'dir sngags dang mtshan nyid kyi 'dod pa 'byed pa'i phyir chags bral gyi tshul bzhi bkod pa yin gyi/ sngags su 'dod pa ni ma yin no gsungs/ gnyis pa ni/ bdag nyid rang rigs dang mthun par rigs lha'i sangs rgyas su bskyed pa ni gsang
215a3(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi rten du rigs pas rgyud dang / de nas slar yang rigs lnga gcig tu 'dus pa'i rnam par gyur pa ni chags lam gyi rnam pa la nges pa ster bas gleng gzhi'o// rdo rje la sogs pa'i rigs kyi sdom pa bzung ba dang khyad par rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyor bas tshangs
215a4(rnying rgyud): sgyid kyi brtul zhugs bzung ba ni nges par brten pa'i gnas su rigs pas nges tshig go// de nas 'dod chags lam du bsgyur ba'i gsang chos la spyod pa ni 'bras bu myur du 'byin pa'i nye rgyu yin pas na rgyu'o// rgyun gsum pa ni/ tshig don 'di las mi 'da' bas na
215a5(rnying rgyud): mtha' ste/ de'ang gal por/ rgyas bshad mtha' ni rnam pa drug/ drang don des don dgongs pas bshad// dgongs min sgra ni ji bzhin pa// ji bzhin ma yin nyid du bshad// ces pa lhur drug gi/ drang nges gnyis ni/ rdo rje'i tshig gcig gis
215a6(rnying rgyud): gdul bya yang dag pa'i skal ba dngos su med pa dang / yod pa gnyis la don tha dad du ston pa ste/ bskyed rim yan lag dang bcas pa ston pa drang don dang / rgyu rgyud dang rdzogs rim ston pa'i phyogs ni nges don no// dgongs dgongs min gnyis ni/ rdo rje'i tshig tha
215a7(rnying rgyud): dad pas bskyed rdzogs kyi don gcig/ de dang 'gol ba'i tshig gi sbyor bas bcings te brjod don dgongs gzhi la ltos nas go dgos pa ni dgongs bshad dang / rjod byed dngos bstan gyis brjod don dgongs gzhi la ltos mi dgos par gsal bar go ba ni dgongs pa can
215b1(rnying rgyud): min pa bshad pa'o// phyi dkyil dang sbyin grags gas chog rnams 'jig rten dang bstan banas la grags pam chog gis gsang+yas pa ni sgra de bzhin pa dang / kor+d+ha g+h+ra la sogs pa'i sgra dang / 'dir skyong sgrol la A li kA la gas pa lta bu 'jig rten dang
215b2(rnying rgyud): bstan bcos gzhan la ma grags pa'i brdas bcings te gsungs pa ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pa'o// rgyan bzhi pa ni/ gal po las/ bshad pa'i tshul bzhi khyed la bstan// tshig ste sbas dang mthar thug yin/ zhes pa ltar bzhi las/ tshig gi don
215b3(rnying rgyud): ni/ ya go'i 'thunan tsam la gzhol ba'i bshad pa sgra tshad sde gzhung dang mthun par bkad pa te/ gzhan dag yo ga'i don nas zer ro// spyi don pa/ mang ma byas kyi dang / bskyed rim pa'i spyi don gnyis/ dang po pa/ man mogs pa zu
215b4(rnying rgyud): dang / sngags nang pa la zhugs pa'i 'gyod pa bzlog pa gnyis/ dang po ni/ sngags nang pa'i lam pa de nying myur ba 'di lta bu la mazhugs par snga mdo'am bya spyod sogs la zhugs pa ni ma legs so snyam du 'gyod na/ de dag kyang 'di'i lam stegs
215b5(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid las/ sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// zhes gsung ba'i phyir dang / mdo las kyang / thabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la// nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur// zhes pas dbang rngon thabs shes
215b6(rnying rgyud): khyad par can dang ldan na tshogs kyi bya ba rlabs chen gcig gis bskal pa mang po'i tshogs bathums pa sogs bde myur gyi lam mad sogs kyang bzhad pas spyi'i don zhes bya'o// gnyis pa ni/ 'dir khrus drang gtsung sgra sogs gtsang lde med par spyod pa lce
215b7(rnying rgyud): phag lta bu dang / sbyor sgrol sogs 'tshab chos su sbubs mu stegs kyi chos so snyam du 'gyod na/ gcod sde'i zin pa ma spangs na chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don mi rtogs pas zhen pa spang phyir ro snyam du spyod pa ni mdo sogs kyang bzhed cing / mi nag mdung
216a1(rnying rgyud): thung can bsad pa dang / dad dpon gyi bskal 'grod pa sags sems dge bas sbyar sbal la sprad kyang nyes pa// migs shang bsod nams dpag mar 'phel bar mang zhags kyang ba rgong pas bslab bya thun mong pa'i phyir skye doH zhes
216a2(rnying rgyud): bya'o// gnyis pa ni/ rten gzhal yas khang dang brten pa lha bsgom pa sogs bskyed rim dang 'brel pa rnams te/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis ka'i thun mod gi bslab bye yin pa'i phyir spyi don no// sbam pa na/ las rba dang skems par 'jug pa'i cho ga
216a3(rnying rgyud): ston pa sogs tshogs su dbyung bar mi 'os pa'i phyir 'dod chags chos smras dang / rang sbyin gyis rlob pa rtsa rlung thig le'i rdzogs rim sogs kun rdzob bden pa'i sbas pa ste/ sgo mthar gnyis kyi dbus su chud pas snying po lta bur gyur pa'i phyir sras
216a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// mthar thug ni/ de dag gi rgyas gdab tu gyur pa don dam 'od gsal gyi rdzogs re ma ni lam gyi mthar rtag dang / bden gnyis bus 'jug tu rtogs pa ni 'grus bu'i mthar thug ste/ tshul bzhi ka rdo rje'i cho ga gcig la dbang po mi 'dra ba'i
216a5(rnying rgyud): sgo nas 'chad dgos pa'i phyir/ tshig de'i brjod bya lhag ma ma lus par mar thug pa med mthar thug go// rgya dam pa ni/ kal po las/ nyan bshad dbye ba rnam pa gnyis// tshogs dang slob ma dag tu 'dod// ces pas gnyis kyi/ tshogs bshad
216a6(rnying rgyud): ni sgra ji bzhin pa dang / de dang thun mong pa'i dgongs minA/ drang don/ cho gdon/ sr-i'i don rnams te 'dod chags chos sbas ma gtogs pa'i bskyed rim 'khor bcas so// slob bshad ni/ lha ri bzhin ma yin pa dang / ras don dang / dgo
216a7(rnying rgyud): bshad dang / sras dang / mthar thug rnams te rdzogs rim 'khor brtsams// 'dir zung mang ma yin pa'i dgongs minan sras mthar gnyis su 'dus pa yin no// kan drug pa ni/ gal por/ mA gyi gang zag rnam pa lnga// yat+pal ra kar de ma
216b1(rnying rgyud): dang // tsan+dan rin po che yi dpe// zhes pas lnga ste/ slob dpon las thos nas lan cig 'dzin par nus kyang 'du 'dza la sogs pa'i chen gyis myur du brjod par gyur pa ni ut+pa la zhes bya ba'i gang zag ste/ dper na ut+pal chu nang du rtsi bcang 'dzin pa sogs
216b2(rnying rgyud): yon tan yod kyang rna bar 'jug pa sogs kyis myur du rnying par 'gyur ba bzhin no// yang mang du zos shing ma brjed kyang gzhan la 'chad mi nus pa ni pad dkar zhes bya ba'i gang zag ste/ dper na pad+ma dkar po ni snga ma las rnyings dka' zhing rtsi bcud brtan na'ang
216b3(rnying rgyud): nyi ma dang 'grogs pa na kha zam par 'gyur ba'i phyir bung ba sogs kyis rtsi bcud len mi nus pa bzhin no// yang / dang brtse shes rab dang ldan pas zlo ba bye ste gzhan la 'chad nus kyang rgyud mi brtan pa'i yon tan ring du mi gnas pa ni brla dmar po zhes bya ba'i gang
216b4(rnying rgyud): zag ste/ dper na pad+ma dmar po ni nyi mas kha 'byed cing rtsi bcud 'dzin pa sogs kyi yon tan yod kyang 'dzag rkyen pas rtsi bcud ring du mi gnas pa bzhin no// yang thos pa chung zhing nga rgyal che ba lung rigs kyi rtsa ba med kyang mang du slab gdul bya rjes su 'dzin mi nus pa
216b5(rnying rgyud): ni tsan+dan zhes bya ba'i gang zag ste/ dper na tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po ni dngos po chung la dri che brtsa ba cha cher ma zug cing yal 'dab rgyas pa sbrul gdug pas dkris pas gzhan gyis blang mi nus pa bzhin no// yang / khrims dag cing mkhas la smin pa chud brtan
216b6(rnying rgyud): pa rang gis zos nas gzhan la legs par ston nus pa ni rin po che zhes bya ba'i gang zag ste/ dper na rin po che ni skyon med cing yon tan dang ldan pa bzang po las mi 'gyur ba dgos 'dod stsol ba bzhin no// de la rin po che rab/ gzhan gsum 'breng / tsan+dan
216b7(rnying rgyud): tha ma ste/ rab slob bshad dang / gzhan bzhi po tshogs bshad kyi snod do// rgyan bdun pa ni/ gal por/ bden pa'i dgongs pa rnam pa gnyis// kun rdzab don dam bshad par gyis// zhes pas rkyen snga ma drug la brten nas kyang don bden pa gnyis
217a1(rnying rgyud): nges par byed pa ste/ bskyed pa'i dam pa 'khor bcas dang / mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i rdzogs rim rnams ni kun pa bden pa dang / mtshan med de bzhin nyid kyi rdzogs rim 'ang gsal ba ni don dam den pas/ chu
217a2(rnying rgyud): 'jug kyang thob pa yin pa'i phyir dan dam du bzhag sa// de ltar rgyan bdun ze 'chang tshal 'di ni/ rgyud 'di'i 'chad thabs kyi brgyud pa'i bka' grol ma yin kyang / gal par ma hA sI'i 'chang thabs su gsungs pa wA ra/ thA gsar rnams la mang
217a3(rnying rgyud): dathos pa'i yan lag tu bas mas nas rnams grangs su bkang pa'i 'ad thibs gzhan pas rdol 'ang cing byed spos ta brkad pa yod no// gnas pa/ snron gyimakhan pa rnams kyi bzhad pa tha da pa mang yang / 'dir bka' ba zung bar bshad rnam
217a4(rnying rgyud): gyi rjesasu 'brangs te bshad pa la/ rang bzhin dngos po'i gnas tshul/ ma rtogs 'khrul pa'i steng tshul/ thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs tshul/ brtsabs thugs rje skyes tshul/ 'gro rdo rdo rje ltar mdzad tshul dang lnga/ dang po ni/ rtags
217a5(rnying rgyud): rung ma rtogs da snang srid 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin bden pa dbyer med lhag pa'i chos rgya chen por yenas sangs zas pa yin te/ rgyas pa lus/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'o// mtha' yas dkyil
217a6(rnying rgyud): kun// rgyal ba'i yum gyi dbyings su thim// de nyid chos sku chen po yin// zhes dang / yang / 'jig rten brtan gas la sogs pa// snang ba nyid na ngo bo med// de nyid chos su chen po yin// zhes dang / 'di nyi de las/ de bzhin bshags pa
217a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa nga ba nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na'ang / zhes 'byung ba'i phyir/ gnyis pa ni/ da ltar sangs rgyas kyang martogs te/ de'i rgyu mtshan ne/ ldan gyis kyi ma rig pas ra' nga ga
217b1(rnying rgyud): shes la/ de'i steng du kun brtags kyi ma rig pas phyin ci log tu bzung ste/ las nyon la rang gar spyad pas yang dag pa'i lam dang bral zhing 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis nyam zag par gnas pa ste/ 'di nyid las/ 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma ragang
217b2(rnying rgyud): las 'gro ba lnga'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la/ zhes so// gsum pa ni/ 'de nyid las/ log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus
217b3(rnying rgyud): snang // zhes pas gsum las/ dang po dbyings las mi gzhan pa'am ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis cir yang mi dmigs par gzigs te/ rgyas pa las/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pas// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// mtha'
217b4(rnying rgyud): bus kyang brtag tu med// ces so// gnyis pa ye shes las mi gzhan pa'am ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis gsal cha ma 'dres par gzigs te/ de las/ mthong man kun gyi gzugs snang dang // bla med byang chub skur snang ba// me long
217b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du// sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang // zhes so// gsum pa dbyings ye 'am ji lta ji snyed dbyer med du mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis sdang stong dbyer med me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar gzigs te/ de las/ rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'
217b6(rnying rgyud): ste// de yis mi mkhyen gang yang med// ces so// bzhi pa ni/ rim gsum las/ rtag rgyun rang bzhin shugs gsol dang // yul dang 'phrad nas byang bar snang // zhes pas/ rtag pa rgyun gyi/ rang bzhin shugs kyi/ bsul zhing gsol ba
217b7(rnying rgyud): btab pa'i/ yul dang 'phrad pa'i thugs rje skye tshul dang bzhi/ dang po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs rjes sems can gyi don nam du'ang mi 'dor ba'i phyir rgyun chad med par sdang ba ste/ chu bo chen po'i rgyun bzhin no// gnyis pa ni/ rgyu rkyen dang rtsol tog med
218a1(rnying rgyud): rtsod pa rang gis jugs ra zlas/ ma dang 'ad thar nan/ sa na/ gang lags la ba dunags byung bar ban ma 'gag s+ho/ 'angs pas gdung ba byung ga dpapa
218a2(rnying rgyud): par thar ba bzhin na// de 'anan cig pa'i 'amar gyis dang bangs rang nga rdzogs na 'ang / bya bab 'khor myedan du stan pa la dzad gas pa gas la pa papas zugs rje gyu te/ 'di'i de dang kyi gdul bar byed pa 'dzin drand gas man
218a3(rnying rgyud): dngos su nyan pa'i skal ba med pa rnalas la lam stegs kyi thes pa gzhan ston pa'i phyir thub drug sprul par mdzungs te le 'u gnyis pa snor ro// bzhi pa ni/ snying sems can thams cad phyogs rje gro pa'i lcel yin mod/ rkang par du 'ang dra nyaM ba gangul
218a4(rnying rgyud): las ngan can yal bar mi 'dor ba rtags rje khyad par can te/ mdzangs pa spyong log zung pa mthong ba lta ba'o// de dag kyang 'di nyid las/ thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po sbyis ma/ zhams// de'ang thugs rje chen po ni/ yin pa thams
218a5(rnying rgyud): kyi gzhir gyur pa dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge ste/ bdag dang sems can dbyer med pa'i ngos nas skyes pa'o// lda ni/ bzhed pa'imi mthun pa mar ste/ rten can gyis don med pa/ rten med kyis rngon snyed pa/ gnas lugs ngos nyid kyis don zer pa
218a6(rnying rgyud): pa gsum las/ 'dir wA rje zlar chud pa'i rjes su 'brangs te/ phyi ma nyid brdung ngo // de la'ang / srid bas ma nis mi khyab pas don mdzad pa dang / khyang bar du gsang ba'i bstan pa chud 'di nyid kyis don mdza pang // dang ngon/ rgyas pa las/
218a7(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen po'i 'byin rlabs kyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyid du// 'gro ba'i phrin las pas ma mi zab// ces so// gnyis pa la/ 'di'i byin rlabs kyis don mdzad pa dang / 'di nyid dngos kyis don mdzad pa gnyis/ dang po ni/
218b1(rnying rgyud): snyan pa kun tu bzang po'i thugs rje'i byin rlabs las sbrul skra thub drug spros te 'dul ba rnam pa bzhis rigs drug gi don mdzad pa ste/ le'u gsum pa'i stong skur ra// gnyis pa la/ lhan cig pa'i 'khor dang / ga phye ba'i 'khor gyi ngan mdzad pa'o//
218b2(rnying rgyud): dang po ni/ ston pas 'og min du lhan cig pa'i 'khor rnams la zab mo'i dbang gsum bskur bas ston 'khor dgongs pa khyad med du gyur pa ste/ le'u gnyis pa'i stod ltar ro// gnyis pa ni/ ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya khyad par can gyi ched du lam
218b3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po lhan cig pa'i 'khor gyis zhus te gsungs pa nyid bachung nas da ltar snang ba 'jo'o// de la'ang rgyud kyi brjod pa'i don ni/ rgyud gsum sdang ba bzhi la sogs pa ste/ 'og tu rgyud don dngos bshad pa'i skabs su shes par 'gyur ro// rjod
218b4(rnying rgyud): byed kyi sgra'i chung bshad thabs la'ang / dor bya bshad tshul nyes pa'i skyon ngos bzung ba/ blang bya legs pa'i yon tan shes par bya'o// dang po ni/ chu 'bras kyi theg pa gnyis bsres nas bshad na rdo rje theg pa ni bab kyis bshad pa'i skyon dang / yo ga
218b5(rnying rgyud): nang bsres na bsnyen srab bzhi'i don las gol te yog 'brog 'tshol ba'i dang / 'brel tshul gnyis dang ma ldan na ston pa'i tshig rna bu'i dang / spyi dang khyad par gyi dgos chod med na don med 'chal pa'i dang / rtog gis brtags pa'i the tshom gyi gegs la ma shes na
218b6(rnying rgyud): mdzangs pa lce sdum ze dang / mi mthun pa'i cho ga don bsdebs ma shes na shes rab long ba'i dang / mngon par rtogs pa'i go rim ma shes na bdud rtsi ro nyams lta bu'i dang / rgyud gong 'og 'khrug pa bsdebs ma shes na rin po che rtsar 'chol ba lta bu'i skyon dang brgyad
218b7(rnying rgyud): do// gnyis pa la/ rgyud gnas skabs dngos po ri re'i 'chad thabs dang / rgyud gzhung spyi'i tshi ga don 'chad thabs gnyis/ dang po ni/ lta ba brgal brtag gis dang / spyod pa rjes 'jug thabs kyis dang / dkyil 'khor don rtags kyis dang /
219a1(rnying rgyud): dbang gdams dgagis dang / dam tshig rnam grangs kyis dang / phrin las chog sdibs kyis dang / sgrub pa phyag bzhes kyis dang / ta dang 'dzin paskyed rdzogs kyis dang / pung gyi nang gis dang / sngags slang
219a2(rnying rgyud): brjebs kyis dang / phyag rgya bskyed rim gyis bshad pa dang bcu gcig go// gnyis pa ni/ bshad thabs 'dren pa'i cho ga bcu ste/ spyi mdo las/ gang la balha dang sgo 'byed dang // sdud dang 'byor bar 'dren pa dang // rkyen dang gzhan dang de mi
219a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshig/ ma bcos me long sbrel gzhi rnams// me long bcu dang mthun sbyar bas// tshig don rnam par sbyar ba yin// zhes gsungs pa las/ dang po dang bzhin lta ba'i tshig khud nam mkha' la lding ba ltar bshad pa ni/ thugs thig las/
219a4(rnying rgyud): ru Da yi chos bzhi pos// rnal 'byor can gyis lta 'phang bcad// ces pas chos bzhi ste/ ji ltar khyud nam mkha' la lding ba'i tshe/ mig gyen du blta ba dang / gshog pa g.yob pa'i rtsol ba med pa dang // dam glog dang g.yang sar nyam ming pa dang
219a5(rnying rgyud): bya lam la rjes med pa bzhin du/ 'di'i gong na rtogs bya gzhan med pas rang bzhin lta ba'i tshig gis theg pa thams cad khog 'og tu 'jug pa dang / lam bgrod pa'i rtsol ba dang bral ba dang / lung gnas srid pa dang zhi ba'i mtha' la nyam mid pa dang /
219a6(rnying rgyud): blta bya lta byed blo yul du byed pa'i rtog pa med pa'o// gnyis pa rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig stag gis mdongs pa lta bu ni/ de nyid las/ bya hU~M mchod pa de bzhin pas// tan+t+ra'i tshig don du mgur gcod// ces pa ste/ ji ltar sdug ma chongs
219a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshe/ bgrod bya'i sa tshigs dum bu dum bur bcad nas mchongs pa bzhin du/ rnam par dbye ba'i tshig gis tshig don gyi dmigs so sor phyi nas ming 'dogs gsal bar ston pa'o// gsum pa spyi don sdud pa'i cho ga seng ge'i mchongs pa lta bu ni/
219b1(rnying rgyud): de nyid las/ sad chen mchongs pa'i chos gcig ltad// rnam grangs tshig lam don gcig sdud// ces pa ste/ ji ltar seng ge mchongs pa'i tshe/ sa tshigs du ma khog 'og tu chung ba bzhin du/ tshig don gyi rnam grangs du ma rnams kyi don baphru
219b2(rnying rgyud): tshig gis don gyi ngo bo gcig tu sdud pa'o// bzhi pa 'breng ba mtshams spyod pa'i tshig bya dang mo'i 'gros lta bu ni/ de nyid las/ dang mo'i 'gros chos rnam gnyis ltar// gzhung don dbu zhabs le mtshams sbyor// zhes pas chos gnyis te/ ji ltar
219b3(rnying rgyud): dad mo 'gro ba'i tshe/ snga phyi drang por 'gro zhing / sta rjes phyi rjes kyis non par 'gro ba bzhin du/ 'brel mtshams sbyor ba'i tshig gis/ tshig 'brel dang don 'brel ma chad par 'brel sbyor ba'o// lnga pa rang rkyen gnyer gyi tshig rus sbal gyi nur 'gros
219b4(rnying rgyud): lta bur bshad pa ni/ de nyid las/ rus sbal 'gros kyi chos gnyis pos// 'bru stod mi bzhag gzer bu gdab// ces te/ ji ltar rus sbal 'gro ba la chos gnyis gnyis te/ g.yo 'gul mi mngon par shugs kyis 'gro ba dang / se stong mi
219b5(rnying rgyud): lus par rjes kyis khyabang bzhin du/ rang rkyen gnyer gyi tshig gis 'bru stong mi bzhag par tshig don brda 'phrod par byed pa'o// drug pa ldem dgongs man ngag gi tshig gan 'phrug brag la 'dzegs pa lta bu ni/ de nyid las// gan phrug 'jog pa'i chos gnyis
219b6(rnying rgyud): ltar// ldem dgongs gsang ba brgyad kyi sbyar// zhes te/ ji ltar gan 'phrug drag la 'dzeg pa la chos gnyis te/ skyes ma thag tu brag me long gi ngos lta bu la rtsed mo rtse zhing 'gro ba dang / de ri dwags gzhan la mi 'tshams kyang kho rang la 'tshams pa
219b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du/ ldem dgongs man ngag gi tshig gis zab lam sbas tshul du bstan pa rnams thabs kyis 'byin pa dang / de theg pa 'og ma rnams la mi 'tshams kyang 'dir 'tshams pa'o// bdun pa gtar ga gegs sel gyi tshig bya glag khra mo gzan la btsum pa lta bu ni/
220a1(rnying rgyud): da da lasa?/ b+hag gcan chos gnyis k+Shar// don gyi dmigs brgyang gang bas pa lo// zhas twa/ ltar grag mogazan lab rnam pa'i mtshas gnyis te/ gang yid la btags pa'i zas dang / de nga ga brgyang
220a2(rnying rgyud): 'byin pa ltar/ gta rag gegs sel gyi tshig gi gtan tshigs kyis gtan la phab nas grub mtha'i don longs par byed pa'o// brgyad pa tshad ma bka' gzhung gi tshig dus kyi 'brug sgra lta bu ni/ de nyid las/ dus kyi 'brug ltar chos gsum pos// bka'
220a3(rnying rgyud): ye tshad gzung skabs sgyur nas// zhes te/ ji ltar 'brug gi sgrala'ang tshes gsum ste/ dus min du me 'byung ba dang / dus su 'gyur ba dang // des dbyar dgun la sogs pa'i dus kyi smyos pa tshod pas yid ches pa bzhin du/ bka' lung tshad mahe
220a4(rnying rgyud): drang yul ma yin par mi drang zhing / skabs dang mthun par drangs pas rngon gyi sgo dag rjod pa ste/ lung ni yid ces tshig yin te// zhes rigs gsungs pa'i phyir/ dbu pa/ mtshon pa dpo'i chog me long ga pa' dag pa lta pra ni/ de nyi las
220a5(rnying rgyud): mgong chos lta tshon pa'i dpe/ kun la dpe mtshon zlog tu dbab// ces pa ste/ ji ltar rang gi bzhin ras lkog tu gyur pa me long gis gsal ba bzhin du/ shin du srog gyur gyi gzung don rnams kyang dpe mtshon nges par byed pa'o// bcu pa/ bsgol
220a6(rnying rgyud): marnams 'ibyin kyang kyi mob seng thug rgya la spyong ba zun/ de nyid las/ ming rigs ga sucug zung kar// shrI rjeg da gyiganan bas// zhes ste/ dri gar mi dgang drug gra cu rjong pa dzin/ bad+mos ma mchongs nas 'jo 'thob
220a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du bsngal mtsho mes 'phen sdud kyi chog gis/ don gyi 'khrugs sdebs/ dkris kyi ga ma rje/ 'bru'i 'dugs babyung nas sgra dzang bzhin pa ma yin/ don thun mong pa ma yin pa'i rgyud don gyen ci ma log par ston pa'o// de dag kyang rigs 'grus
220b1(rnying rgyud): na/ rta sgo zag pa 'i log dbub las/ de la rnam par dbye ba/ 'brel sbyor ba/ rang rkyen gnyar gsum dkyus su gyur/ gzhan le'ug bshad kyi dkyus kya zang kar ba spyad do// zhes gsungs pa ltar/ skye 'gro rnam pa ga snam ma gtogs
220b2(rnying rgyud): le rba so so dang sbyar tshul rags tsam rgol g.yung gnyis kyi khog dbub du 'byung ngo // nyad DAka pa ni/ gsum du 'dum par bzhed de/ dkyus dbye na pas thams cad du khyab kyang du 'jug pa gsum/ khyad par du 'jug pa gsum/ 'jug tu rung ba bzhi'o// dang po
220b3(rnying rgyud): ni/ rnam bye/ 'brel sbyor/ rang rkyen no// gnyis pa ni/ rang bzhin/ lem dgongs/ spyi don gsum mo// gsum pa ni/ gtar ga tshad ma bkung gzung / mtshon dpe/ bsnol mtshams 'phen sdad dang bzhi'o// zhes gsung / de dag kyang
220b4(rnying rgyud): snga ma las/ tshig don mos par bshad pa'i phyir// rnam par phye bas ma 'dres gsal// zhes so// gzhan yang / lha rje zur po che'i zhal rdza nas/ mtshon dpo dang sbyar te bshad lugs gsum gyi sgo nas bshad pa dang / rgyud 'brel man ngag rnams dang mi 'gal
220b5(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir bshad tshul bzhi'i sgo nas 'chad gsung / dang po/ mda' ltar rtse mo nas bzang ste bshad pa/ mdung ltar sked pa nas bzung ste bshad pa/ ral gri ltar yub nas bzung ste bshad pa dang gsum/ dang po ni/ mtshan gyi skabs su chos thams
220b6(rnying rgyud): cad gzhal ma 'bras gsum du dril nas 'chad/ gnyis pa ni/ le'u lnga par chos thams cad mtshan nyid gsum du dril nas 'chad/ gsum pa ni/ le'u za mar chos thams cad snang ba bzhir dril nas 'chad do// gnyis pa bshang tshul bzhi ni/ chung chud
220b7(rnying rgyud): kyis/ rgyud 'brel pas/ rgyud srub thabs kyis/ kyud man ngag gis bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ rgyas pa sogs bshad chud rnams dang sbyar te 'chad/ gnyis pa ni/ rang rang gi 'dod gzhung so sos spang khab sogs 'grel pa re re'am 'ga' zhig dbang
221a1(rnying rgyud): btsan par byas te chad/ gsum pa ni/ mnangag gre gzhung phra mo rnams kyis rgyud donadamigs rje steskabs dang myur nas 'chad/ bzhib ni/ de dag dang / khyad par zab samasas bshad rnams rten krung dang ldan pa'i rnam
221a2(rnying rgyud): dam pa'i gsung bgros kyis brgyan te 'chad do// tshul bzhi po de ni rdo blo phug pa'i brnyed kyis rgya cher 'grel gyi bshad lugs yin gsung skad do// de ltar bshad thabs rnams nges par byas nas/ kho ga gzhung gsal blon pas/ phas kyi lan gdab
221a3(rnying rgyud): 'bru mnan dang // khog dbyu bas bcad bzhi cu gsungs// zhes pas/ dang por spyi don gyis khog dbu bu brang du dkyus kyis bcad/ tha mar tshig gi 'bru gzhom/ gnas skabs khri'ur brgal lan gyis gtan la dbab pa'o// dang po la/ thun mong dang / thun
221a4(rnying rgyud): min gnyis pas/ dang po ni/ bstan pa spyi'i rnam gzhag dang / bye brag ni don lngar brdzus te bshad pa sogs sngar smais pa rnams so// gnyis pa ni/ 'cha 'gyur ltar nyu dgas ma dub bzhi la sogs pa'i sgo nas gtan la 'bebs pa'o// ba du dkyus kyis
221a5(rnying rgyud): bcad pa la/ de las/ rab la mtshan bstan 'dzir la dbye// bla ma dbug nyer dgrol ba'o// zhes pas/ dbang po rab pa mtshan bstan pa ldan pas lag gi rtsal bsten nas lus mgo mjug gi na dngos 'dzin pa lta bu/ 'brings rnam par dbye ba sman snod
221a6(rnying rgyud): byad lta bu/ tha ma la 'bru re gnyer res 'chad pa sman gcig kyang chos du mas gtan la 'bebs pa lta bu'o// / dang po ni/ bshad lugs gsum las mda' ltar bzung bas 'chad/ 'bring la rnam par dbye ba ni/ rgyud kyi rgyu dang rkyen dang / yongs su shes
221a7(rnying rgyud): par bya ba dang / dgos 'brel dang / gdams shing gtad pa dang lnga las yongs shes ni/ chung gnas skabs kyi dngos po re re bshad thabs bcu gcig pos 'chad/ gdams pa ni ral gri ltar bzung bas dang / gzhan rnams man ngag gi yi ge dang gsung spos
221b1(rnying rgyud): rigs pas 'jud do// dbang po zluma'i don no/ dbyas kyis bcad pa dang / rdzogag jug namya banyis thun rlong du bshad thabs btsun pa'i thog pa rna las bdun pa ma gtogs pas 'chad cing / de dag gi gnas skabs rje'u rang rgal lan ni bdun pa
221b2(rnying rgyud): gta ga shegs ser gyi chog gisung chad do// ma drang pa'i bzung ba ni/ le'u lnga pa khor deng rgyad bzlas so// tshul ba zhi'i sbyinas bshad pa naM/ le'ul ba'i/ bdud cir 'gyur zhing bzung ba dang / zhes sogs staza/ tshul bags bshang padang yod la/
221b3(rnying rgyud): su da // da da nas la / / sa lus
221b4(rnying rgyud): bshad krol ma med pa yin pas drang tsam du ma zad ba med kyi spyad kun g+hu 'chang thabs su sgyur ro// gnyis pa man dag gi ba shang thabs ni/ lung mchog bla ma las/ thos tshwa gas bu yid ces bya ba'i sbyid// mnu dag sbyidon ces 'gos nang nas gzhog/
221b5(rnying rgyud): zhes pas ces dgo / rdzas 'chad de/ khrungs la yid ches par bya ba'i phyir/ slob dpon gang gis mdzad pa dang / bka' dang mi 'gul lding theg pa'i gzung tshugs par zla ba'i phyed klad gang nas brnyas shing phyogs gar gtogs pa dang / brtan pa la mtshan nges shing
221b6(rnying rgyud): don gyi mngo tsam zhig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mthon ci las btags pa dang / brna mus pa ladon yod par bya ba'i phyi dgung zag gang gi don du mdzad pa dang / brjod byad don khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir dbu thabs su bsdus pa'i don du bstan pa dang lha'o// dang po'i
221b7(rnying rgyud): phyir btan pa'i 'jug pa gang zag pa rigs gnyis las/ rtogs ldan chos kyongs sa baphreng ba dag ni/ brjod du 'don du rjo byeng 'i rje babyor la spyon ma par 'thong na/ rtsom byed kyi gang drag su yin kyar 'dreg par 'gyu bas tsam pa po rlom mi ga rjod
222a1(rnying rgyud): sas yang nan/ smra nga / ga 'as san dang / ny-id kyi pa tan par tha papa da
222a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa ni/ rdo rje sems dkyi su 'jal dra ba'i rgyud las sa la/ phyogs sa phyinas pa 'o// gdul pa te/ mtshan gyi 'dogs grags pa/ phral dadu/ na pa dang / gang zag dang / gzang ci / ngan
222a3(rnying rgyud): dang rdzalas dgas/ dang / nga dgashegs pa'i nas/ gnyis te/ snam la pa'i ba napa/ 'i/ pa rloms brgya pa nga/ grub po las bdags pa badz+rang sas la /
222a4(rnying rgyud): dbyigagazhan dang rnama'i tham pa lta ba/ lA ba na/ rgya ma nyid las btags pa rgyag rgyas mag ta Ta/ ma btags pa zlog pa'i bajug shi pa phyogs sa thA/ dan sbyin sa rnams btags pa la sa che chung smradzu'o// dngag
222a5(rnying rgyud): los gang yin des brnang bsapas sgyu / gang dag pazhig ga na mdzad pa yang gis das // ni kyis bsdus pa dang / zhugs bzlas pa'i rgyaganyis sums par byun// gdogs chud pa'i
222a6(rnying rgyud): dag pa shang byin to// gsum pa des nga ltar 'argyad pa'i tshul la/ slob dpon dang slo pa ma'i mtshan no/ dI lta bya tan bya ma/ ji ltar cad nan byas pa'i bras pa'o// dang po la/ 'chad byeng rmob dpa na sumatshan da dang / bshad bya thal
222a7(rnying rgyud): ma'i mtshan nyid do// dang pon/ brgyad ldan te/ bsgred rdzogs gas me kyi don la mkhas pa sags pa'i mdo dag sum dang ldan pa/ phan dus thab mo'i dbang thab pas chu brdzogs pa/ gsang sngags papa' rgyal rngus sbed pas gsangs zhir thub pa dang/
222b1(rnying rgyud): yang na spyod ldan yal bar mi 'dod pa'i gnyer dang ldan pa/ rmad don dngos po bcu la mkhas pas slong bu'i shes rgyad 'gro la nus pa/ dkyil 'khor dang dbang gi rim pa dang zhi rgyas sogs las tshogs sgrub pa'i mtha' lam rmongs pa/ skran brgyad kyi man ngag 'chang ba
222b2(rnying rgyud): nyams myong dang ldan pas man ngag gi gdeng thob pa ste/ mdzod gsum so sor ba grangs pas brgyad do// de'ang lta ba'i mdzod a ti/ ting 'dzin gyi mdzod a nu/ spyod pa'i mdzod ma hA yo ga'o// de ltar yang lam rim las/ ston pa mdzod ldan chu bo rdzogs//
222b3(rnying rgyud): gnyer ldan chung dang las la mkhas// man ngag drod 'chang brgyad 'chang ba// ces so// 'o na 'dir/ khra ma dam pa la bsten pa zhes 'bod pa gang zhe na/ mtshon tu don gyi rgyud rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po sems kyi de kho na nyid dang / mtshon byed tshig gi rgyud rtsa bshad man
222b4(rnying rgyud): ngag dang bcas pa'i tshig don ston par mdzad pa po yin pa'i phyir de skad ces bya'o// rgyud sde rnams su slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid mang du gsungs na'ang / re zhig brgyad po der 'dus so// de lta na 'ang / don dam bsnyen pa las/ rtsod ldan dbang gis bla ma skyon dang yon
222b5(rnying rgyud): tan 'dres// rnam pa kun tu sdig pa med pa yod ma yin// gang zhig yon tan lhag pa yang ni legs dpyad nas// bu rnams kyis na de la brten par 'gyur ba'o// zhes pas mtshan nyid kun tshad ma rnyed na/ yon tan shas che ba la brten par gsungs shing //
222b6(rnying rgyud): 'on kyang med du mi rung ba'i yon tan ni/ dbang thob cing dam tshig la gnas pa/ gang 'chad pa'i rgyud dang dkyil 'khor gyi las lam rmongs pas slob ma rjes su 'dzin dus pa zhig nges par dgos pa yin no// de yang slob mas bla ma bsten pa na/ thog mar brtag
222b7(rnying rgyud): thabs gsum gyis brtag pa/ bar du btsal thabs gsum gyis 'tshol pa/ tha mar bsten thabs gsum gyis bsnyen pa dang gsum/ dang po ni/ chung nas gzhan la dris te brtag pa/ drang nas rang gis brtag pa 'dod lha dang pra sen la brten nas brtag pa'o//
223a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa ni/ de ltar brtags pas bzang por shes na/ zag nye reng dang / lus ngal dra ba dang / nor zad 'phangs la mi blta bar btsal bar bya'o// gsum pa ni/ de ltar btsal bas rnyed pa de nyid/ 'chig spos kyi sman ltar
223a2(rnying rgyud): 'bral med du bsten/ khong gi snying ltar gzu lums dang ngas chod mi bya bar bsten/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar bsnyen bkur la tshad bzung mi bya bar bsten par bya'o// mdong na bdag rkyen bla ma dam pa ma bsten par thar pa thob pa'i thabs med pa'i phyir/ bla ma ni sangs rgyas kun
223a3(rnying rgyud): las lhag par bltas la bkar bar bya ste/ dgodra 'dus las/ bskal pa 'brum gyi sangs rgyas pas// slob dpon gnyan par shes par bya// zhes sogs mdo rgyud kun nas rgya cher gsungs so// gnyis pa ni/ spyir gang zag lnga'i dbye bas sngar bshad pa nyid yin mod/ 'on
223a4(rnying rgyud): kyang bka' srol 'di nyid las 'byung ba ltar cung zad brjod na/ stod kyi skyon bzhi dngabral zhing / yon tan lnga dang ldan pa ste/ skyon bzhi ni/ thos pa'i snod gyon khri sbub pa lta bu dang / bsam pa'i sgod skyon zhabs pa rdo la dang gzhog ral lta bu dang / sgom pa'i snod
223a5(rnying rgyud): skyon dugacan lta bu ste/ lam ri ma las/ bcud chen 'dzag dang 'bo// mi chags ma rungs byed pa dang // zhes so// yon tan l+ya ni/ dang zla rgyan ltar ring ba/ tshul dge slong ltar zhib pa/ bsam pa gser ltar bzang ba/ blo ri rab ltar brtan pa/
223a6(rnying rgyud): lus dang longs spyod chos phyir gtong phod pa ste lnga'am/ 'grel pa spang khab las/ shes rab dang / snying rje dang / nogs thub pa ni snod dang ldan pa'o// zhes pas don go ba'i shes rab dang / gzhan don la spro ba'i snying rje dang / bstan pa'i don 'dzin nus pa
223a7(rnying rgyud): nags thub pa stogasum po bstan nas/ yon tan brgyang ngu'ang dbyer yod do// de ltar yang 'di nyid las/ sdod ldan dang tshul bzang la bstan// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// zhes so// de bas na rgyas pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te//
223b1(rnying rgyud): skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis rtogs// zhes pas rkyang bab mo 'di nyid dbang brtul gyi yul ma yin gyi/ dbang po rnon po'i spod yul yin pa'i phyir/ shes rab dang ldan pa sogs zos gsum tshang ba la 'grel par stod ldan zhes gsungs pa ni shin tu rigs pa yin no// dbang rnon
223b2(rnying rgyud): de la'ang dbyen/ rang bzhin gyi dang / sbyangs pa'i rnon pa'o// dang po ni/ de nyid las/ yangasA la rgya che gteng zab pa// shes rab zab pas rtogs par 'gyur// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ 'di nyid las/ thos pasam bsgom la rab spangs pa'i// shes rab mig
223b3(rnying rgyud): drang mo lnga sogs pas brtag pa/ ston d+ha reng me rung mkha' 'gro la gsol pa btab nas brtag pa dang / khyad par las la bkol zhing dag gis thab pa sogs spro ba'i sgonas brtags pas mi sgrog cing brtan pa ni dag nyen nan tshogs kyis rigs nges pa zhes bya/ zung bar 'os pa la/
223b4(rnying rgyud): de yang snying rigs nges pa la/ rang bzhin gyi dang / don mthong gi dang / dag nyen nan chags kyis rigasangs pa dang gsum/ dang po ni/ dbang rnon gsang sngags kyi rigs su nges pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ lbub rtogs nas gzhan gyis bskur du mi btub pa'o//
223b5(rnying rgyud): gsum po ni/ bshad ma zag pa de nyid do// gal te sdong dang mi ldan par shes na de zhig btang snyoms su 'jog pa'am/ yang na/ snod dang 'tshams pa'i drang don tshogs bshad tsam bshad du drang na pa shang par bya ba ste/ snga ma las/ 'tshams par sla bstan gcan
224a1(rnying rgyud): 'brang srin// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ thog ma kho nar/ dkon mchog mchod pa/ 'byung po la gtor ma btang ba/ gsung rab klag pa/ swAts+tsha gdab pa/ lam 'phrang gso ba sogs dge baji tsam 'grub pa'i rim gros bsod
224a2(rnying rgyud): nams kyi dpung bskyed par byas nas/ ji skad du/ slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs brtsam pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// zhes gsungs pa ltar slob ma snod rung du bya ba'i phyir dbang
224a3(rnying rgyud): bsgyur zhing / des kyang sngon du slob dpon mnyes par byas te dbang nod nas dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pas rgyud mnyan no// de yang rgyud don dngos la thug pa nas bzung ste/ bla ma brgyad pa'i gsol 'debs/ rdor sems bsgom bzlas/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo
224a4(rnying rgyud): bsgom pa/ mchod gtor dbul ba rnams byas la/ dpon slob gnyis kas sngon byung je lta bar bsgom pa'am/ yang na gsang 'dus las/ mdo 'don cho ga'i bya ba la// rtag par rdo rje chos su bya// zhes pa ltar 'chad pa pos bdag nyid gsung rdo rje sdang ba mtha' yas
224a5(rnying rgyud): su bsgoms kyang rung ste/ 'di nyid las/ smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// zhes sogs 'chad dbang gi bsam chung ngu snad mthar bsgom par gsungs pa'i phyir/ de ltar na nyan pa pos kyang rin 'byung du bsgom dgos par mtshungs te/ nyan dbang gi bsapa
224a6(rnying rgyud): chung ngu de ltar 'byung ba'i phyir ro// de nas rdo rje slob dpon la phyag sngon du 'gro bas yon dang maN+Dal phul la/ lus badzugs thal mo sbyar te/ e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i chung// dri med zab
224a7(rnying rgyud): mi brtag dka' bo// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud// ma lus gtan la 'bebs pa 'di// / rang gsang thabs kyis chod pa yis// 'gro ba kun la sman slad du// bcom ldan padag la
224b1(rnying rgyud): bshad du gsol// zhes lan gsum gyis gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ bla ma lnga bcu pa las/ pus btsugs thal mo sbyar ba yis// nyan sogs 'dod pas gsol gsum gdab// ces so// den dpon slob gnyis kas sgo gsum gyi sngon bcu gcig
224b2(rnying rgyud): spangs te 'chad nyan bya'o// gang zhe na/ nyal ba dang rkang pa gyod pa sogs lus kyi gnas ngan lan dang / rtsed mo dang / kyal ta dang / ca tse dang / zhe sdang ba'i brgal lan dang / ha cang rtog ge la 'tshel ba'i rtsod dor thal ba dang / man ngag med pa dang / rdzun
224b3(rnying rgyud): man ngag dang / ma spen pa'i skye bos thos pa dang / rked grags kyi sems dang / 'gran sems rnams spangs te/ slob dpon gyis sba ba'i rgyan dang ldan pas snod dang snod ma yin pa brtags la bshad pa gnyis kyi sgo nas 'chad cing / nyan pa pos kyang gus
224b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i spyod lam gyis 'dug ste/ bsam sbyor phun sum tshogs pas legs par nyan la// rjes su bka' drin dran pa dang / de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// gsum pa ni/ 'di nyid las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya gas
224b5(rnying rgyud): chen snying po 'di// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs// zhes dang / de ni nges par lung bstan te// sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin// sa rab rig pa 'dzin la gnas// zhes 'chad pa pos thob pa'i phan yon dang / yang / gang
224b6(rnying rgyud): gis 'di la mos gyur pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// zhes rgyud la mthong mos byas pa'i yon tan te/ gtso bor nyan pa pos thos pa'i phan yon no// yang / rgyal ba'i rig
224b7(rnying rgyud): pa 'dzin pade// 'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur// dam pa mchog dang dam pa yis// sras dang kun dgongs byin gyis rbab// ces dang / bshad rgyad rgya mtsho las/ sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyad chen 'di// mos dang mthong dang bris pa dang // bklags pa tsam gyis
225a1(rnying rgyud): 'grub 'gyur na// rtogs dang goms pa'i spong ba yis// 'bras bu thob pa smos ci dgos// zhes dang / he ru ka gal po las kyang / spu dang gsung thugs rdo rje ye// rnal 'byong 'dir gyur gyen chad ni// klog gam yang nasems kyang rung //
225a2(rnying rgyud): de yang rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// zhes pa rnams ni gnyis kab thob pa'i phan yon no// gzhan yang 'chad nyan gyi phan yon mdo sde las 'byung ba dag kyang bshad de slo ba bskyed par bya'o// man ngag des ji ltar bshad pa'i tshul bshad zin to// dpal ldan tung
225a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal snying po nyid// 'chad pa'i sngon 'gro'i rnam gzhag 'di// rje btsun gter chen bla ma yi// drin las pa na byung chos dpal gyis// legs par bshad las thob pa'i dgye// pad+mo'i gnyen dang sgron me ltar// 'gro ba'i nang gi sman pa ldan// sel ba'i dpa
225a4(rnying rgyud): du mangs byur // ces tu rlung ster ma nan nasang bang gzhal wang las/ sa dkrig pa dang pa sngon ma lce rnam padag zhag pa 'di yang thugs btsun gyim rnaMs drug kyi slong btsug rnas pa'i rab tu semos kyi ro la spang ba'i lo ga pa ni/ dge ba'i shes
225a5(rnying rgyud): gnyen dang rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa la gcig tu gus pa them ston o rgyan dpal 'byor ro// phyis lcags rta rang po so bdun pa las dmigs gnyis pa chud kyi lci don dngos nyid stan thog gcig tu rdzogs par brtsam pa'i tshe dbri ba snad cung zad bkyis te dag par byas pa'o//
225a6(rnying rgyud): skye sed+d+hi/ 'khor 'das chos kun rang rig byang chub sems// ljang stong dbyer med lhag pa chos kyi skar// ye nas rnam dag bde gshegs snying po ste// gzhi rgyud sems kyi chos nyid la phyag 'tshal// mtha' bral rigs lam mkha' la gtan tshogs rtas// drangs
225a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs grol lam mchog tsha zer can// shes thob byed pa'i sdang bas gzhi ji bzhin// gsal nus lam chud gsang ba'i snying por mos/ 2/ shes rab ral gri non pos ma rig pa'i// sgo nga'i sbubs brtol gnas lugs mngon kyar la// mthar thug 'bras chung ba de
225b1(rnying rgyud): ba gshegs pa nas// 'di tu can tha thar ban la 'dud/ 2/ phyung gzhi sbyor byed pa drang bras zi thal ste// gnasas papa bsum ste shes thob pa byed dang // ba ga nyid gtsug par ze ba deng thun chags do// rmongs pas pa de zag togs byung dadon dang/
225b2(rnying rgyud): nga gzhung lugs mang po'i thob rgya me ldan zhing // tshes rab 'byed pa'i shes rab mtha drang yang // tha ma'i drin gyis rnyed pa'i zab don gnad// zung zad dngas 'di brjod pa skyon yod yin/ de ltar ldan du 'gro ldi rnam par gzhug pas blo spangs nas/
225b3(rnying rgyud): bsgur batho cing mchog gis grang ba rnams pa'i yul ldan pa babra' 'jung bgang par zab len pas/ byer/ zag rna ge don pad pal 'drag par bya nye/ 'di lugasam/ khrangs la sto gyis bskyed pa'i bring pong gang byung bya 'i drus dang /
225b4(rnying rgyud): la don gtad chubs pas 'jug pa'i phying rgyung byin pa dang / che ba ldan pa byung do/ dngas pashad par// dang pa la/ ston pas sgra gzung rgyal/ de las de sbyang brgyad tshul lo// dang pal 'ang / 'od se ga'i bzhed pa dang / ng+ge'i rdo rje bded po
225b5(rnying rgyud): gci sa myong ngog das ga sa rje lag pan sa / dadangs dzu pa ladu jug dag dngas nga tshul pa na pa ga 'dug par byed /
225b6(rnying rgyud): dru ni ldan ga sa rung ga'adab pa dzad pa la gas pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bsngal nas thas pas/ btags pa'i rdzas de bzhag nas/ ye shes kyi smras 'og min drag shegs nas/ don bams pang thab pa'i brang chub sases dpa' bru bajogs pa'i gad cig par gnas pa
225b7(rnying rgyud): las/ rang gisas pas 'od kyi rdza 'thal gyis rnam ma pa'i dbyangs thams cad khyab par byab pas/ de bde gshegs pa thams cad sang gcig tu 'dus nas phyogs panor rigs kyi sangs rgyas kyis mngon par byang dub byin gyis brnabs pas mngon par rdzogs
226a1(rnying rgyud): par sangs rgyas so// gal te de ltar ma yin du zinan/ slob dpon med pa'i ye shes ni me 'thad pa nyid kyi zer ro// mtshan yang rdo rje dbyings chen po gsol lo// de nas shugs bzhin du po shes mi dbang gis bas nas/
226a2(rnying rgyud): rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu brtsegs pa'i khang par gyon nas/ de/ na nyid 'dus pa'i sde la sogs te yo ga'i theg pa chen po rnams bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes khrus pas/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du byon nas rdo rje dbyings kyi khang bzang chen por yang log 'theg pa rnams bka'
226a3(rnying rgyud): stsal to// de nas oM rgyan dang za hod kyi yul du gshegs nas rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti la sogs pa la gsang ba'i rgyud sde thams cad bka' stsal to// de nas slar dka' thub mdzad pa'i sar gshegs nas btags pa'i lus la ye shes slar zhugs nis/ de las bzhengs nas/ bsod
226a4(rnying rgyud): su sa
226a5(rnying rgyud): na/ chud dngos las/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa/ zhes 'byung ba ci'i phyir/ de mi yul du bka' stsal ba mi smos zhe na/ lan du/ de ni 'di ltar lags te/ rnam pa gcig du khungs gsang dgas pa dang / gnyis su gang gi tshe/ gang gi dus na
226a6(rnying rgyud): 'og min lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sras gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa ston pa de'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ sprul pa'i sras kyang / de'i dbang gis mi yul du'ang gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa 'chad par 'gyur ro// zhes ta thA a pa lo ki kar las gsungs
226a7(rnying rgyud): so// de nas mjug tu mya ngan las 'das nas lo nyi shu rtsa brgyad na nga'i chos 'di dag phyung la khungs lha yul nas babs par snyed la/ bka' yang dag pa'i don dang me 'gal ba 'phrer phyag na rdo rje'i mthus bstan to bag rdzogs shig/ rdo cing phyir zhe na/ sprang pa po yin pa'i
226b1(rnying rgyud): sbyid te/ gzhung 'di nyid nas kyang / raja gapang ba chog tur// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ngo ro// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ mchog gi sbal pus ma yul dul mthun mong pa bshad pa dang / dus mtshungs par ston pas 'og min du gsungs par brjedang /
226b2(rnying rgyud): las/ jug pa'i ston pa ldan gyis grub pa'i thabs dang / smon lam gyis go bya nas/ lce'u dang por chu snang bar mdzod/ gnyis par chen sngar/ gsum par thun mong bas gzhi'i ston pa drug snang bar mdzad do// rdzas mtshungs par zad dpa'i thung rnams byung ba'o//
226b3(rnying rgyud): zhes pa ltar/ rgya bod kyi rba ma phal cher 'di dang mthun par 'og min du gsungs par bzhed do// de yang / spyan 'grel las/ gsang ba'i 'og men dang grags pa'i 'og min dang / btags pa'i 'og min dang / don gyi 'og men dang / 'og min chen po las/ gdul bya
226b4(rnying rgyud): snang ba lam mtha' nyid du'o// zhes dang / sgyu 'phrul rdo rje las/ gtsang ma'i ris dag rnam spangs pa// 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na// zhes 'og min chen por grags pa chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du gsungs pa'i phyir/ dag ma dag gi zhing chas phye ba'i gnas phyogs
226b5(rnying rgyud): re ba gcig bsrub tu med de/ thugs thig las/ chos dbyings 'og min gsang ba na// lhan cig 'dus pa'i rin chen khang // zhes dang / bla ma'i 'grel pa mun se la las/ 'og min tshan po dbyings kyi gzugs brtan snang pa'i gnas su/ zhes dang / 'grel chung
226b6(rnying rgyud): las/ mtha' dbus med pa chos kyi dbyings// de ni gnas kyi bla mar 'dod// ces dang / rgyud las kyang / 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa/ zhes sogs gsungs pas/ 'og min chen po'i gnas su/ ston pa rigs drug pa kun tu bzang pos/ 'khor dgo
226b7(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis su med pa dang / rig pa khyad par can gyi 'khor rnams la bstan pa ste/ rgyud kyi gleng gzhi sgra ji bzhen pa ltar bzhed pa yin no// de ltar bzhed lugs gnyis las/ kho bo ni/ gor ltar bshad kyang mi 'gal bar mngon te/ mchog gi sbrul sku thub pa'i
227a1(rnying rgyud): dbang po yang ston pa rigs drug pa las chung gzhan du ma gyur pa byer/ mkha' rdza dang / chu snod ltar gdul bya gro d+ha pal so sar gsungs pa'ang mi 'gal ba'i rtser dang / lugs da gnyis kyang / snga mas 'og min du longs su
227a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa dang dus mtshungs par sprul mus mi yul du gsungs pa'i phyogs bzung zhing / de yang / khungs lha yul nas byung bar bskrad nas phyag rdor gyis ston cig par ston pas bka' gnang ba'ang bshad pa/ phyi mas de'i phyogs bzung nas longs su'i gleng gzhi dang sbyar te gsu
227a3(rnying rgyud): pas gnyis po 'gal med du 'chad thub cing / der ma zad kya dag zhud gcig la gleng gzhi bshad tshul tha dad pa gzhan las kyang 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal sta dra'i bshad rgyud las/ gleng gzhi rnam pa gsum yin te// 'og min gnas dang ri rab ced// 'dzam bu'i gleng
227a4(rnying rgyud): 'dir grags pa yin// byang chub sems dang lha rnams dang // mi rnams kyi ni don du gsungs// ston pa yang ni rnam gsum ste// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen dang // sprul gru 'khor lo bsgyur ba dang // shAkya thub pa nyid kyis gsungs// dus ni gdul bya 'dul
227a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshe// 'khor rnams 'dus pa'i dus der gsungs// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// de ltar lugs gnyis 'grel med du bsgrubs nas/ rang lugs ni/ brgyad pa'i bka' srol phyi ma nyid yin pas/ re zhig 'dir yang spar khab kyi lugs ltar bzung ngo // sngags
227a6(rnying rgyud): pa kha cig/ mi yul du srul sdus lam stegs kyi theg pa tsam las ma hA yo ga'i rgyud ma gsungs par 'dod pa ni shin tu mi rigs te/ rtsa rgyad du/ sprul skya'i bstan pa 'dul ba rnam pa bzhi las gsung gis 'dul ba'i skags su/ bla na med pa'i theg pa dang // zhes
227a7(rnying rgyud): dang / bshad rgyud kyi/ bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu// rnamathar theg pa bas ma yas ma lus 'dus// zhes pas 'chad dgos pa'i phyir/ de'ang 'di'i lam stegs kyi rgyud sde 'og ma rnams la dgongs so zhe na/ ma yin te/ de'i sprin 'brel las/
227b1(rnying rgyud): sa med du la ban nga brnams ngas pas/ rgyud thams da margya po/ ban pas shA gnas ma / s+ho// don/ danangs sa / dam pa'i bags sangs la gsangs// nas sa yang ma bas gas rtags pa
227b2(rnying rgyud): gzung sa pa dang / ngan 'di nas ma ldan// zhi phyogs sngags kyis 'byung bar yang brtan pa dang ga sa yinan/ 'dang/ bas padag// gsang sngags kyi stong mthar pa'i gdus thagags pa bzhad pas kyis 'byung bar yang bsan pa dang gas
227b3(rnying rgyud): zheng / stod wardal bshad pas 'dir dran med pa'i zag pa/ zhes gsungs pa dang mi 'gal lo gsungs kyang / sngags kyi snod du ma gyur pa'i rnal med la gyes 'byung bar lung bstan pal don med cing / skal lan la gyis 'byung bar lung bsar na/ de ka
227b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa dang yang 'gal ba'i phyir mnges so// rog gi zhal nas/ rgya'i theg pa rje snong gsum ni dngos su zhal nas gsungs pa'i bka' yin la/ 'bras bu'i theg pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i rje snod rjes su gdang ba'i sgo nas gsungs pas gnyis ka nga mi 'gal
227b5(rnying rgyud): gsungs te/ dang po la mdo'i gleng gzhi sogs kyis ma nges/ phyi ma la/ dpal snyan 'bras spangs su dras 'khor gyi hud gsungs pa sogs kyis mnges so// rang lpags/ re zhig rdo rje'i theg pas 'dul ba'i dus la ma babs pa'i phyir/ thub pa'i dbang pos
227b6(rnying rgyud): gdul bya lal gyi snang ngong yongs su grags par ma gsungs pas rigs can ladang rgyal po zla zang sogs la ma gsungs par mnges la/ phyig 'byung bar lung bstan pa 'ang 'jig rten du gsang sngags kyi sa yongs su grags par 'gyur ba la dgongs pa'i phyir skyon med // gcis
227b7(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ bshad rgyud tu mtsholas/ rgyal ba sems dpa' rnal 'byor pa// dgangs pa rig pa rna bar brgyad// ces pas gsum ste/ rgyal ba dgongs brgyad/ rig 'dzin rig pa'i brda brgyud/ gang zag snyan brgyad do// dang poni/ rgyal ba kun tu bzang bas rgyal tshab
228a1(rnying rgyud): rigs sngal gyud/ rigs rdzas rgyal sa sangs dpa' bags nyan cigapa 'dam sa babyud da// gnyis pa la/ mamagrin la brgyud pa dang / med mi ma yin pa gnyis kal bcung bganas/ dang ban/ rgyal sras sems dpa' 'a rnam/
228a2(rnying rgyud): kyinang nas rigs gsum gyis gdul bya rang rang gi bsam pa dang mthun par bstan cing dang bar mdzad de 'jam dmal gyis lha'i gnas su lha grags 'a phyogs skyong la bshad/ des lha'i rige 'dzin rnams la brgyad cing dar bar byas/ s+phan ras gzigs kyis klu'i gnas su/
228a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal mchen pa cag brgyad de dam par bgyud ci dang / byang rang gdod sbyin gyi nam ng+ge/ ga rdzu nga pol bshad de ri pa brgyad cing / gnyis pan/ thab pa dab kyang dulas dasadas \u0f7fbrgyad 'das pan/ mas
228a4(rnying rgyud): nga / mam ma 'jog pa/ gdod byed pa meng gdong / l+r-i rlos mas na/ rigs nag cing dri me pags pa te/ dam pa rigs can nga nga shi don pa gas pas lan tshul gyi mong na kyang rim la lag nas sunas yong pa ci /
228a5(rnying rgyud): gyi bya bas 'dus te/ gdung tshig bton pas/ phyag na rdo rje mngon sum du gyon nas/ rigs can lnga la bshad cing brgyad do// gsus pa la/ mi yul du rgyud 'di thog mar babs tshul dang / de las ji ltar brgyad tshul gnyis/ dang po la/ dus gang gatsho/ gnas gang
228a6(rnying rgyud): du/ gang zag gang la/ tshul ji ltar babs pa/ de la rtsod ba spang ba dang lnga/ dang po ni/ lam ri ma las/ gsang ba'i bdag pos mngon gshegs nas// lha klu gnod sbyin srin po dang // mi las skal ldan 'dus pa la// dang pos ji ltar lung bstan dus// rgyal
228a7(rnying rgyud): thi rigs can lhas gar nas// zhes pas/ ri ma lal phyir rigs can la la gsang bdag gis chos 'khor bkod pa'itshe/ de'i byin rlabs kyis rgyal po ngo la mr-isnas bdun gang dang / de'i zas thog tu/ sngo na thub pa'i dbang pos lung bstan pa bzhin du gas rdzogs
228b1(rnying rgyud): babs par bshad do// de'ang lung nga lta nga stan snyam na/ 'brur khyad tsamam gtogs du ma las gsungs par zlog don mthun par/ sdom 'byung gi tung zlum las/ ngani 'ang nas ma snyung nas// 'on brgyad dang bcug nyis na// zhwa gnas gzu du thags pa na/
228b2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i snying po dam pa zhig/ 'dzam gling shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi// rgyal po dza zhes bya ba la// bsod nams chen po'i mthus snang ba'i// gsang ba'i bdag pos sdang bar 'gyur// zhes so// 'o na/ gang du thub dbang gshegs nas lo nyir brgyad na babs par bshad
228b3(rnying rgyud): pa mi rigs te/ 'dir lo brgyad dang bcu gnyis na babs par bshad pa'i phyir ther na/ skyon med de/ lung 'dir bstan gyi lo bcu gnyis ni bcu tshan gnyis la dgongs pas don la nyi shu ste/ a ti zab don snying po'i lo rgyas las/ lo che brgya ngang nyi sha 'tsheHzhes
228b4(rnying rgyud): sasu byed/ nas
228b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po dzaHla rmi ltas bdun byung ste/ zhes sogs gsungs pa'i phyir/ gnyis pa ni/ rgya gar shar phyogs za hor gyi yul dang nye ba la ng+ka'i yul gyi re ma la ya'i shad lho'i ngos na a su 'brag phug bya ba yod/ der rgyal po dzaHba sgrub pa mdzad cing bzhugs pa'i yang thog tu babs
228b6(rnying rgyud): par bya mgong ma rnams bzhed mod kyi/ sher phyin tshul brgya lnga bcu pa'i 'brel bar za hor gyi yul nyid du babs par gsungs so// 'o na lang+ka'i yul de na hor kyi snying khor na yod bgrang gis shes zhe na/ de ni mdo'i 'grel ba sman bskyugs 'grol pas/ za hor wal gyi
228b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor na// mthu stobs zhabs bcags ma la ya// gnam lugs 'bar ba'i ri rtse na// zhes so// de la kha cig/ lang+ka rba tor gyi nye 'khor na yod pa'i rigs te/ lang+ka 'ayul rdo rdo rje gdan gyi gyo nub na yod la/ za hor ni shar na yod pa'i phyir zer/ lan dus ston chen po ni/
229a1(rnying rgyud): da sa /
229a2(rnying rgyud): sa / ma dza // gsus thA / nags// dru sa // seMn po lad pa 'i brji ma// len dag du na/ yon pasas// ngan 'du / ga

229a4(rnying rgyud): don 'di snyam te/ lan yu yi na ba yo gros ma pa'i dogs pa 'di/ rgos bab tshod da rma tu byung byed pa ste/ 'di ba zi la ris pa d+mo la rnam yin par gyi/ na gang dzin/ na com ldan 'das
229a5(rnying rgyud): larbAng bdag pa tho grogs kyi ma snyen brdas ldan dudrung sa thob chen pos thus pa yang / lan ga shegs pa'i mdo ga sungs phyi byu pa sa po mang gag rgyu gyims na medan du ma cing / ngas spyod napos nga bas la la dang / kyis na/
229a6(rnying rgyud): dang niseng shes du chu bas/ da s+ya sa sbya gling zhes thags pa de yin te/ parta rten lan ra 'junas/ sid+d+ha pa'i snong de ni srung byas 'da'i gling dru gas 'di ste / maHsa 'angs pa dang parda'i ga par rdzo tham pa badzugs pa
229a7(rnying rgyud): nga 'i 'a gru sa su na du sa gyu ma
229b1(rnying rgyud): gyi sa'i cha khyab par yod pa dang / gling de na sa ma na klu Ta zer ba' bo sum gcig yan chad brag ri'i thebs bskong bas kyi bo gal gyis bgrod mi nus pa der/ paN chen 'khor bcas kyis 'byor thang pa sogs kyi gtam rgyu dgasu zhes rnam thar las 'byung
229b2(rnying rgyud): zheng / paN chen gyis gling der lo drug bzhugs par grags pas gtam khrungs btsun par ma zad/ skyes bu de ni kun gyis rtsod med du bkur ba'i mkhas grub yin pa'i phyir/ 'o na/ lho nub rnga yab gling na'ang / ri bo ma la ya sogs yod par bshad
229b3(rnying rgyud): pas mi 'gal lam zhen/ gnas kyi sring dang / mtshan nyid de 'dra ba ci rigs gzhan na med pas mthab ste/ 'dir bstan gyi u sur dang ming gcig ba rgyab la mtshams na'ang mod la/ 'i zed kyi kyang rgya klung chen mor gsungs pa'i gnas sit+pa la tha~M
229b4(rnying rgyud): de'ang 'dir bstan dang don mi gcig par rgyud de las gsal ba'i phyi ro// 'di ltar 'thad pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan yang yod de/ ana?'i rgyud rnams lang+ka'i yul du babs par kun la grags pa ltar/ kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i thabs kyilam
229b5(rnying rgyud): mchog 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi lelu lnga bar/ ma hA yo ga'i rgyud rnams ni rgyal po dza'i khang steng du 'bab par 'gyur la/ a nu yo ga'i rgyud rnams ni sid+d+ha la'i nags tshal du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ zhes lung bstan pa'i phyir/ des na gling der kha skad du su
229b6(rnying rgyud): ma nA k+Sha Ta zhes grags pa'i ngo bo yod par gsungs pa'ang / 'dir bshad pa'i drag shul can gyi ri'am/ ri bo ma la yang grags pa de yin nam snyam du sems te/ 'gro de dka' ba sogs mtshan nyid cha 'dra ba yod par snang ba'i phyir/ 'o na/ rim la pa'i
229b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid kyang gang zhen sman pa lcags 'grol las/ gyen rtsal gyi rgyal po gnas// ngos la phrag dkar gyi tshugs pa// seng gi gnam du mchongs 'dras brgyad// kyi sman rtsa brgyad tshang bar 'brangs// 'du ba'i nad kyi'i yongs mi rdzogs// spyi bo ga la n+tu
230a1(rnying rgyud): sa gtsug pang gnas pa pa// mdang ldan da pa tshang bcas pa// mal ldan rnams kya brjod par ma// skal mad rnams byas yangs mtha// 'as// gsas / 'gros / mas
230a2(rnying rgyud): lar// bzhi pa ni/ rgyal pa nyid gsang sngags kyi chung la thub pa mdzad cing bzhugs pa na ma lhas bdun 'ang \u0f7f/ de 'du mda' 'phrul pa yang bstan ma lus/ bdag nyid la sus bdun sha ste/ 'di yang / lug sung thugs rtags ni ma brdeg// ngan chen
230a3(rnying rgyud): thugs pas babs pa dang // rdzas bye bas pabyas pa dang // srin dam par bzhugs pa dang // mchong ba chen bzlas pa dang // de chen chang dububs pa dang // sangs rgyas sa la 'ang brtan pa'o// gsags sa/ kha zhig ni lam gnyis pa dang gsum pas
230a4(rnying rgyud): brngas nas 'chad de/ mdo 'grel la shes drang ba rgyan gyi lugs su bzhed do// de nas ma lus dang mthun par dngos sgra rang gi khang thog tu gsang sngags rgya sde'i glegs pa ma dang / phyag na rdo rje'i sku khru gang bzhig babs te/ gsol bcad/ pa btab pas rdor sems zhal
230a5(rnying rgyud): mthong gi le 'dugs nas/ de dang phyag rdor gyi sul brnyan te zla ba drug bsgrub pas rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mang la zhing byin gyis rlobs pa'i mthas glegs pam gyi don ma lus par mkhyen to// zhes rje bla ma'i gter byon gyis ta lo d+has las gsungs/ snga rabs kyi tham
230a6(rnying rgyud): phal cher/ rmi ltas bdun bung bsad nas yang thog tu byon pas phyag rdor gyi sku rnyed de la brten te zla ba bdun bsrubs pas glegs bam rnams dngos su babs pa la brtags na rtogs par 'dug kyang / gdul bya rgyud la rang dgar 'jug pa dgag pa'i phyir ma rtogs
230a7(rnying rgyud): bltar bstan nas/ glegs pa ma rnams shing rta la spun drangs te u ba dA dza la bstan pas brdam 'jal/ de nas dge slong ku ku rA dza la bstan pas/ des rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mthong gi le'u rtogs te bsrubs pas zhal mngal nas phyag rdor gyis gyon par

230b3(rnying rgyud): ka la 'gal ba med de/ rgyal po nyid kyis rtogs kyang / gzhan gyi gzu lums dang ras gcod dgag pa'i phying ku ku rAng la bsten pa ltar mdzad pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang 'dir ni rgyal po rang gis rtogs pa'i phyogs legs te/ rgyal po nyid kyis mdzad pa'i lam
230b4(rnying rgyud): nam bkod las/ shar phyogs ir+g+ha'i lung ba na// rgya lung rdo rje brdzogs pa ru// rigs can in+d+ra Sh+Ta tings// gsang ba'i bdag pos mngon bstan pa'i// sgra 'phrul dra ba'i sgrub pa yang // tshom bu la bcu kyang dang bcas// phyag na rdo rje mngon thab ste/
230b5(rnying rgyud): len bcul zhugs spyod pa'i dbang // dge bar bsrung nas sdig pa med// de nas sa la reg par byas// zhes dang / sangs rgyas gsang ba'i lam rim gyi lung snga ma'i gros las/ 'brel pas snang la mngon brtags pas// thugs kyi sgrub pa mtshan rtags te/
230b6(rnying rgyud): nyid sgo nas de nyid pa pa// brtan pa'i dngos grub de nas 'thob// don dam bcud kyis de nas rgyas// 'dod pa'i bsam pa de ru 'grub// ljon pa'i lha dang de ru mangs// ges rang gis rtogs par bshad kyi/ gzhan la brten par ma bshad pa'i phyir ro// de la hA
230b7(rnying rgyud): bcwabargyang ni/ spang bas paphral cher/ sdug sung thugs yon tan sbyin las kyi spyang gsum gsum ba skye// spyi spya gas mi skye bcwa brgyad do// zhes bzhed/ dpal 'brang dam 'i 'phral ba myo dpon kra rlangs mdzad par/ gragasang thugs yon tu ldan

231a4(rnying rgyud): mi 'thad de/ skal med la de ltar 'gal yang / skal ldan la nges pa med pa'i phyir mtha' gcig tu dgag pa mi rigs so// rgyu mtshan dgyes dor dang gdan ba ni sngogs kyu lbab kyis lpag par ba rdzus nas oM D+yan nas bcus te bros pa mkha' 'gro rnams kyis bdas kyang

231a7(rnying rgyud): bris pa med pas/ sa zhig gis rnas byed bag pa nga me byer da gas chags rangs bral dil ming dragags pa'i jug dang yang yod/ phyi zung ba ma pang las/ gsung dang dri ba rgyas par du /
231b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rbAs mi yul dum brgyad du bzhugs pa rjod/ sarba bu d+has pa yog dang / klubs ma lasags pas 'dul zhing / de nas theg pa de dag gi sbyong dugyur pa 'dzam du'i gling gim yul na med sa rgyal chen rags bskul sogs pa'i gnas na ska rnams dang bzhal pa
231b2(rnying rgyud): bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs paskrod du gyur nas/ rdo rje tshe mdo sde den bzhugs so// slad kyis sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu ma hod kyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa 'o mtshar gyur te/ chos pa dang pa zhig 'dus pa theg pa de'i 'dulas
231b3(rnying rgyud): du gyur cing snod du gyur nas/ sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga la sogs pa mdo sde chen po rtso ba rgyang byug non rje'i byin rlabs kyis rba hor kyi yul du gshegs pa dang / za tsor b+hi rgyal po in+d+ra d+hA tis mdo sde bsdus pas brda ma 'phrod nas/ gang gis shes mngon thos kyis bsta
231b4(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ sre ba dbus sde dge slong nas nA dza tI na re bsnyen gyi stong la chos 'chad/ mthon che bzhin gyi de dag la dam tshig gi mongs spyod mdzod pa zhig bzhugs pa theg pa'i snod du gyur la/ bdag gi 'dul skam du 'gyur ba 'dra 'dunas/ rgyal pos 'oH btang
231b5(rnying rgyud): slo dpon ldan drangs pa dang / slob dpon gyis mngon gas kyis brtags pas bdag 'dul gal bu'ang babs/ bdag kyang mdo sde'i snod du 'gyur bar shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang mdo sde de dag slang ma bltas na/ brtsal rgyal po the tshom dag ma sel bar gyur na mi d+ha
231b6(rnying rgyud): skar nas/ mdo sde tshur byings te bltas pa na/ mgo mjug gang yang bsti ba'i rdzam mchis nam/ de nyid du lus byardabs te/ mgon med do// skyabs med do// zhes bos pa dang / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par gshegs te/ khyod ci 'dod ces dri
231b7(rnying rgyud): sa/ bdag ba po 'di brtas btsam gyis zhes par 'dod/ bas gsol ba dang / de bzhin gnang ngo // de zas sa rba prag+has pa yo ga la sogs pa'i glegs pa ma rnams la bye bar de dge gi don yid la mngon sum gsal bar gyur to// de nas slob
232a1(rnying rgyud): zata mtha lung gshegasanasacal ba'ab dang bcas sa tsamad dag pa na dang // dang pa da sams drub su zang bstan pa/ rtsal pa'am dang bcas pa rnams 'a dbas cad pal bdag bag na pa ma brgyag das/
232a2(rnying rgyud): dam sang rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dang / de'i sras 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sram ma lakhar dang bcas pa nam / sa la gnas pa'i rig 'dzin du grub pa// de nas sras mangs rgyal bu la lung dang man dag bzhag pa las 'phel ba ni nga sang pe/ 'di lags te/ zhes

232a5(rnying rgyud): ga mas pa bzhin pa// ma gage legs pa sa shings pa'i// brel bad na to// nga / ga' nga ma khan na 'ad kyim la ga zig la yang 'i ma babs pa ga pa ma

232b4(rnying rgyud): gyis/ pacwa chen brim la mi thal bshad/ des pad du la rdzab ma rin chen mchog dang / gtegs dz+nyAn kum gnyis la bshad cing / mnga' ba dag pa ba can grangs sums pasrung zhes rje gsung ba nid kyang / kun mkhyen chas rje'i dgangs pa ltar ma gtags thu ma shes
232b5(rnying rgyud): mnga' ba dag pa srong gi ngas bsgyur gsung ba 'di 'thad par mangs/ spang bzud 'di la bang du lo d+ha brdibs pa'i gzhi 'gyu gsapa dang / paN+Di ta med pa'i rtsal 'gyur gnyis te 'thar 'byung bar grags pa las gzhi 'gyur gsum na/ sangs rgyas gsang bdang po
