232b7(rnying rgyud): dang / 'gas pa rna pa gzhin nu gangs kyi 'gyur ba cas gnyis sa// sngar/ gdub sa sangs rgyas pa sa la ra ga tugs gnyis las bcud pa ba phral gsum pab te/ dbang ma na can mcha gags/ gtsug tu rin chenaganan du dang /
233a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ mchog rtswang gnyis la bshad/ de gnyis kas dang rje dpal te grags pa dang nang rgyal ba'i yan tan gnas la bshad/ dang rje las yangs grags dbus chags pa dang // khams grags pags bkan sal gnyis su shes/ zhang lag nga
233a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes kyis gsan/ 'di la sgra 'phral gdams dag lugs sa man bu lpags su thugs te bka' sal ga cag na// yang / srab pa na padz+ra dang ba ma la gnyis ka'i thab ma gnyigs d+hA nas/ sag pa dpal gyi yaM shes la bshad des gzubs pa
233a3(rnying rgyud): bshad de bka' grol gcig go// yang cha gnyigs tha ma ga slob ma tha byang chub 'ang dang // khyang po dmiga'ang gnyis las// bus nang dang // glang pos dang rdo yab shang / zhang gis mkhas pa gtsug kyir rnam gnyis dang kha'i bshad bka' gtso bar bzung bas ba
233a4(rnying rgyud): phyug gis nying shes rab mchog la bshad/ des nyang ye shes 'byung gnas pa des lharnga zur po che shAkya 'byung gnas la bshad/ de la slob martsa mo bzhi/ rtse zhag dang wa/ skomachan brgya rtsa bcang sogs byung ba las/ rtse mo bzhini/ mi nyag 'byur
233a5(rnying rgyud): grogs/ zhang 'gas chung ba/ bzang sgom sher rgyal/ lha rnga zur chung pa shes rab grags pa rnams so// je zur chung ba la/ srob ma kab bani/ gdung ma brgyad/ phyam bcu drug/ dral ma sum cu rtsa gnyis/ yus pa che mi gnyis sogs mang dky-ir
233b1(rnying rgyud): du laka ba bzhin/ rtags chen gyigab rdzun 'a// mnga' klub yang bang nas/ zla 'dul lag pazhanas bzang ba// ldan nub pakapa ma la gnas nag/ spya na nang pa 'das/ chags ca rda 'bar dang / gsang bdag tu nags/
233b2(rnying rgyud): yin pa shAH dag gnyis las/ rje phrug pas yab kyi slob maka ba bzhi dang / yan nyam la~M ba shAs byang chub rnams la gtugs te legs par gsan/ skye thug pa la gdug ga zags kyi sgrub mgra pa 'dzin pa stong dang / de nang nas kyang zugs zin kyi pa
233b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi gsum bcu gnyis te/ de la nag po bzhin/ zur nag 'khor lo// kye kun rgyanag pa/ nyang nag mang na/ 'dar nag gtsug ta dbang phyug ga ma bcig ste dpal song zer/ ston bzhen/ nyerten/ grabs ston/ zhang stan/ rgya ston nam/ ma
233b4(rnying rgyud): grinas gnyen ston dang / kha rag ston snying bstan pa'ang mthong ngo // me bzhini/ g.yung ston nyor po/ sAng sten lcags kyu gtsang ba byas ston dgras pa chos seng ste/ des sngon du thi ma gnyis sre nas shangs pa rtsese rab dang / bya ston rdo rje grags gnyis bgrangs
233b5(rnying rgyud): de yang la steng pa gtsang nag 'da' bar gyis/ rje rje phrag pa dang / thar dpal le/ gtsang pa gyis nyon rnams la 'ang can mod kyi/ gtso bar thugs thag gcod pa ni/ nyari drings pa lce ston chas seng // gtsang nag gis/ gzung gi mi thun mgan
233b6(rnying rgyud): bal bshad/ des bro shes rab tshul khrims la/ des rta nag bdud 'dral 'bum la/ des mnga' shAH 'phel la/ ngas zung thams cad mkhyen pa thams pasang ge la/ des sbalam pa 'grastan pas ma 'thub rdo rje la/ des sgral chen sangs rgyas ngan ldan la/
233b7(rnying rgyud): nges 'gos lo thams cad mkhyen pa gzhon nu dpal la/ des spyan snga rin po che ye shes dpal bzang po la/ des slar chos rgyal rin chen phran tshogs la/ des rang grol nyi tha sangs rgyas la/ de la 'khon cha dbang nor rgyas kyis gsan pa ni slar khab kyi bshad
234a1(rnying rgyud): thal dang wang gi bzud pa sdug sang ga sa na/ mdang shAH 'phel dang / ra byams seng gnas pa/ gsung ston da nga pal gyis gsun/ des thag tub bsan pa mapar 'phrul/ ngas chub tham pa phragasu pa/
234a2(rnying rgyud): des rgya po sa thar bas ma 'grub la/ ngas slob dpo na u legs pa la/ dal 'khon rdo sgras cha de bang nor chas kyis gas na nas/ rang gi sras lung rtogs kyi mnga' bdag dpal 'byor ldan grub la bshad/ des thar chen bkra shis kun dga' la/ des smras
234a3(rnying rgyud): snyid gsang bdag dpa' ba zhin las sman thapa dngul bzang po la/ des bka' dzin marnangs med ga tur chen tshas kyi rgyal po gter bdag nying ba 'dugs bral rdzogs pas sa chud las rnam par rgyal pa'i snrel/ des bdug gnyis kyi ban rdung d+ham nIl
234a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rjes bzhin du stsal to// gzhan yang ste 'phrul ni khro'i dbang dang man dgra r+b+ha gzhung phra mo'i dpe lung mang po dang / lo ts+tsha pa chen po d+ha mablangs mdzad pa'i rtig tshul bzhi yan lag bco lnga pa dang / kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po'i TIgatshogs bcu mnas la rnams kyi
234a5(rnying rgyud): bka' wang yang bdag la sbal zhing / b+hu 'phrul sde brgyad/ bshad chud sde ba'i/ rgyud phran dar bcas pa rnams ni/ grogs rdo rje theg pa 'din gyi dag 'dun nyis bacha brgal ba dang thabs rtseg par b+ha 'gyur thar med bu'i rkad 'brum chin mo stan thug gcig tu stsal ba'i/
234a6(rnying rgyud): dus legs par nod cing / rtsa bachung dang / brgyad rtsapa ni gnas skabs gzhan du'ang lan du mar bka' drin du stsal te/ de dag gi brgyad pa dang / btud pas so'i sgra che ba'i pho rgyas la sogs pa ni 'dir yi ge mang gi dgas nas ma bkod pas gzhan las
234a7(rnying rgyud): shes par bya'o// mdor na bdag cag gi dpal ldan bra ma dam pa sa'i steng na 'gran pa'i zla thams cad dang bral ba'i gtso bo gcig pu pa/ mtshan brjod par dka' ba rje btsun thams cad mthun pa gter chen chos kyi rgyal po zhes lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten du rnam
234b1(rnying rgyud): par grags pa 'din/ ster thal ba'i bstan pa yangs sa dgas pa dang / thazags 'gyur na zag pa ka' gtu thams cad mnyan pa padang / zad par sgra phrul zhi po slor ba bang bka ba shang bka' gdams dag pan lag dang bcas parlab par bya
234b2(rnying rgyud): nA rje na pa nyid 'di'i nges pa gsal bar mdzad pa'i phying slar yang phyin pa lags pas/ nges pa'i don ni dzin paci 'di drug pa rnangs ti rgyad zad du byung ba yinan// gnyis pa che ba na/ log gzung gas la ldan las// rang bzhin gsang par
234b3(rnying rgyud): snying pa 'di// gzhan las 'phags pa'i chab bcad// ces pas bcad de/ rgyud thams cad byinal ba yin pas nges par chu ba gzes nags la pa'i rnamasaT/ theg pa thams cad kyi yang kyi yin pas che ba dbus kyir po mjug rab rta ba/ bstan pa/
234b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi 'tha thang yin pas rdug byung blanas pa na/ lu rnams cad kyi grol man mas ca nam mkhas pas rgyab gam/ de na ga shegs pa thams cad kyi dgangs pa lan chags min pas che baN+Dal pa bka gas ba
234b5(rnying rgyud): mi lta bu/ 'bras bu thams cad kyi thugs yin pas che ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin chen sta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gshegs shul yin pas che ba skor lam gyi shul lta ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi lam yin pas che ba khri la ma
234b6(rnying rgyud): prasde bcad do// de las dang pon/ ji ltar nyi ma'i snang ba ni snang ba thams cad kyi rgyal po yin pa bzhin du rgyang 'ang nyid kyang chud thams cad kyi rgyal po ste/ rgyas pa las/ gsang ba'i snying po ngas pa ni// gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal ba yin// zhes pa/
234b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa ni/ ji ltar lhun pa'i tsher byin na re bran thams cad mig 'og tu chung ba ltar/ chud 'di'i don rtogs na theg pa thams cad kyi dan 'dir 'dus pa'i phyir de thams cad shes par 'gyur te/ snga ma las/ mnyam nyid don rtags dang rig rgyal

235b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad las 'di la brtan nas sangs rgyas paH/ 'di nyid lam/ 'das dang daltar byung ba sa// chal ba 'dakyis ga bar ma lus can// brtas nas rbA ma ldan gyis rdugs// zhan so// bcad pan/ dzag gnas dar slar 'gro' gyur rnams byung la mdar
235b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba bzhin du/ ma 'ongs pa na 'tshang rgya 'gyur rnams kyang lam 'di kho na la brten nas 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ 'di nyid las/ babyung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis ldan gyis 'grub par 'gyur// zhes so// gsum 'tsho ba de lhun gyi rnang ngon
235b3(rnying rgyud): bshad pa ni/ de yang chud dbu zhabs kyi don thams cad kyang dgos 'brel yan lag pazhi ldan du gnas te/ thugs drig las/ brjod 'brel dgos dang yang dgas dang // chu D+yan yan lag bzhi du 'gyur// zhes so// de'i don gyis dgos sogs mthong na rngon/
235b4(rnying rgyud): res par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ re zhig thog mar dgos 'brel brjod pa la/ dri bas mtshams sbyar ba dang / lan gyis rgyas par bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ gyi ma'i rgyud 'gos 'gyur las// 'di la brjod par gyur pa gang // 'di yi dgos
235b5(rnying rgyud): pa'ang ci zhig yin// 'dir bshad pa rnams ji ltar 'brel// brjod par byed pa gang la brjod// ces so// gnyis pa ni/ de las/ stong nyid snying rje sbyor ba ni// brjod par bya ba 'dir bshad do// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni// dgos pa'i
235b6(rnying rgyud): gtso bo'i rang bzhin phyir// 'jig rten pa yi lam gyur pas// sna tshogs rang bzhin mtha' dag go// thabs dang thabs byung 'brel pa ste// bla ma skyob ma dag kyang ngo // gang gis brjod bya 'chad byed pa// de ni rjod pyid du bshad do// zhes gsungs pa
235b7(rnying rgyud): spyad/ mtshan byang nga bzhin gyi rgyu gzhi las 'bras gsum gcig kyi byung ba'i drung 'jug dang bzhin gyi chos su ni rjod bya ste/ chog ga zung sa/ mtshan bya nga bzhin gnam skyed// zas so// dazing du chung par bya 'i phying / mtshan byed ge'i drud du/
236a1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' gyu 'phrul du bca bshad kyi chud rnams ni rjod par byed pa ste/ de nyid las/ sgo spyar med par bstan dran// mtshon byed srung thul drab ste// zlos so// dzod byed la brten nas rjod rtswa'i don rnams shes pa/
236a2(rnying rgyud): ni dgos pa ste/ de las/ mdzub mos ri bong can bzhin no// zhes so/ de ltar shes pa'i don nyams su blangs pas thun zong gi dngos su bathob pa ni nyid dgos phra mo dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa'i zung 'jug phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub thob pa
236a3(rnying rgyud): dgos pa'i yang dgos pa mchog ste/ de las dgos pa'i dgos pa 'bras bu ting / ces so// de'ang brjod bya rjod byed gnyis shes bya shes byed dang / rjod byed dang dgos pa gnyis thabs dang thabs byung dang / bla ma dang slob ma'i 'bel ba ni don
236a4(rnying rgyud): rtags kyi khyad par gyis rdo ba nyid dang snod bzud du 'brel la/ dgos pa dang nyed dgos gnyis de las de byung da / nyeng dgas dang brjod bya gnyis du bo bdag nyid gcig par 'byil ba rnams ni 'brel bste/ d+hag mis rig pa bu pa'i smon mar/ med
236a5(rnying rgyud): na mi 'byung rag las 'brel// zhes so// de lta bu'i don dang ldan pa'i hud 'di bshad pa'i dbang du byas na/ spyir the ma chen po gsang sngags kyi sgor spang ba spyod pa'i skyes bu blo gros can rnams gyis don du nyi yang gtso bo ni gzhan don phun tshogs te/ ji skad
236a6(rnying rgyud): du/ gzhan don phun tshogs sangs rgyas kyi// 'bras bu gtso bo yin par 'dod// ces so// de'i rten ni rang don phun tshogs kyi byang chub ces grags pa 'bras byung yin la/ de mngon dupyod pa'ang nyid len gyi chu dang / lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen gnyis tshang

237a3(rnying rgyud): dbye ba ni gsum nyid do// gsum pa ni/ sgyu 'phrul bye brag bstan pa las// tshad ma gsum gyi dngos po yis// rnal 'byor gsum gyi phung po la// rigs dang snang ba'i yan lag bzhag/ de nyid thur ma'i mchog tu nges// zhes pas 'khor 'das
237a4(rnying rgyud): gyi chos thams cad ma 'dres la yongs su rdzogs pa ni bya ba gzhi'i rnal 'byor te/ bya ba ni rgyu/ gzhi ni gnas lugs/ de'i don la bzos smad med par ye nas gnas pa'o// de'ang mdo'i don bsdus las// phyi nang bye brag ji snyed pa'i// chos rnams
237a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad byung chub sems// ji bzhin dang du ye gnas pa// shes par bya ba'i rgyud doni yin// zhes so// lte ba dang ting nge 'dzin gnyis med kyi 'jug pa byed pa rkyen gyi rnal 'byor te/ shes thob kyi rkyen du gyur pa'i byed rtsol gyi ngang du blo gnas pa'o//
237a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bur smin pa ni bya ba byas zin pa ste/ des rang gzhan gyi don gnyis med mngon du gyur pa la dbang 'byor pa ni bya bral 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor ro// 'o na 'dir bstan gyi rnal 'byor gsum dang / mdo'i don bsdus las/ bya ba gzhi dang byed pa rkyen//
237a7(rnying rgyud): bya bral 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor dag/ ces gsung pa gnyis dgo pa gcig gam tha dad zer na/ g.yung ston chen pos/ lam rim so so'i go mthun partsi tshul na gcig par mdzad kyang / rnal 'byor phyi ma gnyis 'di dang bzhed tshul za dad par mngon te/ de las
237b1(rnying rgyud): rtsol bang spyod pa 'dren 'jug pa'o// theg pa deni bya byed cen// zhes kun 'byung 'dren pa'i theg pa gsus la byed pa rkyen gyirna la 'byor dragasungs pa dang / gzhan du 'bras byar grol med// bsgrub pa nyid lalam gnas pa// thabs chen theg 'di bya thal ba /

237b3(rnying rgyud): 'byor phyi ma la/ spyan 'grel las/ mthar thug gi rnal 'byor bya ba med pa'i rkad du byung zin pas mi 'gyur ba 'bras bu'i rigs so// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// yang 'dir rigs dang zhes pa'i zur gyis rigs gsum du'ang 'gyur te/ ngo bo gzhan du mi
237b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur zhing ma chad pa phye mo'i rigs dang / sems lnga bskyed pas chos nyid kyi rgyud du byung zhing / de'i mi mthun phyogs su mi gtong ba rtsol ba'i rigs dang / rgyud du byung zin pas lam rtsol gyi bya ba med pa 'bras bu'i rigs dang gsum du bshad do// bzhi pa

240a1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin yang dag yid ches d+ha// zhes so// des na lung ni 'di nyid las// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// dang byung kun dmas ldan gyis thub// ces so// man ngag ni/

240a7(rnying rgyud): snang ba ste/ spar khab las/ rang rig pa'i lugs kyi cir yang snang ba/ ces so// gsum pa ni/ snod bcud sngang zhen gyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad de/ rim gsum las/ 'ang sdod bcud 'jig rten gyi// snang dang zhen pa chos rnams so//
240b1(rnying rgyud): gas pa lan myong ban/ byed nas dbugs su kyis bskyod bkun mong dang mchogagis sa shA'am sams sum thob sa/ dngas/ rab shes rab rnam gsam gyis// sems sa skyes par bstan pa yin// zhes dang / na 'as /
240b2(rnying rgyud): lnga sems ldan pa'i shes rab nyid// skye ba'i gzhi dang skye nges pa'o// zhes so// gsum pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni/ rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga'am nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/ lam ri ma las/ spu dang gsung dang bugs nyid dang // yon tan phrin las
240b3(rnying rgyud): rmad byung ba// lnga'am lnga nyid ngo bor gnas// zhes so// gsum pa la gzhi'i/ lam gyi/ 'bras bu'i sgra don dang gsum/ dang po ni/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi 'byung khungs sam gzhir gyur pas na gzhi ste/ rim gsum las/ tha skad gnyis
240b4(rnying rgyud): kyi chos rnams kun// ma lus 'byung gyir gzhi zhes bya// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ gang gis gang du bgrod byar gyur pas na lam ste/ don bsdus las/ bgrod dang de chos ldan pa dang // zhes so// gsum pa ni/ smin pa'am mthar phyin pa'i phyir
240b5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu ste/ khog gzhung las// grub pa mthar phyin 'bras bur brjod// ces so// zhar la de gsum rgyud du mtshon bya'i sgra bshad ni/ phyi ma 'gos 'gyur las/ gyud ni chun chags zhes bya ste// thabs dang rgya las 'bras bu'o// zhes pas gzhi lam
240b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis shes bya shes byed/ lam 'bras gnyis thob bya 'thob byad gzhi 'bras gnyis bdag nyid gcig par 'brel bas/ rgyu rkyen 'bras bu'i tshul du 'brel zhing rgyun chags pas na rgyud de/ spar khab las/ rang bzhin 'bras bu rnam gnyis kyis// shes
240b7(rnying rgyud): thob btags pa'i nges tshig gnyis// shes so// bzhi pa mtshan nyid la/ dkag gzhag gnyis/ dang po ni/ snga rabs pa kha cig/ gzhi shes bya/ lim shes byed/ 'bras bu shes zin pa 'am/ yang na/ gzhigs la bya/ lam gsal byed/
241a1(rnying rgyud): 'bras thags la zin pa'i thar/ dganyis nam 'tha da/ lam de shes shing gsal bar bya dgos sam mo dgos/ dgos na ga zhir 'gyur/ ga dran 'bras bung thul/ gzhan yang zhal ldan pa// yul can mag shes/ sngan/
241a2(rnying rgyud): bor rtags pa gsum pad nga bral gzhalam 'bras gsum du 'byur rdzogacung / glan nya tshal pa ni/ gnas pa gang/ 'dug pa las/ smin pa bras bu'i gsung / de/ nangam yang gni // gang gis bzod bud gyur ba'i gnams pazhin lam hA
241a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rje dang / las kyi mtshan nyid kyis kyang lta ba lam thub ste// de shes byed yin gyi 'jug byed ma yin pa'i phur zab ste/ 'dug satshan nyid 'byod pa'i gnangs// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ spyan dbul nar/ gnas nang brtan pas gno//
241a4(rnying rgyud): 'jug cing bzod par byed pas na lam/ yon tan gyis smin pa mthar thug pa 'bras bu'o// gsung yang / gzhi lam gnyis la skyon sa ma ltang 'bab cing / 'bras bu la 'chang 'gyur gyi sngon gnas pas mi rigs so// yang bdag nyid chen po 'ga'
241a5(rnying rgyud): zhig/ ye nas gnas pa brtag bya dang bcas pa ni gzhi/ bgrad par byed pa rtog byed dang bcas pa ni lam/ mthar thug pa'i don mngon du byas pas rtsol ba las grol ba ni 'bras bu'o// zhes bzhed kyang / mi 'thad de/ de ltar na la ma 'bras gnyis yaM nas
241a6(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i brtag bya yin nam min/ yin na/ gzhi lam 'bras gsum ka mtshan nyid gcig gis mtshon nus par 'gyur la/ gal to ma yin na ni/ de ltar ye shes rang gnas pa// lam dang 'bras bu kun ngo po// zhes gsungs pa dang 'gal zhing /
241a7(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang / lam gyur gyi 'bras bu lam khyab ste/ dadung mdzod zin bsgom pa'i rtsol pa las ma grol bas mthar thug gi don mngon du ma byas pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ni gzhi shes
241b1(rnying rgyud): 'jug ga byed rtsol dang bcas pa na lam/ chos nyid mngon gyur bskyed dbyar med par san pa ni bras du/ mtshan kad dang mas ra ba dang brtag gan gnas kA la na ba lam 'bras bcad/ bar bas lta ba dang nying nge 'dzin gnyis ka la 'ang nga
241b2(rnying rgyud): gzhi 'bras bcad/ thams gnas skabs dang mthar bug gnyis ka 'a khyab cing gzhi lam bcad pas smon las rgol ba'i phyir/ mkhas pas bsngags par 'os pa yin no// gnyis pa la so sor gtan la dab ba mas rgyas par bshad pa la/
241b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ lam bshad pa/ 'bras bu bshad pa dang gsum/ dang po la'ang / snyir bshad pa dang / bye brag tu byung ngu ji ltar 'gyur ba'i 'thad pa bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ rim gsum las/ dang pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// ngo bo'i gzhi dang brtags
241b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhi// zhes pas/ gnas sngags ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi dang / 'khrul pa brtags pa'i gzhi gnyis/ dang bo la/ rang gi mtshan nyid ngos bzung ba dang / de gtan la dbab pa'o/ dang po la/ dngos dang / srub byed/ skabs 'phros kyi gzhal
241b5(rnying rgyud): thadang gsum/ dang po ni/ rang rig pa byang chub kyi sems shes bya dngos po'i gshes mtha' dang bral bar gnas tsam nab ste/ de las/ mtshan nyid mtha' rnams kun bral ba// cer yang gzung du med pa'o// zhes so// gnas pa ni/ kun
241b6(rnying rgyud): khyab gtan tshigs gsum gyi/ de la/ lung na/ rgyas pa las/ thams cad dang rig par chub sems// de ni wang gi tshad mar bshad// ces so// man ngag ni/ lta phreng las/ chos thams can sems la gnas/ zhes dang / rdul
241b7(rnying rgyud): 'byor mig ga bsam gtan gyi rgya cher 'phral las/ chos thams cad rang rig pa'i ye shes rang gi mtshan nyid rig par gas langs kyis kyang ma bslabs pa/ gnyis su med pa la mtshan nyid 'di 'drar brjod du mad ma ste/ zhes so// rigs pa na/
242a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das sam gsum gyi bslus pa'i chos rnams chos can// rang rig pa byung chub kyi sems yin te/ thams cad sems sa 'dus pas/ sems las ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan med pa'i phyir/ rin rjen
242a2(rnying rgyud): gser med du byin pa pasnyen no// de la rjegan re/ sal rdzas su dang ba'i drug gas pa las gzhan du thung ba'i kyi 'du rnams na/ yul gas la bang gu gcig gi 'brel pa med de/ bdag nyid mi gcig pa'i phyir/ ka ba dang gsu ba
242a3(rnying rgyud): debasu zla shi ni/ 'dun kyi smoms pa na pa sa thus pa dasmram thos da pa sa pabyas su la rnams 'a /
242a4(rnying rgyud): yul shes la 'brel ba gtan med pa'i phyir/ mig dang sgra bzhin no// 'dod mi nus te/ mngon sum gyi tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir ro// de bas na sems las gzhan pa'i chos gzhan ma grub ste/ 'di ltar yul stsogs lda ba na nyams su myong ba'i
242a5(rnying rgyud): sasusu du mas na na
242a6(rnying rgyud): dang / 'di ltad snang ba'i chos rnams kun// rdos pa rnyan ste chos min te/ lkog med rang TIg 'od gsal ba'i// shes pa 'ba' zhig zhona'o// zhes dang / lam+ba ri ma las/ sems las ma gtogs chos med phyir// sku ma rdo rje btsan po mchag// sa
242a7(rnying rgyud): dang / slob dpon dpal dbyangs kyi mtha'i sun se la sgron me las/ chos rnams sems kyi 'phrul pa ste// sems las ma gtogs chos rnams med// ces so/ de ltar thun mong ge lung las kyang gsungs te/ lang+ga gshegs pa las/ ji ltar
242b1(rnying rgyud): skyes pas brtags pade// nga ma dngos po ma min par/ bganags kyis nimags pa'i sems// dan pa cwas// sa dang / mangs pa ya dang / ngang sa / gnasugasasu pa dgas sa mam
242b2(rnying rgyud): dang / rigs pa drug rtsab las/ 'byung ba chel sogs bshad pa// rnam par shes su yang dag 'dra// zhes so// de dag thun mong gi gtan tshigs kyis chos thams cad rang snang du lhag ste/ de nyid blan min ci gtan tshigs kyis mtha' bral du bsgrub pa no /
242b3(rnying rgyud): na sa ma/ na na
242b4(rnying rgyud): dang / gal te ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi ma yin na 'khrul snang 'di chos nyid kyi khyab bla ma yin par 'gyur te/ ngo bo tha dad pa'i phyir/ ka ba dang bum pa bzhin no zhe na/ lan du/ mkhas pa bla na/ snang ngo nas chos nyid rang snang yin pas chos nyid yin gyi/ zhan
242b5(rnying rgyud): ngal phyogs su zhen pas ma yin te/ ltos pa thad dade la ltos pa'i gsung rje nya rib/ rtogs pa'i dus su gzhir ma gyur pa med la/ ma rtogs pa'i 'khrul ngo 'di ma yin no gsungs kyang / de gnyis ka legs par mi sems te/ dang po sbyar na/ sngar zhen
242b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis smroms jo bo gcig na/ rdzas gcig la skad mi snang gi cha gnyis 'gal bas/ na po yang chos nyid rang sdang du 'gyur zhing / tha dad na zhen 'phrul spangs tshe sdang 'khrul mi spong bar thal ba dang / gnyis pa ltar na/ rtogs pa de rten la dge lum
242b7(rnying rgyud): na rang bzhin gyi snang ba ma yin par 'gyur zhing / reg ma lus na rtogs ma rtogs kyi dus kyi ldog nas gni yin min du 'dod pa'i dam bca' nyams so// ni ga 'den/ rang bzhin chos nyid du yongs rdzogs/ rnam pa khrul ldog tu ma 'dres/ jo bo ma bye
243a1(rnying rgyud): med ces bya ste/ dgongs 'dus las/ zhe sdang ma 'dras mnur sems pa// yongs su rdzogs par stong bdag med/ de nyid ma 'dras yongs rdzogs nas// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// zhes so// 'o na ma 'dres pa
243a2(rnying rgyud): chos nyid min pa bzhin du/ yongs rdzogs kyi ngos nas kyang ma yin par 'gyur te/ de nyid ngo bo dbyer med yin pas so// zer na/ sgron med de/ til 'bru dang ldu ma gnyis rdzas dbyer med na'ang / til 'bru zhu ba dang / sbrum gong bur mi
243a3(rnying rgyud): snang ba bzhin no// zhes gong ma rnams gsung / gnyis pa la/ ka dag ldan grub kyi dbye ba bshad pas gzhi 'ching grol med par bstan/ grub mtha' bden pa gsum gyis dang gzhung mtha' bral du bsdu ba/ gzhi nges byed kyi tshad mA bsam pa'o//
243a4(rnying rgyud): dang po la/ ka dag lhun grub kyi glo ba bstan/ 'dod gzhung gi dbye ba brjod/ skyon can gyi phyogs dgag/ rang gzhung bzhag ste la bzla ba dang bzhi/ dang po ni/ gzhi gdod ma nas dag pa yin te/ ma rig pa glo bur gyi dri ma yin pa'i phyir/
243a5(rnying rgyud): nor bu rin po che mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyis gtums pa bzhin no// zhes gzhi dang dri ma tha dad du 'dod pa'i ka dag pa dang / gzhi ye nas ldan grub yin te/ ma rig pa gzhan byung ma yin pa'i phyir/ ye nas gser lcags dbyer med du med na gser
243a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur gyi rtsis lcags gser du bsgyur du mi btub pa bzhin no// zhes gzhi dang dri ma dbyer med du 'dod pa'i lhan grub pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ de gnyis re re la'ang dbye ba gsum gsum du yod na'ang / ka dag chen po dang / lhun grub chen po
243a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis yongs gcod bsrub bu yin pas 'og tu 'chad la/ 'dir skyon can gyi 'dod gzhung gi dbang du byas nas re re la'ang gnyis gnyis su dbye ste/ de yang ka dag la gnyis las/ dbyings ka dag pa na re/ gzhi chos dbyings rnam dag yin pa'i phyir/
243b1(rnying rgyud): na / sa / na
243b2(rnying rgyud): gags me gang ba'i 'du me pa pas shing byas nas dag palas dgapa da 'byung ba na/ spa ba sas nga gnyis pas/ sa nyid ldan byab pa nang/ gzhis dag pa dang sanas dbyung ma ni dang thom tsam nyid ga cig
243b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin las ma 'das pa'agyur/ sa nas pa yang ba tsha gcig ste/ yings gsar lags dbang 'dudu ma na byi gyis gser du baspyang dum brlab pa shing gamigs pa bzed na chung / mas can lda rngub pa da /
243b4(rnying rgyud): byas pas dang gakris cang sna ga pag nas ma dzi da tshiga' ba'i ting / lugs gas dri thar ba'i lugs pags sa pa spang byed smrags shA pa ma thagasas pangs na
243b5(rnying rgyud): ra // gas pa n+te/ dbyings klu dag na/ pa 'i gling rje yang ma nga rjir/ 'thul pa des me par shAts+tsha dang / gzhanas dag pa slo bang kyi yin ci bar na/ rgab gapas 'bra thugags pa
243b6(rnying rgyud): pa san pa ni da ga 'du pa sa na ma /
243b7(rnying rgyud): sangs kyis dzumags// ga cigs dang ga' pa dang / din pa khyong ni drim da pa gyi/ pas/ dgas gis pa du 'an// nan rnan pa dri'imami dngas
244a1(rnying rgyud): rigs pa'i gnod pa'am/ 'khrul sdang dag phyogs su bsgyur du mi btub padung / chos nad mthong yang 'khrul sdang mi spong bsogs rgya ltar 'bab cing/ 'chad 'gyur ltar/ 'khrul gag med na kyon du 'gyur ba'i lung rigs
244a2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis kyang gnong ngo // yang / chos nyid lhun grub pa ltar ni/ gzhi dang 'brul bde byed med len pa'i phyir/ 'khrul ba spang du maM rung bar thal ba dang / chos can ldan thub basbyar na/ mu rig pa'i rang bzhin las ma 'das pa'i phyir/ 'bras sa
244a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas thob kyang dgos med du thal ba dang / snron du/ gzhi dang dri ma dbyer med du 'dod pa'i byer/ rgyas pa las/ thams cad dag ces bya ba yang // dngos po bas pa dag ma yin te// sdang spyod nyid na rnam par dag/ ces pa'i lung dang 'gal zhe ma
244a4(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i 'khrul snang mthong bas chos nyid mthong ba sogs dang / 'khrul gzhi yod na skyon du 'gyur ba'i gnod byed 'og tu 'chad pa rnams kyang 'bab par 'gyur zhing / mdor na/ ka dag spun grub gnyis gcig gi grub mthas gcig la gnod pa'i phyir/
244a5(rnying rgyud): grub mtha' bzhi po de thams cad skyon can 'ba' zhig pa'o zhes bla ma rnams gsungs so// bzhi ka dag chen po 'am ka dag skyon med dang / ldan grub chen po'am ldan grab skyon med gnyis ni/ gzhi 'bras la ma rig pa me ldan pa'i cha nas ka dag dang /
244a6(rnying rgyud): gzhi 'bras kyis ma rig pa ma spangs pa'i cha nas lhan grub ces btags kyis/ don la gzhi 'bras gnyis la ma rig pa ma spangs la mi ldan pa ste/ dper na snyam pa til gyi rdzas ma spangs la/ til gong mi ldan pa bzhin no// de'i phyir/ 'khor 'das so
244a7(rnying rgyud): sor snang ba yang kun brtags 'khrul ngo tsam du zad kyi/ chos kyi ngo bo nas yang dag par gzhal na/ ye nas bcang grol med pa/ dpe rgyal bu dmangs su 'khyams pa ltar/ 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid du la bzlas pa ste/ rtsa chud las/ bci
244b1(rnying rgyud): da dam pa gra dpas// yonas ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas s+hos// su dang / ma sa/ smras pa nas byu na// rang bzhin gyis na tha bar bdang / 'dzad pa pa thopa pa// nas dang / kun za la/
244b2(rnying rgyud): nas sgrub pa'i 'bras tha bstan pa min// sa btsal lenas lhun gyis thub pa pan// zhes sa// gnyis pa ni/ lum malas/ de yang rnam gsum gangs tshul bzhag/ ces pas/ gnodzo g+sa/ do na dam/ bden pa de byer me dang gas
244b3(rnying rgyud): dang pal/ dag/ smad na/ dbug/ sngags sngags s+ho// dang pa la'ang / sna'ang ba dang / lhag pa sa byang ban/ skad byed pang spang sa ma 'gags ma sa / mtha den da
244b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rna pa'isasam chad pa'o// dedag grub pa la snang dgas man dgagasas pa sa// na/ pas/ bdang bskrum du sanyas pa ya// 'dus thab dang pa dgas ni// ma rdul du thams ca
244b5(rnying rgyud): brab kren byed kyang // rtog pa kun gyi chud meng ldang // bde dag thams cad gzugs pa // dri byed med pa dngus po pa // na rlo thams cad gnas// thams cad snyeng pa dang bzhin meng // ces da/ rdzo drugapa dbang
244b6(rnying rgyud): cer yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub// thos so// man ngag ni/ lam rim pas/ rma k+ka k+Shu ma skal ba bzhin// zhes so// rigs pag sdang tsam 'gag med du sgrub pa dang / bden pas stongs pa'i sdang ba ras med du sgrub pa'o// dang po ni/ spang bachos
244b7(rnying rgyud): na 'gag pa med pa yin te/ gshes pa yang dag sogs kyi kyang bzhig sad par ga tshogs pazhis su byed/ bzhig shen/ snang bas grab da bul sdang chung mi rigs pa'i phying dang / sdang ba med na don ngas shes byed kyang med pa du
245a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir dang / sdang tsam pa 'di sus kyang dgag mi nus pa'i phyir dang / rang rig pa thams cad du rtsal ma 'gags par rang sdang ba'i phyir ro// de ltar bzhi las/ dang po ni/ da ltar gyi 'khrul snang 'di chos can/ 'byung mi rigs te/ ngo
245a2(rnying rgyud): gzhig shis la sdang ba med pa'i phyir/ gang du snang ba khegs pa la 'khrul snang legs pas khyab ste/ dngos po'i sbrul khegs na thag khral sprul 'dzin gyi 'khrug shes khegs pa bzhin no// gnyis pa ni/ snang ba chos can/ khyod med na don dam stong pa rang du shes
245a3(rnying rgyud): byed med de stong pa phyogs gcig par song ba'i phyir/ skyon med de/ snang ba ma yin pa zhig gis shes zer na/ de 'khrul lam ma 'khrul/ 'khrul na don dam stong par mi bden pa 'gyur te/ shes byed 'khrul pas shes pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir/ mig shes
245a4(rnying rgyud): 'khrul mthong gi dung gi rang bzhin ser po min pa bzhin no// ma 'khrul na/ shes bya don dam shes pa'i shes byed de kho na la snang bzer ba yin te/ ka ba zhes pa gdung 'degs nus pa la zer ba bzhin no// gsum pa ni/ sdang ba 'di chos can/ thams cad mkhyen
245a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyag gis kyang mi khegs te/ rang snang ba'i phyir te/ rigs drug gi sdug bsngal ma khegs par 'dug pa'i phyir ro// khegs te ma bkag go zer na/ rgyal ba thabs mkhas la thugs rje dang mi ldan par thal lo// bzhi pa ni/ rang rig pa chos can/ thams
245a6(rnying rgyud): cand du rtsa lum 'gags par rang snang ba yin te/ gzhan du nu bem stong dang khyad par med par thal ba'i phyir/ 'dod mi nus te/ ltong pa'i rang 'od 'gag pa med par 'khor 'das kyi chos su shar ba'i phyir/ dper na mtsho nyid rlabs dang / nyi ma nyi 'od kyi
245a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du snang ba bzhin no// gnyis pa sdang ba bden stong nges med du sgrub pa ni/ mthun snang gi chos can gcig bsgru na/ rang cag mi rnams la snang gyur bran mong du dmigs pa'i rgya 'di chos can/ rig pa sgyu ma'i snang ba yin te/ sdang ba'i
245b1(rnying rgyud): risas spangs pa'i byer te/ ye dwags rnams la nag tu sdang ba byed/ de ltar yang sa pa dpal bstsags sdug rim las/ dmyal ba rang sems me sogs snang // yi rtags sdig sems mig tsang yul// khyol song gyen mthar ngamathog te// mil rjong /
245b2(rnying rgyud): yul 'di nyid snang // de bzhin lha/ mi'i go mtshon sogs// sbrul dge sems rin chen snang // zhes so// de ltar na'ang / kho na re/ nga la chur spang ba bzhin du khyod la mi snang bar 'gyur te/ ma nges pa'i phyir zhe na/ khyod dbang gnyis las mthudag
245b3(rnying rgyud): tu tshogs pas mthun par snang ba mi 'gal te/ dper na nad kyis btab pa'i mig ser can gnyis kyis dud dkar po ser por mthun par mthong ba de/ dung ser por yod nas mthong lugs mthun pa ma yin/ nad rigs mthun pas mthong lcags gci
245b4(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin no// gzhan yang / shes ngo thun mong ba dang / dus gsum thun mong ba la mthun pa mi 'ag la yang / shes ngo khyad par ba dang / dus gsum snga phyi mthun par mi 'gyur te/ yi dwags gnyis kyi chu rnag tu mthun par mthong na'ang / mi
245b5(rnying rgyud): dang ya dwags gnyis mthong lugs so so ba'i phyir/ shes do// khyad par ba la snang ba'i ngo bo ris su ma nges pa dang / dus thun mong pa dus gsum gdong tshugs su snang ba nges na'ang / dus gsum snga cir ma nges te/ dus sbyar gyi 'jim pa/ da lta'i rnga
245b6(rnying rgyud): bram/ gyis kyi gyong ma rnams snang ba'i ngo bo ma nges pa'i phyir/ rgyu mtshan de dag gis rig pa sgyu ma'i snang ba yin par grub ste/ ting 'dzin gyal po las/ ji ltar sgyum mkhan gyis sprul pa'i gzugs// rta dang glang po shing rta sna tshogs byas/
245b7(rnying rgyud): de la je bzhin snang ba gang yang med// chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par bya// zhes pa ster ro// gnyis pa ni/ sa s+dzi t+ta sa t+ya zhes pa'i sgra las/ kun rdzob bden pa ste/ br-inya 'gegs pa dang sleb pa la'o// zhes pa'i byings don
246a1(rnying rgyud): gyis/ nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i ma rig pa'i rtog pas bskyod pa'i kun brtags pa don 'dzin gyi snang brnyan ni kun rdzob yin la/ des bden par bzung bas na kun rdzob bden pa ste/ 'di'i rgyud phyi ma las/
246a2(rnying rgyud): rnam par rtog pa'i skang brnyan yang // rnam pa kun tu ga rdzo ba 'dod// zhes dang / dbus bdag par/ gti mug yang dag sleb skye dkun rdzo hU~M// des gang bcos ma bden par snang de la// kun rdzob bden zhes thub pa da ste gsungs te/
246a3(rnying rgyud): sa nga ga bdu/ sa nas pas/ sa du/ pa byed dang sa
246a4(rnying rgyud): dug yang dgra ma yin pa'o// kani rdob kyi ni dbye ba byas// gsas// 'dud / dbus pas yang dag zan rdzob tu de pa'i phreng sogs kyi chos rtag parnam pa la/ mdag pa las sbyang log pa'i kun rdzob zhes bzhag/ yang dag pa'i kun
246a5(rnying rgyud): rdzob ni phung po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang / yul 'byung ba lnga rigs kyi yum lnga/ rnam shes tshogs brgyad ye shes lngar rang bzhin gyis dag pas ye nas sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du rdzogs par 'dod la/ gnas tshul kyang / lam
246a6(rnying rgyud): re ma las/ mtshon bya don gyi bstan pa ye shes lha rang la gnas pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin du/ rgyud kyi gleng gzhi dang / rgud don thabs grol dang / 'bras bu rang la gnas rgyal rnams rgya cher gsungs kyang / 'dir ba rag ston snying
246a7(rnying rgyud): gizhal nas/ 'dren bshad las/ ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang // de bzhin gsang bar shes par bya// zhes pas/ phyi nang gisang gsum du dbye gsung / de yang kun rdzob rgya ltar/ rtog chags sgra'i rang bzhin duganas te/ rdo rje phung po yan
246b1(rnying rgyud): gan// gas pa'i sangs rgyas thugs// nas nags pa// rlung wA / gangs 'gar ba bzhi nga ma ngon pa sbyar gnas date/ 'am sa ldan/ pal ba ba ba dang nag shong gnas// gnasan 'i sa byas can// nan
246b2(rnying rgyud): de'i nang nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo la gleng gzhi ji ltar gnas tshul kyang / rgya mtsho las/ d+ha mtshakra chos kyi gnas// 'ong bzhi e sogs dbyibs su gnas// mi shigs thig le waM dbyibs can// rang la bde bags pa byed dag/ mthu rnam shes yid sogs
246b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi// ye shes myong bas spyad bar bshad// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs skyes pa// pUr mAr+thadon zab mo// bde ba'i dus nyid wa d+hi bral// dus gsum kun ngo bor gnas// zhes so// gsang bltar na/ ngog so thabs zhes la gleng gan
246b4(rnying rgyud): gnas tshul kyang / thal gyud las/ 'di zhes nye bar mtshon pa ni// e sogs rnam bzhi'i dbyibs can gnas// skad ces gsal byed las mang ce na// waM dbyibs thig ler bcas ston pa'o// mad ma nu sdom byed yid// las can rnam shes de dag pa
246b5(rnying rgyud): gsal bar gobyas bshad bar 'dod// nga wa dan dam nges pa'i rgyad // yAn theg chen 'di nyid do// dus ni bsam gyis me/ b+ha bdas// d+ha mde seng zhes d+ha'o// zhes gsungs pa stir ro// sI na lam rim las/ skyam mig yor thal ba dang /
246b6(rnying rgyud): smig rgya 'ang 'tshon chu zla bzhin// zhes pa'i dpes sgyu ma'i dngos po drug tu dbye ste/ de la log tog lham ni// lha ma'i rta glang ltar dri ma yin la der 'dzin gyi zhen pa'i log rtog dang / twen 'brel sgyu mni chu rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i chos dris dbang po bslad pa'i mig
246b7(rnying rgyud): yor gyi gzugs ltar snang lam grub pa dang / dngos po sgyu ma ni sdang la tshim pa med pa smig sgra'i dpes bum pa la bum par sdang ba lta bu'i snang cha dang / phyag rgya gyu ma ni/ snang la rtog pa med pa chu zla'i dpes bden dngos kyis stongs pa'i snang ba lha skur gsal ba
247a1(rnying rgyud): D+ha dang / legs sum ni med bya gan du rnam par bkru ba 'angs can myang pas dag byu mang byudags pa bad+ma dang / dbus zlapa nagag tu sangs bskul ba dbas de da dung byung ga srung bdagaganod du brdzur ba
247a2(rnying rgyud): pa/ dem+b+ha shAm dngas po ga pa pa med pa ga pa'i gsas rgyug bdu ga/ 'i kyis rdzu gsagasas/ da sa kyi'i pa'i pa
247a3(rnying rgyud): ma skyed pang+gA 'big ste/ rgyamapas su dag rgyas / nas/ di skye la ga du napas shAm+b+ha/ pa / ma rdzu zhi /
247a4(rnying rgyud): bam pas rngu nga na nal ga pa skyed rdzun / sa pasas/ sa kyi thig pa na// bye nga rgyu d-i//
247a5(rnying rgyud): drubang dbyed sted // rta na man ma mo// zhes dang / ba ni ma rigs pa// ste// de ga na na khri badzin myed byer med pa rgyang bar med pa nga zhin/ snang ba bden pas sa bcam dung theg cig nga / gtsun
247a6(rnying rgyud): 'byeb chub kyi zlog pa pa dang byas rje myed de/ 'tha ba dngas su mthong bab mnag g+ha du grags pa rton sa pa ba su kyi bden padan tan pa labapas dang bzhin med par zhugs las rtogs pa nagasungs/ klung sa pas ma kyi
247a7(rnying rgyud): na kyis skrag pa'i ma mas ma sa/ rtsig pa'i sh-i rjeb kyang mthul sog shes sa gyu // mthag kyi cad pa sa 'i mchen kyang legs par 'gyu // sa ma panas pas pa
247b1(rnying rgyud): sogs khegs pa bzhin zhe na/ spyi lam ltos pa'i bye brag mi srid pa'i phyir khyab pa khas blang ngo // de lta na'ang / lhag pa'i kun rdzob 'khru' snang log shes su mi 'gyur te/ khyab byed kun rdzob spyi mtshan bden pa'i spros pas stongs pa yin pa'i phyir/ dper na mi la chu dang
247b2(rnying rgyud): se dregs la rtag tu snang ba'i mthong chu pa tha bad kyang / 9/ zhegasher bas gnyis ka la khyab pa bzhin no// yang lhag pa kun rdzob 'di ltar sdang ba lha'i dkyil 'khor du 'dod pa de/ ye nus med pa'i sgro btags zhig gam/ ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su grub pa zhig yin/ zhes
247b3(rnying rgyud): 'dri na/ 'dir phyi ma ltar 'dod de/ gal te blo btags zhig na/ sgro btags dngos med rdzun pa yin pas don byed nus pa mtha' dag gis stongs pa'i phyir/ lam lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa don med du 'gyur bas na mi rigs so// de ltar na 'ang chos can mtshan mar snang ba
247b4(rnying rgyud): 'di dag ye nas dag pa lce'i dkyil 'khor du gra bzin na/ ser sa li sbrum ltar rgya rkyen gzhan la ma ltos pa ng+kA / lhar skyed byed kyi shes pa tsam la'ang ma ltos par thal zhe na/ de'i skyon med de/ ji ltar nor bu rin po che rnyed pa do ma shes te nor 'phal ba'i khrod du bzhag pa na/
247b5(rnying rgyud): de'i yon tan mi mthong mod/ de nor bu'i rigs shes pas ngo sprad de byi dor byas pa ni/ gdod de las rin po che'i yon tan khyad par can 'byung ba ltar/ ye nas lhar ngag kud snang ba 'di'i bden zhen gyis dag par ma shes pas/ de'i phyir lam bskyed rim kyang bde na zhan 'gog
247b6(rnying rgyud): byed tsam len pas/ de la ltos nas yongs grub kyi dam bca' nyams par mi 'gyur ro// des na 'dir yongs grub tu lung rigs man ngag gsum gas 'grub ste/ lung ni/ 'di nyid las/ thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// zhes
247b7(rnying rgyud): sogs dang / rmad byang rgyal po las/ ye nas lhun mnyam dkyil 'khor la// yin par shes nas bsgom pa las// zhes so// man ngag ni/ lam rim las/ yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun// rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa dang // ting 'dzin de bzhin gshes/

248a6(rnying rgyud): ning ba/ gaben na 'i mams nyid ni/ bas pa 'dzi TI/ yang med pa 'a ga bcad bye/ pa'i de ci 'o/ mas pa'i dag me jidzin rnyed byings yin te/ sa pa ci ni //
248a7(rnying rgyud): da da sa pa mi da / ma
248b1(rnying rgyud): med smra babyed kyi gtan tshigs bzhi gsungs te/ bum pa chos can/ yang dag par rang bzhin med de/ gtan tshigs bzhes skye med du grub pa'i phyir/ bzhi gang zhe na/ glu rkyen las ma skyes pa'i phyir dang / dus glo bur du mabyung ba'i phyir dang // byed pa pos ma
248b2(rnying rgyud): byas pa'i phyir dang / skyes pa'i dngos po 'di 'dra ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro// de ltar bzhi las/ dngos po ma grub ste// dngos po thams cad rgyu rkyen las skyes pa'i phyir zer na/ 'o na dngos po de bdag gam/ gzhan nam gnyis ga 'am/ rgyu med pa gzhi gang las skye/ dang po
248b3(rnying rgyud): bdag las skye'o zhe na/ bdag grub pa las skye'am/ ma grub pa las skye/ gal te grub pa las skye snyam na/ rnga bum chos can/ bskyed mi dgos par 'gyur te/ 'jim pa la grub zin pa'i phyir/ rtags ma grub na phyed byed kyi rgyu srab dus snga bskyed bya 'bras bu grub pa
248b4(rnying rgyud): nyams la/ gal te gu ba zin nas kyang phye'o zhe na/ zug med du skye bar thal te/ bum pa las kyang bum pa skye bar 'gyur ro// yang ma grub pa las skye'o zhe na/ gya ma grub pa'i skyed byed du mi 'thad cing / 'bras bu ma grub pas bskyed byar yang mi 'thad do// gnyis pa
248b5(rnying rgyud): gzhan las skye'o zhe na/ gzhan rtag mi rtag gang las skye/ rtag pa las skye'o zhe na/ rtag pa skyed byed kyi rgyur mi 'thad de/ rgyu mi 'gyur pas 'bras bu bskyed pa mi srid pa'i phyir/ bskyed na rtag pa nyams te/ bden gnyis las// dngos rnams gzhan du 'gyur ba la/
248b6(rnying rgyud): mkhas rnams mi rtag brjod par mdzad// ces so// gal te gzhan mi rtag pa las skye'o zhe na/ dus gsum gang las s+ye/ 'das brgyu 'bras spyad zin pas skye ba mi 'thad/ ma 'ongs pa ma skyes pas skyed byed du mi bzad / de ltar ba las skye na/ 'bras bu rang dang dus
248b7(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa las skye'am/ mi mnyam pa las phye/ dus mnyam pa bskyed bya skyed byed du mi 'thad/ me mnyam na rgyu 'bras/ 'phrad ba med pas skye bar mi rigs so// gsum pa gnyis ka las skye'o zhe na'ang / mi 'thad de/ rgyu 'bras gnyis bdag gcig
249a1(rnying rgyud): gsam pa dag las gnyis byung // gnyis las bdun 'byung bdun las kyang // gsum pabyung srid pa'i lnga ba \u0f7f// nyid na yang dang yang du 'khor// zhes so// dA dag cang sngam thamasardzim sam bskyed pa'i cha
249a2(rnying rgyud): rgyu dang 'brel ba dang / nang gi 'byung lnga dang rnam shes te khams drug 'dus pas bskyed pa'i phyir rkyen dang 'brel ba zhes bya ste/ sA lu ldar pa'i mdo las/ nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'thung ba ni gnyis kyi phyir 'byung ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
249a3(rnying rgyud): dang 'brel ba dang / rkyen dang 'brel ba'o// zhes sogs rgya cher gsungs so// gsum pa bsdun gsum ste/ ma rig srid len gsum nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dang / 'du byed dang srid pa gnyis las dang / lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal te/
249a4(rnying rgyud): sgrub kyis/ dang po brgyad pa dgu nyon mongs// gnyis pa bcu pa las yin te// lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal yin// zhes so// de yang nyon mongs pa las las dang / de las sdug bsngal dang / de las kyang nyon mongs pa ste/ lus can rnams la dngos
249a5(rnying rgyud): dang / lus med rnams la bag chags kyi tshul du 'khor ro// de ltar na phyi nang gi rten 'brel gnyis ka bcu gnyis kyi tshul du 'khor ba nyid de/ ri ma gsum mas/ rten 'brel bcu gnyis tshul dag tu// phyi nang gnyis kar 'khor ba'o// nyes so// drug pa
249a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa'i nyes pa ni// de nyid las/ 'phags lam bral dang sdug bsngal myong // nyes pa rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// zhes pas/ 'dod bya 'phags lam dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni/ rgyas pa las/ sems can ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yi
249a7(rnying rgyud): kun khyab kyang // rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas nas// ye shes lnga yi don ma rtogs// zhes so// spang bya shin tu mnar ba'i sdug bsngal drag po dang / gnas skabs bde ba ltar sdang ba'i sdug bsngal ris mi mthun pa rnga tshogs kyi tshor ba nyams su myong ba'i nye
249b1(rnying rgyud): byed 'phrang pa med pas byed por me 'thad do// yang kho na re/ rgyu rkyen las ma byung / byed pa pos kyang ma byas/ dus glo bur du'ang ma byung mod/ 'on kyang dngos po 'di dag skyes nas 'dug pa sus kyang mi khegs pa'i phyir/ bzhi pa ma grub po zhe na/ bus pa chos can/
249b2(rnying rgyud): yang dag par rang bzhin med de/ gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir// de ltar yang dbu ma snang ba las/ bdag dang gzhan gyi dngos 'di dag/ yang dag par ni gcig pa dang // du ma'i rang bzhin bral ba'i phyir// rang bzhin med de gzugs brtan bzhin// zhes so//
249b3(rnying rgyud): gtan tshigs ma grub zhe na/ 'o na bum pa nyid gcig tu yod dam/ du mar yod/ gcig tu yod na/ cha shas dang bcas par yod dam/ gal bar yod/ gal te cha shas dang bcas par yod na/ gcig tu mi btung ste/ skar ma'i tshogs ltar du mar bral lo// cha ma la
249b4(rnying rgyud): du 'dod na mi 'grub ste/ phyogs cha drug dang bcas pa'i phyir/ rang snang 'di nub par 'gyur ro// da'ang nyi shu ba las/ drug gis cig char sbyang ba na// phra ba rdul cha drug tu 'gyur// drug po dag kyang kau gcig na// gong bu'ang rdul phran dag tu 'gyur// zhes so//
249b5(rnying rgyud): yang du mar yod na du ma de gcig la ltas sam mi ltos/ ma ltos na khyab byed gcig ma grub pas khyab bye du ma'ang mi 'grub ste/ grangs kyi gnas bzhin no// ltos na/ gcig tu thal te// ltos pas grub pa'i phyir/ mer 'dzin la me gcig tu snang ba bzhin no// des na ga
249b6(rnying rgyud): gcig dang du ma'i spros pa dang bralang la/ rang bzhin med pas khyab ste/ nam mkha' bzhin no// gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa'i rigs pas spros bral de nyid snang ba ngo bo nyid kyi rgyur lhun grub tu sgrub pa ni/ gong gi spros bral de chos can/ sdeng ba bo nyid kyi rgyar ldan gyis
249b7(rnying rgyud): grub ste/ snod tsam nyid nas brtags na yang dag tu ma grub cing / snang tshod tsam zhig ma 'gags par phyir/ rtags mgrub na/ 'on sdang stong la 'grol yang dam med/ yod na grub pa nyid de/ 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid med na mi 'byung ba'i rgyu 'bras yin pa phyir/
250a1(rnying rgyud): ga du / na nas sad yod dang / chog ga ba pa / dang pa dang / 3 nas gnyis tsun ga gag ga gsas par gyu te/

250a3(rnying rgyud): pa d+ha mA r+thas t+ya zhes pa'i sgru bas/ bar mni dam pa/ yadz+ra \u0f7f/ siH bden pa ste/ dam pa ni bsgom byung gi mnyam gzhag ye shes dang / de'i rjes mthun rig zhes rjes dpag/ don ni/ de'i spyod yul du gyur pa'i stong nyid dang / rdzas mthun med
250a4(rnying rgyud): dgag gi mtshan nyid can gyi stong nyid/ de la rig pa gzhan gyis mi gnod pas na bden pa'o// yang na dbu mi chog gsal las/ don yang de yin/ dam pa dang de yin pas na don dam pa zhes bya'o// de nyid bden pa yin pas na don dam pa'i bden pa shes byeng /
250a5(rnying rgyud): zhes pas/ don dang / dam pa dang / bden pa gsum gzhi mthun pa'i bsdu bar bzhed do// gsum pa ni/ thun mong ba dang / spros pa phyogs re chod pa rnam grangs pa'i don dam dang / spros pa mtha' dag chod pa rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam gnyis su 'byed/
250a6(rnying rgyud): 'dir ni/ lamadrim las/ don mchog lnga 'bras ye shes dbyings// bdun dang gsum phyed don dam pa// zhes pas bdun ni/ ye nas reg pa su gsung thugs yon tan smin las dbyings dang ye shes mang por lhun gyis grub pa ste/ de nyid pas/ rbab
250a7(rnying rgyud): kyi lha / spyod chen po ni// bla med theg pa las 'phags pa// don dam du ni dkor bdun la// zhes so// de bdun yang rigs bsdus na gsum ste/ rang bzhin don dam/ ye shes don dam/ 'bras bu don dam mo// dang po ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin spros pa dang bral
250b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnas lugs te dbyings so// gnyis pa na/ don rtogs pas shes byal sgrib g.yogs kyis dben pa ste ye shes so// gsum pa ni/ sku gsung thugs pon tan phrin las lnga'o// de dag kyang rang bzhin dang 'bras bu mngon du byas ma byas dang / 'bras bu dang ye
250b2(rnying rgyud): shes kyi bye brag dang / rang bzhin dang ye shes gnyis gzhi 'bras kyi cha las phye bar zad do// zhes spang bas pa rnams gsung yang / gzhi 'bras gnyis dmigs 'dres pa'i skyon du 'gyur ram snyam ste/ des na rang lugs/ dbyings spros bral de nyid da
250b3(rnying rgyud): gsul sgrib g.yogs dang bral ba'i cha nas ye shes don dam dang / de nyid la 'bras chos lnga po ye nas sun grub tu bzhugs pa ni 'bras bu don dam mo zhes bshad na 'thad ngo do// de ltar nam thar thug gi 'bras bu dang khyad par yod dam med ce na/ de mas gzhan
250b4(rnying rgyud): 'thob bye med/ ces pas ngo bo la khyad par med kyang / rnam pa la ma gyis mngon gsal du byas ma byes la khyad par yod pa yin no// bzhi pa la/ ngo bo/ mtshan nyid/ rang bzhin gyis sngags lugs gsum/ dang po ni/ glu'i theg pa'i don
250b5(rnying rgyud): dam stong nyid sgos bral du 'dod la/ 'dir stong mtha' las grol te snang ba ngo bo nyid kyi chu ba rdzun gyis grub pas 'phags te/ lamang la las/ dpag bsam shing dang rin che ni ltar// de kuno pa nyid chung gnas// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ kye'i don
250b6(rnying rgyud): ma stong pa'i mthar spangs la/ 'dir ni sdang chus ma spangs la mi ldan pa'i phyir 'phags te/ de las/ gang yang ma spangs ma ldan pas// ma bral phyi na bral zhes bya// zhes so// gsum pa ni/ rgyu'i don dam skye med spa ji bzhin par song bas byin rlabs
250b7(rnying rgyud): rig pa rang snang du mi tsir la/ 'dir ni gyen rlabs rig pa rang snang lha dang gzhal las khang sogs su 'chang bas 'phags te/ 'di nyid las/ de bzhin nyid dpe ngas yegs te// rngubs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgya// zhes so// zhar byung slebs thos kyi rtsod spong na/
251a1(rnying rgyud): khyed cag smos bral la snang ba bo nyid rgyur grub par 'dod pa de/ sred byed dam rnam 'jog gi rgyu gang yin/ dang po ltar na/ skyeng byed kyi rgyur grub pa'i phyir/ don dam dngos por thal pas spos bral nyams la/ gnyis pa ltar na/
251a2(rnying rgyud): don dam gyis rnam par bzhag pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir/ kun rdzob de nyid don las mi bslu ba'i 'jug yul du thal lo zhe na/ lan du/ rdzas ma spangs la ldog pa mi gnas pa ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu ste/ shel me ldan bzhin no gsung / 'o na kun rdzob kyi rdzas ma
251a3(rnying rgyud): spangs pa'i phyir/ don dam la spros pa ma khegs par thal zhe na/ de tsam du shel grang mo la mngobo nyid kyi rgyur grub pam ma grub/ mgrub na/ nyi ma la skyon med pa dang bar sdang la sre' g.yogs med pa'i rkyen dang sprod pa don med du thal/ rgya med rkyen la mi
251a4(rnying rgyud): ltos phyir// zhes gsu drapas mo// grub na/ me rdzas ma spangs pa'i phyir/ shel thang mo la seg byed sa don gyur gyi don byed ma khags par thal zhes mga'o zla'o// gsum pa bden pa dbyer med la'ang / dza ra/ skra don/ dbye ba/ lpags lugs pani//
251a5(rnying rgyud): dang po ni/ mtha' gang du'ang ma reg pa'i sems nyid ye nas dkor bdun ngo bo nyid kyi chur lhun gyis grub pa'i don dam bden pa dang / de nyid kyi rtsal snod bdud su dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du raHsnang ba kun rdzob kyi bden pa gnyis/ mtshon byed kyi tshig la snga phyi byung
251a6(rnying rgyud): yang / mngon pa'i din da po mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas bden pa dbyer med gro'i spyod yul dang bral ba'o// de slab pa la gsum las/ srung ni/ 'di nyid las/ bden pa gnyis ka byer med pas// 'phrul dga'i tshul de ba dang min// zhes dang / rgya
251a7(rnying rgyud): pa las// don dam kyi rdzob dbyer med do// 'dus ma thas nyid 'dus byas thaMng // dngas pas sdang 'do nyid// rtsi mo// man gni/ lam ma mas/ rgyal 'gros ma ma das bcos par// rang bzhin dang gis byed med re// na /
251b1(rnying rgyud): rigs pa ni/ spol TIka pa/ ma yin pa dpe la brten nas dgag pa dang / yin pa dpel brten nas bsrub pa gnyis yin gsungs/ dang po ni/ srud pa dkar nag sgril ba bzhin snang skyong re mos med pa'i phyir dang / bum pa dang snga ma bu bzhin tha dad pa med
251b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir dang / dngos po glang rwa dang dngos med ri bong gi ra ltar snang stong tha dad pa med pa'i phyir dbyer med grub po// gnyis pa ni/ gser dang gser gyi ser po dang / g.yu dang g.yu'i sngon po dang / mtsho dang mtsho'i rlabs dang / bar sdang dang 'ja
251b3(rnying rgyud): gyi dpe bzhis dbyer med du bsgrub gsung / rgyal ba g.yung sogs gong ma phal cher/ dbyer med du sgrub byed kyi rigs pa bzhir bzhed de/ bden pa gnyis po de rang bzhin bzang ngan med pa'i phyir dang / ngo bo dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir dang / 'dug pa tha mi
251b4(rnying rgyud): dad pa'i phyir dang / dus snga phyi med pa'i phyir dbyer med grub gsungs so// 'dir mthun snang gi chos can gcig gi steng du bsgrub na/ bum pa chos can/ bden pa dbyer med yin te/ sdad stod gang gi yang phyogs su ma chad pa'i phyir/ gtan tshigs ma grub ce
251b5(rnying rgyud): na/ 'o na bum pa snang phyogs su chad dam/ stong phyogs su chad/ dang po ltar na/ snang ba 'di yang dag par bden pas stong ngam mi stong / skong na snang phyogs su chad pa nyams la/ mi stong na snang ba rtag dngos su thal/ 'dod na/ spyi mdo las/ byas
251b6(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad mi rtag phyir// zhes pa ltar 'dus byas 'jig pas gsal te/ bum pa dngos po gzhan gyis bcom pa na rang gi gnas skabs btang ste mi rtag par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ de ltar yang / kun 'dus las/ dper na rdo yi dngos po las// btang
251b7(rnying rgyud): sam phyi mar byas nas ni// rlung gi ngo la bskyod byas na// de la rang bzhin gang yang med// ces so// yang / stong phyogs su chad na/ bum par snang rung ma grub par thal/ 'dod na/ bum par snang bas gsal/ gal te sdang stong gang gi phyogs
252a1(rnying rgyud): sum chad na'ang bden pa dbyer med yin na gyi sto zhe na/ gang du snang phyogs dang stong phyogs gar yang ma chad na dbyer med yin pas khyab ste/ sgyu ma'i d+h+rU glang bzhin no// de'i phyir snang ba ma spangs sdang ba'i mtha' las grol/ stong
252a2(rnying rgyud): pa ma spangs stong mthar mi 'dzin/ gnyis ka ma spangs gnyis su 'dzin pa'i mtha' las grol/ mdor na dbyer med ces brjod pa nyid kyang snang stong tha dad du zhen pa dgag pa'i phyir smos par zad kyi/ yang dag par na/ dbyer med du 'dzin pa dang yang
252a3(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i phyir/ blo'i spyod yul dang bral ba zhes bya ste/ 'di nyid las/ a ni stong dang mi stong gi// dbu ma'ang dmigs su yod ma yin// zhes dang / lam rim las/ de ming zhen pa dgrol phyir las// tha snyad gnyis par bsam brjod 'das
252a4(rnying rgyud): zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ bi b+he da/ zhes pa'i sgra las/ b+hed ni dbye ba/ be ni dgag bla ste/ sdang stong gang gi'ang rigs su ma chad pas dbye ba byar med pa'i don te/ phan tshun bsdebs pa lta bu ma yin par/ chos gnyis po gcig gis gcig mi
252a5(rnying rgyud): gtong ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi dbyer med do// gsum pa ni/ gcig la gnyis med pa'i dbyer med/ mtha' gnyis bkag pa'i dbyer med/ ngo bo dbyer med gsum/ dang po ni/ sems tsam pa'i don dam bden pa gzung 'dzin gnyis med kyi shes pa rang
252a6(rnying rgyud): rig rang gsal/ gnyis pa ni/ dbu ma pa'i rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam bden pa/ gsum pa ni/ gsang sngags pa'i snang stod zung 'jug ge grub mtha'o// bzhi pa la/ ngo bo mtshan nyid/ rang bzhin gyis spags lugs gsum/ dang po ni/
252a7(rnying rgyud): tshwa'i theg pa'i bden gnyis res 'jog tu gyur pas ro bo srur 'debs su song la/ 'dir snang stong dus gcig tu chod pas skyer 'debs su ma song ba'i phyir ngo bos lhag ste/ a ni stong dang mi stong gi// dbu ma'ang dmigs pa yod ma yin// zhes so// gnyis pa
252b1(rnying rgyud): klu'i dbyer med mthar thag dpyang ba'i dag ngor grub par 'dod pas mtshan nyid gzung du yod la/ 'dir blo'i spyod yul dang bral pa'i phyir mtshan nyid phyogs gcig tu med pas mtshan nyid kyis lhag ste/ bskrad gnyis par bsam parjod 'das// zhes so//
252b2(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ gu'i bden gnyis rang bzhin yod med ris chad du song la/ sngags kyi snang stong dbyer med pa'i phyir// rang bzhin gyis 'phags te/ lam rim las/ rang bzhin ngang gis dbyer med pa'o// zhes so// zhar byung skabs 'gros kyi rtsod spong ni/
252b3(rnying rgyud): ltar na rang bzhin gyi snang ba gsum du 'gyur te/ gnas tshul de ltar grub pa'i phyir zer na rtags mgung la/ der bkod pa'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir glos slo btags te gsum du bkod kyang / der mi 'gyur na ci lho ste/ khyab pa med
252b4(rnying rgyud): de zhes nyang rtag pa gsang / yang btsag nA re/ snang ba sde 'gag byed pa'i chog nyid kyang skye 'gag byed par 'gyur te/ snang stong gnyis ngo bo bdag gcig pa'i gyad zer na/ lan du mkhas pa glan/ snang ldog skye 'gag byed kyi/ dzi na ma byed gsung / 'on skye
252b5(rnying rgyud): 'gag byed mi byed 'gal ba'i chos yin pa'i phyir/ snang stong bdag mi gcig par 'gyur ro zhe na/ de tsam du mi rtag ldog dang byas chos kyang bdag mi gcig par 'gyur te/ mi rtag ldog skad cig kye 'gag byed tshe de dang bdag gcig pa'i byas chos kyi rdzas skye 'dagag mi
252b6(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i phyir/ dper nad lha bla ma 'dzin gyi shes pa skang cig gnyis pa la bum pa'i rdzas rgyan ma 'gags pa bzhin no// yang dbyer med spyod yul dang bral ba de/ thos bsas kyis gtan la dban du yod dam med/ yod na sgo'i spyod yul dang bral ba nyams la
252b7(rnying rgyud): bden 'di ltar gtan la dbab pa'i gtan tshogs rnams don med par 'gyur ro zhe na/ gnas lugs kyi dang mtshan rtogs pa'i mthar rtogs kyi rtogs byed gnyis med du grong bas mi ko d+he/ rtogs pa'i rang mtshan po mtha' gang shes kyang ma rig pa'i phyir/
253a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngal ba don med do// de ltan 'ang / sa mya blo yul du rtogs pa'i nges shes yod dam med can/ rang mtshan rtogs pa'i nges shes med mod/ 'on kyang rjod byed pa' mo'i sras mtshon te spyong phral dang bral ba'i don pa/ de dang
253a2(rnying rgyud): mthun gyi don gyi rtogs pa'i nges shes tsam skyer yod pa'i phyir gtan la phag pa don med du mi 'gyur te/ 'byung chen gyis ci nam mkha' la rmos gzhal pa na/ mtha' dbus dang / dbyibs pa dog/ gcig dang du ma stsogs spros pa du mas gtangs
253a3(rnying rgyud): nga / 'byung ba gzhan cig 'byed pa tsam lapa dang gi mtshan tenyid ngos gzung byal dmigs pa ltar/ 'dir yang shAng stong dab+h+rir meng po stonas na smras kyang // don gyi thub tha' 'dod du med pa 'dod/ dang rjong rdon sbyinam dang mthor ra mtshig par
253a4(rnying rgyud): lugs ltar mngon du rtogs pas 'gal bar snang ba'i chos rnams mi 'gal ba sogs lung tshad mas grub kyi/ 'di dge tha skad kyi rig pa kho nas bsgrub tu med de/ brjod med kyi don la gang ltar brjod kyang mtha' 'dzin gyi blo mi 'dor pa'i phyer/ thams cad
253a5(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pa'ang tshig gis dbul bar 'gyur ro// de ltar yang / spyi mdo las/ snang dang mi snang la sogs pa// gnyis su rtog pa thams cad mtha'// kun mkhyen rnams ni dbus la'ang min// zhes dang / slob dpon gnyen dpal dbyangs kyis
253a6(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'i lta ba yang dag sgron ma las/ ji ltar nam mkha' ga ni tha snyed du// ming dang tshig gis brjod par byed mod kyi// mtshan ma med cing spros dang bral byed// ngo bo nyid kyi sems kyi yul las 'das// zhes dang / des mdzad pa'i nges don pa ji ltar
253a7(rnying rgyud): bsgos pa'i thabs las kyang / de bzhin pa lachos btsan par/ la ga ste// com thab pa tshog brjod kyar// da dang mthun par / zhes so// 'on par mo sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis rtogs pa'i thabs med pal ma pa
253b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin tshurgyal po las/ yi ge med pa'i chos rnams pa// nyan cing ston par byed pa gang // 'gyur ba mang la sgro btags nas// nyan cing len par byed pa yin// zhes pas spyod yul dang bral bar gtan pa phab nas nges shes bskyed par bya ba yin pas kyang mi 'gal po//
253b2(rnying rgyud): des na khog gzhung bas/ mtshon bya rang bzhin gzhi yi rgyud// rgyo sbyar med par bstan pa ni// mtshon byed spya 'phrul dra ba ste// mdzub mos bong can bzhin no// zhes rang bzhin gyi rgyad sgra rgyud kyis mtshon nus par gsungs pas kyang gsapa po// ci/ de ltar
253b3(rnying rgyud): na/ zla ba lta 'dod pa la mdzub mos bltar na zla ba'i rang mtshan mthong nges pa'i phyir/ dang po nus rang mtshan mthong gi/ don spyi mthong ba'i dper mi rung ngo zhe na skyon med de/ byis pa brda' la ma byang ba la zla ba dngos su bstan kyang don spyir song ste/ gyis chu zla la
253b4(rnying rgyud): der rtog pa'i blo rtse ba sbyar/ mtshon tu mtshon nus kyis zab mo'i sgras bshad kyang so skye mtshon ma'i blo can gyis ji ltar bshad pa ltar mi rtogs pas/ thog mar don g+hi tsam gro la bkod de dad pas drangs pa'i nges shes bskyed pas brgyad nas brjod bya zab mo'i don rnams ra
253b5(rnying rgyud): gyes rtogs par gdon mi za bar grub pa yin no// gsum pa gzhi nges byed kyi tshad mo la'ang gsum las/ lung ni/ rgyas pa las/ bden pa kun rdzob don dum dang // gnyis su med dang rnam gsum yang // de gsum nyid du mnyam pas gsal// zhes
253b6(rnying rgyud): so// man ngag ni/ lam rim las/ de yang rnam gsum gnas tshul bzhag/ ces so// rigs pa ni/ gnas lugs sam rang bzhin gyi gzhi chos can/ bden pa gsum du nges te/ rnam pa ma 'dres ldog ldan gnyis su sdang zhing / rang
253b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin dbyer med du yongs su rdzogs pa nyid thams cad mkhyen pas kyang dgag tu med pa'i phyir ro// ji skad du rim lnga las/ kun rdzob dang ni don dam dang // so sa'i char ni shes gyur te// gang du yang dga' dres gyur pa// zung du 'jug pa de bshad do//
254a1(rnying rgyud): zhes dang / byang chub sems grel las kyang / gan rdzob stong pa nyid du bshad// sbya na ban kun rdzob ste// zas pa dang na ma rtag bzhin// mad nam 'byung nges byeng ngo ro// zhes so// gnyis pa brtag ga /
254a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid ngos bzung ba dang / de gtan la dbab pa gnyis/ dang po la// dgrags/ gzhag/ srang gsam/ dang po ni/ snga bas pa pa bached/ lam pa'i spos brtags pas na btag gzhi gsung / de ltar na las yang brtag gzhir 'gyur
254a3(rnying rgyud): skyeg sbrul n+ya rags me dgas pa bzhan sa so btags la srung d+ha'i rdzas mgrub pa byed/ lam spangs pa nga dzin meng drabral la// yang / thab padag shegs chen men// sa sar rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// brtag dpung bya ba'i gzhir gyur pa lag
254a4(rnying rgyud): ste na shes rab kyis dbyung ba'i yul yi pa'i phy-ing/ gshelas 'bus gsum ga bral bapo ma rigs so// gnas pa na/ gnas lugs pa sa na par ma grub pa las log par rtog pa'i zhen rdzang ste/ lam ma las/ 'khor dang 'das
254a5(rnying rgyud): sa zhu sa
254a6(rnying rgyud): nga / 'a nga sa can pa da par bye/ ra ma nan nga na dbyug 'ang mi'i ston pa pang // sa/ 'od dang rkyen ga
254a7(rnying rgyud): nas gzhal lam zhan/ ma yin te/ snong chenas thag pa'in kyang / zhen canas sgral drugan pa / nga ca das pa yin kyang / nyin mnas 'khor bar 'dzin pa chags pa dgazha pabya// gnyis pan/ ri sags pas/ ga ga
254b1(rnying rgyud): skya bstan pa 'chas// lab dang snang na dngas par gsungs// zhes pas/ dab bar rnas gtan pa dbab pa dang / myang 'das kyi nas gtan la dbababa'o// dang pani/ thugs pag las/ 'al ga/ 'jal rgal ban sa/
254b2(rnying rgyud): yongs su shes par bya/ zhes pas/ gang las 'khrul pa'i gzhi/ ji ltar 'khrul pa'i tshul/ 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin chos nyid las ma g.yos par la bzla ba'o// dang po la'ang / dgrang / gzhag/ mang gsum/ dang po de// khacig na
254b3(rnying rgyud): nas 'khrul gzhi yod pa las 'a zhal lo zer ba ni/ m-i 'thad de/ thags theg pas/ sgo 'dogs dbang gyur gang zag na sas// sems nyid migs su med pa pa// dngos po rang chung gzhing skab// de yi dgas sud rtag pa paSh+Ta /
254b4(rnying rgyud): zhes pas gyon pa zhig nas te/ dang po ni/ 'khrul pa dang rgyud pa rtag par thal/ ye nas 'khrul gzhi yod pa las 'khrul pa'i phyir/ rtags ma grib na dam bca' nyams la/ 'dod na/ lam nges las/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs kyir//
254b5(rnying rgyud): pas gsal/ skyon gnyis pa ni/ gzhi 'khor ba'i mthar ltung bar thal/ 'khrul gzhi yod pa'i gling/ 'dod na/ de nyid las/ rang bzhin dang gis dbyer med pa'ang / zhes pas gas la/ skyon gsum pa ni/ thos pas pa bsgom gsum
254b6(rnying rgyud): sa 'jal ba mi sel byar bral/ 'thub gzhi pa nas dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'dod nA/ sa rbud las/ zos pasas bsgos pa'i mnyam sgor gyis// rang byung tsun dam spyan gyis thub// ces pas gsal/ gyon bzhi pa na/ gzhag zung 'dzin can du //
254b7(rnying rgyud): ye nas 'khrul gzhi yod pa'i phyir/ 'dod na/ rim gsum las/ mtshan nyid mtha' rnams kun bral ba// ces dang / rgyas pa las/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// zhes pas gsol lo/ yang gcig na re/ 'thal gzhi med kyang 'a
255a1(rnying rgyud): na na / du dang /
