255b1(rnying rgyud): so// di skam bde gshegs chen po ni/ gzhi la 'thul pa med kyang 'bul pa sa gzhi yod de/ thag pa la sbal du 'khrul pa bzhin zhes bye ste/ gsungs so// yang 'khrul gzhi med pa las kyang dbul te/ rab rib can gyi mig lam du mkha' la
255b2(rnying rgyud): shan 'dzag pa bzhin no// de ya gas la bkrams/ nyi ma'i dkyi lan sran med ltar/ zhes dang / spyi mdo las/ srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ci yang med pa las spang bar zad do// zhes so// dbyer med las kying 'khrul te/
255b3(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs kyi gzhi la ma rig ye shes dbyer med pa'i gnad kyis de nyid rtogs ma rtogs las grol 'khrul ltar snang ba'i phyir/ ga pur la sman dug dbyer med pas tshad nad can la sman dang / rlung nad can la dug tu 'gyur ba bzhin no// de ltar yang
255b4(rnying rgyud): thugs theg las/ don gnyis yod med res med pas// de yi rgya rkyen rang bzhin pas// sman gyi phan gnod ji bzhin du// thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig pas// mi mthun khyad par so sor snang // zhes so// gnyis pa skad dog pa'i dbang du byas na//
255b5(rnying rgyud): gzhi rang bzhin nam dag yod med dbu ma'i mtha' las grol bde rang ngo rang gis ma shes pas 'khrul te/ thugs thig las/ drug gi 'gro ba thams cad kyi// sems nyid nor bu rin po che// ji ltar bsam pa sbya ba la// 'khrul gzhi yod med sgo srung med//
255b6(rnying rgyud): ces so// gsum pa ni/ de ltar na'ang / dbul gzhi zhes bya ba de/ bde gshegs snying po la 'dod dam/ ma rig pa rgyu dang bcas pa la 'dod/ dang po ltar na/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mi rnyed par 'gyur zhing / gnyis pa ltar na 'bral ba'i ngo bo mi rnyed
255b7(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ro zhe na/ skyon med de/ bskyed pa'i zla ba de gshegs snying po/ dngos rgyu ma rig pa ste/ rgyas par da lta nyid du 'chad 'gyur las shes pa nyid do// gnyis pa 'khrul tshul ni/ sgyu 'phrul bye brag bstan pa las// su rkyen 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus
256a1(rnying rgyud): du da sa / nga/ / da/ ma spyod pa sa gapa las / ma
256a2(rnying rgyud): nga nyes dmigs bdag tu nags 'azlas// zhes dang / gyang phyim las/ thog med ngas kyi nyon mongs pad// brtags byu mabral ba ma yin no// zhes so// gnyis pani/ ri ma gas ma khas/ brgyad bcos spyan cig bang sa
256a3(rnying rgyud): zhes pas bzhin/ bskrad ba'i spyani/ chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin rnam drug yenas dril med pa bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po ste/ de yin bzhin du ngos shes pas 'khrul ba'i chu gyur pa'o// de'ang 'di nyid las/ e ma bde gshegs stong
256a4(rnying rgyud): po las/ ra she namartog pas kyis sprul/ zhes so// mdzang sa ldan gyi g+han/ chob nyid dang lhan cig tu skyes pa'i ma rig pa ste/ rkyen dang 'phri na 'grel ba 'byung rung du gnas pa nig ser dang gser gyig yeng bzhin no// de yang byas pa pa'i/
256a5(rnying rgyud): gnag 'i rnam pa gnyis bral bas// zhen pa snang bar 'gyur ma yin// rtag tu rang mtshan snang gyur kyang // sdig gis mig bzhin mjig pa'o// zhes dang / chur khrod pa de ba'i dpe chung dang gnas las/ bde gshegs snying po dang rig la// ma rig
256a6(rnying rgyud): bla ma tshungs pa'i b+ha/ zhes dang / lhur khab las/ sems can dang bzhin gyis 'a dgas pa pa yin yang / des pa'i shes pa sangs pa sa byas pani/ spyad cig skyes pa ma rig pa // zhes so// lhan cig byung ba'i rgyun/ ku banas
256a7(rnying rgyud): ste/ lam bgatag pas na nyi kyi ga jigag ga du ba gnas pa shi da cigabyed pa'i// na ma na
256b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin ga// zhes dang / gzang 'drin pas la 'jal bste// rnam ga gags thamam mar ldan// zhes dang / dbazungams/ sman brtags mngag nas sungs// nyan gan ma/ byu// rnams// byed khrim paldan/
256b2(rnying rgyud): sdig gi bag chags mthunan du gyur pas bde sdug gi 'bras bu 'byin ma dag pa ste/ 'di nyid las/ srid pa'i sabon rtsub mos 'phangs nas/ zhes dang / rgyas pa las/ rtog pa'i bag chags sprag po pos// zhes so// gnyis bstan ni/ rim gsus pas/
256b3(rnying rgyud): gzhes bstan pa las gsum dang // kun brdegs ma rigs nyon mongs lha// zhes pas/ las gsum dang / nyon mongs pa drug pa'o// dang po ni/ rgyang kyi ma las/ bsod nams gzhan la ldan pa ste// de las bzlog pa sdig pa // zhes pas/ madz+ra
256b4(rnying rgyud): ris su skye ba'i rkyen bsod nams kyi las dang / ngan 'gror skye ba'i rkyen sdig tA'i las gnyis kyi steng du// khams gong ma gnyis su byeb ji rkyen/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / snyoms 'jug bzhi la mi g.yo ba'i las zhes bya ste/ de nyid du ldan pas las gsum mo// de lta
256b5(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid las/ rang gi dam rtog las kyis sbal/ zhes so// gnyis pa ni las de dag kun nas slong pa po ste/ de'ang zhe sdang gis kun nas bslangs pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyis dmyal ba/ de bzhin du per rdzas yi dkas/ gte mug gi si dri dang po/ 'dod chags kyis pa/
256b6(rnying rgyud): phrag dog gis l+h+wa ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis sbyar skye ba'i rkyen byed de/ nA dbyim pas/ nyon mongs las kyis 'khor ba ste// de yang 'gro thug dang bzhin yin// zhes dang / rgyas pa las/ thams cad mnyam par ma shes shing // ma lus kun pa snang bas// dam la la jam
256b7(rnying rgyud): bza ga dag / brgyad// ces sogs dang / de dag cad kun 'bring rje/ rkye ni sa nams dang / bamang rnams ma yin pa dang / mig po pa'i las dang / nyan mangs pa btags pawa/ pra rags dang mang tung gis sa so gyur bar// des gsungs so// de rnam pa 'ong
257a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu dang sbyin 'khyud par ci yod ce na/ 'bras bu'ang ba skyed par byed pa rgyu yin la/ de'i khyang bar bskyed pa rkyen yin no// gsum pa 'khrul pa'i 'bras bu ni/ gyi snod kyi 'jig rten dang / nang brgyad kyi sems can du snang zhing zhen pas las nyon gyi 'bras bu d+d+ha na
257a2(rnying rgyud): bsngal gyi rnam par smin pa ste/ 'di nyid las/ ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos// zhes dang / chung ngu ga skye 'gag lus dang langs spyod dang // gnas dang phyag bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa// zhes dang / rgyud phyi ma'i lung de'i 'brel las/ 'phros der 'ja
257a3(rnying rgyud): de ru gnas// zhes so// bzhi pa 'khrul pa'i dus ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med par 'khor zhing 'khrul pas sdug bsngal gyis long btags te/ rgyas pa las/ thog ma med nas sems yan btung // zhes dang / rim gsum las/ thog ma tha ma med dus nas/
257a4(rnying rgyud): yang dag don la rtog pas nyams// zhes so// 'di kha cig na re/ 'khor ba la thog ma dang bla ma yod dam med/ gnyis pa ltar na/ ya ma nyams su blangs pa la dgos pa med par thal/ stongs pa'i phyi mtha' med pa'i phyir/ 'dod na/ 'di nyid las/ thos bsam bsgom
257a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang gyang kun ma lhun gyis grub// ces pa dang 'gal lo// dang po ltar na/ 'khor ba chos can/ dong lkugs pa srid par bal/ 'dod na/ spyi mdo las/ 'khor pa thog tha med pa'i khams su/ zhes pas gsal lo zhe na/ lan du kha cig na re/ thog
257a6(rnying rgyud): ma yod de/ lhan skyes kyi ma rig pa'o zer/ de ni shin tu mi rigs te/ ma rig pa ni chos nyid dang mtshungs ldan du gnas la/ de dang bdag gcig pa'i chos nyid la thog tha med pa'i phyir ro// yang khacig nA re/ 'brid pa yod la bsngon pa med pa'i phyir tha ma 'ong yod de/ 'bru'i
257a7(rnying rgyud): phung por ra nas bgrangs na 'dzad pa bzhin zer/ de yang mi 'thad de/ sbub byed de'i phyir/ ngas kyang shar phyogs su ring du bsgrags na nam mkha'i mthang rnyed par 'gyur ro byas na ces dgag// de la rnyed tu'i mtha' mgrub pa'i phyir zer na/ 'di yang yod skya'i thal gyi
257b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' nyid ma grub pa'i phyir mtshungs so// 'bring pa yod la sgron mkhan med pa'i phyi zer na/ 'dir yang 'grod pa yod la bzlog mkhan med pa'i phyir zhes mgo bsgo'o// des na spyad pa las/ ma rig 'khrul 'khor 'di la zad med 'phel ba ma/ ces so// yang /
257b2(rnying rgyud): btsan du thog ma dang tha ma gnyis ka med la/ lam gyis grol bar nus pa'i phyir bye brag gang zag dgos btsan la mtha' yod do byas pa la/ kha cig na re/ de ltar na spyi dpe dgos la khyab ba ma ma khyab/ dang po ltar na dgos btsan la 'ang tha ma med par thal/ khyab byed skye
257b3(rnying rgyud): la med pa'i phyir/ gnyis pa ltar na/ dgos la ma khyab pa'i phyir sti ma yin par thal lo zer na/ mkhas pa dag/ ris spyis khyab pa rtags ma grub skye/ spyi log na bye brag bzlog pa'i res don du khas ma blangs pa'i phyir dang / tshogs spyis khyab pa'i phyir zhe na/ tshe
257b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyes khegs kyang bye brag khegs pa'i khyab pa med do gsung / 'dir sgrol ga yung gnyis kyi TI ka'i dgongs pa ltar na/ go don dang / lan gnyis las/ go don ni/ 'di nyid las/ rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med/ ces dang / lam rim las/ 'khor
257b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir/ zhes pas 'khor ba dang 'das pa'i chos gnyis/ de gnyis dang gzhan du brjod du med pa'i phyir/ blo'i yul las 'das pa ste/ thog mtha' yod med kyi tha snyad las grol ba yin no// 'on kyang lan gyi dbang du byas na/ 'gal na
257b6(rnying rgyud): 'gog/ mtshungs na bsgre bya ba yin pas/ 'byung chen gtos kyi nam mkha' la mtha' dbus yod dam med byas pas/ yod zer na/ 'khor ba la'ang thog mtha' yod bya/ 'khor ba la thog mtha' med par spyi mdo'i lung gis gsal lo zer na/ de tsam du
257b7(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' la'ang mtha' dbus med par lung rigs tshad mas gsal ba'i phyir mgo snyoms so// yang nam mkha' la mtha' dbus med zer na/ 'khor ba la'ang thog mtha' med do// de ltar na la ma nyams su blangs pa don med du thal zer na/ bu ga'i nam mkha' bkag
258a1(rnying rgyud): la/ kyar mthegs par thal ba zhes mgom rdungs pazlag// lwab 'thul tshul na/ 'di nyid pas/ phrin zhen 'brel gnyis su la da/ zhes pas rgyanang gnyis pas/ dang matsu rten 'bra brtag nyes ni/ mang thar gatshul du 'khrur ro// de yang gas
258a2(rnying rgyud): po las/ sbyin chu dang 'bral brtag/ de bzhin rkyen dang 'brel ba drug/ ceska bas bya 'brel drug ni/ sa bon las s+ya bu dang / de nas rim pabazhin/ dzIng ba dang / ye la ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams sngam sems/ khyi ma sgyel bskyed pa ga
258a3(rnying rgyud): yang ba'i 'khor tshul lo// nyung brno zlum wA phral sbyar na/ drug ka de dang yin pa lta bu'o gsung / gnyis pa sbyin dang 'brel ba drug ni/ 'byung ba la dus kyi 'gyur ba dang drug go// de ltar rgyu dang 'brel ba'i chos drug po rkyen drug gis brten pa la sogs pa'i bya ba byas
258a4(rnying rgyud): phyi rol ltar snang ba'i yul spyod kyi 'jig rten la sogs pa 'di dag bskyed pa ste/ lanar gshegs pa las/ blo gros chen po/ dza~M lta 'jim pa'i gong sa las rba ma~M byung ba de bzhin du/ zag pa pas snam bu dang / ci sred las re lde dang / sa bon+da las sgra gra dang / srub ma la
258a5(rnying rgyud): sogs pa la'i nan tan dang zho las mar byung ba 'di ni/ blo gros chen po/ gyi'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba snam las phyis 'byung ba'o// zhes so// gnyis pa nang gi rten 'brel la/ mtshan ted/ dbye ba/ bsduba'o// dadapon/ med nal 'byung zhing ltos pas 'grub pa zhig
258a6(rnying rgyud): ste/ gal po las/ 'di yod phyir ni 'di 'byung la// 'di skyes mying na 'di skye bas// snga ma'i rkyen gyis kyim 'byung // zhes so// gnyis pa la/ dngos dang / dbye don gyi khyad par ji gang 'khor tshul lo// ring po ni/ ma ngag pa la sogs pa bcu gnyis so// gnyis pa ni/
258a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs chen gyi gyad rig pa rang shar las/ de yang ma rig pa las byung // ma rig pa las 'du byed do// 'dra byed rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes las mi 'byung zhing // ming las gzugs kyi rang bzhin 'byung // gzugs pas skye mched rnam drug 'byung // skye ma
258b1(rnying rgyud): rlag pas reg pa 'byung // reg pas tsho ba 'byung bar 'gyur// tshor las sred pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sred pa las ni len pa 'byud// len pa las na srang pa 'byung // sred pa las ni sgrub 'byung // skye ba las dran pa 'byung // rgab pas nin pa 'byung // nab /
258b2(rnying rgyud): las ni shi ba 'byung // zhes gsung pa lur/ ma rig pa ni/ de kho na nyid kyi don dang las 'bras la rmongs pa'o// des su byas nas dge mi dge'i las gsog pa'am mngon par 'du byed pa ni 'du byed do// las de dag kun dang bcas pa'i rnam shes kyi steng du bsags te skye
258b3(rnying rgyud): phye mar khyer ba po ni rnam shes so// de skye gnas su tshud pa las tshor sogs ming bzhi'i phung po dang lhan cig pa'i 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs te phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyi ming gzugs thub pa'o// de rim gyis 'phel bas mig sogs nang gi skye mched du gdong
258b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de las yul dbang rnam shes gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa dang / de las pade sdug nyams su myong ba'i tshor ba dang / de las bde ba blang 'dod dang sdug bsngal 'dor 'dod kyi sred pa dang / de las blang dor gyi bya ba sgo gsum gyis rtsol bar byed pa'i len pa dang / des
258b5(rnying rgyud): gsos btab stelas kyi bag chags yang srid yin pa la rdzas mthu can du gyur pa ni srid pa'o// de las gyi ma'i skye ba 'byung zhing / skye ba yod nan tshod 'gyur ba'i rgas pa dang / khams 'gyur ba'i nad dang / srog 'gyur ba'i shi ba ste/ rten 'brel yan leg bcu gtas
258b6(rnying rgyud): gyi 'khor lo bar med par 'khor bas na 'khor ba zhes bya'o// de dag kyang tshe gsum la rdzogs te/ ma rig/ 'du byed/ rnam shes gsum na/ lte ba 'phen byed yin pa'i phyir tshe snga ma dang / ming gzugs nas/ srid pa'i bar bdun ni tshe bar pa la rdzogs te/ dang po
258b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi rnam smin gyi rang bzhin dang / kye ma gsum rnam spen de dag gi rkyen pas blang ba'i phyir ro// skye ba dang rga shi gnyis kyil la rdzogs te/ tshe 'di'i tha ba srid pa yin la/ de'i rkyen las phye ba dang / de las rga shi 'byung ba 'gyur ro// de skad du'ang lnga rlabs kyis/
259a1(rnying rgyud): gsum pa dag las gnyis byung ste// gnyis las bdun 'byung bdun las kyang // gsum 'byung srid pa'i 'khor lo ste// nyid na yang dang yang du 'khor// zhes so// de dag kyang snga ma snga mas rdzi ma gyi ma bgyid pa'i cha
259a2(rnying rgyud): rgyu dang 'brel ba dang / nang gi 'byung lnga dang rnam shes te khams drug 'dus pas bskyed pa'i phyir rten dang 'brel ba zhes bya ste/ sA lu ldang ba'i mdo las/ nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni gnyis kyi phyir 'byung ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
259a3(rnying rgyud): dang 'brel ba dang / rkyen dang 'brel ba'o// zhes sogs rgya cher gsungs so// gsum pa bsdun gsum ste/ ma rig srid len gsum nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dang / 'du byed dang srid pa gnyis las dang / lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal te/
259a4(rnying rgyud): sgrub kyis/ dang po brgyad pa dgra nyon mongs// gnyis pa bcu pa las yin te// lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal yin// zhes so// de yang nyon mongs pa las las dang / de las sdug bsngal dang / de las kyang nyon mongs pa ste/ lus can rnams la dngos
259a5(rnying rgyud): dadeng / lus med rnams la bag chags kyi tshul du 'khor ro// de ltar na phyi nang gi rten 'brel gnyis ka bcu gnyis kyi tshul du 'khor ba nyid de/ ri ma gsum mas/ rten 'brel bcu gnyis tshul dag tu// phyi nang gnyis kar 'khor ba'o// zhes so// drug pa
259a6(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa'i nyes pa ni// de nyid las/ 'phags lam bral dang sdug bsngal myong // nyes pa rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// zhes pas/ 'dod bya 'phags lam dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni/ rgyas pa las/ sems can ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yi
259a7(rnying rgyud): kun khyab kyang // rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas nas// ye shes lnga yi don ma rtogs// zhes so// spang bya shin tu mnar pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dang / gnas skabs bde ba ltar sdang ba'i sdug bsngal ris mi mthun pa sna tshogs kyi tshor ba nyams su myong ba'i nye
259b1(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ 'di nyid pas/ yem thun pa phrag kyang bar 'gyur// zhes so// 'di bcag nar/ sdug brda la nyes par 'gro med dge bde banyes par ces 'gro zhe na/ lan du mdzog ston/ sangs rgyas kyi bde ba la ltos nasems can gyi 'a bang par tha
259b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyang sdug bsngal gyi rade bzhin las ma 'das te/ kla mas klas rnyed pa lta bu'o gsung / der yang ma zad 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyi chur nges pa'i phyir ro// bdun pa 'khrul pa'i sbub byed las/ 'khor 'das gnyis ka'i byed pa po ni ma bcom
259b3(rnying rgyud): skad cig ma ste/ rgyas pa pas/ ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma zin gang yang med// ces so// bye brag tu 'khor ba'i byed pa po ni/ log rtog rgyun gyi skad cig ma ste/ de las/ log rtog rgyur gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma byas gang yang med/
259b4(rnying rgyud): zhes dang / 'di nyid las/ bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// zhes dang / rim gsum las/ rgyun dang bcas pa'i skad cig ma// las kyi byed por brjod pa'o// zhes so// brgyad pa dpe ni/ 'khor bzo rgyan gyi 'khyud mo lta bu dang / mched pa rtsa sog
259b5(rnying rgyud): gi me lta ba ste/ rim gsum las/ zo nun bu sog med pe bzhin// rtag tung khor zhir mched pa'o// zhes sa// de ltar brgyad kyi nying du/ de las/ 'jig dang chags dang stongs dang gnas// rkye rgyan 'chi bzhi ldan pas// mtshan nyid ther zag med pa'o/
259b6(rnying rgyud): pas lce zhing 'jig pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid du bshad do// gsum pa 'khrul pa chos nyi dngul bsgrub ni// de ltar ba rtag gzhi 'khor ba'i chos de dag tu 'khrul ba ltar snang yang rang bzhin chos nyid las g.yos pa med de/ tho yong la mar ldang
259b7(rnying rgyud): yor las ma g.yos pa bzhin no// de ltar yang 'di nyid las/ rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// ces dang / log rtog nyid las gzhan du ni yang med// stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen dang rig thugs// dmigs tu dmigs byed med par dran dbang bltar
260a1(rnying rgyud): dam tsha sa gsung la tu masalas// gzhan na mdzad da kyad du ltar yon// zhes dang / sA pa las/ mchog gas mardzogs paman tsa d+hanas// dran song gnas rnam sa thams cad kun// yang dag pa na du /
260a2(rnying rgyud): de// gang yang spang bar bya ba min// zhes so// 'dir 'khor ba'i chos gtan la phab pa la dgos pa ci zhig yod ce na/ dgos pa gnyis te/ 'khrul tshul bshad pas 'khor ba'i mtshang shes nas myang 'das kyi lam la bkri ba'i dgos pa dang / de'i rang
260a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin bshad pas 'khor ba 'di ma spangs par rang byung gi ye shes su ngo 'phrod de 'khor 'das dbyer med du shes pa'i dgos pa yod do// de las dang po ni/ lung las/ sdug bsngal med na des 'byung med// ces so// gnyis pa ni/ gzhan na med de/
260a4(rnying rgyud): de nyid de ltar yin// zhes pa'i 'grel par slob dpon nyi 'od seng ges/ 'khor ba'i chos zhes bya ba gzhan yul logs shig na med do// 'khor ba'i chos de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor de ltar yin zhes bya'o// zhes dang / le lag
260a5(rnying rgyud): las/ 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyis ka yod pa ma yin te// 'khor ba yongs su shes pa na// mya ngan 'das zhes de la bya na DA zhes bsam gtan mig smon gyi rang 'grel du drangs shing / dgyes rdor las kyang / 'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste// 'di
260a6(rnying rgyud): nyid mya ngan 'das pa nyid// 'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni// mya ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur// zhes so// gal te de ltar mi yin na/ lam sbyangs par don med par 'gyur te/ sol ba la byi dor byas kyang dkar por mi 'gyur ba bzhin no//
260a7(rnying rgyud): de ltar yang rgyas pa las/ rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dang // ye nas ngo bo yod min na// nyon mongs spangs shing byang bsgrub med// ces so// gnyis pa btag gzhi mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos la bi ma las rim pa gsum par sa dmigs drug
260b1(rnying rgyud): tu bsdus nas gsungs kyang / de dag ni myang 'das rang gi mtshan nyid yin gyi/ 'dir ni sku dang ye shes su zhen pa sgro btags kyi blo de brtag gzhi'o// de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid ni 'bras bu'i skabs su rgya cher shes par 'gyur bas 'dir ma smos so//
260b2(rnying rgyud): de rnams ni gzhi spyir bshad pa'o// gnyis pa rgya rgyud du 'gyur ba'i 'thad pa ni/ 'khor 'das su snang tsam nyid nas 'ching grol med pas/ dag pa chen po'o// lhun grub chen po'i gzhi/ ma yin dgag gi stong nyid rang bzhin bden pa dbyer med lhag pa'i chos sku
260b3(rnying rgyud): por ye nas bzhugs pa ni/ 'bras rgyud kyi nye bar len pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rgyu dang / sems can nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du gser bzang po'i khams ltar rang bzhin 'gyur ba med par rgyun chags pas na rgyud do// de yang rje bla ma'i gter gyon bde gshegs kun
260b4(rnying rgyud): 'dus kyi rtsa srub slob dpon gyis mdzad pa las/ gdod nas dag pa'i rig pa ni// ye nas chos slar gnas pa la// dbul po'i khyim gyis 'og na// gnas pa'i nor bu rin chen bzhin// ngo ma shes pas 'khor bar 'khrul// ngo sprad de ngo shes pa ni//
260b5(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings ye shes rtogs pa de// sangs rgyas zhes su grags pa'o// zhes dang / bsam gtan mig sngon gyi rang 'grel las/ rang bzhin de bzhin nyid gnyis su med pa yin yang / thabs dang ma ldan pas/ dbul po'i gteng dang gyad kyi nor bu bzhin
260b6(rnying rgyud): ma mthong bar zad do// zhes so// gzhi don gyi kun gzhi'am rang bzhin gyi chos nyid de la phyir mi ldog pa 'khor lo'i gtam gyi mdo sde dgongs 'grel dang bcas par dpe dgu dang // stong gsum dang yug chen po'i dpe sogs kyi sgo nas khams bde bar
260b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bshad pa ltar/ rgyud 'dir yang bzhed de/ e ma bde gshegs snying po las// zhes dang / phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// ces dang / rgyas pa las kyang / rnam rtog
261a1(rnying rgyud): nA // nga 'an nga / sa // da gas/ du/ shA / segs dang sams// ma
261a2(rnying rgyud): gsal ba// zhes so// gzhi don gyi kun gzhi'i don de yang / rgyan stug po bkod pa las/ sa rnams sna tshogs kun gzhi ste// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po'ang de// snying po de la kun gzhi'i skyes// bde bar gshegs pas bstan par mdzad/
261a3(rnying rgyud): ces so// snying po des 'gro ba kun la trail la mar bzhin du khya ba ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long gi rgyu de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po tA la 'bral mar gyis khyab pa bzhin du gnas so//
261a4(rnying rgyud): zhes dang / mdo sde las kyang / bde gshegs snying pos 'gro kun yongs la khyab// ces gsungs pa'i phyir/ de yang snying po'i don nang rig 'gyur med la bzhed pa'i phyogs legs te/ mgon po byams pas/ rigs khams slang rtsi'adra
261a5(rnying rgyud): ba 'di gzigs nas/ zhes dang / slob dpon dur khrod bde bas kyang / bde gshegs snying po rang rig la// zhes dang // slob dpon mahA sAd+ha sa/ nang zhes bya ba ni chos nyid kyi 'khor lo kha nang du 'dus pa'o// zhes mig spob du drangs padag
261a6(rnying rgyud): sngar gyi/ gdod nas dag pa'i rig pa ni// zhes sogs kyis kyang ston pa'i phyir ro// 'o na 'khor lo bar pa'i dngos bstan ltar bdag nyid chen po klu sgrub zhabs sogs kyis/ phung sogs lnga gcig du bral gyi rigs pas dpyad pa'o rig shes kyi
261a7(rnying rgyud): yul stong pa nyid med par dgag pa'i mtshan nyid can la/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings sogs su gsungs pas gnod do zhe na/ de ni rtswa'i rgyud nang rig 'gyur med 'dir 'jug pa'i thabs kyi yan lag gam/ der bgrod pa'i themasas lta ba
261b1(rnying rgyud): tsan gas nam ma rgyan pa gas pa dang / 'phags pa stangs sa mdun las 'das pa man pa mas can ma grangs pas kyang / ston shes dgas pa pa phyin dang 'du badzang pa'ang / das mas thams cad tong ba nyid dung rtan pa gang ya
261b2(rnying rgyud): nga rnams pad tu mngan par zhen pa las yongs su dang ba'i phyir ba shad kyi/ yang dag pa na du bzhin gshegs pa'i snang po rtag gcigadon dam pa'i bden pa'o// zhes gsung pas cung shes so// khyang de du/ rgyang 'ang tu sa man pa
261b3(rnying rgyud): gsang theg gi/ bcad dkyil na/ don dam snyeng pod pa rdzag 'tshal lo// zhes pa'i 'brel bar/ dzod de'i dkyil mthog le rjen po zung chub kyim pas bzhugs so// rjes dang / ngan tsas kyang bdan gyi snying don dam par
261b4(rnying rgyud): skye das nag rdul g+ha// zhesu dang / dang gagal ba ma bral las/ da na kyang chub kyi 'i ma khyim pa med sh-ina'i tshigs brgyad bang meng po med pa nyid kyi kyang zugs par/ dngas mi kyi ngas
261b5(rnying rgyud): kyang dgas pa mas thang ma kyi sa gsu par bshad pa cid pa ba ba byed ga ga pa pa da pa gang yin pa da // zhi ce sa byis/ sa pa 'i shem thar ba bdas// dab parnams kyid pa dug du
261b6(rnying rgyud): dngos po ldan la zab pa po// las gnas sras lus sa byas pa'o// zhes dang / kyang thang / rdzogs sangs sran 'gro thu dang / dpa zhid cid dbang srid ky-i dang // rigs yod byer na lus banang na// phyag tu sangs thas zhing po can// sa
261b7(rnying rgyud): sa tas/ mkhas pa thams cad bstan bcos 'thad pa las// lus la sangs rgyas yod par rtog sa// zhes so// thang chub kyi sapas yang rang bzhin lhan cigaskyes papo 'gyur ba ba rtser po dang bya' /
262a1(rnying rgyud): lus can stong la gang gnas pa// rang byung zag med ye shes gzugs// me shas theg le bad chen po// nam mkha' lta/ thang kun/ zang pa// mi gnas chos su'i rang bzhin yin// nas dang / dang chung dang gnas kyi 'grol
262a2(rnying rgyud): nang na byang chub kyi sems theg le chen po 'od kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dbyibs dang kha dog gang la lang ma brten par bzhugs pa ni bde ba'i dngas ma/ zhes dang / brtag gnyis pas/ dmyal ba yi dwags du dang gro dang // dang lha min marnams dang // ba
262a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i srin bu sogs kyis kyang // bde ba gang phyir mi shes pa// rtag tu rang bzhin bde ba can// 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang // sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de// sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan pa med//
262a4(rnying rgyud): so// des na nang dag 'gyur med la de bzhin nyid du byas pa ni snying po'i skor sa mdo dang / chud tha sogs de dag gi dgongs 'phral rnams dang mthun yang / 'dir nang rig da bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du byas pa ni/ bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi khyad chos yin nam snyam
262a5(rnying rgyud): sems te/ dus 'khor las/ srid gsum phra rags gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa'o de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med de// sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur// gang gis 'gyur//
262a6(rnying rgyud): med dang bral ma rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de bzung nas stong par lta byed pa// des na gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan// zhes so// 'o na lus la gnas pa'i mi shigs pa'i thig le la snang po dang bachud du
262a7(rnying rgyud): bzhag pa de ltar na/ mu stegs pa'i bdag rtag pa dang mtshungs so zer na/ mi mtshungs te/ mu stegs pa'i 'dod pa de ni bdag tu blta ba'i mtshan nyid can yin la/ 'dar ni le nas 'od gas pa zhing lus la gnas kyang rtag mi rtag gi spros pa las nga
262b1(rnying rgyud): pas ga kha nar ma 'dod par thar dang / 'od gsal byang sus kyang ma mthang ba'i glog tu gyur bya ma yin tate/ bla ma'i manra dag gis mthang du yod pa'i phyir dang / mra stegs pa mthe bo ga chad la sogs pa'i dngos pa dang mtshan dang rjes stong tu/ 'a
262b2(rnying rgyud): dbyer med mtha' bral du 'dod pa'i phyir dang / chos nyid 'od gastsal ba'i don de mngon du rtogs pa na/ bdag gnyis kyis dben pa'i gnas lcags mngon du gyur pa yin pa'i phyir/ bdag ltar mi 'gyur bar ma zad/ de gnyen por mchog tu
262b3(rnying rgyud): bsogs khyad par shin tu mang ngo // mdor na 'di nyid las/ dras bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas byung // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan du mang tshol zhig/ ces dang / ye shes rdzogs pa
262b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la// zhes sogs gsungs pa blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis nges shes khyad par can gyi sgo nas spro dga' bskyed de/ sems nyid 'od gsal ba'i don la 'bad pas sbyor ba gces so// de ltar yang kun ma then chos rjes/ ma lus 'gro kun bde gshegs
262b5(rnying rgyud): sbed po can// glo bar dri mas g.yogs pa'i sbubs nang na// 'od gsal chos khams mar me ye nas gnas// sra dang ye shes 'bru bral med pa'i chos// rang la yod de de nyid lhan gyis phub// stong dang ting rje'i snying ba skur len pas// khyams de byung chub
262b6(rnying rgyud): b+ha ming thob nas// ma lus lce rgu'i tshogs la phan bde byed// nyi mkha' bzhin du gdod nas rang byung yang // glo b+har nyon mongs rgya 'don gyis bsgribs pas// rmi lam 'dra ba'i sring par lhag bsngal myang // de bsal kye byir brtson par stobs skyed cing // ces gsung
262b7(rnying rgyud): so// gzhi 'don nus par bshad zin to// / gnyis pa ni/ dbacang rang gnas las/ rang ba'in mngon du byed myang // ngo bo dang ni byin nying // zhes pas/ brjod bye na gyi su lamagying nga nyid dang / rjod byed cig gi spyang lamakhyen du byung
263a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis las/ dang po la/ dbye ba/ dbye don gyis mtshams 'jog lugs/ ji ltar bzhag pa'i don gtan la dbab pa'o// dang po ni/ thun mong spyi'i lam dang / khyad par 'di nyid kyi lam gnyis te/ rim gsum las/ thun mong lam lngar bslab
263a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang / khyad par so so'i lam bzhin bslab// ces so// gnyis pa ni/ don spyi bye brag la 'jug pa'i khyad par te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo sngags gnyis ka'i 'dug yul du gyur pa ni thun mong gaM la ma dang / ma hA yo ga nyid kyi 'jug yul du gyur pa ni khyad par
263a3(rnying rgyud): gyi lam mo// gsum pa la/ thun mong gi lam dang / khyad par gyi lam gnyis/ dang po la/ dgos ched/ ngo bo// s+tha don/ dbye ba/ rtsod pa spang ba dang lnga/ dang po ni/ dngos su 'di'i lam gyi gol sa shes shing / brgyad nas thun mong gi lam pa rnams kyang khyad par gyi lam
263a4(rnying rgyud): 'dir 'jug pa'i dgos pa yod de/ 'di nyid las/ sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// zhes dang / khog gzhung las/ thun mong lam stegs tsam nyid du// pha rol gyen bcu rgyu 'grus spyod// ces so// gnyis pa te/ gang blo che
263a5(rnying rgyud): chung gi yul du gyur pa'i thun mong gi sems lnga skyes pa ste/ nges 'byung gi theg pa bzhi dang / gyi chud sde gsum mo// gsum pa ni/ de dag gis rang rang gi 'bras bu sgrub pa dang 'di'i lam stegs su bgrod pa thun mong du byed pa'i phyir/ thun mong gi lam zhes bya'o// bzhi pa
263a6(rnying rgyud): dngos kyi thun mo ge la mya dang / ltos pa'i thun mong gi lam mo// dang ba ni/ nya ma/ nyan zas/ rang rgyal/ byang sems te/ nges 'byung gzeg pa bzhi'o// de'ang ma mtsho las/ rigs kyi byebs la ma dbyeb// snga dang gcig gis wa 'bras 'gyur// 'angs skye yi dbye
263a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi na ngas 'byung thun mong lam// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ rtse gud sde gsum gcig tu bsdoms pa nyid nyid las/ de bzhin rigs gcig thun mang man// de nyid kyi nang char snang bas// phyi rol ltos pa'i thun mong lam// zhes so// swA pa ni/ thun mong gis mang

263b3(rnying rgyud): sgyung/ dbul gan la byab ba/ dadagang shAng ba 'i dang // sa byed dag nga na na 'du shin mdun byed pas du dpa rlo dngas gas pa rdzogs
263b4(rnying rgyud): rab brten te// sod nas gaganas don 'phrin pa// sa so// ngas tho btsu bzlas tha me na du byed pala'ang dgos / dinyid las/ man 'phrul rmad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod do sa ma yin te// thabs la brtan pa'i shes rabatang // nga du
263b5(rnying rgyud): zhes so// gnyis pa'i/ zad par ma sems sabyas pan// depa'ang rna mtholas/ bres can gyis byan pa dang // skyes pa'ing bamamasangs pa// zhem pas/ gang nas bu bzhiga'o// gangags rtse ba'i chen/ de ltar zla ba'i rgyub/ skyes par ga po ngan por// deng ngos
263b6(rnying rgyud): danyid las/ ga'i dang sabs nas lnga 'thar bya// bral mthar la mang rnam par bshad// ces pas/ ga dang / las dang / 'bras nas sems // dang po 'i/ gzho rigs gsam pa gang pa dbya/ gang las the ba'is byos bzang po // da yol/ rigasangs pa dang /
263b7(rnying rgyud): ba dang / mangs pags sa/ dang bram theg pa'i dam pal dang blo nga ba rtsams par 'dug par ya ga par du drung bas ngas pa te/ rgyas pa las/ bla mad thag pa pabam yas gsungs pa yang / ngam dang gi blo ba spang bar dang // ches so// dpeng byed/ rten pas dmas kyi
264a1(rnying rgyud): // gsum mo// gnyis pa ni/ de las/ chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyad gyur kyang // dang reg rtogs pa'i skal dang ma ldan na// ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog bstan bzhin// 'di ni skal med rigs chad sa pa yin// zhes pas/ re zhig thar thob kyi skal ba chad pa'o// dbyen
264a2(rnying rgyud): rnam bcad rang bzhin gyi rigs chad du 'dod pa dgag pa dang / yongs gcod gnas skabs rkyen gyis rigs chad par sgrub pa'o// dang po ni/ mkhas pa kha cig na re/ gang zag gi shes rgyud chos can/ khyod la rang bzhin gyis rigs chad pa yod de/ rang rig rtogs pa'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i
264a3(rnying rgyud): phong ba'i mdun du kha dog bstan pa bzhin gsung / de ltar na rang bzhin gyi gzhi bzang ngan can du thal ba'i phyir mi 'thad de/ mgon po byams pas/ chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir// rigs ni tha dad rung ma yin// zhes dang / rim drug las// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// kyang
264a4(rnying rgyud): chub snying po yod par blta// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal bar// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// zhes sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying po can du gsungs pas gnod do// lon re/ skyon de mi 'jug ste/ 'dir mthun rkyen gyis cig car du rigs mi sad pa'i phyir skal ba dang mi ldan pa la
264a5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gyi rigs chad zer gyis byang chub kyi snying po'i sa bon tsam yang rgyud la med par bdag mi 'dod do zhe na/ de ltar na/ re zhig dad mos ma skyes kyang kun gzhi la dkar po'i bag chags bzhag ste nam zhig na rigs sad pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang srid pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin gyi rigs chad yin par
264a6(rnying rgyud): ma nges te/ phal chen gyi mdo las/ sems can la la zhig las kyi sgrib pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad na'ang / de dag gis mthong zhing thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du don yod par 'gyur ro// zhes so// der ma zad/ ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog
264a7(rnying rgyud): bstan bzhin/ zhes pa'ang rang bzhin gyi dper mi mtshungs te/ gal te mtshungs na/ mig mkhan gyis phye ba rnam pa kun tu don med par 'gyur ro// gnyis pa ni/ rang bzhin nyid btags pa'i bag chags 'thug pos dang mo nas bsgribs pas yun ring por mthong dka' ba'am/ grub mtha'
264b1(rnying rgyud): log pa la zhen pas yang dag pa'i gags su gyur pa la dgongs nas/ re zhig thar rjod kyi skal ba dang me ldan pas rigs chang ces gsungs so// de ltar yang 'di nyid las/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang brtags pa la mngon par zhen pas yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag/ rdzas dang /
264b2(rnying rgyud): rjes kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab byar gung // zhes pa ldan 'grel pas/ chad pa'i l+h+wa ma rig sa gnyis kyis shes rab kyi spyan ldongs pas dpe lta bar ye nas log pas rang rgyud du gol ba ni rigs chad pa'i sa pa ste/ rtsa ba dang yan laganyams pa las kyang shung te/ yung yang dgyu ba pa
264b3(rnying rgyud): tsam la brjod pa'o// zhes so// de la/ kha cig na re/ gol ba no rags chad pa nges pa ste/ zhes pa yan chad rang bzhin gyis rigs chang slab pa'i lung yon zer na'ang / ma yin te/ gal te yin na/ rtsa pa dang yan lag nyams pa las kyang / zhes pa'i rgyung sgras/ che ba yin to rigs med 'grar
264b4(rnying rgyud): zhes rkyen gyis chad pa dang rang bzhin gyi rigs chad du 'gyur ro// des na rdza 'brel gyi lung de dag gi don ni/ rkyen gyis chud pa kho na la dgongs pa ste/ yun ring du 'gyangs pa tsam la brjod pa'o// zhes pas gsal lo// gsum pa rigs ma nges pa ni/ rkyen gyi dbang gis sems ga 'ang
264b5(rnying rgyud): skyeng rung ba ste/ rgyas pa las/ theg pa gang du bstan par ma nges pa'i// zhes so// de la'ang dbyen ma nges pa bzang ngan gnyis/ dang po ni/ theg pa gang bstan kyang thogs med du go ba'i bzang po'i rigs can te/ de las/ yang na kun la mthun byas dbyams par 'jug/ ces so// gnyis pa ni/
264b6(rnying rgyud): theg pa mtha' dag la zhugs shing nges shes kyi mthar mi phyin pa'i mnges pa ngan pa'i rigs can te/ de las/ yang na nges med 'do zhes brtag tu med// ces so// gnyis pa ni/ sngar grub mthas blom bsgyur ba'i gang zag gang zhig/ 'bras bu'i theg pa 'dir rigs nges pa'i dbang rnon nam/ rigs ma
264b7(rnying rgyud): nges pa bzang po de las phye bar bzhed de/ lam rim las/ mnges pa nas 'brel rgya chen// ldan pas rdal 'byor mchog spor ba'o// zhes dang / lam drung las/ ngo bos 'brel phyir gzhi nyid nas// 'dir 'jug nges pa'i don du rung // zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ lam rigs bzhinas skye ba yin te
265a1(rnying rgyud): dang/ dang/ da da sa zhan dunanan du pa rnam pas
265a2(rnying rgyud): rdzum pa di ra' 'dub pa ngas// zhes so// gangs pani/ nga shAng ma par byid nas 'di 'jug ste/ pas rgya nas/ na mongs sapar bas// nga ga zugasung drugs coM// da d+hang sa kyangs mis ngangs/ ra mongami 'a gyung ba //

265a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa dang skye so// zhan rtog byed pa'i rgyani/ theg po dag pa byethos pas kyi shA'i gang ngo yon dngas pas yo nas/ 'di 'jug pa 'dzi na'i sbyi te/ dzin pa'is/ bags kyi mngon pas gang na ta ma/ yod tu mthongang sbyin ma mang gi
265a5(rnying rgyud): da'i rje mang mthong dang // nyis pa smrangs pa // saso// gnyis pa/ dpas/ ba dgag migs gas pa te// snang byagang zil padis cag/ ces pas rgyan nams nyi gas ga d+ha ma ma rnams pa gas pa can kyi
265a6(rnying rgyud): man ga dang ldan pa gamani dan pa chen/ coM byed pa'i byung nga gdang banas pa ni migs pa'i rje/ ma gyi nyigs pa gapa ni kyi ma gyi ba rtogs migs nga badzi pa ma rgyan na// gsum pa thas

265b3(rnying rgyud): zhen/ bdan mod sde/ don kyang bse ru'am na cilta bu rigs mthun pa'i grogs por bstan nas don byed pa'i phyir skyon med de/ 'di nyid las/ rang rgyal rnams ma thas du tshul// zhes dang / rnam skang stad las/ rang rgyal rnams la rdzogs po gzugs/
265b4(rnying rgyud): bstan nas theg chen dmigs la 'dzud// ces dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa'i mdo las/ gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis gdul bar bya ba de dag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su 'dug ste rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa
265b5(rnying rgyud): chos brdas yang dag par ston to// zhes gsung pas gsal lo// gsum pa ste tshul ni/ nyang TIka dang g+ha na TI ka pa sogs rnam grangs brgyad du bzhed do// mos pa tha dad pa la ltos te thabs grol gnyis su dang / blo che chung la ltos te rim cig car
265b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis su dang / rim pa 'dor mi 'dor la ltos te thod rgal dang thar chags gnyis su dang / zhen pa dag ma dag la ltos te zag bcas zag med gnyis su dang / mtshan mche chung la ltos te lha dang mi rtog pa bsgom pa gnyis su dang / gang la bya drag zhan
265b7(rnying rgyud): la ltos te zhi ba dang khro bo gnyis su dang / rang stobs dang gzhan stobs la ltos te shes rab dang gdams ngag gnyis su dang / ting nge 'dzin gsal mi gsal la ltos te mos bsgom dang nges rdzogs bsgom pa'i tshul gnyid ma sems kyi zhes bzhed nang
266a1(rnying rgyud): 'dar ni/ lam gyi rtsub thabs grol gnyis te/ de gnyis ka b+h+ya rtsal dbang dul nas te ma dang cig cang du 'dug pas skye rang byu/ @ gnyis cu rgyad de nes gsang bdag rten pa d+ma phrag pa dang /
266a2(rnying rgyud): drings pa sogs bzhed pa nyid legs par snang bas de bzhin du 'chad do// de la dbye ba dang sgrub byed gnyis/ dang po ni/ rang bzhin gyi dbang rnon dang / sbyangs pa'i dbang rnon gnyis re re la'ang blo che chung gi sgo nas rim 'jug dang cig car du 'jug pa gnyis
266a3(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis 'jug ste/ lam rim las/ de yang rang bzhin sbyangs pa yis// rjod du gyur pas nye ring phyir// ri ma dang cig car bzhi cha yis// rtsibs rnal 'byor chen por 'jug/ ces pa ltar bzhi las/ sbyangs pa'i dbang rnon rim gyis pa ni/
266a4(rnying rgyud): ma phan chad blun mong gi theg pa la yun ring sbyangs shing / 'di'i tshe stong la'ang la ma stegs kyi theg par sbyangs pa zhig mu nya'i theg par 'jug pa'o// spangs ni cig cang ba ni/ snga ma spangs par mthun zhing / tshe 'di la chog ma rang na sa ma gar 'jug pa'o//
266a5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gyi dbang rnon rim gyis pa ni/ tshe snga ma phan chad ma sbyangs shing / 'di'i tshe stod la lam stegs tsam rnyer zhig 'og ma la spangs pa'i mthar ma hAr 'jug pa'o// dang rdo cig cang ba ni/ snga ma la'ang ma sbyangs shing // tshe 'di'i yang tho
266a6(rnying rgyud): ma na sa ma hA nyid du 'jug pa'o// gnyis pa la/ sbyangs rdo dang / rang rdo sgrub pa'o// dang po ni/ lam rim las/ bskal pa zhing gi rdul skyed du// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i// shes rab mi ldan 'dir 'jug phyir// ring ba'ang

266b4(rnying rgyud): na/ rang rno med par 'dod pa nyams so// gzhan yam/ dbang rnon yin na sbyangs rno yin pas khyab pa'i phyir/ spangs pa mnyam po la rjo badrug mi rung ngo // 'dod na mngon sum gyis gas/ rdzob de nyid snga ma la sbyangs sam ni mazer na/ ma ska
266b5(rnying rgyud): sam kyang ste/ cicha yod kyis rigs pa mi gartun gas bral bdi gshegs chen po gsung // yang theg chung du snang ba'ang mi rigs te/ spangs pa mnyam po la rdo rje chung 'o ba mi rigs la/ rgol che chung med na/ theg pa la che chung
266b6(rnying rgyud): re/ theg pa'i rim pani d+mo khyad kyis lci ba yin pa'i phyir/ da ltar yang / dgongs 'du // rim pa'i sgo yod byed// theg pa'i rim pa'ang de bzhin te// na so// gnyis pa la/ lung / man dang // rigs pa'i skad byed
266b7(rnying rgyud): sa/ lung ne/ dgongs 'dus las/ rdorje sems dpal zhi dmas na nanas pa thams can chen po 'di dag ni/ sems kyi rang bzhin du tshogs pa'i phyir/ ba'aphrang nga/ zab pa dang / sa pa dang / dge pa dang /
267a1(rnying rgyud): ba dang / brtul ba dang / myur ba dang / bul ba shastug las/ gsang sngags kyi gtam rim gyis sam// cig cang du thos nas/ zhes dang / kun byung rgyal po las/ lha mo'i sems can dbang po mi mthun pas/
267a2(rnying rgyud): la la dbang po ye nas tshig chod yod// pa la sbyangs pa'i dbang po 'phro can yod// zhes so// man ngag ni/ lam rim las/ ma sbyangs grub pa gsum phyir gyis// mtho bstan myur rno rgya che yang // zab mo rgyu yi gang zag de// zhes dang / mdzod
267a3(rnying rgyud): las kyang / kha cig thog ma nas de rig/ kha cig sbyangs pa las gyur pa'o// zhes so// rigs pa la/ dgag/ gzhag/ spang gsum/ dang po ni/ lha rje mdar na gA nA de/ sems can gyi shes cud chen po/ khyod la dbang po rnon po gzhi la grub ste/
267a4(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi la bag chags sna tshogs bsags pa'i phyir gsung / de mi 'thad de/ kun gzhi la bag chags 'jog pa de/ rgya chen pos bsam gyis sbyangs pa la ltos dgos pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin gyi dam bcu' nyams so// gnyis pa ni/ gsang
267a5(rnying rgyud): bdag sgo phug pa'i zhal nas/ sems can gyi shes chud chen po/ khyod la dbang po rno brtul grub ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i phyir/ lcags kyi rdo brtul bzhin no/ gsungs te/ sgron dang bral ba'i sbyor ba'o// gsum pa ni/
267a6(rnying rgyud): kha cig na re/ gzhi la rno brtul grub na/ gzhi bzang den can du thal ba'i phyir mi 'thad de zer na/ lan du rde nye ston dang / rdung 'khor na re// zhi'i ri bo bzang ngan can du thal lam ldog pa bzang ngan can du thal phrer/ dang po ltar na/ rdo brtul 'jug pa'i blo la dpyad pa
267a7(rnying rgyud): yin pa'i phyir khyab pa med do// gnyis pa ltar na/ 'dod pa nyid do/ ldog pa bzang ngan las 'khor 'das sna tshogs su shar ba'i phyir ro gsung / lha rje gnubs gshin na re/ gzhi bzang dan can du mi 'gro ste/ don ngas par dbang po rno 'jal gang
267b1(rnying rgyud): du'ang ma grub/ kun rdzob du rno brtul sna tshogs su ma 'gags/ dbyer med la rno brtul tha dad kyi zhen pa las grol lo gsung / yang kha cig/ rang no de rkyen thos bsam la rag lus sam ma lus/ dang po ltar na rang bzhin gyi dam bca' nyams la/
267b2(rnying rgyud): pa ltar na 'bad med du grol bar thal lo zhe na/ de tshod du lcags kyi rno btul rgyal yod pa de rkyen mgar ba la rag lus sam ma lus/ lus na 'dir yang thos bsam la rag lus so// 'o na rang bzhin gyis rno ba ma yin par zang / thos bsam la dag
267b3(rnying rgyud): lus pa'i phyir zer na/ lcags rang bzhin gyis rno ba ma yin par thal/ rkyen ma gar ba la rag lus pa'i phyir zhes bsgo'o// yang lpags kyi rang rdo de rkyen mgar ba la rag ma lus so zhe na/ 'dir yang rkyen thos bsam la rag ma lus so bya/ ma
267b4(rnying rgyud): sbyangs pa'i rgyud dag srid pa'i phyir/ 'bad med du grol bar thal lo zhe na/ de tsam du lcags rdos kyang mtshon gyi bya ba byed nus par thal/ zhes mgo mtshungs so// des na rkyen mgar ba dang 'phrad pa mtsham po la lcags la rdo brtul 'gyur ba bzhin du/
267b5(rnying rgyud): 'dir yang rkyen thos pas ma dang 'phrad pa mnyam po la rno ba rtul gyi khyad par 'byung ba nyid mngon sum gyis grub bo// gsum pa ni/ kha cig na re/ gsang ba snying po'i chud 'di sbyangs pa'i dbang rnon gyi yul yin gyi/ rang bzhin gyi dbang rnon gyi yul
267b6(rnying rgyud): yin no zer na/ lan du sgrol g.yung rnam gnyis kyi TI kar/ de rigs pa ma yin te/ de tshod du zag med kyi chos nyid de mthong lam pa'i yul yin gyi/ mthar lam pa'i yul ma yin no byas pas/ kho na re/ mthong lam las mthar lam blo
267b7(rnying rgyud): rung bar thal zer na/ 'o na sbyangs rno bas rang rdo blo chung bar thal/ rtags khyab mgo mtshungs/ 'dod na/ 'dir yang 'dod do// lam rim las/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan mchog 'chang // zhes pas gsal lo zer na/ de nyid las/
268a1(rnying rgyud): ma grangs grub pag su ma rnyed rjes// zhes pas gsal zhes mgo ba sgo gzung / bzhi ba skyes par nga ga ba na/ sems ma skyes pa ste/ khagag nyung las/ rngab sems rgyas pa dang // zhes dang /
268a2(rnying rgyud): ba gnyis/ dang po ni/ rang bzhin gyi snyan pa can so so skye bo dang / ched du byas pa'i sran pa can spu skegs pa sogs theg pa 'og ma rnams kyi zhe 'dod las grol nas ma hA yo gang sems g.yo ba ni g.yo ljang byang chub ci sems/ gzhi des ma hA'
268a3(rnying rgyud): khong du chud par smon pa ni smon pa byang chub kyi sems/ de'i don la 'jug pa ni 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems/ zhugs nas dbyer med kyi don nyams su len pa'i rtsol ba la gnas pa ni gnas pa byang chub kyi sems/ gnas pas lam lnga mthar phyin
268a4(rnying rgyud): pa ni bathar phyin pa byang chub kyi sems so// de'ang lam rim las/ de dri bzhin du gnyis dang bzhis// mchog gi g.yo ba'i sems 'brang 'gyur// gzhi des khong du chud smon pas// lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan 'jug par byed// mchog gi dam
268a5(rnying rgyud): thobadu thos/ gsangs gyung pa pan badz+ra// tham ga sa sgri pa gyi 'du ngag 'a ldan ma bangs brtsor/ ya pa' 'khor ya gyud// thos pa sa dres pa 'ini pa byung / pa dang /
268a6(rnying rgyud): 'grel pa las/ rgyu rkyen thun mong ma yin pa drug gis snga ma'i log pa gnyis kyi shes pa'i gzhi nas theg pa mchog la 'dug pa'i sems yang rje me ltar ldang zhing g.yo ba dang / rgyu des sngon pa gsum rgyo ba dang / des sgyu 'phrul ri mo'i dkyil
268b1(rnying rgyud): rab gsum gyi sgo nas nyams su len pa grol lam mo gsung / bla mgong ma phal cher/ thabs kyi man ngag dang ldan// sa nyon mongs pa la smad kyang me 'cheng zhing grol bar ston pas thabs lam/ chos nyid kyi ngan la shes rab gsum gyis
268b2(rnying rgyud): grol lam mo gsung / bzhed pa de gnyis ka legs par mi sems te/ dang po ltar na/ dbang dang bde ba mi ston pa phyir/ mngon du phyung ba'i sgrol ba 'di thabs lam ma yin par thal/ 'dod na/ ngo mtshang ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs//
268b3(rnying rgyud): thabs lam du gsungs pa dang 'gal lo// gnyis pa ltar na/ nyon mongs pa ma spangs par grol ba'i thabs su ston pa'i phyir/ gsang sngags tha dag thabs lam du thal/ 'dod na/ gsang sngags la grol lam gtan med 'thal lo//
268b4(rnying rgyud): 'dod mi nus te/ rim gsum las/ dbu ma rnam pa gnyis yin te// grol lam thabs su rnam par bstan// zhes pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir/ gnyis pa ni/ gtso bor shes rab gsum gyi sgo nas shes 'dug gi 'ching ba las grol bas 'bras/
268b5(rnying rgyud): bu grub par byed pa ni gol lam ste/ ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis/ rang byung kun dam lhun gyis grub/ ces so// gtso bor thabs dang gdams ngag gi sgo nas 'ching ba la btul zhugs kyis
268b6(rnying rgyud): spyad pas 'bras bu myur du 'grub par byed pa ni thabs lam ste// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu mar snang ba mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med// ces dang //
268b7(rnying rgyud): A li kA le'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes so// gzhan yang lam de gnyis dpes mtshan rnaMs bshing dbade blag tu go bar 'gyur te// makI ka'i spor bas lugs khams gser du bskur ba bzhi thabs
269a1(rnying rgyud): no// g.yo dang bskyod dang lda nga gnas// zhes sa// de yang lam pas thabs la ma nyams su len pa'i dus su/ rtsa gnas nas thig lo mag gams can Na bdeb mgo ldang ban tshul du 'dug pa nig yo ldang byang chu
269a2(rnying rgyud): sems so// bde ba snum 'jig cing brim la 'dug pa ni 'jig 'jug byung chub kyi sems so// lus mi rtswa thig rnams rang sa gnas pas bde ba'ang spes la ma 'gags par gnas pa ni gnas pa byang chub kyi sems so// sa ma bride ba la dmigs
269a3(rnying rgyud): shang gyi ma'i bdeb la ston pa ni smon pa zung chub kyi sems so// thig le dbab bzlog gi sbyong bas byang chub kyi sems rdung nga badz+ra ba 'gro 'ang du gnas pa ni r+g+ha 'o byang chub kyis rnas sa// 'dir 'acig/ la bkyo bo sems lnga yi nan/
269a4(rnying rgyud): pa gang gis snyed ces rgal na/ lan naM/ sems g+ha sde pa'i gzhi 'ongs nas lem pa yin la/ skem pa rang gnas nas la mgyu na yin pas byon med do// zhem tham gang ma rnams gsungs sa// gsum pa sgra na ni/ rdo bo dang
269a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i thun mo grolam pa rnams kyis spya dbyar mthar ba'i phyir khyad par lAm zhes caste/ bu dkyil las/ rnal dbyang stong yul byung ba rjod // ldan pos rnams la la ba sha cing // dab mchog sa dag slong la 'ang // gsang las shing tu gas
269a6(rnying rgyud): bamachag/ sa// bzhi pa dab la/ dngos dang / 'byed byed gi zad par // da pon/ khog ga ltung las/ tha da pa yi nan ma gnyis te/ zhes pas gnyis sa kyi'o// gnyis ga shin/ shes rab rnam par bral ba'i lam
269a7(rnying rgyud): dang / thabs kyis nges pa'i kyi/ mtshalas/ zil lam babs su rnam par du// / pa/ dgag/ gnan 'ang gsus dang / dang nga yang ngaska pathabs lam/
269b1(rnying rgyud): rab gsum gyi sgo nas nyams su len pa grol lam mo gsung / bla mgong ma phal cher/ thabs kyi man ngag dang ldan/ sa nyon mongs pa la smad kyang me 'ching zhing grol bar ston pas thabs lam/ chos nyid mye ngan la shes rab gsum gyis
269b2(rnying rgyud): grol lam mo gsung / bzhed pa de gnyis ka legs par mi sems te/ dang po ltar na/ dbang dang bde ba mi ston pa'i phyir/ mngon du byung ba'i sgrol ba 'di thabs lam ma yin par thal/ 'dod na/ ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs//
269b3(rnying rgyud): thabs lam du gsungs pa dang 'gal lo// gnyis pa ltar na/ nyon mongs pa ma spangs par grol ba'i thabs su ston pa'i phyir/ gsang sngags tha dwag thabs lam du thal/ 'dod na/ gsang sngags la gro la lam gtan med 'bral lo//
269b4(rnying rgyud): 'dod mi nus te/ rim gsum las/ dbu ma rnam pa gnyis yin te// grol lam thabs su rnam par bstan// zhes pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir/ gnyis pa ni/ gtso bor shes rab gsum gyi sgo nas shes 'dug gi 'ching ba las grol bas 'bras
269b5(rnying rgyud): bu grub par byed pa ni gol lam ste/ ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis/ rang byung kun dam lhun gyis grub/ ces so// gtso bor thabs dang gdams ngag gi sgo nas 'ching ba la btul zhugs kyis
269b6(rnying rgyud): spyad pas 'bras bu myur du 'grub par byed pa ni thabs lam ste// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu mar snang ba mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med// ces dang //
269b7(rnying rgyud): A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes so// gzhan yang lam de gnyis dpes mtshan nas bshad na bde blag tu go bar 'gyur te// mak+Shi ka'i sbyor bas lugs khams gser du bskung ba bzhin thabs
270a1(rnying rgyud): la mkhas pa'i myur lam yin pas thabs lam dang / de la ma brten par gsar 'gyur gyi thabs gzhan med pa'ang ma yin te/ rin po rje kau su b+ha dang lha/ na cig tu bzhag pa'i rdo'i khams gser du 'gyur bcang
270a2(rnying rgyud): grol lam gyi dpe'o zhes bzhed do// gsum pa ni/ de lta na'ang grol lam la thabs dang gdams ngag mi dgos shing / thabs lam la shes rab gsum mi dgos par thal zhe na/ rnam par phye ste/ gtso bor mi dgos pa 'dod la/ thams
270a3(rnying rgyud): cad du mi dgos pas ma khyab ste/ rje dri ngas pa nye ston gyig gla sel sgron me las/ lam de gnyis mgo 'brel lam stag shal na/ mgo 'brel te gcig gi cha rkyen du gcig dgos so// 'o na gnyis su phye ba la dgos pa med do zhe na/ dgos pa
270a4(rnying rgyud): yod de// gtso bor gad byas na 'bras bu thob pa'i sgo nas bzhag go// zhes so// sngar gyi dpe'ang don dang shin tu mtshungs te/ gang dag grol lam du shes rab gsum gtso bor bsten te mnyam pa'i lta ba las su rung ba las thabs lam du rbad du blang ba'i
270a5(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang du blangs te mnyam pa'i lta ba las su rung ba ches gyur par bla na med pa'i chud sde thams cad du gsungs la/ rgya mtshan des/ ma kI'i dpe dang / kau sU b+ha'i dpes bstan pa gnyis 'bras bu gser du gcig kyang /
270a6(rnying rgyud): myur bul gyi khyad par yod pa bzhin no// lnga pa lam gyi ngo bo thabs grol gnyis gtan la dbab pa ni/ rgyud phyi ma las/ gang gis brjod bya 'chad byed pa// de ni rjod byed du bshad do// zhes pas/ brjod bya 'chad byed rjod cir yin pa'i phyir/ 'og
270a7(rnying rgyud): tu lam rkyen yi ge'i rgyud 'chad pa las rgya cher shes par 'gyur bas 'dir ma smos so// 'ug pa ni/ thabs lam gyi sngon du grol lam 'gro dgos pa yin te/ btags pa gnyis kyi gzhi nas mahAr 'jug pa'i nyer bsdogs su g.yo ldang dang /
