271a1(rnying rgyud): las// maN+Di byung dang bzhin pa'i yichud// blo skar med par bstan pa ni// mtshan ldang sgyu 'phrul drub// / mdzum mam bar ldan bzhin no// zhe' dang / rimags ma las/ tshig dang yiga'i can gnyis pas
271a2(rnying rgyud): nas rtogs par byed pa yin// zhes po// ci'i phyir/ gzhan pa rag na lus par gzung phyogs le ge'i rgyud lo nas rang bzhin gyi rgyud do ni ji sa ba bzhin ston par nus pa yin nam zhe na/ ma yin te/ 'di nyid kyi lung de'i 'phros las/ khong nas gangasas
271a3(rnying rgyud): don 'dzin pa// ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas// zhes gsungs pa phyir/ de'i don yang / sgo ba~M dben skyes pa rda rje'i d+hA kAr/ sngon byung dang rje 'dug gi ston pa gnyis sdes ji ltar 'byin pa'i tshul gsungs na'ang / 'dir thabs sra babapa pa rnye
271a4(rnying rgyud): 'dug gi dbang du byas te/ gong du smos pa'i rkyen bzhi'i nang tshan bdag rkyen rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ rang bzhin gyi rgyud gdul bya'i rgyung la gab pa de nga spod ba'i thabs kyis 'byin cing / lam rkyen yi ge'i rgyud du sbas pa'i don rnams 'khrugs sdebs mngon
271a5(rnying rgyud): dra zung ba'i tshul kyis 'byed par mdzad pa ste/ bi ma la'i 'grel chu las/ kun gyi khong na gnas pa'i ngan de gsang ba 'di las 'byin mngong pa'i// theg pa kun la mkhas pa'i ston pa'i thugs la gnas// rgas dang / nya'od ser po'i la
271a6(rnying rgyud): kyang / slob dpon gyi tshig gis rab tu mtshon te/ rgyud kyi khong nas chog dron gyi grub pa dang / don tshig la sogs pasdus pa'i don 'byin par byed// rjes so// mdor na 'chang pa pa rdo'i slob dpon gyis/ 'chad bya sba byad la bstan te/ de ga
271a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i rgyud don nyid byen ci ma log par kaun dgos pa'i phyir/ 'di dag ni dud la 'dug pa'i mthun rkyen gyi gcab yin par shes par bya'o// de gar mtshan byed yi ge'i hud zhing / btung ba'i mdang gagi bshad thabs gang gis/
271b1(rnying rgyud): ltar 'chad ce na/ bshad thabs kyi man ngag ni sngar rgya cher bshad grub la/ des ji ltar 'chad pa la/ rgyad kyi mtshan bstan pa dang / mtshan de ldan gyi rgyud don no// dang po ni/ thugs thig las/ dang por mtshon pa mtshan gsum ldan// zhes
271b2(rnying rgyud): dang / khog gzhung las/ rab mtshan tha snyad gsum du grags// sku 'phrul snying po lung gi spyi// lag gi rtsa bzhin dbu zhabs rtogs// skal ba can gyi tshad phyir ro// zhes pas mtshon gyi rnams gangs gsum ste/ rgyad dang 'chad pa'i skyes bu'i
271b3(rnying rgyud): tshan thun mong du bstan pa dang / che ba las btags pa dang / don rang gi ngo bo las btags pa'o// dang po ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/ rdo rje me long las/ chos rnams ma lus gnyis med pa'i// rang rig byang chub sems nyid
271b4(rnying rgyud): ngo// tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin// zhes pas/ rdo rje ni dbyer mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin can/ sems dpa' ni/ sa twa'i sgra skyed don drug la 'dug kyang / skabs 'dir bstan pa dang / bsdus pa dang / rtogs pa
271b5(rnying rgyud): gsum la 'jug ces rong zom chen po gsungs pa ltar/ rang rig pa byang chub kyi sems bden pa dbyer med de nyid/ rdo rje ltar brtan pas na/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang / des 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad rdo rje ltar dbyer med par bsdus pas sam/
271b6(rnying rgyud): dbyer mi byed pa'i don rtogs pas kyang rdo rje sems dpa' dang / gang rtogs pa'i ye shes de yang rdo rje ltar gnyis su med par gyur pa ste/ dang po gnyis kyis gzhi 'bras dbyer med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' dang / phyi ma gnyis kyis 'bras bu'i spyi dang bye
271b7(rnying rgyud): braphrag gi phyogs bzung ba'o// sgra 'phrul dra ba ni/ spring rgyal ba rnams kyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rnam 'phrul sgra ma ltar cing yang ma nges par sdang ba'i sgo nas thugs rje'i dpung thag gis mi gtong bar 'dzin cing 'brel pa'i don dam/ thab sa
272a1(rnying rgyud): 'phral pa'i skyed pa'ang mtshan ma med pa'i shes rab kyis ma zin pa med pas kyang 'brel pa stesgyu 'phrul dra bar// khyad par du/ rdo rje mo long las/ thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i don// sgyu 'phrul zhes ni bzha
272a2(rnying rgyud): bshad do// zhes pas phyi nang gsang ba de kho na nyid dang bzhir brgyad pa'i bka' srol gyis 'chad pa las/ dang po gyi ltar na/ 'byung ba lnga sgyu ma ltar snang la ma nges pa dang / de'i rgyas cing yang 'phrul pa ni phung po lnga'o// de gnyis 'brel pa can
272a3(rnying rgyud): kyi dru ste/ don des lha ma mtshan pa wA wam/ 'phrul pa mtshon pa yab/ drab mtshon pa zung du 'brel ba 'am/ yang ni 'd-i'i la~M' bzhi par/ yab la sku 'phral dang / yam la dra bar bshad de/ dang pa n+de/ lung wa m+b+has
272a4(rnying rgyud): bu la rang rig rtog pa'i thabs kyis ye shes lngar mtshon nas rigs lngar snang ba la 'phrul zhes bya ste/ le lag las/ lnga phung sgyu ma'i ye shes la// rang rig thabs kyis rigs lngar 'phrul// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ sgra ma rtog tshog dang /
272a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul po lha gnyis dbyer med du 'brel ba la'ang bshad du rung mod/ 'dir ni yum gyi mkha' dra da pa chos mthun pa'i phyir yum la dra bar bshad de/ rdo rje g.yung drung 'khyil pa'i mdo las/ dra ba cing yang 'gyur ba ste// mdo mdud 'phral cing
272a6(rnying rgyud): zar thal ba// gang nas bltas kyang gsal bar ltung // cir yang sdud cing shong ba bzhin// doni yum gyi mkha'i dbyings kyang // mdo mdud 'brel cing zang thal bas// gang nas zhugs kyang gsal bar snang // thams cad spyad cing shong ba'i
272a7(rnying rgyud): phyir// yum la dra ba zhes su brjod// ces so// gnyis pa nang sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni/ sbru ma ni rten 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa// 'phrul pa ni brten pa dang thig le/ de gnyis sgom pa'i 'bas kyis 'brel ba ni rje ste/ rgya mtsho las/ gnas pa
272b1(rnying rgyud): gra bas// l+h+wa ma las// nam ma tha'i ye shes cing yang gas la// thar snang bdag nyid rig par 'brel// drab don dung yis bshad// tsams// gsum pa gsang ba sgra 'thal nga ba ni/ b+h+ra ma de ya d+hi dang / 'phral pa ni su
272b2(rnying rgyud): mkha' pad+me/ de gnyis bde bas 'brel ba ni dra ba ste/ de las// thabs dang shes rab lha ma las// rang bzhin lha 'phral chen por shar// thabs dang thabs su 'brel ba nyid// thams cad kun gyi gzhir gnas pa'o// zhes
272b3(rnying rgyud): so// bzhi pa de kho na nyid rdzu 'phrul dra ba ni/ snang yang ma grub pa'i phyir sgyu ma ni don dam/ de las 'khor 'das sna tshogs su shar ba ni med bzhin du snang ba'i phyir 'phrul pa ste kun rdzob/ de gnyis dbyar med pas na dra ba'am/ yang
272b4(rnying rgyud): na rang rig pa byang chub kyi sems lhag pa bden pa dpyir med des 'khor 'das kun la khyab cing 'brel bas na dra ba ste/ bla ma las/ stong zhing dben pa'i sems nyid 'dis// rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med de// cir yang med las ci
272b5(rnying rgyud): snang // ma skyes smra 'phrul sna tshogs 'gyur// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyang // sems kyi sgyu 'phrul chen po yin// zhes so// de ltar na gzhi 'bras la rdo rje sems dpa' gru 'phrul dra ba dgrags pa ltar nA/ shes thob
272b6(rnying rgyud): kyi byed dang 'brel ba'i pham dang / de smyon pa'i gzhung tshogs yi ge'i rgyud la'ang de skad du brtags te/ rgya mdud 'grel las/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems// zhes dang / chung 'di nyid kyi mjug tu/ 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal ba rdo rje sems dpa'
272b7(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba/ ces gsungs so// 'o na 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po zhes pa'i don gang zhe na/ de 'ang gang byung du 'chad de/ 'phags pa ni theg pa gzhan las rgyud 'di che ba brgyad kyis khyad par du byas pa dang / rtog pa ni/ thun mong dang mchog gi rang
273a1(rnying rgyud): grubathub pa'i babs kyi rnyed thams cad pa de skad drugags shing / 'don de dag gi nang nas kyang mchog sgyur pa na thong ma thag// 'grel ba skur 'bulas na/ mtshan pa yang dag sa langs par byed pa'i phyir yang /
273a2(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i rtog pa la bzhed do// gnyis brtse ba las btags pa ni// lung gA gre sgo rdo rje las// ma brjod pags pa'i brtan pa nyid// sgo slar med dpanal nas gsungs// dri ma med pa'i wang nyid de// las dang ye shes nyid kyi// rdzogs pas rdzog
273a3(rnying rgyud): gyar lung nyid de// bstan pa spyi yi bdag nyid ni// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pas// gcig dang du mar mi gnas kyang // sa so bstan pargya mtsho'i rgyud// 'dir skyon 'dis ston 'di phyir ston// don kun 'di la yongs rdzogs pas// lung gi ste zhes
273a4(rnying rgyud): bshad pa yin// zhes pas/ zlu ma las kyi wang mtshan nying sde gsum/ ye shes lha'i lung gyi chud sde gsum/ bya thal rdzogs pa'i wang nad ska thogasum mo// de ltar theg pa kun myo don dang 'bras bu thams cad 'dir 'du zhid / 'di las 'grus
273a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir/ lung gi spyi ste/ 'di nyid las/ mtshan nyid dang / gyad thams cad kyi lung gi sde/ zhes so// gsum pa don rang gi ngo bo las btags pa ni/ glegs pam gyi klad du bkod pa'i mtshan te/ snga 'gyur las/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i sgo
273a6(rnying rgyud): po de kho na nyid nges pa'o// zhes pa las skad gnyis ma smos so// thar lo'i 'gyur du/ dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ zhes bsgyur cing skad gnyis ka smos te/ rgya dper/ shrI gu h+Na gar+d+ha ta tA bI ni lca ma
273a7(rnying rgyud): ma hAn n+ta rAm/ zhes snang bltar bkad do// des na 'dir sngar ston gyi bka' tshom dang / lcags tsha dang nyang blan gyi TIka sogs sa/ de khon nyid ngas pazhes pa'i gad do// taM bA la nyin/ zhes rmad du bkod pa ni rgya dpe'i mtshon gyi skad ma yin pas
273b1(rnying rgyud): ma dag la sno d+h+rika t+ya/ rgya gar ska du/ gud+ya gat+ya d+hA bi ne b+hU ma/ zhes smos pa nyid kyang pa dang mthun pas dag par mngon no// de ltar mtshan bstan nas/ de'i don chad pa la/ klang du spros pa'i dgos padang / mtshan ni bslus don dang / tshig gi don/
273b2(rnying rgyud): dang / brgal lan no// dang po ni/ bum pa zhes pa'i ming las/ lto ldir zha ba zhum mthu sbyor gyi don byed nus pa'i dngos po go bltar/ mtshan mthong ba'am/ thos pa la brten te/ dbang po rab kyis gzhung gi don go ba dang / 'bring gi
273b3(rnying rgyud): don gyi rnam grangs khong du chud pa dang / thams kyang sman gyi kha byung ltar glegs bam btsal bde ba'i dgos pa yod do// gnyis pa ni/ gsang bdung / snying po dang / de kho na nyid dang / nges pa bzhis rim pa bzhin/ rgyud kyi rang bzhin
273b4(rnying rgyud): dang / che ba dang / mtshan nyid dang / nges pa'i don du ston pa ste/ 'grel chung las/ 'di yi rang bzhin che ba dang // mtshan nyid dang ni don bstan phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyung chen las// mdor bsdus gtan la phab pa yin//
273b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gsang ba zhes bya ste// che ba zhes pa snying po'i don// de kho na nyid mtshan nyid do// nges pas dzes don mdor bstan pa// de ltar rnam pa bzhi po che// mdor bsdusaM spyi yi don du bshad// ces so// de las go tshul kyang rtogs dka' ba dang //
273b6(rnying rgyud): bcud 'dus pa dang / mtshan nyid gzhan rnam par bcad pa dang / drang don ma yin des don ne tshom dang bral bar go zhing / ston tshul dang rjes su mthun par rgyud kyi rang bzhin dang che ba sogs kyang rtogs par 'gyur ro// gsum pa ni/ thams chud pa'i
273b7(rnying rgyud): man ngag las/ phyi ltar shes rab krol lam dang sbyar te bshad pa/ nang ltar thabs lam steng sgo dang sbyar te bshad pa/ gsang ba ltar 'og sgo dang sbyar te bshad pa gsum las/ dang po ni/ gsang ba zhes pa'i don/ 'grel
274a1(rnying rgyud): chud pas/ rang bzhin ga bdang sbas pa dang // bstan min zhes pa'i rang bzhin ni// mnyam pa nyid dang dgongs pa'i dran// mdzad sprod ga pang pa'i theg pa 'di// rnam bzhigs ba zhes bya'i mtshan// zhes brdar/
274a2(rnying rgyud): nga / dadag byung las/ gab jig su ba ma rtogs par/ thab panigs pa pa ma na pa la nas/ zhes pas pa bsdus pas sa 'dus bur/ man+t+ra brjen pa 'ang nam dang / gan khyen byed pa ban da
274a3(rnying rgyud): slob dpon sgeg pa'i rjes su 'brangs te bshad na gsum ste rang bzhin gyi dang / gab pa'i dang / sbas pa'i gsang ba'o// dang po ni/ sems nyid bden pa dbyer med lhag pa chos kyi skur ye nas rang chas su gnas kyang blo'i khyod yul dang bral
274a4(rnying rgyud): mamatha kyi'i sa pang byang mad pa na/ 'a / lji migs sa kyis
274a5(rnying rgyud): gzhan du min las shin tu gsang // zhes pas/ lhun skyes kyi ma rig pas don dam ma rtogs pa ni ye nas gsang pa/ de bzhin kun brtags kyis kun rdzob ma rtogs pa ni rang bzhin gsang ba/ snang stong so sor bzung bas dgyed med ma rtogs pa
274a6(rnying rgyud): chod can gyis rtogs su ma rung bsagapa pa ste/ mig ser can la dung gi kha dog bzhin no// de yang rang bzhin gyi rgyud du gab pa ni/ mtshon bya'i chang rang la rang chas su gnas kyang rtog pas bsgribs pa'i phyir gab ste/ de gang gis 'gyen du
274b1(rnying rgyud): lung tshad ma'i bdag po sangs rgyas kyis so// dpyas yi ge la grub pa ni/ ras chod can mgo rmongs par bya ba'i phyir/ rgyud dkrugs/ lung gargyus/ man ngag gab pa'i tshul du ste/ de ni man ngag tshad ma'i bdag po rdo rje slob dpon gyis 'byin par
274b2(rnying rgyud): mdzad de/ de nyid las/ khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas// zhes so// gsum pa ni/ sngags kyi man ngag med pa dang / sgra ji bzhin par spyod pa rnams la sbas te/ de dag gi yul ma yin pa'i phyir/ gcan
274b3(rnying rgyud): gzan chen po'i sku rtsal spre'us mi bzod pa'am/ ser zho snod ngan du byug par byab ma yin pa bzhin no// gang sdu na/ gsang sngags kyi mdzad spyod sbyor sgrol la sogs pa lta spyod 'brel pas spyad par gsungs pa de dag brda'i tshul gyis sbas te/ gsal
274b4(rnying rgyud): bkra las/ gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te// sems can don phyir rab tu gsang // gsang thub dngos grub mi yal bas// gsad phyir brda dag sna tshogs gsungs// zhes so// de yang lta spyod mgo ma 'brel pa ni/ rgyas pa las//
274b5(rnying rgyud): kha cig lta ba mnyam gnas kyang // spyod pa dag dang yongs mi mthun// kha cig spyod pa rdzogs byed kyang // mnyam pa'i don la yongs mi gnas// kha cig lta spyod gnyis ka med// ces dang / ma rtogs par tshig tsam nya brten nas spyad na ltung
274b6(rnying rgyud): ba yang / de las/ ma rtogs pa yis spyad gyur na// yi dwags srin po'i gnas su skye// zhes so// snying po la'ang / rma'i dang / 'bras bu'i dang / bcud 'dus pa don gyi snying po'o// dang po ni/ theg pa thams cad kyi 'phro gzhi'am
274b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i chur gyur pa ni rgyad 'di yin te/ 'di nyid las/ 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // zhes sogs rkang pa lnga gsung pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni/ theg pa'i sgo gang nas bsgrubs kyang / mthar rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di'i don mngon
275a1(rnying rgyud): du byed dgos pa ste/ 'di nyid las/ sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// zhes dang / theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// zhes so// gsum pa ni
275a2(rnying rgyud): gtan tshigs kyi sgo gang nas gtan la phab kyang / mthar thug sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'i don rtog tshegs thams cad sku dang ye shes bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su sangs rgyas pas 'khor ba mgrub ste/ rgyas pa las/ don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu
275a3(rnying rgyud): 'o// bas / /
275a4(rnying rgyud): rig las mi gzhan pa'i phyir/ shA sh-ing gnyis med dang Sh+Ta la shes pa/ dom bye po rnas ma bcos par bzhag paT+Te/ rgyas pa las/ mabacas spyan ma bzhin ba zug dang // zhes so// de las 'bras tha byung bam chu 'ang ldan nyid ces kyang bsnang //
275a5(rnying rgyud): hU~M/ mab sa pa mag pa pa sa di / // de na nga/ ma pa
275a6(rnying rgyud): zhes so// gsum pa ni/ 'bras bu 'di zla ba byed ci zhen pa dag pan tshwa rang la med pa'i dad snang ba las gzhan nas byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir/ de la rta 'thas kyi dbye ba tsam yang mgrub pas rdu zas gA rjes su med pa'i sgol ny-id kyang ba ro// de 'ang / 'di ni
275a7(rnying rgyud): las/ ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmang kyi chos// gzhan nas yid 'ong ma yin te// zhes dang / rgyas pa las/ ji skad brjod pa'i kha brgyad kyang // yang dag don gyi snying po ni// gzhan nas bcol kyang mi rnyed de// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin// sa so//
275b1(rnying rgyud): dris pa la/ bAzhi dang / lam dang / 'bras tha sa pan+de// dang pan/ gzhi'i drung dang bzhin gsang pa'i snyeng po / chos nyi blo sla dang thal bar bden pasan sa pad+ha/ 'di nyi las/ blo dang mang bzhaba'o// gas zang ba bar khon/
275b2(rnying rgyud): nyid dnges pa'i dbyings nas kyang // zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ theg pa 'di'i grags kyis ye nas gnas pa'i 'bras pa nyid/ shes thob kyi byed pas 'bras bral ma du byed pa'i phyir nges pa te/ 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi// 'bras bral ma nga gyur pa yin/
275b3(rnying rgyud): zhem mo// gsum pa ni/ rgyud 'di rang gi dpos brjod byartsal pa'i dgongs pa des byon mngon+da krung nas ston pa'i phyir nges pa ste/ rdul ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus las// 'di las gsang ba'i ngas den med// ces ma// gnyis pa matsu nA na lhung
275b4(rnying rgyud): bshad pa la/ snying ga'i 'khor lo dang skar te bshad pa dang / mtshan bzhi dang 'khor lo bzhi sbyar te bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ snying ge chos kyi 'khor lo rtsa 'dab brgyad kyi dbus na dang ma chen po lnga dang / de'i dkyil na ye shes snying po'i thig le ye nas
275b5(rnying rgyud): gnas kyang rangags dathabs kyis chod nas ma mthong du ni gas d+haba'o// thig 'di nyid la shes bya dang bsgrub pa'i don gyi brnyad 'dus pas na skyeng bar// thabs kyi mnang gdang ldan pa'i seM nas nyams su blangs pas/ rang gi sems nyid bu
275b6(rnying rgyud): rjen ldan cig skyes pa'i ye shes su rang gsal bani po pon nyid do// steng bu'i thig la de gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi dngos gzhi dzes pa'i phyir dris pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ lte ba'i 'khor lo ci 'ang badrug rgya rtsa bzhi'i dbus nang dgrangs phyag
275b7(rnying rgyud): le mi'i rnam par gnas pa ni gas ba ste/ yum gyi mkha' gas shi rgya'i thig le dpa brel te gnas pa'i gyu // ting ga'i mthong po du ma lnga thas ma 'i shes snying po'i thig pa bakhrugs sa/ rdzo ba thams kyang bzung
276a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus 'byung po yin pa'i gyud // mgrin pa'i 'khor lo gyu'adab banA drug gi dbus rnamakha' 'gro ma ngams pa'i ma ma yis byibs sa gnas ba nang larnyan dang / thog ma mang du'abar tsam na pa de bsdebs pa
276a2(rnying rgyud): las mig pamamagyu'o// tha za'i tsal bas kyi gle me gnas pa ning ste/ bya pa skyes pa ba cin sa gis la na kya dngas pa ngas pa
276a3(rnying rgyud): gsam pa ma rgya pa spyang ba gang ba sha mas ca rnam na sa ga du bcurgya gnyis lalog pa'i dzu ban ma ma skyes pa rgyas pa rgyas kyi maud kya shipa jogs pa'o// ga' dIb rgyu zu
276a4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa thar sbe zar// thed ba sgom pa drang dang bcas pa'i thabs kyi pa zhes sa sa blangs pa su ba dzin gyig rgyas pa'i le ge sadungasas chung sa gyes pa'i ngon // thig de nyi gzhalam 'bras gsum ka'i ngos ga rjid sa pa rgya
276a5(rnying rgyud): shA tu/ zla na mas nga nams ga la sa par bye/
276a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan rtsi bshad tshul gas ma po de ni bla ma brgyad pa'i man ga yin la/ rnam pas sbyigaH/ rlung gi shes bya kyilam la gyis 'di ltar yid bzad du drung ste/ chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su grang pa'i gnis lpags de badzin nyid nam pa
276a7(rnying rgyud): dbyings srung chu gyi ga pa'i 'jig nyid ca brdzogs pa'i di la na / zhugs na ba gas da zhes 'i sa thal 'du
276b1(rnying rgyud): cad kyi 'phrog zhi'am bcud 'dus pa dang dam pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir snying po'o// gzhi mi 'gyur ba dang lam gyis de rtogs pa la mi bslabs don la phyin ci ma ldog pa'i phyir de kho na nyid do// de yang ston pa sa gdul bya rnams kha drang ba'i ched du
276b2(rnying rgyud): gsung pa lta bu ma yin gyi/ 'dir rang gi dgongs pa mthar thug tu nges pa gang yin pa de bstan pa'i phyir rnam par nges pa zhes bya ste/ 'di nyid las/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med// ces so// yang
276b3(rnying rgyud): na/ gsad pa ni snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo dang / snying po ni de'i dkyil gyi srog mi shigs pa'i thig le'am/ gzhan du na/ gsang ba ni yum gyi gsang ba'i pad+ma/ snying po ni de'i dbus na byang chub kyi sems zla ba ltar dag cing gsal ba'i tshul du
276b4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa ste/ gnyis ka'i nang tshan gyi chos gnyis po phyin ci ma log par 'dir nges par bstan pa'i phyir de kho na nyid nges pa'o// de dag kyang / rgyud phyi ma las/ gsang ba'i snying po zhes gsungs gang // de nyid rnam des ji lta bu// zhes de
276b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dris pa'i lan du bstan pas/ gsang ba tshes 'byung la bshad de/ snying po'ang de yi thabs can no// gnyis po phyin ci ma log phyir// de nyid do 'dir rnam nges so// zhes gsungs shing / gzhan yang //
276b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'das dbyed med pa ni gzhi gsang ba'i snying po/ de 'ching grol med par rtogs pa'i thabs bskyed rdzogs zung du 'jug pa ni lam de kho na nyid/ des rtogs pa mthar thug mngon du gyur pa ni 'bras bu 'ching grol med par nges pa'o// zhes kya
276b7(rnying rgyud): bshad du rung ste/ rdo rje'i tshig yin pa'i phyir spros pas chog go// bzhi pa brgal lan la/ mtshan chung don yin min gyi/ mtshan du chud don 'dus ma 'dus kyi/ man ngas kho na'i mtshan nas smos pa'i/ rgya srad mi spros par bod skad spos
277a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bsal ldan no// dang po la brgal ba dang lan gnyis/ dang blon/ kha nar/ mtshan dung don yin nam min/ yin na gleng bya'i gleng ba slang dgas med du bal/ dam bca' de 'thad pa ga zhig
277a2(rnying rgyud): gleng gzhi gleng ba slang gi gong du chud don byung ba'i phyir/ mtshan chud don minan/ smad 'di'i ched du bya ba'i gdul b+ha dbang po yang rab das mtshan mthong ba'am thos pas rgyad don mo rtogs par thal/ rtags khas/ khyab pa tshad mas grub/ 'dod na/
277a3(rnying rgyud): rlab la mtshan bstan/ zhes sogs mi 'thad par 'gyur ro// zer na/ gnyis pa ni/ rje nye'u ston gyis/ skyon byung 'og min du gleng gzhi tshogs/ gleng bslad nas rgyud don gsungs pas/ gleng gzhi gleng bskang mi dgos pa'i skyon med la/
277a4(rnying rgyud): sa/ bye sasani 'i nga slongs sa ma la gas /
277a5(rnying rgyud): pas 'og min du chud 'di rjod byed kyi tshig tu ma gsungs par thal/ dam bca' de 'thad pa'i phyir/ 'dod na/ 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ zhes gsung ba mi 'thad par thal/ 'dod pa'i phyir gsungs na'ang / skyon de mi 'jug ste/
277a6(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa brda'i bshad pa nyid gsang ba dag gis tshig tu sdud pa'i tshe/ rang nyid ston pa dang dgongs pa mnyam par khas blangs nas/ 'di skad ces sogs bsdus par bzhed pa'i phyir de/ 'grel pa nyi seng mar/ de ni spad pa pos bcom ldan
277a7(rnying rgyud): 'das kyi lung dang mthun pa ltar rgyad kyi gleng gzhi mdzad pa bla ma'i man ngag gis bshad par bya ste/ 'di skad/ ces sogs gsungs pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa la'ang brgal ba dang / lan gnyis/ dang po ni/ mtshan du bud don 'dus sam ma 'dus/ 'dus na mtshan dang /
277b1(rnying rgyud): rma kyi dadzam pa bcu pozabrang skad ma byor rigs par thal/ ma 'dus na/ dbang rab kyis mtshan la brten nas rgyu don mo rtogs par thal lo// zer na/ gnyis pa ni/ rgyud mi dngos po brgya dang mtshan non mo sar sbyor du med kyang / mAdz+nyAn d+han+ta
277b2(rnying rgyud): gzhi lam 'bras gsum du gnas pas/ der rgyud don ma 'dus pa'i skyon med do gsung / yang / mtshan mthong bas rgyud dbu zhabs kyi don rtogs par gsungs pa de/ don mthong ba la brten nas mtshan du btags pa'i phyir sngon
277b3(rnying rgyud): byung gi 'khor gyi rtogs tshul lo zhes nyang TI ka pa bzhed pa nyid legs sam snyam ste/ de yang gsang ba dag gis rang gis rgyud don thugs su chud nas 'khor la 'chad pa'i tshe don la brten nas mtshan du btags pa'i phyir/ des na sngon byung gi dor
277b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan du tshig don ma lus pa 'dus pa dang / skad cig tsam la rtogs pa mi 'gal te/ rgya mtsho las/ sgrib pa mtha' skang gdul bya la// skad cig tsam gyis snang bar mdzad// ces so// rjes 'jug tu mtshan la brten nas don go ba ni/
277b5(rnying rgyud): der gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi brda' phrad pa tsam du go ba yin te/ ming gis don mtshon par nus pa tsam gyi ming yin pa'i phyir ro// dper na bum pa zhes brjod pas/ lto ldir zhabs zhwam chu skyor nus pa'i dngos po tsam go yang / gser bum
277b6(rnying rgyud): sogs khyad chos rnams go bas ma khyab pa bzhin snyam mo// gsum pa ni/ chud 'di la/ hud kyi mtshan rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba/ lung gi mtshan lung gi spyi/ man ngag gi mtshan gsang ba snying po zhes grags pa las/ glegs
277b7(rnying rgyud): kyi klad du man ngag gi mtshan kho na smos pa ci'i phyir zhe na/ lan ni/ ma hA log la'ang nang gses kyi rgyud lung man ngag gsum du phye ba las/ 'di ni ma hA'i a te yin pa'i phyir man ngag gi mtshan nas spos so// bzhi pa la'ang / brgal
278a1(rnying rgyud): dang / lan gnyis/ dang po / tshangs pa khacug na re/ rgyu 'di tu gar nas bstar bya ma yi ta/ mdadu tu srad ma smos pa'i phying/ zer/ gnyis pa la/ dgag gzhag gnyis/ dang pan/ grong ma 'galda na/
278a2(rnying rgyud): skyad gtan med na bod skad du sbyar ba mi rigs pas/ bod skad du zhes pas rgya skad yod par shugs kyis brda' 'jal bar bya'o// zhes gsung ba ni ma yin te/ bod kyi skad la chu nag la sogs pa'i skad kyang ltar du rung ba'i phyir phya gar mar mi 'grub ci
278a3(rnying rgyud): sgra bdud rgyams pa'ing/ rnam du zugs la snang nga du byung rgyanang byung bal pa 'a / zhes pa na/ 'dud cas byed pas za par byu ba'i thang pa me / hrA rnamams pa'i shAkun ba dpung yang d+hasang thang du ma
278a4(rnying rgyud): da rjod/ des kyig nga sa sa na// mapa pa tsun pa/ smi byu sa / pa sa
278a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang bod mar thal ba bzlog tu med do// de lta na 'ang / ci'i phyir bo skad kho na klang du spos she na/ snga 'gyur gyi rgya dper rgya gar skad du zhes yod par mngon te/ 'grel pa nyi seng mar bkral ba'i phyir ro// de ltar smos pa la dgos pa ci yang
278a6(rnying rgyud): ste/ 'grel pa nyi seng ma las/ rgya gar zhes pasnod dang brgyad rnam pa gnyis te/ rdo rje gdan drung la sogs pa'o// skad ces pa ni rigs bzhi'i skad la sogs pa las/ 'dir se skr-i ta'i skad la shes par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa
278b1(rnying rgyud): lo tsAbs kyang de dang bstan te bod skad du zhes klad du smos par mngon no// snga rabs pa rnams/ tshig nyung bar bya ba'i phyir rgyu skad ma smos la/ don myur du ngos zin par bya ba'i phyir bod skad du zhes bod skad rkyang ba smos so gsung ba ni gsungs pa tsam du zad do//
278b2(rnying rgyud): dor na rgyad 'di ni yongs su grags pa'i rgya gar gyi paN chen rnams kyis mang du bkral zhing / gsang 'dus kyi 'grel pa bi shwa mi dzas mdzad par yang rgyud 'di'i lung mang du drangs pa dang / dus phyis kyang rgyad pe rnyed pa las thar lo dang 'gos sogs lo tsA ba
278b3(rnying rgyud): chen po 'gas 'gyur mdzad pa'i phyir bod mar 'gyur ba'i skyon med do// gnyis pa mtshan de ldan gyi rgyud don la/ ston pa la dbang mi za ba'i phyir klad don phyag dang / pa kA'i don bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gzhung don gtan la dbab pa'o//
278b4(rnying rgyud): dang po la/ ngag don/ tshig don/ rtsod pa spang ba'o// dang po ni/ byed pa'i mu bzhi dang sbyar na/ phyag gang gis na skud pa pos/ gang lan rgyud kyi ston pa la/ dus gang gi tshe na sdud pa pos 'og min du dang por shes pa'i chud la bsdus te/
278b5(rnying rgyud): nas mi yul du tshig tu sdud pa'i tshe na'o// tshul ji ltar btsal na/ rab lta ba mjal ba/ 'bring bsgom pa goms pa/ tha ma mos gus kyi phyag gsum las/ 'di ni sdud pa po'i phyag yin pa'i phyir dang ba'o// gnyis pa ni/ 'grel chung las/
278b6(rnying rgyud): panyam nyid dbyings su bdud bzhi dang gis bcom// phyag rgya'i rang bzhin tshogs gnyis rdzogs par ldan// yod med mtha' 'das bdag gzhan yongs kyi dpal// thams cad rang bzhin rtogs dang thugs rje bzang // kun bzang lha yi lha khyod dbyer
278b7(rnying rgyud): med la// rtogs dang gus pas rab tu phyag 'tshal lo// zhes so// de yang chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings su bdud bzhi dang gis dag pas bcom pa ste/ ji ltar bcom na/ rgya nyon mongs pas mtshan ma rang sa krol bas/ 'bras bu nyer len gyi phung po
279a1(rnying rgyud): mi len zhing / de ma blangs na skye shi dang / lha'i bu'i bdud kyis bar du gcad pas mi tshugs pa'i phyir bdud bzhi bcom pa ste/ rgyas pa las/ nyon mongs pa nyid rnam par dag/ phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas/
279a2(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor te// lce shi med pa'i g.yung drung gnas// zhes so// ldan pa ni/ b+ha ga bAn gyi sgra las b+ha ga ni bcom pa la 'dug par ma zad/ rnam pa gcig tu skal ba 'am legs pa rnam pa drug la 'jug par yang chud gzhan
279a3(rnying rgyud): las bshad pa la/ 'dir ni chos sku'i phyag rgya ye shes kyi tshogs dang gzugs sku'i phyag rgya bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pas sku lnga la sogs pa'i yon tan rang rig pa'i ye shes la rang bzhin gyis ldan pa'o// 'das pa yang / bkas bcad
279a4(rnying rgyud): las/ 'jig rten pa'i b+ha ga bAn las khyad par 'das zhes bla thabs su bstan te/ zhes gsungs shing / b+ha ga'i sgra srid pa dang 'jigs par 'gro ba la 'jug pa ste/ de las 'das pas na b+ha ga bAn no// 'dir ni chos sku skye ba med pas yod pa'i
279a5(rnying rgyud): mtha' dang / gzugs sgra 'gag pa med pas med pa'i mtha' ste spros pa'i mtshan ma kun las 'das pa'o// de ltar yang phal po che las/ spros pa kun las rab 'das pa'i// bcom ldan 'das ni mkha' rab zhi// zhes so// dpal ni/ gzhi
279a6(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings shin tu dri med de rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i dpal dang / de mngon du gyur pa'i 'bras bu ni/ chos sku rtogs pa bdag gi dpal dang // gzugs sku thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal gnyis so// de'ang rdo rje las de ma las/ rang bzhin
279a7(rnying rgyud): mngon byas ma lus reb skong // zhes so// kun tu bzang po ni 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad 'ching grol med pa'i rang bzhin mngon du rtogs pas spyod yul dag pa ste/ 'di nyid las/ thams cad ma lus chos mo cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las
279b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan pa yin// zhes so// sring gnas grags la sangs rgyas pa ni rang bzhin kun thu bzang du/ na nyid rtogs pa'i yon tan mngan du ltur pa ni rtogs pa kun cu bzang po/ de la gzugs kyi sra mngon du snang ba ni thug pa gan tu bzung bab/
279b2(rnying rgyud): dag kun kyang 'gro ba la phyogs nas kun tu gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi phan bde ster bar dbyed pa po ste/ rgyud phyim las/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad du// mngon mthongs legs ba bstan pa// gyen tu bzang por brjod pa yin// zhes
279b3(rnying rgyud): yul de la sdud pa po gsang bdag gis rang dang ston pa'i thugs gnyis su med par rtogs pa'i sgo nas phyag btsal ba ste/ 'brel ba mngon rtogs las/ de yang thun mong pa dag lus ngag yid gsum gyis so sor bltas nas phyag 'tshal ba ni shinan
279b4(rnying rgyud): 'gal te/ tshe chang par 'gyur ro// rmad du byung ba'i theg pa 'drir kun tu bzang po dang rig pa gnyis med du mngal ba phyag tu gsungs te/ dpe mar gyi nang du mar thug pa bzhin no// zhes so// gsum pa ni/ kha cig na re/ 'di ma
279b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur phyag yin gyi sdud pa po'i phyag ma yin te/ sdud pa po'i tshig ni 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ zhes pa man chad yin pa'i phyir zer/ de ltar na sdud pa pos bka' bsdu byed pa'i thog mar rang gi stod pa la gastong phrag byas pa med par thal/
279b6(rnying rgyud): dam bca' de 'thad pa'i phyir/ 'dod na/ de yod par thal/ so tha~Md kyi mdo'i bka' bsru ba'i tshe ston pa la bstod phyag zas nas bka' bsdus pa'i phyir te/ de las/ 'gro ba'i gcol sgri bos phyag btsal nas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i
279b7(rnying rgyud): bslab gzhi dkon mchog sdod// 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi dbus su dbye bar bya// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir byas pa laM/ kho na re/ 'on nu de 'di'i klad du spros pa'i phyag 'di sdud pa po'i brag yin pa'i phyir/ lo tsA ba'i 'gyur phyag med par thal
280a1(rnying rgyud): ber na/ skyon med de/ lo tsA bas rgyal ba'i bkas bcad dang bstan pa'am rang gi 'dod ltal phyag byed pag wAr na 'dra/ ston pa kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal bar rigs par mtho nas 'gyur phrag zung ngam bdan
280a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir te/ bus 'khor gyi rgyud kyi klad du'ang yi ge pa'i phyag gis go bcad de 'gyur phyag ma bkod pa bzhin no// 'dir g.yung d+h+ri ka du/ chud gzhung spyi'i lugs kyi slad kyi bstod phyag yi ge pa'i phyag tu bzhed pa ni ma yin te/ phal ze par 'gyur
280a3(rnying rgyud): phyag tu snang ba'i phyir dang / 'dir ni/ spar khab las/ ltung pa pos tshig gnyer ba de'i tshe rang gi ston pa la mchod par brjod pa'o// zhes skud pa po'i phyag tu bshad pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa gzhung don gtan la dbab pa ni/ 'di nyid las/
280a4(rnying rgyud): rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la// mthun par gsang ba sgag gzhan du min// zhes pas chud 'di nyid kyi ched du bya ba'i gdul bya dbang po rab 'bring tha gsum la ltos nas 'chad tshul gsum du gsungs te/ log gzhung las/ ra ba la mtshan bstan 'bring la
280a5(rnying rgyud): dbye// tha mar 'bru gnyer dgrol ba'o// zhes gsadA pa'i phyir/ de las/ dang po ni/ sngar bshad grub la/ gnyis pa dbang po 'bring la don rnam par dbye ba dang / gsum pa dbang brtul la 'bru re gnyer re'i sgo nas 'chad pa gnyis kyi/
280a6(rnying rgyud): phyi ma ni/ me lo rab rgya'i bshad thabs dang sbyar te rgyud kyi mtshan dang TIka sogs las shes par bya zheng / 'dir pad ma'i dbang du byas te bshad na/ sman 'grel las/ lung gi spyi ru grags pa yi// rnam par dbye ba lde ru 'gyur// zhes so//
280a7(rnying rgyud): gang zhe na/ mngon rtogs 'grel las/ rgyud gzhung gzhi blang yongs su shes// dgos 'brel gtad dang rdzogs pa'o// zhes lngar gsungs na'ang / dgos 'brel sdar bshad grub pa'i phyir// 'dir/ 'grel drung las/ rtswa dang rkyen dngag
280b1(rnying rgyud): ti dang // 'gro ba'i don du snang ba'i phyir// gleng gzhi dang ni gleng bkang ste// don dang yongs su bzung ba dang // rnam pa bzhir ni bsus pa yin// zhes pas/ rgyud 'byung ba ba rgya grangag ne/ rkyen grang bslang ba/ 'bras bu yangs shes rgyang ngon/
280b2(rnying rgyud): gdams shing bstan pa gtad pa'o// dang po la'ang / dgos ched/ ngo bo/ sba don/ rnam grangs bzhi/ dang po ni/ gnyis su nges te/ gleng gzhi tshogs pas rgyud don 'byung ba'i rgyu byed pa'i phyir dang / gleng gzhi lo rgyas la brten nas ma 'ongs pa'i
280b3(rnying rgyud): gdul bya rnams yid ches shing 'dug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni/ phun sum tshogs pa lnga'am drug ldan te/ don bsdus las/ ngo bo tshogs pa drug nyid de/ ces so// gsum pa ni/ gang gleng na bstan pa ste/ de'i rgyu'am gzhi ni du
280b4(rnying rgyud): sum tshogs pa lnga yin pa'i phyir dang / yang rnam pa gcig can/ nA da'i ska las nges pa sminA pa ste/ bka' ma yin par rtog pa'i the tshom can gyi gro la yid ches kyi nges pa sbyin par byed pas na gleng gzhi'o// bzhi pa ni/ khog gzhung las/ na
280b5(rnying rgyud): mo gleng gzhi rnam gnyis dang // thun mong min pa rnam pa gnyis// zhes pas/ thun mong ma yin pa'i dang / thun mong gi gleng gzhi'o// dang po la'ang / nang ltar thabs lam sted sgo dang sbyar te dang / gsang ba ltar 'og sgo dang sbyar te bshad pa gnyis/
280b6(rnying rgyud): dang po ni/ sgying gi chos kyi 'khor lo rtswa 'dab brgyad las/ rtsa ba'i 'dab ma bzhi e gru gsum sogs las bzhi'i dbyibs dang / kha dog 'od bzhi'i rnam par gnas pa ni/ ye shes snying po'i thig le bzhugs pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir/
280b7(rnying rgyud): gnas phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rgya mtsho las/ d+harmA tsas chos kyi gnas// 'od bzhi ye sogs dbyibs su gnas// zhes so// de'i dbus na/ srog mi shigs pa'i thig le dngas ma lnga 'dus kyi ngo bo yi ge rma gyi dbyibs can ni/ dper nam mes
281a1(rnying rgyud): byed gzhan la ko 'i dgos pa ga nyid dang sa bar bags la ba son pa'i bdag kod la pa bya son pa phran su sa tshogs pa te/ mi shigs ga srid byibs can// dud la ba dbyugs pa byeng bdag/ mas// thubazhag
281a2(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi dang / yid dang / nyon yid dang / sgo lnga'i rnam shes bzhi gnas la/ de dag gis brjod bral rnam par me rtog pa'i ye shes gsal bar nyams su myong ba ni bshad pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir 'khor dang / bye brag tshogs bdun kun gyi rjes su
281a3(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa'i yid kyi rnam shes ni sdud pa por bzhed pas 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ste/ ma nu rnam shes yid sogs bzhi// ye shes myong bas spyad par bshad// ces so// sgred sgo 'khor lo bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nyams su blangs pas bde gsal
281a4(rnying rgyud): mi rtog pa'i ye shes nyams su myong ba'i phyir bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs skyes pa// pa ra mAr+tha don zab mo// zhes so// de'i tshe dus snga phyir 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dang bral ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus yin pa'i
281a5(rnying rgyud): phyir dus phun sum tshogs pa ste/ bde ba'i dus nyid snga phyi bral// dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas// zhes so// gnyis pa na/ yus kyi b+ha ga phyi khyams e gru gsum la sogs te las bzhi'i dbyibs su gnas pa ni gsang ba'i sku'i bzhugs
281a6(rnying rgyud): kyi ra gnas te/ thal chud las/ 'di zhes nye bar mtshan pa ni// mi sogs rnam ma dbyibs can nas// zhes so// yab rje'i dbang bsrung dag 'a thabs kyis bzung ba'i tshe d+ha pa ya rdzag bcug bram kyi brgyad 'dus pa'i kun
281a7(rnying rgyud): rdzob ye shes kyi thig le waM gyi dbyibs can ni/ yab yum gnyis ka'i chud la bde ba gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid du bzhugs pa'i phyir ston pa ste/ skad ces gsal byed las med can// waM dbyibs thig leng bcas ston pa'o// zhes so//
281b1(rnying rgyud): bad ba sdom par byed pa'i las kyis yid la sogs pa gsang ba'i rnam shes na bde ba'i ye shes nyams su myong ba'i phyir 'khor te/ mdam cu sdom byed yid// las can rnam shes de dag la// gsal ba dgo bas bshad par 'dod// ces so//
281b2(rnying rgyud): de'i tshe bde bsgom par byed pa'i yid ni nyams su myong ba'i chos rnams bde bar bsdus nas ston pa'i phyir sdud pa por yang rung la/ myang bya sems lnga rdzogs pa'i dga' ba bcu drug gi mtha'i skad cig ma rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyams su
281b3(rnying rgyud): skyong ba ni rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po'i don yin pa'i phyir bstan pa ste/ bA sgra don de mangs pa'i rgyud// yAn theg chen 'di yin no// zhes so// de'i chos kyi'i 'dzin rtog bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis me khyab pa'i dus te/ dus ni bsam gyis
281b4(rnying rgyud): rmi khyang bus// na ma de ming zhes bya'o// zhes so// de dag kyang / saM mr-i ta'i skad du/ e waM ma yA/ zhes pa thun min gyi gleng gzhi dbang btsan par byas te/ 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na zhes 'gyur gyi rgyud gzhung thams cad kyi
281b5(rnying rgyud): legs par sbyar ba'i skad la/ e waM ma ya bya ba las/ bshad dang thos sogs rnam dbye gzhi mi mthun pa med ces/ nyang rdo mdo dang / rjegayung sogs gsungs na'ang / rigs par ma mthong ste/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus
281b6(rnying rgyud): gcig na/ zhes pa'i rgya dpe rnams su/ e waM ma yA shu ta me ka s+thin sa ma ye/ zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro// yang rje rod zom gyi zhal nas/ rgyud 'di la yi ge ma ya gnyis med pas/ 'di nyid nas ni bsdus pa'i gzhi med do gsungs kyang / ma
281b7(rnying rgyud): ya'i yi ge gnyis yod par drangs ma thag pa'i bshad rgyud kyi lung rnams kyis ston cing / zang lo 'gyur du'ang / 'di skad bdag gis bshad pa'i dus na zhes 'byung ste/ ma yA nyid a spad la TA byin pa'i rnam gyur du mdzad de bsgyur ba'i phyir ro// des
282a1(rnying rgyud): sman dan shA / ma na// srog ba na/ thugs cig las/ mgaldan/
282a2(rnying rgyud): shes pa gyur// zhes pa ltang na mamal bgis sa phyung / phyogs na grugs yin gang pa'i ba'i sa shAng sa
282a3(rnying rgyud): nI waH'i byeng sprin las skang / saM ya'i g+hu nI/ kun 'dren chen po'i da / rang bzhin dang / d+hu ma da / bdag dang / dbyung bamigs pa 'jug pa las 'dir 'byung bgazung ste bzung ba'i rjes dgas bad+ma y-i gsungs so// de skang na ma gas
282a4(rnying rgyud): min pa ma man sa 'a nas phyi ba zhi sa/ ma 'dug gzhes pa sa da da pa/ ga pa sa
282a5(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa ma thos pa dang dag ste/ 'dagasal la ma ldan tho sa ye shes thab mi 'dzin no// ni rje ma sa rnas ma ma ma 'a sa ma la bya rjes le brdzun // 'a ga da tsam pa mams kyi mamaldan nam
282a6(rnying rgyud): gyis/ 'di zhes pa gnas sogs pod smad lnga'ang sa sa phyir te bskur ba shAng gyi sa ga tanA 'brebs pa'i ma sa yin med/ do na mang cad dngeg par yang sri sa spang nga mar pa'i byer/ 'di sa na nas kAng ya nus pa sha na gas pa yin
282a7(rnying rgyud): nga/ da/ zhi pa 'i badzin / da do// zhi nos kyi de'i la pa ma
282b1(rnying rgyud): ga swA / sa nan nanadus smras/ man nasugs sa
282b2(rnying rgyud): glen shAg bzang de/ bshud thos gnyis rtog mi mthun sa / ston pas 'khor lnga bshad pa dang tho kyis ston pa las thos pa den mthun gsung sa na'ang / thos pa la bshad pas mthal pa'i phyir legs par me sems s+ho// \u0f88\u0f90'i ma
282b3(rnying rgyud): tig na re/ thos pa la ma rtogs log rtogs the tshum gsum gyi skyon srid pa las/ 'dir bshad ces pa snroston 'khor dgongs pa gnyis su med pa nyid la nyid bshad pa'i phyir sngar kyi skyon gsum rnam par bcad pa 'ogasung yang / mi 'thad de/ bshad
282b4(rnying rgyud): pa b+h+yo gsum dang bral bas ma khyab cing / dgongs pa gnyis su med pa nyid la nyid thos pa'ang 'gal ba'i phyir ro// yang khyed bla ma dang rdo sgo thug pa'i bzhed kyi/ sku gnyis kyi bstan pa'i khyad par yin te/ longs su tshig tha migasu bas rna bas sa
282b5(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i spyir bshad ces dang/ sbrul sku tshig tu gsung ba'i phyir thos tha bar spong ba yin gsung na'ang / longs sus gsungs pa'i drung du bshad ces 'ong bas khyab na lo d+ha skas bstan pa'i rgyang kun tu de ltar 'byung rigs pa las ma byung ba'i phyir skam du dogs
282b6(rnying rgyud): sa// rje rings pa na de/ ston pa'i dgongs pa brda'i bshad pa sdud pa pos ma phri ma bsnan par bshad par bzhed pa'ang / snga ma dang zhe 'dod gcig mod/ 'on kyang 'di la 'gal ba ma mthong ngo // rang lugs ni/ gsang bdag gis bsla bgyid pa
282b7(rnying rgyud): nga nyid do dang nye du'as / snang nges 'og min du bshad pa nyid yang 'dir bshad par bya zhes dang / dus nags pa'ang dus nges 'ga' ba ma yin te/ rtag pargyan gyi 'khor lar gsung ba 'don kyis cung gnang dang thung mongs me phyogs pa du
283a1(rnying rgyud): bsdus par mngon te/ nyi 'odas dge'i rgya cher 'grol bar bshad ces pas ni 'khor dang ston pa gnyis su med par bstan pa yin la/ zhes sogs dang / skAr khab las kyang / thun med ma yin pa'i gling kun
283a2(rnying rgyud): ste/ rgyud gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i phyir zhes gsungs pa'i phyir byas pa lA/ khon te/ 'o na bde 'dus kyi zhi ba 'dus brtsa ba'i rgyud kyi klad du'ang / 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ zhes 'byung rigs par thal/ klu der ston 'khor byu gtsug
283a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa'i phyir te/ da ni che ba'i rgyal po ste/ 'byu dang nyan pa'ang nyid yin// zhes gsud pa'i phyir zer na/ skyon med de/ ston 'khor khyad med par mtshungs pa bdon kya gzud 'di ni khyad par med par mtshon pa'i ngos nas smos la/ bde 'dus sogs thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyud/
283a4(rnying rgyud): gzhan du khyad par yod par mtshon pa'i ngos nas smos pa tsam du zad de/ gdul bya mos pa tha dad la grags pa'i phyir/ kho bos khyab mtha' ma bcas so// gzhan yang / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ zhes ma smos pas bka
283a5(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa ma yin par 'gyur na/ bde mchog rtsa rgyud dang / 'jam dpal mtshan brjod sogs kyang der thal/ de ltar ma smos pa'i phyir te/ de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/ zhes dang / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // zhes gsung ba'i phyir/
283a6(rnying rgyud): des na/ mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel pa las/ 'di ni rnam par gzhag pa gzhan kho na yin pas/ theg pa gzhan gyi lugs la brten nas nam du'ang sun 'byin brjod par mi bya'o// zhes pa ltar shes par byas te bag yod par spyod cig/ gnyis
283a7(rnying rgyud): pathun mong gi gleng gzhi la/ rgyud khyad par gyi gleng gzhi dang / bstan pa 'byung ba spyi'i gleng gzhi gnyis/ dang po pa'ang / gleng gzhi dngos dang / zhar byung gdul bye dgos ched kyi gleng gzhi'o// dang po ni rgyud 'di'i le'u dang pos ston te/
283b1(rnying rgyud): 'chang pa la/ mdor bstan dang / rgyas bshad gnyis/ dang du na/ 'di skad bshad pa'i sogs la phran sum tshogs pa drugs / bangs bzung nas rgyas bshad dang sbyar ro// 'dir thun mang gi gleng gzhir brjod pa ni snga mthun min la ltos na
283b2(rnying rgyud): te/ gzhan du na 'di yang thun min nyid do// gal te thun mong yin na/ gnas gang du/ ston pa gang zhig/ 'khor gang dang lhan cig tu bzhugs pa'i dus de'i tshe chos 'di lta bu zhig thos shes/ ston 'khor tha dad pa dang / chos theg pa sna chags
283b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang / dus res 'ga' ba zhig ston dgos pa las 'dir de ltar mi ston te/ 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/ zhes dang / de'i don rgyas bshad las shes par 'gyur ba'i b+hir/ de bas na thun mong khyad par gyi gleng gzhir bsnyad do zhes bla ma
283b4(rnying rgyud): rnams gsungs so// ci'i phyir/ thun khyad 'gal bar mi 'gyur ram snyam na/ mi 'gal te/ de'i ming don ni/ glan TIka pa sogs snga rabs pa dag/ gnas 'og min tsam du ming thun mong du gyur kyang / 'dir dbang phyug chen po'i
283b5(rnying rgyud): 'og min gyis khyad par du spags/ ston pa longs sku tsam du mthun kyang rgyal ba drug pas spags/ 'khor byang sems tsam du mthun kyang 'bras bu'i sems dpas spags/ bstan pa grol lam tsam du mthun kyang grol lam khyad par can
283b6(rnying rgyud): lam gsang ba'i snying pos sbags/ des na thun mong khyad par gyi gleng gzhi 'o gsung // gnyis pa rgyas bshad ni/ rgud phyi ma las/ ston pa la sogs rab dbye bas// phun sum tshogs pa lngar brjod do// zhes dang / khog
283b7(rnying rgyud): gzhung las/ ston gnas 'khor dang sdud pa dang // bstan pa dus kyis shes par bya// zhes pas phun sum tshogs pa lnga'am drug las/ dang po ston pa la'ang / ston pa'i bdag nyid dang / 'chad pa'i skyes bu gnyis/ dang po ni/ bcom
284a1(rnying rgyud): san+ta das dag ste gzugs rnang ngan// nga/ du da // bdug gang kyang gyu pa dang // nas su// dmyung ba/ ston pa nga ban dang/
284a2(rnying rgyud): thA ga N+DIs/ rlung ba la/ gdon dang / gtan pa dbabyu pa // dang pan/ na pa dag sgrub DU ga ma shes de ny-id rgyas te 'i ngadus rgyas bzlas pa hrIHsa rnams kya da chos nyid rnam dang pa dganas shA bzhinapa
284a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa ni/ bi ma las rang bzhin pa zhir bsha dang / 'grel chung pas/ byang chub mchog gang bdang // chos rnams rol par longs spyod dang // thogs dras pa da ga shegs bdag po dang // chos so cog bye byer med pado// zhes so//
284a4(rnying rgyud): spang khab las/ rgyal bajug pa'i yon tan mtha' yas pa'ang mdor bdun du 'du ste/ zhes pa rang bzhin bdun dang / 'og gzung las/ yang dag pa dang / rdzogs pasas the bas brgyad drab nyid kyang / mdor bstan gnyis las/
284a5(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i chos dang dbyed mi phyed par bstan pa la/ mtshan gyi rnam grangs lnga so sor bstan pa dang / spyir bsdus te mi phyed par bstan pa'o// dang po ni/ ston pa'i che ba'i yon tan gyi ldog zla nas spos na mtshan lam/ de bzhin nyid du nar son pa'i
284a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa/ zhes gsungs te/ spyir trug tu swa las ta nA ni bzhin/ gtan gshegs pa'am/ byin pa'am/ mkhyen pa'am/ gsung ba la b+h+yaH/ sprin gyi rgyal ba rnams steng byang chub kyi sbed pa'i rna nas gshes
284a7(rnying rgyud): pade skang lam mthun pas gshegs shing rkyen pa dang / de zhin nyid nges bar mthun cing gsung bdang / 'did yod gyi snang ba de ltang rlung badzin thabs kyis spyad pas gshegs pa / sems can rnams su brnam pa ni ma tshung kyis
284b1(rnying rgyud): sam pa mtha pa yang nas zhinas/ nagasu rnasags shad nga/ 'do / rgya na las/ ga ni slong dag gags// dbazhin ga gags par ma na na// rnas pa ny-id kun na
284b2(rnying rgyud): nga thalabs naman nga / ra khri gang drug pa'i phyir gshegs pa / las/ dngazhin da gshegs pa yang / chags gan las rmel ba shAng// ces so// yang dag pa rdzogs pa/ nus pa mau nam
284b3(rnying rgyud): gyis thun pa'i rang bzhinan/ rang byug pa shes la snang bre mgrub pas mnor mi 'gyur mi blta ba'i phyir yang dag pa dang / des nathams cad 'bras bu swa dang ye shes sngar snang bas spyang thob thugs ma lus pa'i gyi tshogs pa ste/
284b4(rnying rgyud): 'dis spyan gyis grub pa'i dge 'dzin las khrid par dbyas pa'o// sangs rgyas zhes pa ni skr-is bral gyi ye shes mahA 'a dbus med par brdal pa'i rang bzhin te/ puh+nA sgras/ gnyings du lhar sangs pa dang / pad+mA Sha zla ba ltar rjes pa'i
284b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'jug par/ gzung gzhan las/ mdog gnyid las sangs phyur dang // shes byal yang na rgyas phyir// zhes so// 'di ni mamathun pad+ma gnya med byeng mi na don po zhin pa mngon byas pa'i stobs kyis smra
284b6(rnying rgyud): mang ba'i yon tan mthar thug pa na/ le lag las/ ga pa nyid ye shes gas la// nyon myong sdug bsngal byang chub mchogasaso// bcom ldan 'das nus pa ni sleb pa'i cha shas matsa ma yang mi gnas pas pa
284b7(rnying rgyud): ring che ba'i yon tan gyi 'bras bu la mnga' mdzad kyang rang gi rnga ba bstan du med pa'i rang bzhin tu/ rdo rje l-i pa las/ bdud bzhi la sogs rig pa'i gdeng gis bcos// spyi lnga la sogs yon tan brjod las 'das// ra
285a1(rnying rgyud): zhes bstan du med// ces so// longs spyod chen po zhes pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi don mngon du mdzad kyang spyod yul dang bral ba'i rang bzhin te/ 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad la spyad bya spyod byed du 'dzin pa'i zhen pa dang
285a2(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i sgo nas longs spyod pas gzhan las ches mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro// de ltar yang 'chi med mdzod las/ chen po mchog dang tshad med dang // mkhas mtshon spro ba'i las 'di nyid// shin tu rmad byung byed pa ni// chen po zhes ni bshad pa
285a3(rnying rgyud): yin// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ phyogs bcu nas/ rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces pa'i bar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag gcig dang du ma las grol ba'i rang bzhin te/ sngar smos pa'i mtshan lnga dang ldan pa'i phyogs dus bde gshegs kun
285a4(rnying rgyud): gyi yon tan thams cad bsdu na/ sku gsung thugs gsum dang / de'i zlas drangs pa'i yon tan phrin las gnyis te lnga'o// de'ang rten byed pa'i ngos nas sku lnga/ brda' sprod pa'i gsung lnga/ mi g.yo ba'i thugs lnga/ dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i
285a5(rnying rgyud): yon tan lnga/ gzhan don mdzad pa'i phrin las lnga ste/ de dag gcig dang du ma dang bral zhing / rang bzhin dbyer mi phyed pa/ mtshan nyid skye 'jig dang bral ba/ ngo bo 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir rdo rje'i bdag nyid de/ 'grel pa yun sel las//
285a6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu lnga ni rigs lnga ste// zhes pas sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga po ni rigs lngar bzhed la/ de'i phyir sngar gyi 'bras bu nyid lnga po'ang kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa dang byung gi ye shes su 'dus shing / rigs lnga yang drug par 'dus
285a7(rnying rgyud): pas na du ma dang bral ba'i phyir/ kun bzang la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyi gzugs can zhes bya'o// drug pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par las 'bras bu nyer lnga dang rigs ldang ma 'gags par snang bas gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir rig thams cad kyi bdag po
285b1(rnying rgyud): zhes btags so// gnyis pa 'khor ba'i chos dang dbyar mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin ni/ ma lus nas rang bzhin to zhes pa'i bar te/ khams gsum dang dus gsum gyis bsdus pa'i 'khor ba chos dang rgyal ba drug pa gnyis ka'ang / kun rdzob tu
285b2(rnying rgyud): rig pa sgra ma yin pa'i phyir so so ma yin/ don dam par sems nyid du ma skyes pa'i phyir tha mi dang / bden pa gnyis kyi tha snyad las 'das pa'i phyir dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ gal te kun rdzob tu so so dang / don dam du thar dad/ skyon ri
285b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin/ rgyas pa las/ so so rang bzhin des shes na// yang dag lam gyis bcos su med// ces dang / ye nas ngo bo yod min na// nyon mongs spangs shing byang bskyab med// ces pas gnod pa'i phyir ro// de ltar rang bzhin bdun po kun tu
285b4(rnying rgyud): bzang po'i rang bzhin yin pa ltar rigs lnga'i rang bzhin yang de bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir/ rigs lnga la rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i 'khor zhes grags so// gnyis pa ngo bo la'ang / go don dang / gtan la dbab pa'o// dang po ni/ rang bzhin de nyid
285b5(rnying rgyud): gdul bya la sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs par snang ba'o// gnyis pa ni/ ston pa'i ngo bo yang yin la 'chad pa'i skyes bu'i mtshan nyid kyang yin pas thun mong du ston zhes sngar khab mkhan po gsungs so// de'ang tshom bsdus na bzhi ste/ sku gsum
285b6(rnying rgyud): gyi bdag nyid yin pa'i dang / thabs shes gnyis su med pa'i dang / ye shes drug dang ldan pa'i dang // rnamathar gsum chub pa'i don rtags so// dang po la gsum las/ chos sgra'i ni/ spu mdun dang rgya ba med pa thams cad du zhal zhal laM bar
285b7(rnying rgyud): gsal zhing / zhes pas/ ston pa dang rigs lnga ni ye shes kyi sku yin pa'i phyir/ bde gshegs dang snang la sku mdun dang rgyab ma grub cing / gdul bya'i snang ba la ris med par thams cad du zhal thal le bar gsal bas gzugs klu'i yon tan gyi
286a1(rnying rgyud): 'dagang sa mjugs pas par tu bzung ba na natshogs brgyad gsal// na gzigs kun zang stsol mdun byab med// phyogs bcug bar blan nas rnam par gdags// dasaso// de'i phyir longs pa dang/ da/
286a2(rnying rgyud): nga po byad dang ldan pa/ zhes pas/ mtshan dpe la gnyis las/ thun mong gi mtshan ni/ gal po las/ mtshan mtshag sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ phyag zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang waM/ zhes sogs dang / dpe byed kyang / dwe las/ dbartsa
286a3(rnying rgyud): tid du ngas kyi ma ba kur 'jug/ bsusags so// ljang bar khyim phyir grus sgram la / na yad ny-i mas ma gas na pa ra ya nga can pa 'i byab lags pa bdag gi da
286a4(rnying rgyud): bcu drug dang / de'i yul chos kyi dbyings bcu drug gi rtsal sems ma bcu drug sde sum cu rtsa gnyis ni mtshan bzang po'o// sems dpa' bcu drug por ye shes lnga'i rtags rigs las dbu bkyud pa'i lha brgyad cu ni dpe byad ste/ spyi mdo las/
286a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan gyi me tog lde dpe byad kyi 'bras bus sbas pa'i phyir/ sras kyi tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan po'o// zhes so// 'dir yum bcu drug lnga dbu rgyan ma bshad / chos kyi dbyings mtshan par byed/ de dag kyang rkyen drakyis 'gyu ben/
286a6(rnying rgyud): bang dang 'khor gyi rgyan zan sum tshogs pas gtso ba'i rang bzhin yang bkod pas mdzes shing zan su mthogs pa bzhin no gsung / gnyis pa ni/ 'khor lo bzhi na ste/ spo ba'o sa gnyis kyis mtshon bzang ba dang mthong pa'i bajig

286b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis su gyur pa yan/ zhes so// gsum pa ni/ ston pa yang yum gnyis rol pa'i dus kyi dga' ba la brtsi ste/ yab kyi dga' ba bcu drug dang phram gyi dga' ba bcu drug stes gnyis ni mtshan bzang ba'o// yang
286b2(rnying rgyud): kyi dga' ba ra re la'ang ye shes lnga lnga'i ro dang ldan pa'i phyir brgyad cu ni dpe byung ste/ rgya mtsho las/ A li kA li'i bde ba nyid// phan tshun mo 'dres gcig par shes// bcu drug ngos gnyis mtshan dang ldan// phyogs gcig ye shes lnga ldan
286b3(rnying rgyud): brgyad cu'o bzod sogs chu las 'phags// zhes so// ci'i phyir rlung dang gsang ba'i mtshan dpe rtsa khams kyi rang bzhin du 'dug pas rgyan du ji ltar 'gyur snyam na/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sbrul gyi khams rnam par dag pa bde ba chen po'i
286b4(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin du ro mnyam pa ni rgyan gyi nang nas mchog go ces g.yung TIg pa gsung ngo // de ltar na phyag zhabs 'khor lo la sogs pa ni skal spu sogs la'ang yod pa'i phyir thun mong dang / phyi nang gsang gsum gyi mtshan depe ni ston pa dang 'chad pa'i skyes
286b5(rnying rgyud): bu kho na'i 'phags chos yin pa'i phyir khyad par ro// sprul sla'i ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du lha gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun tu snang ba/ zhes pa stsal pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te/ rnam par 'phral pa bsam gyis mi khyab
286b6(rnying rgyud): cing tshad med pa ni mdzad pa'i snang tshul lo// de ltar yang sdong po bkod pa las// sru yi rtse mo gcig la yang // zhing rnams bye ba bsam mi khyab// sna tshogs dbyibs kyang tha dad de// de dag 'dres par gyur pa med// ces dang / gsang ba bas
