291a7(rnying rgyud): yum rang bzhin las// zhes dang / nyi 'od se shes/ kun ga'i byang chu kyi sems rdo rje mi bstod pa la ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po zhes gnas skabs 'dir bya'o// zhes so// rigs pa ni/ rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po chos can rnam
291b1(rnying rgyud): ma yin te/ khyod mi bskyod pa yin pa'i phyir/ de yin te/ rnam shes dag pa thugs yin la/ de rdo rje'i rigs mi bskyod pa dngas pa'i phyir te/ glang po che rab 'brog gi rgyung las/ den+da dam par sems can gyi rnam par shes pa gnas su dag pa ba'i
291b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i thugs kyi bdag nyid/ ces pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pa/ zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ de ltar rnam shes dag pa mi bskyod par grub mod/ 'on kyang sngar gyi skyon rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur dam snyam na/ myi gnad
291b3(rnying rgyud): de/ gdan gyi 'khor lo ni rigs bdag mtshon byed kyi mtshan ma ma yin gyi/ rigs lnga ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya ste/ 'grel chung las/ gzhi yang tshad med 'khor lo ste// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin yin// zhes so// seng khri yang thugs gtso bor
291b4(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i phyir rdo rje'i rigs dang sbyar ba tsam du zad de/ slob dpon pad+mas mdzad pa'i yang dag gi las rim shel phreng las// seng ge glang d+harma bya khyung // nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gtso nga 'khor du rim par bsam// zhes gtso bo rdo rje'i rigs mi bskyod pa'i
291b5(rnying rgyud): gdan du seng ge byung ba'i phyir dang / yum dbyings phyug ma ni rnam shes kyi yul nam mkha'i khams dang sbyor ba ste/ de las/ mi bskyod mthing ga dkar dmar zhal// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen g.yas// dril bu pad+ma rAl gri g.yon// dbyings phyag
291b6(rnying rgyud): g.yas brten g.yon dril sngogs// zhes dang / rdo rje las rim la/ rnam shes nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// ces pas kyang bstan pa'i phyir/ ye shes ni/ rgya cher 'grel las/ zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par shes pa'i phung po yongs
291b7(rnying rgyud): su dag pa thugs rdo rje chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor/ zhes pas 'dir zhe sdang dag pa chos dbyings ye shes su bzhed pa'i lugs yin pa'i phyir skyon med de/ ye shes thig le'i rgyud las/ gti mug me long ye
292a1(rnying rgyud): shes pas// ngarbal mnyam pa nyid du dran// sa sar rtogs pa 'dod chags yin// bya bsgrub pa phrag dog // zhe sdang ces dbying su rnam par dag/ ces pa sbyar ro// khro bo'i skabs sa'ang / praHte drug gtso bar mgung
292a2(rnying rgyud): ste/ pa Na grub kyi man ngag rnams su rgyud 'khrugs pa bsdebs nas gtso bor badz+ra he ru kar bzhed pa'i phyir/ de ltar yang rgya cher 'grel las/ zhi ba'i dus su mi bskyod pa dang por smos shing gtsor byas la/ khro bo'i dus su ni gzugs kyi phung po rnam par dag pa
292a3(rnying rgyud): ru ka dang por byung zhing gtso bor smos pa ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni rgyud dkrugs pa yin te/ dbyings phyug ma gtso bo la 'khril ba'i gnas skabs na de nyid mngon par 'gyur te/ 'di ni rdo rje khrag 'thung nga nyid la ci nas kyang don gyis shes par bya'o// zhes dang / 'dir
292a4(rnying rgyud): yang rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo mi bskyod pa rdo rje khrag 'thung ngu mngon par 'du mdzad pa de la shes par bya'o// zhes gsungs shing / der ma zad/ 'bar ba chen po'i khrag 'thung sru smug nag/ ces pa'i rgyu dper/ ma hA dzA
292a5(rnying rgyud): lan+taM ru d+hi ra pA nA ma nI la kr-iSh+Na kA yaM/ zhes mthing nag gi skad dod yod pa'i phyir dang / der rdo rje khrag 'thung gi sngags kyang thog mar byung ba'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni/ rdo rje bkod pa las/ sra ni ma bcos de bzhin nyid// thugs ni mi 'gyur rdo rje'i ri//
292a6(rnying rgyud): yon tan kun 'byung rin chen rigs// gsung ni chags med pad+ma'i rigs// don grub spyod pa las kyi rigs// zhes pa ltar sbyar ro// de la skabs 'dir/ dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo mi bskyod pa thugs rdo rje'i rigs dang chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/
292a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du rnam snang sgra de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs me long lta bu/ rin 'byung yon tan rin po che'i rigs mnyam nyid/ snang mtha' gsung pad+ma'i rigs sor rtog/ don grub srin las las kyi rigs bya grub ye shes so// de dag kun kyang
292b1(rnying rgyud): zhes sogs kyis rigs kyi mtshan mar gyur pa'i kha dog rnams bstan te/ chos nyid 'gyur ba med pa dang / nyes skyon gyis mu gos pa dang / che ba'i yon tan rgyas pa dang / gdul bya'i don la chags pa dang / las sna tshogs lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags
292b2(rnying rgyud): su/ rim pa ltar/ chos dbyings ye shes dang rdo rje'i rigs mthing gaM/ me long lta bu dang bde gshegs rigs dkar po// mnyam nyid dang rin chen rigs ser po/ sor rtog dang pad rigs dmir po/ bya grub dang las rigs ljang gr-i ste/ rgyas
292b3(rnying rgyud): pa las/ ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la// ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // ljang gu la sogs nag por bstan// zhes sogs rgyas par gsungs so// gnyis pa rigs kyi yum lnga'i mtshan la//
292b4(rnying rgyud): bye brag gnyis las/ spyi ni/ btsun mo dam pa dang / dbyings so// de la btsun mo'i sgra ni/ skyed par byed pa'i rgyu dang / sprid bya'i yul du gyur pa gnyis la 'jug ste/ rtog pa'i dus su 'byung ba lngas phung po lnga bskyed cing / lha'i skabs su rigs
292b5(rnying rgyud): kyi yab lngas spyad par bya ba'i yul yin pa'i phyir ram/ yang na/ yum gyi ngo bo dbyings dang / yab kyi ngo bo ye shes te/ dbyings kyis ye shes bskyed pa dang / dbyings ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa'i phyir ro// dam pa'i sgra ni rang bzhin rtog pa las
292b6(rnying rgyud): khyad par du byas pa'i 'phags chos so// dbyings zhes pa ni/ nyi 'od seng ge sa/ dbyings kyi sgra ni mi zad pa la bya'o// zhes gsungs shing / don la sras kyi 'byung khungs dang bde ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ram/ yA ma rnams dbyings
292b7(rnying rgyud): kyi phyan gyur gyur pa'i phyir yang de skad nga grags so// bye brag ni rtog pa'i mtshan te/ de la snang ba zhes pa ni nam mkhas go ma phyen dngos po thams cad ldang mi nus pa'i phyir nam mkha' ste/ chos kyi khams rnam shes kyi yul yin pa'i phyir thug
293a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs kyi phra ma dbyings phyug ma'o// swa ba ni sra brtan mkhrang pa'i mtshan nyid can mi sa'i khams te/ brtan zhing rten dgyur pa'i phyi sgra'i rigs kyi yum sangs rgyas sman ma'o// mnyan pa nag/ sher snad brnan
293a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chu'i khams te/ rgyud brnyan cing yon tan spyad pa drin po tshe rigs kyi yu mA mA mA kI'o// dro bani rgya zhing sreg pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi me'i khams te/ mtshan 'dzin gyi sgra ris gsal bdung shes rab kyi mas dgu par byed pa'i
293a3(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid pad+ma rigs kyi yum gos dkar mo'o// bskyod pa ni yang zhing g.yo ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi rlung gi khams te/ bskyod 'degs kyi bya ba byed pa ltar thogs pa med pa'i las can las rigs kyi yum sgrol ma'o// de yang / 'di nyid las/ sa
293a4(rnying rgyud): spyan dang mA ma kI/ me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// zhes so// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de lta bu'i btsun mo'i tshogs dang thabs shes gnyis sgra med pa'i tshul gyis kun tu khyab par bzhugs pa ste/
293a5(rnying rgyud): 'grel chung las/ nam mkha'i dbyings ni mtha' klas par// ston pa'i mdzad snod rol mo yis// til gyi gang bu bzhin du khyab// ston pa'i khyad par yin par grags// zhes so// gnyis pa gnas phran sum tshogs pa ni/ 'og mi
293a6(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang ste// khog gzhung las/ gnas kyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// ngo bo 'og min gzhal yas khang // zhes so// spyir dog min la/ don gyi/ rig pa'i/ gsang ba'i/ 'jig rten gnas kyi/ dbang phyug chen po'i
293a7(rnying rgyud): 'og min dang wa/ dang ba ni/ chos kyi dbyings te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten len pa'i phying dang / rnam rtog dang mtshan ma gang gi nga'ig tumagyur pa'i phyi / nus pa las/ gzung 'dzin thal 'i mni /
293b1(rnying rgyud): kun gyi gnas// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ ngartogs parang rig pa'i ye shes ni banyis 'don gyi 'og tu mgyur pa'i phyir dang / yang nadrongs bu'i zhing dang ma mthun par lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste/ de las/ rang bzhin dkyil dun
293b2(rnying rgyud): skya bar// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// zhes so// de la btags pa'i 'og min zhes kyang zer do// gsum pa ni/ yum gyi mkha' ste/ smyon pa gsang ba'i sgra'i gnas dang mtshon ma'i rtog pa rang rgyad pa'i 'og tu ma gyur pa'i phyir/
293b3(rnying rgyud): de ltar yang rgyas pa las/ nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu// ma chags pad+ma'i gadran bting nas// dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas// zhes dang / rgyud gzhan las kyang / rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// zhes 'byung ste/
293b4(rnying rgyud): kyi rnam par dag pa sgyum la'i ma 'a ga garang bzhin pa phyi gyur/ na pa las thaMd pa sa sa pa / rjin da 'i zhes matsu las kyi byung ste/ gzhan sa/
293b5(rnying rgyud): kyi mkha' dbyings/ ldan pa ni de dang gnyis su med par bzhugs pa'i don no// bzhi pa ni// gzugs khams gnas rigs bcu bdun gyi ya thag tsang rigs kyi lha'i gnas dang po de'o// de la der grags pas na grags pa'i 'og min zhes bya ste/
293b6(rnying rgyud): gzugs can gyi gnas gzhan gyi 'og tu ma gyur pa'i phyir/ 'dir kha cig lngas/ yod min med smin gyi lce mched la bgrangs pa'i 'og min zhes btags te/ srid pa'i rtse mor gyur pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa ni/ 'dir 'chad pa'i gnas longs /
293b7(rnying rgyud): bzhugs gnas 'og min chen po ste/ sgyu 'phrul rdo rngarje las/ gtsang ma'i dis dag rab spangs pa'i// 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog ra// rigs bdag phyag rgya lhan grub tu// gcig dang dra ma rnams spangs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi
294a1(rnying rgyud): gzugs te// 'dod nam jug med nyid byed// slob pas na mams gsul byal// gang zlog gtsog gis rung bar mad / mas// da' nga / gnas myo so// prAdan/ gtan la dbab pa gsam/ dang /
294a2(rnying rgyud): po ni/ don dbyings dang ye shes dbyer mi phyed pa'i rtags gzhal yasaM khang gi dbyibs dang kha dog tu rang snang ba ste 'chad par 'gyur ro// gnyis pa ni/ a kaniSh+Ta'i sgra las 'og ma yin pa ste/ don gdul bya'i blo las 'das shing / rtags de
294a3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gnas kyi 'og minA las nyis 'gyur gyis sngags pa'i phyir/ de'ang rgya mtsho las/ 'jig rten gnas kyi 'og min las// nyis 'gyur shin tu sngags pa yi// zhes so// 'dir 'phros don nyis 'gyur 'phags tshul gyi dogs pa
294a4(rnying rgyud): bcad pa ni/ kha cig/ 'di nas 'jig rten gnas kyi rtog min la bar thag ji tsam yod pa'i nyis 'gyur// de nas 'og min chen po'i bar du yod zer ba sogs pha rol du 'phags par 'dod pa ni mi rigs te/ ma dag pa'i 'jig rten spangs pa'i
294a5(rnying rgyud): pha rol na dag pa'i zhing bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir des na dmus long gis ma mthong bas nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor med par mi 'gyur ba ltar/ ma dag pa'i 'gro ba la ma dag pa'i zhing du snang ba tsam gyis/ de nyid dag pa'i zhing ma yin par bsgrub tu med de
294a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa las/ yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na// bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong / ga mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa na// ngan song gnas kyang 'og min dga' ldan gnas// zhes so// don la sems
294a7(rnying rgyud): can gyis gang khyab tu rgyal ba'i sku dang phrin las kyis khyab pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing la phyogs dpangs su chad pa mad do// de'i phyir dag ma dag gi snang bas che ba nyid du shes par bya ste/ dri ma med par grags pa'i mdo las/ bcom ldan 'das
294b1(rnying rgyud): kyis 'bar gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'ang 'di'i rang bzhin bstan par mdza pas/ thams ca kyis shang rgyags kyi sangs rgyas don pa che'i rgyan bkod pa'i zhing khams bzhin mongs su dag par mthong bar tha pa / ba
294b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni rtag tu 'di 'dra ste/ khyed rnams kyi mi mthong ngo // zhes gsungs pa ltar ro// de bas na sngags lugs la nyis 'gyur zhes brjod pa'ang / gtsang ma'i 'og myin ni rgyu'i
294b3(rnying rgyud): byang sems sa dang po'i bden pa mthong ba'i gnas yin la/ 'og min chen po ni nges don du 'tshang rgya ba'i gnas yin pa sa/ slob la mA~M dang po na sna bden pa mthong ba la yun dzi tsam thogs pa'i nyis 'gyur mi slob pa'i sa'i bar du dgos pas na de
294b4(rnying rgyud): skad ces bya'o zhes gsungs pa nyid legs par mngon no// gsum pa ni/ gnas de'i rang bzhin gang zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni chos kyi dbyings nyid yin pa'i phyir mtha' dbus la sogs pa'i spros pa thams cad las 'das pa ste/ 'grel gyu
294b5(rnying rgyud): lngasa?/ mthu' dbus myed pa chos kyi dbyings// de ni gnas kyi bla mar 'dod// ces so// de nyid ngadi las yon tan gyi rnyed par rang snang ba'i phyir/ gnas kyi bo'i chos rnams dbye bar bya ste/ de'ang snga ma lus/ gzhal yas
294b6(rnying rgyud): gIzhi dang d+hi baN+DI// de byings dang gro'i bur hU~M ma nga // rgyun dang sgyid rta ba'is dang // mitshan nyid gdon gyi rnam pa ste// bcu gcig dag gis dbye bar bya// zhes pa ltar las/ dang po la spyi'i 'og gzhi ni/ ye shes lnga mtshon pa'i phyir rgya khron
294b7(rnying rgyud): tshad med pa'i 'khor lo ste/ bshad rgyud rol pa chen po las/ 'khor lo chen po'i sa gzhi la// khang pa gru bzhi rnam par brjid// ces so// nang gi 'og gzhini sgo dang khyams sog nas lte ba'i bang rdo rje 'greng du res spags pa ste/ theg pa 'og ma
295a1(rnying rgyud): na sa rud nan tu sug // gsu ma na
295a2(rnying rgyud): par chu pang dang snang ba'i phyir/ bzhi pa dbyings/ gru bzhis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'in pa'i lha shan thams cad kyis 'dir rgyab pa du mnyam pa ra \u0f7fsa pa'i n+ti/ de yang rgya ched 'grel bas/ mnyam pa'i phyir dang khyab pa'i phyir/
295a3(rnying rgyud): phyir ni bu zhing zung // zhes so// wab klo 'bud ni/ tshang las phy-i ba'i rkyang bzhi dbyings mkhar gyi / rlabs// khu dang / bdog rigs rti d+hi gdog can gyi rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa ste/ ye shes rere'ang lhag pa'i ye shes pani
295a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir/ drug pa rtse mo ni/ tshang dpag tu med pa dang / dbyibs bum pa zlum po'i rnam para'i khyim ba ste/ rim pa bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes lo mthar thug pa men cing spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ bdun pa rgyan la bdun las/
295a5(rnying rgyud): 'og gzhi'i dz+nyAn ne/ gzhal yas khang gi lte bar ye shes lnga mtshon pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa'i mtha' chos nyid mtshon pa'i rdo bzhum pos bskorang ba'o// logs rgyad ni/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rtsal sdang ma 'gags pa'i phyir/
295a6(rnying rgyud): pany+tsa re kha'i rtsig pa'i steng du/ rin po che'i pha gu dang / phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu dang / mda' yab la sogs pa'i rgyan dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ma spangs rnam dag rgyan du rdzogs pa'i phyir/ 'dod yon gyi lha mos phyogs kun
295a7(rnying rgyud): tu 'khrigs par// de ltar yang 'ad rim las/ ye shes rtsig steng seng mgos gtams// mi 'jigs kha nas mu tig hAr// legu mdzes pa'i bad dang ldan// drabang byed mgrol 'khor ldan// gzugs sogs lha mo 'khregs pa ste/
295b1(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs mchod byed rol mo yis// dar sbyar khams kun sbyin phung bzhin// zhes so// steng d+ha nA ni/ bum pa zlum po'i steng du bre mtshon pa'i phyur bu'i rtsar/ pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rim pa bcu gsum gyi steng na ra d+ha'i gdugs kyis mdzes shing
295b2(rnying rgyud): tog dang ldan pa ste/ rdo rje me long las/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas shing // nyon mongs chad pa'i gdung ba sel// thugs rje gdugs kyi 'khor lo bstan// ma lus gcig tu 'dus pa ni// tog stong 'od zer 'bar ba ste// zhes dang /
295b3(rnying rgyud): babs kyi rjer yang gdugs kyi rtsa bar 'khor lo ri dwags kyis bskyod pa dang / gzhan yang phyogs kun du rnga yab dang ba dan la sogs pas mdzes par sbas pa'o// sgo dang rta babs kyi rgyan ni/ rngam glog las/ gzhal yas de yi sgo bzhin// gla
295b4(rnying rgyud): se gnyis kyis mdzes par brgyan// rta babs rnams kyi 'khor lo la// gser gyi dril bu 'bar bdag/ dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra yang sgrogs// zhes so// phyi'i rgyan ni/ 'od rim las/ sgo bzhi g.yas g.yon ljon shing dang //
295b5(rnying rgyud): dpag bsam shing zung tsong tsong spel// dril bu g.yer kha theg chen sgrog/ bkra shis bya snyan sgra sgrogs ldan// yid bzhin rin chen brgyad bskor ba// rin chen phung po bzhi gnyis ldan// zhes so// ngo bo nyid kyi rgyan ni/ bden bzhi mtshon
295b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i gru chad dang // bden pa dbyer med mtshon pa'i bar khyams la sogs pa ste// gru chang bzhi brgyan sogs gsungs pa ltar ro// bdag po'i rgyan ni/ dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// zhes pa'i don te/ 'di la bdag po nyid rgyan
295b7(rnying rgyud): du bzhag pa dang / de'i sprul pa'i 'phro 'dul rkyen du bshad pa dang / bdag po la yod pa'i yo byad rgyan du bshad pa gsum las/ rog TIka pa dang po 'thad gsungs// mang mkhar pa phyi ma ltar bzhed ste/ khyim bdag gis longs spyod kyis khang
296a1(rnying rgyud): pa mdzes pa bzhin no gsungs/ gong maphal cher spar khab kyi rjes su 'brangs te bar ma ltar bzhed do// brgyad pasgo ni/ rnam thar bzhi'i ting ngange 'dzin gyi sgo nas byang chub chen por lhun gyis 'jug pa'i byung sgo ni / lag
296a2(rnying rgyud): las/ stong smon mtshan med 'or gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar// zhes so// de'ang thang sgo lta bu ma yin te/ sgo khyud kyi zlas drangs pa'i 'gram logs dang / ya phubs rdo rje'i dru mig can no// dgu pa rta nga bas ni/ rdo rje me long
296a3(rnying rgyud): las/ lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis// 'bras bu'i yon tan kun rdzogs pas// rta babs rgyu 'bras bcu drug bstan// zhes pa las/ rgyu'i rta babs ni/ mtshon sgo rnam thar bzhi'i sgo nas mtshon bya mi gnas pa'i ye shes la 'dug pa
296a4(rnying rgyud): de yang / thun mong rnam thar gyi theg pa brgyad la sbyangs pas rtogs pa'i rtags su/ sgo phubs kyi phyi nang gnyis su them skas bzhi bzhi ste brgyad ni babasazhon gyi rta babs te/ le lag las/ der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan// rta babs brgyad
296a5(rnying rgyud): du gyur pa yin// zhes dang / 'grel chung las/ nyan thos dang rgyal byang chub dang // bya ba chud dang gnyis ka rgyud// rnal 'byor bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi// rnam thar brgyad phyir rta babs brgyad// ces so// 'bras bu'i rta babs ni/ theg pa brgyad kyi
296a6(rnying rgyud): grub mtha'i yon tan brgyad rdzogs pa'i rtags su/ sgo logs kyi phyi zur bzhi nas ka bas btegs pa'i sgo khang gi steng du rgyan gyi rta babs brgyad de/ sgyu 'phrul bye brag bstan pa las// de yi grub pa'i mtha' rdzogs pa'i// yon tan brgyad phyir rta rkang dang // /
296a7(rnying rgyud): chu skyes sgom dang zar tshags// snga 'phyang chun 'phyang shar bu dang // khyung mgo mdzes pas rim par 'khrigs/ zhes so// de la sgo khang dang sgo'i bsil khang gi mun pa sel byed glang rgyab la sogs pas sbas pa'o// bcu pa mtshan nyid ni/ rang byang
296b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes la phyi gzung ba'i yul dang / nang 'dzin pa'i sems gnyis su med pas shes bya'i dkyil 'khor kun rgyang rang byung ye shes su gsal ba las gzhan ma dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings rdo rje kun tu bzang mo'i b+ha gnyid du 'dus
296b2(rnying rgyud): pas na nang zhes bya ste/ 'grel chung las/ gnas mchog mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// gzhal yas phyi nang chos dbyings nang // b+ha ga nyid du bsdus pas na// kun tu nang zhes brjod pa yin// zhes so// de ltar na chos kyi dbyings de'i ngang las/ ye shes kyi 'phrul par
296b3(rnying rgyud): dang snang ba'i gzhal yas khyang rgyan dang bcas pa thams cad kyang / shel gyi smyu gur rin po che sna tshogs bcug pa ltar mi bsgrib par gsal ba'i rang bzhin can no// bcu gcig pa gdan la/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i/ sa'i khyad par bgrod pa'i
296b4(rnying rgyud): yon tan gyi che bas nyes tshogs bcom pa'i gdan no// dang po ni/ sngar gyi 'og gzhi'i rgyan de nyid do// gnyis pa ni/ rang byung gi ye shes rtogs pa'i rig pa la 'bras bu'i chos mi 'jigs pa bzhi sogs lhun gyis grub pas/ yang dag
296b5(rnying rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su bstan cing nges par byas pa'i rtags su seng ge la sogs pa sems can lnga'i gdan byung ba ni yon tan rtags kyi gdan khri ste/ dbang bskur rgyal po'i rgyud las/ thugs ni mi 'jigs bzhi yis bdud bzhi 'joms//
296b6(rnying rgyud): degrub rtags su seng ge'i khI la bzhugs// sku ni stobs bcus mi dge bcu rnams 'dul// de grub rtags su gling chen khri la bzhugs// yon tan rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhis chags med sgrol// de grub rtags su rta mchog khri la bzhugs// gsung
296b7(rnying rgyud): dbang bcu mthar phyin rgyal po'i gsung // de grub rtags su rma bya'i khri la bzhugs// las ni phrin las bzhi yi thogs med sgrol// de grub rtags su shar shang khri la bzhugs// zhes so// de la mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni/ 'grel chung las/ mngon
297a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dang drag pa zang // bar mi chod dang nges par 'byung // zhes so// stobs badz+ra ni/ gnas dang gnas min yang dag mkhyen// dus gsum las 'bras rnam smin mkhyen// khams rnams sna tshogs mkhyen pa dang /
297a2(rnying rgyud): pha rol mos pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// dbang po mchog dang mchog min mkhyen// kun tu 'tsho lam mkhyen pa'i stobs// bsam gtan thar dang nyon mongs mkhyen// sngon gyi gnas mkhyen stobs dang ni// skye dang 'chi 'pho mkhyen pa dang // zag pa rdza
297a3(rnying rgyud): med sems grol mkhyen// de bcu stobs su gyur pas ni// 'bras bu mngon shes drug yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'ang / 'dun dang brtson 'grus sems dang ni// dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin spong ba yi// 'du byed rnams te rkang pa bzhis// ye
297a4(rnying rgyud): shes bzhi grub 'bras bu ste// chos dbyings ye shes kun la khyad// dbang bcu'ang / yo byad skye ba tshol dbang // ye shes chos dang sems dpa las// rdzu 'phrul smon lam chos rnams kyis// khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// phrin las
297a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi yang / zhi rgyas dbang drag las rnams kyis// thogs med las rnams lhun gyis grub// ci la'ang thogs pa med par spyod// ces so// 'o na sems can gyi gdan de dag thugs rig pa dang snang du 'dod pa ltar na/ rgya mtsho las/ byang chub
297a6(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' sngon lam dbang // thos pa'i rgya mtsho bsag pa'i phyir// lus ni seng ge'i gdan du phul// zhes dang / slang khab las/ seng ge la sogs pa smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang brgyad brgyad do// zhes smon lam du
297a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gdan du gsungs pa dang 'gal lo zhe na/ thud tha dad pa la ltos nas 'gal yang / 'dir ye shes rab sdang dang sngon lam gus pa gnyis rgyud tha dad du ma grub pas mi 'gal te/ dper na dge bshes kyi ching bde rang gi bsod nams kyis grub pa dang /
297b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyis dang pas phul ba gnyis rtag cig gsang du mtshungs pa blan/ zlal ba la mi 'jigs pa bzhis gas sun thos thub pa'i rtags su snang ba dang / byangs pas blan lam myo dbang gros rang dbang can dus ngag la sogs par sprul ta thus pa du
297b2(rnying rgyud): gdan du phul nas rna bas chos nyan pa'i phyir mi 'gal lo gsungs so// gzhan yang gsang ba'i theg pa 'di ni/ 'og ma la nyams ming zhing mi 'jigs pa dang / 'og mar mi tshud pa'i don 'dir shor zhing chud pa'i stobs dang / gdul bya rnams
297b3(rnying rgyud): sprin gyi sar myur du bkri ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / las nyon ma spangs par dbang du byed pa dang / chags thogs med pa'i phrin las kyis gdul bya 'dul ba'i phyir te/ rim bzhin seng ge la sogs pa dang sbyar ro// de'ang theg pa brgyad la bgrod nas 'dres
297b4(rnying rgyud): bu'i yon tan thugs su chud pa'i rtags su seng ge la sogs pa re re'ang brgyad brgyad mjug ma nang du bsgol nas rin po che'i khri rkang 'degs pa'i phyir/ sa'i khyad par bgrod pa'i gdan zhes grags so// gsum pa ni/ rgyal ba'i thugs rang bzhin gyis
297b5(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal zhing thabs shes dbyer med pa'i brdar nyi zla'i gdan dang / pad+ma ni 'dam las skyes kyang nyes skyon gyis ma gos pa ltar mtha'i skyon gyis gos pa med pa pad+ma'i gdan dang / yid bzhin gyi re bskong ba'i rtags su rin po che'i gdan dang / de ka bas
297b6(rnying rgyud): bteg pa'i mdzod mig bdun ldan ni dkar bdun lhun gyis grub pa'i brda'o// 'dir gdan gyi brtsegs lugs ni// skyes bu lnga la lnga brtseg ste// sems dpa' la ni sum brtseg go// nyi rgyang khro la pad rgyang thub// kun bzang yab yum
297b7(rnying rgyud): bzhir rtseg go// zhes bla mgong ma rnams gsungs te 'od rim dang 'grel pa mun sel gyi bzhed par mngon no// spyan 'grel du/ kun bzang yab yum dkyil 'khor la 'god pa'i tshe sum brtseg dang chos 'chad pa'i tshe lnga brtseg/ sgo ba la
298a1(rnying rgyud): par nyi brtseg ma ste gzhan 'dra'o// gdan brtsegs kyi zla ba steng du 'ong ba gang zhe na/ sman 'grel las/ gcabo ni shes rab la spyod pa'i phyir dang nang gi chu skyes kyi lte ba'i nyi ma la zla ba brten pa'i phyir ri bong skyed na gnas so//
298a2(rnying rgyud): zhes pa ni gsang ba ltar bshad pa'o// gzhan du grol lam ltar na gtso bor thabs snang ba 'gag pa med pa mtshon pa'i phyir zla ba steng dang / nang ltar na lte ba'i a thung gi steng du spyi bo'i haM yig gam/ snying ga'i srog mi shigs pa'i thig le gnas pa'i
298a3(rnying rgyud): phyir ro// de dag gis gnas rgyas par bstan te/ rgya mtsho las/ dga' bde yang dag rdzogs pa'i gnas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// ma lus 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang // bdag po rgyan dang bcas pa nyid// 'jig rten
298a4(rnying rgyud): gnas kyi 'og min pas// nyis 'gyur shin tu spags pa na// ngo bo mtha' gsum las 'das pa// ma spangs rgyan rdzogs gzhal yas khang // yon tan lnga yi bdag po ste// gru bzhi spyi bo 'khyil snang ba'o// zhes so// gsum pa 'khor phun
298a5(rnying rgyud): sram tshogs pA la/ rnam grangs dngos dang / zhar la de dag gi tshad bshad pa'o// dang po la'ang lhan cig pa dang / go phye ba'i 'khor gnyis te/ khog gzhung las/ lhan cig 'khor dang go phye ba// zhes so// dang po la/ rang bzhin gnyis sgra
298a6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i/ rig pa khyad par can gyi/ dad pas gta mnyan pa'i 'khor // dang po ni/ de nyid las/ nyid las mi gzhan rigs lnga dang // zhes pas 'chad pa'i skyes bu lnga ste bshad grub bo// gnyis pa ni/ ston pa'i thugs dang rig pa'i ye shes kyi
298a7(rnying rgyud): khyad par las ngang sdang ba'i phyir rig pa khyad par can gyi 'khong zhes bya ste/ rgya mtsho las/ de bzhin thugs kyi khyad par mas// de sdung rgyal nga sems sogs dang // zhes sa// de la'ang / gnyis te/ d+ha la~M sras sems dpa'i 'khor dang /
298b1(rnying rgyud): byed rdo ngo'i 'khor ro// dang po la spyi dang / bye brag gi mtshan gnyis las/ dang po ni/ mig shes la sogs pa'i rtog tshogs rnams ye nas chos nyid byang chub kyi sems yin pa las/ yin pa ltar mngon du gyur pa'i 'bras bu ni byang chub chen po'o//
298b2(rnying rgyud): de ltar rgya 'bras ltung snang yang don dam par lha tog dbyer mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste/ 'grel chung las/ 'khor gyi bkod pa ji snyed pa// khams dang skye mched yin par grags// rnam shes yul dang dbang po dang // dus dang phrin tsa ma lag rnams
298b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub chen po'i rang bzhin du// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// zhes so// yum gyi mtshan btsun mo ni sngar ltar las/ khyad par yul bzhis rnam shes bzhi bskyed pa dang / dus bzhis go bya nas dbang po bzhi bskyed pa'i phyir /
298b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa ni/ nang sems yab yum la/ mthong ba la sogs par smos pa ni/ mig rna ba sna lce'i rnam shes bzhi ste/ mig dbang la brten nas mig shes kyis yul gzugs mthong ba la sogs pa yin pa'i phyir/ de dag rim pa bzhin/ sa'i
298b5(rnying rgyud): snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnams so// de rnams la thugs kyi sems dpar grags te/ 'di nyid las/ ka ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ces sogs dang / sngar khyab las
298b6(rnying rgyud): rnam shes bzhi po ni rig pa kho na'i phyir thugs te// zhes so// mthong bar bya ba sogs ni/ yul gzugs sgra dri ro bzhi ste/ mig shes sogs kyis mthong bya la sogs pa'i yul yid pa'i phyir/ de dag kyang / lA s+ya ma dang / gIN+Di ma dang /
298b7(rnying rgyud): me le ma dang / TI nyi ma rnams dang rim par sbyar ro// de rnams la spu'i sems mar grags te/ yul bzhis rnam par shes pa'i rten byed pa'i phyir/ de'ang / tsa ni spyan gyi sku yaM mchog/ ces sogs dang / rdo rje las/ rnam shes pazhi
299a1(rnying rgyud): nasu sa na/
299a2(rnying rgyud): sa / na / shA sa ma ma / 'a
299a3(rnying rgyud): da rnas pa / 'du bzhid dang/ 'das na rgyur rnagapa ldas/ gas ni pa ya byed/ rigs kyi sa su sang ga ga sa min pas/ 'jig
299a4(rnying rgyud): ma du gas // zhes gas bas sa sa mi kyimakyi 'i gas pa ma nga na
299a5(rnying rgyud): rlu nga ga n+d+he/ rlom pa lta bar/ byams pa dang / sgrib pa rnams padung / dran rgya nga yong // 'ang mdapa la rgya mam// de dag migasu gas pa pa dper nas kyang klags te/ dbang sasas pa dang shes pa gnyis kyi nangadage ba 'byung byed pa'i
299a6(rnying rgyud): sa
299a7(rnying rgyud): smra kya su sa
299b1(rnying rgyud): de'i skabs su kha cig nar/ 'dir dus bzhi spros pas rus log ste/ lnga sdod gzhan du dus gsum las ma bshad pa'i phyir zang ba ni/ rang gi rang bzhin gsal bar klog pa'i sgra sngags te/ mdzod las/ chags gnas 'jig stong bzhi dang rdzogs ldan pa
299b2(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i dus bzhi bshad pa dang / dkon mchog brtsegs pa las kyang / 'od srungs/ sems dang chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du'ang ma song / gang yang mi gnas pas na ma nges pa ste bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus so// zhe
299b3(rnying rgyud): dus gsum dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus te bzhir gsungs pa sogs kyang / dus log par thal ba bzlog tu med do// rigs pas kyang gnod de/ khyed cag dus gsum kho nar 'dod pa de tshod du/ kho bo cag gis/ dus gsum du nges par 'dod
299b4(rnying rgyud): pa'ang mi rigs par thal/ dus yin na gnyis kho nar nges pa'i phyir te/ da ltar dang / da ltar ma yin pa gnyis su nges pa'i phyir byas na cis 'gog/ kho na re/ da ltar ma yin pa las 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa gnyis su phye bas gsum mo zhe na/
299b5(rnying rgyud): 'dra dus bzhi la'ang mtshungs te/ de ltar ma yin pa las/ 'das ma 'ongs ma nges pa gsum du lte ba'i phyir ro// des na lha rtog sbyang ba'i dbang du 'dir dus bzhir grangs dang go rim nges pa ste/ ji ltar na/ dus ring ba dper byas na//
299b6(rnying rgyud): bskal pa gcig la chags gnas 'jig stongs bzhir grangs des/ dus thung ba dper byas na/ lo gcig la dbyar dgun ston dpyid bzhi dang / nyin zhag de la thun chen bzhi la sogs par grangs nges pa'i phyir/ go rim nges pa ni/ da lta bska
299b7(rnying rgyud): pa gnas pa'i dus la dper mtshon na/ gnas pa'i dus 'di ni rgyu spyad cing 'bras bu ma spyad pa'i phyir da ltar ba dang / chags pa ni chu 'bras gnyis ka spyad zin pa'i phyir 'das pa dang / 'jig pa ni rgyu 'bras tshogs la ma spyod pa'i phyir ma 'ong
300a1(rnying rgyud): dang / stongs pa ni rgyu 'bras yod la ma tshogs pa'i phyir 'das ma 'ongs gang bu'ang ma nges pa'i dus so// de ltar yang ngam zlog las/ rtswa 'bras ngas pa mtshogs pa// 'brang bar ma ngas dus zhes grags/
300a2(rnying rgyud): zhes so// de la kho na re/ bskal pa sngar stongs pa ni 'das pa dang / phyis stongs par 'gyur ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i phyir dus gsum du nges so zhe na/ stongs pa'i dus de nyid gzhir byas pa la 'das ma 'ongs gang rung gcig tu kha tshon mchod pas ma nges pa'i dus
300a3(rnying rgyud): phyir mi 'gyur/ rgyu mtshan de'i phyir dus bzhir grangs dang go ri mangs pa yin no// 'dir kha cig na re/ ma dros pa'i dus ni mnyam pa nyid kyi dus te/ sbar khab las/ lani stong ba dag pa'o// zhes pa'i 'grel par/ ngo bo nyid 'di 'dra
300a4(rnying rgyud): bstan du med pa/ zhes gsungs pa'i phyir zer ba mi rigs te/ 'grel pa'i dgongs pa ni dus gsum gang rung gi ngo bo 'di 'drar bstan par byar med pa'i don te/ gzhan du na mnyam pa nyid rtog pa ma yin pa'i phyir rtog tshogs ma tshang ba'i skyon gnas so// de
300a5(rnying rgyud): lta na'ang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus ma 'dus so zhe na/ skyon med de/ de ni don dam 'dus ma byas kyi dus yin pa'i phyir rtog pa bshad pa'i skabs 'dir ma smos te/ rtog pa ni kun rdzob 'dus byas kyi dus bzhir dmigs pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa
300a6(rnying rgyud): la'ang kyi bye brag gnyis kyi/ b+hI ni/ 'joms pa chen po rdo rje/ zhes pa la sI nang gnyis las/ phyi lus kyi chos bzhi dang sbyar na/ rtog pa'i rang bzhin mngon du gyur pa'i khro bo bzhi'i sgra gsung thugs kyi mdzad pas bdud dang log par 'dren paH
300a7(rnying rgyud): 'joms pa dang / nang gsang ba'i khams bzhi dang myur na/ 'og sgo gsang ba'i kharla gsum 'dus pa'i bde ba'i rtog pa lha'am bde bar 'dzin pa'i zhen pa gnyis ka 'joms pa ste/ 'di nyid las/ nga ni thugs kyang 'jig par byed// ces ga
300b1(rnying rgyud): dang / yon thams ga pa ston// gsas// dang bya dums pa la gags pa mad pasan rdzo nga/ dasang ba la pa mas cad das nan da'o// byangams zud kyigatan 'dang / dbyung /
300b2(rnying rgyud): rna 'ang rjes pa dadag ba min pa gcig gas babyu ba gyurang bdag pa la na da ma byu ba sa byud pa'i cir btsun ma ba sa ma 'i gyu ro// yang/ rkyen lagaso// pan rigasus
300b3(rnying rgyud): na dngas suni brdzud kyang brgyad nas panyid rjes gsu // thub sa/ sa kyi sa te na pa chang pa bskyed pa la/ rig byed / ga tu la/ ga nyis mang pa'i dag shes / na/ gas
300b4(rnying rgyud): la du badrin ma gan gsus sa ga pa skyed pa'i/ byed gi se 'du / rgyagasu sum zhes pas pa sa / na / gnyis/ rim pa brdzun/
300b5(rnying rgyud): da rje 'khyil pa dang / tamathon dang/ stobs pa dang / gshin ga shed mas dang gyu // phyi ma yin po seMnas bram pa ma na / zung ngo sa nyin pa byun pa dang / drug pa la kyi dzin pa dang / bdag med du 'dzin pa sa
300b6(rnying rgyud): stong par 'dzin pa byin ma ng+ge lta bar khyis lpags kyu la sogs da // ya na/ g-i pa dzin pa ga pa nyid gas byu ba ltar pa la hU~M/ dem sbyangs par ni ma thugs kye ma'i rang bzhin du dag pa'i phyir/ zhes pa ltar 'byug te //
300b7(rnying rgyud): byu 'i gas ga tsun yu bzhid pa me byed pa yi / thang byung pas/ gas na sa mtsho sems bskyed byer// btsun gas ba du// zhes dang / gang pa 'dzig sa

301a6(rnying rgyud): khyab pan 'dudu de/ dper la bya gang bu shi gang nas bya ba bathug so// so// gakyis pad+ma/ byis mal byung sa brtse/ pa ma tshang sa byas ma yang bad nyis su me par
301b1(rnying rgyud): da'ang nga bzhin gshegs pa dang tha brnabasams dpa' ma smras da thams smad pa la pa nga bzhin dus dang/ pa ma pa thams ldam dang dU thams pa byu gA'i dang bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin ga nyis su med par
301b2(rnying rgyud): bzhugs te/ dgral chung las/ srid gsum 'gro thams cad kyi// phyung po khams dang mched dang // 'ad+mod byeng brjod kyis mi yang gi/ da skad 'khor mo'i dkyil 'khor dri// mang na rdogs rgyal pa da ljongangs// gnyis med ldan
301b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag par bzhugs// zhes so// skyob dpon ga pa ni/ mtshungs pa bzhi'i sgo nas gnyis su med par bzhugs par bzhed de/ slar khab las/ rang bzhin dang / blan mong ma yin pa dang / bdag nyid cha
301b4(rnying rgyud): po dang / gnas kyi phyir bzhag pa'o// zhes so// 'dir skabs 'phros kyi khyod snong ni/ kha cig na re/ la'u dang po'i 'khor 'di rnams/ gya mes skangs rang chud pa yin na ma/ thugs rang snang sprul pa pa yin/ dang po ltar na/ gang zag
301b5(rnying rgyud): gtsug gis sbyangs sam tha dang pas sbyangs/ gcig gis blangs na/ gang zag gcig gtog pa la ste ga tso 'khor ba bang ngan dubang ba mi rigs pa/ thadad pas sbyang sa na/ 'dir gang thag gcig ge tog tshogs las ma smos pa'i phyir mi 'jad /
301b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa ltar na 'dra / gdul gyi rang chud pa med pa'i phyir/ 'dul byed sbrul pa tsogs pa don med du 'gyur ro zhe na/ lan du bla ma cug pa gang pa sogs skur bas pa kha cig nare/ rigs lnga yan chad sprul pa dang / sems dpa' man rang
301b7(rnying rgyud): par 'thang / rigs lnga'i skabs su spang khab las/ mtshan thun mong po gnyis ni sngang thal te/ zhes dang / sems dpa' sems ma'i skabs su/ lta ba'i sgrib pa 'joms pa'i phyir las kyi dza dza'o// zhes bag la nyal zla ba'i
302a1(rnying rgyud): yod par bshad pa'i phyir gsungs na'ang / rigs par ma mthong ste/ rgyud 'di'i mthar thug gi 'bras bu sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yin nam min/ gnyis pa ltar na/ rgyas pa las/ don bsdus gsung rab
302a2(rnying rgyud): bzhi bcu gnyis// de bas lhag pa'i don smra ba// de ni rnam dag la ma min te// rang blo bsam pa 'khrul pa yin// zhes pa dang 'gal la/ dang po ltar na/ sems dpa' man chad rang rgyud par 'dod pa'i dam bca' nyams so// rang lugs/ le'u dang
302a3(rnying rgyud): por dngos su smos pa'i 'khor 'di rnams thugs rang snang sprul pa yin te/ spar khab las/ ston pa dang / gnas dang 'khor khyad par du gyur pa la dam pa ste/ rang rig pa nyid gsum gyi khyad par du snang ba la dam pa gsum mo// zhes dang / skabs don
302a4(rnying rgyud): sngar drangs pa'i gnyis su med par bzhugs so// zhes pa'i 'grel pa'i lung gis gsal ba'i phyir ro// de lta na'ang 'dul byed tshogs pa don med du mi 'gyur te/ go phye ba'i 'khor gyis gsang sngags kyi nges pa rnyed par bya ba'i phyir ston 'khor du bstan nas rgyud
302a5(rnying rgyud): gsung ba'ang mi 'gal ba'i phyir dang / der ma zad/ rje sgo phug pa khu dpon dang nya ri drings pa'i zhal nas/ dkyus gcig la 'khor cha gnyis bzung ba mi 'thad kyang / spyir cha gnyis yod par nges pas/ 'dir rtog tshogs sbyar ba'i 'khor 'di rnams
302a6(rnying rgyud): thugs rang snang sprul pa yin te/ rgya mtsho las/ de bzhin thugs kyi khyad par las// rang snang rgyal ba sems sogs dang // zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ de dang cha 'dra ba'i rgyud mas sbyangs kyi mthar lam pa dang / theg pa 'og ma'i rgyal ba brjod kyis mi
302a7(rnying rgyud): nga ba yod de/ snga ma'i 'phros las/ dang po'i sangs rgyas sa rgyal ba// sems dpa' che dang 'joms pa che// brjod kyis mi lang tshad med dang // rnam gnyis tshul du bzhugs pa'o// zhes pas mngon no gsung / rgyal ba g.yung ni/ thun mong ma yin
302b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i blang gzhi gnas rang byung ba 'al bar thams cad pan tshul nas thugs dang sdang skal pa pa yin byung / smang tshul ba byung ngas pa pa bang nabyas mas dpa' nas byung bas 'galaH/ snang bab las/ gnas bu las san ga pa ni drug pa nga
302b2(rnying rgyud): ga/ dadags su byung par / ga sas da/
302b3(rnying rgyud): sa pa pa'i phying dul bum na dag pa gnas 'a // / 'ogs rnaMs kyi nyis bgrags sa bzugs/ gang myi thubs nas
302b4(rnying rgyud): su brung la/ bzlags na po maung ma badz+ras ga bsugs ma/ bzugs// / pa dang shis ny-i pa pa'i rnabs sa pa sku bang dgas pa tshogs pa tu snang byags pa'i thags su
302b5(rnying rgyud): yod par thugs kyis bstan cing/ bshad rgyad stong po ga pa'i the gzhing/ dpal bram ba'i srung ba gtan la gsum du da ma pa'i do ci gsus na 'dzin pa/ brjid kyil bu rang theg yonan ma
302b6(rnying rgyud): derje'i rgyas mdzung gis kun tu bzang po dang 'dru thal ma nga / sa dang / gzhan / me mig par pa la / zhes thogs gnyi sa ni mas pa'i phyi // 'on rje bdun me du brlags pa / gangal
302b7(rnying rgyud): pa da pa / thubadrug+sag zug dru sem sa ma ya sa na/
303a1(rnying rgyud): tsam du zad pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang / bde mchog gi sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams yul nyer bzhin bzhugs par rtswa rgyud du gsung med/ des na 'og min gyi gnas su bde mchog lta
303a2(rnying rgyud): gcu rtsa gnyis ma tshang ngam snyam du rtog pa dang 'dra ste bzhad gad kyi gnas so// bzhi pa bstan pa phun sa ma tshogs pa ni/ lam gsang ba'i snying po ste/ mtshon bya rang bzhin gzhi yi rgyang// ces sogs gsungs pa'i phyir ro// kha cig na re/ mdza
303a3(rnying rgyud): bstan gyi rjes sgyu rgyas bshad 'dug gam me 'dug/ gnyis pa ltar na mdor bstan don med du thal zhing / dang po ltar na/ bstan bshad kyi don gnyis nang 'gal te/ rgyud 'dir mdor bstan la lnga byung la/ rgyas bshad la ston 'khor gnas gsum
303a4(rnying rgyud): las ma byung ba'i phyir zer na// lan du/ bla mgong ma rnams/ dogs pa de'i skyon med de/ bstan pa ni ston pa'i thugs la rdzogs shing / dusi nI ston 'khor gnas gsum nam 'jom pa'i dus te/ ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud las/ gnas nga
303a5(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba 'khor tshogs na// dus dang bstan pa shugs las 'byung // zhes gsungs pa'i phyir gsungs/ lha rdo zur chung ba'i zhal nas/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid kyis sogs kyis bstan pa bstan te/ gleng ba slang gi gang dubyung ba ni rgyud 'khrugs
303a6(rnying rgyud): po'ogasungs/ rdo sgo phug pa khwa dpon sogs phal cher/ sbar khab kyi rjes su 'brangs te gtso bor gleng gzhi bsdus pa'i don du bzhed do// de ltar na'ang / bstan par 'dod pa'i phyogs la gleng ma bslang bar byung ba'i skyon dang gleng gzhir 'dong pa'i phyogs
303a7(rnying rgyud): la rdo rje las byung ngo zhes pas gnod do zhe na/ kho bo ni gnyis ka ltar bshad kyang mi 'gal bar sems te/ dang po ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i spyi gzugs rigs lnga dbyer mi byed pa'i ston pa nyid kyi thugs la chung ngo ji ltar shar 'ji
303b1(rnying rgyud): don gsang bdag gis bsgrub byed pa'i tshe bsdus pas gleng ma bslang bar byung ba'i skyon med cing / de nyid gdul bya dbang rab la ltos nas cung don mdor bstan du bshad pa yin pas bstan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ rgya mdud 'grel las/ da ni chos phun sum tshogs pa bstan par
303b2(rnying rgyud): bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang / zhes sogs dang / 'grel chung las// rgyud 'di nyid kyi mdo don du// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gsang ba 'di// sku gsung yon tan phrin las zugs// rdo rje las ni nges par phyung // zhes rgyud don
303b3(rnying rgyud): mdor bstan du bzhed pa'i phyir/ gnyis pa ltar na/ gdul bya dbang 'bring man chad la rgyud don 'og tu ston pa'i phyir 'di nyid gleng gzhi bsdus pa ste/ slar kha ba las/ 'di nas mar gleng gzhi bsdus pa ston te/ zhes so// de lta na'ang rdo rje las phyung ngo // /
303b4(rnying rgyud): zhes pas gnod dam snyam na/ mi gnod de/ de las/ dbang rdzogs pa ri grwa drug pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ zhes dbang rdzogs nas ston sdud khyad par med cing / dgongs pa'i rgyud gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'i phyir sdud pa pos bshad pa la rdo rje las
303b5(rnying rgyud): bzhes te dang sa bye thugs pa byung bar 'gyu ba skye gas sa/ na/ 'di bye nga smra ba sa nga rnaM ma du sbyi na/ mas sa spyod / mas la ba bdun pa 'i
303b6(rnying rgyud): bsdu bar mdzad pas kyang rgyud don du 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis sam bdun ni rgyud don dngos dang / theg pa'ang rgyud don dang ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir ro// 'dir ni/ rgyud kyi brjod bya thams cad rgyud gsum du 'dra ba las/ de 'dir bsdus
303b7(rnying rgyud): pas na bstan par 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid kyi ces pas gzhi rgyudang dang / dbang bsgyur zhes dang / rkang pa gnyis pas lam rgyud dang // ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i dang // zhes dang / rkang pa gsum pa man chad kyis 'bras rgyud de/ rgyud
304a1(rnying rgyud): gsum mdor bstan pa'i phyir/ klud da bu zhapas kyi brjod byug zhi lam 'bras gsum dang / da ston pa thams cad 'di las bkris pas shes pa bya'o// lnga pa dus phun sa ma tshogs pa ni/ khog gzhung las/ dus rgya
304a2(rnying rgyud): dpa nyam gnas kyang // zhal ba can la nan pa'i dus// zhes pas/ ngang dris dang / gdum byal rje phyi'i dus gtsus/ rus bshe mnyam pa nyid byengs te/ gleng rdzoba'i skye dus sa kyi tha da pa ltar lnga yang / dus
304a3(rnying rgyud): bden pa'i cha nas dar ma dmigs la/ dbyer med kyi ngos nas de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med pas na mnyam pa nyid kyi dus zhes bya ste/ rgyas pa las/ 'das dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las// dus bzhis phyi mang
304a4(rnying rgyud): yaM// mnyam pa nyid du lhan ner sbyor// zhes dang / 'grel chung las/ dus bzhi mnyam bcos kyi dbyibs nyid du// rnyog pa bkod pa'i rgyan la thim par bzhugs// zhes so// gnyis pA ni/ rgyud kyi chu phun sumacho ga lnga tshang pus gdul bya
304a5(rnying rgyud): la rgyung don byung ba de yin te/ skal ba can la dkon pa'i dus// zhes pas mngon no// drug pa snying po po ni/ sa bcu dus pazhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin pa'i rgyal sras ldeg na rdo rje ste/ rgya mtsho las/ 'a
304a6(rnying rgyud): gyi nang na skal mchog ldan// 'dul ba'i dus babs gsang ba'i 'dag/ leg na rdo rjes bsgrub mdzad// ces dang / log gzhung las/ gsang bdag phyag rdo rdo rje yis// thun mong ma yin nges pa'i rgyud// rnaMs lan me mngon don gyis
304a7(rnying rgyud): 'grus// byin rlabs mi yul grags pa yin// zhes so// de'ang 'dotad las/ rdo rje gas pa'i tshig tu'o// zhes pas bstan te/ slob dpon ni 'od seng shes/ rdo rjegasang bzhes pa ni dbang babyung ba'i mtshan yin te/ gsapa'i
304b1(rnying rgyud): bdag bajug na dul grags pa'o// zhesas// de sbyar sdud pa ba smras pa'i dgas pa ni/ srud pa po mdun gtam grags pa/ gros ma 'byung ba 'byon da/ gzhan byung nga/ gnas ga dang/ stanA bag sang kun rjeng/ gang nga
304b2(rnying rgyud): gtid/ de nas kyi zhig gis sre zhes pa'i sgra myur krung dri phyir/ glang dub shAng da/ 'dir tshig N+DI // zhes sbas par ba // gnyis pa gangs byung ga myed kyi kyang gi / di'i 'i nab N+DI lnga'i khri na g-i 'arjes tan// del
304b3(rnying rgyud): rdzobs/ shes rab chen po'i/ sa / gas rkyen de la bdu gas sa/ na/ bdag sgrogs pa'i shes rab/ das sa spyo tshun ts+tsha mA~M ma ga jims pa'i myu gis thog+sa/ rnamam/
304b4(rnying rgyud): dag shes rab chen po na// mtshan ma 'joms phyir khro bo mchog/ ces so// gnyis pa ni/ rang rig rtogs pa'i ye shes te/ des chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing 'khor ba'i sa ni dus nas 'joms pa'i phyir/ nga dag sa khrob ste/ rgyas pa las
304b5(rnying rgyud): rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// phyogs bcu'i khams rnams dbang bsdus nas// kun kyang mr-id mig sa byings su nim// thams cad khro ba'i tshogs sa gyur// zhes so// gsum byin/ gdul bya nam yang me 'dor pa'i phyir// 'dul ba'i dus
304b6(rnying rgyud): las mi 'du ba rdzu na rkyen pa'o// dala'ang 'gra brgyab pan ba kyil ming 'i gas rgyas mi mthur rdzogs 'dams pa'i phyir dadung ma thugs kyis rgyab ga sa ste sta na ma / 'don pa ga zu sa nan nags so// zhems// rje des sa

305b4(rnying rgyud): bu mo brgyad dang / do sring 'gro ba tshogs dang phyogs kyisacu brjod pa 'on srung bani dang / phrin po chen mo ma sran mo dang / zhes tshogs kyis dab sa nyid brgyad rnams so// bzhi pa bstan pa ni/ gdul dka' dag po'i gdul bya nyid zin
305b5(rnying rgyud): las drug shul gyi sgo nas 'dul ba'i don mdzad pa'o// de yang ji ltar btul ba ni/ 'grel chung las/ ji ltar 'dul ba'i dpung ni drug 'gyur te// tshe mchog nyid dang khro bo 'chol ba dang // rdo rje zhe sdang rdo rje srin po dang // rngo mthe'o 'jigs

305b7(rnying rgyud): nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas gsang ba'i yum sprul te sbyor ba mdzad pas dkyil 'khor thams cad bskyed pa'i rgya byang chub kyi sems spo ba ni che mchog longs spyod chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i tshe hU~M hU~M hUM bai shwa badz+ra zhes sogs brjod pa ni gnyen pa
306a1(rnying rgyud): gas ngag tsun na dun / na na pa cas klas blas na na tshul ra na pan pal brdzunadu // nga du na tusarna chu/
306a2(rnying rgyud): gyi khams g.yos pa stsogs sras chen po ba tso s+t+rai dang / nang du lam pa'i sems la tshogs sbyor kyi ting nge 'dzin myur ga yo/ thob goms pa'i nyams gsum pogs 'thon pa ni sbyin rlabs kyi tshe 'phrul lo// gyi snong g.yo ba sogs dang nad zhu ba'i sbyi
306a3(rnying rgyud): sa bzung ba'i jos byung bas/ ji'i rtse gadrug pa can thams cang brtul bar zlas pa ni chos snang ba'i rgyu laphrul lo// de nas sprul ba tshogs de dag rigs pa'o 'og 'thung la ba sum dung bcas par bzlas nas rang ga rigs dang
306a4(rnying rgyud): mthung po'i phyogs su dgas ba tson rnams gdan du thas te bzhugs pa ni gang gi sprul pa las khyung par rgyu phyir pa'i phyir sprul pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rdegs pa de rnams thos te gtum tshig tu sgru ban/ de'i gnyen por rdo rje srin pa

306b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor la 'gad bu'i mdzad pa rdzogs nas dbang mo rnams rang gnas su brtse ba ni ngo mtshar tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor // de nas drags pa can rnams 'ag sgo nas bton ta mi ba zung ba'i 'dam du chud pan/ slar yang rnams nas/ khro zod me brtsegs sam

306b3(rnying rgyud): byas gcig tu btul te/ de dag shin tu 'dar zhing bred pas mna' bor nas lus gud na phul zhing / mgrin gcig tu 'khor phul ba rnams ni phrin las kyi 'bras bu dregs pa can gnas smra bstib pa'o// de nas ma mo rnams slar 'khor du 'dus

307a1(rnying rgyud): na ma pas srid ci'i bar song nas kyang / nyes 'dod pa'i ma byas bsam tan gyi nying 'dri rdib pa ga bdang pa'i snang / de mnob pa pa yang mangs pa'i ci dugadapa' chen po ma thong gal spod sal gcid mod dashes na/
307a2(rnying rgyud): thub mthong ba'i sems can thams cad kyis thub pa dang spyod yul gcig tu spyod dgos pa sogs ha cang thal lo// phyogs gnyis pa'i lan ni/ tha mal pa'i gzugs dang sdug bsngal myong ba ltar bstan pas sdug bsngal rang mtshan pa myong ba dang tha mal pa
307a3(rnying rgyud): yin par ma nges te/ sems can gyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa tha mal pa'i gzugs su snang ba rnams dang / sems can rnams skyob bgyed pa'i phyir dmyal ba'i 'jig rten sgra nas bstan pa sogs kyang der ma nges pa bzhin no// 'o na 'dir gang bzhag snyam na/
307a4(rnying rgyud): kho bo ni gsang ba dag chen po sgo phug pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas sprul pa bar khas blangs te/ 'grel pa lung bstan las/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis tshul du bstan par rig par bya ste/ de la dgos pa dang dgongs pa ci yod ce na/ rang chud pa'i golas dgag pa dang / che ba

307a6(rnying rgyud): zhes sogs kyis gnod do zhe na mi gnod de/ phyis 'jig rten du cha lugs dang mthu cha 'dra ba'i ru dra rang mtshan pa 'byung ba rnams rgyu de lta bus bskyed par bstan te/ che mchog 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar// ma 'ongs dus na 'byung ba yang // zhes so//
307a7(rnying rgyud): de'i phyir gnyen po mchog rnams la nyes pas mi gos par bstan 'a'i cheng du rgyal bas sor phreng can du sbal nas btul bzhin thabs kyi che ba dbyung ba dang / sngags lam pa'i go las dgag pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa'i tshe 'phrul du gdon mi za'o// yang / he rug rnam
307b1(rnying rgyud): yin pa'i phyir/ drangs pa'i chos kyis tshad gzung du med de/ mtha' yas ma med/ zas so// longs sku'i zhing khams ni/ slong gsum kI 'jig rten kong la steng rgyu bkod dang ba/ de stong la skang rtswa bkod par ma/ dwe stong la stong sa tshams blad yongs su das
307b2(rnying rgyud): pa zhes bya ba 'ongs bu'i zhing gi tshad do// spel bzhi dang yan man ni 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu/ zhes pas bstan par bzhed do// kho bo ni/ de yong mi slong mod kyi'on klung pal chen las/ las kyi bye brag bsam mi khyab// dmyal ba'i 'jig rten mthur
307b3(rnying rgyud): nga zhing // gshin rje'i 'jig rten rje la zhi ste// byol song lha mi gyen du 'gro// zhes bltar dam/ yang na 'go sngon bstan pa 'gro ba mtho ris/ spel zhi ste 'phreng brgan gyis 'gro bdud 'gro// mthung brtan gyis 'gro ba dmyal bu dang yi dwags te// de ltar

307b7(rnying rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sdang bar byas nas 'dzam gling bye ba phrag pas bstan to// zhes pa nas/ de ltar phyogs brgya shin tu rgyas par byas nas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad snang bar byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'jam gling the ba phrab bcwab sa sa/
308a1(rnying rgyud): stod pa pa nga ste// rig dang bcas par ldan pas na// rig pa'i skyes bu zhes su bshad// ces slar khab tu drangs pa ltar ro// gnyis pa ni/ 'thon nas sang cir 'gyur zhe na/ khog gzhung las/ grags pa'i bu mang thun
308a2(rnying rgyud): thub drug ston pa stong gsum gnas// khyad par shAkya thub pa nyid// rgyal srid btsun mo'i 'khor ldangs nas// rab tu byung rdzogs mdzad pa yis// rgya yi 'khon lo bstan par sgrogs// 'gro drug 'khor dang rnam bzhi sogs// shin tu dkon po'i dus su'o//

308a4(rnying rgyud): mtshos rnam par bris// zhes 'gro ba'i las dbang gis zhing khams kyi bkod pa mtha' yas kyang / 'dir mdzod las/ gling bzhi dang ni nyi zla dang // ka rI rab dang ni 'dod lhar bcas// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni/ stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod// de stong
308a5(rnying rgyud): la ni stong gnyis pa// bar ma'i 'jig rten khyams yin no// de stong la ni stong gsum ste// mnyam du 'jig cing 'bung ba yid// rjes pa'i stong gsum gyi snod ze po ni sgra'i sku thub pa gcig gi zhing ste/ stong gsum ni myong chen po rang / zhes so//
308a6(rnying rgyud): skyil gzhi dang yan man+ta s+t+rai jig rten drug gi sngogs bcu mtha' yas su med pa'i// zhes pa don med du 'gyu'o zhe na/ grod med de/ de ni chos su dang longs spro'i// yin la/ de skal dra gzhing mtshon pa'i phyid/ zhes bral gong sa rnam na
308a7(rnying rgyud): sku gsum kyi zhing khams kyi khyang par dgang zhen/ la gsum byer med yin pa ra/ pa ma chu med na / thag ge pa stsa na/ sa pa'i zhing khams ni/ chos dgrang sa ngas tha pa'i

309a2(rnying rgyud): na brgyag pa ga su sa bdun zhams // sag dus pa/ nga / shel rgyams byas gas/ da'i ni nas sa rba/ rgyu// tsun pa rgyam 'di pa

309b3(rnying rgyud): nyid yang nga shi kyis dad 'i gas rgyag nga/ zeng bu'i bo sa bzha ma gas pa na// bzhi ba ni sa parnam pa pa sa pa sa ma sas pa nga ban pa sbyin pade// dpa sa dri /
309b4(rnying rgyud): sa 'gas par skyed nga bsnod sa ca pas 'das 'ang/ gang ga 'du na pa'i rdzugs dzin gyi snang rigapas 'dra' ba dade/ bas mi dgas na po na mi rlu pa sa sas
309b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'dus nga/ rngon mas pas mthos mi thab pas 'dral ba da 'phrul rdzogs rten pa'i byung 'phral gyis 'dul ban// man/ brnams pa dang / gang chogasun pa bcad da sas gsangs zhing / them thong rnam 'di da /
309b6(rnying rgyud): da ma du na nyis m+b+hi da/ zan pa la 'i der rnying ste/ 'di 'i rnas pa san par gsungs pa bye gas pa/ dam sadang pa brnyan nyis kyi nga dums na/ bla thalas/ gas su
309b7(rnying rgyud): sun// rjes kyi las ma gachis par// sprul pa bzhin rdzogs pas// gleb ma pa byu dang // dga' ldan nas nas pa ba dang // rnams kyi ga dang gsas dzus/ krol gnas

310a2(rnying rgyud): dmas// yongs su mngag zhing rnams sa// med pa ji sri gnas pa sa// zhes sogs po pag me pa rnam hU~M/ myangang bras 'dis pa masugs da rnyed pa'i thubangs
310a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa ni/ thams ca mang 'dzig te// 'dul ba'i dbang gis b+ha dang mi'i theg pa dang / zhes seMn kyi sa thon pa na \u0f89\u0fa4 yAd/ ma rig bya'i zhes sogs kyi su gang gi gnyen gror ma hU~Mgasung tshum dang /

310a7(rnying rgyud): ga'i mngon shes dang / gsanapa su rna ba'i mngon shes dang / gshis tshul 'di 'dod par pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mngan shes dang / da kyang gang na mi 'bas dang med kyi
310b1(rnying rgyud): kyi rjes su 'gro zhing mkhyen nas don mdzad pa'i phyir mngon shes so// bzhi pa ni/ kun tu sku/ zhes sogs te/ sprul pa'i sras 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ ris drug gis bsdus pa'i 'gro ba gang dang gang gis 'dul ba de dang mthu
310b2(rnying rgyud): par/ zhi khro la sogs pa'i sku dang / de las byung ba'i gsung dang / de dag slong ba po'i thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sku gcig la'ang zhal mang po dang phra men la sogs pa'i zhal gzugs mi mthun pa'ang sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa ste/ sangs rgyas
310b3(rnying rgyud): mnyam sbyor las/ res 'ga' zhi la res 'ga' drag/ res 'ga' gdon chen gegs mdzad de// de la sogs pa mtha' yas man+to ri// ri dang skye bo thams cad do// zhes so// mdor na skra sogs mang por ston pas grangs bsam gyis mi khyab par ma zad/ na
310b4(rnying rgyud): mkhas ji tsam khyab pa de srid du skus khyab pa sogs tshad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang sbyar du byung ngo // lnga pa dus ni/ sgron ma bkod pa'i dus te/ shin tu dkon pa'i dus na'o// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa la/ rtsod pa dgod pa dang / de spang ba'o// dang pon
310b5(rnying rgyud): sha za dge sbyong gi tshul 'dzin pa dpal 'dzin na re/ khyod kyi thub pa'i dbye ba la// 'gro drug thub pa drug yin lo// 'o na thub pa gzhan lnga yis// mdzad pa bcu gnyis gang du bstan// chos kyi 'khor lo gang du 'askor// bstan pag yin de 'dzin su// gal te de dag
310b6(rnying rgyud): nA ni// thub pa yin pa'i sgrub byed gang // zhes zer/ gnyis pa ni/ de skad du smra ba dag shin tu rigs pa ma yin te/ rgya mtshan de'i phyir/ 'byon 'gyur gyi rgyal ba byams pa mgon po chos can/ khyod thub pa ma yin par thal/ thub pa yin na
310b7(rnying rgyud): gyi ston pa 'di kho na ltar mdzad pa bcu gnyis ston dgos pa gang zhig/ khyod kyis dka' ba spyod pa'i mdzad pa mi ston pa'i phyir/ rtags dang po khas/ gnyis pa mdo'i lung gi grub/ gzhan yang / dag pa'i zhing na ngas 'byung dang rol rtsed mi ston pa

311b3(rnying rgyud): 'dral ba sogs bshad pa'i phyid/ de ltar sprul pa mchog gis 'du' ba senas zung smug sbyar byas kyi/ de dag gis ma~M tha le la so so'i lus mthun du ston pa phyir rnagal ba med // gzhan yang / lha'i thub pa sogs pa brten pa dang /

311b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i lha yo ba bzhin dang/ de dag gi gzugs sa bzhugs nas chos son to// zhes pa'i phung gis kyi gas sre ni zer ro// gzhan thub pa 'i Ta/ des bdi gdo ma 'a pa mams / kyil pa

311b7(rnying rgyud): darnga thams dpa'i sprul pa bas ma gyis ma thab pas 'khor ba'i dbang gtan com du'i myur chub pa zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs pa'i sbyor ro// gnyis papyid gleng bang dzin/ ledra gnyis pacu rgyu te/ de la'ang / dgos da/ dzig/ spadan/ rnam grangs

312a7(rnying rgyud): brtar 'od la dang bsrung bas// hud don byang byar bslang zhes bya// zhes so// gnyis pe/ gsang dbang baphreng ba dang / dbang gnyis kyi las thun mong du bstan po// da por/ na med zer
312b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus nasas yang byed pa po rang rig pa'i ye shes gnyis dang bzhin dbyer mi byed par byer rdo rje yid da kun tu bzung ba'o// b+hab mni/ dbang po rje re wal rgya ma gyur pa'i yul 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas su chos kyi khams yin la/ des sdib spyad par da cing /
312b2(rnying rgyud): la du gyur pa'i phyir btsun mo ste kun tu bzang mo'o// de'i phyir/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid/ nyes sogs dang / de nas btsun po byeb mo chos kun tu bzang mos/ zhes sogs te/ de ltar ston pa yab yum gnyis sboms par
312b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i nyi zla byang chub kyi sems kyis chu byas shing / yab yum gyis nyams su bstod pa'i don ched du 'arjod pa gnyis kyis chen byas te/ de'i 'bras bu togs pa brjod pa ni/ yab kyis thabs kyi cha bzung nas/ 'khor 'das tha drug ba
312b4(rnying rgyud): gcig gi rang bzhin du sangs rgyas pa la dam pa'i tshul gyis/ e ma'o// rdo rje phung po yan lag ni// zhes sogs gleng bar mdzad pas/ 'khor rnams kyis lhag pa kun rdzob kyi brten pa mthong ste/ thug khams kyi mched thams cad ni dang lda
312b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor du rtogs shing / yum gyis shes rab kyi cha bzung ste/ kye ma'o phyogs bcu stong khams ye nas dben/ zhes sogs dbyings kyi don gleng bar mdzad pas/ 'khor rnams kyis lhag pa don dum gyi bden pa mthor ste/ 'di ltar rdzogs bcu stong khams dang
312b6(rnying rgyud): dpa gsum dang / snyigs ma lnga dang / phung po lnga ste/ tha smad bzhis bsdus pa thams cad ye nas chos kyi skung mngon sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/ 'bras bu gzhan nas btsal du med par rtogs pa'o// nong cha sngon byang d+ha nA jig pa'i 'khor la/ gleng bska
312b7(rnying rgyud): rung / gyu pa dang gsu ga'i gtogs yin/ rjes la na go kye 'dri 'khor la/ swA 'i rim pa 'i bar sleb pa rags 'bring dag cing can rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa pa shang du rung ba'i snod ldan du byas pa'o// gal te ba

313a6(rnying rgyud): 'galta / dab kya lngas/ gan rten pa dang na sems/ po shes ga shems 'jugs/ zhes pas/ salnga pa'i rdzogs dang rig pa'id gdas za ma mi shes bla ma'i 'ang bzhin cig nas pe rkye nga rten pa theg par snang na nam
313a7(rnying rgyud): khyer ro// gnyis pa ni/ de ltar gsang dbang bsrur nas/ shes rab ye shas dang / dbyer med pa de chen gyi dbang gnyis kyi las thun mong du ston par bzhed pas/ de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos/ zhes sogs te/ ngan dag
313b1(rnying rgyud): dang / rtags yab sum ga ga gnyis sam dang 'dang nas/ bdag dang mthung yas sems can rnams// yanas sangs rgyas yin pal// yin par shes pa'i ba dab skyed // b+hang nab martog sems byung nga// zhus pa sa
313b2(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'i phyir 'di gsungs so// de'ang sems bskyed pa'am dbang bkru re ma ga pa dngos pa bla ma rnams sde dgongs pa tha dad pa rnams bsta na gsum du 'du ste/ gzhi rang bzhin gyi/ bgrod pa lam gyi/ mthar byin 'bras bu'i sems bskyed do// dngopo che
313b3(rnying rgyud): ngon dag sngam rim par gzhi rnam shes ye nus ye shes yin pa dang / de nyams su len pa'i thabs dang / des mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bul dam pa'o// de dag ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bran gyi gsang ba ste/ thugs kyi gnag zug ni 'bring po la med par yon tan ldan
313b4(rnying rgyud): grub pa 'di phal gyi yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de yang don dam par ste 'gag gnas dmigs 'gro'ang med pa las/ kun rdzob tu ste sogs ltar snang zhing / skyes par skad tsam nyid nas rtse ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir/ bden pa dbyer med de/ rim pa brji / ga d+hA
313b5(rnying rgyud): kAnag byung ba nyid kyi ye shes sa dang / sbyor ba don gyis na gzhi ma thong ba dang / nyon yid mnyam nyid/ yid sa par rdzog pa/ rga sde bya tha ba ye shes su sems brjed par byang // gnyis pa la/ grol lam dang / thabs pam gnyis/ dang pode/ ma
313b6(rnying rgyud): sogs pa na pa gsum la rim par dam pa dang / sangs kyis kun gyi dgongs pa de rtogs dka' ba'i phyi dgesang ba'o// de 'ang sems kyi dang snar pa dang / ye shes pa dad+ya Sh+Ta dA gnyis/ drang bro ni/ skye ba zed sogs bden par dbyer med ngu la rdzab rdzapo gang /
313b7(rnying rgyud): gnas/ sbyin/ mtha yin pa kyi/ grob lam tho sems sa sa kyi kyang rgyab gnyis la sa nga/ 'di gnas pa'i ngasasu ldan pa ni sus kyig sa/ sa byed pang na pa'i sa pa pa ra/ pan ngan dang/

314a7(rnying rgyud): ma mi shes la tha~Mng gag gnas dmigs patsha'ang srung ba danam zhin kyis kyi ma sa skye sa pas pa da kyi medang pa sa/ 'do ba nas nasu mthong c-ing byung mi da na

314b2(rnying rgyud): yin pa mi 'gul te/ de'i mu mtshan yang / lhan cig la ltos te/ dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas brji thu na gyi ud 'khor la snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ srung don rtogs pa'i ldog cha nas bstan pa dang / gsang dbang ba bla bas sno rung du byas nas/ dbang

314b4(rnying rgyud): swA khab las/ chung kyi sbyin gnyis las thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng bslang phyo gsang pa'i dbang smyon pa'i phyir ro// zhes dang / pa~Mr mAn+dani don dam pa zang chub kyi sems te/ sams lnga'i tham da cig zab cadrug pa'i byang chub sems mthas ma gu pa nims
314b5(rnying rgyud): nanA theg pa chen po ste khyad 'di'o// zhes dang / mngon togs las kyang / ston pa yab yum gyis gleng bsnang ba ni dbang bsku zhing byud bshad pa'i phyir/ zhes so// go b+h+rUM ba la ltos te/ dbang bsgyur bas nyon 'khor khyad zad du gyur nas/ gzhan don du na kyi
314b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyobs pa skyes te bstan pa 'byung ba'i rkyen dugyur pas na dbang gas ma ka k+She bskad du dkar bya'i phyi nyes pa shes pa med do// de'ang rdza ma las/ 'khor gyis rtogs nas gling bslang ba ni gro tha ba rnams kyi ched do// zhes so// des na steng bslang ba/ dbang bang
314b7(rnying rgyud): sru dag pa gsum tha gcig pa'i phyir/ sngon bung san cig pa la chud mer gcigazugs pa yin no// de skar lhan cig pa la dbang bskur bas shes bya'i sgrib pa cham mod ga/ rang bzhin gsang nga'i steng ba'i rim pong du myed pa kyi la zhes
315a1(rnying rgyud): nyid du sangs rgyas pa ni/ gsumyab sabyu hrI nang zas rnas sa sa da/ bya zhen/ mam sngags/ la rnamag par chugasu bad ba dang / dbang sung nang skang bu shadang dang / sleb pa gnams
315a2(rnying rgyud): pa ste/ lhan cig pa rnams sku lnga bor sangs rgyas pas ston 'kho dgongs pa gcig tu gyur ba dgo bye ba'i snod yul du masbar ba'i snying gsang ba'o// de dar / skyes ma skyes dbyer med chos kyi bu dang / 'gags me 'gag gnyis med mngon byangag lnga dang / gnas
315a3(rnying rgyud): banas gnyis ma mongs tu dang / demigs med migasu gnyis me dode'i rgyud du/ bzo'o med pa las de ba skyed myed rdul bu sems babyed pa 'o// sa pa pa de gro pa'i yon ta ston khong yang med dang gyu pa la mthus par/
315a4(rnying rgyud): dag sang khog gzhung lus// 'gro ba chags can srang med la// longs nyid rdzogs rba btsun mo dang // gnyis med ro la sogs bstan ste// mthun pas mthun pa sgos phyir ro// gas so// gnyis pa la dang / go don dang / gtan la dbab pa gnyis/ dang po
315a5(rnying rgyud): lhan theg pa rnams rang don du sangs rgyas pa'i phyir rgyud bu mi dgos kyang / gzhan don du go bye ba'i 'khor gsang ba pa ni mchod pa rnams kyi ched du kung bshad par zhus pas/ ston pa'i thugs sa nyid ces pa'i tshul drug gi sgo nas chud bshad cing / 'di nyid rtogs
315a6(rnying rgyud): bya nal bA mi snyan pa rnams la byam stegs kyi thig pa gnan ston pa'i kyi thang pa drug pa'i rjes stobs mchis mkhyab pa tho ba zhal gyi'i bzhes padi ba myong gi grang na te/ nyid pas/ mo she bye do dang 'khor// ba dang blang nas da

316a1(rnying rgyud): chad kyis skye dang khyad par gyi ma gyen rdzogs nas/ ga nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brdzu dang // zhus pa man chad khya byed dang bcud gus rgyud kyi dbus pa bstan par bzhadade/ spang 'ang las/
316a2(rnying rgyud): de yan chad du rgyud kyi rgya rkyen tshang nas/ gsum pa'i dang po lta ba bstan pa'i phyir/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa gsungs te// ces so// slob dpon chen po bai ma las ni le'u gnyis pa'i yab yum gyi gleng bslang bas kyi bye rdzogs nas/
316a3(rnying rgyud): nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos/ zhes pa man chad kyis chung dron bstan par bzhed de/ 'brel chung las/ de rus rgyal mchog rdzogs sangs cas// btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med// rnam gnyes gang don zhugs rnyed de/
316a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par bshad pa mdzad// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rtog spyod rnam pa nyi shu yis// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa// thog mar 'gro ba'i lam mchog yin// zhes so// rong po mchen
316a5(rnying rgyud): le'u dang por gleng gzhi/ gnyis pa dkun bzang yab yum gyi khring bsrang dang de martogs pa'i 'gro ba la byang chub kyi sems gnyis bskyed pa/ gsum par de'i byin rlabs thub drag smos te 'dul ba bzhes 'gro don mdzod tshul bstan nas/ le'u bzhi pa ma cha
316a6(rnying rgyud): rgyud kyi dngos po bstan par bzhed do// 'o na 'dir gang gzhag snyam na/ lpags de gsum ka gang ltar bshad kyang 'gal bar ma mthong zhing 'chad bde mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dir bka' sde zur pa'i bshad srol gyi man ngag dbang btsun du byas te/ re zhig bzhed pa dang pa
316a7(rnying rgyud): rjes su 'brangs te sla'o// gnyis pa la/ le'u rnams kyi bas kyi bsrub spying bstan/ rgyud don gyi dngos po so so'i bslab bye brag tu bshad pa'o// dang po ni/ snga ma'i lung gi 'phros las/ byang chub mchog ldan rnal 'byor des// chos kun nges don

316b6(rnying rgyud): bya nyin du sbyar ro// gnyis pa la/ zhe n+do bye brag gi chos bstan pa'i le'u'i tsho ma dang / nyi cag chud kyi dngos po bcu ltar ston pa'i bsdu ba'o/ 1 ni shrI ga dang po ni// lci bston pa'i le'u dgra// khro bstan pa'i le'u lnga// thun mong du ston pa'i le'u brgyad

321b1(rnying rgyud): skyon med do// gnyis pa ni/ de tsam du snang bas mun pa sel ba'i tshe mun pa dag pa'i shul du snang ba kye 'am/ ma dag pa la skye/ dang po ltar na/ de'i tshe mun pa mi gnas pa'i phyir/ snang ba skyes pa don med du thal lo// gnyis pa ltar na/ de la rgo 'dun
321b2(rnying rgyud): mtshungs pa'i phyir/ mngon gyur gyi dngos po gcig la bsgribs ma bsgribs cha gnyis dus gcig la ldan par thal lo zhes pasgre'o// mdor na/ 'khor 'das gnyis kyi rang mtshan la mi 'jal gyi/ 'khor ba gyi nang snod bcu dang zhen pa dang / myang 'das nyid
321b3(rnying rgyud): shes su zhen pa'i zhen byed kyi blo nyid gzhal bya ste/ rnam bkod pas/ nges par bzhag pa'i gzhal bya ni// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// rang gi mtshan nyid mi 'dod de// de ltar nang na zhen pa yis// phyi rol med la yod ltar snang // gzhan du /
321b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis la brten// zhes so// de'ang zhen sdang gnyis re re nas gzhal tha ma yin te/ 'das par snang yang 'khor bar bzhen pa'i sna zhin gyi tshogs pa de nyid min pa'i phyir/ depes na snang zhen rgyang pa chos can du bzung ngo // de la kha cig na re/ zhen du seMrnam
321b5(rnying rgyud): gtan tshigs kyis gzhal mi dgos te de grub zin pa'i phyir zer na/ khyab pa med de/ zhe na sdang grub kyang de chos nyid du ma nges pas gzhal dgos pa yin na// de lta na dang zhe na sdang gtan la phab pas chos nyid gtan la mi phebs te/ tha dad pa'i phyir/ mig/
321b6(rnying rgyud): gis gzugs gtan la phab pas sgra gtan la mi phebs pa bzhin zhe na/ gzugs dang sku lta bu tha dad 'brel med du mgrub ste/ zhen snang dang chos nyid chos can dang chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/ zhen sdang gtan la phab pas chos nyid phebs par 'gyur te/ sbrul/
321b7(rnying rgyud): 'khrul gyi shes pa la dpyad pas theg par rtogs pa bzhin no// gnyis pa ni/ de ltar na zhen sdang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir gzhal gyis me lang bar 'gyur ro zhe na/ de dag re ren gzhal mi dgas te/ zhen snang gcig chos nyid du gtan la phab pas
322a1(rnying rgyud): gtan la phabs par 'gyur te/ zhen snang kun rigs 'dra ba'i phyir/ dper na 'dam bu ga cig khrog stong na kun kyang khog stong pa bzhin na// de ska nga'ang / yum las/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes na chos thams cad kyi mang dang
322a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa shes par 'gyur ro// zhes dang / lam ri ma las/ dngos gnyis zhen dngas dus gsum chos// skad cig gcig la kun rdzogs phyir// de dngos mthong bas yang dag par// rig bzhin kun kyang de ltar shes// zhes so// bzhi pa rtsod srung
322a3(rnying rgyud): bas na 'dir ma 'khrul pa'i shes rab tu khas bla dang // de la kha na re/ ma 'khrul pa'i phyir/ 'bad med da grol bar thal zer na/ ma 'khrul yang mi gro lan gyi s+ho ste/ dbang po'i mngon sum bzhin no// yang / zhan snang yal du bas te 'dal mkhan
322a4(rnying rgyud): gyi so sor rtog pa'i shes rab de chos can/ 'khrul shes su thal/ kun brtags rdzun pa de nyid yul du byed pa'i phyir/ dung ser 'dzin bzhin na zhe na/ brtag par bya ste/ rang chung pa yul du byas pa'i phyir zer ram/ rang bzhin med bsgrub kyi gzhir yul du
322a5(rnying rgyud): thus pa'i thar zhen/ dang po'i nags khas mablangs shing / gnyis pa ltar na rdzab pa ma grub ste/ gzhal ba zhing seMsar rtag shes kyi rdzas skang cig gnyis pa la me dmigs pa'i shes rab du gnas 'gyur te/ chu 'azas yin pa'i phyir ro// de rang ba mal
322a6(rnying rgyud): shes rab spyan 'gyed las/ gnyis kying ba skabs 'jug kyang // nu 'bras yin phyer cig shos la// zhes so// gnyis pa 'angal byed gtan tshogs la/ go don dang / gtan la dbab pa'o// dang po na/ bsrub bya'i ngan shes par byed pa'i thabs cang
322b1(rnying rgyud): gzhim bgad nas dgag sgrub gnyis su byed pa las canate/ lam dam las/ dmar gtan tshigs las la brjod// ces dang / gtan pags gtan rdzogs bad pa rnams// bsgru ba zlagang yin shes dan la// ngas kyi gang ba macan nyid dgas// dang
322b2(rnying rgyud): nas 'bebs kyang rgyas par byas// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ de las/ de nyid dngos lnga tshul dang tshig/ ces pas/ gsum ste/ sngon byung dngos lnga'i gtan tshigs dang / rjes 'jug tshul lnga dang / tshig lnga'i gtan tshigs so// dang po ni/ sngon byung
322b3(rnying rgyud): sten pa skra lngas rang rang gi 'khor lnga la gsung lnga'i sgo nas chos nyid kyi don dngas su gtan la phab parje ngas lnga'i gtan tshigs te/ de nyid las/ yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas ston pa// gru lngas 'dul ba'i 'khor rnams la// gsang lnga bstan pa de kho na// ga
322b4(rnying rgyud): la 'bebs shing 'angal byed pa'o// zhes so// de'ang ston pa chos kyi sgras 'khor ye shes rgya mtsho la skye med don gyi gsung gis/ longs sgras smin pa rgya mtsho la dgongs pa brda'i gsung gis/ sbrub sgras mos pa rgya mtsho la brjod pa tshig gi gsung gis/
322b5(rnying rgyud): rdo'i skus dbyer med rdo rje'i 'khor la rdo rje'i gsung gis/ mngon byang gis chal ba rgya mtsho la rig pa byin rlabs kyi gsung gis dngos su brda' sprod pa'o/ de'ang snga ma las/ gser bcad brdar ba'i gser bzhin du// dngos lngas legs par banags te dpag
322b6(rnying rgyud): zhes so// 'dir kha cig na re// sngon byung dra sgra lnga'i 'khor la gzhal bya zhen sdang yod dam med/ gnyis pa ltar na 'jal thed gtan tshigs don med du thal/ gzhal bya med pa'i phyir/ rdzas med pa'i srang bzhin no// dang po ltar na/ mi rigs te/ ston pa sa
322b7(rnying rgyud): wa'i 'khar byad pa ne mthang nga ma yan chad kyi kyang rgyal yin la/ mthalam la zhan dag pas zab ste/ mthang la mad pa zhen sdang dngas 'gal yin pa'i phyir zer/ de'i lan la/ snga rabs pa rnams/ sbal su'i lakhar la ni zhen snang 'byung du rung /
323a1(rnying rgyud): gdul bu dag mdag gnyis ka 'dan mdzad par phyir ro// sra bzhi'i 'khor la zhen snang med de/ rjes thob tu'ang yul rnams sku ma lta bur gzigs par phyir ro// de san dngas ldan rjes 'jug rtogs pa'i gtan chags srab byed kyi yan
323a2(rnying rgyud): lag yin gyi/ rngon byung nyid la ltos nas gtan tshigs ma yin no gsungs/ la la dag/ sku bzhi'i 'khar la 'di zhen snang phrab ci rigs yod de/ gal te med ni skra bzhi'i 'khor bya don med de// zhes bzhed/ rang lugs ni/ phyi ma ltar khas
323a3(rnying rgyud): grangs na 'thad dam mA ma he/ de'i rgyu mtshan kyang / zhen lhung gi go ba ni/ chos nyid kyi don la blo'i thams bzang ngan du sgra 'degs pa nyid yin la/ de las/ ngan rtog zla rags gnyis mthong ba sgom gyis spang zhing / gnyen po la kun tu brtan pa'i bzang rtog
323a4(rnying rgyud): gam/ shes bya'i sgrib pa shin tu phra ba ni mthar lam na'ang yod pa'i phyir te/ da dung mnyam par bzhag 'jog dgos pa'i phyir dang / gnyen po rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis gzhom bya dgos pa'i phyir/ de ltar yang / lamar ma las/ bag la nyal ba 'joms
323a5(rnying rgyud): byed cing // zhes pas gsal lo// gnyis pa ni/ dbang rnon yang rab mchog tu gyur pa rnams la sdang grags 'di dag gis mtshon nas/ sngon byung ngu dngas lngas gtan la phab pa'i sku lnga'i gsung gi tshul du ni zlab byed pa ni tshul lta'i gtan tshigs te/ de nyid las
323a6(rnying rgyud): rtogs dang ldan pa'i blo rnams la// dngos po sna tshogs sems gsang sngags// des lung yin phyer chos tshul ston// brjod dang 'dra ba dbarda' sbring pas// ngo bo nyid kyis bshad pa'i phyir// ma 'angs don du gtan tshogs nges// zhes so// de yang na pa
323a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas / langs skye/ mngon pang/ dadzo'i/ sprul ba'i blarnams kyi gsung dang tshul mthun pa'i gtan cigs ni ri ma zhin du/ ma na cigatan tshogs kyim mtshan pa nam mkha dang / dgangs pa bad btang chags srab par #
323b1(rnying rgyud): me long ga gzugs brnyan sta ba dang / rang rig mngan gas la mi gtan tshigs rtog med rang gas la nyi ma snying po lta bu dang / dbyed med rdo rje'i gtun tshigs grag stong dbyer mad bug chalta / ba dang / brdad pa rtag ga gtan chags bran yang drag pa cings dbyangs/ dru/
323b2(rnying rgyud): gsam pa ni/ sngar kyi tshul sa nyid chag tu dngas su brjod pa ni chog lnga'i gtan chags so// de yang / chos sku'i chog ni skye med rang snang du sbyin pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams so// de bzhinang / longs sgra'i ldem dgo bar da'i// sbrul grwa'i bzla drang brdung pa'i/ dza rje'i
323b3(rnying rgyud): dbyer med rde rnga'i/ mngon byang g.ye shes rang snang du ston pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams te/ lam rim las/ ngo bo snang tshog rang snang tsheg lde ma dgongs tshig dang bgri dang chog/ 'dod chen chog dang rdo rje'i cho ga/ rang rig mngon gas pa chog gis mtshon// zhes so//
323b4(rnying rgyud): ba na 'dir gsung bdun byung bas gsung ltar ji lngar 'gyur zhe na/ 'ga' zhig ngo bo rang snang chos sku'i gsung du bsdu na'ang / 'dir snar ston ltar gnyis ka brda'i gsung du bsdu ba legs so// de rnams kyang bsdu na/ dpyad du med pas ga ba dang / yod pas
323b5(rnying rgyud): go ba'o// dang po ni/ sku bzhi'i gtan tshigs te/ brtag dpung la ma ltos par donag pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni/ sbrul sku'i gtan tshigs te/ brtag dpyad la brten nas don go dgos pa'i phyir ro// de skad du'ang la ma rim las/ de ltar mod kyang bstan
323b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis// bzhi rjes mi dpyid gcig rjes byed// ces so// de gnyis kyi byed par ni/ dbang rngon la lkog tu mgyur pa'i dran brtag dpyad la ma ltos par car phag tu ston pa ni dpyad du med pa dang / dbang brtul la brtag dpyad la brten te don brgyad nas
323b7(rnying rgyud): ston pa ni dpyad du yod pa'i gtan tshigs so// dang po ni/ dper na gser blta 'dod pa'i mi la gser dngos su bstan pa bzhin te/ lam ri ma las/ de bas gser blta gser bzhin du// bdag phyir bya byed ma dmigs pas// tog dpyod dmigs 'dzinam
