324b1(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ zhes so// yig 'bru'i tshul ni sems nyid kye med kyi gdangs chos can/ ral pa 'gag med lha'i sku gsung thugs su rang snang ba yin te/
324b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan byed yi ges mtshon nas rtogs pa'i phyir// mdzub mos zla ba bzhin no// de yang rgya mtsho bas/ sku gsung thugs su sdang ba yi// ma lus gsung gi rgyun du rtogs// thams cad gsung gi yi ga ste// thabs dang ldan pas rgyas gdab 'o// zhes
324b3(rnying rgyud): so// gang du yi ges mtshon nas don rtogs pa de yig 'bru'i tshul gyis rtogs pa yin te/ 'di pas/ yi ge sgra btags ming tshogs la// brtan pa'i chog gis rab mtshon te// khong nas gab sras don 'byin pa// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir
324b4(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ snang stong gnyis po de chos can/ dbyer med yin te/ de gnyis dngos su rtogs pa'i mthus bden pa dbyer med du ye nas sangs rgyas par rtogs pa'i byin rlabs shug la 'byung ba'i phyir/ dper na ras dkar po dmar por
324b5(rnying rgyud): bsgyur ba'i nus pa btsod la yod pa bzhin no// de yang rgya mtsho las/ de nyid dbyer med kyi na rlabs las// de nyid de yi byin rlabs te// gnyis med tshul gyis rang sdang ba// gyen rlabs ngo mtshar bsam mi khyab// zhes dang / rngam glog las
324b6(rnying rgyud): kyang / skye med dbyings kyi byin rlabs las// chos kun snang bar shes pa dang // de lta bu yi rang bzhin te// zhes so// mngon sum pa ni/ bden pa dbyer med chos can/ blo'i spyod yul las 'das pa yin te/ chung dag pas dbyer med spyod yul
324b7(rnying rgyud): dang bral ba'i gnas lugs mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'i phyir/ dper na mig dag pas dung dkar por mngon sum gyi mthong ba nyid dung gi kha dog gi gnas lugs yin pa bzhin no// de yang rgya mtsho las/ rang byung dang snang chos 'di dag/ gnyis med
325a1(rnying rgyud): ngang rig ma myos par// gsal bar ma na mamachod// rtogs pa tsun gyi mchog tu bshad// ces dang / dza ma klog las/ gzhan la me / na ma 'phrul bar// mnganas mdog pas rbag tshad na// rnal 'byong sa la gleng pa
325a2(rnying rgyud): yin// zhes dang / lha 'bring las kyang / chos thams cad yenas sangs rgyas par gnas pa de yang / lung dang man ngag dang 'bral ba yang ma yin la/ wad dang man dag gi chog tsa ma la brten pa'ang ma yin par rang ga rig pas blo'i gting du yang rgyas
325a3(rnying rgyud): pas mngon sa ma du rtogs pa'o// zhes so// snying mngon snyam la/ dbang po/ yid/ rgal 'byor/ rang byeg bzhi pas/ 'dir ni blta bya'i tshul dang byed kyi shes pa gnyis su med par rang gsal bar rtogs pas rang rig mngon sngam sa// 'di dag
325a4(rnying rgyud): snga ma'i bsgrub bya phyi ma'i gzhal byang byas na ni rim gyis pa'i rtogapa tshul te/ cig char ba'i dbang du byas na/ chos thams cad don bden pa dpyir med du gcig pa de/ mtshon byed yi ge 'thugasum gyis mngon nas/ de'i byin rlabs kyi mthus/ mngon
325a5(rnying rgyud): sum par rtogs pa'o// gnyis pa dag pa gsuma'i gtan tshigs ni/ 'di ltar snang ba gyi nang gi chos rnams chos can/ ye nas sgra dang ye shes kyi ngo bor sangs rgyas pa yin te/ dag pa gsus dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// gsum ni/ sdod 'byung ba lnga yul
325a6(rnying rgyud): ra/ bzung chung lnga yab lngar/ rgyud rnam shes tshogs brkyang ye shes lngar dag pa ste/ 'di nyid las/ sdod bcung chud rnams dag togs shing / zhes dang / bdag dang gzhan du 'jog pa'i rgyan// rnam dag na med theg pa'i mchog/ rdzas /
325a7(rnying rgyud): yon dag pa la grib pa mtha dag mi gnas pas khyab cing / de nyid chung ba'i shi kying bong sangs rgyas pas kyi phre zhin na// de ga bya / thams cid mchogs stong byer// gzhan pa kya sa
325b1(rnying rgyud): na dug nga u du nga/ gnas pa na ma na gas nga gas sa gdos 'du/ 'dus byas ga gas sa da
325b2(rnying rgyud): gsus pa/ mnyam pa bzhi'i gtan rdzogs ni/ 'di ltar spang ba'i chos rnams chos can/ lhag pa zlos kyi skur ye nas sangs rgyas pa yain te/ mnyam pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i b+hair/ bzhin/ rnam grangs dang rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam
325b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka ste med dang / yang log gi kun rdzob gnyis ka sgra ma mnyam pa ni thun mong gi mnyam pa gnyis so// lhag pa'i mnyam pa gnyis ni/ med dgag dang ma yin dgagi gi stong nyid gnyis ka dran da ma kor bad+man zlos kyi spa dang / ma dang / pa
325b4(rnying rgyud): nga na gyi'i sa pa sa da
325b5(rnying rgyud): nyid chen po'i gtAn tshogs ni/ 'khor 'das kyi chos rnams chos can/ snang lugs tu mar sdang yang yin lugs nas gzhal nas de ltar ma yin te/ sems nyid rgyo med rang byung gi ye shes chen po gcig gi bdag nyid du le nas gnas pa'i phyir/
325b6(rnying rgyud): dper na sa mas kyi ba rgyas las ma ma'i dgas brgyad shes pa bzhin do// de zhing du'ang rnam bkod pas// bdag nyid ldan po'i rkyen chog gis ji lteng gzhal rgya 'dir brjod pa// ga baN+Da 'bras pa dag gzha
325b7(rnying rgyud): dra ba 'du dang // rang bzhin med pa'i rnam shes nyid// rang byung la shes gnas med drung / zhes dang / dpang na 'jig rten ma 'dag/ phams po nus pa shad kyis n-i// rigs brgyad gcig gis gcig shes kyang // chos bad
326a1(rnying rgyud): sbal byas na// gser bas tha dad dbyibs snang ltar// rang rig cir yang sdang phyir gzhi// zhes dang / shes rab spyan 'byed las kyang / dngos po lo rgyas gtan tshigs kyis// bdag nyid chen po smos ci dgos/
326a2(rnying rgyud): zhes so// 'dir skabs 'gros kyi rtsod spang ni/ gzhal bya zhe na sdang gcig la gtan tshigs kyi sgo bzhi po des dus gcig tu 'jal lam/ re mos 'jal/ dang po ltar na shes rgyud gcig la rtog pa bzhi dus gcig tu skye bar thal/ 'jal
326a3(rnying rgyud): byed blo rdzas gsum gyis dus gcig tu 'jal ba'i phyir/ 'dod mi nus te/ 'gro la shes rgyud gnyis mi 'chang // zhes dang / rnam 'grel las/ rtog gnyis cig char 'jug pa med// ces pas gnod do// gnyis pa ltar na/ gtan tshigs
326a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi po zlos par 'gyur te/ gzhal bya gcig la 'jal byed gsum gyis ri mos su 'jal ba'i phyir zhe na/ lan du nyid rdeka pa/ de ltar dus gcig tu re mos su 'jal na bden mod kyi/ 'dir de gnyis gang yang ba yin te/ bsrub bya ba srub 'dod
326a5(rnying rgyud): la rag las pa yin no// zhes gsung ba legs par mngon te/ yongs gcod du bsrub bya lhag pa bden pa dbyer med kyi lta ba'i rang mtshan rtogs par 'dod pas rtogs pa'i gtan tshigs dang / gzhi nyi nga dbyung gi ye shes gcig tu rtogs par
326a6(rnying rgyud): 'dod pus bdag nyid chen po'i gtan tshogs dang / rnam brjid du dgag bya 'og mabs dag ma dag gnyis su blta ba'i lhogs 'dzin gyi log rtog dag par 'dod pas dag pa'i gta tshogs dang / dgag bsrung gnyis dang bral bar 'dod pas mnyam pa'i
326a7(rnying rgyud): gtan tshigs kyis 'jal ba'i phyir/ de'ang dang po ni/ de byung gi 'brel pa nges pa la brten nas bsgrub bya rtogs pa yin la/ gyi ma gsum ni ngo bo dbyer med kyi 'brel pa yang rten na rtogs pa yin no// gnyis pa sgra mthunadon grags la'ang /
326b1(rnying rgyud): go don dang / gtan la dbab pa gnyis/ dang po ni/ chog mdo sngags thun mong du grags shing / don 'di nyid ltar gtan la 'bebs pa'o// gnyis pa la/ rang dang skye'o/ mthu' dang thal ba'o/ rnamo par dbye ba'i/ mtshon pa dpe'i gtan
326b2(rnying rgyud): tshotshigs dang bzhi/ dang po ni/ mtshan nyid kyi theg pa pa rnams nyon mongs pa spyi'i mtshan nyid ni sems rab tu ma zhi ba'i rnam pa'o// rang mtshan ni/ gti mug ni sems kun nas blun zhing grags pa/ zhe srung kun nas ma nur sems/ ngargyal
326b3(rnying rgyud): nas khengs pa/ 'dod chags kun nas zhen cing sred pa/ phrag dog gzhan gyi phun tshogs mi bzod pa ste/ de'ang rang lci'i mtshan nyid phye nas 'khor ba'i lam du brtags te spong spyod byed par 'dod do// 'dir nyon mongs pa spyi'i mtshan nyid rig pa smos
326b4(rnying rgyud): bral dang / rang mtshan rig pa sgyu ma'i rtsal ma 'gags par snang bar 'dod pas/ de rtogs pa las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu bslab bya med pa'i phyir/ sgra mthun yang don sngags pa ste/ gyes pa las/ nyon mongs rang dang lci bstan pa// mtshan nyid
326b5(rnying rgyud): ma nor don rtogs na// rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur/ zhes so// de gtan tshigs kyis bsrub na/ dug lnga chos can/ yang dag par ma grub ste/ rang rang gi ngo bos stong pa'i phyir/ dper nA thag khra sbal du sdang yang gshes la phul ma grub pa bzhin
326b6(rnying rgyud): no// de ltar yang rnam bkod las/ la pa rang rig thabs chen du// ma 'gags snang ba rang mtshan te// dngos kun rnam par byung ba yi// mtshan nyid yin te spyi ru ston// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ snang ba phyi nang gi chos thams cad chos can// spros
326b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtha' dang de la ltos pa'i dbus sogs cir yang ma dmigs pa ste/ yang dag par gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir/ 'di nyid las/ gcig dang du ma bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te/
327a1(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes gnas med sbyang // zhes dang // lamar ma las/ mtha' dang dbus med da ma bral// gang yang ma yi nang bzhin nyid// dbyur med pa yi tshul rtogs phyur// mdzang dang bral ba'ang bdan ro//
327a2(rnying rgyud): so// de'ang rgyu'i theg pas rnam bcad bkag nas yod gcod smos bral du bsgrub pa dang sgra mthun kyang / 'dir dgag bya'i spang ba de ma spangs shing mthar zhen pa la ma reg pas don spags pa ste/ 'di nyid las/ yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing
327a3(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul// zhes dang / rnam bkod las/ phyogs 'dzin lta ngan dgrol phyir dang // mtha' bral 'dod pa 'dir gzhug phyir// mtha' dang bral zhes brjod mod kyi// mtha' kun rang rig rang snang phyir// 'di la za pa dang mthal
327a4(rnying rgyud): dang / grol dang ma grol phyogs zhen med// ces so// gsum pa ni/ bum pa chos can/ rang bzhin du nges pa ma yin te/ dbyibs dang kha dog sogs chos du ma dang ldan pas phyi yul gyi rnam pa rnams gcig tu ma grub pa'i phyir/ gzhu'i rgya tshogs
327a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin no// de ltar yang rgyas pa las// 'byung ba chen po lnga rnams la// rang bzhin med par gzhig bya'i phyir// gcig la'ang lnga lngar dbye bya zhing // mAM gyi dbyings su bstim par bya// muM nyid spabasam yul las 'das// zhes so// de la thun tho
327a6(rnying rgyud): pa dag / 'byung chen lngar re'ang lnga lngar phye nas tha dad du gtan la phab ste rags snang gzhig par byed pas sgra mthun kyang / 'dir mtshon byed yi ge hUM gyis mtshon gyi chos kyi dbyings su gcig par 'bebs pas 'phags pa ste/ rnam bkod las/ sdang ba'i
327a7(rnying rgyud): dngos po rnam bshigs na// so so'i mtshan nyid dngos med pa// gzhi ba na nam mkha'i ngang du zhe// nam mkha' de nyid lngas bshigs na// mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su thim// 'di la mos pa gzhug phyir dang // gser chen nang
327b1(rnying rgyud): dngos pan byang 'dal// rnam par dbya bas gzhan nas min// thos so// bzhipa ni/ chos can 'ga' zhig thongs su gtan pa lab pas yid mthos na/ dbyes mtshan nas gtan pa dbang pa rjo so/ sems nyid chos cad/ tshar ba
327b2(rnying rgyud): da do/ gzung dri nang pa'i byed/ rnam sa pa'ang nan/ daltar yang lamar malas/ rnam mkhar gzung du med pa gyud// ni srid thams ca byedang 'dra// zhes so// de 'dithun meng ba dag/ dbengon pa dang 'dod pa / 'di
327b3(rnying rgyud): chos nyid drugacig pa'i phyir dbyer med du madz+nyAn pa su mthu kyang don gas te/ rnam bgad las/ snang bar ngagyu med pa'i byed// rang ga dang srung snod pa la med// bcul de lta 'byor ba ces// zhes so// kyi gdo ma mdun pa
327b4(rnying rgyud): 'gado dang / gtanas dab pa'o// sabasgru kyi ngan ngag tan chags kyi cho ga dang snang pa'i gas bstan pa ci gdon mi mthun pa ga ta gas sa/ gnyis pa ni/ shes
327b5(rnying rgyud): chos can/ yang dag pa phyir yang ga thabs kyi yang pa yin to/ ska rdza la 'grags pa dang snang bus ci yang yin pa'i phyir/ rtags tshad ma thob te/ de ltung brtags dang bsam pa ltar 'drar bas rjes su gyi dang snang
327b6(rnying rgyud): sung sa sna ma las/ dri mngon ci yang len pa'i phyir// sems chos ci yang ma yin no// dephyir me yi kun yin pas// ze yang yin no ldan ces grub// shes so// de ltar bstan pa'i dgos pa yang // yin min tha dad du 'dod pa'i zhen
327b7(rnying rgyud): nags par byab yi te/ de nyid las/ chos kun mtha' las 'das pa la// mtha' rda mag yang dor med pas// 'di ltar 'di'o zhes bstan pod// rang gang po bstan par dka'// 'on kyang yin ming 'dzin krol gyi// rnam // ga ma
328a1(rnying rgyud): du / // dag / na/
328a2(rnying rgyud): lhag pa'i rnam gnyis dbur med do// / ming bdus cid yang kun nga/ don zla bsam sul las dus// zhes so// / drim med pa'i shes rabag gyis yang rid la sogs pa'i tshe tha sa sa par ma ga pa las
328a3(rnying rgyud): btsal bar bya ste/ lama'i mams/ yang las 'tshal nam btags te/ ma nas / #// zla bdus gang s+ya na/ mi ma sa las #
328a4(rnying rgyud): na/ de nyid krung du ma bstan 'gyur// zhes dang / 'di nyid las/ sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs nyas te// sangs mas pazhan du ma tshal zhig/ rngu ba dang / rnam pagong las kyang / gzhan dung tshal zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis// bstan kyang
328a5(rnying rgyud): zas mtshon kyang ma mdzang pas// bdag dang gzhan du 'tshal byas 'tshang miH// zhes so// gsum pa na/ zab pa'i mtha' nga ba gnas lugs shing rang gi mchod cid du rtogs nas rig pa yul med dgasal bab+ha/ lam rim lngas/ !mar+tha ma pa ga
328a6(rnying rgyud): brnyan sdur// na na meng la byung min byar// rang ga mngonas mya dmigs thal ba// rang gas la gas sa thul sa bskal par// rnam pa gang yang rnas pa// thos pa'am brten pa'i wA na rjen// rnams// ban pa nga /
328a7(rnying rgyud): bcas su chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mthong ngam mi mthong / dang po sar na/ zag med du thal/ rang mtshan mngon du byas pa'i phyir// rma dbang bzhin no// 'dod na/ zag bcas nyams shing mngon 'grus las/ de dag zag bcas
328b1(rnying rgyud): bsam gtan te// gnyis med yul pAl de mthong min// zhes so// gnyis pa ltar na/ dga' rab kyi pa shan pas/ sgo min rang gi mtshan nyid d+ha// rang rig mngon sum gsal dus na// rang snang mtha' bral ldan las grol// zhes dang /
328b2(rnying rgyud): sgra rten yid la byed min par// zhes rang gi mtshan nyid mthong bar bshad pa dang 'gal lo zhe na/ 'di'i lan du/ dgag/ bzhag srang gsum/ dang po ni/ snga rabs pa kha cig na re/ lta ba rang gi mtshan nyid ni/ zag bcas su lta ci smos/ zag med
328b3(rnying rgyud): kyi lam gsum du'ang mi mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kho na'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dgongs 'dus las/ chos 'di zab ste mthong ba dga'// rtogs par yang ni ma yin te// mthar phyin pa la gnas pa yi// skyes bus kyang ni mthong ba min// zhes
328b4(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas so zer/ de ltar na/ zag med kyi lam gsum kyang zag bcas su thal bas mi 'thad de/ gang du chos nyid rang mtshan ma mthong ba la nyon sgrib ma spangs pas khyab cing / de'i las kyis kun nas bslang ste khams gsum du zag cing 'pho ba'i phyir
328b5(rnying rgyud): ro// 'dod mi nus te/ lam rim las/ zag kun zad pa'i rigs chen ni// ji ltar spyad kyang ldog pa med// ces pas gnod cing / dgongs 'dus kyi lung don kyang / bla ma bde gshegs chen po'i bzhed pa ltar/ dus bzhi mnyam sbyor du ma
328b6(rnying rgyud): gyur pa la dgongs pa yin gyi/ chos nyid rang mtshan ma mthong ba la dgongs pa ma yin no// yang mkhas pa sngar ston na re/ zag bcas su chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid mthong ba 'thad de/ de lta ma yin na/ mngon sum pa'i gtan tshogs don med par 'gyur
328b7(rnying rgyud): ra// 'on kyang bsgom pas nus pa bogs su 'gro ba'i phyir/ nus pa rab rtogs pa ma yin te/ shing lnga'i ma bzhin no// gsungs pa'ang 'thang par ma mthong ste/ lta ba zag bcas dang chos nyid rang mtshan gnyis mngon par 'gal chos gnas par
329a1(rnying rgyud): byer dang / thun mong gi lung las kyang / mamathong mtha~Mng phyir mthong ba'olam/ khas pas gnod drug pa mas ma ma pa 'byor / ma tshangs na nags nga 'ang dam// dal rtso mo dang / logs nga
329a2(rnying rgyud): mal te/ 'du bag cing ma 'i gas kya/ rnams sa sa rnyan pa dang/ gas pa dag sa zad pa yang na padas

329a4(rnying rgyud): nyis dang mtshan // 'go mabyung ga nyis mad paza ma thab// sa sa ma phyi ba papa'ang / ston parabar 'du dbya/ ma nas pags nim mang pa grang pa yod pa go// su gnyis bzod pa sang ba pa
329a5(rnying rgyud): yang ma dang nag na na/ cho nyid dang mtshan dgag rdzas su ba gas ngongs pa dang / zas me du ra'i 'byor mngon su mams // pa yang sa/ sa ga rdzog pa sa/ ste/
329a6(rnying rgyud): pa mthang byin lam// mthong ba'i rjes la mya ngab 'das// zhes rdzo sang gis chos nyid nga cig mngon su mchis mthong bar ba shan pas gnod ngo // gnyis pa ni/ 'dir ngos lag su gnyis kyi rjes su 'bras te/ chos nyid rang gi mtshan nyid zas bcas su mi mthong
329a7(rnying rgyud): la/ zag med du mthong zin pa'i phyir/ zag pa zad pa dang chos nyid da patshan mthong brgyas gagapa 'dod // ca gyi drug pa rnas pa mi mthong zhe na/ bag pa la pa labye pasad/ nga mtshan mthong ba pa yin te/ na
329b1(rnying rgyud): brtags slong ba'i gnyen po mthong lam chen po chung la ma brten pa'i phyir/ thun mong gi sgor lam bzhin no// de ltar yang / de dag zag bcas bsam gtan te// gnyis mang yul thal de mthong min// zhes pasnga gsal lo// gsum pa na/ de ltar na rang
329b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan mthong bar bshad pa'i sngar gyi lung rnams kyis gnod do zhe na/ mi gnod de/ lta ba ni zag bcas kho nar rnam par bcad pa ma yin pa'i phyir/ sngar gyi lung don ltar 'ga' zhig tu rang mtshan mthong ba'ang mi 'gal te/ lam ri ma las/ lta ba lang
329b3(rnying rgyud): gtsor brjod mod// don du shes rab kun mnyam nyid// ded dpon rin chen ji bzhin du// gdod mtha'i bar du 'dis shes dgos// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ gzhan du na/ zag bcas bsam gtan gyis chos nyid kyi don mthong bar bshad pa'i lung phal che ba ni//
329b4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid lce'i rnam pa mthong ba la dgongs pa ste/ de yang zag bcas su zos pa'i sgra skyel brten nas bsam shes kyis chos nyid kyi'i rnam pa mthong bas lta don spyi rtogs te/ ting nge 'dzin la 'dris par bslabs pas zag med du bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis chos
329b5(rnying rgyud): nyid dang mtshan ngo bo bskyed du byar med par mthong la/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du phra ba'i sgrib pa rim gyis sbyangs te gsal ba'i khyad par bskyed du byas shing / mthar thug mkhyen pa'i ye shes dus bzhi mnyam sbyor bskyed du byar med pa mngon du gyur pa nyid de//
329b6(rnying rgyud): de nyid las/ 'on kyang sa dang sa yi rim// dbang po dang ba'i spyod yul la/ nye ring drang bzhin stobs 'phel bas// rgya chen gong 'og 'bras bur 'brel// gsal ba'i bye rgyan/ rim par 'gro// zhes so// de'i phyir dbyer med tshig tshod du rtogs par ma
329b7(rnying rgyud): nus pa la/ ye shes kun mkhyen lta ba dgu/ zhes lam dang sa'i spos gcod kyi lta ba so sor gsungs pa yin no// yang gsal ba'i bye brag rim par 'gro// zhes pa'i skabs su'ang / bzhed pa mi mthun pa 'di ltar mthong ste/ gtsang ba phyis
330a1(rnying rgyud): stonan/ gsal me gsal med de/ chos ngangag mtshan nyid yin pa'i byer/ gnas yun rang tha ma dang / lam gong ma gong mar bzod pa'i rdzas na pa pa slo bang thob thob san gagrangs/ rgyag bsangs na/ gsas mags
330a2(rnying rgyud): dang mun nga byang gnyis ka med de/ snga mni/ gsal ba'i the zlag ngem par 'gro// zhes pa mngon pa// bye bani/ kyai las/ skad cig dang / thang gdung / yungs mi nga / med pa dang / than bye dang / tha dang / zhes sogs gas 'dus
330a3(rnying rgyud): gsal lo gsungs/ grol g.yung rnam gnyis ni/ lbab 'angs nas gsal mi gsal dang / yun de dbang med la/ de dag yod pa'i lung rnams ni/ mthong don bsgom pa'o rkang 'dzin lags la mi gsal dang / yun dang thang yod pa'i lung yin no/
330a4(rnying rgyud): gsungs te/ dadung sgo ldan rnams kyis dpyang par bya'o// gzhan yang dbang rnon yang rab 'acig/ thos bsam gyi mthog nas/ dbyer med tshig tshang du rtogs te grol ba dgag mi rnam pa'i phyir/ bye brag tu zag bcas lta ba'i skabs sa mthong ba'ang yod/
330a5(rnying rgyud): dam skam na/ de nas byas ma gyi lta thog nas grol bas zag brjes sna chos nyid rang mtshan rtogs pa ltar snang yang ba yin te/ ni 'dra ga'i gang zag da ga grol dus gcin pa'i phy-i/ skad kyis dang mthong lam mngon dus dbya'ang dgag me nus sams
330a6(rnying rgyud): me hA 'o ni bzhin no// gsum pa rnam grangs rnam par ba dmigs bzung ba la/ mi grangs dang / don ga so// dang po la/ ting med ni/ tshogs bzang po 'di na gzugs car gyis phral tha dal sgra 'dzig su gcong du'i byar rnam sang sa yin
330a7(rnying rgyud): gsung zhi / rgyal ba gsang kyang / shes rab kyi chags nga chub da na dang / 'dir/ thags thag las/ dbang podrug gi ra yang yang // gan la mchog tu brjod pa na// shes rab thal yang byer ma pas// mngon sumags pa rdzogs pa
330b1(rnying rgyud): rang dag ye shes tshogs gcig bya// zhes pa'i rjes su 'brangs te/ nyang rtsig pa ltar rnam shes tshogs drug gi/ lta bar bshad na bde bar mngon no// de'ang / lam rim las/ shes dang spyod yul gnyis med pas// thams cad ma lus gcig pa'i dang // ma
330b2(rnying rgyud): 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal stong gzugs// lha dang blta bar byar med par// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong // gang du'ang ma mthong spyan gyi mchog/ khyab gsal rang bzhin go ba'i sgra// thos pa med par thos pa'i phul// dang bas tshems byed chos kyi
330b3(rnying rgyud): dride// snom byed med par tshor ba'i shangs// don bcud nyams su myong ba'i ro// myong ba'i bya byed med nyid myong // yang dag don la reg pa nyid// reg pa kun dngos reg dang bral// chos khams sna tshogs kun mkhyen pa// rang rig rgyal por rang sdang ba'o// zhes
330b4(rnying rgyud): pas so so dang / de bas bdag 'dzin rang gsal ba// bdag bcas bdag dang bral ba'i yid// don dang sems can rtog med gsal// rang byung ye shes thams cad mkhyen// zhes pa ni/ 'dir chos thams cad rang bzhin med par mthong tshul spyir bstan pa
330b5(rnying rgyud): la 'chad cing / gzhan du tshogs brgyad ltar na/ sh+lo ka phyed snga mas nyon yid dang // phyi mas kun gzhi'i lta ba'o zhes 'dod do// gnyis pa la/ nyams su len byed lam gyi rim pa'i lha grangs dang // blang ba chud don gyi lha grangs so// dang po ni/
330b6(rnying rgyud): khyab bya lam kun khyab byed lta bas khyab pa'i phyir lam rim gyi lha grangs dgu ste/ de nyid las/ mnyam nyid ngangal mi skrag pas// mngon byang nges pa'i shes rab dang // rnam pa kun ldan son chen mthong // rang rig ye shes snying rjes gzigs// phyag
330b7(rnying rgyud): gzigs 'bras bu rab ste// thams cad gsal ba'i lta ba dang // bar chad med pa'i tshogs chen mthong // dbang bskur mnyam nyid mi g.yo ba// ye shes kun mkhyen lte bdagu// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ khyud kyi dngong po rnams la'ang // khyab
331a1(rnying rgyud): byed skabs khyab pa'i phyir// kyang don thab // grangs dgra swA/ de nyid las/ rgyud don gzungs kyis zin pa no// dmachog dam chog ces byab// rangag smra ba ma chog san// zhes pa la sogs pa'o// wa pa ma rtags
331a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i skyon la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'khor ba'i gnas su mthong ba'i skyon dang / dge ba'i las la sbyang sang 'khor ba las mi grol ba'i skyon no// dang po ni/ rgyas pa las/ yang dag shes pa'i rang reg blo med na// bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas
331a3(rnying rgyud): su mthong // zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ de nyid las/ thabs la mkhas pas mazin na// lam gyi dge spyang rtag spyad kyang // mtho ris lha dang mir ske yi// skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob// ces dang / lam rim las kyang / spyan bzang lam zhugs ji
331a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin phyir// lam kun zag cing 'ching ba'i rgyu// zhes so// drug pa rtogs pa'i yon tan la/ ngan song gi gnas sangs rgyas kyi zheng du mthong ba'i dag las ci la spyad kyang mi 'ching ba'i dang / 'khor bar mi ldog cing 'tshang rgya ba'i yon tan no// dang po ni/ rgyas pa las/
331a5(rnying rgyud): theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa na// ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ 'di nyid las/ bla med theg par rab des na// nyon mongs las rnams kun spod kyang // byas la me sogs tshogs 'gyur te// tshul
331a6(rnying rgyud): khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs// zhes so// gsum pa ni lam rim las// gang zhig 'di ltar mthong rtogs pa// dngos grub mchog gi snying po de// gru srin phyag rgya bzhin du// dang po don rtogs mtha' mo gtong // spyod yul kun tra tshad dpag med// ces so//
331a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis pa zin chags med pa spyod pa la dug las/ dang po dgos chad ni/ gzhan po la sleb pa 'brang zhing bag chag 'dag/ don gnyer tshogs rdzogs shing / lha sgom gyi pogs 'phrin par byed pa ste/ khog gzung lase/ de yang bdag gzhan don skyer du/
331b1(rnying rgyud): rjes mthun pa'i spyod pa yang // skabs kyi ting 'dzin stangs phyir spyad// ces so// gnyis pa ba na/ lam pa'i sgo gsum gyi bya bar gyur pa ste/ 'di nyid las/ lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na'ang me gnas ma dmigs pas// zhes so// gang /
331b2(rnying rgyud): pasgra don ni/ tsAr+g+ha'i wa las byed pa ste/ sgog su mdon yod par bya ba'i phyir sngags kyi spyad pal sdod pa'i las can no// de'ang log gsung las/ sgogasum las phyer nges tshig 'grub// ces so// bzhi pa rnam grangs la/ gangag rje spad pa'i dus dang / gang spa \u0f7f
331b3(rnying rgyud): dngos so// dang po ni/ mnyam gzhag las langs te rjes thob tu spyod pa ci la yang ma chags par spyod pa ste/ de nyid las/ kun kyang mnyam las langs cho'o// zhes so// gnyis pa la/ s+thi dang / khyad par gnyis/ dang po ni/ spyir lus ngag yid gsum yongs
331b4(rnying rgyud): su dag pa'o// de'ang cung zad bshad na/ las dang pa pa'i tshe dge slong gzhon nu'i spyod pa ltar bag dang ldan pa la bslab par bya ste/ dbyen/ mi mthun pa'i rkyen las byol ba'i dang / mthun rkyen brten pa'i spyod pa gnyis/ dang po ni/ spad yul byed pa'i bsam gtan las/
331b5(rnying rgyud): snyan dga' mi snyan mi dga' dang // de bzhin bstod spad grags ma grags// rnyed dang ma rnyed chos brgyad po// thams cad ring du gtang bar bya// zhes 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad sogs kha na ma thob thams cad las byol nas/ gzhan gyi dge ba spel ba'i phyir bsam pa
331b6(rnying rgyud): la mi bsgrib na mthun 'jug 'tshams pa'i spyod pa la 'dug ste/ rdo rje rtse mo las/ brtan pa ma thob par du'ang // kha na mtho rdul med cing // sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ mnyam gzhag gi rtog pa bag ldan du bsrings shing / thun
331b7(rnying rgyud): mtshams kyi bya ba'i chagaca bor brten pa ste/ dgras mtha' rnam 'byed las/ yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin pa dang // nyan dang klog dang 'dzin pa dang // 'chad dang / kha ton byed pa dang // de sems pa dang bsgom pa te// spyod pa 'de bsnga'i bdag nyid ni// bsod nams lung po dpag/
332a1(rnying rgyud): tu med// rjes pas rgyas spyad brgya dang / zas dngags kyin la 'byung/ gtong ba/ 'ab+h+rid/ s+yAm+b+ha ma la/ phyag/ bsko ba/ mun bshags/ mad 'ad na pa sogs san 'gro byang chub sa sems/ dngos ga mkhor gsam
332a2(rnying rgyud): mi rtog pa'i shes rab/ rjes pa spobs zin pa'i sgo nas sprad par bya'o// de nas chung ba dgo mas te dben par mag sa rjes khyad med par gyur pa na rtogs pa rkyen thub tu byed pa ston pa'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang / shin tu goms nas/ mthun chen dang 'gal tshun
332a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka'i rtog pa gang bri med par gyur pa na bcos bslang med par gzhan phan byed pa rgyal po sa 'dzin gyi spyod pa lta bu ste spyir bshad pa'o// gnyis pa khyad par gyi spyod pa la/ grol lam bag yod kyi dang / thabs lam brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa'o// dang po la/
332a4(rnying rgyud): rim gyes pa dang / cig char ba'i spyod pa'o// dang po la'ang / zag bcas kyi lam bu dang / zag med kyi lam du ji ltar spyod pa'o// dang po la/ dang brtson gyi spyod pa/ shes rab dang mthun pa'i/ thabs dang mthun pa'i/ phyogs gcig pa'i/ spong
332a5(rnying rgyud): bcas kyi/ tshogs kyi spyod pa dang drug/ dang po ni/ rgyu shes par bya ba lta ba 'tshol ba'i dus kyi spong pa ste/ lam ma las/ thos bsam bcu stong ched dganyer// zhes dang / lam chung las kyang / gzhan phyer ma so'i rnal 'byor gyis// don byed cu spos
332a6(rnying rgyud): dang po bcu// gzhan la ston cing bze bar bya// zhes so// 'dir gang sbyang bya'i chos bcu ni/ bslab pa'i mtha' bcu ste/ gzhi da ma tshig gis bzang ba la bslab pa zhings gshin po la so nam byed pa lta bu dang / rgyad thos pas dgrol ba la bslab pa kyi leng
332a7(rnying rgyud): sgrog grol ba lta bu dang / sgo kun nas bsrung ba la bslab pa bung ba tshang 'tshal ba lta bu dang / phul du mkhas pas dbyung ba la bslab pa ldan po'i rtser phyin pa sta bu dang / thag lha gas paca dpal bslab pa khyang mkha' la lding ba lta bu dang / nyams ting nge
332b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyis blang ba la bsgrub pa rin po che len pa'i ded dpon lta bu dang / la spyod pas dor ba la bslab pa glang chen chu la brgal ba lta bu dang / rim pa dbang gis bzod pa la bslab pa rgyal bu rgyal sar bton pa lta bu dang / don man ngag gis bslab pa la
332b2(rnying rgyud): bslab pa gser 'gyur gyi rtsi lta bu dang / mdo don gcig tu bsdu ba la bslab pa sonam gyi khye bslab pa lta bu'o// de'ang don bsdus las/ bslab pa'i mtha' ni rnam bcu ste// dam tshig gzhi dang sbyang dgrol dang // sgo mo bsngar dang phral dbyang dang // thag 'chad
332b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang nyams blang dang // la dor spyod dang dbang rim dang // man ngag don dang mdor bsdus rnams// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i mtha' bcur bzhed// ces so// khyad par du skabs 'dir rgyad dkrol ba sogs bzhi la gtso bor bsnyen dgos par mngon te//
332b4(rnying rgyud): thos bsam gyis lha ba gtan la 'bebs pa'i skab pa yin pa'i phyir/ des na snga ma las/ chud dkrol ba ni thos bsam ste// mkhas ldan dam pa'i bla ma la// dang dang sri zhu gus pa yis// don gang mnyan cing rtogs byed dkrol// sgo bsngang bani
332b5(rnying rgyud): theg pa rnams// shes par byed dang rdol ba ste// gol sgrib phyogs su gang gsungs dag/ gcad phyir de dag rig shes byed// phul du dbyung ba'i don de nyid// mkhas shing rab tu shes byed pa// zag bcad pa ni lta ba ste// ji bzhin ma nor shes rab nyid
332b6(rnying rgyud): zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa ste/ rgyas pa las/ zla ba med las bya med bya// zhes dang / lam ri ma las/ skyong dgu dor ba'i cig car yang // mi dmigs mthun par spyod ces bya// zhes pas chos
332b7(rnying rgyud): spyod dgu'i spros pa dang te mi dmigs pa shes rab dang mthun pa'i spyod pa'o// gsum pa ni/ snying rje sgyu ma'i spyod pa nye// rgyas pa las/ thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa spyod// ces dang / lam rim las/ snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor pas// srid gsum gyur
333a1(rnying rgyud): 'dra bar ni// zhes pas spyod sbrul ye shes snga mar bltas te thabs dang mthun pa'i stod pa bya'o// bzhi pa ni/ phyag rgya gcig pa'i sdod pa ste// khog gzhung las/ chos spyod brtsas gcig chal// gnas pa/ zhab dang / lam rim las
333a2(rnying rgyud): rgyu 'bras mtshams sbyor bar skabs ste// chos spyod dgu yi spros pa dor// rgyal ldan yang blang bya min// mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba yin phyir ro// zhes pas thun mtshams kyi bya ba gzhan rnams dor te phyogs gcig pa'i rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa bya'o// lnga pa ni/ phyag
333a3(rnying rgyud): chu spos bcas kyi spyod pa ste/ 'di nyid las/ yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam spen oM d+hu shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gzugs spa dr-i ro dag la sogs// rnam sbyin mr-i du
333a4(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// zhes dang / lam rim las/ snod yul mthong thos thams cad kun// 'gro dang 'dug dang nyal ba na// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi rnal 'byor pa// mnyams de yi dbyings na gnas// shes rab
333a5(rnying rgyud): mchog gis rtag tu spyad// ces pas spyod yul thams cad lha'i rol bar blta zhing goms par byed pa'o// drug pa ni/ bar chad med pa'i lam du tshogs bslab pa'i spyod pa ste/ 'di nyid las/ gos can bza' btung wa dang tshig/ tho gar tshogs kyi srin phrang
333a6(rnying rgyud): la// hrI du shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// zhes dang / zo gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis// zhes pa nas/ A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes pa'i bar dang / lam
333a7(rnying rgyud): rim las kyang / spyod lam yo byad lnga sprod cing // dngos su mchod pa rnam gnyis so// zhes pas yo byad lnga la blang dor med pa rmad byang tshogs kyi spyod pa bya'o// gnyis pa la/ rnam spen gyi/ tshe dbang gi/ phyag rgya chen po'i/ lhun gyis grub pa'i rig
333b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyi spyod pa'o// dang po ni/ bdag don du bkod pa dkyil 'khor gyi byabs tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byed cing / phrin las bzhi'i sgo nas gzhan don rdzogs par spyod pa ste/ lam rim las/ dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul spyod pas// tshogs gnyis
333b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa bdag gi don// smin pas phrin las rdzogs byed pa// mi 'dor 'god pa gzhan gyi'o// zhes so// gnyis pa ni/ bdag don du rang gi lha sgom la rig rtsal spangs te kun 'gro'i dri ma sbyong zhing / gzhan don du cho 'phrul bzhi dang phrin las
333b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi sogs kyis don mdzad pa ste/ de nyid las/ dkyus sar phyin pa'i cang shes bzhin// kun tu 'gro ba bdag po'i don// rdzu 'phrul chos snang rjes ston brjod// ces so// gsum pa ni/ bdag don du lhan cig gnas pa'i dril sbyong zhing gzhan don du dgongs
333b4(rnying rgyud): pa me g.yo ba'i ngang nas sbal ba sna tshogs pas dag ma dag kun gyi don mdzad pa ste/ de nyid las/ lhan cig gnas pa'i dri ma dag/ ce sa dang / mnyam gzhag dang las ma g.yos bzhin// stong gi 'jig rten brgya stong phrag/ bcwa yi rdul skyed 'jig rten
333b5(rnying rgyud): dang // zhing grangs med pa brgya stong phrag/ bcu yi rdul skyed zhing khams su// rngon dang smad 'tshong la sogs pa// sprul pa'i lus kyis 'dul bar byed// ces so// bzhi pa ni/ rang don du sku lnga'i rgyal ba la sogs par brten te shes sgrib sbyor la/ gzhan
333b6(rnying rgyud): don du sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams mthar thug pa med par mdzad pa bcu gnyis sogs sbrul sku'i mdzad pa sna tshogs ston cing / gsang ba'i rgyud kyi sdud pa po mdzad de/ de nyid las/ nyid phyir rdo rje 'dzin rdzogs la// skad cig dus kyis bslab rdzogs nas//
333b7(rnying rgyud): tha ma'i bag la nyal ba dang // bcom ldan 'das par gyur pa yin// de tshe de sgrib cha yod kyang // lhun grub rig 'dzin sar bzhugs nas// zhing khams thug pa med pa dag/ 'dul phyir sbrul sgra'i mdzad pa'ang ston// zhes dang / gsang ba'i tan
334a1(rnying rgyud): ston pa dang // de ni bsgru ba mdzad pa dang // zhes so// gnyis bkrol lam cig chang ba'i spyod pa ni// rjes shes su ji skar sprod kyang / mi dmigs/ ma chags/ bla col 'dzin tog dang bral ba rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa sa/
334a2(rnying rgyud): las/ spyod pa gcig la'ang thogs med pa'i// zhes dang / rgyas pa las/ rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa ni// thams cad kun la dgyer med spyod// bde ba'i ro mchog myang 'gyur te// de la su zhig chags par byed// spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin te//
334a3(rnying rgyud): bde ba mchog sbyin bsod nams tshogs// de lta bu yi dang du spyod// ces dang / kun 'dus las kyang / mi dmigs pa las rnam par spyod// de ltar spyod pa kun spyod kyang // dam pa'i don de spyod mchog nyid// ces so// gnyis pa thabs lam
334a4(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa ni/ gtsang sde'i rnam pa ci la'ang mi gnyis pa'i blos mnyam pa nyid du spyod pa ste/ rgyas pa las/ sems can rtog pa bzlog phyir sngan// gtso ru dang du blang bar bya// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang // dri chen dri chu rak+ta rnams// sgrub pa
334a5(rnying rgyud): pos ni rtag du bza'// zhes so// dar mazang thabs mkhas kyi rtsis zin pa'i gdeng dang ldan pas 'khor ba'i chos ci la'ang spyod de/ 'di nyid las/ ye nas kye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu mar spang ba mig yor tshul// ldong sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // dul
334a6(rnying rgyud): cha tsa ma yang zas pa med// ces dang / bla me theg par dbyangs na// nyon rmongs las rnams kun spyod kyang // byas la me sogs tshogs 'gyur te// tshal khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs// zhes so// lwa ba skyon ni/ khyad par bya spyod pa dang 'i marnam
334a7(rnying rgyud): thug gi 'bras bu mi thob ste/ thug thig las/ khyad bar ngor na mthar phyin do// ces so// drug pa yon tan ni/ spyod pa de dag gis ltung rnam gyi sngags phyin nas/ dngos grub rnam pa gnyis kyang du thob par 'gyur te/ rgyas pa las/ rnga rtsed me
334b1(rnying rgyud): btsod 'bras kyis// don byang rdzam tha ba ldan// zham sa// gsum pa paka bang phrul la bar la rtag las/ da ma dgasacad na/ dpung sgrub mchung ldan la stsogs pa'i dusas ba dag gzhan kyang na byeng pa'i dran du byung ban slo dgas pa dang /
334b2(rnying rgyud): par gzhan sel du de dag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams sel ba dang / don du gnyer ba'i dgos pa sgrub pa'i ched de/ dngos grub kyi thabs dang rten ni dkyil 'khor len pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ba ni/ bkod pa lha'i 'khor lo rdzogs par snang ba ste/ thugs
334b3(rnying rgyud): thig las/ gnas skabs bdun du snying po len// bkod pa gang rdzogs dang po// zhes so// gsum pa sgra don ni/ maN+Dal zhes pa'i sku las/ ma ni snying po'am dkyil dang // la ni len pa'am 'dzin pa la tha bas/ snying po'i gzhi 'dzin pa'am/ snying po lan
334b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i don te/ 'grel chung las/ man+ta zhes bya snying po don// la zhes pa ni len pa'o// zhes so// rnam pa gcig tu na/ maN+Dal ni khor khor lhag gdon la'ang 'jug pas skabs dang sbar zhing / skye dgrags pa la dkyil 'khor te/ gang gtso bo la 'khor
334b5(rnying rgyud): gyis bskor ba'i phyir ro// de'ang thugs thig las/ bdun sdug tso po snying gang la// de yi 'khor ldan ngas pa'i tshig/ ces so// bdun po dmigs kyis bka na/ rgyas pa las/ 'das pa rtag tu dkyil yin te// 'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor dragasungs//
334b6(rnying rgyud): zhes pa ni rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra don no// yang de nyid las/ rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil yin te// rigs bzhi'i lha dang lha mo 'khor// zhes pas/ gzugs brnyan dang / lhag pa gnyis/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor/ mthar phyin 'bras
334b7(rnying rgyud): bu'i dkyil 'khor lnga'i sgra don no// rdo rje las rim las/ rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor po'i tshul// zhes pas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'thar ro// yang de nyid las/ snying po thams cad dus dkyil la// gang
335a1(rnying rgyud): ya la na lag 'khor drugasangs// zhes pa ni zang sems la gsum las/ \u0f7f dang / bcoMbacad khams gdun nam nyid // de dag 'a ma ba ba'i khams// zhes pas nang thag la dang / ye shes de'i zhin mang pas/
335a2(rnying rgyud): zhes pa ni gas ba ste/ byang chub sems me dkyil 'khor ba ste don no// bzhi pa rnam grangs la/ gzu zad ce ba/ bdun tu datheb/ bcu gnyis cang rtse bA ra// dang pani/ chos don lta/ dbye ba rang bzhin ting 'dzin dang / gzugs brtan dkyil langar rnam pa

335b5(rnying rgyud): zhes so// 'di nyid lam gyi cha rkyen ma yin pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi rnam grangs su spros pa tsam las 'dir rgya mi bskyed de/ 'og tu 'bras bu'i skabs su shes par 'gyur ro// gnyis pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni lha rje mda' nyig/ don dam pa'i
335b6(rnying rgyud): gzugs brtan kun rdzob lha'i dkyil 'khor du 'byung ba la bzhed/ lnga rje glan ston rnam rtog phra rags kyis lha yab yum du mtshon pa de'o gsung / nyang TIka pa ni/ snga ma'i bzhed pa de gnyis char yang / 'og min na bzhugs pa dang / 'di ltar bsgoms

337a7(rnying rgyud): gsol ba gdab po// gnyis pa ni/ rang nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bskyed pa'i mdun du/ sa'i lha mo bskyed la/ spyan drangs te mchod nas nam mkhar dge ba'i dbang du bzhag go// de nas bar chad bsal ba'i phyir zhe sdang rdo rje nga rgyal gyis
337b1(rnying rgyud): mtsham sa gtsad de/ de las/ sangs rgyas byin rlabs hUM bsdus te// me bzad gan tu 'ang gra ba yi// na sdang rdo rje'i sman 'bar ba// nang mthal thugs byas mazeng nag d+ha// gsang sngags rdo rje 'gos par bcas// lbo ba stangs na cig bcu /

337b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin du ni bdag gis kyang // nges par bya phyed dkyil 'khor bri// sa yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// oM ra tra ba shaM sid+hi ku rba sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod pas lha mo 'dzum pa'i 'od dang bcas te nim pas sa nyid ye shes kyis gzhir bsam pa'o// bzhi pa
337b4(rnying rgyud): dbang du bya ba ni/ de las/ dngos grub dbang du bya ba'i phyir// zangs sogs phur bu zla gra ma la// hUM las byung ba'i dbang mchog khro// zhes pa lhur zangs phur dpal glag ma can bat+sa kI la ya zhal gcig phyag bzhi par bskyed de/ gnas gsum byin gyis
337b5(rnying rgyud): brlabs nas btab pas bdag gi dbang du 'dus par bsam pa'o// lnga pa skyong ba ni/ de las/ ltung ba las me sngags phrag mra/ ting nge 'dzin gyis dag par 'gyur/ zhes pas don bzhi las/ dang po las dang bya bas spong ba ni/ thog ma
337b6(rnying rgyud): 'phye'i phyogs nas bslang ste/ bam brgyad kyi 'grel ba las/ lto 'phye gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ni// ston zla gsum gyi zla ba la// nyi ma 'gro ba'i rim pa yis// mgo shar ba lko g.yon cis nyal// dgun zla gsum gyi zla ba la// nub tu khabaltas mgo

338b1(rnying rgyud): khang gdan dang bcas pa bskyed pa'o// drug pa byin rlabs ni/ slob dpon rgyas pa'i chas su zhugs nas rdo rje'i 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' bskor zhing / shar sgo nas zhugs te/ dbus su shar bltas kyis 'dug la/ zhi khro gang byed kyi gtso
338b2(rnying rgyud): bo yab yum bskyed nas sbyor ba'i sems sprin las 'khor rnams rdzogs par bskyed de/ ye shes pa spyan drangs nas mchod do// de nas yum bzhi'i nga rgyal 'dzin pa'i phyogs kyi slob ma pa zhis phyogs so so nas slob dpon la/ zhi ba'i ye shes rang snang ba'i/
338b3(rnying rgyud): zhes sogs dang / mgrin gcig tu/ bsod nams ye shes kyis gsol ba 'debs su bcug ste/ slob dpon gyis rdor dril 'dzin cing 'dzum pa dang bcas pas/ phyogs bcu ma lus dus gsum gyi// zhes sogs kyis nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
338b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi byin rlabs bsgral zhing / hUM bzhis bsdus la/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis 'bar ba'i sdang mig dang bcas te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyi ma dang / chos dang rta mchog snang mdzad kyang // bdag nyid chen po nga nyid yin// thams cad bka' las deng ma
338b5(rnying rgyud): 'da' zhes sum+b+ha'i sngags brjod cing rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bskor bas sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du brlab pa'o// bdun pa bsrung ba ni/ spang ba'i 'khor lo dang / mtshon cha lngas mtshams gcod pa ste/ las rim las/ nam mkha' khab pa'i rtsibs brgyad la/
338b6(rnying rgyud): nyi steng sngam+bas lha rnams mnan// khro bcu thugs las nges phyung dgod// ces dang / mtshon cha lnga yi rim pa yang // nges par gzhung bzhin bya ba yin// gang yang bar chad skyabs med na// srung ba'i mchog tu de gsungs so// zhes so// brgyad pas
338b7(rnying rgyud): bzung ba ni/ gong ma'i phyag bzhes su skabs 'dir yan lag dang slob bu rab gnas rnams mdzad/ de nas lha ga nas mi nor ba'i ched du ji tsam bzhed par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i skam thig btab ste/ lha grangs dang mnyam pa'i byang
339a1(rnying rgyud): sems kyi thig le byas pa me tog dgod/ zhi khro gang byed kya ga cuba' skor mtshams nas spros pa'i sems sprin gyis gzhal yas khang dang lha bskyed de ldan 'dzin mchod ba stod byas nas/ zhi ba yan na/ mgon po kun gyi bdag nyid can// gcig
339a2(rnying rgyud): dang dra ma yongs bral phyir// zhes sogs dang / khro ba yin na/ oM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rapa 'thams na// zhes sogs kyis bskul bas/ lce tshogs yab yA ma rnams rol pa'i 'odas gzhi la thim pas/ sa nyid dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du gas
339a3(rnying rgyud): brlabasam pa nis bzung ba ste/ las rim las/ nges brjod rol pa'i gan gyi dkyis// thams cad dkyil 'khor rang bzhinadu// gsal byas yongs su gzung ba'o// zhes so// de dag la ci gyi ras gzham rnam pa zhes bzhen/ sa dang par 'dzin pa
339a4(rnying rgyud): ga pa dganas/ rnams da nga gA pa cang chub kyis rnam sa nyam pa c-i tshon pa cid/ sa/ rnams sems nas m+bu bas/ ga tan sa na pasmrig/ 'dis gang gas gsal nga // na ba ma
339a5(rnying rgyud): zhes bya// zhes so// gnyis pa dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni/ dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya// zhes sogs te/ de la bsdus 'bring rgyas pa'i tshod gsum yod/ de yang / logs ral khru gang se mthang bsor du mtho brgyad pa dang / logs rel khru bzhin
339a6(rnying rgyud): lus gang ba gnyis ni dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i tshad de/ las rim las/ brgyad dang bzhi la nges pad ni// stangs dpral gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor te// phyag tu dgra yis mtshan mas gdag// ces so// yang logs re la lus gsum de khwa bcu gnyis dang /
339a7(rnying rgyud): khu bcu drug pa gnyis ni 'bring tshad de/ de las/ drug dang brgyad gnyis ldan pa la// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rnam par brgyan// zhes so// logs rel khru nyi shu'amanyer lngang byed pa ni rgyas pa'i tshad de/ de las khu tshang nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// rigs kyi dkyipa
339b1(rnying rgyud): lha rnams dang // bar byams bcas pa khra ba yang // zhes so// de'ang lus 'brang bsdus gsum la chad gnyis gnyis 'ong ba na/ de nyid las/ tshad ni rkyen gyis spangs te// zhes pas/ slob dpan phyagagasu mi gzo dang / gnas khang yangs nga
339b2(rnying rgyud): slob bu 'byor ba che chung dang / gang mos kyi dbang gis 'dam kha can yin te/ de las/ mos dang 'thor pas rnam phye'o// zhes dang sra khab pas/ gnyis ni bzo la yang byer ro// zhes so// rnam pa'i tshad ni/ dbus mtho zhir mtha' kug nas snyoms
339b3(rnying rgyud): ste/ 'on kyang shar mthon tshe thung / byang mtho na nor 'dzud pas/ de gnyis cung zad dma' bur bu gsungs so// gsam pa theg ti/ phur bu sa bu tshon gyi dang // zhes sogs te/ de la'ang / g+hA/ grogs/ tshwad/ grangs/ rab gnas/ gangab pa
339b4(rnying rgyud): nga/ / ba lnga #
339b5(rnying rgyud): rmed/ gnyis ka'i dmachog gi rgyu ni/ rus bral gtsang mdapa' bo'i dzin gyis nas pa'o// de 'khal ba'i thogs ni tha mo mtshan ldan la bcu dag mazhi ba'i kun rgyas bcugs ma gyis brgyan pa'o// tshad ni/ rang thung dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur /
339b6(rnying rgyud): tham rba na TaH'o// gangs ni/ tshon gyis khabag+h+nA te/ ye shes kyi srung pa nyis rgya ma 'amam thil dang / dmacho gi srid pa dbadz+wa la la pa sums pa te/ las ma pa/ blatha~M nas pas bdag pastsu/ yang ga zug sa
339b7(rnying rgyud): bkal la// skal ma gcig kyang lnga lngang ldan// ye shes rang bzhin shes par bya// kha dog gsum ldan skal ma dgu// ras pal las btags su gsung thags// zhes so// rab gnas ni/ ye shes kyi thig skad me shes lnga dang / dam tshig gi sung
340a1(rnying rgyud): pasgra ga sung thugs sa byon gyis rlob pa ste/ de las/ gtsang ma' sdang du lags bkad na// nyas// ba gdan dga'// thugs la su yig 'bru grangs bzhan// phyogs brgya ngas bzhi mdu ngas te// mtsha
340a2(rnying rgyud): gsol ba gdab par bya// stong ba'i ye shes gangs mnya dang // ri gi zlum byi na nges par brtem// zhes so// gad ba pa'i rdabs pa/ dum theg ga dab pa dang / yo brag ga ba gi// dang pan/ rdon rtsupa pa lab sam lta gas lag
340a3(rnying rgyud): mtshanas nas dmachog theg srung lha gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin can du 'debs pa ste/ de nyid las/ rdzogs mtshams legs par gyinas ni// so sa'i tshad bzhin nus pa da k+She// zhes pas/ tshangs thig gnyis/ zur zig gnyis/ rdza lag bzhin
340a4(rnying rgyud): ma man byed ngan panas ma byu 'i// de 'angs ma das sa/ mchog ga jig zan pa brdzun/ lags papa dag kyi yang bye/ rnababs bcad pa mnong// ni mang ba mchags pa 'gyur lan// dza la gcan ma
340a5(rnying rgyud): dbras byed dang gsum du zas// zhes so// khyad par khrob la sgonyis brtsegs dang // 'khor yug gzhi gang ba bo// gnyis pa ni/ dam thig gi// dge nam mkhar lo theg gdang pa ste/ sku gsung thugs re re'ang ye shes lha lnga'i rang bzhi nadu rdzas gangs
340a6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de skad yang // de nyid las/ ye shes rdo rje mad bangs ma// dang nog ces pa rnamigs la byung // ces so// gzhan duH/ sa mig gi sngon duganam thig btab kyang 'gal bar ma mthong / thig gi bi Sh+Ta na las/ rang bzhin kyil 'kho ga nam
340a7(rnying rgyud): gas// de nags thug 'chad pa zhen// sa mthil bar ga pa dang bya// yid na le gas dmachog pa'i// nges pa nas dran kyi shed po// sa ga dmag gsungs pa kyi dang / tshang 'an kyi gzung bang po yang nga yang nga
340b1(rnying rgyud): glog pas/ thig g.yog las kyi sems ma ste// mtshan ldan byin gyis brlabs nas ni// phyag rgya gar dang bcas pa yi// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gan ma thig gdab// de nasas thig gdab pa yang // 'dul ba'i dbang gis bye brag las// maN+Dal
340b2(rnying rgyud): tshad ni nges pa med// ces so// gang ltar yang / mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya// zhes pas/ b+h+ra ma'i man ngag thob cing mthong ba goms pas bskor phyogs ma 'khrul pa/ thig spyad ma chad pa/ thig snam shor ba/ thig rgyun ma chad pa nyid du gdab
340b3(rnying rgyud): po// gal tem bsgrims pa'i nyes pa ni// las rim las/ srung pa chad na slob dpon chi// thig skya shod ni slob bu 'chi// phyogs 'khrul bas ni gnyis ka nyams// rgyud chad lam la gnod par 'gyur// debyi mkhas pas brdzi gas te b+ha// zhes gsu
340b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir dang / thig srung dang / thig la 'gom pa'ang nyes pa yin pa'i phyir/ thig sud la gshegs gsol dang / thig nyid mkha' la btegs pa'i 'og tu 'dzul nas las bya ste/ de las/ rab gnas ldan pa'i thig 'goms na// bde gshegs skur pa btang
340b5(rnying rgyud): dang mtshungs// sangs rgyas chos las ring 'gyur phyir// hrIHsgra'i phyag rgyas 'dzul bar bya// zhes so// bzhi pa tshon la/ dgos ched/ g+ha/ grangs/ rab gnas/ ji ltar dgye lugs/ nyes pa srang ba'o// dang po ni/ ma mthong rmongs la bsten kyang
340b6(rnying rgyud): tshen// zhes pas rdul tshorje kha dog so sor phye ba'i dgos pa ste// las rim las/ ma mthong rmongs la ye shes sogs// bstan phyir tshon lnga dgye bar bya// dman pa rnams la lnga yi phyir// rigs kyi ye shes lngar shes bya// zhes so// mu ni/ 'byer ba rab
340b7(rnying rgyud): kyis rin chen sna lnga dang // 'bring gis 'dusam pa dog bsgyung ba dang / tha mas dri ma med pa'i dul tshon padog sngal byab te/ rdo rje mo long las/ gser dang dngul dang ba rnyen// pa dag men+d+ra la nying // rin chen lda dang ldan pa yis// mkhas pas 'byor lnga
341a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ bde shre// yang na 'bras ni sAl la// kha dog bsgyur ba de bzhin no// dman dang 'byod pa chung ba las// 'byung khungasu lnga las tha bar bya// zhes sa// khra ba pas chen gyi steng thal chen dung zang ba srem/ he draka 'das pa pas/ ngur khrod
341a2(rnying rgyud): sol ba dang bsres pa'i// rin chen lnga dang 'bras bsgyur dang // kha dog lnga yi phye ma li// zhes so// grangs ni/ kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am// lnga yi tshen gyis bri bar bya// zhes dang / las ri ma las/ mtshams sems khro bo la sogs phyir// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lngar gas
341a3(rnying rgyud): zhes so// rab ga nas ni/ zhi khro grang yin gyi rigs lnga bskyed de zhu ba las ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa ste/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom// zhes dang / las ri mA las/ snod rim ma 'dres dag byas la// hUM sogs yig 'bru gcig kyang ldar// bdog
341a4(rnying rgyud): rjes su mthun byas te// yongs gyur nyi shu rtsa lnga'i lhar// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro// tshon dgye lugs ni/ lag pa la dpa' bo 'bru lnga bkod de tshon pra brtags nas slob bu dkyil 'khor rgyas 'greng bsdus gsum gang gis 'dul ba de bzhin
341a5(rnying rgyud): dgye bar bya ste/ 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye// zhes dang / las rim las/ de nas bri ba'i cho ga ni// chas ldan dbang phyug thig btegs la// dang po dbang ldan phyogs nas bskor// de nas zhal lung thob pa rnams// 'bru ldan rdo rje thal khu tshur// phyag rgya ting 'dzin
341a6(rnying rgyud): ldan par bri// zhes so// tha mnyes pa spong ba ni// de las/ bag med gyur pa'i nyes pa ni// bshad pa'i rjes su shes par bya// zhes pas spyir thig gi skabs dang rjes su mthun pa las/ khyad par du/ sra ba na dbul zhing / tshon thal sh+long na nad 'byung ba sogs dang /
341a7(rnying rgyud): tshon pra brtag pa'i tshe na/ ku ku rA dzas mnyam sbyor dkyil chog tu// de khwa dma' bas mi 'grub cing // yon pos gdung ba bskyed par byed// chad pas slob dpon slob mdag/ 'chi 'aman par 'gyur ba yis// lhag chad las ni nad 'byung zhing // phyogs 'khrul rmongs
341b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i las su 'gyur// zhes so// lnga pa bri ba la/ lte brtsibs dang ldan pa yi// zhes sogs kyis skabs su dkyil 'khor rgyas 'greng bsdus gsum las/ zhing rgyas pa ni/ pho brang 'khor la rtsibs bzhi dbus dang lngar 'khor lo skyabs bzhi pa re res mtshan cang
341b2(rnying rgyud): tshad khyams dang bcas pa'o// 'bring po la rtsibs bzhi bri chad khyams ldan dang / bsdus pa ni/ de'i khyams spang ste su chad la sgo dod pa'o// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ni sgo nyes brtsegs su bri ba tsam khyad par ro// drugs rnam pa dgod pa ni// sku gsung thugs ldan
341b3(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyang dgod// ces pa ste/ las rim las/ dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum dag tu/ gzhung nyid kyis ni gsal bar gsungs// yan lag gzugs sku snying po nyid// nyi zla pad+ma'i rim bzhugs pa// dkyil 'khor su yi mtshan nyid yin// phyag
341b4(rnying rgyud): rgya gsal dgod thugs dkyil 'khor// Da Ta'am yang na hUM mAM ni// mchog dang 'bring pos gye ba ste// dkyil 'khor gsum du shes par bya// zhes dang / rnga ma glog las/ gtso bo gzugs su rdzogs par bri// 'khor rnams phyag rgya dag tu bya// phal pa dag la yig 'bras
341b5(rnying rgyud): so// zhes so// bdun par ba gnas la/ ngo bo/ sgra de ni/ rnam grangs so// dang po ni/ rten gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan gyi byin bsdus te gzhug pa'i cho ga yan lag rdzogs pas khyad par can du gyur pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ pra tiSh+Tha
341b6(rnying rgyud): sgras// rang bzhin mchog tu gyur pa dang / yun du gnas pa las mi 'da' ba'o// gsum pa ni/ las rim las/ rab gnas lugs ni gsum yin te// zhes pas/ bum pa la sogs pa yan lag gi rab gnas dang / slob bu rab gnas dang /
341b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rab gnas so// dang po ni/ de las/ bum pa rin chen las byas pa// lho dang mgrin par ldan pa ni// zhabru ma la sogs skyon spangs pa// kha dog ldan pa'i ras kyis dkri// zhes pa'i mtshan nyid tshang ba'i lha bum dang las bum gnyis las/ thog
342a1(rnying rgyud): mar gnas tha thams cad la gas sbyangs dang bgegs slong bya ba'i phying las tham dang / de rdzas gzhan rnams kyi kyis rlab bo// de yang lha thaya ni brog yinA dang / lus kyi rnas par bdud rtsil thil pa bskra de/ mchodang rtad
342a2(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa 'od zhal sogs pas bum mu nus ldan du byed pa'o// gzhan yang de dang rjes su 'brel bar rdo dril/ zod chu sogs dang / sngar bshad pa'i thig tshon rab gnas rnams bya ba yin no// gnyis pa ni/ las ri ma las/ gnyis pa stob mar shes
342a3(rnying rgyud): par bya// zhes pas slob ma lhag gnas bya ste/ de la dgos pa dang / las khrigs gnyis/ dang po ni/ slob ma rnams sngags la spro ba bskyed cing dngos grub kyi lhas brtag pa dang / bar chad bsrung ba'i ched du'o// gnyis pa ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar lhor
342a4(rnying rgyud): maN+Dal zlum po khru gang ba pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris pa sogs yo byad rnams tshogs par byas la/ slob dpon gyis las gzhung bsrang / de nas slob zla rnams khrus byas te/ sems bskyed pa la/ gnang ba sbyin zhing spro ba bskyed/ mdun du drangs nas bgegs
342a5(rnying rgyud): bskrad la sleb pa phral/ lhar bskyed de dbang bsur byin brlab go bgo lus bsrung ba rnams byas la dngos grub kyi ltas brtag par bya'o// de la gnyis/ so shing dor ba dang / rmi lam brtag pa'o// phyi ma'i don du khyod chu/ bsrung spyad/ ku sha sbyin pa gsum
342a6(rnying rgyud): ste rim pa ji ltar rmi lam gsal ba dang / bar chad mi 'byung ba dang / mi 'khrugs par bya ba'i phyir ro// de rjes dngos grub kyi sgod skyon shes pa'i phyir dbang gi gegs brgyad bshad de/ rmi lam brtag tu bcug go// gal te ngan na de nyid rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags rgyas
342a7(rnying rgyud): bsrung zhing / kun ngan na drag po'i mes sbyang ngo // de dag kyang rdo rje las rim las/ dgos pa'i yo byad rab bsags la// las kyi dkyil 'khor las rim sbyar// khus byas dri dang ldan pa'i bus// nges par gnas su thal sbyar nas// 'bid de sems lnga
342b1(rnying rgyud): bskyed par bya// de la lan du sbyin bya ba// zhes sogs nas// dkyil 'kharang don dang yon tan rnams// gsal byas rab tukhrod pa babyed// rdo rjes des drangs du 'od zer// rdo rje sems dbang rab gnas bya// de bzhin yan pas ldan pa la// rje mang ga sa khyag par
342b2(rnying rgyud): sbyar// so sheng ku sha bsrung srud chu// sbyin la las sbyar mtshan ma brtag/ gang zhig ngan par gyur pa na// rdo rje gnod sbyin rnal 'byor gyis// mche ba'i phyag rgyas bsrung bar bya// oM badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM phaT/ bar chad kun las grol bar 'gyur// dram
342b3(rnying rgyud): cad thams cad de bzhin te// drag po me yis bzlog par bya// las rjes shes par 'gyur ba yin// zhes so// gsum pa dkyil 'khor rab gnas la'ang / dgos pa dang / lus khrigs gnyis/ dang po ni/ lhag pa gzugs brnyan gyi phyag rgya bris shing /
342b4(rnying rgyud): bkod pa rnams ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs pas/ de nyid dngos grub kyi rten phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i dgos pa yod do// de skad du'ang / sa la sogs par phyag rgyar byas// rnam grol rim pa thob 'gyur na// dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyang
342b5(rnying rgyud): pas// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// zhes so// gnyis pa la/ sngon du bya ba'i rim pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang / ye shes pa spyan drangs pa bstim pa dang / dbang po la sogs pa'i sngon bsal ba dang / che ba'i
342b6(rnying rgyud): yon tan rgyan chas kyis mnga' gsol ba dang / chu bdun gyis khrus gsol zhing phyi ba dang / phyi nang gi mchod pa 'bul ba dang / bden pas brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba dang / bskor zhing smon lam gdab pa dang dgu/ dang po ni/ 'di nyid las
342b7(rnying rgyud): bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang // rgyan phreng btung dang bri bas bskor/ zhes pa'i don 'grel chung las/ rgyan ni kha dog bcos pa'i sna tshogs ras// blo rgyan 'og rgyan par rgyan mdzes pa dang // rin chen sna tshogs mangs pa'i phreng bas bskor// gzugs
343a1(rnying rgyud): rdo papa'abathang de bzhin pa sang// skyes sogs dkyil ma gyimun dang / rubuganas kyil byad sogs rdzogs par byas la na/ brgyad da/ da cas zu rdzun can pa/ ngan pa gnas kyang ban/
343a2(rnying rgyud): brtan ma long pa 'char du bcug pA la 'byung lnga dang 'bru mar gyis rgyags shing shing kun lngas rtsi/ skur yang thos kyi lde gas drugs pa ras kyis 'gyi zhing dri khrus bsus te / tho ga seMng+ka kyi las ga/ grang bzang bar bya'o// de ltar yang las nges pas/ bram chu rung zad
343a3(rnying rgyud): dbus bsdus pa// nus pa'i sprin / shA d+ha gyur// mamyod pa rnam tha zlas par dbam// byA seM rnam u legis thugs la/ tsatsun da/ dam pa sa ng+yas pa // d+h+r-ig N+Di dang pAH!/ shing zan kyi mas breb // de dag gsogs ma hA
343a4(rnying rgyud): rnams// dngos min gzugs brnyan pa shes bya// rang gi tsho gas legs mchod la// zhes so// gnyis pa la smad pa dang / bskyed pa gnyis/ dang te/ sh+yan d+haNi sngags kyis stong panyid du byung ba ste/ 'di nyid pas/ lus du sems ces thams
343a5(rnying rgyud): cad// ces sogs dpa las rim las/ stong nyid ye shes gsang sngags kyis// skrag sung thugs sogs chos thams cad// gang na'ang mi gnas mi dmigs par// mig yod tshul du sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom// zhes so// gnyis pa nI/
343a6(rnying rgyud): rol mo lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ste/ rang gi thugs kanas sa bon spos te 'byung lnga rim brtsegs gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bskyed/ der gzugs sku rnams stong pa nyid ye shes su gsal ba la/ bdag yab yum sbyor ba'i
343a7(rnying rgyud): byangasems skyems sa yon gyi rnam par bton na / cho ga gsum gyis mar bskyed lang bang brgyar byin gyis rdzob ba ste/ 'di nyid pas/ ting 'dzin rol po mthang yas mchod// byas sogs dang / la ril las/ sogs 'das du'i byud las/
343b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor gnas dang ldan par zla// rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor rjes dag tu// yab sum las byung dngos pogs ma// rjes su mthun sbyar gnyis bskyed de// yi ge 'am gangan nas phyag rgya las// sra gsung thugs ldan byin gyis rnyog// rdzas so// gsan pa/
343b2(rnying rgyud): de las ye shes gsal bstim gzi byin bskyed// ces pas// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// zhes sogs kyis rnam pa 'i khro dang grangs dkyil 'khor rgyas 'bring bsdus gsum gang yin gyi ye shes pa dpabadrang bab stim skye brtan par bzhugs
343b3(rnying rgyud): gsol ba'o// bzhi pa ni/ mig sman gyis byugs pa'i thur ma dang / gser gyi snyan 'dra/ ljang cher/ ljags bzhar/ choms shing / longs su la dung gi so mang dang / thub drug la gser gyi 'breg spyad rnams dbul ba'o// lnga pa thun khyad
343b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis las/ dang po ni/ las rim las/ rang gi bum pa gcig shos kyis// dbang bskur dbu rgyan ldan par bya// zhes pas ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis bum chus dbang bskur zhing sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlob pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ zhib par
343b5(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i rgyan chas nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / khro bo la/ rol pa nyi shu/ che ba nyi shu/ rngo many+dzi shra/ badz+ro nyi shu ste bkud cus mnga' gsol ba'o// drug pa ni/ khro bo las rim las/ chu gtsang 'dag tshal bcu dang spos// 'bru dang ma na pa
343b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan la sbyar ba// nyon mongs shes bya sgra lngar smin// bkra shis dag pa'i ngas kyis kyi// zhes so// 'dir sngon gyi las byang rnams swa/ zhi ba pa rdzu gtsang sogs bdun dang / khro bo la bdud rtsi lnga'i steng du thal zhan bstan pas ba'u zhing rangs kyis
343b7(rnying rgyud): phyi bar gsungs na'ang / khro bo'i las rim du zhi ba dang mthun par byung bas thun mong du byas kyang me 'gal zhing 'jug pa bde bar sems so// bdun pa ni/ gyi'i mchod pa lnga dang / gzhan yang / bla re la sogs pa'i skab lngab dang na bza'/ nang gi sman gtor
344a1(rnying rgyud): gas kyi babyu/ sa bsgyud la/ zhag pa dzin/ zla sdigag// mab gal dgas pas mdzod par byang bag// ba na bdu bas bad pa nas bdan pathugs dgral dran/ byas dmas
344a2(rnying rgyud): bded pa'i mthu la bskul thas la// 'dod pa yangs su mardzogs par// nam srung brtan par thu bye yin// shes pa// dgra ni/ smin bdagags pa ga ba rgya zhi // slob ni sdes sngon la la gang ba par draba'o/ ba dang mi sbyin pa gyun ni/ dam
344a3(rnying rgyud): sngog las// dkyil la khar la sogs gang nas kyang // rab gnas ye shes me snun mo// tshogs deng nga ba'i das pa med // cesas// ldan pa phrin mon yang // la zhi dgas/ shes dag pa'i byin nga sa dang // na pa byer ting 'dzin ma du
344a4(rnying rgyud): byin dang // rgyal ba bzhugs bu'i rgyas mthu mas// sgrib pa dag cing tshogs gnyis rdzogs// gang 'bad de yo ngos grub thob// ces so// dzan rjes su 'brel par dkyil 'khor bris pa'i phan yon kyang / ye shes byas pa las/ gang gis rdul ba'i
344a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog/ thig dang tshon rdzas 'dri byed pa// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing khams kun// rin chen bdun sbyin po sod rnams pas// de yi phung po dpag tu med// las rnams dgrub cing rgyal bas dgongs// dkyil 'khor bsam pas thob par
344a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur sa// bzud pa sbyin mig byab/ dgra pa yul la bar nga ba/ brgya 'grus ni rgyu / na pa ti rlon gyi kyi nga / ma tham sa TIganas gas kyi sa ting ra zhe car 'apal
344a7(rnying rgyud): ga tu 'gro bu du bya te/ dril sems sring dres par bye ba'i byed/ gas paca ba nas kyig cig tu gas par dzin pa'i/ ngom pa cas pa las/ de ba'i ma
344b1(rnying rgyud): ni// nyid kyi thugs la them byas te// thams cad chos spa'i thug ca che// zhes so// de 'ang rang rig pa ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin la phyogs ris ma grub kyang / yon tan gyi ldog canas brtags na/ ye shes lngar snang ba ste sems nyid rang bzhin gyi spros pa
344b2(rnying rgyud): dang bral ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes/ gsal la mi rtog pa mo long lta bu/ bzung ngan che chung med pas mnyam nyid/ gsal la ma 'dres pas sor rtog/ don gnyis 'bad med dusgrub pa b+ha grub ye shes te/ 'di nyid las/ ye shas phyogs bka
344b3(rnying rgyud): dbus brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas ldan gyis thub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun dbyung dkyil 'khar chen po na spyod// ces so// lta ba lhag pa ting nge 'dzin ni/ de ltar bsgom mi nus pa'am/ rim 'jug gi gang zag
344b4(rnying rgyud): gis bsgom byur gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gang zhig/ mtshan bces lha'i skur bsgom pa'i bya bas lhag pa'o// dbye na/ thugs rje zhi ba'i dang / bdud 'dul khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gnyis te/ pog gzhung las/ lhag pa ting 'dzin rnam pa gnyis
344b5(rnying rgyud): gdul ba'i don phyir zhe khro ste// zhes so// gdul ba'i dbang gis gnyis su ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ 'di'i rgyud phyi ma las/ rang gzhan bdag nyid rnam pa kun// thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i phyir// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes brjod de// gdul bar dkar ba'i
344b6(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs la// thugs rje'i dbang gis khro byad phyir// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bshad do// zhes so// de'ang bshad tshul nyes pa'i skyon brgyad las// mngon rtogs kyi go ma bsdeb ma shes na/ bdud rtsi ro nyams lta bu'i bshad skyon yod pa'i phyir
344b7(rnying rgyud): mngon rtogs kyi las sngabs dang sbyar nas 'chang nga // de rgyu mtshan yang chung chub thabs dang 'brel ba/ srub thabs chog khrigs dang 'brel ba/ cho ga khrigs phyag bzhes dang 'brel ba/ phyag bzhes bla ma brgyad pang gdams ngag dang brel
345a1(rnying rgyud): 'brel pa bzhi ldan gyi sgo nas 'chang dgos pa'i phyir ro// de la gnyis te/ khri khro thun mong gi sngon 'gro dang / sa so'i las rim mo// dang po la/ sngon du bya ba'i rim pa dang / sngon 'gro dngos so// dang po ni/ rten gyi gang zag
345a2(rnying rgyud): dbang thob cing dam tshig la gnas pas/ sdig pa dang ma 'dres pa'i yo byad bsags te/ bsam gtan la chor ma med pa'i gnas su nyams su byang bar bya'o// de ltar yang me long lta bu'i sgrub thabs las/ slob dpon mnyes par byas pa dang // sgyu 'phrul dra
345a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang rnams rdzogs par byas pa dang // 'dod pa'i g.yeng ba kun spangs te// zhes dang / baM ma la'i lha skya sgom pa'i man ngag las/ bsam gtan dgra las ring gyur pa'i// bkra shis gnas su bsdad par bya// bsdu ba'i rkyen
345a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis tshogs byas la// zhes so// de yang dus bzang po la/ rten gyi dkyil 'khor bri/ phyi rol du cha gsum gtang / nang du 'dug la mchod chas rnams bsham pa'o// gnyis pa la/ gral phyag dang tshul phyag bya ba/ rgud sbyang ba/ mtshams
345a5(rnying rgyud): bcad pa/ bshags pa bya ba/ dam bca' ba/ byin dbab pa/ mchod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang bdun/ dang po ni/ snga rabs pa phal cher dbang thob pa sde rim ma ma ye shes kyis rgan pa la mal phyag dang / yi dam gyi lha la tshul phyag mdzad gsungs na'ang /
345a6(rnying rgyud): rje'i zhal snga nas/ 'du ba'i thog mar lha la gral phyag dang / rnal 'byor pa rgan rim gyis tshul dang mthun pa'i phyag byed pa yin gsung ba nyid legs so// gnyis pa ni/ lam ram las/ yan 'ag brgyad pa'i tshul bzung la/ yongs su thim byas rjes la
345a7(rnying rgyud): 'dug/ ces pas tshogs zhing sun drangs te yan lag brgyad pa phul la/ mthar yul rnams rang la bsdu ba'o// de yang rgun bshags rtsa ba las// rgyal ba 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// bla ma snying por bzugs byas la// phyag skabs mchod dang bshags pa dang /
345b1(rnying rgyud): yi rang sems paskud lus dbul dang // byang chub rgyan par yangs bsngo ba'o// zhes so// gsam pa la gnyis lngas/ mtshan mang rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshams na/ rbA nas brjod pas chos thams cad gang nang bdag mad par bsgom pa'o// dbang ma par
345b2(rnying rgyud): las/ rnam tog 'du shes kun spangs na// bgegs kyi sbyor ba yongs mi 'gyur// de bas rnam rtog bgegs yin par// yang dag rig pa nyid kyis gsungs// zhes dang / gsang 'grel las/ mtshams kyi rgyal po mi rtog ye shes kyis// bgegs kyi
345b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po rnam rtog gnan par bya// zhes so// gnyis pa mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i mtshams ni/ spyir phyag rgya spros bcas kyi skabs 'dir/ mtshon cha 'chol ba/ mtshon cha dam tshig/ bsrung ba 'khor lo/ khro bcu rol pa'i mtshams bzhi las/ bla ma rnam
345b4(rnying rgyud): zhib la mtshon chad mchog pa mdzad do// de yang rgyas pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos mtshon chad ma tshig gi glu 'di blangs so// zhes sogs gsungs te/ de'i rim pa ni/ de nyid las/ kun kyang phyag rgya bzhis byas gang ba// ces
345b5(rnying rgyud): pas phyag rgya bzhi las/ phyag chen ni/ mi rtog pa de'i ngang las/ ngo bo dbyer mi phyed kyang / rnam pa rang nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga dang bzang mor skabs kyis bskur ba'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje gsor zhing 'khor lo bskor// gzhan gsum
345b6(rnying rgyud): 'debs rgya la dra la bugasil// zhes bca'a'o// chos kyi thug sa n+te/ dz+wa wAn ldana'i chags brjod pa'o// las ci zug sani/ phyag na bcas pa las phyag mtshan mi sa'i gzugs pa mgrangs med pa smos te/ brlad bshegs thams cad pa rdzogs pasgyu
345b7(rnying rgyud): brlag par byas/ rjer 'dus pa las phyi nas rim par/ dzang/ 'khor lo/ rin chen/ padz+ra/ ral mi/ dril bu rnams rang rangagi me ra ba dang bcas pa bsam pan// gzhan du dril za ba zhag na/ rgyal polnga'i mtshams zhes thaltad mdzadzad// thabal
346a1(rnying rgyud): !/ / khro brdu la pa mang dkrung / zheng rdo gsul byas khro ba'i gle gzhi lta / sbrul ba su 'phrul sa tsha 'phrul gyis bklags bskrad nas/ zur 'jus pa lam maba'i rang bzhin sto rdo gur gyis gtams pa'i kyi rol su ma chung chu'i rab
346a2(rnying rgyud): rim pa gsum gyis mtshams bcad kyang mi 'gal cing 'jug pa byed par 'dzin no// gul te ba tsong mi byed na/ hU~Mlasal po de lasang po rtsi byas byargya pa khyog pa grang bcos byed kyis dang mnyam pa'i nang du dang ge shAng da gsal ba'i thags ka'i rna las
346a3(rnying rgyud): chad de/ sde byes nang rnams sa ti g+hadan da Ar/ de nas tsazhi ma'i khros te/ des tshogs spong brgya bcag nas ti gdun gyi stong du bting skar yang hUM bad+ha gros te sa ma'i snying ga po kho brgyazha la gas ma phrag drug pa'i ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sma da phrar zhabs can drab /
346a4(rnying rgyud): de dag las khro rgyang grangs med pa skyes ti gegs bskrad nas/ lhar 'dus pa las tho grar gyis gtams pa'i phyi rol tu me pung mtha' med du 'babrar ba'o// de ltar mtshams bcad pa'i dgos pa yang bAr tshad kyi bgegs kyis mi rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
346a5(rnying rgyud): nam snying gi gal phred las/ ngo bo bdag gzhan gnyis med kyang // dang po'i las can rnal 'byor pa'i// ting 'don nyams len par btsod dag/ nges par bsal gyi mtshams gcod bya// zhes so// bzhi pa ni/ sdig pa spong ba'i sgo bzhir bzhed de/ shes pa
346a6(rnying rgyud): chen pos bag chags rang bzhin med par dang / ye shes chen po'i mes bsregs te dang / gnong 'gyod drag po dang bcas te dang / nyams pa'i brda sbyar te bshags pa'o// dang po ni/ stang gA snong byed spong mkhan gsum ga yang dag par mi dmigs pa ste/
346a7(rnying rgyud): brjod med las/ don ma med migs spros las 'das pas na// rnam rtog gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur zhing // nas so// gnyis pa 'i/ shAg la rnams ciganas gsum las 'phros pa'i da bad po sgrog jig stsol lo/ du stongs na
346b1(rnying rgyud): sbyinas pa gagru par byab sgra/ da yang can gyi stabs la bshags yul ni/ bla ma yi ma paka/ 'a stod dang bcas pa mdun mkhar lhan ngas pa'o// rang rgyud kyi tan ni/ skabs sa 'gro bad blangs mas mi gtang ba yanan sngar rgyun bshags byas pas tshang dang / bshang
346b2(rnying rgyud): tshig las kyang 'byung ngo // sun 'byin pa'i stobs ni/ de dag gi spyan sngar gnod 'gyod drag pos bshags pa'o// gnyen po gan brten pa'i stobs ni/ sngar byas kyi gnyen por rnal 'byor gyi rim pa la 'jug snyam du sems brtan par bzung ba'o//
346b3(rnying rgyud): sor chud pa'i stobs ni/ rjes la dag par mos shing dga' ba bsgoms la/ phyin chad srog la babs kyang mi bgyid snyam du sdom pa'o// bzhi pa ni/ thabs de dag dang ldan pa'i sgo nas/ brjod med la sogs pa'i bshags chog gdung dbyangs
346b4(rnying rgyud): rtar bcug nas 'don par bya ste/ gal po las/ mi dge sdig pa'i bag chags rnams// gdung ba'i glu dang bcas te bshags// zhes so// lnga pa da ma bca' ni/ lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pos tshig brjod pa dang mthun par yi dam du bca' ba ste/ khro bo
346b5(rnying rgyud): puN+Da ri ka'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i dum bca' nyi shu pa'am/ bdun yan chad rdzogs pa'i skabs dang sbyar zhing / de'ang dpal 'phyeng dam pa'i rgyud las/ rdo rje rtse gcig phyag rgya yis// dam bca' rim pa tshul bzhin bstan// zhes pas rdo rje rtse gcig gis
346b6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya snying gar bcas te dam bca'o// drug pa ni/ g+has la la hoH/ zhes sogs dang / babs trag/ 'das bzhi/ mdzod gcig gi dgongs pas bskul pa/ hUM bzhis byin bsdus pas mkha' khyab kyi lha rnams rang la thi ma ste b+hin gyis rlob par bsam
346b7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de skad du'ang gal phreng las// sngags 'dzod 'od balnga'i phyag rgya yis// 'bras bu rnam lnga'i byin rlabs dbab// ces so// bdun pa ni/ phyi mchod dang sman gtor dkrug sum byin gyis thob pa ste 'og tu 'chad do// gnyis pa la/ zhi ba dang /

347a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa
347b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bla ma lta bu'i sems can la dngon med sgyu ma lta bu'i snying rje chen po nam mabang dang mnyam par bsgom pa'o// de gnyis tha dad du zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir rgyu'i ting 'dzin ni/ de lam/ sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen stan/
347b2(rnying rgyud): zhes pas rang rig pa nyid sdang stong gnyis su med pa'i yi ge a dkar po gsal brtan gyi tshad brgyad dang ldan pa te/ de yang btu na pa'i tshod bzhini/ mi g.yo ba/ mi 'gyur ba/ mngon par me 'gyur ba/ cir yang bskur du brngub pa'o// gsal ba
347b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi ni/ sa la le ba/ sang de pa/ lhang re ba/ lhag ge ba'o// de nas brtan pa'i yan lag tu/ a de las a phra mo'i spro bsdu dang / yi ge zhe gsum gyi spro bsdu bya ba ste/ 'di nyid las/ a/ rab tu brtan g+ha ra a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i
347b4(rnying rgyud): a rnams spro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas// bcus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan// de las ming tshogs gsal bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub che// rten dbyung ye shes rgyu yin no// zhes so// gnying
347b5(rnying rgyud): pa la/ rten gzhal yas khang dang / brten pa lha bsgom pa'o// dang po pa/ gzhi dbang chen yab yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa/ gzhal yas khang dngos bskyed pa/ zhar la gdan bskyed pa'o// dang po ni/ rin dra las/ de las rgyal ba'i bzhugs
347b6(rnying rgyud): gnas rten// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsgom// zhes pas/ chu'i yi ge a las 'thung lnga'i sa bon gyi yi ge rim par spros te/ de dag lus 'od 'phros pas phyi nang gi 'byung ba lnga dang lngar 'dzin pa'i zhen rtog sbyangs shing / ye shes kyi 'gyur ba
347b7(rnying rgyud): lnga'i yo tan bsdus pa las/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mthing ga zu gsum pa/ srung dacil lho s+ya zla ga ma/ chu kyil dkar po zlum po/ sa dkyil ser po gru bzhi pa rin chen sna bzhi'i ri rab dang bcas pa/ me dkyil dmar po bu gsum

348a7(rnying rgyud): nga nga / dganyis dang gzhir mtshungs pa yin no// gnyis pa btan pa sa bgying pa la/ ngi// ba byed pa'i chog dang / bgyid pa rgya'i mchen nyid/ dab ba kyis rna pa/ dzin ba dang
348b1(rnying rgyud): dgrongs pa ma mthunan/ 'thal panyis mar chog sgrub bya/ rlab sas la 'dunaH/ bdag sas gnanasas dang / tshogags byen// las/ bzhed pa dang po na/ thog mar sems babyu / byad nan sus pan byu bar sa nas/
348b2(rnying rgyud): thog gitshogs su mi shes kyi sna gasbyi nas bzung gA zhal yus lang gdan deng bcas pa bA ng+gA mo ba dang / hrI/ gad na sa sems kyil gyis 'jug par mos// byang chub kyi sems ye shes sra bskyed pa 'odon gyis sbyong ba nyid kyi ye shes rdzog dang nga /
348b3(rnying rgyud): dngas dang sems a drang por bsgoms nas 'byo 'du'i thubs/ A lus ska kyil sde dbyas su mtshan gyis na mA li dAd+ya/ A ring ltas nyid kyil gyi dbus sra dpe byung rjes bo na thA lI Te/ gnyis gnyis rim dung skor ba'i rang ba rjin chog gnyis pa hU~M/
348b4(rnying rgyud): me lor lta za'i ye shes so// de dag rjod kyi grong thag cig tu 'dril ba ni tshig gsum pa ste mnyam pa nyid ye shes so// 'od kyi gong bu las skye gyur nas/ de'i sgra mthun pa'i 'bras blo rdo rjer byin gyis rlob pa ni chog bzhi pa ste sor tog ye shes so// de yong
348b5(rnying rgyud): gyur pa las kun tu bzang po'i skur bskyed pa ni cho ga lnga pa ste bya grub ye shes so// de nas yum bskyed de sems sbyin las so so'i skya bskyed pa rang rang gi thugs kyis phyir phyung nas dkyil 'khor du 'god par mdzad do// rje rong zo ma dang kun+da mA khyen chen po na
348b6(rnying rgyud): lnga'i babyed tshul 'di 'drab las/ khyad par ting 'dzin gsum sngon du 'grobs/ ting 'dzin dang po gnyis hr-i da ye shes to tshig dang po dang / r+g+ha'i a yig lus ti zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdzog gnyis pa bskyed par mdzod nas/ ji srid tshig lnga pa
348b7(rnying rgyud): brjod rdzogs pa dang / gzhal yas pa babyed/ de nas bdag rdzas gnan pas kyichog pa 'jug dang mdzo/ bzhin gnyis pa pa/ bdig don gyis brgyas yin pa'i phyi'i bdag gisas su badzin gshegs pathab dang / rigs mi chub cang man
349a1(rnying rgyud): sa du dgazugs pa n+tu// ma/ bdag / rgyaganas pas sa // sa nan/ grubs sa /
349a2(rnying rgyud): ma ga nang spyo pa/ oM/ rnaMs ldan du byezhin ga pas na// zhes sogs rgyas gas la ba bas/ lhanam kyi gyur mchims nas kyang chub sems ca 'di ci dzun/ bdag la dag pas 'i bab+ba \u0f7f/ 'disan

349a5(rnying rgyud): su su ga sa sa

349b1(rnying rgyud): yab yu mA bskyed nas mkha' gsang ma rlob pa'i grong dang ye shes las dbang bskur ba rang mu ba rgyan las bshad cing / rnga rang zom dang can mkhyen rgan po ni zhi ba la'ang da ltar mdzad/ thar pa rnams ni khyoganyis kA lA tshogs thams cad bko krung nas
349b2(rnying rgyud): dkyus bzhin mdzad/ sa ma ston nyi ma gnyis kwa'i sbubs su mdzad pa la/ rta ston gzi brjid kyi zhal nas/ lugs snga ma gzung dang mthun kyang 'dir zur lugs ltar bris zhes par mul phyag len ma / kho bo ni/ lugs snga ma gnyis gang ltar
349b3(rnying rgyud): byas kyang ngag la bdu ma mthong la/ 'on kyang sngo so'i gzhung rtsa ba dang bstan pa'i rnam gzhag gi dbang du byas na/ zhi ba'i skabasus zur ba ltar 'thad de da zung dang 'od rim las de ltar 'byung ba'i phyir dang / khro bo'i skabs su rong pa ltar 'thad de/ dran pa rgyan
349b4(rnying rgyud): las der 'byung ba'i phyir snyam mo// sum ston gyi lugs de las/ rta snron gyi zhal nas pha rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i bu rgyal rigs su dang gis 'gro ba'i phyir sngar bskul nas 'og tu bsgyur mi dgos zhes gsungs so// de wAr sras gnyis kyi cho ga'i sgo nas
349b5(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'i blangs ni/ rgya mtsho las/ rang byung dngos dang mi 'gal zhing // 'bras bu nyid la lum shes pas// ma lus dkyil 'khor thig le rnams// bdag gi sras su bsgom par bya// zhes dang / gang gis gang la gsol btab pas//
349b6(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes byin rlabs srungs byas nas// thugs zhugs 'dres par dbyer med na// sras gyur dgongs pa nI la gnas// zhes dang / lam dang 'bras bu'i khyad par las// rtogs pa'i ye shes bod las byung // byin rlabs 'bras bu dngos 'brel
349b7(rnying rgyud): so// bde ba gshegs pa'i sras tshogs bsgo mo// zhes so// tshul 'di'i man gning chung dang 'od ri ma sogs las 'byung ngo // bzhed pa gsum pa ni/ cho ga gsum las/ dang po gsung yig 'dru tshad ni/ spyi'i yi ge las yi ge hrI/
350a1(rnying rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis smos te gdanas sa'i steng du bkod la klu yig tid yi ge spyi rab stims nas/ de dag las sgobasu bya ba'o// gnyis pa thugs phyug mtshan gyi chog ni yi ge rnams 'od \u0f7fhe rdo rje dang 'khor lo sogs so
350a2(rnying rgyud): so'i phyag mtshan du gyur pa las spro bsdu bya ba'o// gsum pa sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho ga nI/ phyag mtshan rnams yongs su gyur pa las/ hUM badz+ra d+h+r-i ka sogs so song bskyed sngags brjod pas rdul pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sgrar bskyed pa'o//
350a3(rnying rgyud): de ltar yang / lha sgra bsgom pa'i mni drag las// rtsa ba'i yi ge bsgom pa dang // blugs rten phyag mtshan bsgom pa dang // rdzogs pa'i sgra ru bsgom pa dang // zhes s+ho// gnyis pa bskyed pa lha'i mtshan nyid la/ ji ltar bzhugs pa tshul/ gang

350a5(rnying rgyud): sogs kyis bstan te/ sngar gyi gdan de dag gi steng du rigs lnga dang kun bzang rnams mdzad pa rdzogs pa'i phyir rdzogs pa'i phyil krung ste rigs lnga mnyam rmil dang kun bzang rdo skyil lo// rigs kyi yum lnga ni btul zhugs kyi skyil krung gis g.yon phyogs nas 'khril zhing /
350a6(rnying rgyud): bzang mo nI pa kyil lo// sems dpa' rnams ni mdzad pa mardzogs pa'i phyir 'bab tshul te/ yub rnams g.yas brgyad pa'i phyed sgril dang / yun rnams de las ldog pa'i stabs kyis g.yon nges nas 'khrud pa'o// sgo ba rnams ni gdug pa can 'dul ba'i
350a7(rnying rgyud): phyir gyad kyo dor stabs kyis thal gyi brgyan pa'o// thab drug ni 'tsho don la gshegs tshul gyis drang po bzhengs pa'o// gnyis pa ni/ 'khor lo rgyal po zhes sogs kyi skabs su bstan te/ rtsibs bzhi ste ba dang bcas pa lnga la rigs lnga yab yum dang /

350b3(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid las lhag pa'i ye shes sgro 'byur zhes gsungs pas/ de ltar na lhag pa ma yin par 'gyur ba'i phyir gsungs/ kho bo ni/ de tsam gyi rigs pas dgag par mi nus mod kyi/ 'o na kyang rtsibs mtshan la 'god pa'i rtogs ni legs pa nyid do zhes
350b4(rnying rgyud): ste/ chu mtshan bshad sbyar rdo rje me long las/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs mtshan shar sto nas// sa snying dkar po myu gu 'dzin// zhes sogs dang / sgrub bab las/ rtsi byas mtshan 'thugs kyi sems dpa' bzhi ste/ drim pa ni yi ge'i dbang du gsungs pa ste/
350b5(rnying rgyud): gral ni lugs dang mthun pa kho na'o// zhes dang / mngon tog sA las kyang / gtso bong ga las phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs pa chen nas snying yab yum la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par bzhugs so// zhes pa'i lung yo mnyam gyi steng du sngar gyi sh+tsa
350b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang bla mA ba byud pa'i phyag bzhes sku mtshan la 'god par mdzad pa'i phyir ro// des na shar lho'i rtsibs mtshan las snying yab yum bkod nas g.yas skor gyis rim bzhin/ na ma rnying / spyan ras gzigs/ phyag rdor rnams so so'i yum dang bcas pa'o//

351a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs pa'i phyir/ de ltar yang rgya mtsho lngas/ lo brang dbus kyi lte bA la// bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo bskor// bkra ba rjod kyis bu mdun na gnas// zhos so// dkyil 'khor du 'god pa'i cho ga tso ga thams la bzugs

354b7(rnying rgyud): brdzes// rang bzhin rdo rje gsum gnas pa// rgyu gnyis tshul gyis rang sdang ba'o// zhes so// yang lte ba dang gas gnas su tha ba la gnas pa'i yig gnyis las/ ana? rA ga dang / pU nga'i sngags kyis yon tan dang phrin las kyi lha gnyis gang sngar
355a1(rnying rgyud): bskyed par gsungs te/ delas/ lci brna ma gnyis thab // tho ldang migs nyid// rdzas mthun 'ad las yon tan las// yan lag rdzogs pa'i gan byin ldan// zhes so// daltar /
355a2(rnying rgyud): na yan lag lhag pa'i lha dgu bsgom par bshad pa dang 'gal te/ lha bcu gcig byung ba'i phyir zer na/ skyon med de/ yon tan b+hinA las gnyis sku gsung thugs kyi wAr byung yin pas/ lam bskam pa'i dbang du lhag pa'i sngan
355a3(rnying rgyud): bsgom mo zhes bla ma rnams gasbyangs pa ltar 'thad pa'i phyir te/ lam ri mra las/ gnas gcig ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// rmyi mgrin tsit+ta'i gnas gsum du// byin rlabs rdo rjegasum du bzhom// dgra li gnas la 'i shas
355a4(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga dang rdzogs pas brgyan// zhes gsungs pa'i phyir/ mdor na su tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis por ro la'ang lhag pa'i lha gu dang cu lha gang yin nyid dang bcung cu ste/ thams cad kyang sdang la rang bzhin med pa me
355a5(rnying rgyud): long nang gi gzugs brtan lta bur shes par byaba'o// /
